title: sa_buddhasvāmin-bṛhatkathāślokasaṃgraha
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahākhātā mahāśālā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pury asty ujjayinīti yā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāmbhodhimahāśaila</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mekhalaiva mahāmahī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahā-khātā mahā-śālā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pury- asty ujjayini īti yā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-ambho-dhi-mahā-śaila</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mekhala aiva mahā-mahī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāsādān yatra paśyantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃtatān haimarājatān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>merukailāsakūṭebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>spṛhayanti na nāgarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāsādān yatra paśyantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃtatān haima-rājatān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>meru-kailāsa-kūṭebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>spṛhayanti na nāgarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vedamaurvīvipañcīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhvanayaḥ pratimandiram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatra saṃnipatanto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na bādhante parasparam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>veda-maurvī-vipañcīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhvanayaḥ prati-mandiram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatra saṃnipatanto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na bādhante paras-param ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtaṃ varṇanayā tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasyāṃ satatam āsate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākālaprabhṛtayas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaktvā śivapuraṃ gaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtaṃ varṇanayā tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasyāṃ satatam āsate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-kāla-prabhṛtayas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaktvā śivapuraṃ gaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām āsīn mahāseno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāsenaḥ kṣitīśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya devīsahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣoḍaśa śrīpater iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām āsīn mahāseno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-senaḥ kṣiti-īśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya devī-sahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣoḍaśa śrī-pater iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ciraṃ pālayatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajāḥ śāstoktakāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gopālaḥ pālakaś ceti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutau jātau guṇāmbudhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ciraṃ pālayatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajāḥ śāsta-ukta-kāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gopālaḥ pālakaś ca iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutau jātau guṇa-ambu-dhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bṛhaspatisamaś cāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantrī bharatarohakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rohantakaḥ surohaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyāstāṃ tatsamau sutau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bṛhaspati-samaś ca asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantrī bharatarohakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rohantakaḥ surohaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyā astāṃ tat-samau sutau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>narendramantriputrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caturvidyārthavedinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayogeṣu ca daṣāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yānti sma divasāḥ sukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nara-indra-mantri-putrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catur-vidyā-artha-vedinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayogeṣu ca daṣāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yānti sma divasāḥ sukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gāṃ pālayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gopālaḥ pitṛpālitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālako 'pi yavīyastvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yauvarājyam apālayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gāṃ pālayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gopālaḥ pitṛ-pālitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālako 'pi yavīyastvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yauvarājyam apālayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantriputrau tu mantritvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atha bhūmir naveśvarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>navamantrikṛtārakṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāyate sma punar vā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantri-putrau tu mantritvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atha bhūmir nava-īśvarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nava-mantri-kṛta-ārakṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāyate sma punar vā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gajarājam atho rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dānarājivirājitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhiṣṭhāya jagatsāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirjagāma bahiḥ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaja-rājam atho rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāna-rāji-virājitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhiṣṭhāya jagat-sāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirjagāma bahiḥ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taddarśanāśayāyātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anekaṃ nṛkadambakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bibhyad vyāḍād gajāt tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>itaś cetaś ca vidrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad-darśana-āśayā āyātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anekaṃ nṛ-kadambakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bibhyad vyāḍād gajāt tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>itaś ca itaś ca vidrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kanyakānyatamā tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhyamāṇātha hastinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṃśuprākārataḥ prāṃśor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agamyāṃ parikhām agāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kanyaka ānyatamā tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhyamāṇa ātha hastinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṃśu-prākārataḥ prāṃśor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agamyāṃ parikhām agāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khātapātavyathājāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃjñānāśāt kṣaṇaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṭasthā hastipṛṣṭhasthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sābhāṣata ruṣā nṛpam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khāta-pāta-vyathā-ājāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃjñāna-āśāt kṣaṇaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṭa-sthā hasti-pṛṣṭha-sthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa ābhāṣata ruṣā nṛpam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avadhyam avadhīr yas tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitaraṃ tasya kiṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhītavedaṃ yo hanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇaṃ tasya ke mṛgāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avadhyam avadhīr yas tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitaraṃ tasya kiṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhīta-vedaṃ yo hanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇaṃ tasya ke mṛgāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti kanyāvacaḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥśravaṃ śvapacair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cinteṣu bhinnahṛdayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviveśa niveśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti kanyā-vacaḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥ-śravaṃ śvapacair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cinteṣu bhinna-hṛdayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviveśa niveśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ativāhya ca duḥkhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dinaśeṣaṃ samāsamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janavādopalambhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradoṣe niryayau gṛhāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ativāhya ca duḥ-khena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dina-śeṣaṃ sama-asamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jana-vāda-upalambhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradoṣe niryayau gṛhāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kālakambalasaṃvītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāsicarmāsiputrikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samantrāgadasaṃnāhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃcacāra śanaiḥ śanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāla-kambala-saṃvītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-asi-carma-asi-putrikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-mantra-agada-saṃnāhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃcacāra śanaiḥ śanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha śuśrāva kasmiṃścit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatāyatane dhvanim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhisārikayā sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣamāṇasya kāminaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha śuśrāva kasmiṃś-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatā-āyatane dhvanim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhisārikayā sa-ardhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣamāṇasya kāminaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hataṃ muṣṭibhir ākāśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuṣāṇāṃ kaṇḍanaṃ kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā yena tvayā sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>baddhā prītir abuddhinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hataṃ muṣṭibhir ākāśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuṣāṇāṃ kaṇḍanaṃ kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā yena tvayā sa-ardhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>baddhā prītir a-buddhinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyam etāvatī velā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khidyamānena yāpitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā tvaṃ tu gṛhād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na niryāsi pativratā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyam etāvatī velā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khidyamānena yāpitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā tvaṃ tu gṛhād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na niryāsi pati-vratā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaumāraḥ subhāgo bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi nāma priyas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khalīkṛtaiḥ kim asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛtheva kulaputrakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaumāraḥ su-bhāgo bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi nāma priyas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khalī-kṛtaiḥ kim asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛtha īva kula-putrakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi tataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā pragalbhābhisārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vihasya viṭam āha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvādṛśā hi hatatrapāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi tataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā pragalbha-abhisārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vihasya viṭam āha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvādṛśā- hi hata-trapāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nanu cittaṃ mayārādhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāpi bhavataḥ kṛte</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi bhartṝn aviśvāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramante kulaṭā viṭaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nanu cittaṃ mayā ārādhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya api bhavataḥ kṛte</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi bhartṝn a-viśvāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramante ku-laṭā viṭaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nirmakṣikaṃ bhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhu pātuṃ manorathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jahi ghātaya bālaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patiṃ nityapramādinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nir-makṣikaṃ bhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhu pātuṃ mano-rathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jahi ghātaya bālaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patiṃ nitya-pramādinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pāpād asi trastaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuṭaṃ nāhaṃ tava priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu durvārarāgāndhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutāṃ yāti prajāpatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pāpād asi trastaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuṭaṃ na ahaṃ tava priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu dur-vāra-rāga-andhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutāṃ yāti prajāpatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athavālaṃ vivādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaidharmyaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena rājyasukhāndhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prajāpālaḥ pitā hataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athava ālaṃ vivādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaidharmyaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena rājya-su-kha-andhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prajā-pālaḥ pitā hataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suduḥśravam idaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gopālo durvacaṃ vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gacchann anyatra śuśrāva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhvaniṃ viprasya jalpataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>su-duḥ-śravam idaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gopālo dur-vacaṃ vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gacchann anyatra śuśrāva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhvaniṃ viprasya jalpataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi brāhmaṇi jāgarṣi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nandini krandate śiśuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaritaṃ yājate dehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>stanyaṃ kaṇṭho 'sya mā śuṣat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi brāhmaṇi jāgarṣi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nandini krandate śiśuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaritaṃ yājate dehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>stanyaṃ kaṇṭho 'sya mā śuṣat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā giraṃ bhartur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinidrā brāhmaṇī sutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛghātin mriyasveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirdayaṃ nirabhartsayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā giraṃ bhartur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vi-nidrā brāhmaṇī sutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛ-ghātin mriyasva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nir-dayaṃ nirabhartsayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āḥ pāpe kim asaṃbhaddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛghātinn iti tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bālo 'yam uktety enaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇaḥ kupito 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āḥ pāpe kim a-saṃbhaddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛ-ghātinn iti tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bālo 'yam ukta ity enaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇaḥ kupito 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim āryaputra putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadā rājñā pitā hataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutismṛtivid ity etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uvāca brāhmaṇī patim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim ārya-putra putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadā rājñā pitā hataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śruti-smṛti-vid ity etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uvāca brāhmaṇī patim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutvaivamādi kaulīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayat kṣaṇadāśeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asaṃmīlitalocanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutva aivam-ādi kaulīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviśya antaḥpuraṃ nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayat kṣaṇa-dā-śeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-saṃmīlita-locanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gāḍhāndhakārāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>velāyāṃ maṃtriṇau rahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apṛcchat ko 'yam asmāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravādaḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gāḍha-andha-kārāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>velāyāṃ maṃtriṇau rahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apṛcchat ko 'yam asmāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravādaḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāv ūcatus trastau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satrāsaṃ nṛpacoditau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaulīnahetuśrutaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cittaṃ devāvadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāv ūcatus trastau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-trāsaṃ nṛpa-coditau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaulīna-hetu-śrutaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cittaṃ deva avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sugṛhītābhidhānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradyotasya pitus tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsann avyabhicārīṇy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ariṣṭāny aṣṭau mumūrṣataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>su-gṛhīta-abhidhānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradyotasya pitus tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsann a-vyabhicārīṇy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ariṣṭāny aṣṭau mumūrṣataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uddhārye dhavale keśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pramādāt kṛṣṇae uddhṛte</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uddhartāraṃ mahīpālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartayām āsa nāpitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uddhārye dhavale keśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pramādāt kṛṣṇae uddhṛte</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uddhartāraṃ mahī-pālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartayām āsa nāpitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhuñjānena ca pāṣāṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśanāgreṇa khaṇḍite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulakramāgato vṛddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūpakāraḥ pramāpitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhuñjānena ca pāṣāṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśana-agreṇa khaṇḍite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kula-krama-āgato vṛddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūpa-kāraḥ pramāpitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakṛter viparītatvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānann apy evamādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabho vidher vidheyatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇān apy abādhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakṛter viparītatvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānann apy evam-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabho vidher vidheyatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇān apy abādhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartur īdṛśi vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantrī tasyāvayoḥ pitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adṛṣṭabhartṛvyasanaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvam evāgamad divam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartur īdṛśi vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantrī tasya avayoḥ pitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-dṛṣṭa-bhartṛ-vyasanaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvam eva agamad divam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutamantrivināśas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa rājā rājayakṣmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guruśokasahāyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasaivābhyabhūyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śruta-mantri-vināśas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa rājā rāja-yakṣmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guru-śoka-sahāyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasa aiva abhyabhūyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāte divaṃ yāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātukāme ca bhūpatau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajāsu ca viraktāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātau svaḥ kiṃkriyākulau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāte divaṃ yāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātu-kāme ca bhū-patau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajāsu ca viraktāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātau svaḥ kiṃ-kriyā-ākulau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāptakālam idaṃ śreya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti buddhvā prasāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaulīnam idam āvābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saparyanteṣv avantiṣu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāpta-kālam idaṃ śreya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti buddhvā prasāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaulīnam idam āvābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-pary-anteṣv avantiṣu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krodhabādhitabodhatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bādhamānaṃ nijāḥ prajāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bandhayām āsa rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājaputraḥ priyaprajaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krodha-bādhita-bodhatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bādhamānaṃ nijāḥ prajāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bandhayām āsa rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāja-putraḥ priya-prajaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śṛṅkhalātantracaraṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svatantrād bhraṃśitaḥ padāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhasya mahato dadhyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa rājendro gajendravat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śṛṅkhalā-tantra-caraṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-tantrād bhraṃśitaḥ padāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-khasya mahato dadhyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa rāja-indro gaja-indra-vat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintāmuṣitanidratvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āhāraviraheṇa ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kṣapāḥ kṣapayan kṣīṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvatsaraśatāyatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintā-muṣita-nidratvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āhāra-viraheṇa ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kṣapāḥ kṣapayan kṣīṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvatsara-śata-āyatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putreṇaivam avastho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajāpriyacikīrṣuṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na mukta eva muktaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvat prāṇaiḥ priyair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putreṇa evam avastho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajā-priya-cikīrṣuṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na mukta eva muktaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvat prāṇaiḥ priyair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nidānam idam etasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaulīnasya vigarhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>itarad vādhunā devaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhur ity atha bhūpatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nidānam idam etasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaulīnasya vigarhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>itarad va ādhunā devaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhur ity atha bhū-patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhomukhaḥ kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>talāhatamahītalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā ca sāsram ākāśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anātha idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adho-mukhaḥ kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tala-āhata-mahī-talaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā ca sa-asram ākāśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-nātha idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tulyau śukrabṛhaspatyor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvāṃ muktvā suhṛttamau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anapāyam upāyaṃ kaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayuñjītaitam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tulyau śukra-bṛhaspatyor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvāṃ muktvā suhṛttamau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-apāyam upāyaṃ kaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayuñjīta etam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu sattvavatām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkāśūnyadhiyāṃ kramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭādṛṣṭabhayagrasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetasāṃ na tu mādṛśām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu sattva-vatām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkā-śūnya-dhiyāṃ kramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭa-a-dṛṣṭa-bhaya-grasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetasāṃ na tu mādṛśām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmat pālayataṃ bhadrau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pālakaṃ pālakaṃ buvaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ tv alīkakaulīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśakto 'ham upekṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmat pālayataṃ bhadrau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pālakaṃ pālakaṃ buvaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ tv alīka-kaulīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-śakto 'ham upekṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vrīḍādhomukhamantriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kūjan prakāśayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣīṇāṃ tāmraśikhaḥ kṣapām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya evaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vrīḍā-adho-mukha-mantriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kūjan prakāśayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣīṇāṃ tāmra-śikhaḥ kṣapām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha śuśruvire vācaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūtamāgadhabandinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaśodhavalitānanta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>digantodbudhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha śuśruvire vācaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūta-māgadha-bandinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaśo-dhavalita-ananta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dig-anta udbudhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīnadīnaṃ tad ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇadāraṇam apriyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pidhāya pārthivaḥ karṇāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uttamāṅgam akampayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīna-dīnaṃ tad ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇa-dāraṇam apriyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pidhāya pārthivaḥ karṇāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uttama aṅgam akampayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cāvocat pratīhārī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivāryantām amī mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣate kṣārāvadekena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ phalaṃ bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca avocat pratīhārī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivāryantām amī mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣate kṣāra-avadekena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ phalaṃ bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc cāsyātha vā dhiṅ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evam ātmāpavādinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu praśasyam ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāham arhāmi ninditum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca asya atha vā dhiṅ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evam ātma-apavādinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu praśasyam ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na aham arhāmi ninditum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niryantraṇavihāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cirajīvini rājani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājaputreṇa laḍitaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kenānyena yathā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nir-yantraṇa-vihāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cira-jīvini rājani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-putreṇa laḍitaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kena anyena yathā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samucchinnaduruccheda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāhyābhyantaravairiṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varṇāśramāḥ svadharmebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vā vicalitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sam-ucchinna-dur-uccheda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāhya-abhyantara-vairiṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varṇa-āśramāḥ sva-dharmebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vā vicalitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avantivardhanasamo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nijāhāryaguṇākaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putraḥ punnarakāt trātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasyānyasya yathā mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avantivardhana-samo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nijāhārya-guṇa-ākaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putraḥ pun-narakāt trātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasya anyasya yathā mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athavāstām idaṃ sarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekenaivāsmi vardhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naravāhanadevena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāmātrā cakravartinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athava āstām idaṃ sarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekena eva asmi vardhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naravāhanadevena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāmātrā cakra-vartinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eka eva tu me nāsīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇaḥ so 'py ayam āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasādān mantrivṛṣayor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tapovanasevanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eka eva tu me nā asīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇaḥ so 'py ayam āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasādān mantri-vṛṣayor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tapo-vana-sevanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti niṣkampasaṃkalpaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>codayām āsa mantriṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sasiṃhāsanam āsthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇḍape dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti niṣkampa-saṃkalpaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>codayām āsa mantriṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-siṃha-āsanam āsthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇḍape dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayos tu gatayoḥ keśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāpayitvā savalkalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kamaṇḍalusanāthaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūpālo niryayau gṛhāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayos tu gatayoḥ keśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāpayitvā sa-valkalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kamaṇḍalu-sa-nāthaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhū-pālo niryayau gṛhāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viṣādaviplutākṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vakṣonikṣiptapāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyamāno 'varodhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viveśāsthānamaṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viṣāda-vipluta-akṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vakṣo-nikṣipta-pāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyamāno 'varodhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viveśā asthāna-maṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>trāsamlānakapolena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭaḥ pṛthulacakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālakenābravīt taṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthita eva sthitaṃ sthitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>trāsa-mlāna-kapolena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭaḥ pṛthula-cakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālakena abravīt taṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthita eva sthitaṃ sthitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasādāt tāta tātasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vatsarājasya ca tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>buddheḥ svasyāś ca śuddhāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ nāma na parīkṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasādāt tāta tātasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vatsa-rājasya ca tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>buddheḥ svasyāś ca śuddhāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ nāma na parīkṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ato 'nuśāsitāraṃ tvām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anuśāsati bāliśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena loke tae ucyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viyātāḥ pitṛśikṣakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ato 'nuśāsitāraṃ tvām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anuśāsati bāliśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena loke tae ucyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viyātāḥ pitṛ-śikṣakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvat tu mayā vācyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitryaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varṇāśramaparitrārtham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idam adhyāsyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvat tu mayā vācyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitryaṃ siṃha-āsanaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varṇa-āśrama-paritra-artham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idam adhyāsyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac cāvaśyam anuṣṭheyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmākīnaṃ vacas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mādṛśāṃ hi na vākyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimṛśanti bhavādṛśāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca a-vaśyam anuṣṭheyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmākīnaṃ vacas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā-dṛśāṃ hi na vākyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimṛśanti bhavā-dṛśāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itīdaṃ pālakaḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthitvā cādhomukhaḥ kṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttaraṃ cintayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsāgrāhitalocanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti-idaṃ pālakaḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthitvā ca adho-mukhaḥ kṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttaraṃ cintayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsa-agra-āhita-locanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtakṛtrimaroṣas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā pālakam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhoḥ siṃhāsanam āroha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ tavottaracintayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta-kṛtrima-roṣas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā pālakam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhoḥ siṃha-āsanam āroha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ tava uttara-cintayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ cottaraśatenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayāhaṃ sopapattinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vegaḥ prāvṛṣi śoṇasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caraṇeneva durdharaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ ca uttara-śatena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaya āhaṃ sa-upapattinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vegaḥ prāvṛṣi śoṇasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caraṇena iva dur-dharaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti dvijātayaḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purohitapuraḥsarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣādagadgadagiraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramṛjyāśru babhāṣire ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti dvi-jātayaḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puro-hita-puraḥ-sarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣāda-gadgada-giraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramṛjya aśru babhāṣire ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pālakas te niyojyatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ājñāṃ mā sma vicārayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvanniyogān niyoktāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasmād vayam udāsmahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pālakas te niyojyatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ājñāṃ mā sma vicārayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvan-niyogān niyoktāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasmād vayam udāsmahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhriyamāṇe prajāpāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyeṣṭhe bhrātari pālakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛgendrāsanam ārohan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khaṭvārūḍho bhaven nanu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhriyamāṇe prajā-pāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyeṣṭhe bhrātari pālakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛga-indra-āsanam ārohan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khaṭvā-ārūḍho bhaven nanu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājyāgnim ādadhad vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayi varṣaśatāyuṣi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parivettāram ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayaṃ manyeta ninditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājya-agnim ādadhad va āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayi varṣa-śata-āyuṣi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parivettāram ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayaṃ manyeta ninditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād asmān nivartasva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkalpad atibhīṣaṇāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śokajāny aśruvārīṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantv ānandajāni naḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād asmān nivartasva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkalpad ati-bhīṣaṇāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śoka-jāny aśru-vārīṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantv ānanda-jāni naḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>baddhāñjalir athovāca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃcin namitakaṃdharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ vaḥ pīḍayitvā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vacobhir iti pārthivaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>baddha-añjalir atha uvāca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ-cin namita-kaṃ-dharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ vaḥ pīḍayitvā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vacobhir iti pārthivaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayāyam abhyanujñāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rakṣaṇe ca kṣamaḥ kṣiteḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khaṭvārūḍho na bhavitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ninditaḥ śabdavedibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya āyam abhyanujñāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rakṣaṇe ca kṣamaḥ kṣiteḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khaṭva-ārūḍho na bhavitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ninditaḥ śabda-vedibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asamarthe ca rājyāgneḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pālane patite mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parivettāpi naivāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣyati narādhipaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-sam-arthe ca rājya-agneḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pālane patite mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parivetta āpi na eva ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣyati nara-adhipaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac cāpi pihitāḥ karṇā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṇya patitadhvanim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajābhis tac ca na mṛṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā hi nihataḥ pitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca api pihitāḥ karṇā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṇya patita-dhvanim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajābhis tac ca na mṛṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā hi nihataḥ pitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad idaṃ pātakaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmatpīḍāpraśāntaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyaścittaṃ vrajan kartuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na nivāryo 'smi kenacit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad idaṃ pātakaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmat-pīḍā-praśāntaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyaś-cittaṃ vrajan kartuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na nivāryo 'smi kena-cit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā cātyaktadharmeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat prajānāṃ kṛte kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya pratyupakārāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pālakaḥ pālyatām ayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā ca a-tyakta-dharmeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat prajānāṃ kṛte kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya pratyupakārāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pālakaḥ pālyatām ayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itīdaṃ prakṛtīr uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pālakaṃ punar abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avantivardhanaṃ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>matprītyā pālayer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti idaṃ prakṛtīr uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pālakaṃ punar abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avantivardhanaṃ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mat-prītyā pālayer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vilakṣahasitaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gopālaṃ pālako 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avantivardhano rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājan kasmān na jāyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vilakṣa-hasitaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gopālaṃ pālako 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avantivardhano rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājan kasmān na jāyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satsu bhārtṛṣu bhūpāla</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇavatsv api bhūbhujaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nikṣiptavantaḥ śrūyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putreṣv eva guruṃ dhuram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satsu bhārtṛṣu bhū-pāla</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇavatsv api bhū-bhujaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nikṣiptavantaḥ śrūyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putreṣv eva guruṃ dhuram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gopālas tam athovāca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaviṣyati yuvā yadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaṃ ca vṛddhas tadā yuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam eva kariṣyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gopālas tam atha uvāca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaviṣyati yuvā yadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaṃ ca vṛddhas tadā yuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam eva kariṣyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ niruttarāḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛtīs tāḥ sapālakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvatīrthāmbukalaśair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhyaṣiñcat sa pālakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ nir-uttarāḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛtīs tāḥ sa-pālakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-tīrtha-ambu-kalaśair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhyaṣiñcat sa pālakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āropya cainaṃ tvaritaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siṃhāsanam udaṅmukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirjagāma purāt svasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekarātroṣito yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āropya ca enaṃ tvaritaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siṃha-āsanam udaṅ-mukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirjagāma purāt svasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eka-rātra-uṣito yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_1.91'>
<l>atha rājani kānanāvṛte puram āspanditalokalocanām |</l>
<l>nibhṛtaśvasitāmayadhvaniṃ mṛtakalpāṃ praviveśa pālakaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_1.91'>
<lg>
<l>atha rājani kānana-āvṛte puram āspandita-loka-locanām |</l>
<l>nibhṛta-śvasita-āmaya-dhvaniṃ mṛta-kalpāṃ praviveśa pālakaḥ ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bibhrad durucchedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śokaṃ bhrātṛviyogajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utsṛṣṭapṛthivīcintaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pālakaḥ kālam akṣipat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bibhrad dur-ucchedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śokaṃ bhrātṛ-viyoga-jam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utsṛṣṭa-pṛthivī-cintaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pālakaḥ kālam akṣipat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ purodhaḥprabhṛtayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadācid avadan prajāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utsīdantīḥ prajā rājan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nārhasi tvam upekṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ puro-dhaḥ-prabhṛtayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadā-cid avadan prajāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utsīdantīḥ prajā- rājan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na arhasi tvam upekṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātuḥ puraḥ pratijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrakṣāṃ rakṣituṃ kṣitim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ śocasi na śoko 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāyaḥ kṣitirakṣaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātuḥ puraḥ pratijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dū-rakṣāṃ rakṣituṃ kṣitim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ śocasi na śoko 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāyaḥ kṣiti-rakṣaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaṣṭhaṃ pāpāṃśam ādatte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rakṣann api nṛpaḥ prajāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nikṣiptakṣitirakṣas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvam eva na muñcati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaṣṭhaṃ pāpa-aṃśam ādatte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rakṣann api nṛpaḥ prajāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nikṣipta-kṣiti-rakṣas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvam eva na muñcati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāj jighāṃsatā pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṇyaṃ copacicīṣatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājan dhanyāḥ prajāḥ kāryāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukhaṃ cānububhūṣatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāj jighāṃsatā pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṇyaṃ ca upacicīṣatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājan dhanyāḥ prajāḥ kāryāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-khaṃ ca anububhūṣatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ced arthayamānānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacanaṃ naḥ kariṣyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhruvaṃ drakṣyasi saṃkrāntā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>deśān rājanvataḥ prajāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ced arthayamānānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacanaṃ naḥ kariṣyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhruvaṃ drakṣyasi saṃkrāntā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>deśān rājanvataḥ prajāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avṛttapūrvam asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udāsīne tvayi śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balād agnigṛhān nītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puroḍāśaḥ śunā kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-vṛtta-pūrvam asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udāsīne tvayi śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balād agni-gṛhān nītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puro-ḍāśaḥ śunā kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>baṭoś ca bhrāmyato bhikṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhikṣāpātrād anāvṛtāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>baṭutvāt kṣiptacittasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛtaḥ kākena modakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>baṭoś ca bhrāmyato bhikṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhikṣā-pātrād an-āvṛtāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>baṭutvāt kṣipta-cittasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛtaḥ kākena modakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā sasaṃtrāso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā tāḍitadundubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛgendrāsanam adhyāste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sumeruṃ maghavān iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā sa-saṃtrāso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā tāḍita-dundubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛga-indra-āsanam adhyāste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-meruṃ maghavān iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin nārūḍhamātre ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samaṃ vikasitāḥ prajāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udayācalakūṭasthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nalinya iva bhāskare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin na-ārūḍha-mātre ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samaṃ vikasitāḥ prajāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udaya-a-cala-kūṭa-sthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nalinya iva bhāskare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athātīte kvacit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viprān papraccha pārthivaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmam ācakṣatāṃ pūjyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddham ity atha te 'bruvan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha atīte kva-cit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viprān papraccha pārthivaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmam ācakṣatāṃ pūjyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddham ity atha te 'bruvan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvavidyāvidā dharmaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kas tvayā nāvalokitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācāro 'yam iti vyaktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anuyuktās tvayā vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarva-vidyā-vidā dharmaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kas tvayā na avalokitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācāro 'yam iti vyaktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anuyuktās tvayā vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāgādimantaḥ puruṣās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tair uktā hy apramāṇatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāṃkhyādīnām akāryatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedasyaiva pramāṇatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāga-ādi-mantaḥ puruṣās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tair uktā hy a-pramāṇatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāṃkhya-ādīnām a-kāryatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedasya eva pramāṇatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād vedeṣu vihitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat tad āsevyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutvedaṃ nṛpatir yajñair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īje niḥsaṃkhyadakṣiṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād vedeṣu vihitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat tad āsevyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutva īdaṃ nṛ-patir yajñair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īje niḥ-saṃkhya-dakṣiṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athotsṛṣṭaprajākāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīkṣāsantānasevayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mantrinau jātasaṃtrāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ kadācid avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha utsṛṣṭa-prajā-kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīkṣā-santāna-sevayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mantrinau jāta-saṃtrāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ kadā-cid avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uddhṛtaḥ śokapaṅkāt tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>balibhir dvijakuñjaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uddhāryaḥ sāṃprataṃ kena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīkṣāpaṅkād duruttarāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uddhṛtaḥ śoka-paṅkāt tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>balibhir dvi-ja-kuñjaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uddhāryaḥ sāṃprataṃ kena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīkṣā-paṅkād dur-uttarāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāmārthau yady api tyaktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sevyāv eva tathāpi tau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durlabho hi vinā tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmaḥ suddho nṛpair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāma-arthau yady api tyaktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sevyāv eva tatha āpi tau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dur-labho hi vinā tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmaḥ suddho nṛ-pair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upapannam idaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratiśrutya tatheti ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devatāyācanavyagra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>strīkam antaḥpuraṃ yayau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upapannam idaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratiśrutya tatha īti ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devatā-yācana-vyagra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>strī-kam antaḥ-puraṃ yayau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pānābharaṇavāsaḥ srak</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyavāgdānamānitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antaḥpuracarīḥ praiśyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cacāra paritoṣitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāna-ābharaṇa-vāsaḥ srak</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>priya-vāg-dāna-mānitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antaḥ-pura-carīḥ praiśyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cacāra paritoṣitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anantaram anujyeṣṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devīḥ saṃmānya bhūpatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāsukinyā mahādevyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nināya saha yāminīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-antaram anu-jyeṣṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devīḥ saṃmānya bhū-patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāsukinyā mahā-devyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nināya saha yāminīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tāmracūḍarutibhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandivṛndair vibodhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāsiṣṭa puraḥsaṃdhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādivākaradarśanāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tāmra-cūḍa-rutibhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandi-vṛndair vibodhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāsiṣṭa puraḥ-saṃdhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ā-divā-kara-darśanāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato dhavalavāsaḥ srag</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃkārānulepanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stūyamāno jayāśīrbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsthānasthānam āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato dhavala-vāsaḥ srag</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ-kāra-anulepanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stūyamāno jaya-āśīrbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsthāna-sthānam āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>purodhaḥprabhṛtīs tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛtīḥ prakṛtipriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mānayitvā yathāyogyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sopacāraṃ vyasarjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puro-dhaḥ-prabhṛtīs tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛtīḥ prakṛti-priyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mānayitvā yathā-yogyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-upacāraṃ vyasarjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>smayamānas tato rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantriṇāv idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āpānabhūmir udyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramaṇīyā prakalpyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>smayamānas tato rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantriṇāv idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āpāna-bhūmir udyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramaṇīyā prakalpyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko hi yuṣmadvidhasuhṛd</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vihitāpatpratikriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣayān na niṣeveta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭādṛṣṭāvirodhinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko hi yuṣmad-vidha-su-hṛd</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vihita-āpat-pratikriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣayān na niṣeveta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭa-a-dṛṣṭa-a-virodhinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ paurajanaṃ bhṛtyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antaḥpuravicāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmānaṃ ca bhavannāthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yojayāmi sukhair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ paura-janaṃ bhṛtyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antaḥ-pura-vicāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmānaṃ ca bhavan-nāthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yojayāmi su-khair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tau prahvamūrdhānau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmyabhiprāyavedinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānopakaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sajjam evety avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tau prahva-mūrdhānau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmy-abhiprāya-vedinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāna-upakaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sajjam eva ity avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyāhārya sa tatas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sabālasthavirāṃ purīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vastrābharaṇamālyānna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dānaiḥ prītām akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyāhārya sa tatas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-bāla-sthavirāṃ purīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vastra-ābharaṇa-mālya-anna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dānaiḥ prītām akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padmarāgādiśuktiṣṭham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utpalādyadhivāsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtajotkāram anyo 'nyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pīyate sma tato madhu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padma-rāga-ādi-śukti-ṣṭham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utpala-ādy-adhivāsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛta-jot-kāram anyo 'nyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pīyate sma tato madhu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madhupānāntarāleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>savipañcīsvanaṃ muhuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gīyate sma manohāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naṭādyair nṛtyate sma ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madhu-pāna-antarāleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-vipañcī-svanaṃ muhuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gīyate sma mano-hāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naṭa-ādyair nṛtyate sma ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vihṛtya dinam evaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śītaraśmau divākare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>visṛjya prakṛtī rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viveśāntaḥpuraṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vihṛtya dinam evaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śīta-raśmau divā-kare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>visṛjya prakṛtī- rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viveśa antaḥ-puraṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāpi śrutasaṃgīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭastrīpātranāṭakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāyitāśeṣabhāryaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścān nidrām asevata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra api śruta-saṃgīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭa-strī-pātra-nāṭakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāyita-a-śeṣa-bhāryaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścān nidrām asevata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam āsevamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārtavaṃ viṣayān gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivṛddhasukharāgasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahavas tasya vāsarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam āsevamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-ārtavaṃ viṣayān gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivṛddha-su-kha-rāgasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahavas tasya vāsarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kadācid dvijādibhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saviṣādo nyavedayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svapno mayādya yo dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praśasyaiḥ śrūyatām asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kadā-cid dvija-ādibhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-viṣādo nyavedayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svapno maya ādya yo dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praśasyaiḥ śrūyatām asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāhyāvalokanāyāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirgatas tatra dṛṣṭavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mattaṃ mahāntam āyāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅgaṃ vanacāriṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāhya-avalokanāya ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirgatas tatra dṛṣṭavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mattaṃ mahāntam āyāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅgaṃ vana-cāriṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tan madāmodam āghrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājyahasty api māmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krodhād unmūlitālāno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātaḥ prati vanadvipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tan mada-āmodam āghrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājya-hasty- api māmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krodhād unmūlita-ālāno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātaḥ prati vana-dvi-pam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vanyas tu hastam utkṣipya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃcid ākuñcitāṅguliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhūtavān iva yuddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sagarvaiḥ kaṇṭhagarjitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vanyas tu hastam utkṣipya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ-cid ākuñcita-aṅguliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhūtavān iva yuddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-garvaiḥ kaṇṭha-garjitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madīyenātha nāgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegenāpatya dūrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃnipāto mahān datto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dantayor vanadantinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madīyena atha nāgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegenā apatya dūrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃnipāto mahān datto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dantayor vana-dantinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sphaṭikastambhaśubhrābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dantābhyāṃ tena māmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūram utkṣipya nikṣiptas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato yātaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sphaṭika-stambha-śubhrābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dantābhyāṃ tena māmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūram utkṣipya nikṣiptas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato yātaḥ parāṅ-mukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parājitaṃ pareṇātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā svaṃ rājyahastinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivarttayitukāmo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsannān idam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parājitaṃ pareṇa atha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā svaṃ rājya-hastinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivarttayitu-kāmo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsannān idam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nivartayāmi rājyebhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śīghram ānayatāṅkuśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikṣito vatsarājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hastiśikṣām ahaṃ nanu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nivartayāmi rājya-ibhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śīghram ānayata aṅkuśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikṣito vatsa-rājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hasti-śikṣām ahaṃ nanu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti mantrayamāṇo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alabdhaprārthitāṅkuśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratibuddhaḥ sasaṃtrāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etad iti cintayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti mantrayamāṇo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-labdha-prārthita-aṅkuśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratibuddhaḥ sa-saṃtrāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etad iti cintayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti svapno mayā dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇadāyāḥ parikṣaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalam iṣṭam aniṣṭaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūjyair atrocyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti svapno mayā dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇa-dāyāḥ parikṣaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalam iṣṭam an-iṣṭaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūjyair atra ucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāniṣṭaphalaṃ svapnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānanto 'pi dvijātayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājopacāracaturāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthāpayām āsur anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha an-iṣṭa-phalaṃ svapnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānanto 'pi dvi-jātayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-upacāra-caturāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthāpayām āsur anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yau 'sau rājan gajo vanyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ budhyasva vināyakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaś cābhiṣekahastī taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājyavighnaṃ śarīriṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yau 'sau rājan gajo vanyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ budhyasva vināyakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaś ca abhiṣeka-hastī taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājya-vighnaṃ śarīriṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat te gaṇapatiḥ prītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasahyoddharati prabhuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvam apy unmūlitānarthaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ pāhi mahīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat te gaṇa-patiḥ prītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasahya uddharati prabhuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvam apy unmūlita-an-arthaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ pāhi mahīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti duḥśliṣṭam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>phalaṃ svapnasya kalpitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhaṃ nālabhatāthainam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abrūtāṃ mantriṇāv idam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti duḥ-śliṣṭam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>phalaṃ svapnasya kalpitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-khaṃ na alabhata atha enam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abrūtāṃ mantriṇāv idam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatāṃ deva yad vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddhasya jagatīpateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvābhyāṃ śrutam etac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhe kathayataḥ pituḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatāṃ deva yad vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddhasya jagatī-pateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvābhyāṃ śrutam etac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhe kathayataḥ pituḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛgendrāsanam āroḍhuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradyotena kilecchatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathāpradhānamilitāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭāḥ svapnaṃ dvijātayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛga-indra-āsanam āroḍhuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradyotena kila icchatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā-pradhāna-militāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭāḥ svapnaṃ dvi-jātayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama siṃhāsanasthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthito mūrdhni vihaṃgamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicitraiḥ saptabhiḥ pakṣaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko 'sau vyākriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama siṃha-āsana-sthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthito mūrdhni vihaṃ-gamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicitraiḥ saptabhiḥ pakṣaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko 'sau vyākriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu nirvacaneṣv eko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijaḥ śāṇḍilyanāmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakampavacano 'vocan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīcai.ś cañcalabhīrukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu nir-vacaneṣv eko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijaḥ śāṇḍilya-nāmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-kampa-vacano 'vocan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīcai.ś cañcala-bhīrukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājñā svapnaphalaṃ pṛṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ tūṣṇīm āstha kathyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trasyadbhiḥ paruṣād vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mādṛk kasmān na yujyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājñā svapna-phalaṃ pṛṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ tūṣṇīm āstha kathyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trasyadbhiḥ paruṣād va āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mādṛk kasmān na yujyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aniṣṭam api vaktavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svanuṣṭhānapratikriyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣkarapratikāre tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktam ittham udāsitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-iṣṭam api vaktavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sv-anuṣṭhāna-pratikriyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣ-kara-pratikāre tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktam ittham udāsitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā mahāsenaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃśayāmṛṣṭamānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāṇḍilyam idam aprākṣīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivakṣuṃ sphuritādharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā mahā-senaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃśaya-āmṛṣṭa-mānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāṇḍilyam idam aprākṣīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivakṣuṃ sphurita adharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahman kathaya viśrabdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujñāto dvijair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmāt vyāhartum ārabdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratiṣiddho na kenacit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahman kathaya viśrabdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujñāto dvi-jair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmāt vyāhartum ārabdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratiṣiddho na kena-cit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.56'>
