<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktaḥ kṣitipālena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāhartum upacakrame</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahitādi hitāntaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyatāṃ deva mā kupaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktaḥ kṣiti-pālena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāhartum upacakrame</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-hita-ādi hita-antaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyatāṃ deva mā kupaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'sau saptacchadaḥ pakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'śanir duḥśravadhvaniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sapta pakṣās tu ye tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapta pakṣān nibodha tān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'sau sapta-cchadaḥ pakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'śanir duḥ-śrava-dhvaniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sapta pakṣās tu ye tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapta pakṣān nibodha tān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā vistareṇālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ siṃhāsanena te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaścid āropyatām etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yasya necchasi jīvitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā vistareṇa alam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ siṃha-āsanena te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaś-cid āropyatām etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yasya na icchasi jīvitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kañcid adyedam ārūḍham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ardhamāseṣu saptāsu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atīteṣv aśanir hanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patitvā mūrdhani dhruvam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kañ-cid adya idam ārūḍham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ardha-māseṣu saptāsu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atīteṣv aśanir hanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patitvā mūrdhani dhruvam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā sphuratkrodhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhūr bharatarohakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṣiṇī mukharasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khanyetām ity acodayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā sphurat-krodhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhūr bharatarohakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṣiṇī mukharasya asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khanyetām ity acodayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathājñāpayasīty uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>badhnan parikaraṃ dvijān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mantrī sākṣinikocena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāhyavākyān asūcayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā ājñāpayasi ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>badhnan parikaraṃ dvi-jān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mantrī sa-akṣi-nikocena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāhya-vākyān asūcayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛdupūrvaṃ tato viprā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahīpālam abodhayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>deva nonmattavākyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhyante paṭubuddhibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛdu-pūrvaṃ tato viprā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahī-pālam abodhayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>deva na unmatta-vākyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhyante paṭu-buddhibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca kevalam unmatto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇaś caiṣa mūḍhakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāpi nayanoddhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naiva nigraham arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca kevalam unmatto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇaś ca eṣa mūḍhakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena api nayana-uddhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na eva nigraham arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu tāvad ayaṃ baddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthāpyatāṃ vidhavāsutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pakṣāḥ sapta gatā yāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ prāpsyati nigraham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu tāvad ayaṃ baddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthāpyatāṃ vidhavā-sutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pakṣāḥ sapta gatā- yāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ prāpsyati nigraham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siṃhāsanam api kṣipram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārohatu narādhipaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lagne 'sminn eva sauvarṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parīkṣārthaṃ dvijanmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siṃha-āsanam api kṣipram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārohatu nara-adhipaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lagne 'sminn eva sauvarṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parīkṣā-arthaṃ dvi-janmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi satyaiva vāg asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ satkāram āpsyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viparyaye khalīkāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manvādiparibhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi satya aiva vāg asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ sat-kāram āpsyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viparyaye khalī-kāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manv-ādi-paribhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devo 'pi divasān etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidbhiḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kurvadbhiḥ śāntikarmāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahākālaṃ niṣevatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devo 'pi divasān etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidbhiḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kurvadbhiḥ śānti-karmāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-kālaṃ niṣevatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā dvijātibhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktam ity avadhārya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bandhayitvā ca śāṇḍilyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahākālaṃ yayau nṛpaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā dvi-jātibhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktam ity avadhārya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bandhayitvā ca śāṇḍilyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-kālaṃ yayau nṛ-paḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra sapta sthitaḥ pakṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyad divase 'ntime</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhyaṃdine payodālīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>unnamantīṃ raviṃ prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra sapta sthitaḥ pakṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyad divase 'ntime</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhyaṃdine payo-da-ālīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>unnamantīṃ raviṃ prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sā kṣaṇamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāptānantadigantarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīlakaṇṭhagalacchāyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛṣṭā vṛṣṭim aśmanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sā kṣaṇa-mātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāpta-an-anta-dig-antarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīla-kaṇṭha-gala-cchāyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛṣṭā vṛṣṭim aśmanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caṇḍaṃ caṭacaṭāghoṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udghoṣyāśanir utkaṭaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājapratikṛtiṃ piṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatraivāntardadhe tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caṇḍaṃ caṭacaṭā-ghoṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udghoṣya aśanir utkaṭaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-pratikṛtiṃ piṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra eva antardadhe tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha śāṇḍilyam āhvāyya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtvā vigatabandhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣamayitvā ca vipulaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃpradānair atoṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha śāṇḍilyam āhvāyya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtvā vigata-bandhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣamayitvā ca vipulaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃpradānair atoṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājñā cāsya kṛtaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tac ca loke pratiṣṭhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'yaṃ mukharaśāṇḍilyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siddhādeśo 'nuyujyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājñā ca asya kṛtaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tac ca loke pratiṣṭhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'yaṃ mukhara-śāṇḍilyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siddha-ādeśo 'nuyujyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena cāhūya pṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niḥśaṅkena niveditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śṛṇu rājan na kopaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitṛvat kartum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena cā ahūya pṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niḥ-śaṅkena niveditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śṛṇu rājan na kopaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitṛvat kartum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'sau vanyo gajaḥ so 'nyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā rājann upāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavadīyo bhavān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvathā śrūyatām idam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'sau vanyo gajaḥ so 'nyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā rājann upāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavadīyo bhavān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvathā śrūyatām idam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvam anyena mahīpāla</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahīpālena rājyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svataḥ pracyāvitas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktam āsthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvam anyena mahī-pāla</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahī-pālena rājyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svataḥ pracyāvitas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktam āsthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā mahīpāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣādānatamūrdhani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śanair mukharaśāṇḍilya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramukhā niryayur dvijāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā mahī-pāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣāda-ānata-mūrdhani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śanair mukhara-śāṇḍilya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramukhā- niryayur dvi-jāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantrimātrasahāyas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā kṛtvā avaguṇṭhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaḥ syād rājeti cintāvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣasāda nṛpāsane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantri-mātra-sahāyas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā kṛtvā avaguṇṭhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaḥ syād rāja īti cintāvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣasāda nṛpa-āsane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siddhādeśasya tu vacaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śraddadhānaḥ surohakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣādād dīnayā vācā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahīpālam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siddha-ādeśasya tu vacaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śraddadhānaḥ surohakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣādād dīnayā vācā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahī-pālam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāsenena duḥsvapnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa yathā vañcitas tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vañcaya tvam api kṣipram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atyāsannaphalo hy asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahā-senena duḥ-svapnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa yathā vañcitas tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vañcaya tvam api kṣipram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aty-āsanna-phalo hy asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tiryagyonigataḥ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhyāstāṃ pārthivāsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devo 'pi divasān kāṃcid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanavāsī bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tiryag-yoni-gataḥ kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhyāstāṃ pārthivā asanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devo 'pi divasān kāṃ-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vana-vāsī bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tuṣṇībhūtaṃ tu rājānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eva bruvati mantriṇi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gopālatanayas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viveśāvantivardhanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tuṣṇī-bhūtaṃ- tu rājānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eva bruvati mantriṇi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gopāla-tanayas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viveśa avantivardhanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya saṃkrīḍamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūram utpatya kandukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nipatyotpatya ca punaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siṃhāsanatalaṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya saṃkrīḍamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūram utpatya kandukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nipatya utpatya ca punaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siṃha-āsana-talaṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avantivardhanayaśā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhagini tena coditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siṃhāsanatalād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kandukaḥ kṛṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avantivardhanayaśā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhagini tena coditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siṃha-āsana-talād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kandukaḥ kṛṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ svayam eva tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ na karṣasi kandukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ cāhaṃ bhavataḥ praiṣyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yenādiśasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ svayam eva tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ na karṣasi kandukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ ca ahaṃ bhavataḥ praiṣyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yenā adiśasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ paśyeti tām uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad utkṣipya nṛpāsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avantivardhano 'nyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthāpayām āsa nirvyathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ paśya iti tām uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad utkṣipya nṛ-pa-āsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avantivardhano 'nyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthāpayām āsa nirvyathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu kandukam ādātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārabdhaś ca nṛpeṇa tu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siṃhāsanād avaplutya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṣvaktas trapānataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu kandukam ādātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārabdhaś ca nṛ-peṇa tu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siṃha-āsanād avaplutya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṣvaktas trapa-ānataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānantaram āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā prakṛtimaṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uvāca rājaputro 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adya rajye 'bhiṣicyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha an-antaram āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā prakṛti-maṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uvāca rāja-putro 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adya rajye 'bhiṣicyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmatsamakṣam ukto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena gacchatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avantivardhanaṃ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>matprītyā pālayer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmat-sam-akṣam ukto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena gacchatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avantivardhanaṃ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mat-prītyā pālayer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadādeśāt sutatvāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'yaṃ saṃvardhito 'dhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitryam āsanam adhyāstāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyāsaṃ pratyarpitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad-ādeśāt sutatvāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'yaṃ saṃvardhito 'dhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitryam āsanam adhyāstāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyāsaṃ pratyarpitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsmin saṃkaṭe kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pālakena pradarśite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sabhāyām ānatāṅgāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kaścid kiṃcid uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asmin saṃkaṭe kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pālakena pradarśite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sabhāyām ānata-aṅgāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kaś-cid kiṃ-cid uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato dharmārthakāmānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātrām ākhyāya pālakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putram āropayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siṃhāsanam avantiyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato dharma-artha-kāmānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātrām ākhyāya pālakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putram āropayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siṃha-āsanam avantiyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_2.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛṣṇājināmbaradharaḥ kṛtakeśanāśaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>skandhāvasaktakarako nṛpatiḥ purāṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhyāsita munivaraiḥ saha kāśyapena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandaspṛho 'sitagiriṃ tapase jagāma ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_2.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛṣṇa-ajina-ambara-dharaḥ kṛta-keśa-nāśaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>skandha-avasakta-karako nṛ-patiḥ purāṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhyāsita muni-varaiḥ saha kāśyapena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manda-spṛho '-sita-giriṃ tapase jagāma ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvantiṣu jantūnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣudrāṇām api kenacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janyate sma na saṃtāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pārthive 'vantivardhane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avantiṣu jantūnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣudrāṇām api kena-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janyate sma na saṃtāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pārthive 'vantivardhane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ bahuṣu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsareṣu mahīpatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadācid vāhayitvāśvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivṛtto dṛṣṭavān kvacit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ bahuṣu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsareṣu mahī-patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadā-cid vāhayitva āśvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivṛtto dṛṣṭavān kva-cit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tamālālambidolāntar</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vilasantīṃ kumārikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālindīhradasaṃkrāntāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lolām indukalām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tamāla-ālambi-dola-antar</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vilasantīṃ kumārikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālindī-hrada-saṃkrāntāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lolām indukalām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttarīyāntasaṃsaktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṣantīṃ śikhaṇḍakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirmucyamānanirmokaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhogaṃ bhogavadhūm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttarīya-anta-saṃsaktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṣantīṃ śikhaṇḍakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirmucyamāna-nirmokaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhogaṃ bhoga-vadhūm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛśyamānas tayā rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāṃ ca paśyan punaḥ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvṛto hayaśālābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaṃ viveśa niveśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛśyamānas tayā rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāṃ ca paśyan punaḥ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvṛto haya-śālābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaṃ viveśa niveśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra saṃkṣiptam āsevya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>majjanādi rahogataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dolāyamānahṛdayo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dolām eva vyacintayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra saṃkṣiptam āsevya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>majjana-ādi raho-gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dolāyamāna-hṛdayo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dolām eva vyacintayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mandāśanābhilāṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mandanidrasya bhūpateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandadharmārthacintasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divasāḥ katicid gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manda-aśana-abhilāṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manda-nidrasya bhū-pateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manda-dharma-artha-cintasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divasāḥ kati-cid gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācid atha velāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mandaraśmau divākṛti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣubhitānām ivāśrauṣīt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa nirghoṣam udanvatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cid atha velāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manda-raśmau divā-kṛti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣubhitānām iva aśrauṣīt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa nirghoṣam udanvatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>didṛkṣuḥ kāraṇaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samudbhūtakutūhale</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsādatalam arohad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>antaḥpuracarāvṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>didṛkṣuḥ kāraṇaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samudbhūta-kutūhale</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsāda-talam arohad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>antaḥ-pura-cara-āvṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nṛmātaṅgaturaṃgoṣṭra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gavājaiḍakarāsabhān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃpramardantam adrākṣīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅgaṃ saṃghamardanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nṛ-mātaṅga-turaṃga-uṣṭra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gav-āja-eḍaka-rāsabhān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃpramardantam adrākṣīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅgaṃ saṃghamardanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>unmūlitamahāvṛkṣaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cūrṇitaprāṃśumaṃdiraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛṅgamālāparīvāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa yayau prati pakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>unmūlita-mahā-vṛkṣaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cūrṇita-prāṃśu-maṃdiraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛṅga-mālā-parīvāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa yayau prati pakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pānaprasaktamātaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>maṇḍalaprahitekṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātaṅgarājam adrākṣīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅgagrāmaṇīs tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāna-prasakta-mātaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>maṇḍala-prahita-īkṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātaṅga-rājam adrākṣīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅga-grāmaṇīs tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādideśa samīpasthāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyakām avilambitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hastikīṭo 'yam uddāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durdānto damyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādideśa samīpa-sthāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyakām a-vilambitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hasti-kīṭo 'yam uddāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-dānto damyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karāmbhoruhasaṃsparśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>subhagenātha sāmbhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārāt siṣeca kariṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kare kuñcitapuṣkare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kara-ambho-ruha-saṃsparśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-bhagena atha sa-ambhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārāt siṣeca kariṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kare kuñcita-puṣkare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha saṃrambhasaṃhārāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃvellitakaraḥ karī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vavande caraṇau tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃspṛśya śirasā mahīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha saṃrambha-saṃhārāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃvellita-karaḥ karī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vavande caraṇau tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃspṛśya śirasā mahīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām avantipatir dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭapūrvāṃ tathāgatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citrīyamāṇahṛdayaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cintayām āsa cetasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām avanti-patir dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭa-pūrvāṃ tathā-gatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citrīyamāṇa-hṛdayaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cintayām āsa cetasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ citraṃ yad ayaṃ nāgaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saharāgaḥ sacetanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaśīkṛtaḥ śarīriṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaśīkaraṇavidyayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ citraṃ yad ayaṃ nāgaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha-rāgaḥ sa-cetanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaśī-kṛtaḥ śarīriṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaśī-karaṇa-vidyayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyaṃ hi vītarāgādīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>munīn api nirīkṣitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaśīkuryād viśantī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>calayed acalān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyaṃ hi vīta-rāga-ādīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>munīn api nirīkṣitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaśī-kuryād viśantī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>calayed a-calān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athendrāyudharāgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sottarīyeṇa dantayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>baddhāṃ dolām adhiṣṭhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgaṃ yāhīty acodayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha indra-āyudha-rāgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-uttarīyeṇa dantayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>baddhāṃ dolām adhiṣṭhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgaṃ yāhi ity acodayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato mandatarābhyāsaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caraṇaiḥ saṃghamardanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhistambham agād vīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhayapaurajanāvṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato mandatara-abhyāsaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caraṇaiḥ saṃghamardanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhi-stambham agād vīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaya-paura-jana-āvṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktam ātapaś caṇḍaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃtāpayati mām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśokapallavaiś chāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha tasyāś cakāra saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktam ātapaś caṇḍaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃtāpayati mām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśoka-pallavaiś chāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha tasyāś cakāra saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bandhayitvā gajaṃ stambhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāsādatalavartinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vanditvā ca mahīpālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅgī pakṣaṇaṃ yayau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bandhayitvā gajaṃ stambhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāsāda-tala-vartinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vanditvā ca mahī-pālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅgī pakṣaṇaṃ yayau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātaṅgīvandanāpūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātmānaṃ prekṣya pārthivaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>keyaṃ kasya kuto veti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛcchati sma surohakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātaṅgī-vandana-āpūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātmānaṃ prekṣya pārthivaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ka īyaṃ kasya kuto va īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛcchati sma surohakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tasmai kathayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deva na jñāyate kutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahasaivedam āyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parun mātaṅgapakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tasmai kathayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deva na jñāyate kutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahasa aiva idam āyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parun mātaṅga-pakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛddhimanto 'tra mātaṅgās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>teṣām utpalahastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grāmaṇīs tasya kanyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutā surasamañjarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛddhimanto 'tra mātaṅgās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>teṣām utpalahastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grāmaṇīs tasya kanya īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutā surasamañjarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā praviśyāntar</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhyāyan surasamañjarīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svadehaṃ yāpayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pittajvaracikitsitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā praviśya antar</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhyāyan surasamañjarīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-dehaṃ yāpayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitta-jvara-cikitsitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>surohakas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātaṅgīdūṣitāśayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyad aṅgāravatyai sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tannaptur vṛttam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>surohakas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātaṅgī-dūṣita-āśayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyad aṅgāravatyai sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tan-naptur vṛttam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ tūṣṇīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicārastimitekṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smitāpagamitatrāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>surohakam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ tūṣṇīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicāra-stimita-īkṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smita-apagamita-trāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>surohakam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātaṅgarūpadhāriṇyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathānyā divyayoṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatheyam api kenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nimittenāgatā mahīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātaṅga-rūpa-dhāriṇyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatha ānyā- divya-yoṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatha īyam api kena-api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nimittenā agatā mahīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva saṃghamardano vyālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva ca taddantalambanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāpāro 'yam adivyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prekṣitaḥ kena kasyacit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva saṃghamardano vyālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva ca tad-danta-lambanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāpāro 'yam a-divyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prekṣitaḥ kena kasya-cit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vālaṃ vimarśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayaṃ sabandhino gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyāṃ varayituṃ yāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nātmatulyāsti dūtikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha va ālaṃ vimarśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayaṃ sa-bandhino gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyāṃ varayituṃ yāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nā atma-tulya āsti dūtikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sātha pravahaṇārūḍhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddhaviprapuraḥsarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā pakkaṇamadhyasthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadarśotpalahastakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ātha pravahaṇa-ārūḍhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddha-vipra-puraḥ-sarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā pakkaṇa-madhya-sthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadarśa utpalahastakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dūrād eva sa dṛṣṭvā tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āttakarkaraveṇukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha mātaṅgasaṃghena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vavande dūram utsṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dūrād eva sa dṛṣṭvā tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātta-karkara-veṇukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha mātaṅga-saṃghena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vavande dūram utsṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāṅgāravatī yānād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avatīrṇā tam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ tvāṃ draṣṭum āyātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvam apy eṣa palāyase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aṅgāravatī yānād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avatīrṇā tam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ tvāṃ draṣṭum āyātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvam apy eṣa palāyase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāryaṃ me mahad āsannam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ādhīnaṃ cāpi tat tvayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūrotsaraṇam utsṛjya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena ḍhaukasva mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāryaṃ me mahad āsannam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ādhīnaṃ ca api tat tvayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūra-utsaraṇam utsṛjya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena ḍhaukasva mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam utsāritamātaṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāsannāsīnam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mannaptre dīyatāṃ rājñe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājñī surasamañjarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam utsārita-mātaṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā āsanna-āsīnam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>man-naptre dīyatāṃ rājñe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājñī surasamañjarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cāṇḍālīsparśanaṃ rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nārhatīty evamādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca grāmeyakālāpais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaṃ māṃ bādhitum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cāṇḍālī-sparśanaṃ rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na arhati ity evam-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca grāmeyaka-ālāpais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaṃ māṃ bādhitum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś ca divyābhimānas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatrāpīdaṃ mamottaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mamāpi bhadra dauhitraś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakravartī bhavādṛśām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś ca divya-abhimānas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra api idaṃ mama uttaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mama api bhadra dauhitraś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakra-vartī bhavādṛśām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity aṅgāravatīvākyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṇyotpalahastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anuktottara evāsyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatheti pratipannavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity aṅgāravatī-vākyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṇya utpalahastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-ukta-uttara eva asyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha īti pratipannavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pracchannam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yugyaṃ surasamañjarīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛtasaṃjīvinī naptūr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asāv oṣadhim ānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pracchannam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yugyaṃ surasamañjarīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛta-saṃjīvinī naptūr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asāv oṣadhim ānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariṇīya tu mātaṅgīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antar antaḥpurād bahiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa buddhyāpi na yāti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyakṣam api tāṃ smaran ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariṇīya tu mātaṅgīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antar antaḥ-purād bahiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa buddhya āpi na yāti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praty-akṣam api tāṃ smaran ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyam evāsti tattvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mithyānyad iti cintayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandharvanagarākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa saṃsāram amanyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyam eva asti tattvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mithya ānyad iti cintayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandharva-nagara-ākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa saṃsāram amanyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gamayan divasān evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekadā saha kāntayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa prāsādagato 'paśyat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pakṣaṇaṃ nirjanaṃgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gamayan divasān evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekadā saha kāntayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa prāsāda-gato 'paśyat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pakṣaṇaṃ nirjanaṃ-gamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā triyāmānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mandaṃ surasamañjarī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krandantī parimṛjyāśrum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anuyukteti bhūbhṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tri-yāma-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mandaṃ surasamañjarī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krandantī parimṛjya aśrum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anuyukta īti bhū-bhṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ śūnyaṃ pakkaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rudyate sundari tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utānyad asti duḥkhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāraṇaṃ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ śūnyaṃ pakkaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rudyate sundari tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uta anyad asti duḥ-khasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāraṇaṃ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravīt kiṃ mamādyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pakkaṇena bavadgateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu kāraṇam asty anyad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīṣaṇaṃ tan niśāmyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravīt kiṃ mama adya api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pakkaṇena bavad-gateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu kāraṇam asty anyad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīṣaṇaṃ tan niśāmyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siddhamātaṅgavidyo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitā mama mahar2ddhikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saptavarṇapure pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāyumukte pure 'vasat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siddha-mātaṅga-vidyo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitā mama mahar2ddhikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saptavarṇapure pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāyu-mukte pure 'vasat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra kālaḥ śvapāko 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyādharagaṇādhamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ipphako nāma tasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitrāhaṃ ca pratiśrutā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra kālaḥ śvapāko 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyā-dhara-gaṇa-adhamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ipphako nāma tasya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitra āhaṃ ca pratiśrutā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tātasya viyatāyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadācid atha mārutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rajaḥpiśaṅgabhṛṅgālīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aharat kusumasrajam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tātasya viyatā āyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadā-cid atha mārutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rajaḥ-piśaṅga-bhṛṅga-alīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aharat kusuma-srajam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu saṃdhyām upāsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgārodhasi nāradam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthāṇusthiraṃ bhujaṃgīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vilolā paryaveṣṭayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu saṃdhyām upāsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgā-rodhasi nāradam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthāṇu-sthiraṃ bhujaṃgi īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vilolā paryaveṣṭayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyutthitaś ca samādhes taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā lohitalocanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāradaś caṇḍakopatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccair idam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyutthitaś ca samādhes taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā lohita-locanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāradaś caṇḍa-kopatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccair idam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīropahatā mālā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yeneyaṃ mālabhāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣiptā mayi manuṣyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍālaḥ sa bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīra-upahatā mālā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena iyaṃ māla-bhāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣiptā mayi manuṣyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍālaḥ sa bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'tha śāpopataptena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitrā vijñāpito mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tīvrasya brahmaśāpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīkāro bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'tha śāpa-upataptena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitrā vijñāpito mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tīvrasya brahma-śāpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīkāro bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kṛpāmbuśamita</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodhajvālākadambakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāradāgnir uvācedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mlānam utpalahastakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kṛpa-ambu-śamita</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodha-jvālā-kadambakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārada-agnir uvāca idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mlānam utpalahastakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na śakyaḥ pratisaṃhartuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāpavahnir mayāpy ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utsṛṣṭaḥ kṛtapuṅkhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhānuṣkeṇeva sāyakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na śakyaḥ pratisaṃhartuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāpa-vahnir maya āpy ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utsṛṣṭaḥ kṛta-puṅkhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhānuṣkeṇa iva sāyakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tv anicchāśamāḥ śāpāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prājñair abhimukhā gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svalpenāpi hi vañcyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena tvam api vañcaya ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tv an-icchā-śamāḥ śāpāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prājñair abhimukhā- gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sv-alpena api hi vañcyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena tvam api vañcaya ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariṇeṣyati gaupālir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavatas tanayāṃ yadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā tvaṃ dāruṇād asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmacchāpād vimokṣyase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariṇeṣyati gaupālir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavatas tanayāṃ yadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā tvaṃ dāruṇād asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmac-chāpād vimokṣyase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śāpe varaṃ labdhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vayaṃ tvatpādapālitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uṣitā varjitā duḥkair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahorātrasamāṃ samām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śāpe varaṃ labdhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vayaṃ tvat-pāda-pālitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uṣitā- varjitā- duḥ-kair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aho-rātra-samāṃ samām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāhaṃ muneḥ prasādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātā tvatpādapālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāpi śāntaśāpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svargād asmān nirākṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa āhaṃ muneḥ prasādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātā tvat-pāda-pālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena api śānta-śāpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svargād asmān nirākṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kadācid ito dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatam utpalahastakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>matkṛte tvām api krūra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ipphakaḥ pīḍayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kadā-cid ito dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatam utpalahastakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mat-kṛte tvām api krūra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ipphakaḥ pīḍayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirmātaṅgam idaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā pitṛniveśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍālabhayaśaṅkinyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ruditaṃ niḥsahāyayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nir-mātaṅgam idaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā pitṛ-niveśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍāla-bhaya-śaṅkinyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ruditaṃ niḥ-sahāyayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti cātrāpi sukara</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upāyaḥ sa tu duṣkaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahārājasya sādhyatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratikūlo hi pārthivaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti ca atra api su-kara</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upāyaḥ sa tu duṣ-karaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-rājasya sādhyatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratikūlo hi pārthivaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi vijñāpayantīṃ maṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānyathā vaktum iṣyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato vijñāpayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartavye tu bhavān prabhuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi vijñāpayantīṃ maṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na anyathā vaktum iṣyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato vijñāpayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartavye tu bhavān prabhuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoktaṃ janarājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad icchasi tad ucyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muktvānyastrīkathāṃ bhīru</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvaṃ saṃpādayāmi te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uktaṃ jana-rājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad icchasi tad ucyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muktva ānya-strī-kathāṃ bhīru</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvaṃ saṃpādayāmi te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānandajanetrāmbu</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>siktānanapayodharā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atiprasāda ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abravīt surasamañjarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā ananda-ja-netra-ambu</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sikta-ānana-payo-dharā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ati-prasāda ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abravīt surasamañjarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyādharādirājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyavasthā sthāpitā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hiṃsitavyaḥ sadoṣo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na antaḥpuragato nṛpaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyā-dhara-ādi-rājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyavasthā sthāpitā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hiṃsitavyaḥ sa-doṣo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na antaḥ-pura-gato nṛpaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itīdaṃ nṛpatiḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām uvāca kṛtasmitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anugrahe 'pi yācñeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad idaṃ tad idaṃ nanu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti idaṃ nṛ-patiḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām uvāca kṛta-smitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anugrahe 'pi yācña īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad idaṃ tad idaṃ nanu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cārabhya divasād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aharniśam avantipaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amāvāsyāṃ śaśīvāsīj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janadurlabhadarśanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cā arabhya divasād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aharniśam avanti-paḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amāvāsyāṃ śaśi īva asīj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jana-dur-labha-darśanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācid atha niryāntīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purīm udakadānakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutvā harmyāvalīśeṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājāpy āsīt samutsukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cid atha niryāntīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purīm udaka-dānakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutvā harmya-avalī-śeṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāja āpy āsīt samutsukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śaiśavaprāptarājyatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>indriyānītamānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadālpadarśī samayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>visasmāra sa taṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śaiśava-prāpta-rājyatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>indriya-ānīta-mānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tada ālpa-darśī samayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>visasmāra sa taṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasuptām eva dayitām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āropya śibikāṃ niśi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṭaṃ śivataḍāgasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citravṛttāntam ānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasuptām eva dayitām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āropya śibikāṃ niśi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṭaṃ śiva-taḍāgasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citra-vṛtta-antam ānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tan makarākīrṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>poteneva mahārṇavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>plavena vyacarat sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryayā vītanidrayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tan makara-ākīrṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potena iva mahā-arṇavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>plavena vyacarat sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryayā vīta-nidrayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anujñātāvagāhāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyan paurakumārakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'paśyad dayitāṃ bhītāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā bhaiṣīr iti cābravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anujñāta-avagāhāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyan paura-kumārakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'paśyad dayitāṃ bhītāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā bhaiṣīr iti ca abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāvadat pālitā yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajāḥ sarvā na bibhyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyaivorasi tiṣṭhantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bibhemīti na yujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa āvadat pālitā- yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajāḥ sarvā- na bibhyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya eva urasi tiṣṭhantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bibhemi iti na yujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu yātrānubhūteyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idānīṃ niṣprayojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ihāsitam ahaṃ manye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād āvartyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu yātra ānubhūta īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idānīṃ niṣ-prayojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iha-āsitam ahaṃ manye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād āvartyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātrāpahṛtacetastvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadvākyam avakarṇayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sabhāryaṃ baddham ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aikṣatāvantivardhanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātrā-apahṛta-cetastvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad-vākyam avakarṇayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-bhāryaṃ baddham ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aikṣata avantivardhanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krandatām atha paurāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyatāṃ cordhvacakṣuṣām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ipphakaḥ sphuritakrodhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samutkṣipya jahāra tam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krandatām atha paurāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyatāṃ cā urdhva-cakṣuṣām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ipphakaḥ sphurita-krodhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samutkṣipya jahāra tam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāṅgāravatīṃ mūḍhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pautrāpaharaṇaśravāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hlādayām āsatur vākyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sacivau sajalānilaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aṅgāravatīṃ mūḍhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pautra-apaharaṇa-śravāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hlādayām āsatur vākyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sacivau sa-jala-anilaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tāv uvāca saṃbhrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvāsitagiriṃ laghu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālakaḥ śrāvyatāṃ sūnor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛttāntam iti tau gatau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tāv uvāca saṃbhrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatva ā-sita-giriṃ laghu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālakaḥ śrāvyatāṃ sūnor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛtta-antam iti tau gatau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāśyapapramukhāṃs tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>namaskṛtya ca tāpasān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vanditāyācacakṣāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pālakāya hṛtaṃ sutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāśyapa-pramukhāṃs tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>namas-kṛtya ca tāpasān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vanditāyā acacakṣāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pālakāya hṛtaṃ sutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kaṇṭhagataprāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśyapaḥ samajīvayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svantaḥ khalv eṣa vṛttānta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti vākyāmṛtena tam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kaṇṭha-gata-prāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśyapaḥ samajīvayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sv-antaḥ khalv eṣa vṛtta-anta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti vākya-a-mṛtena tam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃdehaś cen nirīkṣasva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabhaḥprasthāpitekṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyāntīm eva jānīhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putravārttāṃ śivām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃdehaś cen nirīkṣasva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabhaḥ-prasthāpita-īkṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyāntīm eva jānīhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putra-vārttāṃ śivām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāgacchantam aikṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabhaḥprahitadṛṣṭayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakāsadasicarmāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divi divyaṃ tapasvinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā agacchantam aikṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabhaḥ-prahita-dṛṣṭayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakāsad-asi-carmāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divi divyaṃ tapasvinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'vatīrya marunmārgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asvatantrīkṛtepphakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha cāvantināthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāśyapādīn avandata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'vatīrya marun-mārgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-sva-tantrī-kṛta-ipphakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha ca avanti-nāthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāśyapa-ādīn avandata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vadhūvanditapāde ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetanāvati pālake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharaḥ kathitavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛttāntaṃ munisaṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vadhū-vandita-pāde ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetanā-vati pālake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dharaḥ kathitavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛtta-antaṃ muni-saṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naravāhanadattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyādharapateḥ priyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māṃ divākaradevākhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jānīta paricārakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naravāhanadattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyā-dhara-pateḥ priyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māṃ divākaradeva-ākhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jānīta paricārakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ himavato gacchan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabhasā malayācalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upariṣṭād avantīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍālaṃ dṛṣṭavān imam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ himavato gacchan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabhasā malayā-a-calam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upariṣṭād avantīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍālaṃ dṛṣṭavān imam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apahṛtyāpagacchantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadāraṃ medinīpatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ipphakaṃ nāma mātaṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyādharakulādhamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apahṛtya apagacchantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-dāraṃ medinī-patim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ipphakaṃ nāma mātaṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyā-dhara-kula-adhamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muñceti ca mayoktaḥ san</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadāyaṃ na vimuktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā yuddhena nirjitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptitaś cakravartinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muñca iti ca maya ūktaḥ san</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yada āyaṃ na vimuktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā yuddhena nirjitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptitaś cakra-vartinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuyuktaś ca tenāyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ rājā hṛtas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim ity avocad etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yan me dārā hṛtā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuyuktaś ca tena ayam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ rājā hṛtas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim ity avocad etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yan me dārā- hṛtā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bhartrāham ādiṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃyamya prāpyatām ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sabhāsadbhiḥ sabhāṃ sadbhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāśyapādyair adhiṣṭhitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bhartra āham ādiṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃyamya prāpyatām ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sabhā-sadbhiḥ sabhāṃ sadbhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāśyapa-ādyair adhiṣṭhitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyavahāre vinirjitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhā surasamañjarīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhamānakamālāṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirjito 'yaṃ sarāsabhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyavahāre vinirjitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhā surasamañjarīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhamānaka-mālāṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirjito 'yaṃ sa-rāsabhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy āryuṣaṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśyapaṃ svaṃ ca mātulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgantā svaḥ pratijñātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣām āgamanaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy āryuṣaṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśyapaṃ svaṃ ca mātulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgantā svaḥ pratijñātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣām āgamanaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃmānya rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyair ambarabhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅgya ca sasauhārdaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā saha visṛṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃmānya rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyair ambara-bhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅgya ca sa-sauhārdaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā saha visṛṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cāyam ipphako baddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadāraś caiṣa bhūpatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakravartī ca vo draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgantā sāvarodhanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca ayam ipphako baddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-dāraś ca eṣa bhū-patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakra-vartī ca vo draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgantā sa-avarodhanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te divākaradevasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutvedam ṛṣayo vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣāśrusiktatanavaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛcchrād akṣapayan kṣapām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te divākaradevasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutva īdam ṛṣayo vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣa-aśru-sikta-tanavaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛcchrād akṣapayan kṣapām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prātar nabhovyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirabhre vyomni garjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākarṇya munayo 'pṛcchan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etad iti khecaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prātar nabho-vyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nir-abhre vyomni garjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākarṇya munayo 'pṛcchan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etad iti khe-caram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd eṣa nirghoṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dundubhīnāṃ vimāninām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimānagarbhavartitvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyate garjitākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd eṣa nirghoṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dundubhīnāṃ vimāninām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimāna-garbha-vartitvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyate garjita-ākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayam āyāti naḥ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyādharapatīśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>garjaddundubhijīmūto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nabhasā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayam āyāti naḥ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyā-dhara-pati-īśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>garjad-dundubhi-jīmūto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nabhasā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rohitendradhanurvidyut</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>balākādyutipiñjaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambhodānām iva vyāpta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakalāśānabhastalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rohita-indra-dhanur-vidyut</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>balākā-dyuti-piñjaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambho-dānām iva vyāpta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-kala-āśā-nabhas-talam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nānāratnaprabhājāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>karālam atha tāpasaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārād āyādvimānānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divo vṛndam adṛśyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nānā-ratna-prabhā-jāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>karālam atha tāpasaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārād āyād-vimānānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divo vṛndam adṛśyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīryāśramadvāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vimānaṃ cakravartinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitam anyāni śailasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kandarāsānumūrdhasu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīryā aśrama-dvāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vimānaṃ cakra-vartinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitam anyāni śailasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kandarā-sānu-mūrdhasu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyādharādhirājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vimānaṃ kamalākṛti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padmarāgapalāśānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaḍviṃśatyā pariṣkṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyā-dhara-adhi-rājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vimānaṃ kamala-ākṛti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padma-rāga-palāśānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaḍ-viṃśatyā pariṣkṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayaṃ garuḍapāṣāṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇikāmadhyam āsthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitās tasya palāśeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryāś citravibhūṣaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayaṃ garuḍa-pāṣāṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇikā-madhyam āsthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitās tasya palāśeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryāś citra-vibhūṣaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sabhāryākariṇīyūthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa vidyādharakuñjaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sabhāṃ kamalinīm āgāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phullānanasaroruhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-bhāryā-kariṇī-yūthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa vidyā-dhara-kuñjaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sabhāṃ kamalinīm āgāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phulla-ānana-saro-ruhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhivādya tatas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśyapapramukhān munīn</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣātiśayaniśceṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vavande mātulaṃ munim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhivādya tatas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśyapa-pramukhān munīn</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣa-atiśaya-niś-ceṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vavande mātulaṃ munim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartāram anuyāntībhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujyeṣṭhatapasvinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devībhir vanditās tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śvaśuras tadanantaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartāram anuyāntībhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anu-jyeṣṭha-tapasvinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devībhir vanditās tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śvaśuras tad-an-antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anujñātāsanāsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśyapaś cakravartinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasṛṣṭānandanetrāmbur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abravīd gadgadākṣaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anujñāta-āsana-āsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśyapaś cakra-vartinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasṛṣṭa-ānanda-netra-ambur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abravīd gadgada-akṣaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.109'>
