<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aprāpteṣṭārthasaṃpatti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāñchāśīr abhidhīyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyuṣmatā tu tat prāptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśiṣāṃ yad agocaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-prāpta-iṣṭa-artha-saṃpatti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāñchā āśīr abhidhīyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyuṣmatā tu tat prāptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśiṣāṃ yad a-gocaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu saṃbhāṣitaiḥ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratisaṃbhāṣaṇaṃ yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācāram anugacchadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmābhir idam ucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu saṃbhāṣitaiḥ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratisaṃbhāṣaṇaṃ yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācāram anugacchadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmābhir idam ucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anindyam idam aiśvaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sabhāryāsuhṛdas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākalpāvasāne 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūṭasthaṃ tiṣṭhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-nindyam idam aiśvaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-bhāryā-su-hṛdas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-kalpa-avasāne 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūṭa-sthaṃ tiṣṭhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pālakenānuyuktas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vadhūnāṃ gotranāmanī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhaḥ kathayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>preritaś cakravartinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pālakena anuyuktas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vadhūnāṃ gotra-nāmanī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhaḥ kathayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>preritaś cakravartinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādikathānte ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakravartī tapasvinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīd ipphakaḥ pūjyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅga anuyujyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi-kathā-ante ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakra-vartī tapasvinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīd ipphakaḥ pūjyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅga anuyujyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaṃ doṣam ayam uddiśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrāvyāpṛtamānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sārdhaṃ surasamañjaryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājānaṃ hṛtavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaṃ doṣam ayam uddiśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrā-vyāpṛta-mānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-ardhaṃ surasamañjaryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājānaṃ hṛtavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa pṛṣṭaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahyam utpalahastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattvā duhitaraṃ paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etasmai dattavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa pṛṣṭaḥ pratyuvāca idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahyam utpalahastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattvā duhitaraṃ paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etasmai dattavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha brūhīti pṛṣṭaḥ sann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uvācāvantivardhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattvā na dattavān yo 'smai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nanv asau pṛcchyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha brūhi iti pṛṣṭaḥ sann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uvāca avantivardhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattvā na dattavān yo 'smai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nanv asau pṛcchyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athojjhitāsanaḥ sabhyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uvācotpalahastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathāhāyaṃ tathaivedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśeṣaṃ tu nibodhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ujjhita-āsanaḥ sabhyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uvāca utpalahastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā āha ayaṃ tatha aiva idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśeṣaṃ tu nibodhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāradena purā śaptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kruddhenāhaṃ yathā tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyakṣam eva pūjyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divyalocanacakṣuṣām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāradena purā śaptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kruddhena ahaṃ yathā tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praty-akṣam eva pūjyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divya-locana-cakṣuṣām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā mayaiṣa dīrghāyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahukṛtvaḥ prabodhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sutā dattā mayā tubhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upayacchasva tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā maya aiṣa dīrgha-āyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahu-kṛtvaḥ prabodhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sutā dattā mayā tubhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upayacchasva tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś caivam uvācāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ninditāṃ kaḥ sacetanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyakām upayaccheta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāpadagdhāt kulād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś ca evam uvāca ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ninditāṃ kaḥ sa-cetanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyakām upayaccheta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāpa-dagdhāt kulād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyākhyātā yadānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caṇḍasiṃhādisaṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avantipataye dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā surasamañjarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyākhyātā yada ānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caṇḍasiṃha-ādi-saṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avanti-pataye dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā surasamañjarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃdehaś cedamī sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyādharagaṇeśvarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛcchyantām iti pṛṣṭaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tatheti niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃdehaś cedamī sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyā-dhara-gaṇa-īśvarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛcchyantām iti pṛṣṭaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tatha īti niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāśyapas tam athāvocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avasanno 'si khecara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍasiṃhādibhir yasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramāṇaiḥ pratipāditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāśyapas tam atha avocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avasanno 'si khe-cara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍasiṃha-ādibhir yasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramāṇaiḥ pratipāditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asya cāvinayasyedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaścittaṃ samācara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vārāṇasyāṃ mṛtāṅgāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgāmbhasi nimajjaya ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asya ca a-vinayasya idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaś-cittaṃ samācara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vārāṇasyāṃ mṛta-aṅgāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgā-ambhasi nimajjaya ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pretāvāsakṛtāvāso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasānaḥ pretacīvaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaikṣāśanaś ca varṣānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktaśāpo bhaviṣyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>preta-āvāsa-kṛta-āvāso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasānaḥ preta-cīvaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaikṣa-aśanaś ca varṣa-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukta-śāpo bhaviṣyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_3.126'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athojjayanyāḥ katham apy upāgatair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jarāndhajātyandhajaḍārbhakaiṛ api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>didṛkṣubhir vatsanarendranandanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tapovanaṃ sapramadais tadāvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_3.126'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ujjayanyāḥ katham apy upāgatair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jarā-andha-jāty-andha-jaḍa-arbhakaiṛ api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>didṛkṣubhir vatsa-nara-indra-nandanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tapo-vanaṃ sa-pramadais tadā āvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vidyādharapatiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśyapenāryuṣā puraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛṣimātulamitrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭo bhāryāgaṇasya ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vidyā-dhara-patiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśyapenā aryuṣā puraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛṣi-mātula-mitrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭo bhāryā-gaṇasya ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyuṣman vayam ete ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tapovittāḥ sapālakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvatkathāśravaṇotkaṇṭha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣkampamanasaḥ sthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyuṣman vayam ete ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tapo-vittāḥ sa-pālakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvat-kathā-śravaṇa-utkaṇṭha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣkampa-manasaḥ sthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aiśvaryaṃ durlabhaṃ labdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idam āyuṣmatā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svīkṛtāś ca yathā vadhvas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aiśvaryaṃ dur-labhaṃ labdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idam āyuṣmatā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svī-kṛtāś ca yathā vadhvas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vidyādhareśasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭasyeti tapasvinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trāsāt pṛthutarākṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātam acchāyam ānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vidyā-dhara-īśasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭasya iti tapasvinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trāsāt pṛthutara-akṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātam a-cchāyam ānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>acintayac ca kaṣṭeyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āpad āpatitā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atyāsanno 'ticapalaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko na dahyeta vahninā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>acintayac ca kaṣṭa īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āpad āpatitā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aty-āsanno 'ti-capalaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko na dahyeta vahninā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyam api bhṛśaṃ raktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītyāham anayāhṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ sacetanaḥ ko nu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathayed gurusaṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyam api bhṛśaṃ raktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītya āham anayā āhṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ sa-cetanaḥ ko nu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathayed guru-saṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śūro mayā hataḥ śatrur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ śūraḥ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti śūrakathāṃ śūraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuryāt kaḥ śūrasaṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śūro mayā hataḥ śatrur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ śūraḥ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti śūra-kathāṃ śūraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuryāt kaḥ śūra-saṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anākhyāne muneḥ śāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāpātakam anyathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sulabhānto varaṃ śāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dustaraṃ na tu pātakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-ākhyāne muneḥ śāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-pātakam anyathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-labha-anto varaṃ śāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dustaraṃ na tu pātakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta eva tu gauryā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasādaḥ saṃkaṭeṣu mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smarer iti na ca nyāyyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām api smartum īdṛśi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta eva tu gauryā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasādaḥ saṃkaṭeṣu mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smarer iti na ca nyāyyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām api smartum īdṛśi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti cintitamātraiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purastāc cakravartinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhāṣata mahāgaurī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhopahatabhāskarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti cintita-mātra aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purastāc cakra-vartinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhāṣata mahā-gaurī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhā-upahata-bhāskarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣimātulabhāryāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdāṃ ca sabhūbhujām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrotuṃ yad ucitaṃ yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa tac chroṣyati netaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣi-mātula-bhāryāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdāṃ ca sa-bhū-bhujām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrotuṃ yad ucitaṃ yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa tac chroṣyati na itaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā vadane tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭūbhūtvā sarasvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caritaṃ kathayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā citraṃ cakravartinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā vadane tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭū-bhūtvā sarasvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caritaṃ kathayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā citraṃ cakra-vartinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>munimātulamitrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājāno dayitāś ca ye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyāyamānaṃ caritaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṇvantv acalacetasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muni-mātula-mitrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājāno dayitāś ca ye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyāyamānaṃ caritaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṇvantv a-cala-cetasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti vatseṣu nagarī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kauśāmbī hṛdayaṃ bhuvaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃniviṣṭānukālindi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyām udayano nṛpaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti vatseṣu nagarī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kauśāmbī hṛdayaṃ bhuvaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃniviṣṭa-anu-kālindi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyām udayano nṛpaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manāg janapadasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nagaryāḥ pārthivasya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathayeyaṃ yadi guṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kathā kathitā bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manāg jana-padasya asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nagaryāḥ pārthivasya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathayeyaṃ yadi guṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kathā kathitā bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo hi saptārṇavadvīpāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draṣṭum uccalitaḥ kṣitim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ratnāni gaṇayen meroḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadā draṣṭā sa medinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo hi sapta-arṇava-dvīpāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draṣṭum uccalitaḥ kṣitim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ratnāni gaṇayen meroḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadā draṣṭā sa medinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād alaṃ prasaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathāvyāsaṅgakāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathyamānāṃ kathām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṇuta prakṛtāṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād alaṃ prasaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathā-vyāsaṅga-kāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathyamānāṃ kathām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṇuta prakṛtāṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāvarodhanasyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāryābuddhir dvaye sthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya vāsavadattāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padmāvatyāṃ ca bhūpateḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahā-avarodhanasya api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāryā-buddhir dvaye sthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya vāsavadattāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padmāvatyāṃ ca bhū-pateḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāprabhāvā nṛpateḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śārṅgapāṇer bhujā iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakāyā iva copāyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>catvāro mitramantriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahā-prabhāvā- nṛpateḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śārṅgapāṇer bhujā- iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-kāyā- iva ca upāyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>catvāro mitra-mantriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣabhaś ca rumaṇvāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā yaugandharāyaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasantakaś ceti sa taiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha kālam ayāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣabhaś ca rumaṇvāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā yaugandharāyaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasantakaś ca iti sa taiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha kālam ayāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācid āsthānagataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛpaṃ vāṇijadārakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jānuspṛṣṭamahī pṛṣṭau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvijñāpayatām idam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cid āsthāna-gataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛpaṃ vāṇi-ja-dārakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jānu-spṛṣṭa-mahī pṛṣṭau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvijñāpayatām idam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devāvayoḥ pitā yātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sabhayaṃ makarālayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha tena sa potena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgalokaṃ praveśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devā avayoḥ pitā yātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-bhayaṃ makara-ālayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha tena sa potena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāga-lokaṃ praveśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jyeṣṭhaś ca tanayas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛbhaktyaiva sāgaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatas tatraiva ca gataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'pi tātagatāṃ gatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jyeṣṭhaś ca tanayas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛ-bhaktya aiva sāgaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatas tatra eva ca gataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'pi tāta-gatāṃ gatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca no draviṇaṃ sāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad gṛhītvā prajāvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitā na mṛgyamāṇāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahukṛtvaḥ prayacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca no draviṇaṃ sāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad gṛhītvā prajāvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitā na mṛgyamāṇa āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahu-kṛtvaḥ prayacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena deva yadi nyāyyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛdraviṇam āvayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātṛjāyā tataḥ sā nau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyutthitā dāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena deva yadi nyāyyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛ-draviṇam āvayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātṛ-jāyā tataḥ sā nau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyutthitā dāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha rājāvadat pahvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratīhārīṃ yaśodharām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣkaraṃ kulanārībhī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājāsthānapraveśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha rāja āvadat pahvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratīhārīṃ yaśodharām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣ-karaṃ kula-nārībhī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājā-sthāna-praveśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena gatvā gṛhaṃ tasyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayā vāṇijayoṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā yadāha sabhāyās tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samakṣaṃ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena gatvā gṛhaṃ tasyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayā vāṇija-yoṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā yadā āha sabhāyās tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sam-akṣaṃ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vijñāpayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātāyātā yaśodharā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpayati sā yat tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākarṇayitum arhatha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vijñāpayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātā āyātā yaśodharā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpayati sā yat tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākarṇayitum arhatha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā dūrād eva māṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyudgamya sasaṃbhramā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāgtaṃ rājajihvāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity avocat kṛtasmitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā dūrād eva māṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyudgamya sa-saṃbhramā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sv-āgtaṃ rāja-jihvāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity avocat kṛta-smitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vetrāsanāsīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayuktārghādisatkriyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā mām āhāgame kāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āryayā jñāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vetra-āsana-āsīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayukta-argha-ādi-sat-kriyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā mām āhā agame kāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āryayā jñāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devādeśe tu kathite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayoktaṃ paṭulajjayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārye sarvam idaṃ satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devarau me yad āhatuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deva-ādeśe tu kathite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taya ūktaṃ paṭu-lajjayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārye sarvam idaṃ satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devarau me yad āhatuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu tasyānayor bhrātur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipannaṃ vahanaṃ śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vahanasya punaḥ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipanna iti na śrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu tasya anayor bhrātur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipannaṃ vahanaṃ śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vahanasya punaḥ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipanna iti na śrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāṃyātrikāś ca bahavaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutapotavipattayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avipannā gṛhān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyante punar āgatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāṃyātrikāś ca bahavaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śruta-pota-vipattayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-vipannā- gṛhān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyante punar āgatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā kadācid anayoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa bhrātā vahanāpadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimuktaḥ punar āyāyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mamāvaidhavyalakṣaṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā kadā-cid anayoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa bhrātā vahana-apadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimuktaḥ punar āyāyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama a-vaidhavya-lakṣaṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyac cāpannasattvāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>māso 'yaṃ daśamo mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vartate bhrātṛputro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadācid anayor bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyac cā apanna-sattvāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>māso 'yaṃ daśamo mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vartate bhrātṛ-putro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadā-cid anayor bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putro me yadi jāyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvan vā patir āpatet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ svīkṛtasarvasvau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devarau me kva yāsyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putro me yadi jāyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvan vā patir āpatet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ svī-kṛta-sarva-svau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devarau me kva yāsyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etan manasi kṛtvārthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dravyaṃ devarayor aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na nikṣiptavatī śeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āryayā jñāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etan manasi kṛtva ārthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dravyaṃ devarayor aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na nikṣiptavatī śeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āryayā jñāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā mahīpālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāṇijāv idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭumbācāracaturā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktam āha kuṭumbinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā mahī-pālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāṇijāv idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭumba-ācāra-caturā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktam āha kuṭumbinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātṛvye bhavator jāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrātur āgamane 'tha vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ubhayor nobhayorvāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktaṃ bhokṣyāmahe tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātṛvye bhavator jāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrātur āgamane 'tha vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ubhayor na ubhayorva āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktaṃ bhokṣyāmahe tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāniṣṭhitae evāsminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālāpe pūritāmbaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tūryagarjitasaṃbhinnas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāraḥ kalakalo 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha a-niṣṭhitae eva asminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālāpe pūrita-ambaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tūrya-garjita-saṃbhinnas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāraḥ kalakalo 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahāsayā ca sahasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsovāsādihastayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṇiggaṇikayā rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyajñāpyata viyātayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-hāsayā ca sahasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāso-vāsa-ādi-hastayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṇig-gaṇikayā rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyajñāpyata viyātayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vardhatāṃ naś ciraṃ devo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>diṣṭyā prakṛtisaṃpadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṇijo bhrātṛjāyāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātaḥ putro 'nayor iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vardhatāṃ naś ciraṃ devo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>diṣṭyā prakṛti-saṃpadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṇijo bhrātṛ-jāyāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātaḥ putro 'nayor iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citrīyamāṇacittena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cintitaṃ ca mahībhujā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho putrasya māhātmyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyakṣam anubhūyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citrīyamāṇa-cittena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cintitaṃ ca mahī-bhujā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho putrasya māhātmyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praty-akṣam anubhūyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuṭumbinaḥ putranāmni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāte śoṇitabinduke</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣavibhrāntacittānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaṇijāṃ paśya ḍambaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuṭumbinaḥ putra-nāmni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāte śoṇita-binduke</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣa-vibhrānta-cittānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaṇijāṃ paśya ḍambaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaṇijo draviṇasyāyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ataḥ pālaka ity amī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samaṃ harṣaviṣādābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitrāmitrasamā gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaṇijo draviṇasya ayam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ataḥ pālaka ity amī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samaṃ harṣa-viṣādābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitra-a-mitra-samā- gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmākaṃ tu dhanasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>medinīmaṇḍalasya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avasāne vinā putrāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pālakaḥ ko bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmākaṃ tu dhanasya asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>medinī-maṇḍalasya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avasāne vinā putrāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pālakaḥ ko bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti putragatāṃ cintām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upāsīnasya bhūpateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrghaśvāsasahāyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divasāḥ katicid yayuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti putra-gatāṃ cintām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upāsīnasya bhū-pateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrgha-śvāsa-sahāyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divasāḥ kati-cid yayuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam ekadā sukhāsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>senāpatir abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yātrā mṛgājinodyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaddṛṣṭyā maṇḍatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam ekadā su-kha-āsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>senā-patir abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yātrā mṛgājina-udyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvad-dṛṣṭyā maṇḍatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gataś ca dṛṣṭavāṃs tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra tatra niveśitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśālāś citraśālāḥ sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citranyastanarādhipāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gataś ca dṛṣṭavāṃs tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra tatra niveśitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśālāś citra-śālāḥ sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citra-nyasta-nara-adhipāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apṛcchac ca rumaṇvantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ kaḥ kaḥ kṣitīśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ye caitān anutiṣṭhanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te ke ke puruṣā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apṛcchac ca rumaṇvantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ kaḥ kaḥ kṣiti-īśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ye ca etān anutiṣṭhanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te ke ke puruṣā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd eṣa sagaraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kīrtilaṅghitasāgaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaṣtyā putrasahasrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūrāṇāṃ parivāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd eṣa sagaraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kīrti-laṅghita-sāgaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaṣtyā putra-sahasrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūrāṇāṃ parivāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ daśaratho rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛto rāmādibhiḥ sutaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ pāṇḍur amī cāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanayāḥ pañca pāṇḍavāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ daśaratho rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛto rāma-ādibhiḥ sutaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ pāṇḍur amī ca asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanayāḥ pañca pāṇḍavāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādīn asau dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svargiṇaḥ putriṇo nṛpān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicintaś cintayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citrāṃ yātrām acintayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādīn asau dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svargiṇaḥ putriṇo nṛpān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicintaś cintayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citrāṃ yātrām a-cintayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṇyavanta ime bhūpāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putravanto divaṃ gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandapuṇyena yātavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manye puṃnarakaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṇyavanta ime bhū-pāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putravanto divaṃ gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manda-puṇyena yātavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manye puṃ-narakaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mṛgājinayātrāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parītaḥ putracintayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivṛtyāpaśyad āvantyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandirodyānasevinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mṛgājina-yātrāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parītaḥ putra-cintayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivṛtya apaśyad āvantyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandira-udyāna-sevinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svakarāmburuhachāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃlohititapallavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmrāśokalatāprāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avalambya vyavasthitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sva-kara-ambu-ruha-chāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃlohitita-pallavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmra-aśoka-latā-prāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avalambya vyavasthitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anādarād anāhitair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mālyacandanabhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udvegam iva śaṃsantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mlānānanasaroruhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-ādarād a-nāhitair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mālya-candana-bhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udvegam iva śaṃsantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mlāna-ānana-saro-ruhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upagamyābravīc caināṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim aśokaḥ saśokayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandyeta labdhavijayo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rakto bālo niṣevyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upagamya abravīc ca enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim aśokaḥ sa-śokayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandyeta labdha-vijayo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rakto bālo niṣevyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravīt sahasāyāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṛkāritasaṃbhramā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahārāja kutaḥ śoko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāmāpi tava gṛhyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravīt sahasā āyāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṛ-kārita-saṃbhramā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-rāja kutaḥ śoko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāma api tava gṛhyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu pārāvatīm enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cañcvā cañcuṣu taṇḍulān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvapantīṃ svaśāvānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īkṣe putravatīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu pārāvatīm enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cañcvā cañcuṣu taṇḍulān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvapantīṃ sva-śāvānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īkṣe putravatīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsic ca nṛpateś cintā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathāhaṃ putracintayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anantayā saṃtatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatheyam api khidyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsic ca nṛ-pateś cintā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatha āhaṃ putra-cintayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anantayā saṃtatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha īyam api khidyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tatra kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā padmāvatīgṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adṛṣṭvā tatra tāṃ tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭavān paricārikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tatra kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā padmāvatī-gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-dṛṣṭvā tatra tāṃ tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭavān paricārikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva devīty uktayākhyātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udyāne putrakasya sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mādhavyā sahakārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivāham anutiṣṭhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva devi īty uktayā ākhyātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udyāne putrakasya sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mādhavyā saha-kārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivāham anutiṣṭhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutveti vatsarājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhir āsīd aho mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāryāṇāṃ divasā yānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha putramanorathaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutva īti vatsa-rājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhir āsīd aho mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāryāṇāṃ divasā- yānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha putra-mano-rathaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lokasyānicchataḥ putraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kīrṇagṛhakarodibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalakeṣu kṛtākrandair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avakāśo na labhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lokasya an-icchataḥ putraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kīrṇa-gṛhaka-rodibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalakeṣu kṛta-ākrandair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avakāśo na labhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmākam icchatām ekaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kulajīvitakāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na labhyate sutaḥ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaiparītyaṃ vidher iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmākam icchatām ekaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kula-jīvita-kāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na labhyate sutaḥ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaiparītyaṃ vidher iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niryāya sa tataḥ svasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mandirodyānamaṇḍape</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anāgatāgatasuhṛt</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>parivāra upāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niryāya sa tataḥ svasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mandira-udyāna-maṇḍape</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-āgata-āgata-suhṛt</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>parivāra upāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apṛcchat suhṛdas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavatāṃ jīvitauṣadham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūlaṃ kulataroḥ kasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiyantaḥ putrakā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apṛcchat suhṛdas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavatāṃ jīvita-oṣadham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūlaṃ kula-taroḥ kasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiyantaḥ putrakā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu niṣprativākyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃcin namitamūrdhasu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasantakaḥ parihasan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇayitvād abhās.ata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu niṣ-prativākyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃcin namita-mūrdhasu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasantakaḥ parihasan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇayitvād abhās.ata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svāmibhaktā vayaṃ deva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmivṛttānuvartinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvantaḥ svāminaḥ putrās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvanto 'smākam apy ataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svāmi-bhaktā- vayaṃ deva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmi-vṛtta-anuvartinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvantaḥ svāminaḥ putrās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvanto 'smākam apy ataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam avocat samīpasthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śanair yaugandharāyaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aprastāve 'pi bhavato</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukham etad anāvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam avocat samīpa-sthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śanair yaugandharāyaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-prastāve 'pi bhavato</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukham etad an-āvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putracintārujārtasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kurvāṇaḥ śalyaghaṭṭanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanv anekaguṇāṃ bhartur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpādayasi vedanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putra-cintā-rujā-ārtasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kurvāṇaḥ śalya-ghaṭṭanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanv an-eka-guṇāṃ bhartur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpādayasi vedanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād evaṃvidhe kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhṛtyavṛttavidā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmicittānukulaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛttir āsthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād evaṃ-vidhe kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhṛtya-vṛtta-vidā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmi-cittā-anu-kula aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛttir āsthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt putracintainaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi satyena pīḍayet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ piṅgalikaiveyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devam ārādhayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt putra-cinta ainaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi satyena pīḍayet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ piṅgalika aiva iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devam ārādhayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athedaṃ nīyakair uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktaṃ śrutvā mahībhujā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāsau piṅgalikā sā naḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putriṇī kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha idaṃ nīyakair uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktaṃ śrutvā mahī-bhujā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ya āsau piṅgalikā sā naḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putriṇī kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anantaraṃ ca ḍhaukitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jayaśabdapuraḥsaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putravān bhava deveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇī tam avardhayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-antaraṃ ca ḍhaukitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jaya-śabda-puraḥ-saram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putravān bhava deva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇī tam avardhayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhivādya mahīpalas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām apṛddhad athāryayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgamyate kutaḥ ke vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tavāmī bālakā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhivādya mahī-palas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām apṛddhad athā aryayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgamyate kutaḥ ke vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tava amī bālakā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhād vāsavadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājann āgamyate mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bālakāś ca sutā ete</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mameti kathitaṃ tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhād vāsavadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājann āgamyate mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bālakāś ca sutā- ete</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama iti kathitaṃ tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tām abravīd rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citram etat tvayoditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi bhartrā na ca sutair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavitavyaṃ tavedṛśaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tām abravīd rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citram etat tvaya ūditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi bhartrā na ca sutair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavitavyaṃ tavā idṛśaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ lekhābhiḥ patighnībhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakalaiva karālitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciraproṣitakāntāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhabhittir iva striyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ lekhābhiḥ pati-ghnībhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-kala aiva karālitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cira-proṣita-kāntāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛha-bhittir iva striyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca patyā vinā putrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavitavyaṃ yataḥ striyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād idaṃ mahac citraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphuṭaṃ naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca patyā vinā putrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavitavyaṃ yataḥ striyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād idaṃ mahac citraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphuṭaṃ naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvocad asau deva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathāttha na tad anyathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahatī tu kathā śrotum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>icchā cec chrūyatām iyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avocad asau deva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā āttha na tad anyathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahatī tu kathā śrotum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>icchā cec chrūyatām iyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty avantiṣu viprāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhivāsaḥ kapiṣṭhalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agnikuṇḍacitasīmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphītagodhūmagokulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty avantiṣu viprāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhivāsaḥ kapiṣṭhalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agni-kuṇḍa-cita-sīmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphīta-go-dhūma-go-kulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uvāsa brāhmaṇas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>somadattas trayīdhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyāntevāsibhir vyāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasudhā vedavedibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uvāsa brāhmaṇas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>somadattas trayī-dhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya antevāsibhir vyāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasudhā veda-vedibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patnī vasiṣṭhakalpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsiṣṭhī tasya suvratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasiṣṭhapatnīm api yā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhuvṛttām alajjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patnī vasiṣṭha-kalpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsiṣṭhī tasya su-vratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasiṣṭha-patnīm api yā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhu-vṛttām alajjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya tasyām aputrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāle mahati gacchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpannolkeva saṃdhyāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutā locanadurbhagā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya tasyām a-putrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāle mahati gacchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpanna-ulka īva saṃdhyāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutā locana-dur-bhagā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>somadattas tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>strīlakṣaṇaviśāradaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patiputradhanair hīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādideśa bhaviṣyatīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>somadattas tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>strī-lakṣaṇa-viśāradaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pati-putra-dhanair hīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādideśa bhaviṣyatīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anarthānāṃ balīyastvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>acireṇaiva durbhagā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūmaketuśikhevoccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paruṣā sā vyavardhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-arthānāṃ balīyastvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-cireṇa eva dur-bhagā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūma-ketu-śikha īva uccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paruṣā sā vyavardhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhikṣām ācchidya śiṣyebhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bubhukṣākṣapitatrapā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aprakṣālitahastaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatsamakṣam abhakṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhikṣām ācchidya śiṣyebhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bubhukṣā-kṣapita-trapā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-prakṣālita-hasta aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat-sam-akṣam abhakṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>durbhagatvād virūpatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalikāritayā ca tām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kaścid varayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaḥ prāptavarām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dur-bhagatvād vi-rūpatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kali-kāritayā ca tām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kaś-cid varayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaḥ prāpta-varām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca tāṃ somadatto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasmaicid aśubhām adāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā sma yujyata duḥkhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpyaināṃ ninditām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca tāṃ somadatto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasmai-cid a-śubhām adāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā sma yujyata duḥ-khena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpya enāṃ ninditām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>grāmyāgnineva saṃkāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kūṭikā sāpy adahyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvaṃkaṣaprabhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabalenāṅgajanmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>grāmya-agnina īva saṃkāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kūṭikā sa āpy adahyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvaṃkaṣa-prabhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabalena aṅga-janmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācit kaścid āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācāṭo baṭur uccakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mastakastho bhayakaraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>somadattam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cit kaś-cid āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācāṭo baṭur uccakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mastaka-stho bhaya-karaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>somadattam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upādhyāyasya duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām ākrudhya nirāgasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iṣṭakāloṣṭakair hanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tenāsau vāryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upādhyāyasya duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām ākrudhya nir-āgasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iṣṭakā-loṣṭakair hanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena asau vāryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>somadattas tataḥ kruddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sutāṃ caṇḍam abhartsayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ulke piśācike gaccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śīghraṃ mama gṛhad iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>somadattas tataḥ kruddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sutāṃ caṇḍam abhartsayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ulke piśācike gaccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śīghraṃ mama gṛhad iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu tat paruṣaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manasvijanaduḥśravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smarapīḍāsahatvāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maraṇāya mano dadhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu tat paruṣaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manasvi-jana-duḥ-śravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smara-pīḍā-sahatvāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maraṇāya mano dadhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>araṇyāniṃ tato gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maraṇopāyakāṅkṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adrākṣit kvacid uddeśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāsādaṃ daityaghātinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>araṇyāniṃ tato gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maraṇa-upāya-kāṅkṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adrākṣit kva-cid uddeśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāsādaṃ daitya-ghātinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyādūre ca sarasīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kūjatkurarasārasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guñjanmadhukaraśreṇīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anumātavyarodhasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya a-dūre ca sarasīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kūjat-kurara-sārasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guñjan-madhu-kara-śreṇīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anumātavya-rodhasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc cāsyā mayā tāvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>martavyam iti niścitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyeṣu tu saṃdehas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatropāyo 'yam uttamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca asyā- mayā tāvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>martavyam iti niścitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyeṣu tu saṃdehas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra upāyo 'yam uttamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devaṃ mādhavam arcantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kamalendīvarādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṅkajāvayavāhārāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣīṇā tyakṣyāmi jīvitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devaṃ mādhavam arcantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kamala-indīvara-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṅka-ja-avayava-āhārāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣīṇā tyakṣyāmi jīvitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtapuṇyā mṛtā svargaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāsyāmi nirupadravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>narakaṃ tu na yāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>strīmṛtyumṛtasaṃkulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta-puṇyā mṛtā svargaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāsyāmi nir-upadravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>narakaṃ tu na yāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>strī-mṛtyu-mṛta-saṃkulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sākarod iti niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathāsaṃkalpam ādṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rātrau ca baddhaparyaṅkā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devaṃ mādhavam asmarat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ākarod iti niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā-saṃkalpam ādṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rātrau ca baddha-paryaṅkā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devaṃ mādhavam asmarat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māsamātre gate 'paśyat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapnānte madhusūdanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varaṃ varaya putrīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣamāṇaṃ mudāyutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māsa-mātre gate 'paśyat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapna-ante madhusūdanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varaṃ varaya putri iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣamāṇaṃ mudā āyutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sātha vyajñāpayat prahvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devaṃ viracitāñjaliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maraṇaṃ me jagannātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ātha vyajñāpayat prahvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devaṃ viracita-añjaliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maraṇaṃ me jagan-nātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devas tām avadan nedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatārādhanāt phalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṇihatyāvipāko 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmahatyā ca ninditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devas tām avadan na idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatā-ārādhanāt phalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṇihatyā-vipāko 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmahatyā ca ninditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād anyaṃ varaṃ brūhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patiputradhanādhikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena hīnāsi vairāgyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niryātā svagṛhād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād anyaṃ varaṃ brūhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pati-putra-dhana-adhikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena hīna āsi vairāgyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niryātā sva-gṛhād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravīt kṛtapuṇyābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patyādiḥ strībhir āpyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ tv ācaritāpuṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhair eva vibhāvitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravīt kṛta-puṇyābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patyādiḥ strībhir āpyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ tv ācarita-a-puṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhair eva vibhāvitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenālaṃ patiputrādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cintayā phalahīnayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛtyunā śāntim icchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā me saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena alaṃ pati-putra-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cintayā phala-hīnayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛtyunā śāntim icchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā me saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt satyam evedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ tu janmāntare tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yavāḍhakaḥ pitur gṛhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇāyopapāditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt satyam eva idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ tu janma-antare tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yava-āḍhakaḥ pitur gṛhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇāya upapāditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca jātaś caturvedaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapuṇyair iha janmani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>surūpaḥ sādhuvṛttaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa te bhartā bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca jātaś catur-vedaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-puṇyair iha janmani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-rūpaḥ sādhu-vṛttaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa te bhartā bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca tvām urvaśīrūpām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eko drakṣyati nāparaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīto yavāḍhakena tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti yāvan na vakṣyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca tvām urvaśī-rūpām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eko drakṣyati na a-paraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīto yava-āḍhakena tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti yāvan na vakṣyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>janmāntare ca pūrvasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhakṣayantyās tilās tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṣṭau nipatitā vahnāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>añjaler viralāṅguleḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>janma-antare ca pūrvasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhakṣayantyās tilās tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṣṭau nipatitā vahnāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>añjaler virala-aṅguleḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te te putrā bhaviṣyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putri candranibhānanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maraṇād dāruṇāt tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cittam āvartyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te te putrā- bhaviṣyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putri candra-nibha-ānanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maraṇād dāruṇāt tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cittam āvartyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvāntarhite deve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratibuddhā dadarśa sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saśiṣyavargaṃ pitaraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadgaveṣiṇam āgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktva āntarhite deve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratibuddhā dadarśa sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-śiṣya-vargaṃ pitaraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad-gaveṣiṇam āgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapaḥkṛśāṃ sakaruṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitā kāritapāraṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāmyantīm anayad gehaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśrāmyantīṃ tarau tarau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapaḥ-kṛśāṃ sa-karuṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitā kārita-pāraṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāmyantīm anayad gehaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśrāmyantīṃ tarau tarau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā sā piṅgalikā deva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devam ārādhya keśavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varaṃ labdhavatī tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāṃ mām eva nibodha tām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā sā piṅgalikā deva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devam ārādhya keśavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varaṃ labdhavatī tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāṃ mām eva nibodha tām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā tu caturvedaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāntevāsī yadṛcchayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛham asmākam āyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtātithyo dadarśa mām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā tu catur-vedaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-antevāsī yad-ṛcchayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛham asmākam āyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛta-ātithyo dadarśa mām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tātaṃ tu so 'pṛcchad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahman kasyeyam ātmajā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāntininditacandrābhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktaṃ cet kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tātaṃ tu so 'pṛcchad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahman kasya iyam ātmajā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kānti-nindita-candra-ābhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktaṃ cet kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mameti kathite pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ prārthayata sa dvijaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitrā dattaṃ ca vidhivan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muditaḥ pariṇītavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama iti kathite pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ prārthayata sa dvijaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitrā dattaṃ ca vidhivan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muditaḥ pariṇītavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cārabhya divasāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa siddha iva kiṃkaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kāṃcin na karoti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mamājñāṃ ninditām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cā arabhya divasāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa siddha iva kiṃkaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kāṃ-cin na karoti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mamā ajñāṃ ninditām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amī cāṣṭau sutās tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>acireṇaiva durlabhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>labdhā mayā sutā ye 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādāl lokadhāriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amī ca aṣṭau sutās tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-cireṇa eva dur-labhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>labdhā- mayā sutā- ye 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādāl loka-dhāriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti kāle gate bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ kadācid abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭhaṃ duḥkhāyamānaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍi saṃvāhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti kāle gate bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ kadā-cid abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭhaṃ duḥkhāyamānaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍi saṃvāhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuktapūrvavacanam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktavantam athābruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim ahaṃ bhavatā krītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭhasaṃvāhiketi tam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-ukta-pūrva-vacanam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktavantam atha abruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim ahaṃ bhavatā krītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭha-saṃvāhika īti tam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravin nīcakais trāsād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅguṣṭhāgreṇa gāṃ likhan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ vā kiṃ tvayā krīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena preṣyatvam āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravin nīcakais trāsād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅguṣṭha-agreṇa gāṃ likhan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ vā kiṃ tvayā krīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena preṣyatvam āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato vismṛtya samayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartāraṃ roṣadūṣitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīto yavāḍhakenāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayety apriyam abruvam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato vismṛtya samayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartāraṃ roṣadūṣitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīto yava-āḍhakena asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maya īty a-priyam abruvam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.126'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asāv api ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahajākāravañcitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃnikarṣād apakramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhrānta idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.126'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asāv api ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahaja-ākāra-vañcitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃnikarṣād apakramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhrānta idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.127'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api kāsi kutaś cāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kenāsi vikṛtā kṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaccit piṅgalikā nāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaś ca nāma yavāḍhakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.127'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api ka āsi kutaś ca asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kena asi vikṛtā kṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kac-cit piṅgalikā na asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaś ca nāma yava-āḍhakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.128'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tenānuyuktāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathāvṛttam avarṇayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'pi saṃjātanirvedo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na jāte kva palāyitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.128'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tena anuyukta āhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā-vṛttam avarṇayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'pi saṃjāta-nir-vedo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na jāte kva palāyitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.129'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin deśāntaraṃ yāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāte ca tridaśālayam</seg> </l>
