<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛbhartṛvihīnāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>enaṃ deśam upāgatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.129'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin deśa-antaraṃ yāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāte ca tri-daśa-ālayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛ-bhartṛ-vihīna āham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>enaṃ deśam upāgatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.130'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svadeśaprītiyogāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devyā vasavadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saputrānugṛhītā asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaktāc chādanarakṣaṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.130'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sva-deśa-prīti-yogāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devyā vasavadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-putra-anugṛhītā asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaktāc chādana-rakṣaṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.131'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena devena yat pṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kutas te bālakā iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evam ete mayā labdhās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṣṭān nārāyaṇād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.131'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena devena yat pṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kutas te bālakā- iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evam ete mayā labdhās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṣṭān nārāyaṇād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_4.132'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti hṛṣtamatir niśāmya tasyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caritaṃ putrasamūhalābhahetum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sacivaiḥ sahitaś cakāra rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutasaṃprāptiphalaṃ kriyāvicāram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_4.132'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti hṛṣta-matir niśāmya tasyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caritaṃ putra-samūha-lābha-hetum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sacivaiḥ sahitaś cakāra rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suta-saṃprāpti-phalaṃ kriyā-vicāram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha saṃpreṣitāsthānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sacivān abravīn nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad bravīmi nibodhantu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantas tat sacetasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha saṃpreṣita-āsthānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sacivān abravīn nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad bravīmi nibodhantu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantas tat sa-cetasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṇaiḥ kila samāghrātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣo jāyate tribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahmacaryeṣṭisaṃtānair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṛṣidevasvadhābhujām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṇaiḥ kila samāghrātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣo jāyate tribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahma-carya-iṣṭi-saṃtānair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṛṣi-deva-svadhā-bhujām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrādhigatavedo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iṣṭāśeṣamahākratuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aputratvāt tu pitṛbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhītaḥ piṇḍabhojibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra adhigata-vedo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iṣṭa-a-śeṣa-mahā-kratuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-putratvāt tu pitṛbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhītaḥ piṇḍa-bhojibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca putrāṅgasaṃsparśāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhahetur anuttaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhibhiḥ sa hi nirdiṣṭaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>candanād api śītalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca putra-aṅga-saṃsparśāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukha-hetur an-uttaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhibhiḥ sa hi nirdiṣṭaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>candanād api śītalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ cātiprasaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvathā gṛhamedhinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭādṛṣṭasukhaprāpteḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrād anyan na kāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ ca ati-prasaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvathā gṛha-medhinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭa-a-dṛṣṭa-sukha-prāpteḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrād anyan na kāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad asti yadi vaḥ kāṅkṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣprajānāṃ prajāṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārabhadhvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devatārādhanaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad asti yadi vaḥ kāṅkṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣ-prajānāṃ prajāṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārabhadhvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devatā-ārādhanaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tu sapramadāḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājñaḥ putrārthinaḥ kathām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddhakalpātmasaṃkalpāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyūcur darśitasmitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tu sa-pramadāḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājñaḥ putra-arthinaḥ kathām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddha-kalpa-ātma-saṃkalpāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyūcur darśita-smitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putrajanma vaṇigvadhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrāyāṃ citradarśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>piṅgalīdarśanaṃ ceti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayogo 'yam anuṣṭhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putra-janma vaṇig-vadhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrāyāṃ citra-darśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>piṅgalī-darśanaṃ ca iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayogo 'yam anuṣṭhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmābhiḥ sa ca devena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathaiva saphalīkṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtaḥ kāle prayogo hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāphalo jātu jāyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmābhiḥ sa ca devena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatha aiva sa-phalī-kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtaḥ kāle prayogo hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na a-phalo jātu jāyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena saṃkalpasadṛśīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārabhadhvaṃ kriyām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sacivair abhyanujñātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatheti pratipannavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena saṃkalpa-sadṛśīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārabhadhvaṃ kriyām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sacivair abhyanujñātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha īti pratipannavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa puṇye 'hani saṃpūjya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatāgnidvijanmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayau nāgavanodyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadāraḥ saha mantribhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa puṇye 'hani saṃpūjya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatā-agni-dvi-janmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayau nāgavana-udyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-dāraḥ saha mantribhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māgadhī tu kṛtotsāhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devyā vāsavadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alam āli tavānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khedeneti nivāritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māgadhī tu kṛta-utsāhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devyā vāsavadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alam āli tava anena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khedena iti nivāritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktā ca nanu bālāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛṇālītantukomalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anubhūtasukhā cāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrātur bhartuś ca veśmani ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktā ca nanu bāla āsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛṇālī-tantu-komalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anubhūta-sukhā ca asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrātur bhartuś ca veśmani ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥsahāni tu duḥkhāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā ninditabhāgyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anubhūtāni tenāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaktā duḥkham upāsitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥ-sahāni tu duḥ-khāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā nindita-bhāgyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anubhūtāni tena ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaktā duḥ-kham upāsitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś ca me bhavitā putraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa bhavatyā bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛttikāgarbhasaṃbhūto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavānyā iva ṣaṇmukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś ca me bhavitā putraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa bhavatyā bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛttikā-garbha-saṃbhūto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavānyā- iva ṣaṇ-mukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tasyāṃ nivṛttāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha vāsavadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tapobhir acirād rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājarājam atoṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tasyāṃ nivṛttāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha vāsavadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tapobhir a-cirād rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāja-rājam atoṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā pratibhuddhau tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daṃpatī jātasaṃbhramau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā devi hāryaputreti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyāharantau parasparam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā pratibhuddhau tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daṃpatī jāta-saṃbhramau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā devi hā ārya-putra īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyāharantau paras-param ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athopaspṛśya nṛpatir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>namaskṛtvā dhanādhipam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puraḥ purohitādīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācakhyau svapnam ādṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha upaspṛśya nṛ-patir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>namas-kṛtvā dhana-adhipam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puraḥ puro-hita-ādīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācakhyau svapnam ādṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adya paśyāmy ahaṃ svapne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyomni kāmapi devatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhāmbhaḥsaṃtativyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nabhomaṇḍalanīlatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adya paśyāmy ahaṃ svapne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyomni kām-api devatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhā-ambhaḥ-saṃtati-vyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nabho-maṇḍala-nīlatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā mām uktavatī vācā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghambhīrasukumārayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvām āhvayati vitteśas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadāśāṃ gamyatām ataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā mām uktavatī vācā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghambhīra-sukumārayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvām āhvayati vitta-īśas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad-āśāṃ gamyatām ataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayaum iti pratijñāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdhyāraktataraṃ karam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āropya prasthitā vyomni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>diśaṃ vitteśapālitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya aum iti pratijñāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdhyā-raktataraṃ karam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āropya prasthitā vyomni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>diśaṃ vitta-īśa-pālitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarveṇeha dhṛtā gaṅgā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṇītātra pārvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ityādīn darśayantī nau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradeśaṃ pārvatīpituḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarveṇa iha dhṛtā gaṅgā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṇīta ātra pārvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity-ādīn darśayantī nau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradeśaṃ pārvatī-pituḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nīyamānaḥ krameṇettham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>athāhaṃ dṛṣṭavān puraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candrapāṣāṇanirmāṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prākārām alakāpurīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nīyamānaḥ krameṇa ittham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atha ahaṃ dṛṣṭavān puraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candra-pāṣāṇa-nirmāṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prākārām alakā-purīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṇānāṃ pārvatībhartur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṇair agaṇitair yutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyā bāhyam adṛṣṭāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalpapādapakānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṇānāṃ pārvatī-bhartur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṇair a-gaṇitair yutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyā- bāhyam a-dṛṣṭa-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalpa-pāda-pa-kānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nānāmaṇiprabhājāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalmāṣaśikharāṇy api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śubhrayaty eva harmyāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yasyāṃ rudrenducandrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nānā-maṇi-prabhā-jāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalmāṣa-śikharāṇy api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śubhrayaty eva harmyāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yasyāṃ rudra-indu-candrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatārya tu māṃ dvāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guhyakeśvaraveśmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadati kṣaṇam atraiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthīyatām iti devatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatārya tu māṃ dvāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guhyaka-īśvara-veśmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadati kṣaṇam atra eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthīyatām iti devatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā praviśya pratīhāryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha nirgamya bhāṣate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñātapraveśo 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devenāgamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā praviśya pratīhāryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha nirgamya bhāṣate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñāta-praveśo 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devenā agamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavanānīva devānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṣaḍ atikramya saptame</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kakṣāntare prakṛṣṭarddhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi draviṇeśvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavanāni iva devānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṣaḍ atikramya saptame</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kakṣa-antare prakṛṣṭa-rddhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi draviṇa-īśvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tatrāpsarāḥ kācit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāṃcid āha nirīkṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakhi nūnam asāv eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yasyāsau bhavitā sutaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tatra apsarāḥ kā-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāṃ-cid āha nirīkṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakhi nūnam asāv eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yasya asau bhavitā sutaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā mantrayamāṇānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣīṇām agrataḥ śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bharatānām ayaṃ vaṃśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśuddhe jāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā mantrayamāṇānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣīṇām agrataḥ śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bharatānām ayaṃ vaṃśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśuddhe jāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na caiṣa kevalaṃ dhanyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena putreṇa pārthivaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'pi sādhūpamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putraḥ pātraṃ bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca eṣa kevalaṃ dhanyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena putreṇa pārthivaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'pi sādhu-upamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putraḥ pātraṃ bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tat tādṛśaṃ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labhatām eṣa bhūpatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asāv api śacīśakra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>caritau pitarāv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tat tādṛśaṃ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labhatām eṣa bhū-patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asāv api śacī-śakra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>caritau pitarāv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kārye guruṇi saktatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tṛṇīkṛtasurāṅganaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakiṃkaragaṇaṃ prahvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇamāmi dhanādhipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kārye guruṇi saktatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tṛṇī-kṛta-sura-aṅganaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-kiṃkara-gaṇaṃ prahvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇamāmi dhana-adhipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manuṣyadharmā tu bhujaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhujageśvarapīvaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udyamyāha manuṣyendra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāgataṃ sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manuṣya-dharmā tu bhujaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhuja-ga-īśvara-pīvaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udyamyā aha manuṣya indra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sv-āgataṃ sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsanne ratnacaraṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāpite kanakāsane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyavadhāya tu mām āste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devī nīcaistarāsanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsanne ratna-caraṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāpite kanaka-āsane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyavadhāya tu mām āste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devī nīcaistara-āsanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svananti parivādinyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāḍitā nāradādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anekākārakaraṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyate puṣkaradhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svananti parivādinyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāḍitā- nārada-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-eka-ākāra-karaṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyate puṣkara-dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>urvaśīmenakārambhā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>citralekhākratusthalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāyantyaḥ kuṭṭitatalā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nartayante tilottamām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>urvaśī-menakā-rambhā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>citralekhā-kratusthalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāyantyaḥ kuṭṭita-talā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nartayante tila-uttamām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃprāye ca vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāro nalakūbaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājarājasutaḥ krīḍann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āyātaḥ saha bālakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ-prāye ca vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāro nalakūbaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-rāja-sutaḥ krīḍann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āyātaḥ saha bālakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>merusāramahāratna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃghātakṛtasaṃhatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍāśakaṭikāṃ karṣann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>itaś cetaś ca gacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>meru-sāra-mahā-ratna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃghāta-kṛta-saṃhatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍā-śakaṭikāṃ karṣann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>itaś ca itaś ca gacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha skhalitacakrāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāḥ kusumasaṃcaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utplutya patitaṃ ratnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaiḍūryakṣodakuṭṭime ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha skhalita-cakrāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāḥ kusuma-saṃcaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utplutya patitaṃ ratnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaiḍūrya-kṣoda-kuṭṭime ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prasāritakaraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuvero nalakūbaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahyam etad dadasveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad ratnam udayācata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prasārita-karaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuvero nalakūbaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahyam etad dadasva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad ratnam udayācata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nyastaṃ ca rājaputreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājarājakarodare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ratnaṃ paṅkajagarbhastha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bandhūkam iva rājate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nyastaṃ ca rāja-putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja-rāja-kara-udare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ratnaṃ paṅka-ja-garbha-stha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bandhūkam iva rājate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duṣṭalakṣaṇamuktānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktānāṃ parivāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaḍviṃśatyā padmarāgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṣṭāśri bahalaprabham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duṣṭa-lakṣaṇa-muktānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktānāṃ parivāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaḍ-viṃśatyā padma-rāgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṣṭā-śri bahala-prabham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vittādhipatinā mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattaṃ devyai ca tan mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stanayor antare nyastam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anayāpi sphuranmudā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vitta-adhi-patinā mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattaṃ devyai ca tan mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stanayor antare nyastam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anaya āpi sphuran-mudā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siṃhaśāvas tato bhūtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cañcadvāladhikeśaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidārya dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etasyāḥ praviśaty asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siṃha-śāvas tato bhūtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cañca-dvāladhi-keśaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidārya dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etasyāḥ praviśaty asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadavasthām imāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hā devīti vadann aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratibuddha iti svapnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācaṣṭe sma narādhipaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad-avasthām imāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hā devi iti vadann aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratibuddha iti svapnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācaṣṭe sma nara-adhipaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nakṣatraśāstrajñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddhādeśaḥ sasaṃmadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādityaśarmā svapnasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvijaḥ phalam avarṇayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nakṣatra-śāstra-jñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddha-ādeśaḥ sa-saṃmadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādityaśarmā svapnasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvijaḥ phalam avarṇayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijayasva mahārāja</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putreṇa dviṣatāṃ gaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samādhineva balinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāgādīnāṃ balīyasām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijayasva mahā-rāja</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putreṇa dviṣatāṃ gaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samādhina īva balinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāga-ādīnāṃ balīyasām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vimānaghanasaṃghāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthagitendudivākaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharasamūhendraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putras tava bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vimāna-ghana-saṃghāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>stha-gita-indu-divā-karaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dhara-samūha-indraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putras tava bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yās tā muktāparīvārās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya ṣaḍviṃśati maṇeḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākulā bhaviṣyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryās tava sutasya tāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yās tā- muktā-parīvārās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya ṣaḍ-viṃśati maṇeḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-kulā bhaviṣyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryās tava sutasya tāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye cāṣṭāv aśrayo ratnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parito lakṣitās tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyās tā viddhi putrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣyantī bhaviṣyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye ca aṣṭāv aśrayo ratnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parito lakṣitās tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyās tā- viddhi putrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣyantī bhaviṣyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca sthāpite svapne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājakīye dvijanmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svasvapnaḥ kathitas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devyā vāsavadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca sthāpite svapne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājakīye dvi-janmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-svapnaḥ kathitas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devyā vāsavadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āryaputreṇa yo dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa eva sakalo mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kukṣau vidāryamāṇe ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hāryaputreti bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārya-putreṇa yo dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa eva sa-kalo mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kukṣau vidāryamāṇe ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hā ārya-putra iti bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutavataḥ svapnau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulyāv ādityaśarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaviṣyadviṣaye jñāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛḍhatāṃ niścayo gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutavataḥ svapnau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulyāv ādityaśarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaviṣyad-viṣaye jñāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛḍhatāṃ niścayo gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vijñāpayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rumaṇvān medinīpatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭaḥ svapno mayā yaḥ sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śravaṇenānugṛhyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vijñāpayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rumaṇvān medinī-patim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭaḥ svapno mayā yaḥ sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śravaṇena anugṛhyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deve saniyame jāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cedivatsaniveśinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devasyāpatyalābhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarve saniyamāḥ sthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deve sa-niyame jāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cedi-vatsa-niveśinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devasya apatya-lābhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarve sa-niyamāḥ sthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāham adya paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapne garuḍavāhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mārgitaś ca mayā dehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāmine naḥ prajā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra aham adya paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapne garuḍa-vāhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mārgitaś ca mayā dehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāmine naḥ prajā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa vihasyoktavān pūrṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāminas te manorathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tavāpi pūrayāmīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahyaṃ bāṇaṃ vitīrṇavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa vihasya uktavān pūrṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāminas te mano-rathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava api pūrayāmi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahyaṃ bāṇaṃ vitīrṇavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sapraṇāmaṃ tam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hṛdaye nidadhāmi ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akālakaumudīṃ cemāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi pratibodhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-praṇāmaṃ tam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hṛdaye nidadhāmi ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kāla-kaumudīṃ ca imāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi pratibodhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣo 'pi sthāpitaḥ svapnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītenādityaśarmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yādṛśo 'sya suto bhavī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśaḥ śrūyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣo 'pi sthāpitaḥ svapnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītenā adityaśarmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yādṛśo 'sya suto bhavī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśaḥ śrūyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāyako hi guṇenārthī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmād asya bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putraḥ ṣāḍguṇyatattvajño</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktaś cāyaṃ guṇair guṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāyako hi guṇena arthī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmād asya bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putraḥ ṣāḍ-guṇya-tattva-jño</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktaś ca ayaṃ guṇair guṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paratantragatisthānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khagāmī ca yataḥ śaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena rājasutapraiṣyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khecaraś ca bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>para-tantra-gati-sthānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kha-gāmī ca yataḥ śaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena rāja-suta-praiṣyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khe-caraś ca bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athākathayad ātmīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapnaṃ yaugandharāyaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mamādyaikonapañcāśan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maruto darśanaṃ gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha akathayad ātmīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapnaṃ yaugandharāyaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mama adya ekonapañcāśan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maruto darśanaṃ gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣām ekaḥ sphuraddyotaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khadyotanikaradyutim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svaṃ vimucya mudā mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃnāhaṃ dattavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣām ekaḥ sphurad-dyotaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kha-dyota-nikara-dyutim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svaṃ vimucya mudā mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃnāhaṃ dattavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartuḥ saṃnāhasadṛśaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūro 'dhyavasitaḥ sutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavato bhavitety evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svapnam āsthāpayad dvijaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartuḥ saṃnāha-sadṛśaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūro 'dhyavasitaḥ sutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavato bhavita īty evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svapnam āsthāpayad dvijaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣabheṇeti kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭavān asmi gogaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bravīti tatra mām ekā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviśemāṃ guhām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣabheṇa iti kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭavān asmi go-gaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bravīti tatra mām ekā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviśa imāṃ guhām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra praviśatā dṛṣṭāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catuḥṣaṣṭir mayā kalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catasraś ca mahāvidyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinyastāś citrakarmaṇi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra praviśatā dṛṣṭāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catuḥ-ṣaṣṭir mayā kalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catasraś ca mahā-vidyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinyastāś citra-karmaṇi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra citrīyamāṇo 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citraṃ citraṃ vilokayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bodhito jṛmbhaṇair mandrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bherīṇāṃ garjitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra citrīyamāṇo 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citraṃ citraṃ vilokayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bodhito jṛmbhaṇair mandrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bherīṇāṃ garjitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthapito 'yam iti svapnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putras tava bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśeṣacitravinyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalākuśaladhīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>

<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthapito 'yam iti svapnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putras tava bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-śeṣa-citra-vinyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalā-kuśala-dhīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭaṃ vasantakenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapnaṃ kathitam ity atha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattavān pāvako mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṇḍalaṃ rucirojjvalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭaṃ vasantakena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapnaṃ kathitam ity atha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattavān pāvako mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṇḍalaṃ rucira-ujjvalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.72'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhinnaṃ bhābhis tamo jātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakoranayanāruṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.72'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhinnaṃ bhābhis tamo jātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakora-nayana-aruṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>komalānilavikṣipta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nalinasparśabodhatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>resur vivādarasitāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarasīṣu śakuntayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>komala-anila-vikṣipta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nalina-sparśa-bodhatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>resur vivāda-rasitāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarasīṣu śakuntayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gambhīrapratinirghoṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhīṣitendrāvarodhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devatāgārabherīṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccair dhvanir ajṛmbhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gambhīra-pratinirghoṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhīṣita-indra-avarodhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devatā-āgāra-bherīṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccair dhvanir ajṛmbhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avadanta ca vṛndāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandināṃ medinīpatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūritārthisamūhāśa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tavāśā pūryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avadanta ca vṛndāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandināṃ medinī-patim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrita-arthi-samūha-āśa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tavā aśā pūryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuvā dhīraḥ sabhe yogyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajamānasya jāyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ityādibhir dvijāś cainaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantravādyair avardhayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuvā dhīraḥ sabhe yogyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajamānasya jāyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity-ādibhir dvijāś ca enaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantra-vādyair avardhayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nimittair evamākāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryasaṃsiddhiśaṃsibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādityaśarmaṇo jātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgaṃ romāñcakarkaśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nimittair evam-ākāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kārya-saṃsiddhi-śaṃsibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādityaśarmaṇo jātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgaṃ romāñca-karkaśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padmāvatyā tato harṣād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivāhae iva nṛtyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasantake dhvanattāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nanarta gaṇikāgaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padmāvatyā tato harṣād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivāhae iva nṛtyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasantake dhvanat-tāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nanarta gaṇikā-gaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ cātiprasaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkṣepād avadhāryatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadhūvṛndaparīvārāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pranṛttāḥ śvaśurā api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ ca ati-prasaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkṣepād avadhāryatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadhū-vṛnda-parīvārāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pranṛttāḥ śvaśurā- api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atiharṣaparītatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vitantrīparivādinīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāḍayanti sma gandharvāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svarāvismṛtasāraṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ati-harṣa-parītatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vitantrī-parivādinīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāḍayanti sma gandharvāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svara-a-vismṛta-sāraṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādau tu vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vartamāne mahīpatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtābhiṣekādividhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suraviprān apūjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādau tu vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vartamāne mahī-patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛta-abhiṣeka-ādi-vidhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sura-viprān apūjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviśya stūyamānaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛndair brāhmaṇabandinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pauram antaḥpuraṃ caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dānādibhir amānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviśya stūyamānaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛndair brāhmaṇa-bandinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pauram antaḥ-puraṃ ca eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāna-ādibhir amānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māsadvayaparīmāṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ kāle 'tigacchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devyāṃ sattvasamāveśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vārttāṃ prāvartayat kṣitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māsa-dvaya-parīmāṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ kāle 'tigacchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devyāṃ sattva-samāveśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vārttāṃ prāvartayat kṣitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena yena śrutā vārttā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śabareṇa śukena vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>giriṣṭhaḥ pañjarastho vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mugdhas tatraiva tatra saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena yena śrutā vārttā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śabareṇa śukena vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>giri-ṣṭhaḥ pañjara-stho vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mugdhas tatra eva tatra saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>striyaḥ prasūtikuśalāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumārādicikitsakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>garbhakarmavidaś cānye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nityaṃ tāṃ paryacārayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>striyaḥ prasūti-kuśalāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāra-ādi-cikitsakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>garbha-karma-vidaś ca anye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nityaṃ tāṃ paryacārayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mlāyanmadhūkavicchāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapolaṃ jihmalocanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśrūs tasyā mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bubudhe dohadavyathām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mlāyan-madhūka-vicchāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapolaṃ jihma-locanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśrūs tasyā- mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bubudhe doha-davyathām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛcchati sma ca tāṃ putri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śīghram ācakṣva dohadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anākhyāte hi garbhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaiphalyam api dṛśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛcchati sma ca tāṃ putri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śīghram ācakṣva dohadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-ākhyāte hi garbhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vai-phalyam api dṛśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lajjamānā yadā nāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathayām āsa dohadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā svavṛttaṃ sā vadhvai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyāhartum upacakrame ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lajjamānā yadā na asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathayām āsa dohadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā sva-vṛttaṃ sā vadhvai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyāhartum upacakrame ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antarvatnīm apṛcchan mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekadā śvaśuras tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bādhate dohado yas tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kṣipraṃ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antar-vatnīm apṛcchan mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekadā śvaśuras tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bādhate dohado yas tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kṣipraṃ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu praṇayinyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛṣṭataralajjayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakhīmukhena kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahukṛtvo 'nuyuktayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu praṇayinya āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛṣṭatara-lajjayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakhī-mukhena kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahu-kṛtvo 'nuyuktayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyaṃ māṃ bādhate śraddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāśu saṃpādyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā ca saṃpāditāmātyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatānīkasya śāsanāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyaṃ māṃ bādhate śraddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-āśu saṃpādyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā ca saṃpādita āmātyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatānīkasya śāsanāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālabhāskarabimbābhā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dadhānāḥ sānulepanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyacaranta purīṃ raktām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambarābharaṇasrajaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bāla-bhāskara-bimba-ābhā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dadhānāḥ sa-anulepanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyacaranta purīṃ raktām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambara-ābharaṇa-srajaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>raktātapatravyajanā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>raktakambalavāhyakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raktāśokavanākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>parivārakadambakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rakta-ātapatra-vyajanā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>rakta-kambala-vāhyakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakta-aśoka-vana-ākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>parivāra-kadambakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suyamunam athāruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padmarāganagāruṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>digdāhād iva raktānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ diśām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suyamunam athā aruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padma-rāga-naga-aruṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dig-dāhād iva raktānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ diśām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pakṣānilabhrānta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāntajanavīkṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭhaputra ivāgacchad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garuḍasya vihaṃgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pakṣa-anila-bhrānta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhānta-jana-vīkṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭha-putra iva agacchad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garuḍasya vihaṃ-gamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarasāmiṣagṛddhaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mugdhām ādāya mām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agamad gaganaṃ vegāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chatānīkasya paśyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-rasa-āmiṣa-gṛddhaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mugdhām ādāya mām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agamad gaganaṃ vegāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chatānīkasya paśyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pradeśe kasmiṃscid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avatāritavān sa mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhakṣayiṣyan niṣiddhaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kenāpy ākāśam āśrayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pradeśe kasmiṃscid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avatāritavān sa mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhakṣayiṣyan niṣiddhaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kena apy ākāśam āśrayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma ca tatra dvau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛśāv ṛs.ikumārakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhāmaṇḍalasaṃsarga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>piṅgalāṅgau jvalajjaṭau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma ca tatra dvau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛśāv ṛs.i-kumārakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhā-maṇḍala-saṃsarga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>piṅgala-aṅgau jvalaj-jaṭau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau mām avocatāṃ devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā bhaiṣīr ayam āśramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasiṣṭhasyāśritaḥ puṇyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udayādrer upatyakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau mām avocatāṃ devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā bhaiṣīr ayam āśramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasiṣṭhasyā aśritaḥ puṇyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udaya-adrer upatyakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgaccha nanu pāvas tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatrety ukte gatā satī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyāmi sma jagajjyeṣṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṣṭhatāpasaveṣṭitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgaccha nanu pāvas tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra ity ukte gatā satī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyāmi sma jagaj-jyeṣṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṣṭha-tāpasa-veṣṭitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vanditaś ca mayā dūrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āśiṣā mām avardhayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putri putraṃ vijāyasva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaśaḥpātram ajarjaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vanditaś ca mayā dūrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āśiṣā mām avardhayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putri putraṃ vijāyasva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaśaḥ-pātram ajarjaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cotkaṇṭhā tvayā kāryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svajane matsanāthayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādityavaṃśajānāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃniveśaḥ parāyaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca utkaṇṭhā tvayā kāryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-jane mat-sa-nāthayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āditya-vaṃśa-jānāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃniveśaḥ parāyaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti viśvāsya māṃ vākyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhurair evamādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvāsaḥ kriyatāṃ vadhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti śiṣyān samādiśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti viśvāsya māṃ vākyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhurair evam-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvāsaḥ kriyatāṃ vadhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti śiṣyān samādiśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣipram āvasathaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te śilādāruveṇubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khātaśālaparikṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasiṣṭhāya nyavedayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣipram āvasathaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te śilā-dāru-veṇubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khāta-śāla-parikṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasiṣṭhāya nyavedayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāpasī kṛtasānāthyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatrāham avasaṃ sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛṣibhiḥ kriyamāṇeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garbhasaṃskārakarmasu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāpasī kṛta-sānāthyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra aham avasaṃ sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛṣibhiḥ kriyamāṇeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garbha-saṃskāra-karmasu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasūtā cāsmi daśame</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māse putraṃ patiṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anukūlasavitṛādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>grahasūcitasaṃpadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasūtā ca asmi daśame</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māse putraṃ patiṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anukūla-savitṛ-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>graha-sūcita-saṃpadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jātakarma tataḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūryavaṃśaguruḥ svayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divase dvādaśe nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrasya kṛtavān mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jāta-karma tataḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūrya-vaṃśa-guruḥ svayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divase dvādaśe nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrasya kṛtavān mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālo jātaḥ sujāto 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasmād udayaparvate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād udayano nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasiddhim upayātv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālo jātaḥ su-jāto 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasmād udaya-parvate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād udayano nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasiddhim upayātv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vede gandharvavede ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakalāsu kalāsu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāstreṣu cāstraśastreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddhir asya vinīyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vede gandharva-vede ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-kalāsu kalāsu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāstreṣu ca astra-śastreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddhir asya vinīyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gacchatsu divaseṣv evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasiṣṭhenaiṣa vāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā kadācid bhavān asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūraṃ gā āśramād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gacchatsu divaseṣv evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasiṣṭhena eṣa vāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā kadā-cid bhavān asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūraṃ gā- āśramād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nisargakarkaśatvāt tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣatrajātes tapovanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niryāya mṛgayām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samakrīḍata kānane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nisarga-karkaśatvāt tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣatra-jātes tapo-vanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niryāya mṛgayām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samakrīḍata kānane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā bhrājamāno 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyaiḥ srakcandanādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhivāditavān bhīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasiṣṭhaṃ darśitasmitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā bhrājamāno 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyaiḥ srak-candana-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhivāditavān bhīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasiṣṭhaṃ darśita-smitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vasiṣṭhaḥ pṛṣṭavān enam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>api dṛṣṭāḥ kumārakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nalinyāṃ prastutakrīḍā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatā bhoginām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vasiṣṭhaḥ pṛṣṭavān enam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>api dṛṣṭāḥ kumārakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nalinyāṃ prastuta-krīḍā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatā bhoginām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āma dṛṣṭā iti prokte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sutena mama nīcakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācakṣva vistareṇeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasiṣṭhas tam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āma dṛṣṭā- iti prokte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sutena mama nīcakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācakṣva vistareṇa iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasiṣṭhas tam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛṣṭenodayenoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aham ājñāpitas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na gantavyaṃ tvayā dūram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etasmād āśramād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛṣṭena udayena uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aham ājñāpitas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na gantavyaṃ tvayā dūram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etasmād āśramād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārabhya ca tataḥ kālāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ guruḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māṃ nivārayatīty āsam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ kautūhalākulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārabhya ca tataḥ kālāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ guruḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māṃ nivārayati ity āsam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ kautūhala-ākulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ doṣam asaṃcintya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurvājñābhaṅgasaṃbhavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūram adyāśramād asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchāmi diśam uttarām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ doṣam a-saṃcintya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurv-ājñā-bhaṅga-saṃbhavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūram adyā aśramād asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchāmi diśam uttarām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra paśyāmi nalinīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānāsarasijāṇḍajām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vanavāraṇasaṃkṣobha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃghaṭṭitanadāmbhasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra paśyāmi nalinīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānā-sarasi-ja-aṇḍa-jām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vana-vāraṇa-saṃkṣobha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃghaṭṭita-nada-ambhasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām amānuṣākārā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā dṛṣṭāḥ kumārakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>unmajjanto nimajjantas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarantaś cāruṇekṣaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām a-mānuṣa-ākārā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā dṛṣṭāḥ kumārakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>unmajjanto nimajjantas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarantaś ca aruṇa-īkṣaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te māṃ taṭastham ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puñjībhūya sasaṃbhramāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrghadīrghabhujākṣepair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agādhaṃ jalam āśritāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te māṃ taṭa-stham ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puñjī-bhūya sa-saṃbhramāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrgha-dīrgha-bhuja-ākṣepair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-gādhaṃ jalam āśritāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tān uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā palāyadhvam āsyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanv ahaṃ bhavato draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśramād ṛṣir āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tān uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā palāyadhvam āsyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanv ahaṃ bhavato draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśramād ṛṣir āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti madvacanaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>teṣām ekena bhāṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ te 'smābhir mahāsattva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣitair gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti mad-vacanaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>teṣām ekena bhāṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ te 'smābhir mahā-sattva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣitair gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satyasatyaṃ na yakṣo 'smi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na piśāco na rākṣasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena mā bhaiṣṭa ḍhaukadhvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti tān aham uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satya-satyaṃ na yakṣo 'smi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na piśāco na rākṣasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena mā bhaiṣṭa ḍhaukadhvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti tān aham uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tais tu saṃjātaviśrambhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃharan vā muhūrtakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgaccha prārthito mitra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhaṃ no gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tais tu saṃjāta-viśrambhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃharan vā muhūrtakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgaccha prārthito mitra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhaṃ no gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tadanurodhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchāmīti pratiśrute</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām ādāya nimagnās te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyaiva saraso 'mbhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tad-anurodhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchāmi iti pratiśrute</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām ādāya nimagnās te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya eva saraso 'mbhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.126'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānuditacandrārka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>grahanakṣatratārakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candrasūryamaṇidyota</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradhvastadhvāntasaṃcayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.126'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha an-udita-candra-arka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>graha-nakṣatra-tārakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candra-sūrya-maṇi-dyota</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradhvasta-dhvānta-saṃcayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.127'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthavirāturanirvṛtta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>virūpajanavarjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramyaharmyāvalīgarbha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jṛmbhitātodyanisvanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.127'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthavira-ātura-nirvṛtta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>virūpa-jana-varjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramya-harmya-āvalī-garbha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jṛmbhita-ātodya-nisvanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.128'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśeṣair viyutaṃ doṣair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśeṣaiḥ saṃyutaṃ guṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praveśito 'smi muditair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhiṣṭhānaṃ kumārakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.128'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-śeṣair viyutaṃ doṣair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-śeṣaiḥ saṃyutaṃ guṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praveśito 'smi muditair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhiṣṭhānaṃ kumārakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.129'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣām ekas tu mām āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhogināṃ bhoginām iyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>purī bhogavatī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasatiḥ kalpajīvinām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.129'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣām ekas tu mām āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhogināṃ bhoginām iyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>purī bhogavatī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasatiḥ kalpa-jīvinām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.130'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tanayaḥ kambalasyāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayam aśvatarasya tu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anye ca sūnavo 'nyeṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgasenābhṛtām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.130'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tanayaḥ kambalasya aham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayam aśvatarasya tu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anye ca sūnavo 'nyeṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāga-senā-bhṛtām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.131'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kambalaputreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītvāhaṃ svaṃ gṛhaṃ mahat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grāhitārghādisatkāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kārito veṣam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.131'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kambala-putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītva āhaṃ svaṃ gṛhaṃ mahat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grāhita-argha-ādi-sat-kāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kārito veṣam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.132'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itare netum aicchanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svagṛhān māṃ mayoditāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujānīta mām adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suhṛdo mā sma kupyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.132'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itare netum aicchanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-gṛhān māṃ maya ūditāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujānīta mām adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-hṛdo mā sma kupyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.133'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guruṇā pratiṣiddho 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etāṃ bhūmim upāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhītaś ca kupitāt tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmān nayata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.133'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guruṇā pratiṣiddho 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etāṃ bhūmim upāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhītaś ca kupitāt tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmān nayata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.134'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tu mām āhur uttiṣṭha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamyatāṃ svam idaṃ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punar āgacchatā kāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anutkaṇṭhabhujaṃgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.134'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tu mām āhur uttiṣṭha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamyatāṃ svam idaṃ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punar āgacchatā kāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>an-utkaṇṭha-bhujaṃ-gamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.135'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām eva ca ramyatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍāmaḥ saṃtataṃ vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdo 'pi yadīcchā syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchet tāṃ nalinīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.135'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām eva ca ramyatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍāmaḥ saṃtataṃ vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-hṛdo 'pi yadi icchā syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchet tāṃ nalinīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.136'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā mama tair vaktre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭāntenāvaguṇṭhite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttīrṇam aham ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi sarasas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.136'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā mama tair vaktre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭa-antena avaguṇṭhite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttīrṇam aham ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi sarasas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.137'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti bhogavatīṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'ham āyāmi saṃprati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mamāsminn aparādhe ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramāṇaṃ bhagavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.137'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti bhogavatīṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'ham āyāmi saṃprati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mama asminn aparādhe ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramāṇaṃ bhagavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.138'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vasiṣṭhas tam athāvocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upāyo 'yaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena nāgakumārās te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭigocaratāṃ gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.138'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vasiṣṭhas tam atha avocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upāyo 'yaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena nāga-kumārās te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭi-go-caratāṃ gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.139'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīm api taiḥ sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā bhogavatīṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāndharvaṃ hastividyā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śikṣitavyāḥ savistarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.139'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīm api taiḥ sa-ardhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā bhogavatīṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāndharvaṃ hasti-vidyā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śikṣitavyāḥ sa-vistarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.140'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi ca grāhayet kiṃcit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvāṃ nāgādhipatis tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sanāgamūrchanā grāhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇā ghoṣavatī tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.140'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi ca grāhayet kiṃcit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvāṃ nāga-adhi-patis tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-nāga-mūrchanā grāhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇā ghoṣavatī tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.141'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅkam āropitāyāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tantryo yasyām anāhatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhuraṃ nisvaneyus tāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyāṃ ghoṣavatīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.141'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅkam āropitāyāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tantryo yasyām an-āhatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhuraṃ nisvaneyus tāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyāṃ ghoṣavatīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.142'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guror udayanaḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāgalokaṃ gatas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gate bahutithe kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇāpāṇir upāgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.142'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guror udayanaḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāga-lokaṃ gatas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gate bahutithe kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇā-pāṇir upāgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.143'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtābhivādo guruṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṣvaktaś ca sāśruṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadviyogāgnitaptāṅgīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambām aṅgair aśītayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.143'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta-abhivādo guruṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṣvaktaś ca sa-aśruṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad-viyoga-agni-tapta-aṅgīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambām aṅgair aśītayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.144'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā tu sukhāsīno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasiṣṭhas tam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāta ghoṣavatīghoṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃgītaṃ śrāvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.144'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā tu sukha-āsīno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasiṣṭhas tam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāta ghoṣavatī-ghoṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃgītaṃ śrāvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.145'>
