<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tannideśāc ca patyau te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pragīte saha vīṇayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jagatpracalanācāryo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nabhasvān api nācalat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.145'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tan-nideśāc ca patyau te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pragīte saha vīṇayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jagat-pracalana-ācāryo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nabhasvān api na acalat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.146'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niśceṣṭam āśramaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūkakeśarivāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raktāṃ ghoṣavatīṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṣṇīm āsīt patis tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.146'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niś-ceṣṭam āśramaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūka-keśari-vāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raktāṃ ghoṣavatīṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṣṇīm āsīt patis tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.147'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś caiṣa vasiṣṭhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tvayāsmiṃs tapovane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vādanīyā punar vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>geyaṃ vā śanakair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.147'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś ca eṣa vasiṣṭhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tvaya āsmiṃs tapo-vane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vādanīyā punar vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>geyaṃ vā śanakair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.148'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anye 'pi dhvanayaḥ prāyaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>calayanti samāhitān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samādheḥ kiṃ punar yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sākṣiṇo 'pi vimohitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.148'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anye 'pi dhvanayaḥ prāyaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>calayanti samāhitān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samādheḥ kiṃ punar yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-akṣiṇo 'pi vimohitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.149'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād avītarāgāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samādhim avihiṃsatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūre tapovanād asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇeyaṃ vādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.149'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād a-vīta-rāgāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samādhim a-vihiṃsatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūre tapo-vanād asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇa īyaṃ vādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.150'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cārabhya divasād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udayācalacāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāgān udayano 'gṛhṇād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramyair ghoṣavatīrutaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.150'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cā arabhya divasād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udaya-ācala-cāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāgān udayano 'gṛhṇād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramyair ghoṣavatī-rutaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.151'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dāntavyālagajārūḍhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siṃhādivyālavellitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kvaṇadghoṣavatīpāṇir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āyāti sma tapovanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.151'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dānta-vyāla-gaja-ārūḍhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siṃha-ādi-vyāla-vellitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kvaṇad-ghoṣavatī-pāṇir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āyāti sma tapo-vanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.152'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ yāti kvacit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhagavān mām abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dārakas taruṇo jātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kauśāmbīṃ gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.152'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ yāti kvacit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhagavān mām abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dārakas taruṇo jātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kauśāmbīṃ gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.153'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu nirvacanayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathite 'smin manorathe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guruṇā tīrthasalilair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhiṣiktaḥ suto mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.153'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu nir-vacanayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathite 'smin mano-rathe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guruṇā tīrtha-salilair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhiṣiktaḥ suto mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.154'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac chiṣyās tu tadādiṣṭā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām ādāya saputrakām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāśena nayanti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇena nagarīm imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.154'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac chiṣyās tu tad-ādiṣṭā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām ādāya sa-putrakām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāśena nayanti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇena nagarīm imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.155'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāhaṃ nagarodyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramye tair avatāritā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muhūrtaṃ preritavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaganāgamanaśramam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.155'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ahaṃ nagara-udyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramye tair avatāritā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muhūrtaṃ preritavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gagana-āgamana-śramam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.156'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīrya tu te bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍāpuṣkariṇīṃ pituḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padmabhañjikayā krīḍan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭa udyānapālakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.156'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīrya tu te bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍā-puṣkariṇīṃ pituḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padma-bhañjikayā krīḍan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭa udyāna-pālakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.157'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair gatvā kathitaṃ rājñe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deva devakumārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunaivāgataḥ svargād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāhate nalinīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.157'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair gatvā kathitaṃ rājñe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deva deva-kumārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhuna aivā agataḥ svargād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāhate nalinīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.158'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā tu drutam āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā devasamaṃ sutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>deva evāyam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇāmaṃ kartum udyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.158'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā tu drutam āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā deva-samaṃ sutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>deva eva ayam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇāmaṃ kartum udyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.159'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tapasvibhiḥ khasthaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhrāntaiḥ sa nivāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājann udayanaputraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na namaskartum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.159'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tapasvibhiḥ kha-sthaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhrāntaiḥ sa nivāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājann udayana-putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na namas-kartum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.160'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃdehaś ced imāṃ pṛccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahiṣī mṛgayāvatīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>premasaṃbhramasaṃtrāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjābhiḥ kheditām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.160'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃdehaś ced imāṃ pṛccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahiṣī mṛgayāvatīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prema-saṃbhrama-saṃtrāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjābhiḥ kheditām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.161'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā tu tān atho dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām apaśyat sutaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muhūrtaṃ cintayitvā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vihasan prasthito gṛhān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.161'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā tu tān atho dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām apaśyat sutaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muhūrtaṃ cintayitvā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vihasan prasthito gṛhān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.162'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāyam ṛṣibhiḥ proktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puraḥsthitvā sasaṃbhramaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na gantavyaṃ na gantavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naiṣa svapno nivartyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.162'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ayam ṛṣibhiḥ proktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puraḥ-sthitvā sa-saṃbhramaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na gantavyaṃ na gantavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na eṣa svapno nivartyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.163'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā bhavatu svapnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapne 'pi na virudhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durlabhenāpi hi svapne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vallabhena samāgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.163'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā bhavatu svapnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapne 'pi na virudhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dur-labhena api hi svapne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vallabhena samāgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.164'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca brūmas tad ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetaḥkarṇasukhāvaham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato yasyāsi sāpatyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādāya dayitām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.164'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca brūmas tad ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetaḥ-karṇa-sukha-āvaham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato yasyāsi sa-apatyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādāya dayitām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.165'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nivṛttāya ca te tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāruṇḍaharaṇādikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācakṣate sma vṛttāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśramānayanād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.165'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nivṛttāya ca te tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāruṇḍa-haraṇa-ādikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācakṣate sma vṛtta-antam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ā āśrama-ānayanād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.166'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā tu putram āliṅgya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣamūrchāvicetanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nipatan dharaṇīpṛṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putreṇa lambhitaḥ kṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.166'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā tu putram āliṅgya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣa-mūrchā-vicetanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nipatan dharaṇī-pṛṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putreṇa lambhitaḥ kṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.167'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ ca dṛṣṭvā ciraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā devadṛṣṭiviceṣṭayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niśvāsair akṣipad dīrghair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>netrāmbukaṇikāgaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.167'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ ca dṛṣṭvā ciraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā deva-dṛṣṭi-viceṣṭayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niśvāsair akṣipad dīrghair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>netra-ambu-kaṇikā-gaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.168'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>baddhāñjalir narapatir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bravīti sma ca tān ṛṣīn</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avatāreṇa gurubhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.168'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>baddha-añjalir nara-patir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bravīti sma ca tān ṛṣīn</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avatāreṇa gurubhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.169'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair uktaṃ na samādiṣṭā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasiṣṭhena vayaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gacchāmo nāvatīryaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svasti tubhyaṃ bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.169'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair uktaṃ na samādiṣṭā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasiṣṭhena vayaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gacchāmo na avatīrya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sv-asti tubhyaṃ bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.170'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tān ayācata bhūpālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat kiṃcit svāṅgadhāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmatpāvanam ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.170'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tān ayācata bhū-pālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat kiṃcit sva-aṅga-dhāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmat-pāvanam ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā-iṣṭaṃ gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.171'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛgājināni te kṣiptvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taḍitkāntijaṭāguṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatraivāntardadhuś caṇḍa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>marudvyastā ivāmbudāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.171'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛga-ajināni te kṣiptvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taḍit-kānti-jaṭā-guṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra eva antardadhuś caṇḍa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>marud-vyastā- iva ambu-dāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.172'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛgājināni tu nṛpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daivatānīva bhaktimān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūjayitvā tad udyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>namnāvocan mṛgājinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.172'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛga-ajināni tu nṛpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daivatāni iva bhaktimān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūjayitvā tad udyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>namna āvocan mṛgājinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.173'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā mṛgājinayātreyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ prabhṛti vāsarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravartitā nṛpatinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasiddhim agamad bhuvi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.173'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā mṛga-ajina-yātra īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ prabhṛti vāsarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravartitā nṛ-patinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasiddhim agamad bhuvi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.174'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṛtvā sutaṃ rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvarājaṃ mṛgājine</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviṣṭo hṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prahṛṣṭāṃ nagarīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.174'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṛtvā sutaṃ rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuva-rājaṃ mṛgājine</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviṣṭo hṛṣṭa-hṛdayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prahṛṣṭāṃ nagarīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.175'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'yaṃ mayedṛśo labdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraḥ saṃpādya dohadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tavāpi dohado yaḥ sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putri saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.175'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'yaṃ mayā īdṛśo labdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraḥ saṃpādya dohadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava api dohado yaḥ sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putri saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.176'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā tu naivākathayal</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjayā nṛpatis tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māgadhīm uktavān pṛccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dohadaṃ bhaginīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.176'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā tu na eva akathayal</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjayā nṛ-patis tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māgadhīm uktavān pṛccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dohadaṃ bhaginīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.177'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padmāvatī tu tāṃ pṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadākhyātam avarṇayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥsaṃpādā kila śraddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mamety āha śanair iyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.177'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padmāvatī tu tāṃ pṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad-ākhyātam avarṇayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥ-saṃpādā kila śraddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama ity āha śanair iyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.178'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tām abravīd uccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hasitvā mṛgayāvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mugdhe kiṃ nāma duḥsādhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāyacaturair nṛbhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.178'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tām abravīd uccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hasitvā mṛgayāvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mugdhe kiṃ nāma duḥ-sādhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāya-caturair nṛbhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.179'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatāṃ vā purāvṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mathurāyām abhūn nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ugraseno mahāsenaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatrusenāmbudānilaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.179'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatāṃ vā pura-āvṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mathurāyām abhūn nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ugraseno mahāsenaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatru-sena-ambu-da-anilaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.180'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya strī guṇasaṃpannā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śucyācārakulodbhavā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīn manoramācārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā nāmnāpi manoramā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.180'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya strī guṇa-saṃpannā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śucy-ācāra-kula-udbhavā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīn mano-rama-ācārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā nāmna āpi manoramā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.181'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācid āgate kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samṛddhakuṭajārjune</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rasanmayūrasāraṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>meghamaṇḍūkamaṇḍale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.181'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācid āgate kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samṛddha-kuṭaja-arjune</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rasan-mayūra-sāraṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>megha-maṇḍūka-maṇḍale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.182'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manoramaṃ gṛhodyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviveśa manoramā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadambānilam āghrātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udbhūtaprathamārtavā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.182'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mano-ramaṃ gṛha-udyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviveśa manoramā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadamba-anilam āghrātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udbhūta-prathama-ārtavā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.183'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā ca drumilo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dānavo nabhasā vrajan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udyānaśobhayākṛṣṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭis tāṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.183'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā ca drumilo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dānavo nabhasā vrajan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udyāna-śobhayā ākṛṣṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭis tāṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.184'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtograsenarūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena sāpāyacetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samagacchata sadyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sasattvā samapadyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.184'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta-ugrasena-rūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena sa-apāya-cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samagacchata sadyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-sattvā samapadyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.185'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>strībhiś ca dohadaṃ pṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛcchrād uktavatī hriyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣṇoḥ śoṇitamāṃsāntrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayāmi tṛṣām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.185'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>strībhiś ca dohadaṃ pṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛcchrād uktavatī hriyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣṇoḥ śoṇita-māṃsa-antrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayāmi tṛṣām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.186'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutvedam ugrasenena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ saṃmantrya mantribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sṛṣṭaḥ piṣṭamayo viṣṇur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>meṣāmiṣabhṛtodaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.186'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutva īdam ugrasenena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ saṃmantrya mantribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sṛṣṭaḥ piṣṭa-mayo viṣṇur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>meṣāmiṣa-bhṛta-udaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.187'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mandapradīpakiraṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyā vasatimandire</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nyastaḥ piṣṭamayo viṣṇuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣapāyāṃ kṣapitas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.187'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manda-pradīpa-kiraṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyā- vasati-mandire</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nyastaḥ piṣṭa-mayo viṣṇuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣapāyāṃ kṣapitas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.188'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥsaṃpāde 'pi saṃpanne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dohade 'sminn upāyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadhyaṃ yādavasiṃhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṃsaṃ sutam asuta sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.188'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥ-saṃpāde 'pi saṃpanne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dohade 'sminn upāyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadhyaṃ yādava-siṃhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṃsaṃ sutam asuta sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.189'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena bravīmi nāsty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥsaṃpādā kriyā nṛbhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāt tavāpi yā śraddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāpi saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.189'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena bravīmi na asty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥ-saṃpādā kriyā nṛbhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāt tava api yā śraddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa āpi saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.190'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathitaṃ ca tataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padmāvatyeyam icchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambarasthavimānasthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtsnāṃ draṣṭuṃ mahīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.190'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathitaṃ ca tataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padmāvatya īyam icchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambara-stha-vimāna-sthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtsnāṃ draṣṭuṃ mahīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.191'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athovāca hasann uccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍāśīlo vasantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devasya dāsabhāryāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayam eva manorathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.191'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uvāca hasann uccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍā-śīlo vasantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devasya dāsa-bhāryāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayam eva mano-rathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.192'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu bhaṇitāḥ sarvā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīrghasthambhāvalambinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dolām āruhya nabhasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muhur āyāta yāta ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.192'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu bhaṇitāḥ sarvā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīrgha-sthambha-avalambinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dolām āruhya nabhasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muhur āyāta yāta ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.193'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upāyam anyaṃ patayo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavatīnāṃ na jānate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenākāśagatiśraddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā ca pūryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.193'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upāyam anyaṃ patayo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavatīnāṃ na jānate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenā akāśa-gati-śraddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā ca pūryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.194'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prahasitā sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rumaṇvān idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivartyatāṃ parīhāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prastutaṃ vartyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.194'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prahasitā- sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rumaṇvān idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivartyatāṃ parīhāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prastutaṃ vartyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.195'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaugandharāyaṇenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim atra paricintyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asādhāraṇa evāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣayaḥ śilpinām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.195'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaugandharāyaṇena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim atra paricintyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-sādhāraṇa eva ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣayaḥ śilpinām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.196'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rumaṇvatā tu takṣāṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃnipātya pracoditāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yantram ākāśasaṃcāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaritaiḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.196'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rumaṇvatā tu takṣāṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃnipātya pracoditāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yantram ākāśa-saṃcāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaritaiḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.197'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athotkramya ciraṃ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantrayitvā ca śilpinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rumaṇvantam abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtrāsapraskhaladgiraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.197'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha utkramya ciraṃ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantrayitvā ca śilpinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rumaṇvantam abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtrāsa-praskhalad-giraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.198'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caturvidhāni jānīmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vayaṃ yantrāṇi tad yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jalāśmapāṃśuyantrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāṇḍarāśikṛtāni ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.198'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>catur-vidhāni jānīmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vayaṃ yantrāṇi tad yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jala-aśma-pāṃśu-yantrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāṇḍa-rāśi-kṛtāni ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.199'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśayantrāṇi punar</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yavanāḥ kila jānate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmākaṃ tu na yātāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gocaraṃ cakṣuṣām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.199'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśa-yantrāṇi punar</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yavanāḥ kila jānate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmākaṃ tu na yātāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>go-caraṃ cakṣuṣām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.200'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ca brāhmaṇaḥ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abravīd āgrahārikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhoḥ sabhe śrūyatāṃ tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yan mayākhyānakaṃ śrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.200'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ca brāhmaṇaḥ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abravīd āgrahārikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhoḥ sabhe śrūyatāṃ tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yan mayā ākhyānakaṃ śrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.201'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti pukvasako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāsenasya vardhakī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>skandhāvāreṇa sārdhaṃ sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>surāṣṭraviṣayaṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.201'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti pukvasako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāsenasya vardhakī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>skandha-āvāreṇa sa-ardhaṃ sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>surāṣṭra-viṣayaṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.202'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tatrāparo dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>surūpaḥ śilpidārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśvilo nāma yaḥ śilpī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadṛśo viśvakarmaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.202'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tatra aparo dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-rūpaḥ śilpi-dārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśvilo nāma yaḥ śilpī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-dṛśo viśvakarmaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.203'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pukvasakas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitaraṃ mayam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava putrāya duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattā ratnāvalī mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.203'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pukvasakas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitaraṃ mayam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava putrāya duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattā ratnāvalī mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.204'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praṣṭavyaś ca tvayā nāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kīdṛśī sā guṇair iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kularūpābhijātyādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇaratnāvalī hi sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.204'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praṣṭavyaś ca tvayā na ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kī-dṛśī sā guṇair iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kula-rūpa-abhijāty-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇa-ratna-avalī hi sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.205'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃpadyate ca naḥ kiṃcin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāsenaparigrahāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāt saṃvardhasiddhyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putraṃ prasthāpayer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.205'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃpadyate ca naḥ kiṃcin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāsena-parigrahāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāt saṃvardha-siddhy-arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putraṃ prasthāpayer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.206'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayena ca pratijñāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā pukvasako gṛhān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāmātrāgamanākāṅkṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāntaṃ kālam akṣipat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.206'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayena ca pratijñāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā pukvasako gṛhān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāmātr-āgamana-ākāṅkṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāntaṃ kālam akṣipat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.207'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtvā rājakule karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadācid gṛham āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaṇati sma na taṃ kaścit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snāhi bhuṅkṣveti cākulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.207'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtvā rāja-kule karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadācid gṛham āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaṇati sma na taṃ kaścit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snāhi bhuṅkṣva iti cā akulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.208'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryayā kathitaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgantukena kenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvam ākulitaṃ gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.208'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryayā kathitaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgantukena kena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvam ākulitaṃ gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.209'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmīyās taṇḍulās tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>randhanāya samarpitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandako 'ham amībhir me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇḍaḥ saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.209'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmīyās taṇḍulās tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>randhanāya samarpitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandako 'ham amībhir me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇḍaḥ saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.210'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāṣṭhabhāraśataṃ dagdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ca svidyanti taṇḍulāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāyam ākulo lokas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat kim etad bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.210'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāṣṭha-bhāra-śataṃ dagdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ca svidyanti taṇḍulāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena ayam ākulo lokas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat kim etad bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.211'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pukvasakenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṣvajya kuṭumbinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhasthe vardhase diṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptas te duhitur varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.211'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pukvasakena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṣvajya kuṭumbinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛha-sthe vardhase diṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptas te duhitur varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.212'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvāsau kvāsau viśvabhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti pṛcchati bhartari</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiraḥ prāvṛtya bhāryāsmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmaśālām adarśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.212'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva asau kva asau viśvabhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti pṛcchati bhartari</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiraḥ prāvṛtya bhārya āsmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karma-śālām adarśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.213'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niṣkramya karmaśālātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satvaraṃ viśvilas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhivāditavān prahvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasāritabhujaṃ gurum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.213'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niṣkramya karma-śālātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-tvaraṃ viśvilas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhivāditavān prahvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasārita-bhujaṃ gurum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.214'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utkṣipya śvaśureṇāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣanetrāmbuvarṣiṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirantaraṃ pariṣvaktaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirādṛṣṭaḥ suhṛd yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.214'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utkṣipya śvaśureṇa api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣa-netra-ambu-varṣiṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-antaraṃ pariṣvaktaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cira-a-dṛṣṭaḥ su-hṛd yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.215'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtārghādisaparyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭaḥ pukvasakena saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃmayās taṇḍulās tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathyatām iti so 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.215'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta-argha-ādi-saparyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭaḥ pukvasakena saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ-mayās taṇḍulās tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathyatām iti so 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.216'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ete pāṇḍarakāṣṭhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāṣṭhena taṇḍulā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghaṭitā ghaṭikāmātrāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karaghāṭataror iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.216'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ete pāṇḍara-kāṣṭhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāṣṭhena taṇḍulā- mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghaṭitā- ghaṭikā-mātrāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karaghāṭa-taror iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.217'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pukvasakenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karmedaṃ viśvakarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tavāpi śilpisiṃhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛtīyasya na vidyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.217'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pukvasakena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karma idaṃ viśvakarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava api śilpi-siṃhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛtīyasya na vidyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.218'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adyaiva ca dinaṃ bhadram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ato ratnāvlaīkaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhyatām iti tenokte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśvilenoktam om iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.218'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adya eva ca dinaṃ bhadram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ato ratnāvlaī-karaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhyatām iti tena ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśvilena uktam om iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.219'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ratnāvalyā sa saṃgamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuradujjvalaśobhayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃmīyate sma nāṅgeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daridra iva kāmukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.219'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ratna-avalyā sa saṃgamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphurad-ujjvala-śobhayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃmīyate sma na aṅgeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daridra iva kāmukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.220'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ālekhyavidyādharayor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā saṃmukhayos tayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahān kālo 'tiyāti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nimeṣojjhitacakṣuṣoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.220'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ālekhya-vidyā-dharayor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā saṃ-mukhayos tayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahān kālo 'tiyāti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nimeṣa-ujjhita-cakṣuṣoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.221'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ratnāvalīṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicintām iva viśvilaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti saṃdihya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.221'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ratnāvalīṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicintām iva viśvilaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti saṃdihya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.222'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām abhāṣamāṇāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekābhāṣata dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartṛdāraka yady asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrotum icchā tataḥ śṛṇu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.222'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām a-bhāṣamāṇāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eka ābhāṣata dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartṛ-dāraka yady asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrotum icchā tataḥ śṛṇu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.223'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>syālakās tava jalpanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvam ekākinīṃ vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā saha jāmātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṣṇīmo bhaginīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.223'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>syālakās tava jalpanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvam ekākinīṃ vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā saha jāmātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṣṇīmo bhaginīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.224'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā vanaṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cittvā dārūṇi kāny api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yantrāṇi ghaṭayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvanāny atha viśvilaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.224'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā vanaṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cittvā dārūṇi kāny api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yantrāṇi ghaṭayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvanāny atha viśvilaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.225'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vṛkṣāyurvedanirdiṣṭaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādapāṅgaiś cakāra saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyurārogyakārīṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pākopakaraṇāni ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.225'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vṛkṣa-āyur-veda-nirdiṣṭaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāda-pa-aṅgaiś cakāra saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyur-ārogya-kārīṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāka-upakaraṇāni ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.226'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahasraguṇamūlyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāni vikrīya tad dhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśurāya dadāti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa ca prītas tad ādade ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.226'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahasra-guṇa-mūlyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāni vikrīya tad dhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśurāya dadāti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa ca prītas tad ādade ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.227'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ dineṣu gacchatsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidrāṇa iva pukvasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśvilādīn samāhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saviṣādam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.227'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ dineṣu gacchatsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidrāṇa iva pukvasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśvila-ādīn samāhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-viṣādam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.228'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham ājñāpito rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmadattaḥ suhṛd mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāśideśapatis tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇayād aham arthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.228'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham ājñāpito rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmadattaḥ suhṛd mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāśi-deśa-patis tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇayād aham arthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.229'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tava pukvasako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>takṣāsti kuśalaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmādhikārakārāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa me prasthāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.229'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tava pukvasako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>takṣa āsti kuśalaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharma-adhikāra-kārāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa me prasthāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.230'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca devakulaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svabuddhisamakarmakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vārāṇasyām avighnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān āvartatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.230'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca deva-kulaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-buddhi-sama-karmakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vārāṇasyām a-vighnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān āvartatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.231'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avaśyaṃ ca mayā tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gantavyam anujīvinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>martavyaṃ cāsya caṇḍasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājño vākyam akurvatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.231'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-vaśyaṃ ca mayā tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gantavyam anujīvinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>martavyaṃ ca asya caṇḍasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājño vākyam a-kurvatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.232'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrghakālaṃ ca tat karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśā ceyam anuttarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāt pukvasakaḥ sarvaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sudṛṣṭaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.232'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrgha-kālaṃ ca tat karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśā ca iyam an-uttarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāt pukvasakaḥ sarvaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-dṛṣṭaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.233'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśvilena tataḥ proktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ trāsam upāsya vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛtyaṃ vārāṇasīṃ yāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anujānīta mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.233'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśvilena tataḥ proktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ trāsam upāsya vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛtyaṃ vārāṇasīṃ yāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anujānīta mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.234'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaśureṇābhyanujñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītena ca mahībhujā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūtaiḥ sa pratidūtaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha vārāṇasīṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.234'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaśureṇa abhyanujñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītena ca mahī-bhujā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūtaiḥ sa prati-dūtaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha vārāṇasīṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.235'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahukālaprayāte 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patyau ratnāvalī mukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtatāśrujalāsāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhautaṃ mlānakapolakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.235'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahu-kāla-prayāte 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patyau ratnāvalī mukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtata-aśru-jala-āsāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhautaṃ mlāna-kapolakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.236'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyatāśītaniśvāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāsāgrāhitalocanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dantāvaraṇasaṃskāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūnyam agalitālakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.236'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyata-a-śīta-niśvāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāsa-agra-āhita-locanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>danta-āvaraṇa-saṃskāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūnyam a-galita-alakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.237'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>visraṃsamānaraśanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jaghanaṃ malināṃśukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na dadhāti sma śokāndhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāhū ca skhaladaṅgadau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.237'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>visraṃsamāna-raśanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jaghanaṃ malina-aṃśukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na dadhāti sma śoka-andhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāhū ca skhalad-aṅga-dau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.238'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām ittham avasthāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amantrayata pukvasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhiṇīṃ cakitaḥ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niścintāṃ tanayām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.238'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām ittham avasthāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amantrayata pukvasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhiṇīṃ cakitaḥ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niś-cintāṃ tanayām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.239'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravit suṣṭhu paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjamānā ca te mukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na darśayāmi nanv evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>straiṇaṃ kim api cāpalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.239'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravit suṣṭhu paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjamānā ca te mukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na darśayāmi nanv evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>straiṇaṃ kim api cāpalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.240'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasyāsamena rūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇaiś cāgaṇitaiḥ purī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛtā na labhate śāntim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyantī tam utsukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.240'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya a-samena rūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇaiś ca a-gaṇitaiḥ purī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛtā na labhate śāntim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-paśyantī tam utsukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.241'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśanasparśanālāpaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ yā tena lālitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>seyam evam aśoketi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandabhāgyā bhaṇāmi kim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.241'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśana-sparśana-ālāpaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ yā tena lālitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa īyam evam a-śoka īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manda-bhāgyā bhaṇāmi kim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.242'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jāyāpatyos tayor itthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mitho mantrayamāṇayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dinastokeṣu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garbhaṃ ratnāvalī dadhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.242'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jāyā-patyos tayor itthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mitho mantrayamāṇayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dina-stokeṣu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garbhaṃ ratnāvalī dadhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.243'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtakrodhasmito bhāryām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atha pukvasako 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bho paśya dayitāpatye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duhituḥ prakriyām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.243'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta-krodha-smito bhāryām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atha pukvasako 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bho paśya dayita-apatye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duhituḥ prakriyām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.244'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartṛkopanimittena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayādoṣajanmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātena ca nṛpāc caṇḍāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prākampata bhayena sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.244'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartṛ-kopa-nimittena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayā-doṣa-janmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātena ca nṛpāc caṇḍāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prākampata bhayena sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.245'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd ayaṃ ca vṛttānto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājñāhṛtaś ca pukvasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sutādoṣavipākaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyan rājakulaṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.245'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd ayaṃ ca vṛtta-anto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājñā āhṛtaś ca pukvasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sutā-doṣa-vipākaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyan rāja-kulaṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.246'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa vihasya nṛpeṇokto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā bhaiṣir duhitus tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāmātraivāhito garbhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tac cedam avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.246'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa vihasya nṛpeṇa ukto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā bhaiṣir duhitus tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāmātra aivā ahito garbhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tac ca idam avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.247'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye mayā preṣitā dūtā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmātrā bhavataḥ saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivṛttamatrais tair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahyam āveditaṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.247'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye mayā preṣitā- dūtā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmātrā bhavataḥ saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivṛtta-matrais tair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahyam āveditaṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.248'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārabhya prathamād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayāṇād eṣa viśvilaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yantrakukkuṭam āsthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradeśe kvāpi yātavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.248'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārabhya prathamād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayāṇād eṣa viśvilaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yantra-kukkuṭam āsthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradeśe kva api yātavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.249'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rātrau ca yāmaśeṣāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāvṛtyāgatya mastakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avijñātaḥ kilāsmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyaśeta svasaṃstare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.249'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rātrau ca yāma-śeṣāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāvṛtyā agatya mastakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-vijñātaḥ kila asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyaśeta sva-saṃstare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.250'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācit pratibuddheṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūteṣu sa parāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pādeṣu patitas teṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayācata viṣaṇṇakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.250'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cit pratibuddheṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūteṣu sa parāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pādeṣu patitas teṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayācata viṣaṇṇakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.251'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nedaṃ kasyacid ākhyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śilpikasyetarasya vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāśayantravijñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>survijñānam ayāvanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.251'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na idaṃ kasya-cid ākhyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śilpikasya itarasya vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāśa-yantra-vijñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sur-vijñānam a-yāvanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.252'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khaṭvāghaṭanavijñānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ivedaṃ pracurībhavet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokena paribhūyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇarāgā hi mānuṣāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.252'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khaṭvā-ghaṭana-vijñānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iva idaṃ pracurī-bhavet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokena paribhūyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇa-rāgā- hi mānuṣāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.253'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nindite vandanīye 'sminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āstāṃ tāvac ca pātakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭa eva mahān doṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīvanasyāpahāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.253'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nindite vandanīye 'sminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āstāṃ tāvac ca pātakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭa eva mahān doṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīvanasya apahāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.254'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ hi bhāryayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uṣitvā rajanīṃ divā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kurvan narapater ājñāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>neṣyāmi divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.254'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ hi bhāryayā sa-ardham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uṣitvā rajanīṃ divā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kurvan nara-pater ājñāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>neṣyāmi divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.255'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca devakulaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghaṭitaṃ kila tādṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭum icchā samutpannā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena duścakṣuṣām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.255'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca deva-kulaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghaṭitaṃ kila tā-dṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭum icchā samutpannā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena duś-cakṣuṣām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.256'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmadattena dattaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhanarāśim anuttamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na gṛhṇāti sma vakti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gurur me labhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.256'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmadattena dattaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhana-rāśim an-uttamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na gṛhṇāti sma vakti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gurur me labhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.257'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam uktvā mahāseno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahatā dhanarāśinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvasvaharaṇāt trastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>toṣayām āsa pukvasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.257'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam uktvā mahāseno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahatā dhana-rāśinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-sva-haraṇāt trastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>toṣayām āsa pukvasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.258'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśvilo 'pi muhūrtena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vārāṇasyāḥ parāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāśayantram āsthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviṣṭaś ca gṛhān niśi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.258'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśvilo 'pi muhūrtena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vārāṇasyāḥ parāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāśa-yantram āsthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviṣṭaś ca gṛhān niśi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.259'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atīte māsamātre ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśvilaṃ pukvaso 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adya mām āha nṛpatiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanair utsārya sasmitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.259'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atīte māsa-mātre ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśvilaṃ pukvaso 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adya mām āha nṛ-patiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanair utsārya sa-smitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.260'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśayantravijñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmātre kathitaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yan mahyam api tat sarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthine kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.260'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśa-yantra-vijñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmātre kathitaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yan mahyam api tat sarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthine kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.261'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu kathitaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tasmai kathitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai tu kathitaṃ prītaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śilpibhir yāvanair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.261'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu kathitaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tasmai kathitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai tu kathitaṃ prītaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śilpibhir yāvanair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.262'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājñā tu kupitenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nedaṃ lokavaco mṛṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilpinaḥ saha śāṭhyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāyanta iti ghuṣyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.262'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājñā tu kupitena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na idaṃ loka-vaco mṛṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilpinaḥ saha śāṭhyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāyanta iti ghuṣyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.263'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam idaṃ śāṭhyam ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mannideśaṃ samācara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyathā jīvaloko 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sudṛṣṭaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.263'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam idaṃ śāṭhyam ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>man-nideśaṃ samācara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyathā jīva-loko 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-dṛṣṭaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.264'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad rakṣatā mama prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saputrān anujīvinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājñe tad yantravijñānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthine kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.264'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad rakṣatā mama prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-putrān anu-jīvinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājñe tad yantra-vijñānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthine kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.265'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśvilas tu pratijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvaśurāya tathāstv iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rātrau ratnāvalīṃ suptāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratibodhyedam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.265'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśvilas tu pratijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvaśurāya tatha āstv iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rātrau ratnāvalīṃ suptāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratibodhya idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.266'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āmantraye 'haṃ bhavatīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchāmi svagṛhān prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyais tava pitrāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmāt sthānād vivāsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.266'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āmantraye 'haṃ bhavatīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchāmi sva-gṛhān prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyais tava pitra āham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmāt sthānād vivāsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.267'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśayantravijñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāptuṃ mattaḥ sa vāñchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pracchādyaṃ ca tad asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidhānaṃ kṛpaṇair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.267'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśa-yantra-vijñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāptuṃ mattaḥ sa vāñchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pracchādyaṃ ca tad asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidhānaṃ kṛpaṇair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.268'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad āstāṃ tāvad ātmā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tava vā dayitaḥ pitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñānasyāsya rakṣāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyajeyaṃ bhavatīṃ api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.268'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad āstāṃ tāvad ātmā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tava vā dayitaḥ pitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñānasya asya rakṣāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyajeyaṃ bhavatīṃ api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.269'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti ratnāvalī śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartāram idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ cāhaṃ durbhagā yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaktāṃ tyajasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.269'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti ratnāvalī śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartāram idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ ca ahaṃ dur-bhagā yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaktāṃ tyajasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.270'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yānaṃ kukkuṭasaṃsthānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsthāya saha bhāryayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rātrāv ākāśam utpatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svasthānaṃ viśvilo yayau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.270'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yānaṃ kukkuṭa-saṃsthānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsthāya saha bhāryayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rātrāv ākāśam utpatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-sthānaṃ viśvilo yayau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.271'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te caivam aurasān bandhūñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chilpaguptyai tyajanti ye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te śilpaṃ darśayantīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasyeyam asatī matiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.271'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te ca evam aurasān bandhūñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chilpa-guptyai tyajanti ye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te śilpaṃ darśayanti iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasya iyam a-satī matiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.272'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād amī śaṭhā baddhāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīḍyantāṃ tāḍanādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asādhyāḥ sāmadānābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīcā hi vadhasādhanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.272'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād amī śaṭhā- baddhāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīḍyantāṃ tāḍana-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-sādhyāḥ sāma-dānābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīcā hi vadha-sādhanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.273'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti senāpatiḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvān saṃyamya śilpinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atāḍayad avocac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yantram āyojyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.273'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti senā-patiḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvān saṃyamya śilpinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atāḍayad avocac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yantram āyojyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.274'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn eva vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaścid āgantuko 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ karomi vo yantraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma tāḍyanta śilpinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.274'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn eva vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaś-cid āgantuko 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ karomi vo yantraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma tāḍyanta śilpinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.275'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yantropakaraṇaṃ cedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idānīṃ dīyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tac ca saṃpāditaṃ sarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>acireṇa rumaṇvatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.275'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yantra-upakaraṇaṃ ca idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idānīṃ dīyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tac ca saṃpāditaṃ sarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-cireṇa rumaṇvatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.276'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu cānyatamaḥ śilpī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam āgantum abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārohakaparīmāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>senānīr anuyujyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.276'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu ca anyatamaḥ śilpī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam āgantum abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārohaka-parīmāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>senā-nīr anuyujyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.277'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ajñātavāhyasaṃkhyābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahavaḥ śilpino nṛpaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipannayantraiḥ śrūyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mathitāḥ kupitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.277'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-jñāta-vāhya-saṃkhyābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahavaḥ śilpino nṛ-paiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipanna-yantraiḥ śrūyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mathitāḥ kupitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.278'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tenoktaṃ manye te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varākā grāmyaśilpikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ vā vacobhir bahubhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇam āsthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.278'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tena uktaṃ manye te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varākā- grāmya-śilpikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ vā vacobhir bahubhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇam āsthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.279'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā garuḍākāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>acireṇa cakāra saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimānam ambaropetaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandārakusumārcitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.279'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā garuḍa-ākāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-cireṇa cakāra saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimānam ambara-upetaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandāra-kusuma-arcitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.280'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cābhāṣata rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājan rājajanārdanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākramya garuḍaṃ krāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krāntapūrvāṃ mahīm imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.280'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca abhāṣata rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājan rāja-janārdanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākramya garuḍaṃ krāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krānta-pūrvāṃ mahīm imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.281'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha rājāvadad devīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devi kiṃ sthīyate 'dhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimānam idam āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.281'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha rāja āvadad devīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devi kiṃ sthīyate 'dhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimānam idam āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatha īṣṭaṃ gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.282'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avocat sā ca rājānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aryaputra tvayā vinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nodyānam api gacchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuto 'nālambanāṃ divam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.282'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avocat sā ca rājānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arya-putra tvayā vinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na udyānam api gacchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuto 'n-ālambanāṃ divam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.283'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ devī bravītīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājñokte śilpinoditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu voḍhum idaṃ śaktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakalāṃ nagarīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.283'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ devī bravīti iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājña ūkte śilpina ūditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu voḍhum idaṃ śaktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-kalāṃ nagarīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.284'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāntaḥpuraparīvāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadārasacivas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sapauraśreṇivargaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yānam adhyāsta bhūpatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.284'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-antaḥ-pura-parīvāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-dāra-sacivas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-paura-śreṇi-vargaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yānam adhyāsta bhū-patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.285'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ketupatākādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>chāyāvicchuritāmbarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṇyam ākāśam āviśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāk prācīm agamad diśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.285'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ketu-patāka-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>chāyā-vicchurita-ambarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṇyam ākāśam āviśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāk prācīm agamad diśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.286'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dadarśa darśakas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānaṃ yān nagaropari</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devo vidyādharo vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhoḥ ko 'yam iti cābravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.286'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dadarśa darśakas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānaṃ yān nagara-upari</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devo vidyā-dharo va āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhoḥ ko 'yam iti ca abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.287'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padmāvatīdvitīyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa ca rājñābhivāditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñātaś ca saṃyāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛpaḥ pavanavartmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.287'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padmāvatī-dvitīyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa ca rājña ābhivāditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñātaś ca saṃyāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛ-paḥ pavana-vartmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.288'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti pradakṣiṇīkṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa bhuvaṃ sāgarāmbarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avantinagarīṃ prāyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛttodakadānakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.288'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti pradakṣiṇī-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa bhuvaṃ sāgara-ambarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avanti-nagarīṃ prāyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛtta-udaka-dānakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.289'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātrānubhavanotkaṇṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jñātvā śilpī mahīpatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stambhayām āsa tad yantram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>athātuṣyan narādhipaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.289'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātrā-anubhavana-utkaṇṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jñātvā śilpī mahī-patim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stambhayām āsa tad yantram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha atuṣyan nara-adhipaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.290'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradyotasya tad ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratnapradyotapiñjaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti saṃdeha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dolādolam abhūn manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.290'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradyotasya tad ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratna-pradyota-piñjaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti saṃdeha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dolā-dolam abhūn manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.291'>
