<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāṃś ced ayam utpāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīyam ataḥ katham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iṣṭasaṃprāptilambhaś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsmābhiḥ śrutam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.291'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāṃś ced ayam utpāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīyam ataḥ katham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iṣṭa-saṃprāpti-lambhaś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na asmābhiḥ śrutam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.292'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃdihanmānasasyeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradyotasya puraḥ śaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pātayām āsa vatseśaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanakair lekhitākṣaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.292'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃdihan-mānasasya iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradyotasya puraḥ śaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pātayām āsa vatsa-īśaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanakair lekhita-akṣaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.293'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāsenas tam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citram etad avācayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājann udayanaś cauraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadāras tvāṃ namasyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.293'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāsenas tam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citram etad avācayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājann udayanaś cauraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-dāras tvāṃ namasyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.294'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā mahāseno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmātaram abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caurāya dattam abhayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād avataratv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.294'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvā mahāseno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmātaram abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caurāya dattam a-bhayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād avataratv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.295'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ālokyāvantikauśāmbyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vimānodakadānake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭavyeṣu tanūbhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udbhūteṣu kutūhalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.295'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ālokya avanti-kauśāmbyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vimāna-udaka-dānake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭavyeṣu tanū-bhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udbhūteṣu kutūhalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.296'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāṃcid velām upāsyaivam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āmantrya śvaśurau tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokālokitayānaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kauśāmbyām avarūḍhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.296'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāṃ-cid velām upāsya evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āmantrya śvaśurau tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>loka-ālokita-yānaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kauśāmbyām avarūḍhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.297'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūjitāmaraviprāgni</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurupaurānujīvinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājñāpitaṃ nṛpatinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śilpī saṃmānyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.297'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūjita-a-mara-vipra-agni</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>guru-paura-anujīvinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājñāpitaṃ nṛpatinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śilpī saṃmānyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.298'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athābhibhūya prabhayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suprabhām aciraprabhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭhantīm ambare 'paśyad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devatām avanīśvaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.298'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha abhibhūya prabhayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-prabhām a-cira-prabhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭhantīm ambare 'paśyad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devatām avani-īśvaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.299'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś citrīyamāṇaṃ sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam abhāṣata pārthivam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūjitaiva tvayā yat tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūjyaṃ pūjitavaty aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.299'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś citrīyamāṇaṃ sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam abhāṣata pārthivam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūjita aiva tvayā yat tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūjyaṃ pūjitavaty- aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.300'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijñāpyaṃ śrūyatāṃ cedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asty ahaṃ guhyakāṅganā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guhyakādhipater āptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhadreti paricārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.300'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijñāpyaṃ śrūyatāṃ ca idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asty ahaṃ guhyaka-aṅganā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guhyaka-adhipater āptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhadra īti paricārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.301'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācin nabhasā yāntī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satī dṛṣṭavatī saraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kandarāyāṃ nagendrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahendrasya nabhaḥprabham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.301'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cin nabhasā yāntī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satī dṛṣṭavatī saraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kandarāyāṃ naga-indrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahendrasya nabhaḥ-prabham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.302'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra saṃkrīḍamānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kareṇukaradhāritaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vījyamānaṃ sarasijaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntārakariyūthapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.302'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra saṃkrīḍamānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kareṇu-kara-dhāritaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vījyamānaṃ sarasi-jaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntāra-kari-yūtha-pam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.303'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama taṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karāmṛṣṭavaśāmukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kartāro hastiśikṣāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satyam āhur idaṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.303'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama taṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kara-āmṛṣṭa-vaśā-mukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kartāro hasti-śikṣāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satyam āhur idaṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.304'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devadānavagandharva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>piśacoragarākṣasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyāḥ sujātā diṅnāgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nānāsattvās tato gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.304'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deva-dānava-gandharva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>piśaca-ura-ga-rākṣasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyāḥ su-jātā- diṅ-nāgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nānā-sattvās tato gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.305'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sapadi nirmāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hastinīrūpam ātmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madāmodavibhinnāmbhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad evāvataraṃ saraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.305'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sapadi nirmāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hastinī-rūpam ātmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mada-āmoda-vibhinna-ambhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad eva avataraṃ saraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.306'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāmarṣakariṇīyūtha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṭākṣekṣitarūpayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prītena yūthapatinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciram ākrīḍitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.306'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-āmarṣa-kariṇī-yūtha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṭa-akṣa-īkṣita-rūpayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prītena yūtha-patinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciram ākrīḍitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.307'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athendukiraṇākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiraṇe 'ruṇasārathau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa gajaḥ kṣālitakaṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṭakaṃ prāviśad gireḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.307'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha indu-kiraṇa-ākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiraṇe 'ruṇa-sārathau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa gajaḥ kṣālita-kaṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṭakaṃ prāviśad gireḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.308'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu vyasanasevā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>phalam utprekṣya dāruṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyaḥ kṛtanijākārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājarājasabhām agām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.308'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu vyasana-sevā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>phalam utprekṣya dāruṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyaḥ kṛta-nija-ākārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāja-rāja-sabhām agām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.309'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhanadasyorum ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya yūthapateḥ karam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smarantī tāḍayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāmareṇa dhanādhipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.309'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhana-dasya urum ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya yūtha-pateḥ karam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smarantī tāḍayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāmareṇa dhana-adhipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.310'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kaṭākṣeṇa māṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodhavisphuritādharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trāsotkampitadikcakraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtavāñ chāpabhājanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.310'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kaṭa-akṣeṇa māṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodha-visphurita-adharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trāsa-utkampita-dik-cakraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtavāñ chāpa-bhājanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.311'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhyāyantyā hastinaṃ yasmāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāmareṇāham āhataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvam avantipates tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhavye hastinī bhava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.311'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhyāyantyā hastinaṃ yasmāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāmareṇa aham āhataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvam avanti-pates tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-bhavye hastinī bhava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.312'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatroktaṃ pūrṇabhadreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yakṣeṇāgasi tucchake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhunā devadevena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktaḥ śāpo mahān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.312'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra-uktaṃ pūrṇabhadreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yakṣeṇā agasi tucchake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhunā deva-devena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktaḥ śāpo mahān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.313'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutvedaṃ pūrṇabhadro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śapto yasmāt tvam etayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaptayā pīḍitas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhava hastī mahān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.313'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutva īdaṃ pūrṇabhadro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śapto yasmāt tvam etayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaptayā pīḍitas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhava hastī mahān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.314'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śokadīnamukhāv āvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā vittapater abhūt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karaṇotkhātakopasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>navanītanibhaṃ manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.314'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śoka-dīna-mukhāv āvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā vitta-pater abhūt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karaṇa-utkhāta-kopasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nava-nīta-nibhaṃ manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.315'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca yadāhaṃ vāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>smariṣyāmi kvacit tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāpād asmād vimokṣyethe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vibhītaṃ mā sma putrakau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.315'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca yada āhaṃ vāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>smariṣyāmi kva-cit tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāpād asmād vimokṣyethe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vibhītaṃ mā sma putrakau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.316'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāhaṃ bhadravatī jātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāsenasya hastinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrṇabhadro 'pi tasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgo vyālo nalāgiriḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.316'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa āhaṃ bhadravatī jātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāsenasya hastinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrṇabhadro 'pi tasya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgo vyālo nalāgiriḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.317'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāsenasya bhavane</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paratantrasya tiṣṭhataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvayoś caritaṃ yat tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvaṃ pratyakṣam eva te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.317'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāsenasya bhavane</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>para-tantrasya tiṣṭhataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvayoś caritaṃ yat tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvaṃ praty-akṣam eva te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.318'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā cāpaharantī tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhanādhipatinā smṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham aprapya kauśāmbīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipannā gahane vane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.318'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā ca apaharantī tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhana-adhipatinā smṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham a-prapya kauśāmbīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipannā gahane vane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.319'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tathā vyasanenāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīḍitas tena tādṛśā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā mayi vipannāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyadāraḥ striyām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.319'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tathā vyasanena asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīḍitas tena tā-dṛśā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā mayi vipannāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priya-dāraḥ striyām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.320'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣayonim avāpyāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tiryagyonim ivāpsarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvām eva śocitavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>seva śaptaṃ śatakratum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.320'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣa-yonim avāpya ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tiryag-yonim ivā apsarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvām eva śocitavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa īva śaptaṃ śata-kratum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.321'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca me kadā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ nāma ca bhūpateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṃ nāma ca kariṣye 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upakāraṃ manāg iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.321'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca me kadā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ nāma ca bhū-pateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṃ nāma ca kariṣye 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upakāraṃ manāg iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.322'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nītaś cāsi mayā svapne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadā dhanapateḥ sabhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrāmitaś ca vimānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sugarbhasthasuto mahīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.322'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nītaś ca asi mayā svapne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadā dhana-pateḥ sabhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrāmitaś ca vimānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-garbha-stha-suto mahīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.323'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhaviṣyantaṃ ca te putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>magnaṃ kasyāṃcid āpadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharendram uddhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukham āstāṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.323'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhaviṣyantaṃ ca te putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>magnaṃ kasyāṃ-cid āpadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dhara-indram uddhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukham āstāṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.324'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prākārasya tataḥ khaṇḍam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apanīya jagāma sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat tad bhadravatīdvāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kauśāmbyāṃ prathitaṃ bhuvi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.324'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prākārasya tataḥ khaṇḍam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apanīya jagāma sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat tad bhadravatī-dvāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kauśāmbyāṃ prathitaṃ bhuvi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.325'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāśrūyanta paurāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalpitāni gṛhe gṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddhādeśavacaḥ satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtaṃ vyomacarair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.325'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aśrūyanta paurāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalpitāni gṛhe gṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddha-ādeśa-vacaḥ satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtaṃ vyoma-carair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_5.326'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sīmantonnayanāntakarmaviratāv autsukyagarbhā purī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāsannakaragṛheva taruṇī kṛcchrān nināya kṣapām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śuddhānte ca śukādipañjaravayaḥkolāhale 'pi śrute</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājā dārakajanmasaṃpadaghanaprahlādam utpraikṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_5.326'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sīmanta-unnayana-anta-karma-viratāv autsukya-garbhā purī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāsanna-kara-gṛha īva taruṇī kṛcchrān nināya kṣapām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śuddha-ante ca śuka-ādi-pañjara-vayaḥ-kolāhale 'pi śrute</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājā dāraka-janma-saṃpada-ghana-prahlādam utpraikṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ smarasakhe kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṣpayukte niśākare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divākare mṛdukare</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devī putraṃ vyajāyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ smara-sakhe kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṣpa-yukte niśā-kare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divā-kare mṛdu-kare</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devī putraṃ vyajāyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putrajanma narendrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jagataḥ sukhajanma ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaṅkājanma ca śatrūṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samaṃ samabhavat trayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putra-janma nara-indrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jagataḥ sukha-janma ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaṅkā-janma ca śatrūṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samaṃ samabhavat trayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha saṃbhūya gaṇakair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktaṃ gaṇitajātakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakravartipitā lokāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ubhau vijayatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha saṃbhūya gaṇakair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktaṃ gaṇita-jātakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakra-varti-pitā lokāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ubhau vijayatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sacivabhāryāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasminn eva dine sutāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alpakālāntare jātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanīyāṃso nṛpātmajāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saciva-bhāryāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasminn eva dine sutāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alpa-kāla-antare jātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanīyāṃso nṛ-pa-ātmajāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim utsavaḥ kiṃ vyasanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ prāṇāḥ prāṇayantu kim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgataṃ cedivatsānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti nāsīd viniścayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim utsavaḥ kiṃ vyasanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ prāṇāḥ prāṇayantu kim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgataṃ cedi-vatsānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti nā asīd viniścayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jātakarmaṇi nirvṛtte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāpte ca dvādaśe 'hani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anvarthanāmnas tanayān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>akurvan rājamantriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jāta-karmaṇi nirvṛtte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāpte ca dvādaśe 'hani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anv-artha-nāmnas tanayān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>akurvan rāja-mantriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāhanena nareṇaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuvero naravāhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naravāhanadatto 'stu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattas tena yatas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāhanena nareṇa eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuvero naravāhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naravāhanadatto 'stu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattas tena yatas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti nāma kṛtaṃ rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putrasya sapurodhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūmihemagajāśvādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dānaprītadvijanmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti nāma kṛtaṃ rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putrasya sa-purodhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūmi-hema-gaja-aśva-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāna-prīta-dvi-janmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>namnā hariśikhaṃ cakre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rumaṇvān ātmajaṃ yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai vitīrṇavān svapne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devadevaḥ śaraṃ hariḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>namnā hariśikhaṃ cakre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rumaṇvān ātmajaṃ yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai vitīrṇavān svapne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>deva-devaḥ śaraṃ hariḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaugandharāyaṇaḥ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakāra marubhūtikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃnāhachadmanā tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatas taṃ maruto daduḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaugandharāyaṇaḥ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakāra marubhūtikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃnāha-chadmanā tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatas taṃ maruto daduḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cakāra gomukhaṃ putram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣabhaḥ saṃjñayā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayaṃ gobhiḥ prasannābhiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citraṃ tasmai pradarśitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cakāra gomukhaṃ putram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣabhaḥ saṃjñayā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayaṃ gobhiḥ prasannābhiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citraṃ tasmai pradarśitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putraṃ tapantakaṃ namnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karoti sma vasantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmāt taṃ tapanas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṇḍalachadmanā dadau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putraṃ tapantakaṃ namnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karoti sma vasantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmāt taṃ tapanas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṇḍala-chadmanā dadau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ labdhaś ca jātaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ kṛtaṃ nāma yasya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham eva sa te caite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarve hariśikhādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ labdhaś ca jātaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ kṛtaṃ nāma yasya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham eva sa te ca ete</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarve hariśikha-ādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te vayaṃ tu yathākālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtānnaprāśanādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avardhāmahi laghv eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sanāthāḥ pādapā iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te vayaṃ tu yathā-kālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛta-anna-prāśana-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avardhāmahi laghv eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-nāthāḥ pāda-pā- iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kumāravaṭakām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upādhyāyair adhiṣṭhitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sabrahmacaryakaiś chāttrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhātrībhiś cāśrayāmahi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kumāra-vaṭakām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upādhyāyair adhiṣṭhitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-brahma-caryakaiś chāttrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhātrībhiś cā aśrayāmahi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avratair eva cāsmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhyastāḥ sakalāḥ kalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>savratais tu catasro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyāḥ sarvaṃ ca vāṅmayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-vratair eva ca asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhyastāḥ sa-kalāḥ kalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-vratais tu catasro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyāḥ sarvaṃ ca vāṅ-mayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gacchatsu divaseṣv evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekadā marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bālabhāvād anadhyāye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīḍati sma sakandukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gacchatsu divaseṣv evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekadā marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bāla-bhāvād an-adhyāye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīḍati sma sa-kandukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ tu bālasvabhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmād ācchidya kandukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ javena mahatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayātaḥ pitur antikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ tu bāla-sva-bhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmād ācchidya kandukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ javena mahatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayātaḥ pitur antikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānubadhnan māṃ vegāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭuśvasitasaṃtatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>baddhamuṣṭikaraḥ krodhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgato marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha anubadhnan māṃ vegāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭu-śvasita-saṃtatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>baddha-muṣṭi-karaḥ krodhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgato marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ kiṃ tāteti tātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa pṛṣṭa idam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanduko me hṛto 'nena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam ayaṃ dāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ kiṃ tāta iti tātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa pṛṣṭa idam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanduko me hṛto 'nena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam ayaṃ dāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato rājñā pariṣvajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāpitāparakandukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tarjanītarjitaḥ pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumāravaṭakāṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato rājñā pariṣvajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāpita-a-para-kandukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tarjanī-tarjitaḥ pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumāra-vaṭakāṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy aṅkam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tātena paribhāṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā sma tāta punar bhrātṝn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kopayeḥ kopanān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy aṅkam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tātena paribhāṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā sma tāta punar bhrātṝn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kopayeḥ kopanān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathāpi pratiṣiddho 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>keliśīlatayā śiśoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathainān kopayāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sma tathaite mām akopayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatha āpi pratiṣiddho 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>keli-śīlatayā śiśoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatha ainān kopayāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sma tatha aite mām akopayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhyāsam ekadā kurvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nārācaṃ marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>icchati sma ca visraṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā ca calitaṃ dhanuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhyāsam ekadā kurvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nārācaṃ marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>icchati sma ca visraṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā ca calitaṃ dhanuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asāv api ca nārācaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>calitāc cāpataś cyutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālatīmukulaṃ lakṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tan mātreṇaiva nāspṛśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asāv api ca nārācaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>calitāc ca apataś cyutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālatī-mukulaṃ lakṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tan mātreṇa eva na aspṛśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utsṛjya kupitaś cāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhāvamānaḥ sa mām anu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsthānasthamahīpāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>samīpam agamat tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utsṛjya kupitaś cāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhāvamānaḥ sa mām anu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsthāna-stha-mahī-pāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>samīpam agamat tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaugandharāyaṇo dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kupitaṃ marubhūtikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kupito bhartsayitvedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhāṣata mahīpatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaugandharāyaṇo dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kupitaṃ marubhūtikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kupito bhartsayitva īdam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhāṣata mahī-patim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>veditā sarvavidyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsannanavayauvanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājaputro mahārāja</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yauvarājye 'bhiṣicyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>veditā sarva-vidyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsanna-nava-yauvanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-putro mahā-rāja</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yauva-rājye 'bhiṣicyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvad yāvad dhi śāstrajñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstrārthān na prayuñjate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvat tāvad bhavanty eṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṇṭhāḥ kāryeṣu buddhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvad yāvad dhi śāstra-jñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstra-arthān na prayuñjate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvat tāvad bhavanty eṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṇṭhāḥ kāryeṣu buddhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amī rumaṇvadādīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putrā hariśikhādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijānanto 'pi śāstrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutarām andhabuddhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amī rumaṇvad-ādīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putrā- hariśikhā adayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijānanto 'pi śāstrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-tarām andha-buddhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vastuny alpe 'py anātmajñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃrabdhālohitānanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhum eva jighāṃsanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛgendraṃ markaṭā iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vastuny alpe 'py an-ātma-jñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃrabdha-ālohita-ānanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhum eva jighāṃsanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛga-indraṃ markaṭā- iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad ete 'pi niyojyantām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhikāreṣu keṣucit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpanā madīyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saphalīkriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad ete 'pi niyojyantām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhikāreṣu keṣu-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpanā madīya īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-phalī-kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_6.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaugandharāyaṇavacaḥ subhagaṃ niśamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītyā narendrasabham ucchrayitāgrahastam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhoḥ sādhu sādhunarakuñjarasādhumantrin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity ujjhitāsanam abhāṣata nirvyavastham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_6.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaugandharāyaṇa-vacaḥ su-bhagaṃ niśamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītyā nara-indra-sabham ucchrayita-agra-hastam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhoḥ sādhu sādhu-nara-kuñjara-sādhu-mantrin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity ujjhita-āsanam abhāṣata nirvyavastham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tātaḥ sabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā saṃjātasaṃpadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathāpradhānam ābhāṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinītavad abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tātaḥ sabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā saṃjāta-saṃpadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā-pradhānam ābhāṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinītavad abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim atra pṛcchyate yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣiptāṅgirasabuddhayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apṛṣṭā eva bhāṣadhve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītinirvāsitatrapāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim atra pṛcchyate yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣipta-āṅgirasa-buddhayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-pṛṣṭā- eva bhāṣadhve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prīti-nirvāsita-trapāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yad rocate sādhu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūjyebhyaḥ pūjitaṃ dinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatrāyaṃ svasutaḥ prītyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālaḥ saṃskriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yad rocate sādhu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūjyebhyaḥ pūjitaṃ dinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra ayaṃ sva-sutaḥ prītyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālaḥ saṃskriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prastāvae etasminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujñātapraveśayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaliṅgasenayā rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūrād eva namaskṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prastāvae etasminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujñāta-praveśayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaliṅgasenayā rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūrād eva namas-kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ehīti sā nṛpeṇoktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na atimantharavikramā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upagamyopaparyaṅkam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyāstādiṣṭam āsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ehi iti sā nṛpeṇa uktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ati-manthara-vikramā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upagamya upaparyaṅkam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyāsta-ādiṣṭam āsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyuktamauktikastoka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhūṣaṇā vimalāmbarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saradvimalahaṃseva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakāśat kāśacāmarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyukta-mauktika-stoka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhūṣaṇā vi-mala-ambarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarad-vi-mala-haṃsa īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakāśat kāśa-cāmarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaṃdharāmūlavisrasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ślathabandhaśiroruhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścimācalakūṭastha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>timirā dyaur ivoṣasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaṃdharā-mūla-visrasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ślatha-bandha-śiro-ruhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścima-a-cala-kūṭa-stha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>timirā dyaur iva uṣasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yauvanāntam anuprāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāvṛḍantam ivāpagā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>calaccaṭulatākārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtāpi nibhṛtākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yauvana-antam anuprāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāvṛḍ-antam ivā apagā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>calac-caṭulatā-ākārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛta āpi nibhṛta-ākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vinītāpi pragalbheva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthavireva taruṇy api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mitavāg api vācālā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyākhyātavyā hi tanmatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vinīta āpi pragalbha īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthavira īva taruṇy- api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mita-vāg api vācāla ā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyākhyātavyā hi tan-matiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upaviṣṭā puras tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśavarṣeva bālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā me dṛṣṭir ākṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇair naur iva mantharā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upaviṣṭā puras tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśa-varṣa īva bālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā me dṛṣṭir ākṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇair naur iva mantharā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>acirasthāpitasphīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaṅgurasnigdhamūrdhajā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nilīnakokilakulā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanvī cūtalateva sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-cira-sthāpita-sphīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaṅgura-snigdha-mūrdha-jā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nilīna-kokila-kulā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanvī cūta-lata īva sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nimeṣonmeṣaśūnyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahajāyām aśobhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakṣuṣā vīkṣyamāṇā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasrākṣam ivākarot ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nimeṣa-unmeṣa-śūnyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha-jāyām a-śobhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakṣuṣā vīkṣyamāṇā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasra-akṣam iva akarot ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rūḍhā dāḍimagarbhābha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśanodbhāsatiānanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>drāḍimīmukulākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vibhaktadaśanacchadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rūḍhā dāḍima-garbha-ābha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśana-udbhāsati-ānanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>drāḍimī-mukula-ākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vibhakta-daśana-cchadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sitasārasanonnadha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahārajanakañcukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raktendīvaramāleva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛṇāladalabandhanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sita-sārasana-unnadha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-rajana-kañcukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakta-indīvara-māla īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛṇāla-dala-bandhanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>unnīyante sma bālāyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cihnair aṅgāni komalaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>latāyāḥ sahakārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phalāni mukulair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>unnīyante sma bālāyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cihnair aṅgāni komalaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>latāyāḥ sahakārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phalāni mukulair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāpṛcchan mahīpālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasyeyaṃ rūpiṇīr iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duhitṛtvam anuprāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāmāsyāḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha apṛcchan mahī-pālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasya iyaṃ rūpiṇīr iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duhitṛtvam anuprāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāma asyāḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaliṅgasenayākhyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śocyeyaṃ tanayā mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yām eva pṛcchati svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtyāṃ madanamañjukām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaliṅgasenayā ākhyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śocya īyaṃ tanayā mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yām eva pṛcchati svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtyāṃ madanamañjukām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sasneham āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātar ehīti bhūpatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ūrūm āropayad bālāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā cemāṃ vāmalocanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa-sneham āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātar ehi iti bhū-patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ūrūm āropayad bālāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā ca imāṃ vāma-locanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>drutam ādityaśarmā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītvā lagnam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho citram iti smeram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhūc ca nṛpater mukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>drutam ādityaśarmā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītvā lagnam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho citram iti smeram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhūc ca nṛ-pater mukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yudhamānarajanmeṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣāṇonmeṣajanmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhvanināpi na taccakṣur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākṣiptaṃ nihitaṃ mayi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yudhamāna-rajan-meṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣāṇa-unmeṣa-janmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhvanina āpi na tac-cakṣur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākṣiptaṃ nihitaṃ mayi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā tu vastrābharaṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>analpam apakalmaṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāmbāyai dāpayitvāsyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadāsthānaṃ vyasarjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā tu vastra-ābharaṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-alpam apa-kalmaṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-ambāyai dāpayitva āsyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad-āsthānaṃ vyasarjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antaḥpuraṃ mahīpālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāravaṭakām aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca viśvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālā svaṃ bhavanaṃ yayau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antaḥ-puraṃ mahī-pālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāra-vaṭakām aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca viśvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālā svaṃ bhavanaṃ yayau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha puṇye dine rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijarājajanāvṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayaṃ bhadrāsanasthaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yauvarājye 'bhiṣiktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha puṇye dine rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvija-rāja-jana-āvṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayaṃ bhadra-āsana-sthaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yauva-rājye 'bhiṣiktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā hariśikhaṃ rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mudājñāpitavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatra prasthāpyate bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gantavyaṃ tava nirvyatham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā hariśikhaṃ rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mudā ājñāpitavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatra prasthāpyate bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gantavyaṃ tava nir-vyatham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>senāpatiś ca mantrī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavān bhavatu sodyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity ājñāpitavān rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prahvaṃ hariśikhaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>senā-patiś ca mantrī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavān bhavatu sa-udyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity ājñāpitavān rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prahvaṃ hariśikhaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khaḍgacarmadharo rakṣed</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apramattaḥ prabhuṃ bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity ājñayā pramuditaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtavān marubhūtikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khaḍga-carma-dharo rakṣed</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-pramattaḥ prabhuṃ bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity ājñayā pramuditaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtavān marubhūtikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādiśad gomukhaṃ bhartū</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīyaṃ manas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramaṇīyaiḥ kriyālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apavādojjhitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādiśad gomukhaṃ bhartū</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīyaṃ manas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramaṇīyaiḥ kriyā-ālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apavāda-ujjhitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantakam athāvocat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇakuṇḍalavṛttinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tyājyo bhavatā svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadācid iti pārthivaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantakam atha avocat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇa-kuṇḍala-vṛttinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tyājyo bhavatā svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadā-cid iti pārthivaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair ahaṃ saṃvṛto 'nyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītachattracāmaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṅgalālaṃkṛtāṅgaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suraviprān avandiṣi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair ahaṃ saṃvṛto 'nyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhīta-chattra-cāmaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṅgala-alaṃ-kṛta-aṅgaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sura-viprān avandiṣi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitur mātaram āsīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitaraṃ ca samantriṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambādvayapradhānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphītaṃ rājāvarodhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitur mātaram āsīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitaraṃ ca sa-mantriṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambā-dvaya-pradhānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphītaṃ rāja-avarodhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ puṣparathārūḍhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasarpan maṅgaladhvanim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṣpapallavalājādyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākrāmaṃ paritaḥ purīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ puṣpa-ratha-ārūḍhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasarpan maṅgala-dhvanim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṣpa-pallava-lāja-ādyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākrāmaṃ paritaḥ purīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prāptābhiṣeko 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārdhaṃ hariśikhādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svādhikāraparaiḥ krīḍan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvatsaram ayāpayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prāpta-abhiṣeko 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-ardhaṃ hariśikha-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-adhikāra-paraiḥ krīḍan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvatsaram ayāpayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varṣābhiṣeke nirvṛtte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrveṇa samaḍambare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvṛttyā sarvavidyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthiratām udapādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varṣa-abhiṣeke nirvṛtte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrveṇa sama-ḍambare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvṛttyā sarva-vidyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthiratām udapādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ me samatīteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>keṣucid divaseṣv aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prātar bhojanavelāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na paśyāmi sma gomukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ me samatīteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>keṣu-cid divaseṣv aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prātar bhojana-velāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na paśyāmi sma gomukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cānena vinā mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirvāṇam api rocate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenānena vināsmabhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhuktair gamitaṃ dinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca anena vinā mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirvāṇam api rocate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena anena vina āsmabhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-bhuktair gamitaṃ dinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñāyatāṃ gomukhaḥ kveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayokte marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>unmattakaḥ sa saṃvṛtta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity avocad gatāgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñāyatāṃ gomukhaḥ kva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya ūkte marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>unmattakaḥ sa saṃvṛtta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity avocad gata-āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi cātrāryaputrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāsti saṃpratyayas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā tapantakas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikārān prekṣatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi ca atrā arya-putrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na asti saṃpratyayas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā tapantakas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikārān prekṣatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tapantako gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punar āgatya coktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āryaputra na tan mithyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad āha marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tapantako gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punar āgatya ca uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārya-putra na tan mithyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad āha marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vimalādarśasaṃkrāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukham ālokya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kampayitvā śiraḥ krodhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirdārayati locane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vimala-ādarśa-saṃkrāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukham ālokya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kampayitvā śiraḥ krodhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirdārayati locane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācic ca smitaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasanne netratārake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃcārayati karṇāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadācin nāsikāntaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cic ca smitaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasanne netra-tārake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃcārayati karṇa-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadā-cin nāsika-antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madhūcchiṣṭanigṛṣṭau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmbūladravalohitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivṛtya dūram adharau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dantāntenāpi niśyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madhu-ucchiṣṭa-nigṛṣṭau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmbūla-drava-lohitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivṛtya dūram adharau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>danta-antena api niśyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vikārān evamākārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā tasyāham āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāryaputra tvaritaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyāsya kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vikārān evam-ākārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā tasya aham āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenā arya-putra tvaritaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriya āsya kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānantaram āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhogamṛditāmbaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāgalbhyān mṛduvailakṣyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām avandata gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha an-antaram āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhoga-mṛdita-āmbaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāgalbhyān mṛdu-vailakṣyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām avandata gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaccit svastho 'si bhadreti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayoktaḥ sann abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim arthaṃ cāham svastho na</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hy ahaṃ marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kac-cit sva-stho 'si bhadra iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya ūktaḥ sann abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim arthaṃ ca aham sva-stho na</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hy ahaṃ marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo hi nāgarakaṃ manyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manyate mām anāmayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>unmattakaṃ sa unmattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakṛtibhraṣṭamānasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo hi nāgarakaṃ manyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manyate mām an-āmayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>unmattakaṃ sa unmattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakṛti-bhraṣṭa-mānasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha śāstropaniṣadas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāta yaugandharāyaṇāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ śikṣitum ārabdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa cāpi vyāpṛtaḥ sadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha śāstra-upaniṣadas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāta yaugandharāyaṇāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ śikṣitum ārabdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa ca api vyāpṛtaḥ sadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyācaṣṭe ca tadā mahyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antaraṃ labhate yadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena māṃ mā pratīkṣadhvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhojanāyodyatā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyācaṣṭe ca tadā mahyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antaraṃ labhate yadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena māṃ mā pratīkṣadhvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhojanāya udyatā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cārabhya divasāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāyam āyātavān ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadācid divase 'nyasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvayos triṣu gateṣu ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cā arabhya divasāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāyam āyātavān ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadā-cid divase 'nyasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvayos triṣu gateṣu ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā bhojanasyānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuto 'py āgatya sādaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho śobhantae ity uccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāśaṃsat khaṇḍamodakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā bhojanasya ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuto 'py āgatya sādaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho śobhantae ity uccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāśaṃsat khaṇḍa-modakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu dāpitān anyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krudhyann iva vihāya saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balād ākṛṣya gatavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam ucchiṣṭamodakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu dāpitān anyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krudhyann iva vihāya saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balād ākṛṣya gatavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam ucchiṣṭa-modakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āryaputra sphuṭībhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>unmattatvaṃ priyasya vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>acikitsyaś ca saṃvṛtta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity avocat tapantakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārya-putra sphuṭī-bhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>unmattatvaṃ priyasya vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-cikitsyaś ca saṃvṛtta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity avocat tapantakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam ābharaṇaṃ vāsas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmbūlaṃ candanādi ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>labdhalabdhaṃ gacchati sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhītvā kvāpi gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam ābharaṇaṃ vāsas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmbūlaṃ candana-ādi ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>labdha-labdhaṃ gacchati sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhītvā kva api gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃprāye ca vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāravaṭakaṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niveditābhyāgamano</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rumaṇvān mām avandata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ-prāye ca vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāra-vaṭakaṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivedita-abhyāgamano</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rumaṇvān mām avandata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ tātam iva dṛṣṭvāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upakrāntaś ca vanditum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena coddhatahastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāta mā meti vāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ tātam iva dṛṣṭva āham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upakrāntaś ca vanditum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena ca uddhata-hastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāta mā ma īti vāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaṃ ca na tvayā tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālena vāsmadādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandyas tvam adhunā prāpto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>loke 'smiṃl lokapālatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaṃ ca na tvayā tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālena va āsmad-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandyas tvam adhunā prāpto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>loke 'smiṃl loka-pālatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyac ca rājasaṃdeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākhyātum aham āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat tvām āha mahārājaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sabhṛtyaṃ tan nibodhyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyac ca rāja-saṃdeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākhyātum aham āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat tvām āha mahā-rājaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-bhṛtyaṃ tan nibodhyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puryām atra śaratkāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrā citrā pravartitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yā nāgavanayātreti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kvacin na vikathyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puryām atra śarat-kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrā citrā pravartitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yā nāga-vana-yātra īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kva-cin na vikathyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvantaṃ ca sā kālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmabhyaṃ na prakāśitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā bhūd vidyāvighāto vas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadvyākṣiptadhiyām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvantaṃ ca sā kālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmabhyaṃ na prakāśitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā bhūd vidyā-vighāto vas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad-vyākṣipta-dhiyām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cittāpahāriṇī yātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hāryacittā ca bālatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cittavidyā ca vidyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durghaṭas trikasaṃgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citta-apahāriṇī yātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hārya-cittā ca bālatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citta-vidyā ca vidyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-ghaṭas trika-saṃgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaṃ cājāgarūkasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mandabuddheḥ sukhātmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>granthabhīroś ca sidhyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na śāstrāṇi tapāṃsi ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaṃ ca a-jāgarūkasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manda-buddheḥ sukha-ātmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grantha-bhīroś ca sidhyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na śāstrāṇi tapāṃsi ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā buddhaboddhavyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāptakomalayauvanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavanto niḥsukhāḥ santaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtapantīva me manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā buddha-boddhavyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāpta-komala-yauvanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavanto niḥ-sukhāḥ santaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtapanti iva me manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad asti yadi vaḥ kāṅkṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ yātrotsavam īkṣitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato yāta nirāśaṅkā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsti ced āsyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad asti yadi vaḥ kāṅkṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ yātrā-utsavam īkṣitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato yāta nir-āśaṅkā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>na asti ced āsyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ suhṛdaḥ pṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad no niṣpadyate hitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad vo vijñāpayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvat pṛcchāmi tān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ suhṛdaḥ pṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad no niṣpadyate hitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad vo vijñāpayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvat pṛcchāmi tān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rumaṇvatā tataḥ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapolāgalitāśruṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haihayānāṃ kulaṃ tuṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ vijayatāṃ jagat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rumaṇvatā tataḥ proktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapola-āgalita-aśruṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haihayānāṃ kulaṃ tuṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ vijayatāṃ jagat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavatā sādhuvṛttena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gotradāsāḥ kṛtā vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yan naḥ saṃbhāvitāḥ putrāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praśnaprativacaḥkṣamāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavatā sādhu-vṛttena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gotra-dāsāḥ kṛtā- vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yan naḥ saṃbhāvitāḥ putrāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praśna-prati-vacaḥ-kṣamāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā nirgate tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdaḥ pṛṣṭavān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya yad vaḥ sthitaṃ buddhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena tat kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā nirgate tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdaḥ pṛṣṭavān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya yad vaḥ sthitaṃ buddhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena tat kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na me gamanam īpsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yataḥ śūnyāni durgāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhyante 'nantarair nṛpaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na me gamanam īpsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yataḥ śūnyāni dur-gāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhyante 'n-antarair nṛ-paiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutam evāryaputreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>proṣite jagatīpatau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāya nagarīṃ śūnyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tad āruṇinā kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutam evā arya-putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>proṣite jagatī-patau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāya nagarīṃ śūnyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tad āruṇinā kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>durgasya ca kṛtā rakṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā ca paritoṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khyāpitaṃ dhīracittatvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmanaś ca bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dur-gasya ca kṛtā rakṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā ca paritoṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khyāpitaṃ dhīra-cittatvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmanaś ca bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ kim āttheti pṛṣṭaḥ sann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocan marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuktaṃ hariśikhenoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity etac ca tapantakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ kim āttha iti pṛṣṭaḥ sann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocan marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuktaṃ hariśikhena uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity etac ca tapantakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoktavān smitamukhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāsūya iva gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim atra bhaṇyate ko 'nyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantrī hariśikhād varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uktavān smita-mukhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāsūya iva gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim atra bhaṇyate ko 'nyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantrī hariśikhād varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ tv ācakṣva kenāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niyukto durgarakṣaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakṣataś cāniyuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>doṣam andha na paśyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ tv ācakṣva kena ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niyukto dur-ga-rakṣaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakṣataś ca a-niyuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>doṣam andha na paśyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuvarājo yuvā vidvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtāstro mandakautukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavadādisahāyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ yāyād acittatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuva-rājo yuvā vidvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛta-astro manda-kautukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavad-ādi-sahāyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ yāyād a-cittatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca rājoditaṃ vakṣye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāsti ced āsyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadāśayaparīkṣārtham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>api cet tan na duṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca rāja-uditaṃ vakṣye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na asti ced āsyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad-āśaya-parīkṣa-artham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>api cet tan na duṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ pustakavinyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>granthabaddhārthabuddhayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praśnānugraham arhanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nedṛśakūṭamantriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ pustaka-vinyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>grantha-baddha-artha-buddhayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praśna-anugraham arhanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nā idṛśa-kūṭa-mantriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ punar guṇopāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayogakuśalo yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetasyaiḥ saha saṃparkaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayogakuśalair mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ punar guṇa-upāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayoga-kuśalo yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetasyaiḥ saha saṃparkaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayoga-kuśalair mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukhaṃ naḥ sevituṃ kālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ṣāḍguṇyakadarthanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yac coktaṃ dharmaśāstreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tāvad avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.77'>
<lg>
