<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukhaṃ naḥ sevituṃ kālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ṣāḍ-guṇya-kadarthanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yac ca uktaṃ dharma-śāstreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tāvad avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayasaḥ karmaṇo 'rthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutasyābhijanasya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veṣavāgbuddhisārūpyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācaran vicared iha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayasaḥ karmaṇo 'rthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutasya abhijanasya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veṣa-vāg-buddhi-sārūpyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācaran vicared iha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenottiṣṭhata gacchāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrām adbhutadarśanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍiṣyāmaś ca kāntāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthalīṣu mṛgayām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uttiṣṭhata gacchāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrām adbhuta-darśanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍiṣyāmaś ca kāntāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthalīṣu mṛgayām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca me gomukhenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviṣṭaṃ hṛdayaṃ yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuktasac cānukūlaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vacaḥ kasmai na rocate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca me gomukhena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviṣṭaṃ hṛdayaṃ yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yukta-sac ca anukūlaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vacaḥ kasmai na rocate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaś ca gomukhenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrāṃ lokasya gacchataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsādatalam āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samṛddhir dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaś ca gomukhena-uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrāṃ lokasya gacchataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsāda-talam āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samṛddhir dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_7.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāham abhraṃlihaśaṅgacakraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhvajaprabhāpīḍitaśakracāpam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsādam āroham udāraśobhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaśīva pūrvācalarājakūṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_7.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aham abhraṃ-liha-śaṅga-cakraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhvaja-prabhā-pīḍita-śakra-cāpam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsādam āroham udāra-śobhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaśi īva pūrva-a-cala-rāja-kūṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāpaśyaṃ puradvārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niryāntīṃ janatām aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citrālaṃkārasaṃskārāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācaṃ kavimukhād iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra apaśyaṃ pura-dvārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niryāntīṃ janatām aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citra-alaṃ-kāra-saṃskārāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācaṃ kavi-mukhād iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>turaṃgarathamātaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kareṇuśibikādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭumbiparivāro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatrāgacchad amaṇḍanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>turaṃ-ga-ratha-mātaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kareṇu-śibikā-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭumbi-parivāro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatra agacchad a-maṇḍanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃpaśyamāno 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ hastinīgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣkrāmantaṃ rumaṇvantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āryaveṣasahāyakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃpaśyamāno 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ hastinī-gatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣkrāmantaṃ rumaṇvantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārya-veṣa-sahāyakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhyāsitavaśāyūtham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ambādvayapuraḥsaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kañcukyādiparīvāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>antaḥpuram ataḥ param ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhyāsita-vaśā-yūtham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ambā-dvaya-puraḥ-saram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kañcukya-ādi-parīvāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>antaḥ-puram ataḥ param ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sārdhaṃ makarayaṣṭyā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cañcadraktapatākayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṇikāgaṇam ākṛṣṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramattajanamānasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-ardhaṃ makara-yaṣṭyā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cañcad-rakta-patākayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṇikā-gaṇam ākṛṣṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramatta-jana-mānasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ gomukho 'vocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aryaputra kim āsyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ vaḥ samayo gantum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity athāham avātaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ gomukho 'vocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arya-putra kim āsyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ vaḥ samayo gantum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity atha aham avātaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃcārimerukūṭābham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āruhya sasuhṛd ratham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nadannandimṛdaṅgādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūryaḥ pracalam adhvagam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃcāri-meru-kūṭa-ābham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āruhya sa-suhṛd ratham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nadan-nandi-mṛdaṅga-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūryaḥ pracalam adhva-gam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>turaṃgaheṣitais tārair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mandraiś ca gajagarjitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikhaṇḍighanasaṃghāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirghoṣae iva jṛmbhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>turaṃ-ga-heṣitais tārair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mandraiś ca gaja-garjitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikhaṇḍi-ghana-saṃghāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirghoṣae iva jṛmbhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>janasaṃghaṭṭaniṣpiṣṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulākoṭikamekhalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājamārgam atikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājadvāram ayāsiṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jana-saṃghaṭṭa-niṣpiṣṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulā-koṭika-mekhalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-mārgam atikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāja-dvāram ayāsiṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suyāmunasthas tatrastham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujñābhinayena mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaccha gaccheti bhūpalaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣiptapāṇir acodayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suyāmuna-sthas tatra-stham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujñā-abhinayena mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaccha gaccha iti bhū-palaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣipta-pāṇir acodayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu taṃ namaskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣam asyābhivardhayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prātiṣṭhe bandisaṃghāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayuktajayaghoṣaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu taṃ namas-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣam asya abhivardhayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prātiṣṭhe bandi-saṃghāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayukta-jaya-ghoṣaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāgdvāreṇa ca niryāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janasaṃpaddidṛkṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājamārgam adhiṣṭhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandiraṃ gantum ārabhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāg-dvāreṇa ca niryāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jana-saṃpad-didṛkṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-mārgam adhiṣṭhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandiraṃ gantum ārabhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāṣṭābhiḥ śaśāṅkābhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṅkumasthāsakāṅkitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hemabhāṇḍaiḥ pravahaṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktam ukṣakumārakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aṣṭābhiḥ śaśāṅka-ābhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṅkuma-sthāsaka-aṅkitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hema-bhāṇḍaiḥ pravahaṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktam ukṣa-kumārakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhavalāmbarasaṃvītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sajyotsnam iva mandiram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītamandasaṃcāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi sma samīpagam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhavala-ambara-saṃvītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-jyotsnam iva mandiram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhīta-manda-saṃcāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi sma samīpa-gam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra pravahaṇācchāda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>channārdham aham ānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ megharuddhārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iva prāleyadīpitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra pravahaṇa-ācchāda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>channa-ardham aham ānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ megha-ruddha-ardham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iva prāleya-dīpitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lalāṭataṭavinyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛdutāmrāṅgulidvayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nibaddham añjaliṃ cāru</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarojamukulākṛtim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lalāṭa-taṭa-vinyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛdu-tāmra-aṅguli-dvayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nibaddham añjaliṃ cāru</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saro-ja-mukula-ākṛtim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāmopacāravijñāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūnyo yasmād ahaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na jānāmi sma kenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ baddhaṃ vandanāñjalim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāma-upacāra-vijñāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūnyo yasmād ahaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na jānāmi sma kena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ baddhaṃ vandana-añjalim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ gomukho 'vocat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>srastena mukuṭena vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lalāṭam āvṛtaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat samādhīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ gomukho 'vocat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>srastena mukuṭena vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lalāṭam āvṛtaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat samādhīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāmṛṣṭe lalāṭānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā dakṣiṇapāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāne kanyābhir unmuktas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmin kalakalaḥ paṭuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā amṛṣṭe lalāṭa-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā dakṣiṇa-pāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāne kanyābhir unmuktas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmin kalakalaḥ paṭuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyataś ca mukhaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pārśvaspandanasūcitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhena smitaṃ sadya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upakṣiptaṃ kathāntaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyataś ca mukhaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pārśva-spandana-sūcitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhena smitaṃ sadya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upakṣiptaṃ kathā-antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krīḍāsthānāni paśyantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāritāni rumaṇvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāsīdāma kālindīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarajjananirantarām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krīḍā-āsthānāni paśyantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāritāni rumaṇvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāsīdāma kālindīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taraj-jana-nir-antarām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yat tat pravahaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ca tan mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttāryamāṇaṃ yamunāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādareṇa rumaṇvatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yat tat pravahaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ca tan mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttāryamāṇaṃ yamunāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādareṇa rumaṇvatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utsāhitaniṣādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddhayātreti vādinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāvaḥ saṃcaratā nāvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tenaivottāritā vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utsāhita-niṣādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddha-yātra īti vādinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāvaḥ saṃcaratā- nāvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena eva uttāritā- vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukhaṃ vihitasaṃbhāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nadītaṭaniveśite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitvā krīḍāgṛhe rātrim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utthitāḥ prasthitās tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukhaṃ vihita-saṃbhāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nadī-taṭa-niveśite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitvā krīḍā-gṛhe rātrim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utthitāḥ prasthitās tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nātidūram atikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛcchrāl labdhāntarāḥ pathi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptā nāgavanodyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śobhāninditanandanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ati-dūram atikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛcchrāl labdha-antarāḥ pathi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptā- nāga-vana-udyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śobha-a-nindita-nandanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃtatānantavṛttāntāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nitāntahitakautukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yātrāṃ paśyan prayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janatāṅgulidarśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃtata-an-anta-vṛtta-antāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nitānta-hita-kautukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yātrāṃ paśyan prayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janatā-aṅguli-darśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>senāpatis tu māṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśu kāñcanatoraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kḹptanānāvidhākrīḍaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātrāgṛham avaśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>senā-patis tu māṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśu kāñcana-toraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kḹpta-nānā-vidha-ākrīḍaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātrā-gṛham avaśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāhaṃ sasuhṛdvargaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍāsnānāśanādikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyāḥ kurvan nayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>netronmeṣasamaṃ divam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ahaṃ sa-suhṛd-vargaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍā-snāna-āśana-ādikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyāḥ kurvan nayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>netra-unmeṣa-samaṃ divam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pradoṣe senānīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgatyāsmān abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaḥ saṃpādayitā krīḍā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā vaḥ sā kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pradoṣe senā-nīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgatya asmān abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaḥ saṃpādayitā krīḍā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā vaḥ sā kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛgayeti mayākhyāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāte senāpatau vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhinīya niśāṃ prātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratiṣṭhāmahe kānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛgaya īti mayā ākhyāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāte senā-patau vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhinīya niśāṃ prātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratiṣṭhāmahe kānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anye 'pi madanujñātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītāḥ paurakumārakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kareṇukarabhāśvādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāhanāḥ saṃghaśo 'vrajan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anye 'pi mad-anujñātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītāḥ paura-kumārakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kareṇu-karabha-aśva-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāhanāḥ saṃghaśo 'vrajan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha duṣparisaṃkhyānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ vanarandhragam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pluṣṭasthāṇuvanākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulindabalam agrataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha duṣ-parisaṃkhyānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ vana-randhra-gam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pluṣṭa-sthāṇu-vana-ākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulinda-balam agrataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato niryāya pīnāṅgo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nikharvas tāmralocanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>senāpatiḥ siṃhaśatruḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>senāpatim avandata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato niryāya pīna-aṅgo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nikharvas tāmra-locanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>senā-patiḥ siṃhaśatruḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>senā-patim avandata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ bhrātṛjāyā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kīdṛśī cintyamekhalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tau vā śāmbarasāraṅgau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrau kuśalināv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ bhrātṛ-jāyā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kī-dṛśī cintyamekhalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tau vā śāmbara-sāraṅgau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrau kuśalināv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siṃhaśatrur avocat taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivaṃ naḥ sakale kule</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad arthaṃ vayam āhūtās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat samājñāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siṃhaśatrur avocat taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivaṃ naḥ sakale kule</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad arthaṃ vayam āhūtās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat samājñāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rumaṇvān abravīd eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāraḥ sasuhṛt tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nyāsas tena sasainyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayatnāt pālyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rumaṇvān abravīd eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāraḥ sa-suhṛt tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nyāsas tena sa-sainyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayatnāt pālyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nailahāridrakausumbha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsorāśim adāpayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tailakumbhasahasraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rumaṇvān siṃhaśatrave ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naila-hāridra-kausumbha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāso-rāśim adāpayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taila-kumbha-sahasraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rumaṇvān siṃhaśatrave ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>susaṃvihitarakṣaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujñāpya rumaṇvati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivṛtte gomukhenoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aho tātena śobhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>su-saṃvihita-rakṣaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujñāpya rumaṇvati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivṛtte gomukhena uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aho tātena śobhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijñātāsmadabhiprāyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na nivarteta yad vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kumāravaṭakeveyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaved dāruṇayantraṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijñāta-asmad-abhiprāyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na nivarteta yad vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kumāra-vaṭaka īva iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaved dāruṇa-yantraṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato dvārādimṛgayā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakārair bahubhir mṛgān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nighnanto ghātayantaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tṛptim alabhāmahi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato dvāra-ādi-mṛgayā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakārair bahubhir mṛgān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nighnanto ghātayantaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tṛptim alabhāmahi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nātham araṇyānyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dviṣantaṃ vājikuñjarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yamāya prahiṇoti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahiṣaṃ marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nātham araṇyānyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dviṣantaṃ vāji-kuñjarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yamāya prahiṇoti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahiṣaṃ marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ratnabudbudacitrāṅgās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato 'dṛśyanta saṃghaśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>carantaḥ saṃcarantaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra vātamajā mṛgāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ratna-budbuda-citra-aṅgās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato 'dṛśyanta saṃghaśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>carantaḥ saṃcarantaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra vātamajā- mṛgāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tān hantuṃ darśitotsāhāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ hariśikhādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhagnotsāhā nyavartanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīrebhya iva bhīravaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tān hantuṃ darśita utsāhāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ hariśikha-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhagna-utsāhā- nyavartanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīrebhya iva bhīravaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tais tu senāpatiḥ pṛṣṭo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na dṛṣṭāḥ kaiścid īdṛśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛgā yadi ca jānāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tais tu senā-patiḥ pṛṣṭo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na dṛṣṭāḥ kaiś-cid īdṛśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛgā- yadi ca jānāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam aham apy etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na jānāmi pitā tu me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prastāve kvacid ācaṣṭa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāṃ vārttāṃ kathayāmi tām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam aham apy etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na jānāmi pitā tu me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prastāve kva-cid ācaṣṭa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāṃ vārttāṃ kathayāmi tām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utpadyate yadā loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakravartī tadā kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃrūpajavākārā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛśyante mṛgajātayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utpadyate yadā loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakra-vartī tadā kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ-rūpa-java-ākārā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛśyante mṛga-jātayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ceśvaraśareṇāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tripurendhanadāhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāsādayituṃ śakyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuta evānyasāyakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cā iśvara-śareṇa api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tri-pura-indhana-dāhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāsādayituṃ śakyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuta eva anya-sāyakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etān pradakṣiṇīkṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena kṣiptaḥ śaraḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tūṇam āyāti tasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitta taṃ cakravartinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etān pradakṣiṇī-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena kṣiptaḥ śaraḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tūṇam āyāti tasya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitta taṃ cakra-vartinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tān ahaṃ baddhasaṃrambhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthitaś ca vihiṃsitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te ca māṃ dūram ākṛṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divaṃ haṃsā ivāsthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tān ahaṃ baddha-saṃrambhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthitaś ca vihiṃsitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te ca māṃ dūram ākṛṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divaṃ haṃsā- ivā asthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvatīrya turaṃgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītaprabalaśramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramaṇīyasarastīra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarucchāyām upāśrayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avatīrya turaṃ-gād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhīta-prabala-śramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramaṇīya-saras-tīra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>taru-cchāyām upāśrayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cirān mṛgayamāṇā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>turaṃgapadavartmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>senānubaddhavartmānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptā hariśikhādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cirān mṛgayamāṇā- māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>turaṃ-ga-pada-vartmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>senā-anubaddha-vartmānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptā- hariśikha-ādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kurvan parīhāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām abhāṣata gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiyanto vātahariṇā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmābhir nihatā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kurvan parīhāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām abhāṣata gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiyanto vāta-hariṇā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmābhir nihatā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ na mayaiko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hataḥ kṣiptas tu yaḥ śaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sa tān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eṣa tūṇaṃ mamāgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ na maya aiko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hataḥ kṣiptas tu yaḥ śaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradakṣiṇī-kṛtya sa tān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eṣa tūṇaṃ mamā agataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tenoktam etasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śararājasya pūjanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaś cakravarticihnānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphuṭānām agraṇīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tena uktam etasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śara-rājasya pūjanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaś cakra-varti-cihnānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphuṭānām agra-ṇīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_8.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siṃhaśatrur atha tāmiṣuṃ mudā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhādibhir apūjayat saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddhasārthavadhajātasaṃmado</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattakāṅkṣitavarām ivāmbikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_8.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siṃhaśatrur atha tāmiṣuṃ mudā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukha-ādibhir apūjayat saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddha-sa-artha-vadha-jāta-saṃmado</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>datta-kāṅkṣita-varām iva ambikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato madāndhavanitā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapolasthalakauśalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarojapattraṃ karajaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chettum ārabdha gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato mada-andha-vanitā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapola-sthala-kauśalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saro-ja-pattraṃ kara-jaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chettum ārabdha gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pattracchedyaṃ tatas tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saritas taradambhasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sajīvam iva saṃpannaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>calatvāt paṭuraṃhasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pattra-cchedyaṃ tatas tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saritas tarad-ambhasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-jīvam iva saṃpannaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>calatvāt paṭu-raṃhasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anukūlaṃ prasarpantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśaṃsantaś ca gomukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pattracchedyam apaśyāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktāvayavasaṃkaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anukūlaṃ prasarpantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśaṃsantaś ca gomukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pattra-cchedyam apaśyāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukta-avayava-saṃkaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>astmābhir anuyuktaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathayeti savistaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukho vyākaroti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pattracchedasya lakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>astmābhir anuyuktaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaya iti sa-vistaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukho vyākaroti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pattra-cchedasya lakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ihāryaputra vijñeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pattracchedyaṃ samāsataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tryasraṃ ca caturasraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīrghaṃ vṛttaṃ ca bhedataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iha arya-putra vijñeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pattra-cchedyaṃ samāsataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>try-asraṃ ca catur-asraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīrghaṃ vṛttaṃ ca bhedataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tryasraiḥ catuṣpadaśailā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣpadyante gṛhādi ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturasraiḥ saśālāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>purāṇi puruṣādi ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>try-asraiḥ catuṣ-pada-śailā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣpadyante gṛha-ādi ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catur-asraiḥ sa-śālāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>purāṇi puruṣa-ādi ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrghe nadanadīmārga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratānabhujagādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛtte bhūṣaṇasaṃyoga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śakuntamithunādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrghe nada-nadī-mārga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratāna-bhuja-ga-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛtte bhūṣaṇa-saṃyoga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śakunta-mithuna-ādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhe kathayaty evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgatya marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho nu mahad āścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āryaputrety abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhe kathayaty evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgatya marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho nu mahad āścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārya-putra ity abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau hariśikhenoktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvam eva bhavādṛśām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kūpakacchapakalpānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āścaryaṃ sthūlacakṣuṣām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau hariśikhena uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvam eva bhavā-dṛśām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kūpa-kacchapa-kalpānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āścaryaṃ sthūla-cakṣuṣām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśya duḥśraddadhāneti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam uktvā marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idam āścaryam ity uccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulinaṃ no vyadarśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśya duḥ-śraddadhāna iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam uktvā marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idam āścaryam ity uccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulinaṃ no vyadarśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtvā hasitam ulbaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āścaryaṃ pulinaṃ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>namas tasmai sacakṣuṣe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtvā hasitam ulbaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āścaryaṃ pulinaṃ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>namas tasmai sa-cakṣuṣe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nimnena salilaṃ yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pulinaṃ sikatāsthalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āścaryaṃ yadi tan mūḍha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dveṣaḥ kaḥ salile tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nimnena salilaṃ yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pulinaṃ sikatā-sthalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āścaryaṃ yadi tan mūḍha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dveṣaḥ kaḥ salile tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt kena pulinam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āścaryam iti bhāṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puline yat tad āścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha vā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt kena pulinam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āścaryam iti bhāṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puline yat tad āścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha vā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ puline santi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sikatāḥ kiṃ tad adbhutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nety ukte tena dṛṣṭvā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulinaṃ gomukho 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ puline santi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sikatāḥ kiṃ tad adbhutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ity ukte tena dṛṣṭvā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulinaṃ gomukho 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mā mā bhadramukhaṃ kaścit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paribhūn marubhūtikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā hi puline dṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃniviṣṭaṃ padadvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mā mā bhadra-mukhaṃ kaś-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paribhūn marubhūtikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā hi puline dṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃniviṣṭaṃ pada-dvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaṃ hariśikhenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yady āścaryaṃ padadvayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atyāścaryam idaṃ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padakoṭīś caturdaśa ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaṃ hariśikhena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yady āścaryaṃ pada-dvayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aty-āścaryam idaṃ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pada-koṭīś catur-daśa ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ sānubandhāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāścaryaṃ padakoṭiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ vicchinnasaṃtānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tenāścaryaṃ padadvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ sa-anubandhāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nā aścaryaṃ pada-koṭiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ vicchinna-saṃtānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tenā aścaryaṃ pada-dvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ yadi śeṣāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parāmṛṣṭāni pāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaveyur iti tenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ syād eva vālukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ yadi śeṣāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parāmṛṣṭāni pāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaveyur iti tena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ syād eva vālukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yeyaṃ tīrataroḥ śākhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pulinaṃ yāvad āgatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā gatvāvatīrṇaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaścin nāgarako yadi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ya īyaṃ tīra-taroḥ śākhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pulinaṃ yāvad āgatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā gatva āvatīrṇaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaś-cin nāgarako yadi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etām eva samālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūram ālambapallavām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivarteteti tenokte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parṇākīrṇā mahī bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etām eva samālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūram ālamba-pallavām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivarteta iti tena ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parṇa-ākīrṇā mahī bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kasya tarhīti tenokte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyasyety abravīt sa tam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divyānāṃ katamasyeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa vidyādharam ādiśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kasya tarhi iti tena ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyasya ity abravīt sa tam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divyānāṃ katamasya iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa vidyā-dharam ādiśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na spṛśanti bhuvaṃ devāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthūlatvād yakṣarakṣasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūraṃ padāni majjanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulineṣu viśeṣataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na spṛśanti bhuvaṃ devāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthūlatvād yakṣa-rakṣasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūraṃ padāni majjanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulineṣu viśeṣataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapaḥkṣāmaśarīratvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddhānām ṛṣibhiḥ saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avyaktāṅgulipārṣṇyādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nikṣepaṃ jāyate padam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapaḥ-kṣāma-śarīratvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddhānām ṛṣibhiḥ saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-vyakta-aṅguli-pārṣṇy-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nikṣepaṃ jāyate padam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyeṣāṃ ca manuṣyāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upapattyā niyujyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avagāḍhaṃ bhavaty agre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viparītaṃ tu yoṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyeṣāṃ ca manuṣyāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upapattyā niyujyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avagāḍhaṃ bhavaty agre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viparītaṃ tu yoṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhārākrāntaḥ sa cety ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhuyo hariśikho 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilāpādapaśatrūṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko 'sya bhāro bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāra-ākrāntaḥ sa ca ity ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhuyo hariśikho 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilā-pāda-pa-śatrūṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko 'sya bhāro bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śilāyām avagāḍhaṃ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parṇakīrṇaṃ ca pādape</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śatrau na śatruṃ puline</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramaṇīye 'vatārayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śilāyām avagāḍhaṃ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parṇa-kīrṇaṃ ca pāda-pe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śatrau na śatruṃ puline</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramaṇīye 'vatārayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād asiddhavidyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāro vidyādharī yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vidyāsiddhim āptvāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāyante paṅguvṛttayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād a-siddha-vidya āsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāro vidyā-dharī yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vidyā-siddhim āptva āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāyante paṅgu-vṛttayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āropitaṃ ca tenāsyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jaghanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ bhujam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nimagnaṃ yena tasyedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣiṇaṃ kāminaḥ padam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āropitaṃ ca tena asyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jaghanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ bhujam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nimagnaṃ yena tasya idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣiṇaṃ kāminaḥ padam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patitair uttamāṅgāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>keśadhūpādhivāsitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālatīkusumair vāsam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avakīrṇaṃ na paśyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patitair uttama-aṅgāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>keśa-dhūpa-adhivāsitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālatī-kusumair vāsam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avakīrṇaṃ na paśyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ramaṇīyatarāṃ caiṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tyakṣyati sa nimagnām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenānyatrāpi dṛśyantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padāni nipuṇair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ramaṇīyatarāṃ ca eṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tyakṣyati sa nimagnām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena anyatra api dṛśyantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padāni nipuṇair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ paurair madīyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicinvadbhir itas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>strīpuṃsayor adṛśyanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padāni salilāntike ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ paurair madīyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicinvadbhir itas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>strī-puṃsayor adṛśyanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padāni salila-antike ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahāsmābhis tam uddeśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā dṛṣṭvā ca gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena nāgarakenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāvyam ity etad uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saha asmābhis tam uddeśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā dṛṣṭvā ca gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena nāgarakena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāvyam ity etad uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ vettheti pṛṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa vihasyedam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jñeyaṃ kim atra durjñānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha vā kathayāmi vaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ vettha iti pṛṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa vihasya idam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jñeyaṃ kim atra dur-jñānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha vā kathayāmi vaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paracittānuvṛttiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svacittasya ca nigrahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yeyaṃ nāgarakair uktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā nāgarakatā matā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>para-citta-anuvṛttiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-cittasya ca nigrahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ya īyaṃ nāgarakair uktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā nāgarakatā matā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantharaṃ parisarpantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāminīm anugacchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ nāgarako yasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atikramya na gacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantharaṃ parisarpantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāminīm anugacchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ nāgarako yasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atikramya na gacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīm eva tau yātau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padavī dṛśyatām iyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā hi caraṇākrānti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>natam adyāpi śādvalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīm eva tau yātau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padavī dṛśyatām iyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā hi caraṇa-ākrānti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>natam adya api śādvalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tām anugacchanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>navāṃ caraṇapaddhatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saptaparṇam apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛttabhramarotsavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tām anugacchanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>navāṃ caraṇa-paddhatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sapta-parṇam apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛtta-bhramara-utsavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tanmūle yāni vṛttāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>raho viharamāṇayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayam ācaritānīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhas tāny avarṇayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tan-mūle yāni vṛttāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>raho viharamāṇayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayam ācaritāni iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhas tāny avarṇayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iha sā kupitā tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena ceha prasāditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ sakusumaś cātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kḹptaḥ pallavasaṃstaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iha sā kupitā tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena ca iha prasāditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ sa-kusumaś ca atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kḹptaḥ pallava-saṃstaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāntā cātropaviṣṭā sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā cedaṃ nirūpyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsanaṃ jaghanākrānti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātajarjarapallavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāntā ca atra upaviṣṭā sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā ca idaṃ nirūpyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsanaṃ jaghana-ākrānti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāta-jarjara-pallavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nidhāya jaghane hastau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinamayya gurutrikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ vijṛmbhamāṇāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>magnāgracaraṇā mahī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nidhāya jaghane hastau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinamayya guru-trikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ vijṛmbhamāṇāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>magna-agra-caraṇā mahī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ nirūpayantaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saptaparṇatalād vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niryāntīm anvagacchāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayoś caraṇapaddhatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ nirūpayantaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sapta-parṇa-talād vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niryāntīm anvagacchāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayoś caraṇa-paddhatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāgamyam apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candrasūryānalānilaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mādhavīgahanaṃ veśma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāminām anivāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā agamyam apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candra-sūrya-anala-anilaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mādhavī-gahanaṃ veśma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāminām a-nivāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāruṇīpānasaṃjāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>madabhṛṅgaviluptayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṣpavatyā pariṣvaktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śyāmayā tan nirantaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāruṇī-pāna-saṃjāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mada-bhṛṅga-viluptayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṣpavatyā pariṣvaktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śyāmayā tan nir-antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭvā ca gomukhenoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atraivāste sa kāmukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pracchannaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na hīdaṃ tyāgam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭvā ca gomukhena uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atra evā aste sa kāmukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pracchannaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na hi idaṃ tyāgam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cāpi darśanaṃ yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsīnasya yathāsukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmān muhūrtam anyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kvacid viśramyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca api darśanaṃ yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsīnasya yathā-sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmān muhūrtam anyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva-cid viśramyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nīlaśītalamūlasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrvayā vaṭaśākhinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>chāyayā ca palāśānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atiṣṭhāma tale tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nīla-śītala-mūlasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrvayā vaṭa-śākhinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>chāyayā ca palāśānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atiṣṭhāma tale tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tu tad ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>latāgṛhakam unmukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāsty asāv atra kāmīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saśiraḥkampam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tu tad ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>latā-gṛhakam unmukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na asty asāv atra kāmi īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-śiraḥ-kampam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvam astīti bhāṣase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idānīm api nāstīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvathonmattako bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvam asti iti bhāṣase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idānīm api na asti iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvatha ūnmattako bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam idam atrastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣkrāntaṃ mādhavīgṛhāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikhaṇḍimithunaṃ kasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūkam andha na paśyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam idam a-trastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣkrāntaṃ mādhavī-gṛhāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikhaṇḍi-mithunaṃ kasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūkam andha na paśyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi kaścid bhaved atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trastam etat tatas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muktārtakekam uḍḍīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛkṣadurgaṃ viśed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi kaś-cid bhaved atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trastam etat tatas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mukta-ārta-kekam uḍḍīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛkṣa-dur-gaṃ viśed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasthāpayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicetuṃ parivārakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>calayantaś tu hastāṃs te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūnyam ākhyaṃl latāgṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasthāpayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicetuṃ parivārakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>calayantaś tu hastāṃs te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūnyam ākhyaṃl latā-gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayaṃ tatrāpy apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>racitaṃ prastaraṃ mahat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakīrṇapallavanyāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiśoraluṭhitair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayaṃ tatra apy apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>racitaṃ prastaraṃ mahat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakīrṇa-pallava-nyāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiśora-luṭhitair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taruśākhāvasaktaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hāranūpuramekhalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyatrānyatra ca kṣaumam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambhoruhadalāruṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taru-śākhā-avasaktaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hāra-nūpura-mekhalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyatra anyatra ca kṣaumam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambho-ruha-dala-aruṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patitārkanikāśaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyādharadhanaṃ kvacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varmaratnaṃ sphuradratna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhākuñcitalocanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patita-arka-nikāśaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyā-dhara-dhanaṃ kva-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varma-ratnaṃ sphurad-ratna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhā-kuñcita-locanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvaṃ tad grāhayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣair bhūṣaṇādikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai niryātayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭāyety atha gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvaṃ tad grāhayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣair bhūṣaṇa-ādikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai niryātayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭāya ity atha gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīd vairiṇā nūnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa nītaḥ saha kāntayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tābhyāṃ hi paratantrābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūṣaṇādīdam ujjhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīd vairiṇā nūnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa nītaḥ saha kāntayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tābhyāṃ hi para-tantrābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūṣaṇādi idam ujjhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrghāyuṣkaṃ ca taṃ vitta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>snigdhās tasya śiroruhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lagnāḥ pādapaśākhāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adyāpi hi sugandhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrgha-āyuṣkaṃ ca taṃ vitta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>snigdhās tasya śiro-ruhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lagnāḥ pāda-pa-śākhāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adya api hi su-gandhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ nirūpayantaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samantād dattadṛṣṭayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nātidūram atikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kvacit tuṅgatarau vane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ nirūpayantaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samantād datta-dṛṣṭayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ati-dūram atikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva-cit tuṅga-tarau vane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>baddhaṃ skandhe kadambasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañcabhir lohaśaṅkubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharam apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lepavidyādharācalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>baddhaṃ skandhe kadambasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañcabhir loha-śaṅkubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dharam apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lepa-vidyā-dhara-a-calam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvatāryatām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>skandhād ity abhidhāya tān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apasṛtya tataś chāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśrayāmi sma śākhinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avatāryatām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>skandhād ity abhidhāya tān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apasṛtya tataś chāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśrayāmi sma śākhinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tv abravīn naite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kenacil lohaśaṅkavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śakyāḥ kraṣṭum upayena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvair api surair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tv abravīn na ete</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kena-cil loha-śaṅkavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śakyāḥ kraṣṭum upayena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvair api surair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāham abruvaṃ smṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājājalpan mayā śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etā oṣadhayaḥ pañca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadāsthāḥ kila varmaṇi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aham abruvaṃ smṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja ājalpan mayā śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etā- oṣadhayaḥ pañca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadā āsthāḥ kila varmaṇi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśalyakaraṇī kācit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kācin māṃsavivardhanī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vraṇasaṃrohiṇī kācit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kācid varṇaprasādanī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśalya-karaṇī kā-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kā-cin māṃsa-vivardhanī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vraṇa-saṃrohiṇī kā-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kā-cid varṇa-prasādanī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛtasaṃjīvanī cāsāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañcamī paramauṣadhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi varmaṇi tāḥ santi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tābhiḥ saṃjīvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛta-saṃjīvanī cā asāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañcamī parama-oṣadhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi varmaṇi tāḥ santi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tābhiḥ saṃjīvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muhūrtād iva cāgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vismito gomukho 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasādād aryaputrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīvitaḥ sa nabhaścaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muhūrtād iva cā agatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vismito gomukho 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasādād arya-putrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīvitaḥ sa nabhaś-caraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tā mahauṣadhayo dṛṣṭā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nihitās tasya varmaṇi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śalyaprote ca hariṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayuktāḥ kramaśas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tā- mahā-oṣadhayo dṛṣṭā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nihitās tasya varmaṇi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śalya-prote ca hariṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayuktāḥ kramaśas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra dṛṣṭaprabhāvābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa vidyādharasundaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṛtāṅgaḥ kṛtaḥ sadyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samāśvasyeti bhāṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra dṛṣṭa-prabhāvābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa vidyā-dhara-sundaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kṛta-aṅgaḥ kṛtaḥ sadyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samāśvasya iti bhāṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jīvitaḥ kena baddho 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity athāhaṃ tam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmākam aryaputreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakārais caturair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jīvitaḥ kena baddho 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity atha ahaṃ tam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmākam arya-putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakārais caturair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ kiṃ ca yuṣmākam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aryaputro 'pi vidyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āmeti ca mayā prokte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tenoktaṃ na sa mānuṣaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ kiṃ ca yuṣmākam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arya-putro 'pi vidyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āma iti ca mayā prokte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena uktaṃ na sa mānuṣaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmākam aryaputro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devo vidyādharo 'pi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasīdantu tam ākhyāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādaṃ cakṣuṣām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmākam arya-putro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devo vidyā-dharo 'pi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasīdantu tam ākhyāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādaṃ cakṣuṣām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktam aryaputreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vayam ājñāpitā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvayitvābhyanujñeyo mā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sma paśyat sa mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktam arya-putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vayam ājñāpitā- yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvayitva ābhyanujñeyo mā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sma paśyat sa mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtopakāras tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāyam icchati lajjayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥsaṃdarśanāyātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāta prasthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta-upakāras tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ayam icchati lajjayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥ-saṃdarśanāya atas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāta prasthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha visrastahastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattvā jānunipātanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viniśvasya ca tenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dainyagadgadayā girā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha visrasta-hastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattvā jānu-nipātanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viniśvasya ca tena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dainya-gadgadayā girā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīm asmi sumṛtaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇadānopakāriṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāminaṃ yan na paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣyacakravartinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīm asmi su-mṛtaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇa-dāna-upakāriṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāminaṃ yan na paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣya-cakra-vartinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradāya yadi me prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paścāt tāpena khedyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ muñcāmi bhūyas tān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na cet paśyatu mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradāya yadi me prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paścāt tāpena khedyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ muñcāmi bhūyas tān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na cet paśyatu mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā datte 'bhyanujñāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyatv evaṃ karotv iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāṃ spṛśañ jānuśirasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa mām idam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā datte 'bhyanujñāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyatv evaṃ karotv iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāṃ spṛśañ jānu-śirasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa mām idam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyādharo 'mṛtagatiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kauśikasya muneḥ sutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvavidyādhareśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇaman dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyā-dharo 'mṛtagatiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kauśikasya muneḥ sutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-vidyā-dhara-īśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇaman dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ehīha ca mayāhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>spṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭhe nirāmayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛddṛṣṭyā ca dṛṣṭaḥ san</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prahṛṣṭaḥ samupāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ehi iha ca mayā āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>spṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭhe nir-āmayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛd-dṛṣṭyā ca dṛṣṭaḥ san</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prahṛṣṭaḥ samupāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhenoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktaṃ vṛṣasutena yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satyaṃ tat priyasaṃbhāṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahānāgarako hy ayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhena uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktaṃ vṛṣa-sutena yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satyaṃ tat priya-saṃbhāṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-nāgarako hy ayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ śrutvāmitagatir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idam asmān abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nedaṃ nāgarakatvaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyatāṃ ca kathā yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ śrutva āmitagatir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idam asmān abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na idaṃ nāgarakatvaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyatāṃ ca kathā yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti prāleyaśailasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manonayanahāriṇi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikhare kauśiko nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>munis tulyāśmakāñcanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti prāleya-śailasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mano-nayana-hāriṇi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śikhare kauśiko nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>munis tulya-aśma-kāñcanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca bindumatī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktanandanakānanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārādhitavatī yatnāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sudīrghaṃ kālam apsarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca bindumatī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyakta-nandana-kānanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārādhitavatī yatnāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-dīrghaṃ kālam apsarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā kauśikenoktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varaṃ brūhīti sābravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi me bhagavān prītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato 'patyaṃ dadātv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā kauśikena uktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varaṃ brūhi iti sa ābravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi me bhagavān prītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato 'patyaṃ dadātv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena cotpāditaṃ tasyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apatyayugalaṃ kramāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ ca putraḥ putrī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>matsvasā matsanāmikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca utpāditaṃ tasyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apatya-yugalaṃ kramāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ ca putraḥ putrī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mat-svasā mat-sa-nāmikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ saṃvardhitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāsti tad yan na śikṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhārayāmi ca tadvidyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena vidyādharo 'bhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ saṃvardhitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na asti tad yan na śikṣitam</seg> </l>
