<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhārayāmi ca tad-vidyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena vidyā-dharo 'bhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rudantam aham abruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mādṛśaṃ putram utpādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ roditi bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rudantam aham abruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā-dṛśaṃ putram utpādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ roditi bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ cakravartitvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na te paśyāmi putraka</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgād aṅgān madīyāt tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛthā jāto bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ cakra-vartitvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na te paśyāmi putraka</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgād aṅgān madīyāt tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛthā jāto bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ mama yaḥ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa mahyaṃ kathyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenoktaṃ cakracartī yaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa cāpy anviṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ mama yaḥ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa mahyaṃ kathyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena uktaṃ cakra-cartī yaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa ca apy anviṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ cakravartitvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaiś cihnair avagamyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā tāni dhiyā mahyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācaṣṭāṃ bhagavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ cakra-vartitvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaiś cihnair avagamyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā tāni dhiyā mahyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācaṣṭāṃ bhagavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ śatruṇā baddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yas tvāṃ śaṅkubhir āyasaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvayiṣyati jānīyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāminaṃ taṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ śatruṇā baddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yas tvāṃ śaṅkubhir āyasaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvayiṣyati jānīyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāminaṃ taṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv aṅgārako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyālakaś cābhavat suhṛt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saudaryo gamayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tābhyāṃ kālaṃ sukhaṃ saha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv aṅgārako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyālakaś ca abhavat suhṛt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saudaryo gamayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tābhyāṃ kālaṃ sukhaṃ saha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vāyupatho nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā tena sahāgamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāśyapasthalakaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puraṃ mānasalobhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vāyupatho nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā tena saha agamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāśyapasthalakaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puraṃ mānasa-lobhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatraikadā vicaratā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayopavanacariṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭā kanyāparivārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyakā kusumālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ekadā vicaratā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya ūpavana-cariṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭā kanyā-parivārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyakā kusumālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśasyavarṇasaṃsthānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā me buddhau sthirā sthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praśastir iva vinyastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhittau vindhyaśilābhṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśasya-varṇa-saṃsthānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā me buddhau sthirā sthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praśastir iva vinyastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhittau vindhya-śilā-bhṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām ādāya tayā sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdbhyāṃ ca manoharāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rataye saṃcarāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saridgiritarusthalīḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām ādāya tayā sa-ardhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdbhyāṃ ca mano-harāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rataye saṃcarāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarid-giri-taru-sthalīḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅgārakam athāpaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyantaṃ kusumālikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāgād apatrapātrāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vakragrīvānirīkṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅgārakam atha apaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyantaṃ kusumālikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāgād apatrapā-trāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vakra-grīvā-nirīkṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lakṣito 'ham aneneti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lakṣayitvā sahānujaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anāmantryaiva māṃ nīco</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīcair utthāya yātavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lakṣito 'ham anena iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lakṣayitvā saha-anu-jaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-āmantrya eva māṃ nīco</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīcair utthāya yātavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu jātavailakṣyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃraktāc ca tatas trasan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na jānāmi kva yāmīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakitaḥ saha kāntayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu jāta-vailakṣyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃraktāc ca tatas trasan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na jānāmi kva yāmi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakitaḥ saha kāntayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adya cemāṃ samāsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīyāṃ nagāpagām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avatīrṇo 'smi puline</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>komalāmalavāluke ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adya ca imāṃ samāsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīyāṃ naga-apagām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avatīrṇo 'smi puline</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>komala-a-mala-vāluke ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suratānubhave yogyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā tac ca susaṃvṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>latāgṛham ahaṃ prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phullaśyāmālatāvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>surata-anubhave yogyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā tac ca su-saṃvṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>latā-gṛham ahaṃ prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phulla-śyāmā-latā-āvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca śeṣam aśeṣaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathitaṃ gomukhena vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād āptopadeśo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na nāgarakatā mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca śeṣam a-śeṣaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathitaṃ gomukhena vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād āpta-upadeśo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na nāgarakatā mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko hi vidyādharair baddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avidyādharasainyapaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mocayen mādṛśaṃ tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathedam ṛṣibhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko hi vidyā-dharair baddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-vidyā-dhara-sainya-paḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mocayen mā-dṛśaṃ tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha īdam ṛṣi-bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sevante sevakāḥ sevyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajñāprāṇadhanādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena tenātmarakṣārthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madvidyā gṛhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sevante sevakāḥ sevyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajñā-prāṇa-dhana-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena tenā atma-rakṣā-arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mad-vidyā gṛhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadyaḥ kṛtopakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā mandādareṇa ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na gṛhītābruvaṃ cainam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anugaccha priyām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadyaḥ kṛta-upakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā manda-ādareṇa ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na gṛhīta ābruvaṃ ca enam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anugaccha priyām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca dinād asmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pareṇāham aharniśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apramatto bhaviṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavato deharakṣaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca dinād asmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pareṇa aham ahar-niśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-pramatto bhaviṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavato deha-rakṣaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>smartavyaḥ saṃkaṭe cāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity uktvā naḥ praṇamya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vegenākāśam utpatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāgād aṅgārakaṃ prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>smartavyaḥ saṃkaṭe ca aham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity uktvā naḥ praṇamya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vegenā akāśam utpatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāgād aṅgārakaṃ prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_9.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādityaśarmavacanaṃ vacanaṃ ca yakṣyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānaṃ pradakṣiṇam iṣoś ca marunmṛgāṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prahlādināmitagateḥ kathitena jātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utkhātasaṃśayakalaṅkatayā viśuddham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_9.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādityaśarma-vacanaṃ vacanaṃ ca yakṣyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānaṃ pradakṣiṇam iṣoś ca marun-mṛgāṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prahlādina āmitagateḥ kathitena jātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utkhāta-saṃśaya-kalaṅkatayā viśuddham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha saṃpāditaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrāsthena rumaṇvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśitvodāram āhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātrāyai gantum ārabhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha saṃpāditaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātrā-sthena rumaṇvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśitva ūdāram āhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātrāyai gantum ārabhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ukṣavṛndārakair yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsthāya syandanaṃ sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haṃsair iva śaśāṅkābhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimānaṃ yādasāṃ patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ukṣa-vṛndārakair yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsthāya syandanaṃ sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haṃsair iva śaśāṅka-ābhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimānaṃ yādasāṃ patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akhaṇḍaśaśibimbābhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhaś chatram agrahīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛṣṭahāṭakadaṇḍaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāmaraṃ marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-khaṇḍa-śaśi-bimba-ābhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhaś chatram agrahīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛṣṭa-hāṭaka-daṇḍaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāmaraṃ marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rathāgrāvasthito raśmīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālambata tapantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātatajyadhanuṣpāṇiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pārśvaṃ hariśikho 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ratha-agra-avasthito raśmīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālambata tapantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātata-jya-dhanuṣ-pāṇiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pārśvaṃ hariśikho 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āśitaṃ mṛdughāsānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śeṣaṃ snāpitapāyitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandam mandaṃ ca naḥ sainyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syandanaṃ parito 'gamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āśitaṃ mṛdu-ghāsānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śeṣaṃ snāpita-pāyitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandam mandaṃ ca naḥ sainyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syandanaṃ parito 'gamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃprāye ca vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāmaraṃ calayan manāk</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā hariśikhaṃ vākyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avocan marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ-prāye ca vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāmaraṃ calayan manāk</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā hariśikhaṃ vākyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avocan marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caratā mṛgayākrīḍām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aryaputreṇa pāpikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradāya prāṇinaḥ prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmaḥ prāpto mahān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caratā mṛgayā-krīḍām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arya-putreṇa pāpikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradāya prāṇinaḥ prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmaḥ prāpto mahān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ kim ihāścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anupāsitasādhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śramavyāyāmasāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣitaṃ yat tvayedṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ kim ihā aścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-upāsita-sādhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrama-vyāyāma-sāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣitaṃ yat tvayā īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūmimitrahiraṇyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mitram evātiricyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan mūlatvād itarayos</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmān mitram upārjitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūmi-mitra-hiraṇyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mitram eva atiricyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan mūlatvād itarayos</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmān mitram upārjitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoḥ saṃjalpator evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ gomukham abruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmādīnāṃ pradhānaṃ yat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad ācaṣṭāṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoḥ saṃjalpator evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ gomukham abruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharma-ādīnāṃ pradhānaṃ yat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad ācaṣṭāṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ dharmamitrārthā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yataḥ kāmaprayojanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prādhānyaṃ tena kāmasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmaś cecchāsukhātmakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ dharma-mitra-arthā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yataḥ kāma-prayojanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prādhānyaṃ tena kāmasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmaś ca icchā-sukha-ātmakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puline hi padaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvam icchā prabhor abhūt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yenedam iha vinyastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ paśyeyaṃ kathaṃ nv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puline hi padaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvam icchā prabhor abhūt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena idam iha vinyastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ paśyeyaṃ kathaṃ nv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca dṛṣṭvāryaputreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukham āsāditaṃ yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan na mitraṃ na dharmārthau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ tu kāmo 'yam arjitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca dṛṣṭva ārya-putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukham āsāditaṃ yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan na mitraṃ na dharma-arthau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ tu kāmo 'yam arjitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyo 'py asti mahākāmaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa yuṣmākaṃ na gocaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūyaṃ hi sarvakāmibhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāhyā dārumanuṣyakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyo 'py asti mahā-kāmaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa yuṣmākaṃ na go-caraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūyaṃ hi sarva-kāmibhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāhyā- dāru-manuṣyakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirdiṣṭāḥ kāmaśāstrajñaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣās tu caturvidhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttamā madhyamā hīnāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturthās tu nakecana ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirdiṣṭāḥ kāma-śāstra-jñaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣās tu catur-vidhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttamā- madhyamā- hīnāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturthās tu na-ke-cana ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttamo gomukhas teṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aryaputras tu madhyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhamān kathayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantas tu nakecana ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttamo gomukhas teṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arya-putras tu madhyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhamān kathayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantas tu na-ke-cana ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ krodhād vihasyedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocan marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho nāgarakatvaṃ te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣpannam anujīvinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ krodhād vihasya idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocan marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho nāgarakatvaṃ te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣpannam anujīvinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api bālabalīvarda</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyam evāsi gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko nāma mānuṣamukhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sann aśuddham udāharet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api bāla-balīvarda</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyam eva asi gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko nāma mānuṣa-mukhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sann a-śuddham udāharet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttamo gomukhas teṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aryaputras tu madhyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhor adhikam ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>itthaṃ kaḥ kathayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttamo gomukhas teṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arya-putras tu madhyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhor adhikam ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>itthaṃ kaḥ kathayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ dṛḍhamūḍho 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kiṃcid api budhyase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi prabhutvamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavaty uttamakāmukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ dṛḍha-mūḍho 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kiṃ-cid api budhyase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi prabhutva-mātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavaty uttama-kāmukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ kāmyate ca kāmī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa pradhānam ahaṃ yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akāmī kāmyate yas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhyo 'sāv aryaputravat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ kāmyate ca kāmī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa pradhānam ahaṃ yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kāmī kāmyate yas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhyo 'sāv arya-putra-vat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tu kāmayate kāṃcid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akāmāṃ so 'dhamaḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te nakecana bhaṇyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ye na kāmyā na kāminaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tu kāmayate kāṃ-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-kāmāṃ so 'dhamaḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te na-ke-cana bhaṇyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ye na kāmyā- na kāminaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itīdaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tān vijānīta kāminaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nakecana bhavantas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena nirlakṣaṇā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tān vijānīta kāminaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na-ke-cana bhavantas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena nir-lakṣaṇā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha cāmaram ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuṭann iva kutūhalāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apṛcchad garjitamukhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaṃ marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha cāmaram ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuṭann iva kutūhalāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apṛcchad garjita-mukhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaṃ marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yoṣin madhukarī yāsāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upabhoktuṃ vyavasyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmino yauvanamadhu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kvāsau kathaya tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yoṣin madhu-karī ya āsāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upabhoktuṃ vyavasyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmino yauvana-madhu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva asau kathaya tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam aryaputrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bravīmi yadi pṛcchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tubhyaṃ sthalamaṇḍūka</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na hi bhasmani hūyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena-uktam arya-putrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bravīmi yadi pṛcchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tubhyaṃ sthala-maṇḍūka</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na hi bhasmani hūyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha baddhāñjaliḥ prahvo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māvocan marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛcchyatāṃ sthiragarvo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha baddha-añjaliḥ prahvo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ma āvocan marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛcchyatāṃ sthira-garvo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>icchatāpi tam ālāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjāṃ bhāvayatā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apratyākhyātakathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathayety anumoditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>icchata āpi tam ālāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjāṃ bhāvayatā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-pratyākhyāta-kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaya ity anumoditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānandāśrutimire</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>netre saṃmṛjya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkāsya śuddhakaṇṭhaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramyām akathayat kathām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā ananda-aśru-timire</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>netre saṃmṛjya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkāsya śuddha-kaṇṭhaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramyām akathayat kathām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāham aryaputreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yauvarājye vibhūṣite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhivādayituṃ devyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>narendrāntaḥpuraṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aham arya-putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yauva-rājye vibhūṣite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhivādayituṃ devyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nara-indra-antaḥ-puraṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra citraṃ mayā dṛṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adṛṣṭaṃ divyamānuṣaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varṇakramaviśuddhyā yad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājyam asyeva bhūpateḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra citraṃ mayā dṛṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-dṛṣṭaṃ divya-mānuṣaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varṇa-krama-viśuddhyā yad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājyam asya iva bhū-pateḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padmāvatyā ca pṛṣṭo 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim asmin putra gomukha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyasīti tato devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trayam ity aham uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padmāvatyā ca pṛṣṭo 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim asmin putra gomukha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyasi iti tato devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trayam ity aham uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ punas trayam ity ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devyai kathitavān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛddhiṃ vaḥ śilpināṃ śilpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahuratnāṃ ca gām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ punas trayam ity ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devyai kathitavān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛddhiṃ vaḥ śilpināṃ śilpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahu-ratnāṃ ca gām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha devyā vihasyoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetasyaḥ khalu gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>acetasyo hi puruṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham evaṃ vaded iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha devyā vihasya uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetasyaḥ khalu gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-cetasyo hi puruṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham evaṃ vaded iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama tac chrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdehādhyāsitaṃ manaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetasyaḥ kiṃ nu guṇavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āho svid doṣavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama tac chrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdeha-adhyāsitaṃ manaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetasyaḥ kiṃ nu guṇavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āho svid doṣavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca pṛṣṭā mayā devī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sasaṃdehe 'pi cetasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā sma budhyata sā bālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>acetasyaṃ ca mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca pṛṣṭā mayā devī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-saṃdehe 'pi cetasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā sma budhyata sā bālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-cetasyaṃ ca mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apṛṣṭaḥ ko nu kathayec</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetasyam iti cintayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃcaran mandiraṃ ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirgato rājaveśmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-pṛṣṭaḥ ko nu kathayec</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetasyam iti cintayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃcaran mandiraṃ ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirgato rāja-veśmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma rathaṃ yuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citracāmaramaṇḍanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirantarakhuranyāsaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pārasīkais turaṃgamaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma rathaṃ yuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citra-cāmara-maṇḍanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-antara-khura-nyāsaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāra-sīkais turaṃ-gamaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rathasya prājitā tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣo māṃ vinītavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratodagarbham ādhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūrdhany añjalim abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rathasya prājitā tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣo māṃ vinītavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratoda-garbham ādhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūrdhany añjalim abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartṛdāraka vijñāpyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmin rājakule vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulakramāgatā bhṛtyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rathavāhanajīvinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartṛ-dāraka vijñāpyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmin rāja-kule vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kula-krama-āgatā- bhṛtyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratha-vāhana-jīvinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'ham ājñāpito rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathaite pṛṣṭhavāhniaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>acirād bhavatā rathyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyantāṃ turagā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'ham ājñāpito rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatha aite pṛṣṭha-vāhniaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-cirād bhavatā rathyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyantāṃ tura-gā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā caite yathāśakti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>skandhadāntās tvarāvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tu saṃbhāvayāmy etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuśalair aparīkṣitān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā ca ete yathā-śakti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>skandha-dāntās tvarāvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tu saṃbhāvayāmy etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuśalair a-parīkṣitān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad evaṃ ratham āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parīkṣyantām amī tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padavākyapramāṇārtha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>catureṇa āgamā iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad evaṃ ratham āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parīkṣyantām amī tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pada-vākya-pramāṇa-artha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>catureṇa āgamā- iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idamādi tataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam ānamitānanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upacāro bhaved eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satyam evety acintayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam-ādi tataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam ānamita-ānanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upacāro bhaved eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satyam eva ity acintayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lambakarṇam athāpaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinītaṃ lambaśāṭakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāyasthaṃ samaṣīpātraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lekhanīkarṇapūrakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lamba-karṇam atha apaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinītaṃ lamba-śāṭakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāya-sthaṃ sa-maṣī-pātraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lekhanī-karṇa-pūrakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīn mahati kleśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātitāḥ prabhuṇā vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvathā dhig imāṃ kṣudrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śvavṛttim anujīvinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīn mahati kleśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātitāḥ prabhuṇā vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvathā dhig imāṃ kṣudrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śva-vṛttim anujīvinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛthivyāṃ santi yāvantaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetasyāḥ purus.ottamāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>acetasyāś ca kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ lekhyaṃ mayā kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛthivyāṃ santi yāvantaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetasyāḥ purus.a-uttamāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-cetasyāś ca kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ lekhyaṃ mayā kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na caikam api paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktaṃ cetasyalakṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>acetasyās tu sakalāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣobhayanti mahīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca ekam api paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktaṃ cetasya-lakṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-cetasyās tu sa-kalāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣobhayanti mahīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pustakadvayahastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra caikena bhāṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasāritāṅgulīkena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām uddiśya sakautukam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pustaka-dvaya-hastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra ca ekena bhāṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasārita-aṅgulīkena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām uddiśya sa-kautukam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgatyāryākṛtim amuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirdākṣiṇyaṃ na paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājīvārthacikitsākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cikitsakam ivādhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgatya arya-ākṛtim amuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nir-dākṣiṇyaṃ na paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājīva-artha-cikitsākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cikitsakam iva a-dhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tāvad acetasya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pustakādau niveśyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ya evam anunīto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rathaṃ nāroḍhum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tāvad a-cetasya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pustaka-ādau niveśyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ya evam anunīto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rathaṃ nā aroḍhum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aprārthito 'pi yaḥ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārohati sa likhyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetasyapustakasyādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>namaskārād anantaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-prārthito 'pi yaḥ kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārohati sa likhyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetasya-pustakasyā adau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>namas-kārād an-antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cetasyatālobhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūram utplutya satvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā smānyaḥ kaścid ārohad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity āroham ahaṃ rathaṃ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cetasyatā-lobhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūram utplutya sa-tvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā sma anyaḥ kaś-cid ārohad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity āroham ahaṃ rathaṃ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vegavatā gacchann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ gajam agrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhāyamānaṃ madhurair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ālāpair parikarmiṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vegavatā gacchann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ gajam agrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhāyamānaṃ madhurair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ālāpair parikarmiṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hastyārohaṃ rathāroho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidhārya ratham uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyato naya mātaṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā cetasyarathaṃ rudhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hasty-ārohaṃ ratha-āroho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidhārya ratham uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyato naya mātaṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā cetasya-rathaṃ rudhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam anyato yātu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetasyādhyāsito rathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vihantum aham etasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>necchām icchāmi dantinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam anyato yātu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetasya-adhyāsito rathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vihantum aham etasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na icchām icchāmi dantinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apravṛttamadasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madaḥ sāntvaiḥ pravartate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>icchāyāś cāvighātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena naḥ kṣamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-pravṛtta-madasya asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madaḥ sāntvaiḥ pravartate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>icchāyāś ca a-vighātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena naḥ kṣamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avocam atha yantāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na nāma yadi necchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādhoraṇaḥ pathānyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rathaḥ prasthāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avocam atha yantāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na nāma yadi na icchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādhoraṇaḥ patha-anyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rathaḥ prasthāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ nāmeti coktvā saḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivartitavān ratham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetasyāvāsamadhyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvāṃ nayāmīti coktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ nāma iti ca uktvā saḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivartitavān ratham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetasya-āvāsa-madhyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvāṃ nayāmi iti ca uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama dīrghāyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ bhavatu kuñjaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rundhatā yena me mārgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetasyā darśitā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama dīrgha-āyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ bhavatu kuñjaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rundhatā yena me mārgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetasyā- darśitā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma ca vistīrṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śilātaladharātalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālyabhūṣaṇadhūpādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyapaṇyaṃ vaṇikpatham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma ca vistīrṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śilā-tala-dharā-talam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālya-bhūṣaṇa-dhūpa-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāya-paṇyaṃ vaṇik-patham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam atikramya ramyāgrā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>harmyamālāḥ saniṣkuṭāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saśarīrā iva nyastā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāstuvidyākṛtāṃ dhiyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam atikramya ramya-agrā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>harmya-mālāḥ sa-niṣkuṭāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-śarīrā- iva nyastā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāstu-vidyā-kṛtāṃ dhiyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utkaṭākāracaritāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samadāḥ pramadāḥ kvacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛśān eva puruṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sevamānāḥ parāṅmukhān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utkaṭa-ākāra-caritāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-madāḥ pramadāḥ kva-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tā-dṛśān eva puruṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sevamānāḥ parāṅ-mukhān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛṣṭhato 'nunayantaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvānaṃ yuvatiṃ kvacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā nirbhartsyamānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vākyair madhuradāruṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛṣṭhato 'nunayantaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvānaṃ yuvatiṃ kva-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā nirbhartsyamānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vākyair madhura-dāruṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi ballavakāpehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ mā chupasi durbhagām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahuballavakacchuptāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chupa ballavikām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi ballavaka apehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ mā chupasi dur-bhagām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahu-ballavaka-cchuptāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chupa ballavikām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>calayantīṃ kvacit kāṃcid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipañcīm añcitāṅgulim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāṃcit koṇaparāmarśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiñjānaparivādinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>calayantīṃ kva-cit kāṃ-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipañcīm añcita-aṅgulim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāṃ-cit koṇa-parāmarśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiñjāna-parivādinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃcaramāṇo 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rathena mṛdugāminā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭhantīḥ paṭṭikā vyagrāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi sma kumārikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃcaramāṇo 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rathena mṛdu-gāminā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭhantīḥ paṭṭikā- vyagrāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi sma kumārikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaḥ punaḥ syād ayaṃ grantha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti śrotuṃ mayecchatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūrāt prahitakarṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphuṭam ākarṇitaṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaḥ punaḥ syād ayaṃ grantha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti śrotuṃ maya īcchatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūrāt prahita-karṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphuṭam ākarṇitaṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sametya pūrvaṃ na svapyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suptaṃ ca na parityajet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṇāpānau ca yatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samaṃ saṃdhārayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sametya pūrvaṃ na svapyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suptaṃ ca na parityajet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṇa-apānau ca yatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samaṃ saṃdhārayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kā etā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṭaśāstram adhīyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manye sārathinopāyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ veśaṃ praveśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kā- etā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṭa-śāstram adhīyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manye sārathina ūpāyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ veśaṃ praveśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāmadevālayaṃ cānyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kurvan ko 'pi pradakṣiṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhāṣata kṛtārtho 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidrāṃ prāpsyāmi saṃprati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāma-deva-ālayaṃ ca anyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kurvan ko 'pi pradakṣiṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhāṣata kṛta-artho 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidrāṃ prāpsyāmi saṃprati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'sau vinayagarveṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥkham āste sa gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avandhyaṃ yauvanaṃ kartum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eṣa veśaṃ vigāhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'sau vinaya-garveṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥkham āste sa gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-vandhyaṃ yauvanaṃ kartum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eṣa veśaṃ vigāhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avocam atha yantāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśobhanam anuṣṭhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā tu rathaḥ kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīpaṃ nīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avocam atha yantāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-śobhanam anuṣṭhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā tu rathaḥ kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīpaṃ nīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ mā trasīr veśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nedaṃ mātaṅgapakṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca darśanamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaścid bhavati doṣavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ mā trasīr veśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na idaṃ mātaṅga-pakṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca darśana-mātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaś-cid bhavati doṣavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atītaś ca mahān adhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiṣyate stokam antaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rathaḥ kiṃ pṛṣṭhato yātu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ puraḥ preryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atītaś ca mahān adhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiṣyate stokam antaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rathaḥ kiṃ pṛṣṭhato yātu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ puraḥ preryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu pura ity ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaritaḥ sārathī ratham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prairayat tatra cāpaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandiraṃ mandaronnatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu pura ity ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaritaḥ sārathī ratham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prairayat tatra ca apaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandiraṃ mandara-unnatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājāvarodhanākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvāsthādhyāsitatoraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yoṣidvarṣavaraprāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinītajanasaṃkulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāja-avarodhana-ākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvā-stha-adhyāsita-toraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yoṣid-varṣavara-prāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinīta-jana-saṃkulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt kanyā viniryāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hārihārādibhūṣaṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāntibādhitapadminyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parivārya rathaṃ sthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt kanyā- viniryāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hāri-hāra-ādi-bhūṣaṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kānti-bādhita-padminyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parivārya rathaṃ sthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāsām ekābravit prauḍhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiroviracitāñjaliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartṛdāraka vijñāpyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgacchata kileti mām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāsām eka ābravit prauḍhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiro-viracita-añjaliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartṛ-dāraka vijñāpyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgacchata kila iti mām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tvāsīd aho śaktir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bata puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jagataḥ prabhur apy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena praiṣyeva bhāṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tvāsīd aho śaktir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bata puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jagataḥ prabhur apy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena praiṣya īva bhāṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>acetanair alaṃ puṇyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kilaśabdaḥ pralīyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaiḥ kṛtā paratantreyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lakṣmīr yena ca sūcitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-cetanair alaṃ puṇyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kila-śabdaḥ pralīyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaiḥ kṛtā para-tantra īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lakṣmīr yena ca sūcitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu yāni na yānīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃśayāne kṣaṇaṃ mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dainyamlānamukhāmbhojās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tā niraikṣanta pṛṣṭhataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu yāni na yāni iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃśayāne kṣaṇaṃ mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dainya-mlāna-mukha-ambho-jās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tā- niraikṣanta pṛṣṭhataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuyātā ca taddṛṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭam udghāṭitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vātāyanaṃ kavāṭastha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇijālāṃśubhāsuram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuyātā ca tad-dṛṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭam udghāṭitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāta-āyanaṃ kavāṭa-stha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇi-jāla-aṃśu-bhāsuram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena śṛṅgārasaṃcāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tālavṛntatrayaṃ calat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vibhrāntagrāhiṇīpāṇi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>karaprakarapiñjaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena śṛṅgāra-saṃcāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāla-vṛnta-trayaṃ calat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vibhrānta-grāhiṇī-pāṇi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kara-prakara-piñjaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tālavṛttāntarālīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukham unnatakaṇṭhakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarastaraṃgarandhrastham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>unnālam iva paṅkajam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāla-vṛtta-antara-ālīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukham unnata-kaṇṭhakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saras-taraṃ-ga-randhra-stham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>unnālam iva paṅka-jam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cañcat pradeśinīkaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇim uccaiḥ prasāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukumāramarutprāptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iva vidrumapallavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cañcat pradeśinīkaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇim uccaiḥ prasāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-kumāra-marut-prāptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iva vi-druma-pallavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>keyam āhūyatīty etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avicāryaiva yānataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhuvam āgatam ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśu cetitavān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ka īyam āhūyati ity etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-vicārya eva yānataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhuvam āgatam ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśu cetitavān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaḥ sārathinā cāsmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṇayaṃ praṇayījanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karotu saphalaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartṛputra praviśyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaḥ sārathinā ca asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṇayaṃ praṇayī-janaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karotu sa-phalaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartṛ-putra praviśyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvatīṃ ca bhavān velām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ihāste tāvatīm aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhuryān viśramayann āse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātatīvraśramān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvatīṃ ca bhavān velām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ihā aste tāvatīm aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhuryān viśramayann āse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāta-tīvra-śramān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṇikābhis tv ahaṃ tābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āraṇyaka iva dvipaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vārīm iva dṛḍhadvārām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādyāṃ kakṣyāṃ praveśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṇikābhis tv ahaṃ tābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āraṇyaka iva dvipaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vārīm iva dṛḍha-dvārām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādyāṃ kakṣyāṃ praveśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśastair anvitāṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradeśaiḥ puṣkarādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhīyamānavinayām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ nāgakanyakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśastair anvitāṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradeśaiḥ puṣkara-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhīyamāna-vinayām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ nāga-kanyakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvitīyāyāṃ tu kakṣyāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śilpikauśalaśaṃsinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karṇīrathapravahaṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śibikāṃ ca śivākṛtim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvitīyāyāṃ tu kakṣyāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śilpi-kauśala-śaṃsinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karṇī-ratha-pravahaṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śibikāṃ ca śiva-ākṛtim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśastalakṣaṇagaṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>raṇadābharaṇasrajaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nānādeśāṃs tṛtīyāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vājinaḥ sādhuvāhinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśasta-lakṣaṇa-gaṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>raṇa-da-ābharaṇa-srajaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nānā-deśāṃs tṛtīyāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vājinaḥ sādhu-vāhinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caturthyāṃ viruvatkeka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakoraśukaśārikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarāvakukkuṭavrātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vayaḥpañjaramaṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caturthyāṃ viruvat-keka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakora-śuka-śārikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarāva-kukkuṭa-vrātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vayaḥ-pañjara-maṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalāvinyāsakuśalair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānākārāṇi śilpibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suvarṇatāratāmrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalpitāni tataḥ param ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalā-vinyāsa-kuśalair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānā-ākārāṇi śilpibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-varṇa-tāra-tāmrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalpitāni tataḥ param ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu yojyamānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandhaśāstraviśāradaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūpānulepanamlāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāsanāni tatas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu yojyamānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandha-śāstra-viśāradaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūpa-anulepana-mlāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāsanāni tatas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saptamyāṃ racyamānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>raṅgadhūpanavāsanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāsāṃsi paṭṭakauśeya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūkūlaprabhṛtīni tu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saptamyāṃ racyamānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>raṅga-dhūpana-vāsanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāsāṃsi paṭṭa-kauśeya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūkūla-prabhṛtīni tu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭamyāṃ maṇimuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakīrṇabahalatviṣaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃskārān dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niśānavyadhanādikān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭamyāṃ maṇi-muktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakīrṇa-bahala-tviṣaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃskārān dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niśāna-vyadhana-ādikān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭasv api ca kakṣyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāmātrādayaś ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svakauśalāni śaṃsanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vighnanti sma gatiṃ mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭasv api ca kakṣyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-mātra-ādayaś ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-kauśalāni śaṃsanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vighnanti sma gatiṃ mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgatyāgatya tāḥ kanyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntarūpavibhūṣaṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abruvan kāraṇīmūlyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavanto mūḍhabuddhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgatyā agatya tāḥ kanyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kānta-rūpa-vibhūṣaṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abruvan kāraṇī-mūlyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavanto mūḍha-buddhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ kenāpi kāryeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviśan bhartṛdārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durbhagair dhāryate kasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaśilpakathitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ kena api kāryeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviśan bhartṛ-dārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dur-bhagair dhāryate kasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-śilpa-kathitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hemakuṇḍaladhāriṇyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇḍarāmbaramūrdhajāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayuktaratnapuṣpārgham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avocan mām atha striyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hema-kuṇḍala-dhāriṇyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇḍara-ambara-mūrdha-jāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayukta-ratna-puṣpa-argham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avocan mām atha striyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrghāyuṣā gṛham idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cintāmaṇisadharmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃkṛtaṃ ca guptaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamitaṃ ca pavitratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrgha-āyuṣā gṛham idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cintā-maṇi-sa-dharmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ-kṛtaṃ ca guptaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamitaṃ ca pavitratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃgatya cetasyaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetasyagrāmaṇīr bhava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇisaṅganimittā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇā guṇavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃgatya cetasyaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetasya-grāma-ṇīr bhava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇi-saṅga-nimittā- hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇā- guṇavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sūryakāntaśilākānti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirastatimirāṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyāyūthaparīvāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptaḥ sopānapaddhatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sūrya-kānta-śilā-kānti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirasta-timirāṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyā-yūtha-parīvāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptaḥ sopāna-paddhatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā prāsādam āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vākpraspanditavarjite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasuptae iva saṃsāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citre dṛṣṭiṃ nyaveśayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā prāsādam āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāk-praspandita-varjite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasuptae iva saṃsāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citre dṛṣṭiṃ nyaveśayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalābhir atha citrābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhiṃ sarvavidām iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aprameyaguṇākārāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyāṃ kanyābhir āvṛtām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalābhir atha citrābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhiṃ sarva-vidām iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-prameya-guṇa-ākārāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyāṃ kanyābhir āvṛtām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anumānopamāśabdau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sudūre tāv upāsatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyakṣeṇāpi tadrūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durnirūpaṃ nirūpakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anumāna-upamā-śabdau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-dūre tāv upāsatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyakṣeṇa api tad-rūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-nirūpaṃ nirūpakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cakṣur nirīkṣya tasyāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūrchāmuṣitacetanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāṣāṇapuruṣākāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyakṣeṇa kim īkṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cakṣur nirīkṣya tasyāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūrchā-muṣita-cetanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāṣāṇa-puruṣa-ākāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyakṣeṇa kim īkṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>neśvareṇa ca dharmeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na pradhānena nāṇubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca kālasvabhāvādyais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśī sukarākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nā iśvareṇa ca dharmeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na pradhānena na aṇubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca kāla-sva-bhāva-ādyais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśī su-kara-ākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ tadrūpakathayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadguṇākhyānadīrghayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kariṣyatha svayaṃ tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇarūpavicāraṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ tad-rūpa-kathayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad-guṇa-ākhyāna-dīrghayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kariṣyatha svayaṃ tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇa-rūpa-vicāraṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad ahaṃ tāṃ namaskartum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uttamāṅgāhitāñjaliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadrūpaṃ vismitaḥ paśyaṃs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūṣṇīm āsaṃ muhūrtakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad ahaṃ tāṃ namas-kartum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uttama-aṅga-āhita-añjaliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad-rūpaṃ vismitaḥ paśyaṃs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūṣṇīm āsaṃ muhūrtakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>unnamayya mukhaṃ sāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikasallocanotpalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciraṃ gomukha jīveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māṃ pūrvaṃ samabhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>unnamayya mukhaṃ sa āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikasal-locana-utpalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciraṃ gomukha jīva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māṃ pūrvaṃ samabhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho dhūrtā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mugdhābhā cāpi khalv iyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ nirabhimānā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yayāhaṃ samayārthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho dhūrtā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mugdha-ābhā ca api khalv iyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ nir-abhimānā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaya āhaṃ samaya-arthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ninditā ca mayātmīyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhir vāk ca pramādinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hastau praśastau tābhyāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvam eva kṛtāñjaliḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ninditā ca mayā ātmīyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhir vāk ca pramādinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hastau praśastau tābhyāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvam eva kṛta-añjaliḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvato hastamātro 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>acetanamukhādikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apramattā hi jīvanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtā eva pramādinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvato hasta-mātro 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-cetana-mukha-ādikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-pramattā- hi jīvanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtā- eva pramādinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti cintayate mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā dāpitam ānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nikharvadantacaraṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra cāham upāviśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti cintayate mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā dāpitam ānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nikharva-danta-caraṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra ca aham upāviśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā ha māṃ kṣaṇam āsīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apṛcchad gomukhaḥ kutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchatīti kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā rājakulād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā ha māṃ kṣaṇam āsīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apṛcchad gomukhaḥ kutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchati iti kathitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā rāja-kulād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ kuśalī rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devyau cāntaḥpurāṇi ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rumaṇvadādayo vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantriṇaḥ saparigrahāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ kuśalī rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devyau ca antaḥ-purāṇi ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rumaṇvad-ādayo va āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantriṇaḥ sa-parigrahāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kumār iti tataḥ kiṃcid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ullāpyāsphuṭarephakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tūṣṇīṃbhūtā kṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsāgre niścalām adhāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kumār iti tataḥ kiṃ-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ullāpya a-sphuṭa-rephakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tūṣṇīṃ-bhūtā kṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsa-agre niś-calām adhāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛṣṭe hariśikhādīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krameṇa kuśale tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā kuśalam ity uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām apṛcchad asau punaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛṣṭe hariśikha-ādīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krameṇa kuśale tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā kuśalam ity uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām apṛcchad asau punaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jānāmy eva yathā buddhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvaiḥ sarvā sukheditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakarṣo yasya yasyāṃ vo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyāṃ kathaya tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jānāmy eva yathā buddhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvaiḥ sarvā su-kheditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakarṣo yasya yasyāṃ vo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyāṃ kathaya tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktam aryaputrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāvīṇyaṃ gajanītiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mānuṣair avigahye ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāndharvajñānasāgare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktam arya-putrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāvīṇyaṃ gaja-nītiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mānuṣair a-vigahye ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāndharva-jñāna-sāgare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.124'>
