<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daṇḍanītau hariśikhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstreṣu marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rathādiyānavidyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣṭhāyātas tapantakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daṇḍa-nītau hariśikhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstreṣu marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ratha-ādi-yāna-vidyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣṭhā-yātas tapantakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu karabheṇeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śamīnām agrapallavāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītāḥ sarvavidyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekadeśā manīṣitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu karabheṇa iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śamīnām agra-pallavāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītāḥ sarva-vidyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eka-deśā- manīṣitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.126'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravīd atha vidyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsām āsevanasya kaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavatām ucitaḥ kālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katamad vā vinodanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.126'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravīd atha vidyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsām āsevanasya kaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavatām ucitaḥ kālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katamad vā vinodanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.127'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoditaṃ triyāmānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabuddhāḥ stutadevatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṅgalālaṃkṛtāḥ paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>itihāsam adhīmahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.127'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūditaṃ tri-yāma-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabuddhāḥ stuta-devatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṅgala-alaṃ-kṛtāḥ paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>itihāsam adhīmahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.128'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anujñātās tato vaidyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sugandhisnehadhāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyasyāmaḥ sayānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niyuddhāny āyudhāni ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.128'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anujñātās tato vaidyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-gandhi-sneha-dhāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyasyāmaḥ sa-yānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niyuddhāny āyudhāni ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.129'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ snātvā ca bhuktvā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhūrtaṃ yāpitaśramāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthaśāstrāṇi śaṃsanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahākāvyāni cāsmahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.129'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ snātvā ca bhuktvā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhūrtaṃ yāpita-śramāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>artha-śāstrāṇi śaṃsanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-kāvyāni ca asmahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.130'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niśāmukhe tataḥ saudhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāndracandraprabhājiti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramāmahe sukhaṃ kāntair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veṇutantrīrutair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.130'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niśā-mukhe tataḥ saudhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāndra-candra-prabhā-jiti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramāmahe sukhaṃ kāntair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veṇu-tantrī-rutair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.131'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sā nayanāntena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śravaṇāntavisāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bālikām antikāsīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭvāpaśyan madantikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.131'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sā nayana-antena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śravaṇa-anta-visāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bālikām antika-āsīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭva āpaśyan mad-antikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.132'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṛcchrād ivotthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nitambabharamantharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayāsanne niviṣṭā sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manāg api na lakṣitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.132'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṛcchrād iva utthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nitamba-bhara-mantharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā āsanne niviṣṭā sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manāg api na lakṣitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.133'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam anyāpi gaṇikā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tṛṇavad gaṇitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadāparā tadāyātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpiṇī rūpadevatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.133'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam anya āpi gaṇikā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tṛṇavad gaṇitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yada āparā tadā āyātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpiṇī rūpa-devatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.134'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravīt kaṣṭam āyātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ito guru guror vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>itaś cātithisatkāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim atra kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.134'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravīt kaṣṭam āyātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ito guru guror vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>itaś ca atithi-sat-kāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim atra kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.135'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ devatābhyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guravo guravo yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād gurur guror ājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saiva saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.135'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ devatābhyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guravo guravo yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād gurur guror ājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa aiva saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.136'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravīn na tvayotkaṇṭhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryā mitrāṇy apaśyatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kariṣyati nirutkaṇṭham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ivaṃ tvā padmadevikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.136'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravīn na tvaya ūtkaṇṭhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryā mitrāṇy a-paśyatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kariṣyati nir-utkaṇṭham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ivaṃ tvā padmadevikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.137'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mamābhiprāyam ūhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjamāneva sābravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yuktam ananujñātaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>preṣyair āsannam āsitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.137'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama abhiprāyam ūhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjamāna īva sa ābravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yuktam an-anujñātaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>preṣyair āsannam āsitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.138'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ tv āstīrṇaparyaṅkaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaraṇaṃ bhartṛdārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśya rathasaṃkṣobha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>khedaṃ vinayatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.138'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ tv āstīrṇa-paryaṅkaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaraṇaṃ bhartṛ-dārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśya ratha-saṃkṣobha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>khedaṃ vinayatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.139'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat praviśya tadādeśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikasadramaṇīyakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śayanaṃ hemaratnāṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāpāśrayam apāśrayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.139'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat praviśya tad-ādeśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikasad-ramaṇīyakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śayanaṃ hema-ratna-aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-apāśrayam apāśrayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.140'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pādasthāne tataḥ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sābravīt kaḥ karotu vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandapuṇyair asaṃbhāvyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pādasaṃvāhanām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.140'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāda-sthāne tataḥ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa ābravīt kaḥ karotu vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manda-puṇyair a-saṃbhāvyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāda-saṃvāhanām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.141'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pādasaṃvāhanaṃ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhadraṃ syād yena kenacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃvāhakaviśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim atreti mayoditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.141'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāda-saṃvāhanaṃ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhadraṃ syād yena kena-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃvāhaka-viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim atra iti maya ūditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.142'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tv ālambite pāde</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇibhyām abhavan mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirdoṣe mayi keneyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayuktā viṣakanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.142'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tv ālambite pāde</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇibhyām abhavan mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-doṣe mayi kena iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayuktā viṣa-kanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.143'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karaṇāny asvatantrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na jāne kīdṛśaṃ manaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viceṣṭāni ca me 'ṅgāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhig anāryām imām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.143'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karaṇāny a-sva-tantrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na jāne kī-dṛśaṃ manaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viceṣṭāni ca me 'ṅgāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhig an-āryām imām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.144'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu saṃvāhya caraṇau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhūrtam idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathaṃ dāsajano vakṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāntaṃ vaḥ sevatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.144'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu saṃvāhya caraṇau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhūrtam idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathaṃ dāsa-jano vakṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāntaṃ vaḥ sevatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.145'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīt pragalbheyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anācārā ca yā mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>spṛṣṭapādatalau hastāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>urasy ādhātum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.145'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīt pragalbha īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-ācārā ca yā mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>spṛṣṭa-pāda-talau hastāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>urasy ādhātum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.146'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mamābhiprāyam ūhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sābravīd darśitasmitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uraḥ spṛśati vaḥ ko vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karābhyāṃ mūḍhadhīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.146'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama abhiprāyam ūhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa ābravīd darśita-smitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uraḥ spṛśati vaḥ ko vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karābhyāṃ mūḍha-dhīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.147'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kāpy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatā brahmavādinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paracittajñatā yasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsti rāgavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.147'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama ka āpy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatā brahma-vādinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>para-citta-jñatā yasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na asti rāgavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.148'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ rathasaṃkṣobha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātakhedasya vakṣasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stanotpīḍitakaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvāhanam aninditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.148'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ ratha-saṃkṣobha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāta-khedasya vakṣasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stana-utpīḍitakaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvāhanam a-ninditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.149'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi vāham anugrāhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vakṣo vā prabalaśramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato mām anujānīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartṛtantrā hi yoṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.149'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi va āham anugrāhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vakṣo vā prabala-śramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato mām anujānīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartṛ-tantrā hi yoṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.150'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama dhīreyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirastakaruṇā ca yā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñāṃ labhate yāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvad āste nirākulā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.150'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama dhīra īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirasta-karuṇā ca yā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñāṃ labhate yāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvad āste nir-ākulā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.151'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athainām abruvaṃ bāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parāyattaṃ nibodha mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaḥ saṃvāhanaśāstrajñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa svatantraḥ pravartatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.151'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha enām abruvaṃ bāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>para-āyattaṃ nibodha mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaḥ saṃvāhana-śāstra-jñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa sva-tantraḥ pravartatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.152'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>urasā stanasāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā madīyam uras tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃvāhayitum ārabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakampena savepathu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.152'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>urasā stana-sāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā madīyam uras tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃvāhayitum ārabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-kampena sa-vepathu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.153'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathālaṃ visarpantyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasaṅgakathayānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkṣiptavastu ramye 'rthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kadācid virajyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.153'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvatha ālaṃ visarpantyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasaṅga-kathaya ānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkṣipta-vastu ramye 'rthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kadā-cid virajyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.154'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ krīḍāgṛhāt tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāhyāṃ tām eva vīthikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāgacchaṃ muhūrtāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām evāryasutāgatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.154'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ krīḍā-gṛhāt tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāhyāṃ tām eva vīthikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāgacchaṃ muhūrtāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām eva arya-sutā āgatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.155'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vanditvā prasthitaṃ sā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam ālokya vismitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālapan madhurālāpā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smitapracchāditāratiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.155'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vanditvā prasthitaṃ sā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam ālokya vismitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālapan madhura-ālāpā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smita-pracchādita-aratiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.156'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ bhavanam ātmīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyavekṣyaṃ sadā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyamāno bhujaṃgo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālena paricīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.156'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ bhavanam ātmīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyavekṣyaṃ sadā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyamāno bhujaṃ-go 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālena paricīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.157'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vastrāntam ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madīyaṃ padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpyam asti me kiṃcit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tac ca nādyety abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.157'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vastra-antam ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madīyaṃ padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpyam asti me kiṃ-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tac ca na adya ity abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.158'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hṛdayavāsinyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padmadevikayā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam eva ratham āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumārāgāram āgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.158'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hṛdaya-vāsinyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padmadevikayā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam eva ratham āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumāra-āgāram āgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.159'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra yuṣmān abhuñjānān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyāmi sma mayā vinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upahāsaṃ ca kurvantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ tathā marubhūtikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.159'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra yuṣmān abhuñjānān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyāmi sma mayā vinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upahāsaṃ ca kurvantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ tathā marubhūtikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.160'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dine 'nyatra ca sevitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇaṃ yuṣmān ahaṃ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvāryaduhitur mūlam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āseve padmadevikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.160'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dine 'nyatra ca sevitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇaṃ yuṣmān ahaṃ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatva ārya-duhitur mūlam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āseve padmadevikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.161'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś cāryaduhitrāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhīrāḥ suhṛdas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛttānto 'yam atas teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā gamat karṇagocaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.161'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś ca arya-duhitra āham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-dhīrāḥ suhṛdas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛtta-anto 'yam atas teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā gamat karṇa-go-caram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.162'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pratiṣṭhamānaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocat padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad vaḥ kiṃ vismṛtaṃ kāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti meti mayoditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.162'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pratiṣṭhamānaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocat padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad vaḥ kiṃ vismṛtaṃ kāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti ma īti maya ūditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.163'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ kathayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punar apy āgatāya te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhatte saṃdhriyamāṇaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rahasyaṃ ramyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.163'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ kathayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punar apy āgatāya te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhatte saṃdhriyamāṇaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rahasyaṃ ramyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.164'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāparasmin divase</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvāryaduhitur gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śokamūkapravṛddhāsram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyam abalājanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.164'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aparasmin divase</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatva ārya-duhitur gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śoka-mūka-pravṛddha-asram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyam a-balā-janam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.165'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karadvayāvṛtamukhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>stambhe lagnā parāṅmukhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandaśabdaṃ mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krandantī padmadevikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.165'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kara-dvaya-āvṛta-mukhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>stambhe lagnā parāṅ-mukhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manda-śabdaṃ mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krandantī padmadevikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.166'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām apṛcchaṃ mahārājye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vatsarāje surājani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jaṅgamasya kutaḥ śoko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuvarāje ca rājati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.166'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām apṛcchaṃ mahā-rājye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vatsa-rāje su-rājani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jaṅgamasya kutaḥ śoko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuva-rāje ca rājati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.167'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na kiṃcid api sāvocan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā pṛṣṭāsakṛd yadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā kila viṣaṇṇo 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mumoha ca papāta ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.167'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na kiṃ-cid api sa āvocan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā pṛṣṭa ā-sakṛd yadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā kila viṣaṇṇo 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mumoha ca papāta ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.168'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra caikā pramṛjyāsraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām avocat sacetanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvannāthāślāghanīyeyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśocyā padmadevikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.168'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ca ekā pramṛjya asraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām avocat sa-cetanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvan-nātha-āślāghanīya īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-śocyā padmadevikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.169'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyās tu svāminīṃ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvarāje virājati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyāḥ śokopataptāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yato rakṣas tato bhayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.169'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyās tu svāminīṃ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuva-rāje virājati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyāḥ śoka-upataptāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yato rakṣas tato bhayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.170'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā paśya tām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyatām eva pīḍyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvādṛśāṃ suhṛdāṃ yasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samaduḥkhasajīvanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.170'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā paśya tām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyatām eva pīḍyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvā-dṛśāṃ suhṛdāṃ yasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sama-duḥkha-sa-jīvanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.171'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadāveditamārgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā pramadakānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭā kamalinīkūle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatrāryaduhitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.171'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad-āvedita-mārgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā pramada-kānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭā kamalinī-kūle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra arya-duhitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.172'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛṇālaśaivalāmbhoja</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nalinīdalasaṃstaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śoṣayantī saniśvāsair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muhur viparivartanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.172'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛṇāla-śaivala-ambho-ja</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nalinī-dala-saṃstaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śoṣayantī sa-niśvāsair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muhur viparivartanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.173'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mudrikālatikā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikā hārikā dṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadaṅkanyastacaraṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhyāyantī puruṣottamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.173'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mudrikālatikā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikā hārikā dṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad-aṅka-nyasta-caraṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhyāyantī puruṣa-uttamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.174'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athopagamya saṃbhrāntas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāṃ kṛtāñjalir abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devī duḥkhāṅgadānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhāvayatu mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.174'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha upagamya saṃbhrāntas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāṃ kṛta-añjalir abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devī duḥkha-aṅga-dānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhāvayatu mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.175'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravīd alam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛddhasukhabhāginaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā mamāpratīkārāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjāśokakarīṃ kathām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.175'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravīd alam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛddha-sukha-bhāginaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā mama a-pratīkārāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjā-śoka-karīṃ kathām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.176'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko hi nandanasaṃcāri</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāminījanakāmukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taran makaragambhīrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśed vaitaraṇīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.176'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko hi nandana-saṃcāri</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāminī-jana-kāmukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taran makara-gambhīrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśed vaitaraṇīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.177'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasādayantī tāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mudrikālatikābravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartṛdārikayā kaścit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smaryate na vimānitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.177'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasādayantī tāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mudrikālatika ābravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartṛ-dārikayā kaś-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smaryate na vimānitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.178'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi ca svayam ākhyātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśaktā bhartṛdārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato mām anujānātu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhṛṣṭo hi gaṇikājanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.178'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi ca svayam ākhyātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-śaktā bhartṛ-dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato mām anujānātu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhṛṣṭo hi gaṇikā-janaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.179'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam uktābravīd evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evaṃ nāma nigadyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṛtvā sāhasaṃ kair vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāl labdho manorathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.179'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam ukta ābravīd evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evaṃ nāma nigadyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kṛtvā sāhasaṃ kair vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāl labdho mano-rathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.180'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cemaṃ gomukhād anyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrotum ālāpam arhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhedasaṃdhānadakṣo hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūtaḥ kārye niyujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.180'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca imaṃ gomukhād anyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrotum ālāpam arhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bheda-saṃdhāna-dakṣo hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūtaḥ kārye niyujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.181'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athotsārya tato deśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mudrikālatikā kathām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahyam ākhyātum ārabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇam adhīyatāṃ manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.181'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha utsārya tato deśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mudrikālatikā kathām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahyam ākhyātum ārabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇam adhīyatāṃ manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.182'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharato nāma rājāsīt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trivargāntaparāyaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa samāhṛtavān kāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumārīr ā mahodadheḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.182'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharato nāma rājā āsīt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tri-varga-anta-parāyaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa samāhṛtavān kāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumārīr ā maha-udadheḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.183'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yugapat pariniyāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etāḥ sarvā rahogatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhāny anubhaviṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtatānīty acintayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.183'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuga-pat pari-niya aham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etāḥ sarvā- raho-gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhāny anubhaviṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtatāni ity acintayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.184'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasyāś ca prathamaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītaḥ kampanaḥ karaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyām eva sa saṃtuṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddhapuṇyārjitākṛtau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.184'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasyāś ca prathamaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītaḥ kampanaḥ karaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyām eva sa saṃtuṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddha-puṇya-arjita-ākṛtau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.185'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariśeṣās tu yās tāsāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manonayanahāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manoruhakarākārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṣṭau prākalpayad gaṇān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.185'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariśeṣās tu yās tāsāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mano-nayana-hāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mano-ruha-kara-ākārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṣṭau prākalpayad gaṇān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.186'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṇe gaṇe ca pramukhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukharābharaṇāvṛtām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñātāsanacchatra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāmarām akaron nṛpaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.186'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṇe gaṇe ca pramukhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukhara-ābharaṇa-āvṛtām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñāta-āsana-cchatra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāmarām akaron nṛpaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.187'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tā gaṇāntargatā yasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyāsāṃ ca mahattamāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ mahāgaṇikāśabdam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alabhanta narādhipāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.187'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tā- gaṇa-antar-gatā- yasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyāsāṃ ca mahattamāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ mahā-gaṇikā-śabdam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alabhanta nara-adhipāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.188'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāguṇās tataś cānyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato 'py anyās tataḥ parāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvad ghaṭakasaṃghaṭṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṭhorakaṭayaḥ khalāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.188'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahā-guṇās tataś ca anyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato 'py anyās tataḥ parāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvad ghaṭaka-saṃghaṭṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṭhora-kaṭayaḥ khalāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.189'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ya eṣa gaṇikābheda</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idānīm api dṛśyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ kālāt prabhṛty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bharatena pravartitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.189'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ya eṣa gaṇikā-bheda</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idānīm api dṛśyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ kālāt prabhṛty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bharatena pravartitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.190'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṇamukhyās tu yās tāsām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekasyāṃ kila saṃtatau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātā kaliṅgaseneyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarasyām iva padminī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.190'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṇa-mukhyās tu yās tāsām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekasyāṃ kila saṃtatau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātā kaliṅgasena īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarasyām iva padminī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.191'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>surāsuroragastrīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nindantī rūpasaṃpadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayā tanayā labdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>seyaṃ madanamañjukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.191'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sura-asura-uraga-strīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nindantī rūpa-saṃpadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayā tanayā labdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa īyaṃ madanamañjukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.192'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣā rājakulaṃ yāntīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā mātaram ekadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham apy āci yāmīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punaḥ punar abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.192'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣā rāja-kulaṃ yāntīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā mātaram ekadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham apy āci yāmi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punaḥ punar abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.193'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñātvā tu dṛḍhanirbandhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sācī duhitaraṃ priyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītabālābharaṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anayan nṛpasaṃsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.193'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñātvā tu dṛḍha-nirbandhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā ācī duhitaraṃ priyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhīta-bāla-ābharaṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anayan nṛpa-saṃsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.194'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha rājakulād eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivṛttā lakṣitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>savikāsaiḥ satoṣeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kapolanayanādharaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.194'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha rāja-kulād eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivṛttā lakṣitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-vikāsaiḥ sa-toṣa īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kapola-nayana-adharaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.195'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthitā saṃprasthitāsīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣīdantī ca saṃtatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karoti sma sakhīmadhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājāsthānagatāḥ kathāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.195'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthitā saṃprasthitā āsīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣīdantī ca saṃtatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karoti sma sakhī-madhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāja-āsthāna-gatāḥ kathāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.196'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dinaśeṣam atiprerya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇadāṃ ca sajāgarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prātaḥ sādaram ādatta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citraṃ maṇḍanam ātmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.196'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dina-śeṣam atiprerya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇa-dāṃ ca sa-jāgarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prātaḥ sādaram ādatta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citraṃ maṇḍanam ātmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.197'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasthitā prasthitām dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājāsthānāya mātaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā pṛṣṭā kva yāsīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatra tvam iti cābravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.197'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasthitā prasthitām dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja-āsthānāya mātaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā pṛṣṭā kva yāsi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatra tvam iti ca abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.198'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktam ananujñātaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putri gantuṃ na labhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājāsthānaṃ tanusnehāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paruṣā hi narādhipāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.198'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktam an-anujñātaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putri gantuṃ na labhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-āsthānaṃ tanu-snehāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paruṣā- hi nara-adhipāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.199'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena mātar nivartasva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhānujñā gamiṣyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhṛṣṭā hi dveṣyatāṃ yānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇayinyo 'pi yoṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.199'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena mātar nivartasva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdha-anujñā gamiṣyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhṛṣṭā- hi dveṣyatāṃ yānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇayinyo 'pi yoṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.200'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madhurāś copapannāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutvā mātur imā giraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṭukā durghaṭāś ceyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manyamānā nyavartata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.200'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madhurāś ca upapannāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutvā mātur imā- giraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṭukā dur-ghaṭāś ca iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manyamānā nyavartata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.201'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭanaṣṭanidhāneva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daridravaṇigaṅganā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muktanidrāśanālāpā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śayyaikaśaraṇābhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.201'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭa-naṣṭa-nidhāna īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daridra-vaṇig-aṅganā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mukta-nidrā-āśana-ālāpā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śayya eka-śaraṇa ābhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.202'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā prastutakathāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakhīr iyam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svaptum icchāmy ahaṃ sakhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvan nirgamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.202'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā prastuta-kathāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakhīr iyam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svaptum icchāmy ahaṃ sakhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvan nirgamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.203'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātāsu tāsu manasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatsatyaṃ mama śaṅkitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etāḥ prasthāpitāḥ sakhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim akāraṇam etayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.203'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātāsu tāsu manasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat-satyaṃ mama śaṅkitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etāḥ prasthāpitāḥ sakhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim a-kāraṇam etayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.204'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā sakhībhir vinā nidrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naiva labdhavatī purā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyās tā eva nighnanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidrām iti na badhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.204'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā sakhībhir vinā nidrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na eva labdhavatī purā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyās tā- eva nighnanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidrām iti na badhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.205'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintayitveti tiṣṭhantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jālavātāyanāvṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṇḍanavyāpṛtām etāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi sma sadarpaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.205'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintayitva īti tiṣṭhantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāla-vāta-āyana-āvṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṇḍana-vyāpṛtām etāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi sma sa-darpaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.206'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhirājakulaṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baddhāñjalir abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janmāntare 'pi bhūyāsam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ tasmin vadhūr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.206'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhi-rāja-kulaṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baddha-añjalir abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janma-antare 'pi bhūyāsam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ tasmin vadhūr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.207'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dukūlapāśam āsajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṃdharāyām anantaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udalambayad ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satvarā nāgadantake ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.207'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dukūla-pāśam āsajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṃdharāyām an-antaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udalambayad ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-tvarā nāga-dantake ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.208'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegād iṣur ivāgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇāpaharaṇodyatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṇṭhapāśaṃ tam etasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālapāśam ivākṣipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.208'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegād iṣur ivā agatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇa-apaharaṇa-udyatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṇṭha-pāśaṃ tam etasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāla-pāśam iva akṣipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.209'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śayanīyam athānīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sajalair vyajanānilaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balāt pratyānayaṃ saṃjñāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pretarājakulād aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.209'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śayanīyam atha anīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-jalair vyajana-anilaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balāt pratyānayaṃ saṃjñāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>preta-rāja-kulād aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.210'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krameṇonmīlya nayane</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantharā tāmratārake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ninīya mayi mattaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyāhṛtyedam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.210'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krameṇa unmīlya nayane</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantharā tāmra-tārake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ninīya mayi mattaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyāhṛtya idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.211'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad mitram atikaṣṭād yad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyasanāt kila rakṣati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyasane praharantyā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatrutvaṃ darśitaṃ tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.211'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad mitram ati-kaṣṭād yad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyasanāt kila rakṣati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyasane praharantyā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatrutvaṃ darśitaṃ tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.212'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ hi sarvaduḥkānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idam utpannam ālayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayā jīvitam ujjhantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidhṛtā kim akāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.212'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ hi sarva-duḥkānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idam utpannam ālayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayā jīvitam ujjhantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidhṛtā kim a-kāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.213'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ānukūlyena nirvāhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kālam ekapade tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vighnantyā mama saṃkalpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>darśitā pratikūlatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.213'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ānukūlyena nirvāhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kālam eka-pade tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vighnantyā mama saṃkalpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>darśitā pratikūlatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.214'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad etad ucyate loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvathā na tad anyathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśeṣopāyaduḥsādhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitram śatrur mahān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.214'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad etad ucyate loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvathā na tad anyathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-śeṣa-upāya-duḥ-sādhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitram śatrur mahān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.215'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bruvāṇām ity asaṃbaddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity enām aham abruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmini prabhur ity asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upālambhena takṣasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.215'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bruvāṇām ity a-saṃbaddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity enām aham abruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmini prabhur ity asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upālambhena takṣasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.216'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ kathaya nas tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyasane 'bhyudaye 'pi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāminyā vayam āyāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasmin nābhyantarīkṛtāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.216'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ kathaya nas tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyasane 'bhyudaye 'pi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāminyā vayam āyāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasmin na abhyantarī-kṛtāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.217'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jātāsi kṛpaṇedānīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāsavargam apāsya yā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tanum ekākinī tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukham āsitum icchasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.217'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jāta āsi kṛpaṇa īdānīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāsa-vargam apāsya yā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tanum ekākinī tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukham āsitum icchasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.218'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥkhahetum ataḥ śaṃsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi sādhyaṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīviṣyāmas tataḥ sarvā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mariṣyāmo viparyaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.218'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥkha-hetum ataḥ śaṃsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi sādhyaṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīviṣyāmas tataḥ sarvā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mariṣyāmo viparyaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.219'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ tūṣṇīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śanakair idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekajīvaśarīrāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ tubhyam api kathyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.219'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sthitvā kṣaṇaṃ tūṣṇīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śanakair idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eka-jīva-śarīrāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ tubhyam api kathyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.220'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha jānanty api tvaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirlajjayitum icchasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idam ākhyāya te ko vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>strībhyaḥ sāhasikaḥ paraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.220'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha jānanty api tvaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirlajjayitum icchasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idam ākhyāya te ko vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>strībhyaḥ sāhasikaḥ paraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.221'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ rājakulaṃ yātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devenāhūya sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dakṣiṇaṃ parighākāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ūrum āropitā tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.221'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ rāja-kulaṃ yātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devenā ahūya sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dakṣiṇaṃ parigha-ākāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ūrum āropitā tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.222'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upaviṣṭas tu nṛpater</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ūrau vāme nṛpātmajaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā dṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛdayaṃ me anivāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.222'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upaviṣṭas tu nṛ-pater</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ūrau vāme nṛ-pa-ātma-jaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā dṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛdayaṃ me a-nivāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.223'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dahane 'pi vasann antar</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na dahaty araṇīṃ sa tu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saumyo 'pi puṇyavān asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirdhūmaṃ dagdhum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.223'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dahane 'pi vasann antar</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na dahaty araṇīṃ sa tu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saumyo 'pi puṇyavān asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nir-dhūmaṃ dagdhum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.224'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa hetur asya duḥkhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakṛddarśanam āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā śrūyamāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vā vilapitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.224'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa hetur asya duḥkhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakṛd-darśanam āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā śrūyamāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vā vilapitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.225'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutvedam aham asyās tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātā yat satyam ākulā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyam etam āśaṅkya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samudrotsekaduṣkaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.225'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutva īdam aham asyās tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātā yat satyam ākulā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyam etam āśaṅkya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samudra-utseka-duṣkaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.226'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hā heti hasitenoccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gūhamānā viṣaṇṇatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etām āśvāsayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niḥsārair vacanair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.226'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hā ha īti hasitena uccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gūhamānā viṣaṇṇatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etām āśvāsayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niḥ-sārair vacanair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.227'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muñca svāmini saṃtāpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>api vidyādhareśvaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaśayeyaṃ tava prītyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punaḥ puruṣeśvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.227'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muñca svāmini saṃtāpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>api vidyā-dhara-īśvaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaśayeyaṃ tava prītyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punaḥ puruṣa-īśvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.228'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu tvāravatā śakyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na labdhaṃ phalam īpsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājāno 'pi hi sāmādīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krameṇaiva prayuñjate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.228'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu tvāravatā śakyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na labdhaṃ phalam īpsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājāno 'pi hi sāma-ādīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krameṇa eva prayuñjate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.229'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena dhairyaprakarṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manaḥ s.amdhṛtya cañcalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokenālakṣitā kāṃścit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasva divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.229'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena dhairya-prakarṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manaḥ s.amdhṛtya cañcalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokenā alakṣitā kāṃś-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasva divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.230'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ceyaṃ siddham evārtham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arthibhāvād abudhyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antaś cākathayat toṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikasan mukhapaṅkajā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.230'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca iyaṃ siddham eva artham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arthi-bhāvād abudhyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antaś ca akathayat toṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikasan mukha-paṅka-jā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.231'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divase divase caitāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacobhir madhurānṛtaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāryasaṃsiddhasaṃbaddhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>darśitāśām ayāpayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.231'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divase divase ca etāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacobhir madhura-an-ṛtaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kārya-saṃsiddha-saṃbaddhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>darśita-āśām ayāpayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.232'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vandhyottarair yadātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vañcyamānām amanyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>moktukāmā tadā prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punar utprekṣitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.232'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vandhya-uttarair yadā ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vañcyamānām amanyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>moktu-kāmā tadā prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punar utprekṣitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.233'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃbhrāntayā gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayāsyā mātur antikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃpradhārya tayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāyo 'yam anuṣṭhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.233'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃbhrāntayā gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya āsyā- mātur antikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃpradhārya tayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāyo 'yam anuṣṭhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.234'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīraṃ rājaputrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvitīyam iva gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kenacid upāyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veśam āśu praveśyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.234'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīraṃ rāja-putrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvitīyam iva gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kena-cid upāyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veśam āśu praveśyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.235'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa eva sahacāritvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āneṣyati nṛpātmajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manaḥśrotraharālāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasantam iva kokilaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.235'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa eva saha-cāritvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āneṣyati nṛ-pa-ātma-jam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manaḥ-śrotra-hara-ālāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasantam iva kokilaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.236'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaliṅgasenayā cāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛttāntaḥ kathitas tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padmāvatyai tayā cāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetasya iti bhāṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.236'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaliṅgasenayā ca ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛtta-antaḥ kathitas tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padmāvatyai tayā ca asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetasya iti bhāṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.237'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sārathikāyastha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>hastyārohādibhis tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūrtair asmatprayuktais tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veśam etaṃ praveśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.237'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sārathi-kāya-stha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>hasty-āroha-ādibhis tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūrtair asmat-prayuktais tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veśam etaṃ praveśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.238'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tisṛṇāṃ ca prayuktānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhavad bhavataḥ priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantrīṇāṃ varṇatantrīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhurā padmadevikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.238'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tisṛṇāṃ ca prayuktānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhavad bhavataḥ priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantrīṇāṃ varṇa-tantri īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhurā padmadevikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.239'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu nirvartitasvārthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdarthaparāṅmukhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na nivedayate tubhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svārthabhraṃśaviśaṅkayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.239'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu nirvartita-sva-arthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛd-artha-parāṅ-mukhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na nivedayate tubhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-artha-bhraṃśa-viśaṅkayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.240'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nopāyam aparaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayuktaṃ bhartṛdārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asādhyāyataniśvāsā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirāśā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.240'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na upāyam a-paraṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayuktaṃ bhartṛ-dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-sādhya-āyata-niśvāsā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nir-āśā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.241'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad idaṃ duḥsahaṃ duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasmād asmākam āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvadāyattaḥ sa śeṣaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvidhattāṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.241'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad idaṃ duḥ-sahaṃ duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasmād asmākam āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvad-āyattaḥ sa śeṣaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvidhattāṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.242'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāham abruvaṃ kasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nakhacchedyam upekṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭhāracchedyatāṃ nītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatībhir idaṃ tṛṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.242'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aham abruvaṃ kasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nakha-cchedyam upekṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭhāra-cchedyatāṃ nītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatībhir idaṃ tṛṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.243'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayam eva tato gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī vijñāpitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mucyatām eṣa saṃtāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siddhaṃ viddhi prayojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.243'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayam eva tato gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī vijñāpitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mucyatām eṣa saṃtāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siddhaṃ viddhi prayojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.244'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuvarājārthinī devī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa car7taguṇavatsalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃdhātā gomukhaś ceti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanyas trikasamāgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.244'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuva-rāja-arthinī devī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa car7ta-guṇa-vatsalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃdhātā gomukhaś ca iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanyas trika-samāgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.245'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāsty eva ca mamāyāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaratkāntyunmanā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājahaṃso hi nalinīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam evopasarpati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.245'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na asty eva ca mamā ayāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarat-kānty-un-manā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-haṃso hi nalinīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam eva upasarpati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.246'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ cālāpajālena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvathāhaṃ nṛpātmajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāminyai kārayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇāmam acirād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.246'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ cā alāpa-jālena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvatha āhaṃ nṛ-pa-ātma-jam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāminyai kārayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇāmam a-cirād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.247'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravīn na nasaṃbhāvyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ nāgarake tvayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu prastāvam āsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatethāḥ kāryasiddhaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.247'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravīn na na-saṃbhāvyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ nāgarake tvayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu prastāvam āsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatethāḥ kārya-siddhaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.248'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aprastāvaprayuktā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānti niṣphalatāṃ kriyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aniṣṭaphalatāṃ vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kopayitvā prabhūn iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.248'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-prastāva-prayuktā- hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānti niṣ-phalatāṃ kriyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-iṣṭa-phalatāṃ va āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kopayitvā prabhūn iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.249'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasyai namaskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāravaṭakām agām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ucchiṣṭān āgataś cāsmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhītvā modakādikān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.249'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasyai namas-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāra-vaṭakām agām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ucchiṣṭān āgataś ca asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhītvā modaka-ādikān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.250'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ ca vijñāpayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājaputreṇa modakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayam ārabhya hastābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmabhyaṃ prahitā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.250'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ ca vijñāpayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja-putreṇa modakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayam ārabhya hastābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmabhyaṃ prahitā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.251'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravīj jālam apy etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āśvāsayati mādṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśvāsanti kṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛgā hi mṛgatṛṣṇikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.251'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravīj jālam apy etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āśvāsayati mā-dṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśvāsanti kṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛgā- hi mṛga-tṛṣṇikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.252'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mālyacandanatāmbūla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsobhūṣaṇadhūpanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmābhiḥ preṣitānīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām āśvāsitavān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.252'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mālya-candana-tāmbūla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāso-bhūṣaṇa-dhūpanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmābhiḥ preṣitāni iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām āśvāsitavān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.253'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa vijñāpayāmy adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvo vijñāpayiteti ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alabdhāvasaraḥ kālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etāvantam ayāpayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.253'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa vijñāpayāmy adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvo vijñāpayita īti ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-labdha-avasaraḥ kālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etāvantam ayāpayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.254'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mām abravīd devyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purato mudrikālatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho saṃbhāvanā kāryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahānāgarako bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.254'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mām abravīd devyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purato mudrikālatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho saṃbhāvanā kāryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-nāgarako bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.255'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praṇāmaṃ kārayāmīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>visphūrjya bhavatā tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim iyaṃ vañcyate mugdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patrapuṣpaphalādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.255'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praṇāmaṃ kārayāmi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>visphūrjya bhavatā tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim iyaṃ vañcyate mugdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patra-puṣpa-phala-ādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.256'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā tiṣṭha tāvat tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aham evānayāmi tam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viraktam api saṃdhātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alaṃ kauśalam asti naḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.256'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā tiṣṭha tāvat tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aham evā anayāmi tam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viraktam api saṃdhātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alaṃ kauśalam asti naḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.257'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam uttejjitas tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurubhir vacanair aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalena jñāsyasīty uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prastāvāvahito 'bhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.257'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam uttejjitas tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurubhir vacanair aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalena jñāsyasi ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prastāva-avahito 'bhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.258'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātrāyāṃ tu pravṛttāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhyāse 'tra yad eva me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan mayā kāritā yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣiptvā hariśikhādikān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.258'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātrāyāṃ tu pravṛttāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhyāse 'tra yad eva me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan mayā kāritā- yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣiptvā hariśikha-ādikān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.259'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yat tat pravahaṇaṃ gacchat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pathi yuṣmābhir īkṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad aryaduhitādhyāsta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyudabhram iva dhvanat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.259'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yat tat pravahaṇaṃ gacchat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pathi yuṣmābhir īkṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad arya-duhita ādhyāsta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyud-abhram iva dhvanat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.260'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra yat tanmukhasyārddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lalāṭanihitāṅguli</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmabhyaṃ darśitaṃ vandyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tayā vandamānayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.260'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra yat tan-mukhasya arddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lalāṭa-nihita-aṅguli</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmabhyaṃ darśitaṃ vandyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tayā vandamānayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.261'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca vijñāpitā yūyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ānataṃ mukuṭaṃ manāk</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>unnamyatām iti mayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatrāpīdaṃ prayojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.261'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca vijñāpitā yūyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ānataṃ mukuṭaṃ manāk</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>unnamyatām iti mayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra api idaṃ prayojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.262'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd āsāṃ praṇāmo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aryaputreṇa nāgaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtas toṣayatā kāntām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmākaṃ svāminīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.262'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd āsāṃ praṇāmo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arya-putreṇa nāgaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtas toṣayatā kāntām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmākaṃ svāminīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.263'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>seyaṃ kāmayate devaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajñāparākramaprāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lakṣmīr iva narādhipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.263'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa īyaṃ kāmayate devaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajñā-parākrama-prāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lakṣmīr iva nara-adhipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.264'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayatnopanatā ceyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na pratyākhyātum arhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naveva mālatī mālā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lobhanīyaguṇākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.264'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-yatna-upanatā ca iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na pratyākhyātum arhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nava īva mālatī mālā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lobhanīya-guṇa-ākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.265'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daṣṭānaṅgabhujaṃgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>laghu saṃbhāvyatām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy āśīviṣadagdha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>antrāḥ kṣamante divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.265'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daṣṭa ān-aṅga-bhujaṃ-gena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>laghu saṃbhāvyatām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy āśī-viṣa-dagdha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>antrāḥ kṣamante divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.266'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti gomukhataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathāṃ navadaśapriyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatkathāpahṛtavrīḍaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakāśam aham abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.266'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti gomukhataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathāṃ nava-daśa-priyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat-kathā-apahṛta-vrīḍaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakāśam aham abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.267'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadaiva hṛdaye 'smākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājotsaṅganiṣaṇṇayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśīrṇaṃ manmathataroḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakīrṇaṃ bījam etayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.267'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tada aiva hṛdaye 'smākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja-utsaṅga-niṣaṇṇayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-śīrṇaṃ manmatha-taroḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakīrṇaṃ bījam etayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.268'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadguṇaśravaṇāmbhobhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sicyamānaṃ tadā tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bādhamānaṃ mano jātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ucchvasatkarkaśāṅkuram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.268'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad-guṇa-śravaṇa-ambhobhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sicyamānaṃ tadā tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bādhamānaṃ mano jātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ucchvasat-karkaśa-aṅkuram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.269'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad dohadam ivāsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyāṃ pravahaṇe sthitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kampaniḥśvāsajananān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amuñjat pallavān iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.269'>
<lg>
