<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad dohadam ivā asādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyāṃ pravahaṇe sthitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kampa-niḥśvāsa-jananān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amuñjat pallavān iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.270'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samāptāvayavo yāvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manobhavamahātaruḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na samākramya mṛdnāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvad darśaya tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.270'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samāpta-avayavo yāvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mano-bhava-mahā-taruḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na samākramya mṛdnāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvad darśaya tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.271'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ nartanācāryāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aspardhetāṃ parasparam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvatpravīṇo 'ham ity uktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tau ca bhūpatinā kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.271'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ nartana-ācāryāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aspardhetāṃ parasparam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvat-pravīṇo 'ham ity uktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tau ca bhū-patinā kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.272'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ vāṃ kalahaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karmaśāstravidau yuvām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya yā kuśalā śiṣyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa nartayatu tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.272'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ vāṃ kalahaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karma-śāstra-vidau yuvām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya yā kuśalā śiṣyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa nartayatu tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.273'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaḥ suyāmunadantāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmād aryasutāṃ ca naḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nṛtyantīṃ nṛpatir draṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra draṣṭāstha tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.273'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaḥ suyāmunadantāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmād arya-sutāṃ ca naḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nṛtyantīṃ nṛ-patir draṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra draṣṭā-stha tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_10.274'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā svābhāvikarūpakhaṇḍitajagadrūpābhimānā priyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śṛṅgārādirasaprayogasubhagā jāyeta sā kīdṛśī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity adhyāsitacetasā katham api prakrāntayā cintayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paryaṅkāṅkavivartinārtatanunā nītā triyāmā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_10.274'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā svābhāvika-rūpa-khaṇḍita-jagad-rūpa-abhimānā priyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śṛṅgāra-ādi-rasa-prayoga-su-bhagā jāyeta sā kīdṛśī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity adhyāsita-cetasā katham api prakrāntayā cintayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paryaṅka-aṅka-vivartinā ārta-tanunā nītā tri-yāmā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nāgarakākāras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadākārasuhṛdvṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃprasthāpya manaḥ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛpāsthānam agām aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nāgaraka-ākāras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad-ākāra-suhṛd-vṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃprasthāpya manaḥ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛ-pa-āsthānam agām aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra puṣpakasaṃsthāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mañcasthānaṃ mahīpatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praṇamya tadanujñātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mañcāntaram aseviṣi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra puṣpaka-saṃsthāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mañca-sthānaṃ mahī-patim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praṇamya tad-anujñātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mañca-antaram aseviṣi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>raṅgāṅgaṇam athālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuśalaprekṣakākulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nṛtyācāryau namaskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahīpālam avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>raṅga-aṅgaṇam athā alokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuśala-prekṣaka-ākulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nṛtya-ācāryau namas-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahī-pālam avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājann upāntanepathye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhṛtye vaḥ samupāgate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭum icchatha yāṃ pūrvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ājñāpayata tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājann upānta-nepathye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhṛtye vaḥ samupāgate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭum icchatha yāṃ pūrvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ājñāpayata tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīn nṛtyagītādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalāśāstraviśāradaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhaḥ sa ca yām āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā pūrvaṃ nṛtyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīn nṛtya-gītā-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalā-śāstra-viśāradaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhaḥ sa ca yām āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā pūrvaṃ nṛtyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tābhyām āgatya pṛṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kā pūrvaṃ nṛtyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa suyāmunadanteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadupādhyāyam ādiśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tābhyām āgatya pṛṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kā pūrvaṃ nṛtyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa suyāmunadanta īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad-upādhyāyam ādiśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasyāṃ pranṛttāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pranṛttā nṛtyavedinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raṅgaśeṣas tu niśceṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suṣuptāvasthāṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasyāṃ pranṛttāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pranṛttā- nṛtya-vedinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raṅga-śeṣas tu niśceṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-ṣupta-avasthāṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyāhṛtya tataś ceto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hriyamāṇaṃ balāt tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manonetrāṅgasaṃcārair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anāhāryair acintayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyāhṛtya tataś ceto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hriyamāṇaṃ balāt tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mano-netra-aṅga-saṃcārair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>an-āhāryair acintayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nānugantum alaṃ rambhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛttam asyāḥ samenakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuta eva parājetum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abalā bālikā priyā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na anugantum alaṃ rambhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛttam asyāḥ sa-menakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuta eva parājetum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-balā bālikā priyā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājahaṃsaḥ pipāsāndhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāptaḥ paṅkajinīṃ yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṅkāvilajalāṃ paśyet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathādhyāsam ahaṃ priyām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāja-haṃsaḥ pipāsā-andhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāptaḥ paṅka-jinīṃ yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṅka-āvila-jalāṃ paśyet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha ādhyāsam ahaṃ priyām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avocaṃ gomukhaṃ cedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīyamānāṃ priyām aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśaktaḥ prekṣituṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>raṅgān nirgamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avocaṃ gomukhaṃ ca idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīyamānāṃ priyām aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-śaktaḥ prekṣituṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>raṅgān nirgamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam icchayā gantum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgantuṃ vā na labhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vatsarājakulāt tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muhūrtaṃ sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam icchayā gantum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgantuṃ vā na labhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vatsa-rāja-kulāt tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muhūrtaṃ sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viratāyāṃ tatas tasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purāṇārkarucāv iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvalokam iva jyotsnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyā raṅgam arañjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viratāyāṃ tatas tasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purāṇa-arka-rucāv iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīva-lokam iva jyotsnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyā raṅgam arañjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apṛcchaṃ gomukhaṃ cāsāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>katamā padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mudrikālatikā ceti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa vihasyedam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apṛcchaṃ gomukhaṃ cā asāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>katamā padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mudrikālatikā ca iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa vihasya idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kīrtikāntyor iyaṃ madhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā lakṣmīr iva rājate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣā naḥ svāminī devī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāmato mudrikālatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kīrti-kāntyor iyaṃ madhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā lakṣmīr iva rājate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣā naḥ svāminī devī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāmato mudrikālatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ceyaṃ śakyate jetum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ vaḥ śaṅkayā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭā kena śarajjyotsnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khadyotaprabhayā jitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca iyaṃ śakyate jetum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ vaḥ śaṅkayā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭā kena śaraj-jyotsnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kha-dyota-prabhayā jitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā vijayamāneyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anekaṃ nartakīśatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭā saṃbhāvayāmy asyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena nṛttaguṇān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā vijayamāna īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-ekaṃ nartakī-śatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭā saṃbhāvayāmy asyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena nṛtta-guṇān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhābhimukho yāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāvadhānaṃ śṛṇomy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvaj jaya jayety uccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimuktaḥ prekṣakair dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukha-abhimukho yāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-avadhānaṃ śṛṇomy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvaj jaya jaya ity uccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimuktaḥ prekṣakair dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>raṅgād dṛṣṭā ca niryāntī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bādhyamāneva sā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dainyavepathuvaivarṇya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣādaiḥ sahajair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>raṅgād dṛṣṭā ca niryāntī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bādhyamāna īva sā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dainya-vepathu-vaivarṇya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣādaiḥ saha-jair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato visarjitāsthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>namaskṛtya mahīpatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svam āvāsaṃ vrajāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntācintāpuraḥsaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato visarjita-āsthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>namas-kṛtya mahī-patim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svam āvāsaṃ vrajāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntā-cintā-puraḥ-saraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhaṃ cābravaṃ kasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām idānīm upekṣase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy ādeśam upekṣante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvādṛśā mādṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhaṃ ca abravaṃ kasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām idānīm upekṣase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy ādeśam upekṣante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvā-dṛśā- mā-dṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam aparaḥ kaścit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyayārthaṃ visarjyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śraddhāsyati na me vākyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipralabdhā hi sā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam aparaḥ kaś-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyaya-arthaṃ visarjyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śraddhāsyati na me vākyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipralabdhā hi sā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣām anyatamaṃ yāhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītveti mayodite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>marubhūtika evātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yogya ity ayam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣām anyatamaṃ yāhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītva īti maya ūdite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>marubhūtika eva atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yogya ity ayam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ hariśikhas tāvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītyā vakragatiḥ kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apāyaśatam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadācij jālam ālikhet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ hariśikhas tāvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītyā vakra-gatiḥ kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apāya-śatam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadā-cij jālam ālikhet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ kaṣṭatame bālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyasanānāṃ catuṣṭaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatpradhānastriyas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājaputraḥ pravartyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ kaṣṭatame bālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyasanānāṃ catuṣṭaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat-pradhāna-striyas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāja-putraḥ pravartyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam aṅgulibhaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicāryālīkapaṇḍitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vihanyād api naḥ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād eṣa na yujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam aṅguli-bhaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicāryā alīka-paṇḍitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vihanyād api naḥ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād eṣa na yujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantako 'pi bālatvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūḍhaḥ śūnyamukho yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād evaṃvidhe kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niyogaṃ nāyam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantako 'pi bālatvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūḍhaḥ śūnya-mukho yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād evaṃ-vidhe kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niyogaṃ na ayam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vikramaikarasatvāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samartho marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyastasāhasas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eṣa prasthāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vikrama-eka-rasatvāc ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samartho marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyasta-sāhasas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eṣa prasthāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tau sahitau yātau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cirāt tu marubhūtikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptaṃ hariśikho 'pṛcchat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vṛttaṃ bhavator iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tau sahitau yātau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cirāt tu marubhūtikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptaṃ hariśikho 'pṛcchat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vṛttaṃ bhavator iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam āvayos tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>veśamadhena gacchatoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyāty abhimukhī yaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saiva yāti parāṅmukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam āvayos tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>veśa-madhena gacchatoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyāty abhimukhī ya aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa aiva yāti parāṅ-mukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhañjantī cāṅgulīḥ krodhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vadaty āraktalocanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na spraṣṭavyo na saṃbhāṣyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ pāpavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhañjantī ca aṅgulīḥ krodhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vadaty ārakta-locanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na spraṣṭavyo na saṃbhāṣyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ pāpavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kruddhadauvārikākrānta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>hāṭakastambhatoraṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kakṣyādvāraiḥ praviṣṭau svaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthānam aryasutāsthitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kruddha-dauvārika-ākrānta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>hāṭaka-stambha-toraṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kakṣyā-dvāraiḥ praviṣṭau svaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthānam arya-sutā-āsthitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatraikā dārikāvocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikāḥ paśyatādbhutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūrtenānena cāturyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomayaṃ pāyasīkṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ekā dārika āvocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikāḥ paśyata adbhutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūrtena anena cāturyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>go-mayaṃ pāyasī-kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aparādho 'yam etāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarpaḥ prāṇaharaḥ kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam eva paśyatānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācālena guṇīkṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aparādho 'yam etāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarpaḥ prāṇa-haraḥ kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam eva paśyata anena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācālena guṇī-kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vandamāno yadā kopāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāminyā nābhinanditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhrāntaś ca vilakṣaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā tām āha gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vandamāno yadā kopāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāminyā na abhinanditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhrāntaś ca vilakṣaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā tām āha gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manye niṣkāraṇaṃ kopaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devyāḥ ko nāma mādṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sevakaḥ paricittajñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāminaṃ kopayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manye niṣ-kāraṇaṃ kopaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devyāḥ ko nāma mā-dṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sevakaḥ paricitta-jñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāminaṃ kopayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathānyatamayā kopāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tālavṛntabhṛtoditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathaṃ niṣkāraṇo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim idaṃ laghu kāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatha ānyatamayā kopāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāla-vṛnta-bhṛta ūditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathaṃ niṣ-kāraṇo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim idaṃ laghu kāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utkaṇṭhādarśam icchantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasyāpi cirakāṅkṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayā nartayatā kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim iyaṃ sukham āsitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utkaṇṭhā ādarśam icchantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasya api cira-kāṅkṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayā nartayatā kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim iyaṃ sukham āsitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā tad gataṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmī kiṃ karaṇaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyann abhimukhaṃ prītyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa tathā vimukhīkṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā tad gataṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmī kiṃ karaṇaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyann abhimukhaṃ prītyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa tathā vi-mukhī-kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavān paśyatu vā mā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvadvidheyo yuvā janaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvam icchasi jayaṃ yasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim asau na parājitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavān paśyatu vā mā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvad-vidheyo yuvā janaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvam icchasi jayaṃ yasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim asau na parājitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato bhiyāvanamitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukham unnamya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uktavān paśyatānarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>doṣo bhūto guṇo 'pi naḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato bhiya āvanamitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukham unnamya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uktavān paśyata an-arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>doṣo bhūto guṇo 'pi naḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi prāk svāminī nṛtyet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā rājā sutoṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadācid itarāṃ naiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyed vṛttakutūhalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi prāk svāminī nṛtyet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā rājā su-toṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadā-cid itarāṃ na eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyed vṛtta-kutūhalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā ca guṇavidveṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jano vaktā bhaved yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pakṣapātān narendreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭā madanamañjukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadā ca guṇa-vidveṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jano vaktā bhaved yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pakṣa-pātān nara-indreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭā madanamañjukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itarā yadi nṛtyantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena dṛṣṭā bhavet tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>norvaśīm api paśyet saḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuto madanamañjukām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itarā yadi nṛtyantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena dṛṣṭā bhavet tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na urvaśīm api paśyet saḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuto madanamañjukām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prītyā yaś conmukhaḥ paśyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtaḥ svāmī parāṅmukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayopāyaḥ prayukto 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham ity avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prītyā yaś ca unmukhaḥ paśyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtaḥ svāmī parāṅ-mukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maya ūpāyaḥ prayukto 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham ity avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na suyāmunadantāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śakyaḥ kartuṃ parābhavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtānukaraṇaiḥ sākṣād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bharatenāpi nṛtyatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na suyāmunadantāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śakyaḥ kartuṃ parā-bhavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛta-anukaraṇaiḥ sākṣād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bharatena api nṛtyatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aryaputre tu vimukhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhiḥ sā parājitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahajair iva vaivarṇya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivādasvedavepanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arya-putre tu vimukhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhiḥ sā parājitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahajair iva vaivarṇya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivāda-sveda-vepanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena bravīmi sevāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāti yady aparādhatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaktyārādhitabhartāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sevakā hanta duḥsthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena bravīmi seva āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāti yady aparādhatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhakty-ārādhita-bhartāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sevakā- hanta duḥ-sthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athavā sāparādho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūtaḥ saṃmānam arhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃdeśaśravaṇāt tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃmānayata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athavā sa-aparādho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūtaḥ saṃmānam arhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃdeśa-śravaṇāt tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃmānayata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sātra parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasādaviśadānanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>īṣadvihasitajyotsnā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>salilasnapitādharā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sa ātra parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasāda-viśada-ānanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>īṣad-vihasita-jyotsnā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>salila-snapita-adharā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi candramukhaṃ mā sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhaṃ puruṣaṃ vada</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi vatseśvarāsannāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyante strīsuhṛddruhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi candra-mukhaṃ mā sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhaṃ puruṣaṃ vada</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi vatsa-īśvara-āsannāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyante strī-suhṛd-druhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anālāpena yac cāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam āyāsito mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kṣamasva na hi svāsthā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bādhante tvādṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-ālāpena yac ca asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam āyāsito mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kṣamasva na hi sva-āsthā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bādhante tvā-dṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sā gomukhenoktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draṣṭum icchati vaḥ priyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃdehaś ced iyaṃ mudrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadīyā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sā gomukhena uktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draṣṭum icchati vaḥ priyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃdehaś ced iyaṃ mudrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadīyā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ kumbhakārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>koṭir vasati vaḥ pure</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>koṭiḥ kim iti nānītā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>na hi te kṣīṇamṛttikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ kumbha-kārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>koṭir vasati vaḥ pure</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>koṭiḥ kim iti nā anītā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>na hi te kṣīṇa-mṛttikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ kena vānītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mudrā vā mṛttikāmayī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy ārabhyamahākāryāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramādyanti sacetasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ kena vā ānītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mudrā vā mṛttikā-mayī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy ārabhya-mahā-ākāryāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramādyanti sa-cetasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaugandharāyaṇasutaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyaṃ mitraṃ priyasya vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāminā preṣitaḥ prītyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛśyatāṃ marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaugandharāyaṇa-sutaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyaṃ mitraṃ priyasya vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāminā preṣitaḥ prītyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛśyatāṃ marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha devī namaskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītā vijñāpitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat saṃdiśati naḥ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmabhyaṃ tan niśāmyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha devī namas-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītā vijñāpitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat saṃdiśati naḥ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmabhyaṃ tan niśāmyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>preritaḥ tvām ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena lakṣmīm ivālasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍatāsmadvidhair eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vilakṣaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>preritaḥ tvām ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena lakṣmīm iva alasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍata āsmad-vidhair eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vilakṣaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasthitāyāṃ tato devyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āha māṃ padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ prasādhyate yāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvad āstāṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasthitāyāṃ tato devyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āha māṃ padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ prasādhyate yāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvad āstāṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devyā saha praviśyāntar</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhūrtād iva sā tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āha prakṛṣṭapramudā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praphullanayanotpalā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devyā saha praviśya antar</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhūrtād iva sā tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āha prakṛṣṭa-pramudā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praphulla-nayana-utpalā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā kaliṅgasenāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā gatvā rumaṇvate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāpi bhūmipataye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛttānto 'yaṃ niveditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā kaliṅgasenāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā gatvā rumaṇvate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena api bhūmi-pataye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛtta-anto 'yaṃ niveditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ kim ihākhyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taruṇo nanu dārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvalokasukhāny eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād anubhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ kim ihā akhyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taruṇo nanu dārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīva-loka-sukhāny eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād anubhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>seyaṃ rājñābhyanujñātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guruṇā manmathena ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyam āyāti te paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātu tāvad bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa īyaṃ rājña ābhyanujñātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guruṇā manmathena ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyam āyāti te paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātu tāvad bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha praviśya saṃbhrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratīhārī nyavedayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sayāno gomukhaḥ prāha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>laghu śrāvaya mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha praviśya saṃbhrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratīhārī nyavedayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-yāno gomukhaḥ prāha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>laghu śrāvaya mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ gomukhas tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekākī praviśatv iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa praviśyoktavān dvāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devī kiṃ vidhṛteti mām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ gomukhas tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekākī praviśatv iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa praviśya uktavān dvāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devī kiṃ vidhṛta īti mām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ajñātapramadāsaṅgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākulībhūtamānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuru nāgarakaṃ tāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaṃ mām ity aham uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-jñāta-pramadā-āsaṅgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākulī-bhūta-mānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuru nāgarakaṃ tāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaṃ mām ity aham uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ yuddhavelāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>damyante turagā iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad etad ghuṣyate loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad etat tathyatāṃ gatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ yuddha-velāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>damyante tura-gā- iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad etad ghuṣyate loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad etat tathyatāṃ gatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na nāgarakatāṃ prāptum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upadeśena śakyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ hi mokṣavidyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayogāvṛttisādhanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na nāgarakatāṃ prāptum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upadeśena śakyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ hi mokṣa-vidya īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayoga-āvṛtti-sādhanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃkṣepatas tu vakṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yad devī kariṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat tad evānukuryās tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣo hi labhate śriyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃkṣepatas tu vakṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yad devī kariṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat tad eva anukuryās tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣo hi labhate śriyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuśiṣya sa mām evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niryāyānīya ca priyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhaṃ supyāstam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathāsvaṃ sasuhṛdgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuśiṣya sa mām evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niryāyā anīya ca priyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhaṃ supyā astam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā-svaṃ sa-suhṛd-gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ praviśya dayitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām ardhākṣṇā niraikṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtaṃ tathaiva ca mayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanditena ca vanditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ praviśya dayitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām ardha akṣṇā niraikṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtaṃ tatha aiva ca mayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanditena ca vanditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā yad yad evāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anayā kāritas tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad evānukaromi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nartanācāryaśiṣyavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā yad yad eva aham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anayā kāritas tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad eva anukaromi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nartana-ācārya-śiṣyavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha buddhvānukūlaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyam anvarthavedinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smitvā sotkamparomāñcaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāḍham aṅgam apīḍayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha buddhva ānukūlaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyam anv-artha-vedinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smitvā sa-utkampa-romāñcaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāḍham aṅgam apīḍayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato 'ham anapekṣyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatkṛtānukṛtakramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśarīrasya kasyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gato bhūtasya vaśyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato 'ham an-apekṣya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat-kṛta-anukṛta-kramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-śarīrasya kasya api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gato bhūtasya vaśyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>strīpuṃsatām āgatayor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anabhipretanidrayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradoṣa eva kṣaṇadā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣīṇā kṣaṇavad āvayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>strī-puṃsatām āgatayor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-abhipreta-nidrayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradoṣa eva kṣaṇadā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣīṇā kṣaṇavad āvayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prātaḥ pravahaṇenaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyām ādāya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātur evānayad gehaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manmānasapuraḥsarām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prātaḥ pravahaṇena eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyām ādāya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātur evā anayad gehaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>man-mānasa-puraḥ-sarām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vardhamānarater evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atiyāteṣu keṣucit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dineṣu mama saṃprāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>senānīr idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vardhamāna-rater evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atiyāteṣu keṣu-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dineṣu mama saṃprāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>senā-nīr idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adyāṣṭāsu prayāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhūrteṣu pravakṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mauhūrtānumato rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rātreḥ śāntipuraḥsaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adya aṣṭāsu prayāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhūrteṣu pravakṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mauhūrta-anumato rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rātreḥ śānti-puraḥ-saram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tārayiṣyāmi yamunām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ yātrāgataṃ janam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmābhir api kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tad ājñāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tārayiṣyāmi yamunām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ yātrā-gataṃ janam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmābhir api kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tad ājñāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ gomukho gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmān vijñāpayiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti tasmin nate mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhena niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ gomukho gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmān vijñāpayiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti tasmin nate mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhena niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adha sakāmukagaṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvo gantā gaṇikāgaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenaiva sahitā yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gantāraḥ śanakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adha sa-kāmuka-gaṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvo gantā gaṇikā-gaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena eva sahitā- yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gantāraḥ śanakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhena tu vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathite 'smin rumaṇvate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratiṣṭhe sasuhṛt prātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭhato janasaṃhateḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhena tu vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathite 'smin rumaṇvate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratiṣṭhe sa-suhṛt prātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭhato jana-saṃhateḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca krīḍāgṛhaṃ prāpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalpitaṃ yamunātaṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divasaṃ gamayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ triyāmāmukhotsukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca krīḍā-gṛhaṃ prāpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalpitaṃ yamunā-taṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divasaṃ gamayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ tri-yāmā-mukha-utsukaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhānītayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsitvā kāntayā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niśāyāṃ yātakalpāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ rudatīm imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukha-ānītayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsitvā kāntayā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niśāyāṃ yāta-kalpāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ rudatīm imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā saṃbhrāntacetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadā noktavatī kiṃcit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadānyā dārikābravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā saṃbhrānta-cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadā na uktavatī kiṃ-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tada ānyā dārika ābravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apaiti guṇavatsaṅgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>doṣo doṣavatām kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṇikāśabdadoṣas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nainām adyāpi muñcati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apaiti guṇavat-saṅgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>doṣo doṣavatām kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṇikā-śabda-doṣas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na enām adya api muñcati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāśirājasya yā kanyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛtā tubhyaṃ purodhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyāś cāmaradhāriṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavitavyaṃ kilānayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāśi-rājasya yā kanyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛtā tubhyaṃ puro-dhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyāś cāmara-dhāriṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavitavyaṃ kila anayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>seyam utprekṣya tad duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāruṇaṃ maraṇād api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣapānakṛtotsāhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hātum icchaty asūn iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa īyam utprekṣya tad duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāruṇaṃ maraṇād api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣa-pāna-kṛta-utsāhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hātum icchaty asūn iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktam aham apy aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvadviyogarujāturam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nityotkṣapitam akṣībaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaktvā sthāsyāmy avedanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktam aham apy aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvad-viyoga-rujā-āturam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nitya-utkṣapitam a-kṣībaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaktvā sthāsyāmy a-vedanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity asminn eva samaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāptā hariśikhādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛttāntam evam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīṣaṇaṃ sabhiyo 'bhavan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity asminn eva samaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāptā- hariśikha-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛtta-antam evam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīṣaṇaṃ sa-bhiyo 'bhavan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃbhāṣya suhṛdāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocan marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vayam eva v.isaṃ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pibāmaḥ kalpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃbhāṣya suhṛdāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocan marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vayam eva v.isaṃ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pibāmaḥ kalpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kvāsau saṃprati gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo hi mūlam anarthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa tāvat pāyyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva asau saṃprati gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo hi mūlam an-arthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa tāvat pāyyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena gomukham āhvātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prahitāgatya dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīd gomukho vakti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ mayātaḥ prayojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena gomukham āhvātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prahitā āgatya dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīd gomukho vakti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ maya ātaḥ prayojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrghajīvitanāmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhyāyaṃ ciravismṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham adhyetum ārabhdo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaidyād prāṇapradād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrgha-jīvita-nāmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhyāyaṃ cira-vismṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham adhyetum ārabhdo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaidyād prāṇa-pradād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhenoktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kruddhena marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>preryamāṇaṃ galāṣṭrābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śīghram ānaya taṃ śaṭham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhena uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kruddhena marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>preryamāṇaṃ galā-āṣṭrābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śīghram ānaya taṃ śaṭham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.96'>
<l><note>The arrival of Gomukha and the beginning of Hariśikhaś speech is missing</note> ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.96'>
<lg>
<l><note>The arrival of Gomukha and the beginning of Hariśikhaś speech is missing</note> ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tvayā ghaṭito 'narthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmino jīvitaḥ sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāminyā saha saṃyogaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'yam evaṃ vijṛmbhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tvayā ghaṭito 'n-arthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmino jīvitaḥ sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāminyā saha saṃyogaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'yam evaṃ vijṛmbhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt so 'yam āyāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vādaḥ saṃprati satyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvariṣyāmīti saṃcintya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇḍaṃ pibati muṇḍitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt so 'yam āyāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vādaḥ saṃprati satyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvariṣyāmi iti saṃcintya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇḍaṃ pibati muṇḍitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kālas tāvad āyātu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāminī yad viśaṅkitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatraiva vidyāma nyañco</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāsyāmas tyajyatāṃ tvarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kālas tāvad āyātu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāminī yad viśaṅkitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra eva vidyāma nyañco</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāsyāmas tyajyatāṃ tvarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vālaṃ pralāpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahīpālaṃ tapantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpayatu tenāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattaḥ pūrvam ayaṃ varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha va ālaṃ pralāpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahī-pālaṃ tapantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpayatu tena asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattaḥ pūrvam ayaṃ varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aprasaṅge 'pi bhavatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryā vijñāpinā mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddhiṃ yāsyati cāvaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma śaṅkāṃ karod iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-prasaṅge 'pi bhavatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryā vijñāpinā mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddhiṃ yāsyati ca a-vaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma śaṅkāṃ karod iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itīmām anukūlābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāgbhir āśyāsya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātur evānayan mūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśāma tataḥ purīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti imām anukūlābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāgbhir āśyāsya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātur evā anayan mūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśāma tataḥ purīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kumāravaṭakāsthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayānūktas tapantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhena yad ākhyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat kāryaṃ sādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kumāra-vaṭakā-sthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya ānūktas tapantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhena yad ākhyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat kāryaṃ sādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantakas tu sāsphoṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ siddhim iti bruvan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā rājakulaṃ tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgatyedam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantakas tu sa-āsphoṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ siddhim iti bruvan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā rāja-kulaṃ tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgatya idam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājapādair ahaṃ pṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāta kiṃ kriyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śālīnena mayāpy uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>modako dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāja-pādair ahaṃ pṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāta kiṃ kriyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śālīnena maya āpy uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>modako dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ mālāphalādīni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niḥsārāṇi tapantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yācate sma prahīṇatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatvā gatvā mahīpatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ mālā-phala-ādīni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niḥ-sārāṇi tapantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yācate sma prahīṇatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatvā gatvā mahī-patim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_11.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saśarīrayā kṣaṇam iva kṣaṇadāḥ kṣapayan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha viśarīrayā dayitayā virasān divasān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dinarajanīvihāraviparītam aham caritai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rathacaraṇāhvayasya caritāni viḍambitavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_11.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti sa-śarīrayā kṣaṇam iva kṣaṇadāḥ kṣapayan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha vi-śarīrayā dayitayā vi-rasān divasān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dina-rajanī-vihāra-viparītam aham caritai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratha-caraṇa-āhvayasya caritāni viḍambitavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ kṛtakartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhāsīnam aharmukhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vādī jita ivācchāyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trapayā gomukho 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ kṛta-kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukha-āsīnam ahar-mukhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vādī jita iva a-cchāyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trapayā gomukho 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham aryasutāṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ svagṛham āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato 'pi vandituṃ devyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>narendrāntaḥpuraṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham arya-sutāṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ sva-gṛham āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato 'pi vandituṃ devyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nara-indra-antaḥ-puraṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vanditā ca vihasyāha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī padmāvatī yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃkāraṇaṃ vadhūr adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsmān āyāti vanditum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vanditā ca vihasyā aha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī padmāvatī yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ-kāraṇaṃ vadhūr adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na asmān āyāti vanditum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātrā te kiṃ na muktaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vādyāpi vibudhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kopitā vā bhaved bhartrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiṣṭā duścaritair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātrā te kiṃ na mukta aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na va ādya api vibudhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kopitā vā bhaved bhartrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiṣṭā duś-caritair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāgat hatoraskā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krandantī padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāsti naḥ svāminīty uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devyor nipatitā puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā agat- hata-uras-kā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krandantī padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na asti naḥ svāmini īty uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devyor nipatitā puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato devyau tataḥ śeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśeṣam avarodhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājā ca śrutavṛttāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāsthāno dhairyam atyajat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato devyau tataḥ śeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-śeṣam avarodhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājā ca śruta-vṛtta-antaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-āsthāno dhairyam atyajat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prāpyācirāt saṃjñāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māgadhyā padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathaṃ jānāsi nāstīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭācaṣṭa niśāmyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prāpya a-cirāt saṃjñāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māgadhyā padmadevikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathaṃ jānāsi na asti iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭā ācaṣṭa niśāmyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathaiva gomukhenāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svam āvāsaṃ praveśitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathaiva kagiti ghrāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gandho 'smābhir amānuṣaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatha aiva gomukhena asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svam āvāsaṃ praveśitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatha aiva kagiti ghrāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gandho 'smābhir a-mānuṣaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akasmāc ca kṣaṇaṃ nidrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchāmaḥ pratibudhya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūnyām īkṣāmahe śayyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśrīkāṃ nalinīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-kasmāc ca kṣaṇaṃ nidrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchāmaḥ pratibudhya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūnyām īkṣāmahe śayyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-śrīkāṃ nalinīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hā heti vikruṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samūrchāḥ kṣaṇam āsmahe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kvacic ca vicinvatyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmaḥ svāminīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hā ha īti vikruṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-mūrchāḥ kṣaṇam āsmahe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kva-cic ca vicinvatyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmaḥ svāminīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaliṅgasenayā tv atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śokagadgadayoditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ tad āgataṃ manya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durvidyādharaceṣṭitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaliṅgasenayā tv atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śoka-gadgadaya ūditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ tad āgataṃ manya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-vidyā-dhara-ceṣṭitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālikām aham ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvaṃ madanamañcukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harmyāgre krīḍayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>candrikāsaṅgaśītale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālikām aham ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvaṃ madanamañcukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harmya-agre krīḍayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>candrikā-āsaṅga-śītale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ehi vidyādharā ehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhāṇemāṃ surūpikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekām eva mayā labdhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutāṃ durlabhikām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ehi vidyā-dhara-ā ehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhāṇa imāṃ su-rūpikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekām eva mayā labdhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutāṃ dur-labhikām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś carmāsikeyūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>hārādikarabhāsuraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avātarad divaḥ ko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divyagandhasragambaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś carma-asi-keyūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>hāra-ādi-kara-bhāsuraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avātarad divaḥ ko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divya-gandha-srag-ambaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dūrād eva ca māṃ bhītāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā bhaiṣīr iti sāntvayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gambhīradhvanivitrasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanayām idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dūrād eva ca māṃ bhītāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā bhaiṣīr iti sāntvayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gambhīra-dhvani-vitrasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanayām idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi mahyam iyaṃ dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyena tanayā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato muñca nayāmy enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyāsabhūtā hi kanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi mahyam iyaṃ dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyena tanayā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato muñca nayāmy enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyāsa-bhūtā hi kanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāmnā mānasavego 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyādharagaṇādhipaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvavijñeyavijñāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>manojvalitadhīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāmnā mānasavego 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyā-dhara-gaṇa-adhipaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-vijñeya-vijñāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mano-jvalita-dhīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anicchantī tatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃnidhau ciram āsitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayatnād dhairyam ādhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pragalbheva tam abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-icchantī tatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃnidhau ciram āsitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayatnād dhairyam ādhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pragalbha īva tam abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arhaty avaśyam eveyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īdṛśī tvādṛśaṃ patim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na punar dīyate tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālikā śaiśavād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arhaty a-vaśyam eva iyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īdṛśī tvādṛśaṃ patim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na punar dīyate tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālikā śaiśavād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mām abhivādyāsāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ulkāsaṃghātabhāsuraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyamāno mahāvegaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇenāntarhito 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mām abhivādya asāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ulkā-saṃghāta-bhāsuraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyamāno mahā-vegaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇena antar-hito 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena bravīmi tenādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat smṛtvā kṣudrabuddhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharādhamenāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nītā yadi bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena bravīmi tena adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat smṛtvā kṣudra-buddhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dhara-adhamena asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nītā yadi bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā dṛśyate neha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad atrānantaraṃ nyāyyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad anuṣṭhīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā dṛśyate na iha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad atra an-antaraṃ nyāyyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad anuṣṭhīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ samutpatann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śokaḥ krodhena māmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>preritaḥ pavaneneva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabalena balāhakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ samutpatann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śokaḥ krodhena māmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>preritaḥ pavanena iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabalena balāhakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>strītaskara durācāra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūḍha mānasavegaka</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭha tiṣṭha kva yāsīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prālapaṃ gaganonmukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>strī-taskara dur-ācāra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūḍha mānasavegaka</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭha tiṣṭha kva yāsi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prālapaṃ gagana-unmukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yugapat krodhaśokābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śoṣito 'haṃ krameṇa ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathānilatuṣārābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiśire kamalākaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuga-pat krodha-śokābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śoṣito 'haṃ krameṇa ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatha ānila-tuṣārābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiśire kamala-ākaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tu nṛpāhutaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāgatyedam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛttānto 'yaṃ mayoditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tu nṛ-pa-āhutaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāgatya idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛtta-anto 'yaṃ maya ūditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃbhramavisrastam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṣann uttarāmbaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣādākulito rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthito yuṣmadantikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃbhrama-visrastam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṣann uttara-ambaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣāda-ākulito rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthito yuṣmad-antikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antare ca rumaṇvantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āha keyaṃ pramāditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvathā khyāpitaṃ lokair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatāṃ nītikauśalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antare ca rumaṇvantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āha ka īyaṃ pramāditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvathā khyāpitaṃ lokair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatāṃ nīti-kauśalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuktaṃ tadā yadālocya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahat sīdat prayojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipralabdho 'smi yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devyā vāsavadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuktaṃ tadā yadā ālocya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahat sīdat prayojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipralabdho 'smi yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devyā vāsavadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā dhriyamāṇe 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samarthasacive mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apanītā vadhūḥ kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālān mama sutād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā dhriyamāṇe 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samartha-sacive mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apanītā vadhūḥ kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālān mama sutād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tam āha nivartadhvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ tatra gatena vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmān dṛṣṭvā hi sa śiśuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇān api parityajet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tam āha nivartadhvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ tatra gatena vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmān dṛṣṭvā hi sa śiśuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇān api parityajet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ājñāpayatha māṃ yac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yac ca vijñāpayāmi vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnān āsane tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivṛtya sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ājñāpayatha māṃ yac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yac ca vijñāpayāmi vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnān āsane tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivṛtya sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upaviṣṭāya cācaṣṭa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuṭaṃ divyena sā hṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anāthāpi na vaḥ kācit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kenacit paribhūyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upaviṣṭāya cā acaṣṭa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuṭaṃ divyena sā hṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-nātha āpi na vaḥ kā-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kena-cit paribhūyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.34'>
