<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvad antaḥpurāṭavyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvac ca gṛhapakṣiṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāsty asau yo na cāsmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īkṣitaś cāracakṣuṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvad antaḥ-pura-aṭavyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvac ca gṛha-pakṣiṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na asty asau yo na ca asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īkṣitaś cāra-cakṣuṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśe tu na me prajñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kramate divyagocare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena vidyādhareṇāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛteti hṛdaye mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśe tu na me prajñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kramate divya-go-care</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena vidyā-dhareṇa asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛta īti hṛdaye mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā bhavatūdyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvarājaḥ parīkṣatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadācit kupitā bhartre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatrāsīta vadhūr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā bhavatu udyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuva-rājaḥ parīkṣatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadā-cit kupitā bhartre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatrā asīta vadhūr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kupitānāṃ hi bhartṛbhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrūyante kulayoṣitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhubhiḥ kathyamānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañca sthānāni tad yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kupitānāṃ hi bhartṛbhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrūyante kula-yoṣitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhubhiḥ kathyamānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañca sthānāni tad yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaśrūbhrātṛnanāndṛṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṛmitrasya vā gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣṭasaṃcāraśūnyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandiropavanāni vā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaśrū-bhrātṛ-nanāndṛṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṛ-mitrasya vā gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣṭa-saṃcāra-śūnyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandira-upavanāni vā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atrāntare kathitavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākhyānaṃ marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prastāve yan mayā pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrutaṃ tad avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atra antare kathitavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākhyānaṃ marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prastāve yan mayā pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrutaṃ tad avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭāvakrasya duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāvitrī nāma kanyakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīd yā caritākāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāvitrīm atiricyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭāvakrasya duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāvitrī nāma kanyakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīd yā carita-ākāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāvitrīm atiricyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭāvakram ayāciṣṭa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadācid ṛṣir aṅgirāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahmann akṛtadāro 'smi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutā me dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṣṭāvakram ayāciṣṭa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadā-cid ṛṣir aṅgirāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahmann a-kṛta-dāro 'smi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutā me dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd bhavataḥ ko 'nyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trailokye 'pi varo varaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu datteyam anyasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣamatāṃ bhagavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd bhavataḥ ko 'nyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trailokye 'pi varo varaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu datta īyam anyasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣamatāṃ bhagavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya bhrātā vṛṣo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa cāṅgirasam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amṛtā nāma duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama sā gṛhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya bhrātā vṛṣo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa ca aṅgirasam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amṛtā nāma duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama sā gṛhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariṇīya tu tāṃ kanyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amṛtām amṛtopamām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmānam aṅgirā mene</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pītāmṛtam ivāmṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariṇīya tu tāṃ kanyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amṛtām a-mṛta-upamām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmānam aṅgirā mene</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pīta-a-mṛtam iva a-mṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā kadācit kathaṃcit taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāraṇe 'lpe 'pi pīḍitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upālabdhavatī nātham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṛṣiputrasya vallabhā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā kadā-cit kathaṃ-cit taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāraṇe 'lpe 'pi pīḍitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upālabdhavatī nātham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṛṣi-putrasya vallabhā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cakṣūraktena bhavatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāvitrī svayam arthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ tv anicchate tubhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitrā dattā balād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cakṣū--raktena bhavatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāvitrī svayam arthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ tv an-icchate tubhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitrā dattā balād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nānāvidhaiḥ sa śapathair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amṛtāṃ parisantvayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṃcid abhyanayat kālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekadāstaṃgate ravau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nānā-vidhaiḥ sa śapathair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amṛtāṃ parisantvayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṃ-cid abhyanayat kālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekada āstaṃ-gate ravau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścāt sandhyām upāsīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsīnaṃ maunadhāriṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apṛcchad amṛtāgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ dhyāyati bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścāt sandhyām upāsīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsīnaṃ mauna-dhāriṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apṛcchad amṛtā āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ dhyāyati bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vanditasaṃdhyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cirād uktaṃ nanu priye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devīṃ vihāya sāvitrīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim anyac cintayāmy aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vandita-saṃdhyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cirād uktaṃ nanu priye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devīṃ vihāya sāvitrīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim anyac cintayāmy aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sā śrutam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasminn āśramapādape</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devatābhyo namaskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīram udalambayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sā śrutam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasminn āśrama-pāda-pe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devatābhyo namas-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīram udalambayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākṛṣṭakaṇṭhapāśā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puraḥ praikṣata devatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyutpiṅgajaṭābhārāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sākṣamālākamaṇḍalum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākṛṣṭa-kaṇṭha-pāśā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puraḥ praikṣata devatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyut-piṅga-jaṭa-ābhārāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-akṣa-mālā-kamaṇḍalum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato dantaprabhājāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhāsitatapovanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devatāvocad amṛtām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amṛteneva siñcatī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato danta-prabhā-jāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhāsita-tapo-vanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devata āvocad amṛtām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-mṛtena iva siñcatī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putri mā sma tyaja prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dustyajān dharmasādhanān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>straiṇam ajñānam āśritya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtuṣṭo hi patis tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putri mā sma tyaja prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dus-tyajān dharma-sādhanān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>straiṇam a-jñānam āśritya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtuṣṭo hi patis tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāṣṭāvakrasya duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāvitrī tena cintitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tv ahaṃ brahmarudra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādisaptalokanamaskṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na aṣṭāvakrasya duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāvitrī tena cintitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tv ahaṃ brahma-rudra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādi-sapta-loka-namas-kṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā matprasādāt te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putri putro bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balena tapasā yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na samāno bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā mat-prasādāt te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putri putro bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balena tapasā yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na samāno bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti dattvā varaṃ tasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāvitrī divam āśrayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amṛtāpi gatāśaṅkā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartrā saha sameyuṣī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti dattvā varaṃ tasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāvitrī divam āśrayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amṛta āpi gata-āśaṅkā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartrā saha sameyuṣī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena bravīmi kupitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadācid amṛteva sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udyānaṃ praviśett tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam anviṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena bravīmi kupitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadā-cid amṛta īva sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udyānaṃ praviśett tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam anviṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāhaṃ śibikārūḍhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthito veśam asmṛtiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakṣuścetoharākārāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyan veśyāḥ samūhaśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ahaṃ śibikā-ārūḍhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthito veśam a-smṛtiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakṣuś-ceto-hara-ākārāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyan veśyāḥ samūhaśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama devībhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayogo 'yam anuṣṭhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api nāmāsya kasyāṃcit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>striyāṃ bhāvo bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama devībhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayogo 'yam anuṣṭhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api nāma asya kasyāṃ-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>striyāṃ bhāvo bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadāyaṃ mohasaṃkalpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na hi saṃkalpajanmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rater anyāsu saṃkalpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadāsu pravartate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tada āyaṃ moha-saṃkalpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na hi saṃkalpa-janmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rater anyāsu saṃkalpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadāsu pravartate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃkalpayann evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>acandrikam ivāmbaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāntāmātur gṛhaṃ kāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntāśūnyam upāgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃkalpayann evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-candrikam iva ambaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāntā-mātur gṛhaṃ kāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntā-śūnyam upāgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakāśān aprakāśāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradeśān bahuśo bahūn</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anviṣyanto bhramāma sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na cāpaśyāma tatra tām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakāśān a-prakāśāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradeśān bahuśo bahūn</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anviṣyanto bhramāma sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ca apaśyāma tatra tām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhoddiṣṭamārgaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviśya gṛhakānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛcchāmi sma priyāvārttāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sākṣiśākhāmṛgāṇḍajān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukha-uddiṣṭa-mārgaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviśya gṛha-kānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛcchāmi sma priyā-vārttāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-akṣi-śākhā-mṛga-aṇḍa-jān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kebhyaścit kupitaḥ śāpān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kebhyaścid vitaran karān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viḍambayann aśāstrajñam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity utkaṭarasaṃ naṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kebhyaś-cit kupitaḥ śāpān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kebhyaś-cid vitaran karān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viḍambayann a-śāstra-jñam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity utkaṭa-rasaṃ naṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athopagamya tvaritaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prahṛṣṭo marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aryaputrāryaduhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā dṛṣṭety abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha upagamya tvaritaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prahṛṣṭo marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arya-putra arya-duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā dṛṣṭa īty abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasya parāmṛjya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇinā vikasanmukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api satyam idaṃ saumya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syāt krīḍety aham abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasya parāmṛjya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇinā vikasan-mukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api satyam idaṃ saumya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syāt krīḍa īty aham abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt satyam apy etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍā yaiṣātiharṣajā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asatye hy atra yā krīḍā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad unmattavijṛmbhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt satyam apy etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍā ya aiṣa āti-harṣa-jā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-satye hy atra yā krīḍā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad unmatta-vijṛmbhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vālaṃ vimarśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahābhyudayavairiṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaritaṃ gamyatāṃ yasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nārtaḥ kālam udīkṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha va ālaṃ vimarśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-abhyudaya-vairiṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaritaṃ gamyatāṃ yasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nā artaḥ kālam udīkṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma tato gacchann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśokaśiśum agrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raktaṃ kusumasaṃghātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayam ābhūmipallavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma tato gacchann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśoka-śiśum agrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raktaṃ kusuma-saṃghātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayam ā-bhūmi-pallavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akāle kim aśokasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kusumānīti cintayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya skandhe hriyālīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ prāṇadāyinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-kāle kim aśokasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kusumāni iti cintayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya skandhe hriyā ālīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ prāṇa-dāyinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kiṃ citraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat pādasparśadohadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyaḥ kusumito 'śokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpya sarvāṅgasaṃgatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kiṃ citraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat pāda-sparśa-dohadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyaḥ kusumito 'śokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpya sarva-aṅga-saṃgatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam atra mahat citraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadālokitam etayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vanadevatayodyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakalaṃ na vijṛmbhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam atra mahat citraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadā ālokitam etayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vana-devataya ūdyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-kalaṃ na vijṛmbhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathācetanā vṛkṣāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntāyā darśane sati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>subhage nirvikāratvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgāratuṣabhasmavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvatha ā-cetanā- vṛkṣāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntāyā- darśane sati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-bhage nir-vikāratvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgāra-tuṣa-bhasmavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāliṅgitum ārabdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānurāgam ahaṃ ca tām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā cāṅgāni saṃhṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā tāvad iti vāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā aliṅgitum ārabdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-anurāgam ahaṃ ca tām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā ca aṅgāni saṃhṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā tāvad iti vāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasarabhaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vilakṣam upalakṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sābravīd aparodho 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aryaputreṇa mṛṣyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasara-bhaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vilakṣam upalakṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ābravīd aparodho 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arya-putreṇa mṛṣyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārādhitavatī yakṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ kanyā satī yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aryaputrasya bhūyāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dayitā paricārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārādhitavatī yakṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ kanyā satī yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arya-putrasya bhūyāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dayitā paricārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tubhyaṃ kārye ca saṃsiddhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śamīlājasugandhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānaṃ hastena dāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasīdatu bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tubhyaṃ kārye ca saṃsiddhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śamīlā-ja-su-gandhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānaṃ hastena dāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasīdatu bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca tasya prasādān me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātaḥ siddhiṃ manorathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyācitaṃ tu yakṣāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na mayā pratiyācitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca tasya prasādān me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātaḥ siddhiṃ mano-rathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyācitaṃ tu yakṣāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na mayā pratiyācitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenāhaṃ pānaśauṇḍena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītā dhanapateḥ sabhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛttāntaḥ kathitaś cāyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>athokto dhanadena saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ahaṃ pāna-śauṇḍena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītā dhana-pateḥ sabhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛtta-antaḥ kathitaś ca ayam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha ukto dhana-dena saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyācitam iyaṃ tubhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>acireṇaiva dāsyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītvā samarpaya kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dārakāya vadhūm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyācitam iyaṃ tubhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-cireṇa eva dāsyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītvā samarpaya kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dārakāya vadhūm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena cāham ihānītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaganāgamanāc ca me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīraṃ paruṣībhūtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāritā stha tato mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca aham ihā anītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gagana-āgamanāc ca me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīraṃ paruṣī-bhūtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāritā stha tato mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.82'>
<l><note>The first half of the verse is missing</note> |</l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai yakṣāya yuṣmābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa me saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.82'>
<lg>
<l><note>The first half of the verse is missing</note> |</l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai yakṣāya yuṣmābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa me saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsyai ganikādhyakṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājādeśaṃ nyavedayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adyārabhya kulastrītvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatīnāṃ bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asyai ganikā-adhyakṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja-ādeśaṃ nyavedayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adyā arabhya kula-strītvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatīnāṃ bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_12.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ cākarṇya mahāmanoratham idaṃ pūrṇaṃ cirāt kāṅkṣitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naiva prītivikāsihārihasitaṃ dhatte sma kāntāmukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yācñāvṛttikadarthitair bahubhir apy āptair na hi prārthakāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītiṃ yānti tathā yathā tanubhir apy arthaiḥ sukhābhyāgataiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_12.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ cā akarṇya mahā-mano-ratham idaṃ pūrṇaṃ cirāt kāṅkṣitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na eva prīti-vikāsi-hāri-hasitaṃ dhatte sma kāntā-mukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yācñā-vṛtti-kad-arthitair bahubhir apy āptair na hi prārthakāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītiṃ yānti tathā yathā tanubhir apy arthaiḥ sukha-abhyāgataiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato divasam āsitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntāmātur ahaṃ gṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyāṃ navavadhūveṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradoṣe pariṇītavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato divasam āsitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntā-mātur ahaṃ gṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyāṃ nava-vadhū-veṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradoṣe pariṇītavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasādād aryapādānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kulastrītvam upāgatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām ādāya svam āvāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛttotsavam āgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasādād arya-pādānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kula-strītvam upāgatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām ādāya svam āvāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛtta-utsavam āgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra sā sadhanādhyakṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ yakṣaṃ kusumādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyarcya pānadānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suduṣtoṣam atoṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra sā sa-dhana-adhyakṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ yakṣaṃ kusuma-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyarcya pāna-dānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-duṣ-toṣam atoṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padmarāgamayīṃ śuktiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padmarāgadravatviṣaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādāya madhunaḥ pūrṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato mām abravīt priyā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padma-rāga-mayīṃ śuktiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padma-rāga-drava-tviṣaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādāya madhunaḥ pūrṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato mām abravīt priyā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maṅgalānāṃ pradhānatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryasaṃsiddhidāyinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣā dhanapateḥ śeṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svādur āsvādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maṅgalānāṃ pradhānatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kārya-saṃsiddhi-dāyinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣā dhana-pateḥ śeṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svādur āsvādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktam ananujñātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tātapādair guṇān api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāhaṃ sevitum icchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punar vyasanaṃ mahat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktam an-anujñātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāta-pādair guṇān api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ahaṃ sevitum icchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punar vyasanaṃ mahat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sā dṛḍhasaṃrambhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śapathair avyatikramaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cirān niruttarīkṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām anicchum apāyayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sā dṛḍha-saṃrambhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śapathair a-vyatikramaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cirān nir-uttarī-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām an-icchum apāyayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pītaikamadhuśuktiṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ sāpṛcchat kṛtasmitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim āsvādam idaṃ pānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti pratyabravaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pīta-eka-madhu-śuktiṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ sa āpṛcchat kṛta-smitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim āsvādam idaṃ pānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti pratyabravaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āpāne madhurāsvādam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anusvāde tu tiktakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣaye kaṣāyakaṭukam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avacchede manāg iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āpāne madhura-āsvādam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anusvāde tu tiktakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣaye kaṣāya-kaṭukam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avacchede manāg iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravīd vyaktam adyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na jānītha rasaṃ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pīyatām iti pītaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punas tadvacanād mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravīd vyaktam adya api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na jānītha rasaṃ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pīyatām iti pītaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punas tad-vacanād mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ kīdṛśam ity asyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛcchatyai kathitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim artham api me cittaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatam asvasthatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ kī-dṛśam ity asyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛcchatyai kathitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim artham api me cittaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatam a-sva-sthatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktam aparāpy ekā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuktir āsvādyatāṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gamiṣyaty acirād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cittaṃ te svasthatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktam apara āpy ekā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuktir āsvādyatāṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gamiṣyaty a-cirād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cittaṃ te sva-sthatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām api ca pītāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ vegavadbhramān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taruprāsādaśailādīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthāvarān api jaṅgamān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām api ca pītāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ vegavad-bhramān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taru-prāsāda-śaila-ādīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthāvarān api jaṅgamān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā cāhaṃ tayopāyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>agrāmyaiḥ śapathādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anicchan pāyitaḥ pānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā tām apy apāyayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā ca ahaṃ taya ūpāyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-grāmyaiḥ śapatha-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-icchan pāyitaḥ pānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā tām apy apāyayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>balavadbhyām athākramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madena madanena ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad eva rucitam tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat taivāsmi pravartitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>balavadbhyām athā akramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madena madanena ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad eva rucitam tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat ta aiva asmi pravartitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ saṃtoṣayituṃ yakṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivāhaḥ kṛtrimaḥ kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena kṛtrimam evāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyātvaṃ pratipāditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ saṃtoṣayituṃ yakṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivāhaḥ kṛtrimaḥ kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena kṛtrimam eva asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyātvaṃ pratipāditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prātar upāgamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhugandhādhivāsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghrātvā hariśikho veśma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhrāntamatir uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prātar upāgamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhu-gandha-adhivāsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghrātvā hariśikho veśma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhrānta-matir uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apūrva iva gandho 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aryaputra vibhāvyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manye 'ryaputrayā yūyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anicchāḥ pāyitā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-pūrva iva gandho 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arya-putra vibhāvyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manye 'rya-putrayā yūyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>an-icchāḥ pāyitā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mayoktaḥ sakhe sakhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tavāhaṃ pāyito balāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavatāpi rucau satyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthīyatāṃ pīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa maya ūktaḥ sakhe sakhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tava ahaṃ pāyito balāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavata āpi rucau satyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthīyatāṃ pīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd vyasanagrāma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāmaṇyaṃ bhavatām api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānaṃ sādhu na paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punar mantriṇām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd vyasana-grāma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāma-ṇyaṃ bhavatām api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānaṃ sādhu na paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punar mantriṇām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktam aryapādeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samitreṣu samāśatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālayatsu kim asmākam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmabhir vañcitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktam arya-pādeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-mitreṣu samā-śatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālayatsu kim asmākam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmabhir vañcitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ mantrisacivair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijñāpyaṃ kāryam āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anuṣṭhāne punas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svātantryaṃ svāminām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ mantri-sacivair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijñāpyaṃ kāryam āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anuṣṭhāne punas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svā-tantryaṃ svāminām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ pibantaṃ sahāvābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālokya marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niḥśaṅkaḥ pātum ārabdhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tapantakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ pibantaṃ sahā avābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālokya marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niḥ-śaṅkaḥ pātum ārabdhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tapantakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājamānas tato raktair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgarāgasragambaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punar uktapriyālāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām avandata gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājamānas tato raktair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅga-rāga-srag-ambaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punar ukta-priya-ālāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām avandata gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam atyāsannam āsīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atimātrapriyaṃvadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pādau saṃvāhayantaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kruddho hariśikho 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam atyāsannam āsīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ati-mātra-priyaṃ-vadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pādau saṃvāhayantaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kruddho hariśikho 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>unmatta kim asaṃbaddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāṣamāṇaḥ puraḥ prabhoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udvejayasi bhartāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apasṛtyāsyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>unmatta kim a-saṃbaddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāṣamāṇaḥ puraḥ prabhoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udvejayasi bhartāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apasṛtyā asyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ mūrkha naivedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madasāmarthyajṛmbhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmino niḥsapatnau tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pādāv icchāmi sevitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ mūrkha na eva idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mada-sāmarthya-jṛmbhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmino niḥ-sa-patnau tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pādāv icchāmi sevitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā tūbhayavaitarddha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṛmūrdhabhir arcitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaviṣyatas tadāsmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sasapatnau bhaviṣyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā tu ubhaya-vaitarddha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṛ-mūrdhabhir arcitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaviṣyatas tada āsmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-sa-patnau bhaviṣyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaitarddhanāmagrahaṇāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smitasaṃdarśitaprītir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abravīt sāśrulocanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaitarddha-nāma-grahaṇāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smita-saṃdarśita-prītir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abravīt sa-aśru-locanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho cāturyamādhurya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradhānaguṇabhūṣaṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālāpā nirgatāḥ saumyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhasya mukhād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho cāturya-mādhurya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pradhāna-guṇa-bhūṣaṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālāpā- nirgatāḥ saumyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhasya mukhād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ bhaṇa paśyāmas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayā kasmāc ciraṃ sthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko vā tavedam ākāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ujjvalaṃ kṛtavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ bhaṇa paśyāmas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayā kasmāc ciraṃ sthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko vā tava idam ākāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ujjvalaṃ kṛtavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ vayam āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māgadhyā rājasaṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājñāpitās tava bhrātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānam āsevitaṃ niśi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ vayam āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māgadhyā rāja-saṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājñāpitās tava bhrātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānam āsevitaṃ niśi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena pānagṛhāt pānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svādyamānaṃ svadeta yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayam āsvādya tad bhrātre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvayā prasthāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena pāna-gṛhāt pānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svādyamānaṃ svadeta yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayam āsvādya tad bhrātre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvayā prasthāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ devīdvayenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maṇḍayitvā svapāṇibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānāgārāya gamitaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānādhyakṣapuraḥsaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ devī-dvayena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maṇḍayitvā sva-pāṇibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāna-āgārāya gamitaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāna-adhyakṣa-puraḥ-saraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra cāsvādayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat tat pānaṃ manāṅ manāk</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>matto 'haṃ preṣayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmabhyam api saṃtatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra cā asvādayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat tat pānaṃ manāṅ manāk</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>matto 'haṃ preṣayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmabhyam api saṃtatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt pibata niḥśaṅkāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāpiśāyanam āsavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujnātāḥ sahāmātyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gurubhir muditair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt pibata niḥ-śaṅkāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāpiśāyanam āsavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujnātāḥ saha-āmātyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gurubhir muditair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sevamānas tataḥ pānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakāntāmitramaṇḍalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divasān gamayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prahṛṣṭaparicārakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sevamānas tataḥ pānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-kāntā-mitra-maṇḍalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divasān gamayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prahṛṣṭa-paricārakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācid ekaparyaṅka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthitā madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmābhiḥ sukhasuptāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na draṣṭavyety abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cid eka-paryaṅka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthitā madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmābhiḥ sukha-supta āhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na draṣṭavya īty abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīt kim ity eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivārayati mām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat satyaṃ sutarāṃ cetaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kutūhalataraṅgitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīt kim ity eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivārayati mām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat satyaṃ su-tarāṃ cetaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kutūhala-taraṅgitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācid ardharātre 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthāvarākārajaṅgame</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāne pariṇatiṃ yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratibuddhaḥ pipāsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cid ardha-rātre 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthāvara-ākāra-jaṅgame</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāne pariṇatiṃ yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratibuddhaḥ pipāsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ parijanaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasuptam abhavan mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yuktaṃ sukhasuptasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatror api nibodhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ parijanaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasuptam abhavan mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yuktaṃ sukha-suptasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatror api nibodhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryā punaḥ śarīrārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ato madanamañjukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratibodhya jalaṃ yāce</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad dhi me na virūpyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryā punaḥ śarīra-ardham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ato madanamañjukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratibodhya jalaṃ yāce</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad dhi me na virūpyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti nirdhārya tasyāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā dṛṣṭir nipātitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvad anyaiva sā kāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nārīrūpaiva candrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti nirdhārya tasyāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā dṛṣṭir nipātitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvad anya aiva sā ka āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nārī-rūpa aiva candrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kiṃ yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ gandharvī kim apsarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mānuṣī syāt kulastrī syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṇikā syād iyaṃ na hi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kiṃ yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ gandharvī kim apsarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mānuṣī syāt kula-strī syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṇikā syād iyaṃ na hi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasmād anyatamāpy āsāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lakṣaṇair nopapadyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād vidyādharī prāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāpi kenāpi hetunā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasmād anyatama āpy āsāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lakṣaṇair na upapadyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād vidyā-dharī prāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ka āpi kena api hetunā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti nirṇīya nipuṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kariṇītālukomalau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍhaṃ saṃvāhayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyāś caraṇapallavau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti nirṇīya nipuṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kariṇī-tālu-komalau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍhaṃ saṃvāhayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyāś caraṇa-pallavau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu saṃtyījatā nidrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyaś caraṇapīḍayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām ālokya tathābhūtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhītā bhūmāv upāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu saṃtyījatā nidrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyaś caraṇa-pīḍayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām ālokya tathā-bhūtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhītā bhūmāv upāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca na kartavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aryaputreṇa sāhasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvādṛśām anukampyo hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>balināṃ pramadājanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca na kartavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arya-putreṇa sāhasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvā-dṛśām anukampyo hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>balināṃ pramadā-janaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śrūtveti yat satyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātmany evāsmi lajjitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ kāriṇam apy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhāvayati mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śrūtva īti yat satyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātmany eva asmi lajjitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ kāriṇam apy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhāvayati mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā māṃ lajjitam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānusaṃnihitānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lajjām apaharantīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaritedam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā māṃ lajjitam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānu-saṃnihita-ānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lajjām apaharanti iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvarita īdam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatāṃ cāpriyaṃ sā te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyā madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvadguṇasmaraṇavyagrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nayate divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatāṃ ca a-priyaṃ sā te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyā madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvad-guṇa-smaraṇa-vyagrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nayate divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_13.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīn me manasi hṛtā na sā mṛtā sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā dṛṣṭer vrajati na gocaraṃ priyā me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyotsnā hi sphuṭadhavalāpi kaumudīndor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>andhānāṃ bahalatamomalīmasaiva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_13.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīn me manasi hṛtā na sā mṛtā sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā dṛṣṭer vrajati na gocaraṃ priyā me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyotsnā hi sphuṭa-dhavala āpi kaumudi īndor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>andhānāṃ bahala-tamo-malī-masa aiva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tām abravaṃ bhīru</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvam eva hi mama priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathāpi tu vinodena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiṣṭhāmaḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tām abravaṃ bhīru</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvam eva hi mama priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatha āpi tu vinodena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiṣṭhāmaḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>grahītavyāni nāmāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurudevadvijanmanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmāt tena viśuddhyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svānam ācaritaṃ tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>grahītavyāni nāmāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guru-deva-dvi-janmanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmāt tena viśuddhy-arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svānam ācaritaṃ tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti merugiriprāṃśur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āṣāḍho nāma parvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūrapaṇḍitavittāḍhya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyādharakulālayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti meru-giri-prāṃśur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āṣāḍho nāma parvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūra-paṇḍita-vitta-āḍhya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyā-dhara-kula-ālayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra vidyādharasvāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vedavān vegavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaḥ kuberādhikasvo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niḥsva eva dinātyaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra vidyā-dhara-svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vedavān vegavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaḥ kubera-adhika-svo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niḥ-sva eva dina-atyaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāpi pṛthivī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahiṣī prāṃśuvaṃśajā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛṇāya manyate sthairyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā devīṃ pṛthivīm api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya api pṛthivī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahiṣī prāṃśu-vaṃśa-jā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛṇāya manyate sthairyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā devīṃ pṛthivīm api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau ca putram avindantau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ duḥkham atiṣṭhatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prauḍhāyā iva kanyāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitarau sadṛśaṃ varam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau ca putram a-vindantau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ duḥkham atiṣṭhatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prauḍhāyā- iva kanyāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitarau sa-dṛśaṃ varam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau manaḥputrikā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kulavidyāṃ sutārthinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārādhayitum ārabdhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayā coktaṃ prasannayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau manaḥputrikā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kula-vidyāṃ suta-arthinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārādhayitum ārabdhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayā ca uktaṃ prasannayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvavidyādharotkṛṣṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyādharaparākramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavitā bhavatoḥ putraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrakau duḥkham ujjhatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarva-vidyā-dhara-utkṛṣṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyā-dhara-parākramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavitā bhavatoḥ putraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrakau duḥkham ujjhatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekā ca duhitā yasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalāśālī bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūraḥ sāṅga ivānaṅgo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyādharapatiḥ patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekā ca duhitā yasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalā-śālī bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūraḥ sa-aṅga iva an-aṅgo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyā-dhara-patiḥ patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāle kvacid atīte ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasūtā pṛthivī sutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trivargam akṣataṃ devī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛthivīva surakṣitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāle kva-cid atīte ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasūtā pṛthivī sutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tri-vargam a-kṣataṃ devī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛthivi īva su-rakṣitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manaḥputrikayā dattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa yasmāt kulavidyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmān mānasavegākhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putraḥ pitrā prasādhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manaḥputrikayā dattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa yasmāt kula-vidyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmān mānasavega-ākhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putraḥ pitrā prasādhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃvatsaratraye 'tīte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātāyā duhituḥ kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāma vegavatātmīyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau vegavatī tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃvatsara-traye 'tīte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātāyā- duhituḥ kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāma vegavatā ātmīyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau vegavatī tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>labdheṣṭatanayau tau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>modamānāv aharniśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītavantau ciraṃ kālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekāharniśasaṃmitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>labdha-iṣṭa-tanayau tau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>modamānāv ahar-niśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītavantau ciraṃ kālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eka-ahar-niśa-saṃmitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegavān ekadā snātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prīṇitāgnisuradvijaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhadrāsanastham ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadarśa ādarśamaṇḍale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegavān ekadā snātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prīṇita-agni-sura-dvi-jaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhadra-āsana-stham ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadarśa ādarśa-maṇḍale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha haṃsam ivāsīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>añjanācalamūrdhani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛṇāladhavalaṃ keśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭavān ātmamūrdhani ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha haṃsam ivā asīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>añjana-a-cala-mūrdhani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛṇāla-dhavalaṃ keśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭavān ātma-mūrdhani ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato bhadrāsanaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasudhāsthaṇḍile sthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭo mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etad iti vegavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato bhadra-āsanaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasu-dhā-sthaṇḍile sthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭo mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etad iti vegavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ palitaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manaḥputrikavaṃśajāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tapāṃsi vā niṣevante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedāntavihitāni vā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ palitaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manaḥputrika-vaṃśa-jāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tapāṃsi vā niṣevante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veda-anta-vihitāni vā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat prajāḥ pālayeḥ putra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajās tvāṃ pālayantu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālitair hi mṛgendro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kānanair eva pālyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat prajāḥ pālayeḥ putra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajās tvāṃ pālayantu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālitair hi mṛga-indro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kānanair eva pālyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krośantīṣu prajāsu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājā mandasukhotkaṇṭhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratiyātas tapovanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krośantīṣu prajāsu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājā manda-sukha-utkaṇṭhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratiyātas tapo-vanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartrā nivartyamānāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacobhiḥ sopapattibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na nivṛttā yadā devī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadopāyaṃ prayuktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartrā nivartyamāna āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacobhiḥ sa-upapattibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na nivṛttā yadā devī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tada ūpāyaṃ prayuktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adyaivāhaṃ cyuto rājyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adyaiveyaṃ pativratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na me saṃpādayaty ājñām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aho dharmaḥ satām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adya eva ahaṃ cyuto rājyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adya eva iyaṃ pati-vratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na me saṃpādayaty ājñām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aho dharmaḥ satām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hrītā ca bhītā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāśruśreṇiḥ savepathuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pādayoḥ patitā patyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyajñāpayad asau śanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hrītā ca bhītā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-aśru-śreṇiḥ sa-vepathuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pādayoḥ patitā patyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyajñāpayad asau śanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā tarhi mayā yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāvayantas tapovanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāsyāḥ pāvanatamaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kālaḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā tarhi mayā yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāvayantas tapo-vanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāsyāḥ pāvanatamaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kālaḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd durlabhaṃ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthirasiṃhāsanāsthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartāraṃ vegavatyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭvā draṣṭāsi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd dur-labhaṃ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthira-siṃha-āsana-āsthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartāraṃ vegavatyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭvā draṣṭa āsi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ caiva ca kalyāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitā vijñāpyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uktā vegavatī mātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitaraṃ praṇatābravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca eva ca kalyāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitā vijñāpyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uktā vegavatī mātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitaraṃ praṇata ābravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāta tvayi vanaṃ yāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ko me dāsyati modakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalpavṛkṣaprasūtāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phalāni kusumāni vā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāta tvayi vanaṃ yāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ko me dāsyati modakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalpa-vṛkṣa-prasūtāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phalāni kusumāni vā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ yena yenārtho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durlabhenāpi kenacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat tan mānasavegas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrātā dātāsyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ yena yena artho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dur-labhena api kena-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat tan mānasavegas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrātā dātā āsyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti rājyakalatramitraputrān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhadhāmaṃ ca tṛṇāya manyamānaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gurusattvarajastamaḥkalaṅkāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakṛtiṃ hātum agād vanaṃ narendraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti rājya-kalatra-mitra-putrān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛha-dhāmaṃ ca tṛṇāya manyamānaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guru-sattva-rajas-tamaḥ-kalaṅkāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakṛtiṃ hātum agād vanaṃ nara-indraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śriyaṃ mānasavego 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadalīdalacañcalām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaktitrayaprayogajñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtavān acalācalām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śriyaṃ mānasavego 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadalī-dala-cañcalām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śakti-traya-prayoga-jñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtavān a-cala-a-calām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha yāte kvacit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātaṅgādhipateḥ sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āṣāḍhaṃ vāyumukteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhīparivṛtāgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha yāte kva-cit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātaṅga-adhipateḥ sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āṣāḍhaṃ vāyumukta īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhī-parivṛta āgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā sma vegavatīm āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājaputri kim āsyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttiṣṭhākāśamārgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchāmo malayācalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā sma vegavatīm āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja-putri kim āsyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttiṣṭha-ākāśa-mārgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchāmo malaya-a-calam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śṛṅgakuñjanitambeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya ramyeṣu ramyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>netrāpidhānikākhyāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrikākandukair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śṛṅga-kuñja-nitambeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya ramyeṣu ramyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>netra-apidhānika-ākhyāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrikā-kandukair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ nāsti me śaktir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gantum ākāśavartmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alabdhakulavidyāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhi tan mṛṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ na asti me śaktir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gantum ākāśa-vartmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-labdha-kula-vidyāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhi tan mṛṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upahasya tatas tās tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uccais tāḍitapāṇayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādhatāmbarapakṣāḥ khaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>haṃsakanyā ivāsthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upahasya tatas tās tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uccais tāḍita-pāṇayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādhata-ambara-pakṣāḥ khaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>haṃsa-kanyā- ivā asthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātur antikam āyātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāvegā vegavaty api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena coktāṅkam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaḥ kiṃ dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrātur antikam āyātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-āvegā vegavaty- api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena ca ukta āṅkam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaḥ kiṃ dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ dehi me vidyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahārāja sasādhanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddhavidyābhir adyāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhībhir hāsitā yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ dehi me vidyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-rāja sa-sādhanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddha-vidyābhir adya ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhībhir hāsitā yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>acireṇaiva dāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātar ity abhidhāya sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātā visarjitāsāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālālaṅkāravañcitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-cireṇa eva dāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātar ity abhidhāya sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātā visarjita-a-sāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāla-alaṅkāra-vañcitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā gaurimuṇḍasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaginī gaurimadyaśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatā vegavatīṃ draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āṣāḍhaṃ sasakhī sakhīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā gaurimuṇḍasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaginī gaurimadyaśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatā vegavatīṃ draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āṣāḍhaṃ sa-sakhī sakhīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upahasya ca tāṃ sāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipakṣām iva sārasīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sapakṣā rājahaṃsīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatā prati himācalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upahasya ca tāṃ sa āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vi-pakṣām iva sārasīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-pakṣā rāja-haṃsi īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatā prati hima-a-calam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegavaty api sāsthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā bhrātaram abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim ayaṃ kṣipyate kālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyā me dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegavaty- api sa-āsthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā bhrātaram abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim ayaṃ kṣipyate kālo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyā me dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam api dāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvarase kim akāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gurukāryakriyāvyagraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ na paśyasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam api dāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvarase kim a-kāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guru-kārya-kriyā-vyagraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ na paśyasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā gatvā manyubhāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphurantīva tvarāvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apatan mātur utsaṅge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtapteva vaśā hrade ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā gatvā manyu-bhāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuranti īva tvarāvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apatan mātur utsaṅge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtapta īva vaśā hrade ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛthivī tu samāhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sacivau bhartur abravīt</seg> </l>
