<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>acireṇa pitur mūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dārikāṃ nayataṃ yuvām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛthivī tu samāhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sacivau bhartur abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-cireṇa pitur mūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dārikāṃ nayataṃ yuvām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antaraṅgo hi saṃbandhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraiḥ pitror akṛtrimaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātaras tu dviṣanty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrātṝn ekodarān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antar-aṅgo hi saṃbandhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraiḥ pitror a-kṛtrimaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātaras tu dviṣanty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrātṝn eka-udarān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau tām ākāśamārgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītavantau tapovanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mārgāyatanamārgeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāmbhaḥsu gamitaśramām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau tām ākāśa-mārgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītavantau tapo-vanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mārga-āyatana-mārgeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-ambhaḥsu gamita-śramām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsthimayakāyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taḍidbabhrujaṭābṛtām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te 'paśyaṃs tatra vṛndāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāpasānāṃ tapasyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asthi-maya-kāyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taḍid-babhru-jaṭā-bṛtām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te 'paśyaṃs tatra vṛndāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāpasānāṃ tapasyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛcchanti sma ca tatraikam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhivādya tapasvinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahman brūhi tam uddeśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatrāste vegavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛcchanti sma ca tatra ekam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhivādya tapasvinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahman brūhi tam uddeśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatrā aste vegavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt parvatāgre 'sāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅguṣṭhāgreṇa tiṣṭhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anugacchati gacchantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṃśumantaṃ ca cakṣuṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt parvata-agre 'sāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅguṣṭha-agreṇa tiṣṭhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anugacchati gacchantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṃśumantaṃ ca cakṣuṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parṇaśālā ca tasyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasyāḥ siṃhamataṅgajau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgaṇe krīḍataḥ prītāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>imau ca śikhipannagau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parṇa-śālā ca tasya iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasyāḥ siṃha-mataṅga-jau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgaṇe krīḍataḥ prītāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>imau ca śikhi-pannagau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsannāgamanaś cāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dagdhaṃ hi kaṭhinaiḥ karaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyāhlādayituṃ cakṣur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eṣa mandāyate raviḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsanna-āgamanaś ca asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dagdhaṃ hi kaṭhinaiḥ karaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyā ahlādayituṃ cakṣur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eṣa mandāyate raviḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapastāntaṃ tataḥ kāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakāyam iva vegavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāyakleśaṃ vahann āgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaikhānasamṛgāvṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapas-tāntaṃ tataḥ kāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-kāyam iva vegavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāya-kleśaṃ vahann āgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaikhānasa-mṛga-āvṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vegavatī dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegavantaṃ tathāvidham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīn mantriṇau nāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama tātaḥ sa vegavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vegavatī dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegavantaṃ tathā-vidham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīn mantriṇau na ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama tātaḥ sa vegavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya candraprabhacchattra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhāḥ samukuṭaprabhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhāsayanti dhāvantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puraḥ sāmantasantatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya candra-prabha-cchattra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhāḥ sa-mukuṭa-prabhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhāsayanti dhāvantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puraḥ sāmanta-santatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu siṃhamātaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śārdūlamṛgatāpasaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyaktavairaiḥ sahāyāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nūnaṃ ko 'pīndrajālikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu siṃha-mātaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śārdūla-mṛga-tāpasaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyakta-vairaiḥ sahā ayāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nūnaṃ ko 'pi indra-jālikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tābhyām uktaṃ sa evāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā cetthaṃ ca dṛśyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛśā eva dṛśyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā cetthaṃ ca sādhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tābhyām uktaṃ sa eva ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā ca itthaṃ ca dṛśyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛśā- eva dṛśyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā ca itthaṃ ca sādhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vandyatāṃ ca pitety uktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vandamānārdracakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅkam āropitā pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūḍhadarbhāṅkuravraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vandyatāṃ ca pita īty uktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vandamāna ārdra-cakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅkam āropitā pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūḍha-darbha-aṅkura-vraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantriṇāv api bhartāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ucitāntaravartinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śirovāgbhir avandetām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha vegavatoditau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantriṇāv api bhartāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ucita-antara-vartinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiro-vāgbhir avandetām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha vegavata ūditau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgaccha taṃ mamābhyāśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ sthitvātidūrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janarañjanamātraṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gataṃ tad rājyanāṭakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgaccha taṃ mama abhyāśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ sthitva āti-dūrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jana-rañjana-mātraṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gataṃ tad rājya-nāṭakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsannasthaṇḍilasthau tau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭavān atha vegavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājño mānasavegasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājyaṃ no varṇyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsanna-sthaṇḍila-sthau tau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭavān atha vegavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājño mānasavegasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājyaṃ no varṇyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tābhyām uktam aśakyaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇāḍhyenāpi śaṃsitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam apekṣya tu rājānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śeṣāś chattraviḍambakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tābhyām uktam a-śakyaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇāḍhyena api śaṃsitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam apekṣya tu rājānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śeṣāś chattra-viḍambakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyaṃ māṇavikā kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ānīteti ca pṛcchate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyālābhārtham ity uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmai tābhyāṃ savistaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyaṃ māṇavikā kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ānīta īti ca pṛcchate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-lābha-artham ity uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmai tābhyāṃ sa-vistaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam acirād eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhavidyā gamiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuvābhyāṃ nītipannābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa bālaḥ pālyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam a-cirād eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdha-vidyā gamiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuvābhyāṃ nīti-pannābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa bālaḥ pālyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vagavaty api sotsāhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karoti sma mahat tapaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalpitāhārakartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phalamūlajalānilaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vagavaty- api sa-utsāhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karoti sma mahat tapaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalpita-āhāra-kartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phala-mūla-jala-anilaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jalāharaṇasaṃmārga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kusumapracayādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārādhayad durārādhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau vaikhānasān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jala-āharaṇa-saṃmārga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kusuma-pracaya-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārādhayad dur-ārādhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau vaikhānasān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uccinvantī kadācit sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>phullāṃ kānanamallikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā sarpeṇāsmi daṣṭeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sākrandāgamad āśramam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uccinvantī kadā-cit sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>phullāṃ kānana-mallikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā sarpeṇa asmi daṣṭa īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-ākranda āgamad āśramam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathāsaṃnihitais tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaikhānasakumārakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā rājadārike bhaiṣīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity uktvā parivāritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā-saṃnihitais tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaikhānasa-kumārakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā rāja-dārike bhaiṣīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity uktvā parivāritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvāsau kvāsau khalaḥ sarpa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti pṛṣṭā kumārakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amuṣmin mallikāgulmae</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti tebhyo nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva asau kva asau khalaḥ sarpa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti pṛṣṭā kumārakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amuṣmin mallikā-gulmae</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti tebhyo nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tv ālokya tam uddeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocann uccakais tarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājaputri na sarpo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayaṃ sarpāntakaḥ śikhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tv ālokya tam uddeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocann uccakais tarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-putri na sarpo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayaṃ sarpa-antakaḥ śikhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭvā prasāritāṃ grīvām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utphaṇāśīviṣopamām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayā sarpa iti jñātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād āśvasyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭvā prasāritāṃ grīvām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utphaṇa-āśīviṣa-upamām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayā sarpa iti jñātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād āśvasyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uṭajāṅgaṇam ānītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa mayūraḥ kumārakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicitrair nartito mārgais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayā kuṭṭitatālayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uṭaja-aṅgaṇam ānītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa mayūraḥ kumārakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicitrair nartito mārgais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayā kuṭṭita-tālayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prekṣaṇīyaṃ ca tad draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adṛṣṭaṃ vanavāsibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>militāḥ sarvae evāsthus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tapovananivāsinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prekṣaṇīyaṃ ca tad draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-dṛṣṭaṃ vana-vāsibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>militāḥ sarvae eva asthus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tapo-vana-nivāsinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn eva vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegavantam upāgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśrāntam upagamyedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avocaṃs taṃ tapasvinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn eva vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegavantam upāgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśrāntam upagamya idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avocaṃs taṃ tapasvinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājadārikayā rājaṃs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tapas taptaṃ sudustapam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vayam ārādhitāḥ prītās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad vidyāṃ labhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāja-dārikayā rājaṃs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tapas taptaṃ su-dus-tapam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vayam ārādhitāḥ prītās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad vidyāṃ labhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ yadi ca prītā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>no bhavanto 'nujānate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato gṛhṇātv iyaṃ vidyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcāṅgaparivāritāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ yadi ca prītā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>no bhavanto 'nujānate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato gṛhṇātv iyaṃ vidyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañca-aṅga-parivāritāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anayā yat tapas taptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmābhiś cedam īdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad asyāḥ kulavidyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alaṃ bhavatu siddhaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anayā yat tapas taptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmābhiś ca idam īdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad asyāḥ kula-vidyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alaṃ bhavatu siddhaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca mānasavegasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyāsiddhiprabhāvitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balaṃ caturguṇaṃ tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāleyaṃ pratipadyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca mānasavegasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyā-siddhi-prabhāvitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balaṃ catur-guṇaṃ tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāla īyaṃ pratipadyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś cāsyāḥ ko 'pi dīrghāyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grahīṣyati varaḥ karam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājyasya daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa madīyasya bhokṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś ca asyāḥ ko 'pi dīrgha-āyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grahīṣyati varaḥ karam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājyasya daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa madīyasya bhokṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam uktvā tatas tasyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat sarvaṃ kṛtavān pitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāpi labdhābhyanujñānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vegenodapatan nabhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam uktvā tatas tasyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat sarvaṃ kṛtavān pitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa āpi labdha-abhyanujñānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vegena udapatan nabhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kanakalekheva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāsā kaṣaśilām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>piśaṅgabhavatī yāntī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śyāmalām ambarasthalīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kanaka-lekha īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāsā kaṣa-śilām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>piśaṅga-bhavatī yāntī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śyāmalām ambara-sthalīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭā mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhramabhrāntacakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avātarat tadāsthāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>haṃsīvāmbhojakānane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭā mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhrama-bhrānta-cakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avātarat tad-āsthāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>haṃsi īva ambho-ja-kānane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃcit pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjiteneva tena sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅgyotsaṅgam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamitā mātur antikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ-cit pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjitena iva tena sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅgya utsaṅgam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamitā mātur antikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātāpi duhitṛsneham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anādṛtyaiva satvarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apṛcchad api kalyāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuśalī vegavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māta āpi duhitṛ-sneham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-ādṛtya eva sa-tvarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apṛcchad api kalyāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuśalī vegavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ vāphalapralāpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāram evāvadhīyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāsau vegavatī sāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya vegavataḥ sutā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ va ā-phala-pralāpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāram eva avadhīyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ya āsau vegavatī sa āhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya vegavataḥ sutā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atīte tu kvacit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saśarīreva cārutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītā mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāpi bhūmau varāṅganā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atīte tu kva-cit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-śarīra īva cārutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītā mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ka āpi bhūmau vara-aṅganā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā ca tadguṇabhūyiṣṭhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛḍhaṃ dveṣṭi kathām api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣīṇadoṣaguṇā sādhvī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmastutikathām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā ca tad-guṇa-bhūyiṣṭhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛḍhaṃ dveṣṭi kathām api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣīṇa-doṣa-guṇā sādhvī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāma-stuti-kathām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kadācit kvacit kācid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā tāpasakanyakām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balād bhoktum upakrāntas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayā coktaṃ sphurad ruṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kadā-cit kva-cit kā-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā tāpasa-kanyakām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balād bhoktum upakrāntas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayā ca uktaṃ sphurad ruṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuktaṃ śāpāgninā dagdhuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvādṛśaṃ pāpacetasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu vegavataḥ sādhoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putratvaṃ tena mucyase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuktaṃ śāpa-agninā dagdhuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvā-dṛśaṃ pāpa-cetasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu vegavataḥ sādhoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putratvaṃ tena mucyase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā śāpanāmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratīcchatu varaṃ bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhīrahṛdayāḥ prāyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trāsagamyā bhavādṛśāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā śāpa-nāmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratīcchatu varaṃ bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-dhīra-hṛdayāḥ prāyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trāsa-gamyā- bhavā-dṛśāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>balāt kāmayamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niḥkāmāṃ kāñcid aṅganām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavataḥ śatadhā mūrdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dagdhabuddheḥ sphuṭed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>balāt kāmayamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niḥ-kāmāṃ kāñ-cid aṅganām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavataḥ śatadhā mūrdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dagdha-buddheḥ sphuṭed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas trastas tataḥ śāpād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akāmāṃ kāminīm asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api notsahate draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuta eva niṣevitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas trastas tataḥ śāpād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-kāmāṃ kāminīm asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api na utsahate draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuta eva niṣevitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu mām abravīn mātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>protsāhyatāṃ yathā kṣipram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upasarpati mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu mām abravīn mātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā madanamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>protsāhyatāṃ yathā kṣipram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upasarpati mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bālasvabhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakutūhalayā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśokavanikāmadhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭā madanamañjukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bāla-sva-bhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-kutūhalayā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśoka-vanikā-madhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭā madanamañjukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃkṣiptam adhitiṣṭhantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūḍhaparṇalatoṭajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mlānacampakamāleva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>purāṇakadalīpuṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃkṣiptam adhitiṣṭhantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūḍha-parṇa-latā-uṭajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mlāna-campaka-māla īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>purāṇa-kadalī-puṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parṇaśayyāśirobhāge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nihitaḥ saṃpidhānakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uṭajābhyantare nyastaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sajalaḥ kalaśas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parṇa-śayyā-śiro-bhāge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nihitaḥ saṃpidhānakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uṭaja-abhyantare nyastaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-jalaḥ kalaśas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha lambhitaviśrambhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mañjukām aham abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kas te mānuṣakeṇārthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuru vidyādharaṃ patiṃ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha lambhita-viśrambhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mañjukām aham abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kas te mānuṣakeṇa arthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuru vidyā-dharaṃ patiṃ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mugdhe mānuṣakās tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahurogādyupadravāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharās tu vidyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhāvān nirupadravāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mugdhe mānuṣakās tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahu-roga-ādy-upadravāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dharās tu vidyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhāvān nir-upadravāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā mānasavegas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartā te varṇyatāṃ katham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo vidyādhararājānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājā sphītaśriyām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā mānasavegas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartā te varṇyatāṃ katham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo vidyā-dhara-rājānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājā sphīta-śriyām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>doṣān api manuṣyāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhṇāmi sma yathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā tathābhavat tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītisphītākṣam ānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>doṣān api manuṣyāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhṇāmi sma yathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā tatha ābhavat tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prīti-sphīta-akṣam ānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guṇān vidyādharāṇāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhṇāmi sma yathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā tathābhavat tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krodhajihmākṣam ānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guṇān vidyā-dharāṇāṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhṇāmi sma yathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā tatha ābhavat tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krodha-jihma-akṣam ānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgantukau yadā caināṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītikrodhāv amuñcatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhṇāti sma tadā śokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saniśvāsāsravepathuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgantukau yadā ca enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prīti-krodhāv amuñcatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhṇāti sma tadā śokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-niśvāsa-asra-vepathuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsyāḥ parimṛjyāsram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśītasparśam abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ bhagini saṃtapya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīvitaṃ rakṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asyāḥ parimṛjya asram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-śīta-sparśam abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ bhagini saṃtapya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīvitaṃ rakṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tūktaṃ mayā nedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātmaduḥkhena rudyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśakyaṃ tu bhayaṃ bhīmam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āhṛtaṃ mandayā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu uktaṃ mayā na idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātma-duḥkhena rudyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-śakyaṃ tu bhayaṃ bhīmam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āhṛtaṃ mandayā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvavidyākalābhijñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvarūpavatāṃ tulā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulavidyādhanair yaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṅgair api na mādyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarva-vidyā-kalā-abhijñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-rūpavatāṃ tulā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kula-vidyā-dhanair yaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṅgair api na mādyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa madvṛttāntam ajñātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśāṃ yāsyati kām api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ sāntaḥpurāmātya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāṣṭraḥ somānvayo nṛpaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mad-vṛtta-antam a-jñātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daśāṃ yāsyati kām api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ sa-antaḥ-pura-āmātya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāṣṭraḥ soma-anvayo nṛpaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu pratyāśayā prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekayā dhārayāmy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad ādiṣṭaḥ sphuṭādeśair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau vidyādharādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu pratyāśayā prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekayā dhārayāmy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad ādiṣṭaḥ sphuṭa-ādeśair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau vidyā-dhara-ādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyālavaviṣādhmātān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyādharabhujaṅgakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharanarendro 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartā vāntaviṣān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyā-lava-viṣa-ādhmātān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyā-dhara-bhujaṅgakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dhara-nara-indro 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartā vānta-viṣān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śrutveti yat satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātāhaṃ jātasaṃśayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharanarendraḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uta na syād asāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śrutva īti yat satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāta āhaṃ jāta-saṃśayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dhara-nara-indraḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uta na syād asāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ kācid dūtikā yātu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāpy asaktā parīkṣitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūtikā matsamā nāsti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam eva vrajāmy ataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ kā-cid dūtikā yātu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa āpy a-saktā parīkṣitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūtikā mat-samā na asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam eva vrajāmy ataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ svārthāhitotsāhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛcchāmi sma tava priyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava priyāya kiṃ vārtā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvadīyā dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sva-artha-āhita-utsāhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛcchāmi sma tava priyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava priyāya kiṃ vārtā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvadīyā dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kṣaṇam iva dhyātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayoktaṃ smayamānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tulyam evāvayoḥ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaktau satyāṃ kim āsyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kṣaṇam iva dhyātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taya ūktaṃ smayamānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tulyam evā avayoḥ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaktau satyāṃ kim āsyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ hi guru kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣiptakālaṃ ca sīdati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>īdṛśaṃ tvādṛśī karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāryate katham anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ hi guru kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣipta-kālaṃ ca sīdati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>īdṛśaṃ tvā-dṛśī karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāryate katham anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyaṃ maṇḍalitā veṇī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā sakhi tavāgrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daṣṭukāmeva capalā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīṣaṇāśīviṣāṅganā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyaṃ maṇḍalitā veṇī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā sakhi tava agrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daṣṭu-kāma īva capalā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīṣaṇa-āśīviṣa-aṅganā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dāhyā vā dahaneneyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mocyā vā gṛdhrajambukaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aryaputreṇa vā dagdha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāruṇā gatidāruṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dāhyā vā dahanena iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mocyā vā gṛdhra-jambukaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arya-putreṇa vā dagdha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāruṇā gati-dāruṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā cāgaccha doleva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na sthātavyaṃ kvacic ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asaṅgā hi gatiḥ sakhyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntaṃ yāntyāḥ smṛter iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā cā agaccha dola īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na sthātavyaṃ kva-cic ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-saṅgā hi gatiḥ sakhyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntaṃ yāntyāḥ smṛter iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktājjukayā kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabhasāham ihāgatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyam aryaputraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hā kvāsīti pravādinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity ukta ājjukayā kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabhasa āham ihā agatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyam arya-putraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hā kva asi iti pravādinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aninditam upāyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicintyātmasamarpaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ajjukārūpayā tubhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmā saṃdarśito mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-ninditam upāyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicintyā atma-samarpaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ajjukā-rūpayā tubhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmā saṃdarśito mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nivāritāś ca yad yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadāliṅganalālasāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa doṣaḥ kanyakātvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśuddhakulajanmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nivāritāś ca yad yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad-āliṅgana-lālasāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa doṣaḥ kanyakātvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśuddha-kula-janmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac cāyācitadānāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivāhaḥ kārito mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca saṃskartum ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kvātra yakṣaḥ kva cājjukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac cā ayācita-dānāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivāhaḥ kārito mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca saṃskartum ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva atra yakṣaḥ kva ca ajjukā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca pātum anicchantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāyitāḥ stha balān madhu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra yat kāraṇaṃ tac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaḥ pratyakṣam eva ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca pātum an-icchantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāyitāḥ stha balān madhu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra yat kāraṇaṃ tac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaḥ pratyakṣam eva ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na draṣṭavyāsmi supteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratiṣiddhāḥ stha yan mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kutūhalavṛddhyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāmaśīlā hi bālatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na draṣṭavya āsmi supta īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratiṣiddhāḥ stha yan mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kutūhala-vṛddhy-arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāma-śīlā hi bālatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā vistareṇālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ajjukā madamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītā mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lakṣmīr iva durātmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā vistareṇa alam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ajjukā madamañjukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītā mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lakṣmīr iva dur-ātmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad ājñāpaya māṃ kṣipram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>imāṃ madanamañjukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ānayāmi parair nītāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddhā nītir iva śriyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad ājñāpaya māṃ kṣipram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>imāṃ madanamañjukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ānayāmi parair nītāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddhā nītir iva śriyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama na nyāyyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praiṣaṇīyajanocitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartuḥ kārayituṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryāṃ tuṅgakulodbhavām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama na nyāyyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praiṣaṇīya-jana-ucitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhartuḥ kārayituṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryāṃ tuṅga-kula-udbhavām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athainām abruvaṃ caṇḍi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutam ehi śayāvahai</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi tāmraśikhaṇḍānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adyāpi sphurati dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha enām abruvaṃ caṇḍi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutam ehi śayāvahai</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi tāmra-śikhaṇḍānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adya api sphurati dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_14.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham api dhavalenduvaṃśajanmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuliśakaṭhorakaniṣṭhikāprakoṣṭhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyasamaraparāvarodharuddhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahataripuḥ katham āhareya dārān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_14.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham api dhavala-indu-vaṃśa-janmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuliśa-kaṭhora-kaniṣṭhikā-prakoṣṭhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priya-samara-para-avarodha-ruddhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-hata-ripuḥ katham āhareya dārān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paripāṭyā tataḥ prāptās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trayo hariśikhādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhāte mām avandanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tu vegavataḥ sutām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paripāṭyā tataḥ prāptās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trayo hariśikha-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhāte mām avandanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tu vegavataḥ sutām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tv acirāt prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prathamaṃ mām avandata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmadāsannam āsīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaktyā vegavatīṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tv a-cirāt prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prathamaṃ mām avandata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmad-āsannam āsīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaktyā vegavatīṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau hariśikhenoktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suṣṭhu khalv asi paṇḍitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandyāvandyavicāre hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau hariśikhena uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suṣṭhu khalv asi paṇḍitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandya-a-vandya-vicāre hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṇḍitāḥ sama-darśinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoktaṃ tena matto 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavān evātipaṇḍitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandyalakṣaṇayuktāṃ yo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vandyām api na vandate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uktaṃ tena matto 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavān eva ati-paṇḍitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandya-lakṣaṇa-yuktāṃ yo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vandyām api na vandate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhaṇa kena na pūjyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā naḥ pūjyena pūjitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu mandamate lokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūjyapūjitapūjakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhaṇa kena na pūjyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā naḥ pūjyena pūjitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu manda-mate lokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūjya-pūjita-pūjakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svāminī svāmisaṃbandhāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmīvārhati vandanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candrāsannair hi nakṣatrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lokaḥ kāryāṇi kāryate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svāminī svāmi-saṃbandhāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmi īva arhati vandanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candra-āsannair hi nakṣatrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lokaḥ kāryāṇi kāryate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi vadatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pakṣam utkarṣayann iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ vegavatīvṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadvarṇitam avarṇayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi vadatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pakṣam utkarṣayann iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ vegavatī-vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad-varṇitam avarṇayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyādharakumārīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛttāvartanīti te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandato muditā gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>senābhartre nyavedayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyā-dhara-kumārīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛtta-āvartani īti te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandato muditā gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>senā-bhartre nyavedayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenāpi tātapādebhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tair ambābhyāṃ niveditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣadundubhivṛndais tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nadadbhir vṛtraśatrave ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena api tāta-pādebhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tair ambābhyāṃ niveditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣa-dundubhi-vṛndais tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nadadbhir vṛtra-śatrave ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gambhīrotpātajīmūta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃpātahrādabhīṣaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pramodadhvanite yātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanyamāne divāniśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gambhīra-utpāta-jīmūta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃpāta-hrāda-bhīṣaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pramoda-dhvanite yātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanyamāne divā-niśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha senāpatiḥ prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prātar mām idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idānīm eva devībhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devo vijñāpito yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha senā-patiḥ prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prātar mām idam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idānīm eva devībhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devo vijñāpito yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvitīyayā vadhukayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhīto dārakaḥ svayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasyāścid api nāsmabhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭaḥ pariṇayotsave ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvitīyayā vadhukayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhīto dārakaḥ svayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasyāś-cid api na asmabhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭaḥ pariṇaya-utsave ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena prasādo yady asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegavatyā tataḥ saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naravāhanadattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivāhaḥ kāryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena prasādo yady asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegavatyā tataḥ saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naravāhanadattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivāhaḥ kāryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devena tu vihasyoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evam astu kim āsyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mamāpi hi manasy āsīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayam eva manorathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devena tu vihasya uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evam astu kim āsyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mama api hi manasy āsīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayam eva mano-rathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu mātā varasyātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī bhavatu māgadhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitāhaṃ varapakṣe 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samastam avarodhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu mātā varasya atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī bhavatu māgadhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pita āhaṃ vara-pakṣe 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samastam avarodhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>astu vāsavadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sutā vegavataḥ sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rumaṇvadādayaḥ pakṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyā evaṃ bhavantv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>astu vāsavadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sutā vegavataḥ sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rumaṇvad-ādayaḥ pakṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyā- evaṃ bhavantv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāntaḥpuram ambāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padmāvatyāḥ suhṛdvṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīto 'haṃ citravinyāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratnamaṅgalamaṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha antaḥ-puram ambāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padmāvatyāḥ suhṛd-vṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīto 'haṃ citra-vinyāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratna-maṅgala-maṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sabhartṛbahuputrābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nārībhir vegavaty api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭhāmbābhavanaṃ nītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kelikolāhalākulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-bhartṛ-bahu-putrābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nārībhir vegavaty- api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭha-ambā-bhavanaṃ nītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>keli-kolāhala-ākulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantakas tu māgadhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>preṣitaḥ prekṣituṃ vadhūm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṣīkālamukhoraskaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kārito jyeṣṭhayāmbayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantakas tu māgadhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>preṣitaḥ prekṣituṃ vadhūm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṣī-kāla-mukha-uraskaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kārito jyeṣṭhaya āmbayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kampamānaś ca kopena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ pratyāgato 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aryaputra khalīkāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyatemaṃ mamedṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kampamānaś ca kopena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ pratyāgato 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arya-putra khalī-kāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyata imaṃ mamā idṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaśrūs te māṃ khalīkṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāntarhāsam avocata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva yāsi jālma labdho 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>preṣitas tvaṃ caraḥ kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaśrūs te māṃ khalī-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-antar-hāsam avocata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva yāsi jālma labdho 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>preṣitas tvaṃ caraḥ kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekaiva mama bāleyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyācitaśatārjitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asyāḥ saubhāgyam utpādyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avaśyaṃ kārmaṇair mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eka aiva mama bāla īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyācita-śata-ārjitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asyāḥ saubhāgyam utpādyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-vaśyaṃ kārmaṇair mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātā jāmātṛkasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahākārmaṇakārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayā hastatale bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gurudhairyo 'pi nartitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātā jāmātṛkasya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-kārmaṇa-kārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayā hasta-tale bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guru-dhairyo 'pi nartitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vardhayantyāś ciraṃ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāḥ kārmaṇamālayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ mayā preṣitaḥ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān iva caras tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vardhayantyāś ciraṃ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāḥ kārmaṇa-mālayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ mayā preṣitaḥ kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān iva caras tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvālambhito bhīmām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ardhacandraparaṃparām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devyāḥ niṣkramitaḥ svasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aham antaḥpurād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā ālambhito bhīmām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ardha-candra-paraṃ-parām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devyāḥ niṣkramitaḥ svasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aham antaḥ-purād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantakena yā prāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra gatvā viḍambanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām anekaguṇāṃ prāpañ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jyeṣṭhāmbāpreṣitāś carāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantakena yā prāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra gatvā viḍambanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām an-eka-guṇāṃ prāpañ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jyeṣṭha-ambā-preṣitāś carāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti pravṛttavṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>matte 'ntaḥpurasāgare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā vegavatīpāṇir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhīto mantrasaṃskṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti pravṛtta-vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>matte 'ntaḥ-pura-sāgare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā vegavatī-pāṇir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhīto mantra-saṃskṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gatvā svam āvāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsāvāsaṃ praviśya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyādṛśaprapañceva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭā vegavatī mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gatvā svam āvāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsa-āvāsaṃ praviśya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyā-dṛśa-prapañca īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭā vegavatī mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyāhṛtā vacanaṃ nādād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>agād ālambitāṃśukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śayanaṃ ca navoḍheva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sevate sma parāṅmukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyāhṛtā vacanaṃ nā adād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>agād ālambita-aṃśukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śayanaṃ ca nava-ūḍha īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sevate sma parāṅ-mukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upasṛtya śanaiś caināṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bravīmi sma vilakṣakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vrīḍākrīḍākṛtā pīḍā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durbhagā tyajyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upasṛtya śanaiś ca enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bravīmi sma vilakṣakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vrīḍā-krīḍā-kṛtā pīḍā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-bhagā tyajyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu katham apy uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuṭitasmitacandrikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aryaputra kutaḥ krīḍā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gurvājñeyaṃ garīyasī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu katham apy uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuṭita-smita-candrikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arya-putra kutaḥ krīḍā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gurv-ājña īyaṃ garīyasī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā hi śvaśurādeśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmin vivāhanāṭake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣkarā kṣiptavelāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadhūkābhūmikā kṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā hi śvaśura-ādeśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmin vivāha-nāṭake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣ-karā kṣipta-vela āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadhūkā-bhūmikā kṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā nāṭayitavyeyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ujjvalā jāyate yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād guruniyogo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alaṅghyaḥ kṣamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā nāṭayitavya īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ujjvalā jāyate yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād guru-niyogo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-laṅghyaḥ kṣamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā saha visarpantyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivāhakathayānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayaṃ kṣaṇasaṃkṣiptām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āyātām api yāminīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā saha visarpantyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivāha-kathaya ānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayaṃ kṣaṇa-saṃkṣiptām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āyātām api yāminīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gate tu nātisaṃkṣipte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāle caṭulasambhramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvarāvān skhaladālāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām avocat tapantakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gate tu na atisaṃkṣipte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāle caṭula-sambhramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvarāvān skhalad-ālāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām avocat tapantakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aryaputra mayā dṛṣṭāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catasraḥ puradevatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrāmyatā nagarodyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dainyamlānānanendavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arya-putra mayā dṛṣṭāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catasraḥ pura-devatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrāmyatā- nagara-udyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dainya-mlāna-ānana-indavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nṛpasyāniṣṭam āśaṅkya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manye kim api dāruṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyad uccalitāḥ sthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vihāyemāṃ purīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nṛpasya an-iṣṭam āśaṅkya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manye kim api dāruṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyad uccalitāḥ sthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vihāya imāṃ purīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā vegavatī pṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kās tā iti tayoditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krodhān mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama sakhyo vivāsitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā vegavatī pṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kās tā- iti taya ūditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krodhān mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama sakhyo vivāsitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayam ādāya tāḥ sakhīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nayanonmeṣamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśya mām āgatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayam ādāya tāḥ sakhīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nayana-unmeṣa-mātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśya mām āgatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utpatantī mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegād vegavatī nabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnā cāsane svasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhībhiḥ parivāritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utpatantī mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegād vegavatī nabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnā cā asane svasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhībhiḥ parivāritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadāgamanavārttā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāpajjhagiti medinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyaḥ svarbhānumuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tārābhartur iva prabhā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad-āgamana-vārttā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāpajjhagiti medinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyaḥ svar-bhānu-muktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tārā-bhartur iva prabhā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>senāpatir athāgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravīṇair brāhmaṇaiḥ saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prītisnigdhaviśālākṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapraṇāmam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>senā-patir athā agatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravīṇair brāhmaṇaiḥ saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prīti-snigdha-viśāla-akṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-praṇāmam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā vegavatīm āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāsannakaragrahāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catasraḥ kila tiṣṭhanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaginyaḥ kanyakās tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā vegavatīm āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāsanna-kara-grahāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catasraḥ kila tiṣṭhanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaginyaḥ kanyakās tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mamāpy akṛtavīvāhā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvāno ramyadarśanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putrās tiṣṭhanti catvāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śastraśāstrakalāvidaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama apy a-kṛta-vīvāhā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvāno ramya-darśanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putrās tiṣṭhanti catvāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śastra-śāstra-kalā-vidaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi saṃbandhayogyān no</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manyate rājadārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatas tā dārikās tebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrebhyo me dadātv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi saṃbandha-yogyān no</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manyate rāja-dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatas tā- dārikās tebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putrebhyo me dadātv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ dhīragaṇikā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaktrasaṃkrāntavākyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devenānugṛhītāsmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādaiḥ phalitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ dhīra-gaṇikā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaktra-saṃkrānta-vākyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devena anugṛhīta āsmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasādaiḥ phalitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhūc ca dārikāpakṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadā devī kanīyasī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ ca varapakṣe tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tātaḥ sāntaḥpuro 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhūc ca dārikā-pakṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadā devī kanīyasī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ ca vara-pakṣe tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tātaḥ sa-antaḥ-puro 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā samṛddhis tadā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vatsarājakule mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām adyāpi na paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpyāpi śriyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā samṛddhis tadā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vatsa-rāja-kule mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām adya api na paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpya api śriyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyādharakumārīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato hariśikhādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agrahīṣata sasvedān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambhoruharucaḥ karān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyā-dhara-kumārīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato hariśikha-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agrahīṣata sa-svedān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambho-ruha-rucaḥ karān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nivartitavivāhās tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājarājasutā iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājarājagṛhāṇīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatāḥ pitṛgṛhāṇi te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nivartita-vivāhās tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja-rāja-sutā- iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-rāja-gṛhāṇi iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatāḥ pitṛ-gṛhāṇi te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhāte tān ahaṃ prāptān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>savrīḍān iva pṛṣṭavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yātā yasya yathā rātriḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa tathā varṇayatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhāte tān ahaṃ prāptān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-vrīḍān iva pṛṣṭavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yātā yasya yathā rātriḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa tathā varṇayatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhena tataḥ proktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uccais tāḍitapāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathaiteṣāṃ gatā rātrir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma gacchad yathā punaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhena tataḥ proktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uccais tāḍita-pāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatha aiteṣāṃ gatā rātrir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma gacchad yathā punaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ hariśikhas tāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyārādhanakovidaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avehi mantriputreti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryayā bhartsitaḥ spṛśan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ hariśikhas tāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyā-ārādhana-kovidaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avehi mantri-putra iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryayā bhartsitaḥ spṛśan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śayyāṃ samāliṅgya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kūrmasaṃkocapiṇḍitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāruṇām anayad rātriṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidrayāpi nirākṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śayyāṃ samāliṅgya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kūrma-saṃkoca-piṇḍitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāruṇām anayad rātriṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidraya āpi nirākṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu ghaṭṭyamāno 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāryayām marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūro 'ham iti bhāryāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pādasthānaṃ na muktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu ghaṭṭyamāno 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāryayām marubhūtikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūro 'ham iti bhāryāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāda-sthānaṃ na muktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantakaḥ punaḥ śayyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktvā supto mahītale</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakṣālanād dhi paṅkasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūrād asparśanaṃ varam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tapantakaḥ punaḥ śayyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktvā supto mahī-tale</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakṣālanād dhi paṅkasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūrād a-sparśanaṃ varam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad evaṃ durbhagān etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntāsaṅgamakātarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pragalbhā ramayiṣyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ vidyādharāṅganāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad evaṃ dur-bhagān etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntā-saṅgama-kātarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pragalbhā- ramayiṣyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ vidyā-dhara-aṅganāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhenoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aho nāgarako bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāryayā yo 'tisaubhāgyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhād api nirākṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato hariśikhena uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aho nāgarako bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāryayā yo 'ti-saubhāgyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhād api nirākṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo hi vāsagṛhe suptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītayā saha kāntayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kathaṃ paravṛttāntaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣapāṃ kṣapitavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo hi vāsa-gṛhe suptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītayā saha kāntayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kathaṃ para-vṛtta-antaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣapāṃ kṣapitavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathopahasatām eṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālāpair apayantraṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramamāṇaḥ kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sasuhṛt pānam ācaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatha ūpahasatām eṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālāpair apayantraṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramamāṇaḥ kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-suhṛt pānam ācaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāparasmin divase</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegavatyā nimantritāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sabhāryāḥ suhṛdas te 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tābhir eva sahāgatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aparasmin divase</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegavatyā nimantritāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-bhāryāḥ suhṛdas te 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tābhir eva saha-āgatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ yasya yasyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānaṃ saha na duṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tayā sā ca tenaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānam āsevatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ yasya yasyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānaṃ saha na duṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tayā sā ca tena eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānam āsevatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryāṃ hariśikhasyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇāv ākṛṣya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śobhājitamṛṇālinyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānabhūmāv upāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryāṃ hariśikhasya api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇāv ākṛṣya gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
