<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śobhā-jita-mṛṇālinyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāna-bhūmāv upāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryayā gomukhasyoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi labhyaḥ svayaṃgrahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītas tarhi niḥśaṅkaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā hariśikhaḥ svayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryayā gomukhasya uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi labhyaḥ svayaṃ-grahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītas tarhi niḥ-śaṅkaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā hariśikhaḥ svayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīnāyāṃ tatas tasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena sārdham anantaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tapantakasya gṛhiṇīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agṛhṇān marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīnāyāṃ tatas tasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena sa-ardham an-antaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tapantakasya gṛhiṇīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agṛhṇān marubhūtikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>marubhūtikabhāryā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samupetya tapantakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīt pariśeṣo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim anyat kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>marubhūtika-bhāryā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samupetya tapantakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīt pariśeṣo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim anyat kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ saha suhṛddāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdaḥ śuddhabuddhayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vayaṃ ca sahitā dāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīḍantaḥ sukham āsmahi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ saha suhṛd-dāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdaḥ śuddha-buddhayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vayaṃ ca sahitā dāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīḍantaḥ sukham āsmahi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācit kupitā mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena kenāpi hetunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayānunīyamānāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suptā vegavatī pṛthak ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cit kupitā mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena kena api hetunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maya ānunīyamāna āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suptā vegavatī pṛthak ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jāgaritvā ciraṃ suptas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato 'haṃ gāḍhanidrayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahasā pratibuddhaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphurallocanatārakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jāgaritvā ciraṃ suptas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato 'haṃ gāḍha-nidrayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahasā pratibuddhaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphural-locana-tārakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>unmīlya ca cirān netre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālanidrākaṣāyite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kenāpy apaśyam ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīyamānaṃ vihāyasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>unmīlya ca cirān netre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāla-nidrā-kaṣāyite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kena apy apaśyam ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīyamānaṃ vihāyasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amarāsuragandharva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>piśācapretarākṣasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko nu mā nayatīty āsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdehādhīnamānasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-mara-asura-gandharva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>piśāca-preta-rākṣasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko nu mā nayati ity āsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdeha-adhīna-mānasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devādīnām ayaṃ sparśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lakṣaṇair na hi vidyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād vidyādhareṇāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhīto duṣṭabuddhinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deva-ādīnām ayaṃ sparśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lakṣaṇair na hi vidyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād vidyā-dhareṇa ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhīto duṣṭa-buddhinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śatruhaste gatasyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣatriyasya na śobhate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hastapādāstramitrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṅgor iva mudhā vadhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śatru-haste gatasya api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣatriyasya na śobhate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hasta-pāda-astra-mitrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṅgor iva mudhā vadhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād ahaṃ yathāśakti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāyamya dviṣatā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mariṣyāmīti nirdhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ tāḍayitum udyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād ahaṃ yathā-śakti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāyamya dviṣatā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mariṣyāmi iti nirdhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ tāḍayitum udyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tena vihasyoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhu kṣatriyakuñjara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svasyāḥ susadṛśaṃ jāteḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karma vyavasitaṃ tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tena vihasya uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhu kṣatriya-kuñjara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svasyāḥ su-sadṛśaṃ jāteḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karma vyavasitaṃ tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vandhyas tu tava saṃkalpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>phūtkāro vāsuker iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mantrayantritavīryasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāc cintaya devatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vandhyas tu tava saṃkalpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>phūt-kāro vāsuker iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mantra-yantrita-vīryasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāc cintaya devatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prītaś cāsmi tavānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śauryaśauṇḍena cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād dadāmi te 'bhīṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvayor anyataraṃ varam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prītaś ca asmi tava anena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaurya-śauṇḍena cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād dadāmi te 'bhīṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvayor anyataraṃ varam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brūhi kiṃ mriyase dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyāṃ madanamañjukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ mahāsāgarādhāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṭyase makarair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brūhi kiṃ mriyase dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyāṃ madanamañjukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ mahā-sāgara-ādhāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṭyase makarair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīn mṛṇālīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cikkhalāt kaluṣād iyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arāter api niryātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāratī svacchakomalā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīn mṛṇāli īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cikkhalāt kaluṣād iyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-rāter api niryātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāratī svaccha-komalā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi nāma priyāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nyaseyaṃ kāyaśṛṅkhalām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato me śatrumitreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaved upakṛtaṃ mahat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi nāma priyāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nyaseyaṃ kāya-śṛṅkhalām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato me śatru-mitreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaved upakṛtaṃ mahat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaṃ yam eva smaran bhāvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyajaty ante kaḍevaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ tam eva kilāpnoti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaṃ yam eva smaran bhāvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyajaty ante kaḍevaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ tam eva kilā apnoti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā tad-bhāva-bhāvitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tu paśyan puraḥ prītyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyāṃ prāṇair viyujyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayānantaram evāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukṛtī saṃprayujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tu paśyan puraḥ prītyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyāṃ prāṇair viyujyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taya ān-antaram eva asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-kṛtī saṃprayujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃkalpayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>raṇantīṃ kiṅkiṇīm adhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śṛṇomi sma prabhātendoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi sma tanuprabhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃkalpayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>raṇantīṃ kiṅkiṇīm adhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śṛṇomi sma prabhāta-indoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyāmi sma tanu-prabhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ diśaṃ prahitākṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭā vegavatī mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivārabāṇanistriṃsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhādalitacandrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ diśaṃ prahita-akṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭā vegavatī mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivāra-bāṇa-nistriṃsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhā-dalita-candrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pīvarakrodhasaṃjāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajvalajjvalanadyutiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokān iva didhakṣantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pralayānalasaṃtatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pīvara-krodha-saṃjāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajvalaj-jvalana-dyutiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokān iva didhakṣantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pralaya-anala-saṃtatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāndraṃ maddarśanād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītiniśvasitānilaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krodhānalam avicchinnaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthūlaiś ca niravāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāndraṃ mad-darśanād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prīti-niśvasita-anilaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krodha-analam a-vicchinnaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthūlaiś ca niravāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāṃsayoḥ samāsajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>natayor asicarmaṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūrdhni cāñjalim ādhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjādīnam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aṃsayoḥ samāsajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>natayor asi-carmaṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūrdhni ca añjalim ādhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjā-dīnam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vatsarājasutaṃ dāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākāreṇa tam īdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuvarājaṃ mahārāja</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā vadhīr bhaginīpatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vatsa-rāja-sutaṃ dāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākāreṇa tam īdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuva-rājaṃ mahā-rāja</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā vadhīr bhaginī-patim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathāhaṃ tava mātuś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathāyaṃ mama vallabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svadārasahitas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>akṣato mucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatha āhaṃ tava mātuś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatha āyaṃ mama vallabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-dāra-sahitas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-kṣato mucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saprabalākṣepo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daṣṭadantacchedaḥ sphuran</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svasāram abravīd vācā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siṃhaphūtkāraghorayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa-prabala-ākṣepo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daṣṭa-danta-cchedaḥ sphuran</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svasāram abravīd vācā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siṃha-phūt-kāra-ghorayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayaṃgṛhītanirvārya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharāgocarabhartṛkām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhik tvāṃ śāradacandrābha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>manaḥputrikapāṃsanīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayaṃ-gṛhīta-nirvārya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhara-a-go-cara-bhartṛkām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhik tvāṃ śārada-candra-ābha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>manaḥ-putrika-pāṃsanīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ puro nihatyainaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāsau mām avamanyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāṃ ca tvāṃ ca tatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ puro nihatya enaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ya āsau mām avamanyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāṃ ca tvāṃ ca tatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīṃ nihato 'sīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā bhrātaram abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāpi tvaritenāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhramadhye nipātitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīṃ nihato 'si iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā bhrātaram abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena api tvaritena aham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhra-madhye nipātitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vegavatī dhyātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kulavidyām abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhagavatyāryaputro 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaputra iva rakṣyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vegavatī dhyātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kula-vidyām abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhagavatya ārya-putro 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-putra iva rakṣyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vātamaṇḍalikotkṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā pattraṃ bhramad bhramat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śanaiḥ śanair mahīṃ yāyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathāyaṃ nīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāta-maṇḍalika-utkṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā pattraṃ bhramad bhramat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śanaiḥ śanair mahīṃ yāyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha āyaṃ nīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nistriṃśam udgūrya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirdharmākaruṇaḥ khalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hantuṃ vegavatīm eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛttaḥ prārthitas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nistriṃśam udgūrya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nir-dharma-a-karuṇaḥ khalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hantuṃ vegavatīm eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛttaḥ prārthitas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>strīṣu svasṛṣu bālāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lālitāsv aṅkavakṣasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nipatanti na nistriṃśāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūrāṇāṃ tvādṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>strīṣu svasṛṣu bālāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lālitāsv aṅka-vakṣasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nipatanti na nistriṃśāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūrāṇāṃ tvā-dṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu vegavatīmadhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dukūlasparśabhīluke</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vajrasthambhacchidādakṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asidhārāṃ nyapātayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu vegavatī-madhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dukūla-sparśa-bhīluke</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vajra-sthambha-cchidā-dakṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asi-dhārāṃ nyapātayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vegavatīr aṣṭau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pracaṇḍāyudhamaṇḍalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ yuddhasaṃnaddhāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍikāgaṇikā iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vegavatīr aṣṭau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pracaṇḍa-āyudha-maṇḍalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ yuddha-saṃnaddhāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍikā-gaṇikā- iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekamānasavegasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhyaṃ kuliśakarkaśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rambhāsthambham ivāsāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alunād asidhārayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eka-mānasavegasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhyaṃ kuliśa-karkaśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rambhā-sthambham iva a-sāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alunād asi-dhārayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato mānasavegau dvau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikarālāsibhāsurau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpannau sakalāv eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīraśakaladvayāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato mānasavegau dvau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikarāla-asi-bhāsurau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpannau sa-kalāv eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīra-śakala-dvayāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekā vegavatī kṛttā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavanty aṣṭau tathāvidhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā mānasavegau dvau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāgalbhetām itas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekā vegavatī kṛttā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavanty aṣṭau tathā-vidhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā mānasavegau dvau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāgalbhetām itas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ mānasavegānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛndair ambaram āvṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣaṇād vegavatīnāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yudhyamānaiś caturguṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ mānasavegānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛndair ambaram āvṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣaṇād vegavatīnāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yudhyamānaiś catur-guṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu tanmahāyuddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyann eva śanaiḥ śanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>proṣitāmbhasi gambhīre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patitaḥ kūpasāgare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu tan-mahā-yuddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyann eva śanaiḥ śanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>proṣita-ambhasi gambhīre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patitaḥ kūpa-sāgare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tīvraviṣādo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vihasya smṛtavān idam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃjayasya vacaḥ kaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vartamānasya saṃkaṭe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tīvra-viṣādo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vihasya smṛtavān idam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃjayasya vacaḥ kaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vartamānasya saṃkaṭe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhṛṣṭadyumnād ahaṃ muktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃcit krāntavāhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patitaḥ sātyakānīke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duṣkṛtī narake yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhṛṣṭadyumnād ahaṃ muktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ-cit krānta-vāhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patitaḥ sātyaka-anīke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duṣ-kṛtī narake yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ duruttarād asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mamottāro bhaved iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyaṃ cintayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smarāmi sma kathām imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ dur-uttarād asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama uttāro bhaved iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyaṃ cintayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smarāmi sma kathām imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>babhūvur bhrātaraḥ kecit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trayo brāhmaṇadārakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekataḥ pūrvajas teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhyamāntyau dvitatritau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>babhūvur bhrātaraḥ ke-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trayo brāhmaṇa-dārakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekataḥ pūrva-jas teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhyama-antyau dvita-tritau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taiś cādhītatrayīvidyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurur vijñāpitaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gurave dātum icchāmaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāṅkṣitāṃ dakṣiṇām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taiś ca adhīta-trayī-vidyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurur vijñāpitaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gurave dātum icchāmaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāṅkṣitāṃ dakṣiṇām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ svagṛhān gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtvā dāraparigraham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpādyatām apatyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kratubhiś cejyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ sva-gṛhān gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtvā dāra-parigraham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpādyatām apatyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kratubhiś ca ijyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair uktam aparā kācid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dakṣiṇā mṛgyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenoktam alam etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>graheṇa bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair uktam a-parā kā-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dakṣiṇā mṛgyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena uktam alam etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>graheṇa bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān naivātinirbandhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivartante sma te yadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā kruddhena guruṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yācitā dakṣiṇām imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān na eva ati-nirbandhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivartante sma te yadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā kruddhena guruṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yācitā dakṣiṇām imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekataḥ śvetakarṇānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gavāṃ kokilavarcasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kumbhodhnīnāṃ sahasraṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>datta sthāta ca mā ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekataḥ śveta-karṇānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gavāṃ kokila-varcasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kumbha-udhnīnāṃ sahasraṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>datta sthāta ca mā ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tu bhrāṃtvā mahīṃ kṛtsnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārūḍhās tuhinācalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jñātāḥ kila kuvereṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kauverīṃ prasthitā diśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tu bhrāṃtvā mahīṃ kṛtsnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārūḍhās tuhina-a-calam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jñātāḥ kila kuvereṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kauverīṃ prasthitā- diśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuverasyāpi kiṃ nāsti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena te gurudakṣiṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattvā prasthāpitāḥ prītās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuhinādrer avātaran ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuverasya api kiṃ na asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena te guru-dakṣiṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattvā prasthāpitāḥ prītās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuhina-adrer avātaran ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃcaranto bahūn deśāṃś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cārayantaś ca gāḥ śanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptāś caṇḍeśvarāsannāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍārkakiraṇāḥ sthalīḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃcaranto bahūn deśāṃś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cārayantaś ca gāḥ śanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptāś caṇḍeśvara-āsannāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍa-arka-kiraṇāḥ sthalīḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācid ekatenoktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gāḥ saṃprekṣya dvitatritau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lobhanīyam idaṃ dravyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na parityāgam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cid ekatena uktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gāḥ saṃprekṣya dvita-tritau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lobhanīyam idaṃ dravyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na parityāgam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādhukāraśruter lubdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaścid unmattako yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agnipraveśaṃ kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathedaṃ naś cikīrṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādhu-kāra-śruter lubdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaś-cid unmattako yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agni-praveśaṃ kurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha īdaṃ naś cikīrṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenedam upapannaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guruṇā ca mayoditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramaṇīyavipākaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vākyaṃ naḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena idam upapannaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guruṇā ca maya ūditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramaṇīya-vipākaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vākyaṃ naḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athovāca dvitaḥ prīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktam āryeṇa cintitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi svārtheṣu muhyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddhayas tvādṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uvāca dvitaḥ prīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktam āryeṇa cintitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi sva-artheṣu muhyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddhayas tvā-dṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekatas tu tritaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tūṣṇīm āsīnam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad atra yuktaṃ tad brūtāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim udāste bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekatas tu tritaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tūṣṇīm āsīnam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad atra yuktaṃ tad brūtāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim udāste bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ ninditaṃ kurvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kaścin na nivāryate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitāpi hi viṣaṃ khādan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naiva putrair upekṣyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ ninditaṃ kurvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kaś-cin na nivāryate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pita āpi hi viṣaṃ khādan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na eva putrair upekṣyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vijñāpayāmi tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kriyatāṃ ca vaco mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>buddhivṛddhena hi grāhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālād api subhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vijñāpayāmi tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kriyatāṃ ca vaco mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>buddhi-vṛddhena hi grāhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālād api su-bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anāryapriyam āryeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kāryaṃ kāryam īdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāryaṃ cen mahyam ātmīyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṃśam āryaḥ prayacchatu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-ārya-priyam āryeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kāryaṃ kāryam īdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāryaṃ cen mahyam ātmīyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṃśam āryaḥ prayacchatu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam ahaṃ gurave dattvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dakṣiṇāyopakāriṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratijñābhāravikṣepād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāsyāmi laghutām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam ahaṃ gurave dattvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dakṣiṇāya upakāriṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratijñā-bhāra-vikṣepād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāsyāmi laghutām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.126'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kruddhau ca lubdhau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaniṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhamadhyamau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dugdhagardhāndhabuddhitvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramāpayitum icchataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.126'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kruddhau ca lubdhau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaniṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭha-madhyamau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dugdha-gardha-andha-buddhitvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramāpayitum icchataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.127'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taiḥ kadācit pipāsāndhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānthasaṃhātasaṃkulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adṛśyamānapānīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭaṃ kūparasātalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.127'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taiḥ kadā-cit pipāsā-andhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāntha-saṃhāta-saṃkulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-dṛśyamāna-pānīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭaṃ kūpa-rasātalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.128'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jalam atrāsti nāstīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdehavinivṛttaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>teṣām anyatamaḥ pānthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūpe loṣṭum apātayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.128'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jalam atra asti na asti iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdeha-vinivṛttaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>teṣām anyatamaḥ pānthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūpe loṣṭum apātayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.129'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ ṣvād iti kṛtvā taj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jarjaraṃ ghaṭakarparam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>babhañja sa ca saṃdehaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pathikānāṃ nyavartata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.129'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ ṣvād iti kṛtvā taj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jarjaraṃ ghaṭa-karparam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>babhañja sa ca saṃdehaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pathikānāṃ nyavartata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.130'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīrya tataḥ kūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tritaḥ karuṇayāvṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānthair uttārayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rajjubhir bhāṇḍamaṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.130'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīrya tataḥ kūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tritaḥ karuṇayā āvṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānthair uttārayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rajjubhir bhāṇḍa-maṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.131'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena gāvaś ca pānthāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrātarau ca mahātmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttāryottārya pānīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtāḥ snāpitapāyitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.131'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena gāvaś ca pānthāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrātarau ca mahā-ātmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttārya uttārya pānīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtāḥ snāpita-pāyitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.132'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pathikeṣu tu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtārthāv ekatadvitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kūpae eva tritaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sagoyuthau palāyitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.132'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pathikeṣu tu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛta-arthāv ekata-dvitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kūpae eva tritaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-go-yuthau palāyitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.133'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tritas tu ghaṭam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rajjvaiva saha pātitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirāśiś cintayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇam uttārakāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.133'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tritas tu ghaṭam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rajjva aiva saha pātitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-āśiś cintayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇam uttāra-kāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.134'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āṃ smṛtaṃ labdham ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vedavṛttāntapeśalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māhendrīm akarod iṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manasaiva mahāmanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.134'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āṃ smṛtaṃ labdham ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>veda-vṛtta-anta-peśalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māhendrīm akarod iṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manasa aiva mahā-manāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.135'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānantaram unnamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niśīthadhvāntakarburāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanuṣmantas taḍitvanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghanā jalam apātayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.135'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha an-antaram unnamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niśītha-dhvānta-karburāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanuṣmantas taḍitvanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghanā- jalam apātayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.136'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śanakaiḥ śanakaiḥ kūpāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūryamāṇān navāmbubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prataran prataran dhīraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>golehyād utthitas tritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.136'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śanakaiḥ śanakaiḥ kūpāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūryamāṇān nava-ambubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prataran prataran dhīraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>go-lehyād utthitas tritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.137'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā ca stokam adhvānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gokhurālīṃ nirūpayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apavargam ivādrākṣīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūrtimantaṃ tridaṇḍinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.137'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā ca stokam adhvānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>go-khurālīṃ nirūpayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apavargam iva adrākṣīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūrtimantaṃ tri-daṇḍinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.138'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhivādya tam aprākṣīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārge bhagavatā kvacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na dṛṣṭāv evamākārau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sagoyūthau dvijāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.138'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhivādya tam aprākṣīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārge bhagavatā kva-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na dṛṣṭāv evam-ākārau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-go-yūthau dvi-jāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.139'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ na mayā dṛṣṭau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tau mahāpāpakāriṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yau tvāṃ pātālagambhire</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūpe bhrātaram aujjhatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.139'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ na mayā dṛṣṭau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tau mahā-pāpa-kāriṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yau tvāṃ pātāla-gambhire</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūpe bhrātaram aujjhatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.140'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praṣṭavyāv api na kṣudrau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draṣṭavyāv api na tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāv evaṃ ninditācārau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṣṭavyau kuta eva tau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.140'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praṣṭavyāv api na kṣudrau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draṣṭavyāv api na tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāv evaṃ nindita-ācārau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṣṭavyau kuta eva tau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.141'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam uvāca tritaḥ krodhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhūrtaṃ kaluṣamānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣṭamaskariṇaṃ dhik tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhunindāviśāradam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.141'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam uvāca tritaḥ krodhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhūrtaṃ kaluṣa-mānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣṭa-maskariṇaṃ dhik tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhu-nindā-viśāradam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.142'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñānendukiraṇavyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃmohadhvāntasaṃcayāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛśā eva jānanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhavaṃ na bhavādṛśāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.142'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñāna-indu-kiraṇa-vyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃmoha-dhvānta-saṃcayāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tā-dṛśā- eva jānanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhavaṃ na bhavā-dṛśāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.143'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasya parivrājaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śucitāmraghaṭāruṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātaṃ vikasitajyotiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kirīṭābharaṇaṃ śiraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.143'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasya parivrājaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuci-tāmra-ghaṭa-aruṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātaṃ vikasita-jyotiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kirīṭa-ābharaṇaṃ śiraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.144'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīraṃ ca sahasrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karaṃ ca kuliśākulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtaivamādikākāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa jātaḥ sarvathā hariḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.144'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīraṃ ca sahasra-akṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karaṃ ca kuliśa-ākulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛta-evam-ādika-ākāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa jātaḥ sarvathā hariḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.145'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varaṃ brūhīti tenoktas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tritas tuṣṭas tam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātarau me sapāpau ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apāpau bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.145'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varaṃ brūhi iti tena uktas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tritas tuṣṭas tam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātarau me sa-pāpau ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-pāpau bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.146'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punar brūhīti tenoktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punar apy abravīt tritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gurū me gurave gās tāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītau vitaratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.146'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punar brūhi iti tena uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punar apy abravīt tritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gurū me gurave gās tāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītau vitaratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.147'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaḥ prītatamenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hariṇā yācyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paryāptam iti tenokte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītaḥ śakro divaṃ yayau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.147'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaḥ prītatamena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hariṇā yācyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paryāptam iti tena ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītaḥ śakro divaṃ yayau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.148'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ mahendradaivatyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iṣṭiṃ nirvartya mānasīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāt pātālagambhīrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avaṭād uttithas tritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.148'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ mahā-indra-daivatyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iṣṭiṃ nirvartya mānasīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmāt pātāla-gambhīrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avaṭād uttithas tritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.149'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathāham api tām iṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ na kuryāṃ manomayīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yājakais tu vinā yajñaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣatriyasya virudhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.149'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatha āham api tām iṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ na kuryāṃ mano-mayīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yājakais tu vinā yajñaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣatriyasya virudhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.150'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād asmād upāyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kenottiṣṭheyam ity aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti ceti ca nirdhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smṛtyāmitagatiṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.150'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād asmād upāyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kena uttiṣṭheyam ity aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti ca iti ca nirdhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smṛtya āmitagatiṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.151'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śaṅkubandhanamuktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tenāhaṃ yācitas tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṣṭām āpadam āpanno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidhaye māṃ smarer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.151'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śaṅku-bandhana-muktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena ahaṃ yācitas tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṣṭām āpadam āpanno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidhaye māṃ smarer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.152'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asoḍhaprārthanāduḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varaṃ tyaktaṃ śarīrakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tu pratyupakārāśā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rujājarjaritaṃ dhṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.152'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-soḍha-prārthanā-duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varaṃ tyaktaṃ śarīrakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tu pratyupakāra-āśā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rujā-jarjaritaṃ dhṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.153'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca cintayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kūpe kūpataros tale</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyam aham ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ cāmitagatiṃ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.153'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca cintayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kūpe kūpa-taros tale</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyam aham ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ ca amitagatiṃ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.154'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ cāvocat sa vanditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣaghargharayā girā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmatsmaraṇapūto 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janaḥ kiṃ kurutām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.154'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ ca avocat sa vanditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣa-ghargharayā girā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmat-smaraṇa-pūto 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janaḥ kiṃ kurutām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.155'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khe saṃgrāmayamāṇāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha bhrātrā balīyasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vegavatyāḥ sahāyatvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācareti tam ādiśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.155'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khe saṃgrāmayamāṇāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha bhrātrā balīyasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vegavatyāḥ sahāyatvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācara iti tam ādiśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.156'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam aryaduhitur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegavatyāḥ sahāyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kartum icchati yo mohān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāgauriṃ sa rakṣati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.156'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam arya-duhitur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegavatyāḥ sahāyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kartum icchati yo mohān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-gauriṃ sa rakṣati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.157'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ājñā tu prathamaṃ dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kartavyaivānujīvinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājñāsaṃpattimātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtyād bhartā hi bhidyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.157'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ājñā tu prathamaṃ dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kartavya aiva anujīvinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājñā-saṃpatti-mātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtyād bhartā hi bhidyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_15.158'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāvat sarojajalajadhvajavajralakṣmyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvatpādapaṅkajayugaṃ na namāmi yāvat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śatror galadgalasirārudhireṇa mūrdhnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nābhyarcitaṃ madasilūnaśirodhareṇa ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_15.158'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāvat saro-ja-jala-ja-dhvaja-vajra-lakṣmyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvat-pāda-paṅka-ja-yugaṃ na namāmi yāvat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śatror galad-gala-sirā-rudhireṇa mūrdhnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na abhyarcitaṃ mad-asi-lūna-śiro-dhareṇa ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsau mām avanditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nistriṃśakarakaṅkaṭaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārohad ambaraṃ kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandendugrahacandrike ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asau mām avanditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nistriṃśa-kara-kaṅkaṭaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārohad ambaraṃ kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manda-indu-graha-candrike ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ cotpatantam ākāśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaraṃ vālambitatvaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na pṛcchāmi sma panthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>deśaṃ nagaram eva vā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca utpatantam ākāśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaraṃ vā ālambita-tvaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na pṛcchāmi sma panthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>deśaṃ nagaram eva vā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gāhamānaś ca valmīka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthāṇukaṇṭakasaṃkaṭām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṭavīṃ siṃhamātaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṇḍarīkākulām agām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gāhamānaś ca valmīka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthāṇu-kaṇṭaka-saṃkaṭām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṭavīṃ siṃha-mātaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṇḍarīka-ākulām agām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāmitagatikrodha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vahnibhāseva bhāsitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ lohitāyantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prācīm aruṇaśociṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha amitagati-krodha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vahni-bhāsa īva bhāsitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ lohita-āyantīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prācīm aruṇa-śociṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaṃcic cādhvānam ākramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deśe nātighanadrume</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivādidhvanighaṇṭānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ gavām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaṃ-cic ca adhvānam ākramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deśe na ati-ghana-drume</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivādi-dhvani-ghaṇṭānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ gavām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anumāya tatas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasantaṃ deśam antike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātāśvāsamatir gacchan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇenāraṇyam atyajam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anumāya tatas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasantaṃ deśam antike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāta-āśvāsa-matir gacchan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaṇenā araṇyam atyajam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tuṣārasamayārambha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhīyeva kamalākarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ dhūsaracchāyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchan dinakarodaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tuṣāra-samaya-ārambha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhīya īva kamala-ākarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ dhūsara-cchāyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchan dina-kara-udaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athālikulanīlāgra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vilasatkundakānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālavālaparikṣipta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūlam udyānam āsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ali-kula-nīla-agra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vilasat-kunda-kānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālavāla-parikṣipta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūlam udyānam āsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra saṃmārjanavyagram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udyānaparicārakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭavān asmi kasyedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udyānam iti so 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra saṃmārjana-vyagram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udyāna-paricārakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭavān asmi kasya idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udyānam iti so 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ ca devakumāro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyajñānāmalāśayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmadādīn abodhāndhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdihann iva pṛcchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ ca deva-kumāro 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divya-jñānā-mala-āśayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmad-ādīn a-bodha-andhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdihann iva pṛcchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā kiṃ na etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahātmano hi mādṛśaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍanti tena devena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayaṃ vijñāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā kiṃ na etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-ātmano hi mā-dṛśaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍanti tena devena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayaṃ vijñāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dvitīyam udyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīyataraṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśyāpaśyam udyāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandiraṃ tuṅgatoraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dvitīyam udyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīyataraṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśya apaśyam udyāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandiraṃ tuṅga-toraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviśāmi sma tatrāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eko dauvārikaś ca mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antare vetram ādhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiṣṭheti dvāry adhārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviśāmi sma tatra aham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eko dauvārikaś ca mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antare vetram ādhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiṣṭha iti dvāry adhārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvocad dvitīyas taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhik tvāṃ nirbuddhacakṣuṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivārayasi yo mohād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>enam ambaracāriṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avocad dvitīyas taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhik tvāṃ nirbuddha-cakṣuṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivārayasi yo mohād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>enam ambara-cāriṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ kadācit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śruto vā kaścid īdṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ vā praviśan dhīraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharaṇīdhīradhīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ kadā-cit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śruto vā kaś-cid īdṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ vā praviśan dhīraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharaṇī-dhīra-dhīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam ananujñātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartrā nāradam apy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśantaṃ nānujānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punaḥ saumyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam an-anujñātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartrā nāradam apy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśantaṃ na anujānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punaḥ saumyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu dhriyamāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>digdantigatidhīrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśaty eva pāruṣya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātrasārā hi mādṛśāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu dhriyamāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dig-danti-gati-dhīrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśaty eva pāruṣya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātra-sārā- hi mā-dṛśāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha niṣkāraṇotkaṇṭhā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>karam udyānamandiram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāviśaṃ nisvanadvīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinītāṇḍajavānaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha niṣ-kāraṇa-utkaṇṭhā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>karam udyāna-mandiram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāviśaṃ nisvanad-vīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinīta-aṇḍa-ja-vānaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāsīnaṃ śilāpaṭṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citrapaṭṭopadhānake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyam amarākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naraṃ nāgarakeśvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrā asīnaṃ śilā-paṭṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citra-paṭṭa-upadhānake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyam a-mara-ākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naraṃ- nāgaraka-īśvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upasṛtya tam ābhāṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhoḥ sādho sukham āsyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaccid vā pratyavekṣyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahukṛtvaḥ kalā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upasṛtya tam ābhāṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhoḥ sādho sukham āsyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kac-cid vā pratyavekṣyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahu-kṛtvaḥ kalā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīṇāvyāsaktacittatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyati sma na mām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avakṣiptaṃ hi dṛśyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manaḥ paśyati nekṣaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīṇā-vyāsakta-cittatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyati sma na mām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avakṣiptaṃ hi dṛśyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manaḥ paśyati nā ikṣaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu calitā vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītvāgre yadā tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇātaś cakṣur ākṣipya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayi nikṣiptavān asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu calitā vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītva āgre yadā tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇātaś cakṣur ākṣipya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayi nikṣiptavān asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃbhrāntam utthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sraṃsamānottarāmbaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām upāveśayat prītas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasminn eva śilāsane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃbhrāntam utthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sraṃsamāna-uttara-ambaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām upāveśayat prītas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasminn eva śilā-āsane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pādacārapariśrāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgaṃ saṃvāhya māmakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakṣālya ca svayaṃ pādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattārghaḥ samupāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāda-cāra-pariśrāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgaṃ saṃvāhya māmakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakṣālya ca svayaṃ pādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>datta-arghaḥ samupāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuyuktaś ca sa mayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ko 'yaṃ janapadas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūṣitaḥ katamac cedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puraṃ saccaritair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuyuktaś ca sa mayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ko 'yaṃ jana-padas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūṣitaḥ katamac ca idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puraṃ sac-caritair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tena vihasyoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāvyā nabhasā gatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvādṛśāṃ devaputrāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ajñānaṃ tu na yujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tena vihasya uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāvyā nabhasā gatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvā-dṛśāṃ deva-putrāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-jñānaṃ tu na yujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo hi deśāntaraṃ yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mugdho 'pi dharaṇīcaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agrato bhāvitaṃ deśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nābuddhvā saṃprapadyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo hi deśa-antaraṃ yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mugdho 'pi dharaṇī-caraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agrato bhāvitaṃ deśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na a-buddhvā saṃprapadyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deśaś candraprakāśo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candrikāprakaṭā purī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na jñātā pathikeneti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥśliṣṭam iva dṛśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deśaś candraprakāśo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candrikāprakaṭā purī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na jñātā pathikena iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥ-śliṣṭam iva dṛśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenāmarakumāras tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avatīrṇo vihāyasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ajñānacchadmanā channaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīḍituṃ madvidhair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena a-mara-kumāras tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avatīrṇo vihāyasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-jñāna-cchadmanā channaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīḍituṃ mad-vidhair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāhaṃ cintayitvedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uttarābhāsam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvijo 'haṃ vatsaviṣaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasataḥ pitarau mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ahaṃ cintayitva īdam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uttara-ābhāsam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvi-jo 'haṃ vatsa-viṣaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasataḥ pitarau mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ karṇasukhācāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadācin mantravādinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutvā dārair asaṃtuṣṭo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣīṃ kāṃcid asādhayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ karṇa-sukha-ācāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadā-cin mantra-vādinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutvā dārair a-saṃtuṣṭo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣīṃ kāṃ-cid asādhayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā cāhaṃ ca tataḥ prītau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaile śaile vane vane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad vā yad rucitaṃ tasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra tatrāramāvahi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā ca ahaṃ ca tataḥ prītau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaile śaile vane vane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad vā yad rucitaṃ tasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra tatra aramāvahi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā rātrau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na me yakṣyā prayojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pātālamantram ārādhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramayāmy asurīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā rātrau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na me yakṣyā prayojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pātāla-mantram ārādhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramayāmy asurīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atherṣyādūṣitadhiyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayāhaṃ yakṣakanyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ānīya nabhasā nyastaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pure 'smin bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā irṣyā-dūṣita-dhiyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taya āhaṃ yakṣa-kanyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ānīya nabhasā nyastaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pure 'smin bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ na na saṃbhāvyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yakṣarakṣaḥsu caṇḍatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścāt tāpagṛhītā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na sā yusṃān vimokṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ na na saṃbhāvyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yakṣa-rakṣaḥsu caṇḍatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścāt tāpa-gṛhītā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na sā yusṃān vimokṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko 'yaṃ janapadaḥ syāt kā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purīti ca yad ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgā janapadaḥ sphītaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>campā ceyaṃ mahāpurī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko 'yaṃ jana-padaḥ syāt kā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puri īti ca yad ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgā jana-padaḥ sphītaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>campā ca iyaṃ mahā-purī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ ca dattako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṇik paurapuraskṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasiddhaḥ priyavīṇatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇādattakanāmakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ ca dattako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṇik paura-puras-kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasiddhaḥ priya-vīṇatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇādattaka-nāmakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāhūyābravīd ekaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa karṇe paricārakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍhaṃ parikaraṃ badhnan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhāvamānaḥ sa cāgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā ahūya abravīd ekaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa karṇe paricārakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍhaṃ parikaraṃ badhnan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhāvamānaḥ sa ca agamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣaṇena ca parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvasitaspanditodaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmipravahaṇaṃ prāptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti dattakam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣaṇena ca parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvasita-spandita-udaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmi-pravahaṇaṃ prāptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti dattakam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvatārya muditaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāṅguler aṅgulīyakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattavān dattakas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śīghrapreṣaṇakāriṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avatārya muditaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-aṅguler aṅgulīyakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattavān dattakas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śīghra-preṣaṇa-kāriṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtāñjalir athovāca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yakṣīkāmuka dhāvyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāvanair dāsabhavanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pādanikṣepaṇair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta-añjalir atha uvāca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yakṣī-kāmuka dhāvyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāvanair dāsa-bhavanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāda-nikṣepaṇair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāruhya pravahaṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattakavāhakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītacārusaṃcāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>campām abhimukho 'gamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā aruhya pravahaṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattaka-vāhakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhīta-cāru-saṃcāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>campām abhi-mukho 'gamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śṛṇomi sma ca paurāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalpatām itaretaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciraṃjīvadbhir āścaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛthivyāṃ kiṃ na dṛśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śṛṇomi sma ca paurāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalpatām itara-itaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciraṃ-jīvadbhir āścaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛthivyāṃ kiṃ na dṛśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva nāgarakasenānīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattakas tuṅgamastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva ca kasyāpi pānthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rajjubhāge vyavasthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva nāgaraka-senā-nīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattakas tuṅga-mastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva ca kasya api pānthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rajju-bhāge vyavasthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāpareṇa tatroktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ata evāyumattamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena lokottamasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rajjubhāge vyavasthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha apareṇa tatra uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ata evā ayumattamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena loka-uttamasya asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rajju-bhāge vyavasthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākārānumitaṃ caitad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇasaṃbhārabhāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu cāsya vasanto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sārathyena vikathyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāra-anumitaṃ ca etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇa-saṃbhāra-bhāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu ca asya vasanto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sārathyena vikathyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭavān paritaś cāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kvacid utsṛṣṭalāṅgalān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hālikān halamūleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇāvādanatatparān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭavān paritaś ca ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva-cid utsṛṣṭa-lāṅgalān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hālikān hala-mūleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇā-vādana-tat-parān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvacid uddāmagovargaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṭe gopālamaṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vitantrīs tāḍayadvīṇāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karṇaśūlapradāyinīḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva-cid uddāma-go-vargaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṭe go-pāla-maṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vitantrīs tāḍayad-vīṇāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karṇa-śūla-pradāyinīḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsannaś ca puradvāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikrayāya prasāritām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇāvayavasaṃpūrṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ śakaṭāvalīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsannaś ca pura-dvāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikrayāya prasāritām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇā-avayava-saṃpūrṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ śakaṭa-āvalīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijarjaritakarṇaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vitantrīdhvanimudgaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyastapadmanidhānābhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpnomi sma vaṇikpatham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijarjarita-karṇaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vitantrī-dhvani-mudgaraiḥ</seg> </l>
