<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyasta-padma-nidhāna-abhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpnomi sma vaṇik-patham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuṅkumaṃ kretum āyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaścid vāṇijam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇāvikṣiptacetasko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇā me dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuṅkumaṃ kretum āyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaś-cid vāṇijam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇā-vikṣipta-cetasko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇā me dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cirād ākarṇya tad vākyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kupitaḥ sa tam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṇijo 'nye kim utsannā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena khādasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cirād ākarṇya tad vākyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kupitaḥ sa tam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṇijo 'nye kim utsannā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena khādasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ vardhakikarmāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kulālavaruḍādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nikṛṣṭajanmakarmāṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saktā vīṇām avādayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ vardhaki-karmāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kulāla-varuḍa-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nikṛṣṭa-janma-karmāṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saktā- vīṇām avādayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prāyaṃ ciraṃ dvāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattakaveśmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śātakumbhamayaiḥ kumbhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambhogarbhaiḥ samaṅgalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prāyaṃ ciraṃ dvāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattaka-veśmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śātakumbha-mayaiḥ kumbhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambho-garbhaiḥ sa-maṅgalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra yānād avaprutya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāviśaṃ gṛham ṛddhimat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utthāsnur iva medhāvī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśālaṃ hṛdayaṃ śriyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra yānād avaprutya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāviśaṃ gṛham ṛddhimat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utthāsnur iva medhāvī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśālaṃ hṛdayaṃ śriyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dattakas tu puro 'smākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāsīdāsam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adyārabhyāsya yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ājñā saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dattakas tu puro 'smākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāsī-dāsam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adyā arabhya asya yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ājñā saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vyajñāpayan prahvāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūpakārāḥ sametya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājñāpayata yuṣmakāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaḥ pākaḥ sādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vyajñāpayan prahvāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūpa-kārāḥ sametya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājñāpayata yuṣmakāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaḥ pākaḥ sādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīn mayā tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇatvaṃ prakāśitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brāhmaṇāś ca ghṛtakṣīra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>guḍādimadhurapriyāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīn mayā tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇatvaṃ prakāśitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brāhmaṇāś ca ghṛta-kṣīra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>guḍa-ādi-madhura-priyāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad idaṃ yuktam ity etac</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cintayitvedam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu hastapuṭagrāhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāyasaṃ sādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad idaṃ yuktam ity etac</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cintayitva īdam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu hasta-puṭa-grāhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāyasaṃ sādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha hastaṃ vidhūyoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūpakāreṇa gacchatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>annasaṃskāraśāstrajñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāṃ diśaṃ yāntu saṃprati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha hastaṃ vidhūya uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūpa-kāreṇa gacchatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anna-saṃskāra-śāstra-jñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāṃ diśaṃ yāntu saṃprati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhīmasenādibhir yāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūdaśāstrāṇi cakrire</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karmakaryo 'pi tāny asmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhe prāyeṇa jānate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhīmasena-ādibhir yāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūda-śāstrāṇi cakrire</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karma-karyo 'pi tāny asmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhe prāyeṇa jānate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣīkāmukam āsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhuṃ bhojanakovidam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anarthakāni jātāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caritārthāni pāyase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣī-kāmukam āsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhuṃ bhojana-kovidam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-arthakāni jātāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>carita-arthāni pāyase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho nāgarakaḥ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayaṃ pravahaṇena yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālekhyayakṣam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣīkāmukam āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho nāgarakaḥ svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayaṃ pravahaṇena yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālekhya-yakṣam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣī-kāmukam āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā dhig akāryajñam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aiśvaryajanitaṃ madam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gamitaḥ preṣyatāṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mādṛśo 'pīdṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā dhig a-kārya-jñam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aiśvarya-janitaṃ madam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gamitaḥ preṣyatāṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā-dṛśo 'pī idṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mardanaśāstrajñas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taruṇaḥ paricārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mamāṅgaṃ gandhatailena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛdnāti sma yathāsukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mardana-śāstra-jñas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taruṇaḥ paricārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mama aṅgaṃ gandha-tailena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛdnāti sma yathā-sukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścād udvartanaṃ snānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahatāmbaradhāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtvā devapraṇāmaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaṃ bhojanamaṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścād udvartanaṃ snānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-hata-ambara-dhāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtvā deva-praṇāmaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyaṃ bhojana-maṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra bhojanabhūmiṣṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ namaskṛtya dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sabhrātṛbhāgineyādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṅktimadhyae upāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra bhojana-bhūmi-ṣṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ namas-kṛtya dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-bhrātṛ-bhāgineya-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṅkti-madhyae upāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kulālacakrapātrī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātrī mama hiraṇmayī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāyasenenduvarṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūpakāreṇa pūritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kulāla-cakra-pātrī ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātrī mama hiraṇmayī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāyasena indu-varṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūpa-kāreṇa pūritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pārśve pāyasapātryāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tejasvimaṇibhājane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāsāramusārasthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthāpite madhusarpiṣī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pārśve pāyasa-pātryāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tejasvi-maṇi-bhājane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-sāra-musāra-sthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthāpite madhu-sarpiṣī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā jāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahānayam upadravaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhumāṃsocitaḥ kvāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva cedaṃ ghṛtapāyasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā jāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-nayam upadravaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhu-māṃsā-ucitaḥ kva ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva ca idaṃ ghṛta-pāyasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kena nāma prakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyajeyam idam ity aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicārya pāyasagrāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dagdho 'smīti nirastavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kena nāma prakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyajeyam idam ity aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicārya pāyasa-grāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dagdho 'smi iti nirastavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣāṃ saṃpratyayārthaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>haran dāharujaṃ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śītapānīyagaṇḍūṣair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukhaṃ muhur aśītayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣāṃ saṃpratyaya-arthaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>haran dāha-rujaṃ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śīta-pānīya-gaṇḍūṣair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukhaṃ muhur aśītayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ballavas tu puraḥ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattakam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāyaṃ vipraḥ kathaṃ vipraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradviṣyād ghṛtapāyasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ballavas tu puraḥ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattakam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ayaṃ vipraḥ kathaṃ vipraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradviṣyād ghṛta-pāyasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ācaṣṭa mardakaś cedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsavāmodavāsitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niśvāso 'sya mayā ghrātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanakair niścarann iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ācaṣṭa mardakaś ca idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsavā-moda-vāsitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niśvāso 'sya mayā ghrātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanakair niścarann iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dattako 'pi karāgreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pidhāya mukham ātmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kampayitvottamāṅgaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ bruvantaṃ nyavārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dattako 'pi kara-agreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pidhāya mukham ātmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kampayitva ūttama-aṅgaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ bruvantaṃ nyavārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca payaḥpānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yūyaṃ pibata pānakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānakasyāpi pānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>goṣṭhī saṃmānyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca payaḥ-pānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yūyaṃ pibata pānakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānakasya api pānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>goṣṭhī saṃmānyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu jātatarṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāne pariṇatiṃ gate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat pītaṃ pānasādṛśyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānabuddhyaiva pānakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu jāta-tarṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāne pariṇatiṃ gate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat pītaṃ pāna-sādṛśyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāna-buddhya aiva pānakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khaṇḍamāṃsaprakārādyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānādhiṣṭhānasaṃkulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sevitvāhāram agrāmyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udatiṣṭhaṃ sadattakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khaṇḍa-māṃsa-prakāra-ādyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānā-adhiṣṭhāna-saṃkulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sevitvā āhāram a-grāmyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udatiṣṭhaṃ sa-dattakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃmṛṣṭabhojanasthāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṣpacchuritakuṭṭime</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāntam adhyāsi paryaṅkaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyastaṃ tatraiva maṇḍape ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃmṛṣṭa-bhojana-sthāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṣpa-cchurita-kuṭṭime</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāntam adhyāsi paryaṅkaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyastaṃ tatra eva maṇḍape ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karpūratriphalānābhi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lavaṅgailāsugandhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mukhasya gandharāgau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmbulenodapādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karpūra-tri-phalā-nābhi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lavaṅga-elā-su-gandhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mukhasya gandha-rāgau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmbulena udapādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca sukham āsīno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattakam abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīnonmattir iyaṃ kasmāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>campāyāṃ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca sukham āsīno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattakam abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīnā-unmattir iyaṃ kasmāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>campāyāṃ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam iha campāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāso vaṇikpatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya gandharvadatteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutā trailokyasundarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam iha campāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāso vaṇik-patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya gandharvadatta īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sutā trailokya-sundarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca tāṃ dhriyamāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varair varaguṇākaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhiprāyeṇa kenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kasmaicit prayacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca tāṃ dhriyamāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varair vara-guṇa-ākaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhiprāyeṇa kena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kasmai-cit prayacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyākhyātum aśaktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yācitena kṣaṇe kṣaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena śulkam upanyastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥsaṃpādaṃ surair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyākhyātum a-śaktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yācitena kṣaṇe kṣaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena śulkam upanyastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥ-saṃpādaṃ surair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apūrvaṃ kila gāyantyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāḥ kim api gītakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo 'nuvādayitā vīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṇetā sa tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-pūrvaṃ kila gāyantyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāḥ kim api gītakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo 'nuvādayitā vīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṇetā sa tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayeyaṃ pariṇetavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayeyam iti nistrapaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kaścid yo na campāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇayonmattakaḥ kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya īyaṃ pariṇetavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya īyam iti nis-trapaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kaś-cid yo na campāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇaya ūnmattakaḥ kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puro nāgarakāṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catuḥṣaṣṭes tadarthinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe gate māse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā tad gāyati gītakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puro nāgarakāṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catuḥ-ṣaṣṭes tad-arthinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe gate māse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā tad gāyati gītakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena ca prakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātaḥ kālo mahān ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na cāpi vīṇayā kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anugacchati tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena ca prakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yātaḥ kālo mahān ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca api vīṇayā kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anugacchati tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etatkathāvasāne ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣau śrotriyākṛtī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇādattakam abrūtāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthavirau vetradhāriṇau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etat-kathā-avasāne ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣau śrotriya-ākṛtī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇādattakam abrūtāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthavirau vetra-dhāriṇau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śreṣṭhinā preṣitāv āvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdeśena tvadantikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi sajjā suhṛdgoṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samasyā kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śreṣṭhinā preṣitāv āvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdeśena tvad-antikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi sajjā suhṛd-goṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samasyā kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ suhṛdaḥ sajjā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi vaḥ susthitā gṛhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalyā gandharvadattā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva eva kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ suhṛdaḥ sajjā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi vaḥ su-sthitā- gṛhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalyā gandharvadattā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva eva kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahotsāhena cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rūpaṃ gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kīdṛg ity atha so 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-utsāhena cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rūpaṃ gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kī-dṛg ity atha so 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_16.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ svakāntipariveṣapaṭāpidhānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>netraprabhāprakarasāritaharmyagarbham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkṛṣṭavismayavimohitamānasena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpaṃ nirūpayitum eva mayā na śakyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_16.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ sva-kānti-pariveṣa-paṭa-apidhānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>netra-prabhā-prakara-sārita-harmya-garbham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkṛṣṭa-vismaya-vimohita-mānasena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpaṃ nirūpayitum eva mayā na śakyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharvadattāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāṃ guṇākārasaṃpadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samākarṇyaiva karṇābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mano nītaṃ vidheyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharvadattāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāṃ guṇa-ākāra-saṃpadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samākarṇya eva karṇābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mano nītaṃ vidheyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛcchāmi sma ca bhūyas tam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>api śakyā bhaven mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭuṃ gandharvadatteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena coktaṃ na śakyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛcchāmi sma ca bhūyas tam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>api śakyā bhaven mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭuṃ gandharvadatta īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena ca uktaṃ na śakyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>agāndharveṇa sā draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devenāpi na śakyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi cecchatha tāṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāndharvaṃ śikṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-gāndharveṇa sā draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devena api na śakyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi ca icchatha tāṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāndharvaṃ śikṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ nāradīye 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivṛtte kila labhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāndharvaśabdas tat tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmākaṃ kāryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ nāradīye 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivṛtte kila labhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāndharva-śabdas tat tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmākaṃ kāryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato vyāharitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇācāryaḥ kharasvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṣṭaśrutisvarajñāno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūtiko nāma durbhagaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato vyāharitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇā-ācāryaḥ khara-svaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṣṭa-śruti-svara-jñāno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūtiko nāma dur-bhagaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama taṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikṛtaṃ naravānaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ me nāradīyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtaṃ gandharvadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama taṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikṛtaṃ nara-vānaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ me nāradīyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtaṃ gandharvadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>īdṛśaḥ śiṣyatāṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājyalābho 'pi garhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyāyāgatam aiśvaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nindanty eva hi sādhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>īdṛśaḥ śiṣyatāṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājya-lābho 'pi garhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-nyāya-āgatam aiśvaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nindanty eva hi sādhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhyutthānābhivādābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ vīṇādattakādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apūjayan mayā cāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na draṣṭum api pāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhyutthāna-abhivādābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ vīṇādattaka-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apūjayan mayā ca asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na draṣṭum api pāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ruṣṭakaṭākṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lohitākṣaḥ sa vīkṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇādattakadattāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pīṭhikāyām upāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ruṣṭa-kaṭa-akṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lohita-akṣaḥ sa vīkṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇādattaka-dattāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pīṭhikāyām upāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīd dattakas taṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yakṣībhartur dvijanmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavān asyopapannasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāradīyaṃ karotv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīd dattakas taṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yakṣī-bhartur dvi-janmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavān asya upapannasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāradīyaṃ karotv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ sābhimānatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ mām avamanyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca pārayate dātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāridryāt kākaṇīm api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ sa-abhimānatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ mām avamanyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca pārayate dātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāridryāt kākaṇīm api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guruśuśrūṣayā vidyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṣkalena dhanena vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na cāsminn ekam apy asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yady asti pratipadyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guru-śuśrūṣayā vidyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṣkalena dhanena vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca asminn ekam apy asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yady asti pratipadyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dattakenoktam ācārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>virūpaṃ mantritaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko yakṣīkāmukaṃ śakto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daridram iti jalpitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dattakena uktam ācārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>virūpaṃ mantritaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko yakṣī-kāmukaṃ śakto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daridram iti jalpitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya dāsaḥ sadāso 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaṃ jānāsy eva mādṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa yakṣīkāmukaḥ kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daridra iti bhaṇyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya dāsaḥ sa-dāso 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaṃ jānāsy eva mā-dṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa yakṣī-kāmukaḥ kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daridra iti bhaṇyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suvarṇānāṃ śataṃ vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhyatāṃ tvād.śocitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patite droṇamegho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tiṣṭhati jalaṃ sthale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>su-varṇānāṃ śataṃ va āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhyatāṃ tvā-d.śa-ucitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patite droṇa-megho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tiṣṭhati jalaṃ sthale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāradādiparīvārāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa cābhyarcya sarasvatīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durvyavasthitatantrīkāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇāṃ mahyam upānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nārada-ādi-parīvārāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa ca abhyarcya sarasvatīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dur-vyavasthita-tantrīkāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇāṃ mahyam upānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu sā viparyaksthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthāpitāṅke yadā tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūtiko māṃ dhig ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇādattakam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu sā viparyak-sthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthāpita-aṅke yadā tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūtiko māṃ dhig ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇādattakam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na yakṣīkāmuko mandaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śakyaḥ śikṣayituṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇāgrahaṇam apy eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na jānāti sukhaiditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na yakṣī-kāmuko mandaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śakyaḥ śikṣayituṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇā-grahaṇam apy eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na jānāti sukha-editaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na nāma svayam etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi vīṇā na vāditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālekhyavādakāḥ ke 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na dṛṣṭā naṣṭadṛṣṭinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na nāma svayam etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi vīṇā na vāditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālekhya-vādakāḥ ke 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na dṛṣṭā- naṣṭa-dṛṣṭinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃtakṣya māṃ vāgbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātodyaṃ parivartya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa niṣādo niṣādaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaḍja ity upadiṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃtakṣya māṃ vāgbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātodyaṃ parivartya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa niṣādo niṣādaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaḍ-ja ity upadiṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāmarṣaparītena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛḍhaṃ tāḍayatā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catasraḥ pañca vā tantryaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chinnāś caḍ iti visvarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā amarṣa-parītena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛḍhaṃ tāḍayatā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catasraḥ pañca vā tantryaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chinnāś caḍ iti vi-svarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athokto dattakas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tantrīvartakasaṃgraham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṛtvā kiṃ karoty asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāradīyaṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ukto dattakas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tantrī-vartaka-saṃgraham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kṛtvā kiṃ karoty asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāradīyaṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu vismṛtacchadmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chinnatantrīm api kṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutivāsitakarṇatvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛdu vīṇām avādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu vismṛta-cchadmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chinna-tantrīm api kṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śruti-vāsita-karṇatvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛdu vīṇām avādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha visphāritair netrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utkarṇā dattakādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti jalpanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām aikṣanta savismayāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha visphāritair netrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ut-karṇā- dattaka-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti jalpanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām aikṣanta sa-vismayāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūtikas tu bhayakrodha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjāvismayaniṣprabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kākatālīyam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gata eva sadakṣiṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūtikas tu bhaya-krodha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjā-vismaya-niṣ-prabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kākatālīyam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gata eva sa-dakṣiṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca divasaṃ nitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtaprādoṣikāśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvasaṃ śayanāvāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mālāghūpādhivāsitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca divasaṃ nitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛta-prādoṣika-aśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvasaṃ śayana-āvāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mālā-ghūpa-adhivāsitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>haṃsapakṣāṃśukaprāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>komalāstaraṇāstṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāsvadvajraśilāpādam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āseve śayanaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>haṃsa-pakṣa-aṃśuka-prāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>komala-āstaraṇa-āstṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāsvad-vajra-śilā-pādam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āseve śayanaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rūpākṛṣṭajagannetre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvatī sārabhūṣaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rūpājīve śanaiḥ pādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samavāhayatāṃ mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rūpa-ākṛṣṭa-jagan-netre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvatī sāra-bhūṣaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rūpa-ājīve śanaiḥ pādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samavāhayatāṃ mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahajāhāryamādhurya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīyatarākṣaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vacobhiḥ kila te cittaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madīyaṃ hartum aicchatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saha-ja-a-hārya-mādhurya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīyatara-akṣaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vacobhiḥ kila te cittaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madīyaṃ hartum aicchatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegavatyā vimuktaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratibhānti sma tāni mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāsabhīr asitānīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>virasāni svakarṇayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegavatyā vimuktaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratibhānti sma tāni mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāsabhīr a-sitāni iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vi-rasāni sva-karṇayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāni cāśrotukāmena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nidrāvyājaḥ kṛto mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha prasupta evāsmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirāśe te ca jagmatuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāni ca a-śrotu-kāmena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nidrā-vyājaḥ kṛto mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha prasupta eva asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nir-āśe te ca jagmatuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ardhe yāte ca yāminyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvāsānumitacetane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭatattva ivāvidyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidrām atyajam utkaṭām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ardhe yāte ca yāminyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvāsa-anumita-cetane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭa-tattva iva a-vidyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidrām atyajam utkaṭām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citrapaṭṭapidhānāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tiṣṭhantyāṃ nāgadantake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇādattakavīṇāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato dṛṣṭiṃ nyapātayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citra-paṭṭa-pidhānāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tiṣṭhantyāṃ nāga-dantake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇādattaka-vīṇāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato dṛṣṭiṃ nyapātayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv asīd avaśyaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>netā śvas tatra dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇā ca vādanīyā syāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirotsṛṣṭā ca sā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv a-sīd a-vaśyaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>netā śvas tatra dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇā ca vādanīyā syāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cira-utsṛṣṭā ca sā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyā cārādhyamānāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥkhena paricīyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaktyā mātuḥ sapatnīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nisargakuṭilā hi sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyā cā arādhyamāna āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥkhena paricīyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaktyā mātuḥ sa-patni īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nisarga-kuṭilā hi sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīṇā saṃnihitā ceyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>velā ceyaṃ nirākulā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jijñāse tāvad ity enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vicāryāhaṃ gṛhītavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīṇā saṃnihitā ca iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>velā ca iyaṃ nir-ākulā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jijñāse tāvad ity enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vicārya ahaṃ gṛhītavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utkarṣann apakarṣaṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāścit kāścin manāṅ manāk</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyavasthāpayituṃ tantrīḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karaśākhabhir aspṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utkarṣann apakarṣaṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāś-cit kāś-cin manāṅ manāk</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyavasthāpayituṃ tantrīḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kara-śākhabhir aspṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāśṛṇavam ālāpān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasmād vāsagṛhād bahiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samudrasena godatta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhāva dhāva sakhe drutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aśṛṇavam ālāpān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasmād vāsa-gṛhād bahiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samudrasena godatta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhāva dhāva sakhe drutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīṇādattakabhadrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛheṣu kṛtakarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarasvatī bhagavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇāṃ sārayati svayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīṇādattaka-bhadrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛheṣu kṛta-karmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarasvatī bhagavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇāṃ sārayati svayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīṇāyāḥ sāryamāṇāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svanasyodaya īdṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāptasāraṇāyās tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kīdṛṅ nāma bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīṇāyāḥ sāryamāṇāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svanasya udaya īdṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāpta-sāraṇāyās tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kī-dṛṅ nāma bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt sarasvatīvīṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca saṃhate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>netraśrotrāṇi no yānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pavitrakaratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt sarasvatī-vīṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca saṃhate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>netra-śrotrāṇi no yānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pavitra-karatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvalambyat tāṃ vīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvarayā nāgadantake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāvṛtya saśiraḥpādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāyaṃ nidrāṃ kilāgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avalambyat tāṃ vīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvarayā nāga-dantake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāvṛtya sa-śiraḥ-pādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāyaṃ nidrāṃ kilā agamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāgarās tu nyavartanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalpanto dīnacetasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathaṃ sarasvatī kṣudrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛśyate 'smadvidhair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāgarās tu nyavartanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalpanto dīna-cetasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathaṃ sarasvatī kṣudrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛśyate 'smad-vidhair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāpitāyāṃ tu yāminyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtapūrvāhṇikakramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām anulbaṇaveṣaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanditvā dattako 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāpitāyāṃ tu yāminyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛta-pūrva-ahṇika-kramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām an-ulbaṇa-veṣaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanditvā dattako 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amī nāgarakāḥ prāptāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citrayānaprasādhanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad gandharvasamasyāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmābhir api gamyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amī nāgarakāḥ prāptāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citra-yāna-prasādhanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad gandharva-samasyāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmābhir api gamyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ājñāpayata yānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kareṇuturagādikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena vo rocate gantuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena prasthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ājñāpayata yānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kareṇu-turaga-ādikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena vo rocate gantuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena prasthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ gacchatu bhavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāhanena yathāsukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ tu pādacāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchāmi śanakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ gacchatu bhavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāhanena yathā-sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ tu pāda-cāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchāmi śanakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsmadanurodhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ purodhāya dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasthitaḥ pādacāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sanāgarakamaṇḍalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asmad-anurodhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ purodhāya dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasthitaḥ pāda-cāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-nāgaraka-maṇḍalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amantrayanta yāntaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kruddhā nāgarakā mithaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣīkāmukarūpo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anartho 'smān upāgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amantrayanta yāntaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kruddhā- nāgarakā- mithaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣī-kāmuka-rūpo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>an-artho 'smān upāgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayam asya prasādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktamaṇḍitavāhanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśādīrghāsu rathyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caraṇaiḥ saṃcarāmahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayam asya prasādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyakta-maṇḍita-vāhanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśā-dīrghāsu rathyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caraṇaiḥ saṃcarāmahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>meror droṇīr ivākraman</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśikhā vistṛtāyatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ veśmanāṃ mālās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyaiva sirasām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>meror droṇīr iva akraman</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśikhā- vistṛta-āyatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ veśmanāṃ mālās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya eva sirasām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāsādeṣu ca jalpantīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gavākṣapreritekṣaṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kokilāsubhagālāpāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṇomi sma kulāṅganāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāsādeṣu ca jalpantīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gava akṣa-prerita-īkṣaṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kokilā-su-bhaga-ālāpāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṇomi sma kula-aṅganāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi māgadhi vaidehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>malayāvati yāvani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣīkāmukam āyātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhyaḥ paśyata dhāvata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi māgadhi vaidehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>malayāvati yāvani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣī-kāmukam āyātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhyaḥ paśyata dhāvata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khalayā kila yakṣyāyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īrṣyāmuṣitacetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāśāt pātitaḥ prāpto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattakena sujanmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khalayā kila yakṣya āyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īrṣyā-muṣita-cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāśāt pātitaḥ prāpto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattakena su-janmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhruvaṃ sā rākṣasī yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi vā mṛttikāmayī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kruddhayā mugdhayā vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yayā svārtho na cetitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhruvaṃ sā rākṣasī yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi vā mṛttikā-mayī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kruddhayā mugdhayā va āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yayā sva-artho na cetitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā sarvam evedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alīkaṃ pratibhāti mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva yakṣīkāmikaḥ kvāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmaḥ kāmī rater iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā sarvam eva idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alīkaṃ pratibhāti mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva yakṣī-kāmikaḥ kva ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmaḥ kāmī rater iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti nirdiśyamāno 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgulībhir itas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nayanotpalamālābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arcyamānaś ca yātavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti nirdiśyamāno 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgulībhir itas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nayana-utpala-mālābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arcyamānaś ca yātavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nāgarakāḥ prāpan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sudhāṃ gṛhapater gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgaṃ gandharvadattāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣām iva manorathāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nāgarakāḥ prāpan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sudhāṃ gṛha-pater gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgaṃ gandharvadattāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣām iva mano-rathāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maṇihāṭakadantādyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgais tair eva kalpitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sphuraddivyaprabhāvāt tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na vidma kiṃmayair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maṇi-hāṭaka-danta-ādyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgais tair eva kalpitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sphurad-divya-prabhāvāt tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na vidma kiṃ-mayair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prathamakakṣāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ saṃnidhāpitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsanānāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāpaṭṭorṇaveṣṭitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prathama-kakṣāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ saṃnidhā-āpitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsanānāṃ catuḥ-ṣaṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-paṭṭa-ūrṇa-veṣṭitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu nāgarakaḥ kaścit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāṃścid āha sma sasmitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho mahākhalīkāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣīkāmukam āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu nāgarakaḥ kaś-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāṃś-cid āha sma sa-smitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho mahā-khalī-kāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣī-kāmukam āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sānudāsābhyanujñātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdo dattakādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāyātāś catuḥṣaṣṭis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvanty evāsanāny api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sānudāsa-abhyanujñātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdo dattaka-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāyātāś catuḥ-ṣaṣṭis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvanty evā asanāny api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣīkāmukam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañcaṣaṣṭam anāsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat satyaṃ lajjito 'smīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataś coktam ṛjur bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣī-kāmukam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañca-ṣaṣṭam an-āsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat satyaṃ lajjito 'smi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataś ca uktam ṛjur bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyatto dattako yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saputrapaśubāndhavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena gandharvadattāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sulabhā kim utāsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyatto dattako yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-putra-paśu-bāndhavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena gandharvadatta āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-labhā kim utā asanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañcaṣaṣṭam adṛṣṭvā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nikṣiptaṃ tatra dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattavān svayam ākṛṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahyam ātmīyam āsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañca-ṣaṣṭam a-dṛṣṭvā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nikṣiptaṃ tatra dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dattavān svayam ākṛṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahyam ātmīyam āsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te 'pi nāgarakāḥ śeṣāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthite tiṣṭhati dattake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭhanti sma sthitā eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtakā iva bhartari ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te 'pi nāgarakāḥ śeṣāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthite tiṣṭhati dattake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭhanti sma sthitā- eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtakā- iva bhartari ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānyad āsanaṃ dattaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattakāyojjvalaprabham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tad adhyāsta śeṣāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathāsanam upāviśan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha anyad āsanaṃ dattaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattakāya ujjvala-prabham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tad adhyāsta śeṣāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā āsanam upāviśan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas triṃśacchataṃ tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṇikānāṃ vinirgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhād asurakanyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāsurapurād iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas triṃśac-chataṃ tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṇikānāṃ vinirgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhād asura-kanyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-asura-purād iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āttaśṛṅgārabhṛṅgārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kācid āvarjayaj jalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāsāṃ pratyekam ekaikā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ pādān adhāvata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātta-śṛṅgāra-bhṛṅgārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kā-cid āvarjayaj jalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāsāṃ praty-ekam ekā-ekā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ pādān adhāvata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madīyas tu yayā pādaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇibhyām avalambitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā svedajalenaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhautaḥ ślathaśarīrayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madīyas tu yayā pādaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇibhyām avalambitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā sveda-jalena eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhautaḥ ślatha-śarīrayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āvarjitavatī yā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalaṃ lulitalocanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>visrastahastayā hastād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛṅgāraḥ pātitas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āvarjitavatī yā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalaṃ lulita-locanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>visrasta-hastayā hastād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛṅgāraḥ pātitas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviśan dhautapādaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śṛṇomi sma prajalpitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṃśuprākāragarbhasthāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrutihārigiraḥ striyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviśan dhauta-pādaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śṛṇomi sma prajalpitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṃśu-prākāra-garbha-sthāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śruti-hāri-giraḥ striyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anartho 'yam upanyastaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsena dāruṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śulkaṃ gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇāvādananāmakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-artho 'yam upanyastaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsena dāruṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śulkaṃ gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīṇā-vādana-nāmakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi rūpam upanyasyec</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chulkaṃ gṛhapatis tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yakṣīkāmukād anyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpnuyād bhartṛdārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi rūpam upanyasyec</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chulkaṃ gṛha-patis tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yakṣī-kāmukād anyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpnuyād bhartṛ-dārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīnāyāṃ tu prayuktāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhagno 'yaṃ no manorathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hyo yasmād bhūtikenāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāradīyaṃ kṛtaṃ kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīnāyāṃ tu prayuktāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhagno 'yaṃ no mano-rathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hyo yasmād bhūtikena asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāradīyaṃ kṛtaṃ kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ tāvan mahad duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yakṣīkāmuko 'nayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ nāsulabhībhūtaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śulkadoṣān na labhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ tāvan mahad duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yakṣī-kāmuko 'nayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ na a-su-labhī-bhūtaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śulka-doṣān na labhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ tu duḥsahataraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad imāṃ bakulāvalīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anātmajño balāt ko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gale tāṃ lambayiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ tu duḥ-sahataraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad imāṃ bakula-āvalīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-ātma-jño balāt ko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gale tāṃ lambayiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīṇāvādanaśulkeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sābhiyogāś ca nāgarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajāpatiś ca durlagnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvathā śivam astv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīṇā-vādana-śulka īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-abhiyogāś ca nāgarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajāpatiś ca dur-lagnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvathā śivam astv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha niṣkampakālindī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>salilasvacchakuṭṭimām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvalanmaṇiśilāstambhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśālāṃ prāviśaṃ sabhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha niṣkampa-kālindī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>salila-svaccha-kuṭṭimām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvalan-maṇi-śilā-stambhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśālāṃ prāviśaṃ sabhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sabhā nāgarakaiḥ sābhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhinnaprabhavibhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upatyakāsthalī meroḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phullaiḥ kalpadrumair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sabhā nāgarakaiḥ sa-abhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhinna-prabhavi-bhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upatyakā-sthalī meroḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phullaiḥ kalpa-drumair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha haṃsa ivotsārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nalinīdalamaṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirgataḥ kañcukī prerya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiraskariṇikāmbaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha haṃsa iva utsārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nalinī-dala-maṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirgataḥ kañcukī prerya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiras-kariṇika-ambaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa nāgarakasaṃghātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocad vinayānataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpayati vaḥ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāgataṃ guṇarāgiṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa nāgaraka-saṃghātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocad vinaya-ānataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpayati vaḥ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sv-āgataṃ guṇa-rāgiṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavadbhir varṇasaṃpannair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antaḥsārair idaṃ gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śātakumbhamayaiḥ pūtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgāmbhaḥkalaśair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavadbhir varṇa-saṃpannair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antaḥ-sārair idaṃ gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāta-kumbha-mayaiḥ pūtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgā-ambhaḥ-kalaśair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi sarve samāyātā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāto vāgamanaśramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato gandharvadattāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirdeśo dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi sarve samāyātā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāto vā āgamana-śramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato gandharvadattāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirdeśo dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te parasparam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidrāṇavadanaprabhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hrītāḥ sadiśam ākāśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyan proṣitottarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te paras-param ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidrāṇa-vadana-prabhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hrītāḥ sa-diśam ākāśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyan proṣita-uttarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kan?cukinā vaktraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇād dīnatayā kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samare kātarasyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sannacakṣuḥkapolakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kan?cukinā vaktraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇād dīnatayā kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samare kātarasya iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sanna-cakṣuḥ-kapolakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyekaṃ ca mukhāny eṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avalokya ciraṃ ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa yadā yātum ārabdhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadāhūya mayoditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praty-ekaṃ ca mukhāny eṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avalokya ciraṃ ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa yadā yātum ārabdhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā āhūya maya ūditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samāptapratikarmā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalyā vā yadi sā tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchatu kim adyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭair nāgarakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samāpta-pratikarmā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalyā vā yadi sā tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchatu kim adya api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭair nāgarakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvataiva dattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat tādṛgmlānam ānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātam ucchvasitaṃ svinna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kapolasthalapīvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvata aiva dattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat tādṛg-mlānam ānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātam ucchvasitaṃ svinna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kapola-sthala-pīvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alapat sānudāsasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītaḥ parijanas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣīkāmuka vandyo 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvathā śobhitaṃ tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alapat sānudāsasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītaḥ parijanas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣī-kāmuka vandyo 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvathā śobhitaṃ tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāṅmātreṇāpi bhavataś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cirād ucchvasitā vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avagrahe hi jīmūto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>visphūrjann api śobhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāṅ-mātreṇa api bhavataś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cirād ucchvasitā- vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avagrahe hi jīmūto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>visphūrjann api śobhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad evaṃ yādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yādṛśī cātidhīratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛśaṃ yadi vijñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavet kiṃ na bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad evaṃ yādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yādṛśī ca ati-dhīratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛśaṃ yadi vijñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavet kiṃ na bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eko nāgarakaś caikam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocad darśitasmitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uddāmitamukhā loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukhaṃ jīvanti nistrapāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eko nāgarakaś ca ekam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocad darśita-smitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uddāmita-mukhā- loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukhaṃ jīvanti nis-trapāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko hi vedajaḍaṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chāndasaṃ chāttram atrapam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhye mahāmanuṣyāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>evam uddāmayen mukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko hi veda-jaḍaṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chāndasaṃ chāttram a-trapam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhye mahā-manuṣyāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>evam uddāmayen mukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣīkāmukaśabdo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śabda evāsya kevalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva ca priyaguṇā yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇa ṛddhiḥ kva cedṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣī-kāmuka-śabdo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śabda eva asya kevalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva ca priya-guṇā yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇa ṛddhiḥ kva cā idṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yat kiṃcid api bālānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetastoṣāya kalpate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkaṭena hi nāmnāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyas tuṣyanti ḍiṇḍikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yat kiṃ-cid api bālānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetas-toṣāya kalpate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkaṭena hi nāmna āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyas tuṣyanti ḍiṇḍikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutvedam itareṇoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā sma nindad bhavān imam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko jānāti manuṣyāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caritaṃ gūḍhacāriṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutva īdam itareṇa uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā sma nindad bhavān imam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko jānāti manuṣyāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caritaṃ gūḍha-cāriṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣīkāntaḥ prakṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhārṣṭyenājñāpayann api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā paricitaśrīkas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā māṃ prati śobhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣī-kāntaḥ prakṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhārṣṭyenā ajñāpayann api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā paricita-śrīkas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā māṃ prati śobhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato javanikāṃ prerya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyā kañcukibhir vṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devī gandharvadattāgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhibhūtasabhāprabhā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato javanikāṃ prerya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyā kañcukibhir vṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devī gandharvadattā āgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhibhūta-sabhā-prabhā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathayāmi kathaṃ rūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāḥ saṃkṣiptam ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravrajyām āsthitā nūnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idānīm apsarogaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathayāmi kathaṃ rūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāḥ saṃkṣiptam ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravrajyām āsthitā- nūnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idānīm apsaro-gaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalpitaṃ ca sabhāmadhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padmarāgaśilāmayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candralekheva saṃdhyābhram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyāsta caturantakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalpitaṃ ca sabhā-madhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padma-rāga-śilā-mayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candra-lekha īva saṃdhyā-abhram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyāsta catur-antakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tejaso 'bhibhavāt tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkucanti sma nāgarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bālāyāḥ śaśilekhāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṇḍarīkākarā iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tejaso 'bhibhavāt tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkucanti sma nāgarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bālāyāḥ śaśi-lekhāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṇḍarīka-ākarā- iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sātha prajñāvacaḥśūnyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpamātrakaśālinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paribhūtavatī goṣṭhīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sabhāstambhāvalīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.103'>
<lg>
