<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ātha prajñā-vacaḥ-śūnyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpa-mātraka-śālinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paribhūtavatī goṣṭhīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sabhā-stambhā-avalīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dakṣiṇam utkṣipya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karaṃ kañcukinoditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrūyatāṃ śreṣṭhino vākyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bho nāgarakakuñjarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dakṣiṇam utkṣipya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karaṃ kañcukina ūditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrūyatāṃ śreṣṭhino vākyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bho nāgaraka-kuñjarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āste gandharvadatteyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyaṃ vīṇā ca sāritā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo vo vādayituṃ śaktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kiṃ tiṣṭhati ḍhaukatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āste gandharvadatta īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyaṃ vīṇā ca sāritā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo vo vādayituṃ śaktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kiṃ tiṣṭhati ḍhaukatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśeṣair na ca kartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paripāṭir apārthikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā hi yuṣmākam asyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjākhedaprayojanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-śeṣair na ca kartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paripāṭir apārthikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā hi yuṣmākam asyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjā-kheda-prayojanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ svayaṃ bhavadbhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasmin vo bhāvanāhitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmān ātmānam etāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kleśān mocayatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ svayaṃ bhavadbhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasmin vo bhāvanā-hitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmān ātmānam etāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kleśān mocayatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nāgarakāḥ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattakam abruvan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaṃ naḥ pūjyaḥ pravīṇaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād utthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nāgarakāḥ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattakam abruvan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaṃ naḥ pūjyaḥ pravīṇaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād utthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa yadā kampitaśirā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>necchati sma tadāparaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhāvitatamas teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatvā vīṇām avādayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa yadā kampita-śirā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>na icchati sma tada āparaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhāvitatamas teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatvā vīṇām avādayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin doṣair asaṃkīrṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇān madhuratottarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃpādayati śabdo 'bhūd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccakaiḥ sādhu sādhv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin doṣair a-saṃkīrṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇān madhuratā-uttarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃpādayati śabdo 'bhūd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccakaiḥ sādhu sādhv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato gandharvadattāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pragītāyām abhūn mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>are jñātaṃ mayedānīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tenaivāmī vṛthāśramāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato gandharvadattāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pragītāyām abhūn mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>are jñātaṃ maya īdānīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena eva amī vṛthā-śramāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>purā vāmanarūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baliṃ chalayatā kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tripiṣṭapaṃ tribhiḥ krāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikramaiś cakrapāṇinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>purā vāmana-rūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baliṃ chalayatā kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tri-piṣṭapaṃ tribhiḥ krāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikramaiś cakra-pāṇinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca viśvāvasur nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandharvagaṇasevitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krāmantaṃ gaganaṃ vegāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>triś cakāra pradakṣiṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca viśvāvasur nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandharva-gaṇa-sevitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krāmantaṃ gaganaṃ vegāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>triś cakāra pradakṣiṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca svayam utpādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>stuvatā garuḍadhvajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārāyaṇastutiṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gītaṃ gītakam adbhutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca svayam utpādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>stuvatā garuḍa-dhvajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārāyaṇa-stutiṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gītaṃ gītakam adbhutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāradena tataḥ prāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāradād vṛtraśatruṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arjunena tatas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>virāṭasutayā kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāradena tataḥ prāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāradād vṛtra-śatruṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arjunena tatas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>virāṭa-sutayā kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parīkṣit prāpnuyān mātus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato 'pi janamejayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti kramāgataṃ tātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tātād āgamitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parīkṣit prāpnuyān mātus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato 'pi janamejayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti krama-āgataṃ tātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tātād āgamitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gāndhāragrāmasaṃbaddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva gāndhāraḥ kva mānuṣāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svargān nānyatra gāndhāra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity āhur nāradādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gāndhāra-grāma-saṃbaddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva gāndhāraḥ kva mānuṣāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svargān na anyatra gāndhāra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity āhur nārada-ādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yo 'yaṃ na jānāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ced abhyupagacchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad asaṃpādayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāyate doṣavān asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yo 'yaṃ na jānāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ced abhyupagacchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad a-saṃpādayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāyate doṣavān asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ punar idaṃ jānan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyaḥ pariṇamatphalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puro nāgarakāṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathāsāmarthyam utsahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ punar idaṃ jānan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadyaḥ pariṇamat-phalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puro nāgarakāṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā-sāmarthyam utsahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayi saṃkalpayaty evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau nāgarakar1ṣabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smayamāno vilakṣyatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svam evābhajatāsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayi saṃkalpayaty evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau nāgarakar1ṣabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smayamāno vilakṣyatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svam eva abhajatā asanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pratihate tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdmaṇḍalamaṇḍane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raṅgo bhaṅgam agṛhṇāt sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nigṛhyajyeṣṭhamallavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pratihate tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛd-maṇḍala-maṇḍane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raṅgo bhaṅgam agṛhṇāt sa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nigṛhya-jyeṣṭha-mallavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ janitotsāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uttiṣṭhāsantam āsanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāvitājñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjayāgrāhi dattakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ janita-utsāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uttiṣṭhāsantam āsanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāvita-a-jñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjaya āgrāhi dattakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyena ca nimittena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>calito 'haṃ kilāsanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenoktaṃ saṃkaṭāsthānād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyatra sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyena ca nimittena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>calito 'haṃ kilā asanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena uktaṃ saṃkaṭa-āsthānād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyatra sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim idaṃ na tvayā śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pathā sakṛt pravṛttāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ karoty avaguṇṭhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim idaṃ na tvayā śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pathā sakṛt pravṛttāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ karoty avaguṇṭhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviṣṭo 'haṃ suhṛdgoṣṭhīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathaiva baṭucāpalāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā gandharvadattāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhṛṣtam ājñāpitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviṣṭo 'haṃ suhṛd-goṣṭhīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatha aiva baṭu-cāpalāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā gandharvadatta āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhṛṣtam ājñāpitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.126'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad asyā baṭuvidyāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāntam aprāpya mādṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā kaṣṭaṃ vañcito 'smīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścāt tāpena khedyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.126'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad asyā- baṭu-vidyāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pra-antam a-prāpya mā-dṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā kaṣṭaṃ vañcito 'smi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścāt tāpena khedyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.127'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra cāmī na lajjante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>salajjāḥ suhṛdas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra nirlajjatāślāghī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjayaiva hi lajjate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.127'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra ca amī na lajjante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-lajjāḥ suhṛdas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra nir-lajjatā-ślāghī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjaya aiva hi lajjate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.128'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samarthayati mayy evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattako 'pi niruttaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho sāhasam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūṣṇīṃbhāvam upeyivān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.128'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samarthayati mayy evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattako 'pi nir-uttaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho sāhasam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūṣṇīṃ-bhāvam upeyivān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.129'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy āsanaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tiryak paśyati dattake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pārśve gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattam āsanam āsthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.129'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy āsanaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tiryak paśyati dattake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pārśve gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dattam āsanam āsthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.130'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kañcukinānītāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvāham uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aparānīyatām ārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naitāṃ spṛśati mādṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.130'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kañcukinā ānītāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇāṃ dṛṣṭva āham uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aparā ānīyatām ārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na etāṃ spṛśati mā-dṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.131'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udaraṃ dṛṣṭam etasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lūtātantunirantaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jaḍatāṃ gamitā yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭutantrīparaṃparā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.131'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udaraṃ dṛṣṭam etasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lūtā-tantu-nir-antaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jaḍatāṃ gamitā yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭu-tantrī-paraṃparā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.132'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>smitadarśitadantāgrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyataḥ kṣiptadṛṣṭibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām ālokya tathābhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uktaṃ nāgarakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.132'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>smita-darśita-danta-agrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyataḥ kṣipta-dṛṣṭibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām ālokya tathā-bhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uktaṃ nāgarakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.133'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brāhmaṇaḥ pūjyatām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirlajjāgrapatākayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena sāhasam ārabdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaguṇākhyāpanopamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.133'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brāhmaṇaḥ pūjyatām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nir-lajjā-agra-patākayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena sāhasam ārabdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-guṇa-ākhyāpana-upamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.134'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tantrīkiṇakaṭhorāgrā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśīrṇakarajātatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karaśākhāś ca no jātā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ca saṃbhāvanedṛśī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.134'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tantrī-kiṇa-kaṭhora-agrā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśīrṇa-karaja-ātatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kara-śākhāś ca no jātā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ca saṃbhāvanā īdṛśī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.135'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu komalāgrabhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tantrīr aṅgulibhiḥ spṛśan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadā vādayitā vīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.135'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu komala-agrabhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tantrīr aṅgulibhiḥ spṛśan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kadā vādayitā vīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veda-veda-aṅga-pāra-gaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.136'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathāyam abhiprāyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayaitasyopalakṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prītim utpādayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāval locanayor iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.136'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvatha āyam abhiprāyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya aitasya upalakṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prītim utpādayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāval locanayor iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.137'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvad utsāryate vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvac cānīyate 'parā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvad gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpaṃ paśyāmy avāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.137'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvad utsāryate vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvac cā anīyate 'parā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvad gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpaṃ paśyāmy a-vāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.138'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rathyācatvarayātrāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vakṣyāmi janasaṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>īdṛśī tādṛsī dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpiṇī yuvatir mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.138'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rathyā-catvara-yātrāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vakṣyāmi jana-saṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>īdṛśī tādṛsī dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpiṇī yuvatir mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.139'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lūtātantutataṃ cāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇākarparam āha yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tat satyaṃ mṛṣety etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devair vijñāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.139'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lūtā-tantu-tataṃ ca ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇā-karparam āha yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tat satyaṃ mṛṣa īty etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devair vijñāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.140'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udveṣṭite ca tat tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭaṃ veṣṭanacarmaṇi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantucakraṃ bhayodbhrānta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>lūtāmaṇḍalasaṃkulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.140'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udveṣṭite ca tat tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭaṃ veṣṭana-carmaṇi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantu-cakraṃ bhaya-udbhrānta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>lūtā-maṇḍala-saṃkulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.141'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātam aṅgaṃ nirīkṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vepathusvedaromāñca</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjāvidhuram ākulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.141'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātam aṅgaṃ nirīkṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vepathu-sveda-roma-añca</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjā-vidhuram ākulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.142'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aparāpi mayā vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samāsphālya paṭukvaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>keśadūṣitatantrīkā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prathameva vivarjitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.142'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apara āpi mayā vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samāsphālya paṭukvaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>keśa-dūṣita-tantrīkā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prathama īva vivarjitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.143'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sānudāsas tato vīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sugandhikusumārcitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kacchapākāraphalakām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādāya svayam āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.143'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sānudāsas tato vīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-gandhi-kusuma-arcitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kacchapa-ākāra-phalakām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādāya svayam āgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.144'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ ca pradakṣiṇīkṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>savikāratanūruhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandharvadattām iva tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adadāt subhagasvanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.144'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ ca pradakṣiṇī-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-vikāra-tanū-ruhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandharvadattām iva tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adadāt su-bhaga-svanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.145'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu dhautapādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇāṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhuktāmbarasaṃvītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pīṭhapṛṣṭham adhiṣṭhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.145'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu dhauta-pādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇāṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-bhukta-ambara-saṃvītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pīṭha-pṛṣṭham adhiṣṭhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.146'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manāk saṃspṛṣṭamātrāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karaśākhāmukhaiḥ svayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantrībandhā yathāsthānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asaran dhaivatādikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.146'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manāk saṃspṛṣṭa-mātrāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kara-śākhā-mukhaiḥ svayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantrī-bandhā- yathā-sthānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asaran dhaivata-ādikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.147'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tantrīṣu gāndhāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jṛmbhamānāsu mantharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandharvadattām avadaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīru saṃgīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.147'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tantrīṣu gāndhāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jṛmbhamānāsu mantharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandharvadattām avadaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīru saṃgīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.148'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā pragalbhāpi gāndhāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṇyāmaragocaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā ca dhṛṣṭam ādiṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālāśālīnatāṃ gatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.148'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā pragalbha āpi gāndhāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṇya a-mara-go-caram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā ca dhṛṣṭam ādiṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāla-āśā-līnatāṃ gatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.149'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ ca pravartayan bhītāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trapājanitamūkatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad eva gītakaṃ divyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ mandam avādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.149'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ ca pravartayan bhītāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trapā-janita-mūkatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad eva gītakaṃ divyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ mandam avādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.150'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hṛte tasyās trapāsenau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdarśitapathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokaṃ pāvayituṃ puṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāvartata sarasvatī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.150'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hṛte tasyās trapā-senau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃdarśita-pathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokaṃ pāvayituṃ puṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāvartata sarasvatī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.151'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vṛttibhir dakṣiṇādyābhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad gītaṃ gītakaṃ tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upary upari pāṇyantaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇibhir yojitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.151'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vṛttibhir dakṣiṇa-ādyābhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad gītaṃ gītakaṃ tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upary upari pāṇy-antaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇibhir yojitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.152'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd idaṃ tamobhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aprajñātam alakṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadgītamātraviṣaya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrotramātrajagad tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.152'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd idaṃ tamo-bhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-prajñātam a-lakṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad-gīta-mātra-viṣaya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrotra-mātra-jagad tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.153'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sabhāyāṃ gāḍhamūrcchāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛdu tad gītavādinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭubhir dundubhidhvānair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhibhūtaṃ vimāninām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.153'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sabhāyāṃ gāḍha-mūrcchāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛdu tad gīta-vādinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭubhir dundubhi-dhvānair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhibhūtaṃ vimāninām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.154'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patitāsu saratnāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divaḥ kusumavṛṣṭiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kañcukī cetanāprāptān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhāṣata sabhāsadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.154'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patitāsu sa-ratnāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divaḥ kusuma-vṛṣṭiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kañcukī cetanā-prāptān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhāṣata sabhā-sadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.155'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bho bho nirmatsarāḥ santaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyam ākhyāta sādhavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gītaṃ yad anayānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ tat saṃvāditaṃ na hi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.155'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bho bho nir-matsarāḥ santaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyam ākhyāta sādhavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gītaṃ yad anaya ānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ tat saṃvāditaṃ na hi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.156'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athodyamitahastais taiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samastair uktam uccakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmyaśulkārjitām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyakāṃ labhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.156'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha udyamita-hastais taiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samastair uktam uccakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmya-śulka-arjitām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyakāṃ labhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.157'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tiraskariṇikāṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ kañcukināntarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahiṣkṛtā nāgarakā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāstikās tridivād iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.157'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tiras-kariṇikāṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ kañcukina āntarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahiṣ-kṛtā- nāgarakā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>na-astikās tri-divād iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.158'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirgacchanti hatacchāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te khaṇḍitamanorathāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svabhyastaguṇavaiphalyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇinaḥ kān na tāpayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.158'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirgacchanti hata-cchāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te khaṇḍita-mano-rathāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sv-abhyasta-guṇa-vaiphalyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇinaḥ kān na tāpayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.159'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>savīṇādattako 'haṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṣṭhinābhyantarīkṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parīkṣya bahuśo rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sacivo guṇavān iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.159'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-vīṇādattako 'haṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṣṭhina ābhyantarī-kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parīkṣya bahuśo rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sacivo guṇavān iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.160'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhāṣata ca nirgacchaṃs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>teṣu nāgarakarṣabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣīkāmuka devas tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amānuṣaparākramaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.160'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhāṣata ca nirgacchaṃs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>teṣu nāgaraka-rṣabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣī-kāmuka devas tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-mānuṣa-parākramaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.161'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayaṃ gandharvadattā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsaś ca sānugaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛcchrām āpadam āpannā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>līlayaiva tvayoddhṛtāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.161'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayaṃ gandharvadattā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsaś ca sa-anugaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛcchrām āpadam āpannā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>līlaya aiva tvaya ūddhṛtāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.162'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāśmaryaḥ khadirāḥ śākāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>campakāś ca saveṇavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātodyāṅgārtham utkhātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prarohantu yathā purā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.162'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāśmaryaḥ khadirāḥ śākāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>campakāś ca sa-veṇavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātodya aṅga-artham utkhātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prarohantu yathā purā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.163'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>agnihotrāṇi hūyantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijāḥ saṃdhyām upāsatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kumāryaḥ pariṇīyantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasūyantāṃ kulastriyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.163'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>agni-hotrāṇi hūyantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijāḥ saṃdhyām upāsatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kumāryaḥ pariṇīyantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasūyantāṃ kula-striyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.164'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parivrājakanirgrantha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhikṣupāśupatādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guruvaktrābhisaṃkrāntān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svasiddhāntān adhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.164'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parivrājaka-nir-grantha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhikṣu-pāśu-pata-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guru-vaktra-abhisaṃkrāntān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-siddha-antān adhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.165'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śāntavīnopasargatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakīranagarāḥ sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sacampāmagadhāś cāṅgāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svasthāṅgāḥ śeratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.165'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śānta-vīnā-upasargatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-kīra-nagarāḥ sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-campā-magadhāś ca aṅgāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svastha-aṅgāḥ śeratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.166'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato gṛhapatir dīnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prārthanābhaṅgaśaṅkayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇādattakam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāvocan nīcakaistarām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.166'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato gṛha-patir dīnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prārthanā-bhaṅga-śaṅkayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇādattakam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāvocan nīcakaistarām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.167'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśastaṃ dinam adyaivaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tenāyaṃ pauruṣārjitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ślāghyo gandharvadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karaḥ saṃskrīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.167'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśastaṃ dinam adya evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena ayaṃ pauruṣa-arjitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ślāghyo gandharvadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karaḥ saṃskrīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.168'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu sābhilāṣo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darśitālīkadhīrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avocaṃ smitasaṃkīrṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anāsthāmantharāṃ giram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.168'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu sa-abhilāṣo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darśita-alīka-dhīrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avocaṃ smita-saṃkīrṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>an-āsthā-mantharāṃ giram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.169'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvijo 'haṃ merukailāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulyāmalakulodbhavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṇetuṃ na me yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asavarṇām imām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.169'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvijo 'haṃ meru-kailāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulya-a-mala-kula-udbhavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṇetuṃ na me yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-sa-varṇām imām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.170'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoktaṃ sānudāsena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśrabdhaṃ pariṇīyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmākaṃ hi savarṇeyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utkṛṣṭā vā bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.170'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uktaṃ sānudāsena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśrabdhaṃ pariṇīyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmākaṃ hi sa-varṇa īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utkṛṣṭā vā bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.171'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kiṃ mattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim unmattaḥ kim ārjavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ yasmād asaṃbaddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abuddhir iva bhāṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.171'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kiṃ mattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim unmattaḥ kim ārjavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ yasmād a-saṃbaddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-buddhir iva bhāṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.172'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ ceyaṃ ca yady asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇāv iti niścayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato mat katham utkṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇād iyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.172'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ ca iyaṃ ca yady asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇāv iti niścayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato mat katham utkṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇād iyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.173'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha imāṃ brāhmaṇīm eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manyate kṣatriyaṃ tu mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā sati kathāpy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyamāṇā virudhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.173'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha imāṃ brāhmaṇīm eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manyate kṣatriyaṃ tu mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā sati katha āpy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyamāṇā virudhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.174'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu saṃbhāvyate nāyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asaṃbaddhaṃ prabhāṣitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena dharmārthaśāstrārtha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣuṇṇadhīr iva bhāṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.174'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu saṃbhāvyate na ayam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-saṃbaddhaṃ prabhāṣitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena dharma-artha-śāstra-artha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣuṇṇa-dhīr iva bhāṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.175'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>agrajo 'varajāṃ bhāryāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svīkurvan na praduṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te ca svā caiva nṛpater</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity uktaṃ manunā yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.175'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>agra-jo 'vara-jāṃ bhāryāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svī-kurvan na praduṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te ca svā ca eva nṛ-pater</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity uktaṃ manunā yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.176'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyākhyānaṃ ca nitarām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyaṃ nārhati ninditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmād akhaṇḍitājñena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāpitā guruṇaiva me ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.176'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyākhyānaṃ ca nitarām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyaṃ na arhati ninditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmād a-khaṇḍita-ājñena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāpitā guruṇa aiva me ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.177'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad ahaṃ grāhitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijñānam atimānuṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāpitā yena tenaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena tenaiva dāpitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.177'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad ahaṃ grāhitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijñānam ati-mānuṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāpitā yena tena eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena tena eva dāpitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.178'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cāvaśyaparigrāhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumārī ciram arhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sābhilāṣā viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyākhyānakadarthanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.178'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca a-vaśya-parigrāhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumārī ciram arhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-abhilāṣā viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyākhyāna-kad-arthanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.179'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād alaṃ mamānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirbandheneti niścitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthitāṃ sānudāsasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatheti samamānayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.179'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād alaṃ mama anena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirbandhena iti niścitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthitāṃ sānudāsasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha īti samamānayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.180'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vaiśravaṇasyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūnorākhaṇḍalātmajaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karaṃ gandharvadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sasaṃskāram upādade ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.180'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vaiśravaṇasya iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūna ūrā ākhaṇḍala-ātma-jaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karaṃ gandharvadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-saṃskāram upādade ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_17.181'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mandaṃ pādatalena tālam anayā yat kuṭṭayantyāciraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gītaṃ mām abhi visphuratkuharitaṃ tāraiḥ subhugnabhruvā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenaiva pratanūkṛtām apaharann asyāḥ krameṇa trapāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvāṇān mahatāntareṇa subhagaṃ saṃsāram ajñāsiṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_17.181'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mandaṃ pāda-talena tālam anayā yat kuṭṭayantya ā-ciraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gītaṃ mām abhi visphurat-kuharitaṃ tāraiḥ su-bhugna-bhruvā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena eva pratanū-kṛtām apaharann asyāḥ krameṇa trapāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvāṇān mahata āntareṇa su-bhagaṃ saṃsāram ajñāsiṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandharvadattayā sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divasān dattakena ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā rativasantābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smaraḥ sukham ayāpayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandharvadattayā sa-ardhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divasān dattakena ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā rati-vasantābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smaraḥ sukham ayāpayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharvadattāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatāyāṃ vandituṃ gurūn</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāso namaskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadati sma kṛtāsanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharvadattāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatāyāṃ vandituṃ gurūn</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāso namas-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadati sma kṛta-āsanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmākaṃ hi savarṇeyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utkṛṣtā veti yan mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūyaṃ vijñāpitāḥ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad etad avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmākaṃ hi sa-varṇa īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utkṛṣtā va īti yan mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūyaṃ vijñāpitāḥ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad etad avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd ihaiva campāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mitravarmeti vāṇijaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāmitro nāpi madhyasthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhor yasyābhavad bhuvi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd iha eva campāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mitravarma īti vāṇijaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na a-mitro na api madhya-sthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhor yasya abhavad bhuvi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya mitravatī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāmnā susadṛśī priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāryā maitrīva sādhor yā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatror api hitaiṣiṇī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya mitravatī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāmnā su-sadṛśī priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāryā maitri īva sādhor yā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatror api hita-eṣiṇī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayor guṇavatoḥ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇavantam avindatoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aputrān ātmanaḥ paurāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saputrān api menire ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayor guṇavatoḥ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇavantam a-vindatoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-putrān ātmanaḥ paurāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-putrān api menire ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā piṇḍapātāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānur nāma digambaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trirātrakṣapaṇakṣamo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vardhamāna ivāgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā piṇḍa-pātāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānur nāma dig-ambaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tri-rātra-kṣapaṇa-kṣamo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vardhamāna ivā agataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daṃpatibhyām asau tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krītābhyāṃ prīṇitas tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apṛṣṭo 'pi yathācaṣṭa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmān ṛṣabhabhāṣitān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daṃpatibhyām asau tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krītābhyāṃ prīṇitas tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-pṛṣṭo 'pi yathā ācaṣṭa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmān ṛṣabha-bhāṣitān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśnādigranthasārajñaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cittaṃ buddhvā tayor asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādideśa sphuṭadeśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāvinaṃ guṇinaṃ sutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśna-ādi-grantha-sāra-jñaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cittaṃ buddhvā tayor asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādideśa sphuṭa-deśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāvinaṃ guṇinaṃ sutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś ca putras tayor jātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya nāmākarot pitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādiṣṭaḥ sānunā yat tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sānudāso bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś ca putras tayor jātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya nāma akarot pitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādiṣṭaḥ sānunā yat tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sānudāso bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekaputro 'py asau pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durlabhatvāc ca vallabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyāḥ śikṣayatā nīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālalīlānabhijñātām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eka-putro 'py asau pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dur-labhatvāc ca vallabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyāḥ śikṣayatā nīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāla-līlā-an-abhijñātām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upādhyāyai.ś ca sotsāhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinītaḥ sa tathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svadārān eva savrīḍaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paradārān amanyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upādhyāyai.ś ca sa-utsāhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinītaḥ sa tathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-dārān eva sa-vrīḍaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>para-dārān amanyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenātivinayenāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lokabāhyena pārthivaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitarau suhṛdo dārā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kaścin nākulīkṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ati-vinayena asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>loka-bāhyena pārthivaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitarau suhṛdo dārā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kaś-cin nā akulī-kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādiṣṭaḥ sānunā yo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayoḥ putraḥ suvṛttayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham eva sa vo dāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sānudāsas tathāguṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādiṣṭaḥ sānunā yo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayoḥ putraḥ su-vṛttayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham eva sa vo dāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sānudāsas tathā-guṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tu dhruvako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhruvamaitrīsukhaḥ sakhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca mām abravīn mitra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyatāṃ tad bravīmi yat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tu dhruvako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhruva-maitrī-sukhaḥ sakhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca mām abravīn mitra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyatāṃ tad bravīmi yat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udyānanalinīkūle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadārāḥ suhṛdas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anubhūtajalakrīḍāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khādanti ca pibanti ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udyāna-nalinī-kūle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-dārāḥ suhṛdas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anubhūta-jala-krīḍāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khādanti ca pibanti ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavatāpi sadāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra gatvā mayā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāphalyaṃ kriyatām adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpayauvanajanmanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavata āpi sa-dāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra gatvā mayā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāphalyaṃ kriyatām adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpa-yauvana-janmanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmārthayoḥ phalaṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukham eva nirākṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viphalīkṛtadharmārthāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāpakarmā kutas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharma-arthayoḥ phalaṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukham eva nirākṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viphalī-kṛta-dharma-arthāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāpa-karmā kutas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>janmāntarasukhaprāptyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaś ca dharmaṃ niṣevate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyaktadṛṣṭasukhaḥ so 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vada ko nāma paṇḍitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>janma-antara-sukha-prāptyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaś ca dharmaṃ niṣevate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyakta-dṛṣṭa-sukhaḥ so 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vada ko nāma paṇḍitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cāpi svārthasiddhyarthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā tvaṃ vipralabhyase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā hi bhīmasenasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vākyam ākarṇyatāṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca api sva-artha-siddhy-arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā tvaṃ vipralabhyase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā hi bhīmasenasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vākyam ākarṇyatāṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyupasthitakālasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhasya parivarjanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anāgatasukhāśā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naiṣa buddhimatāṃ nayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyupasthita-kālasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhasya parivarjanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-āgata-sukha-āśā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na eṣa buddhimatāṃ nayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu sa vihasyoktas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tucchae eva prayojane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ saṃrambhagāmbhīryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaṅkām iva karoti saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu sa vihasya uktas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tucchae eva prayojane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ saṃrambha-gāmbhīryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaṅkām iva karoti saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi pītaṃ na vā pītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svadārasahitair madhu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lābhaḥ kas tatra hānir vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāgo 'yam abhivāsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi pītaṃ na vā pītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-dāra-sahitair madhu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lābhaḥ kas tatra hānir vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāgo 'yam abhivāsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāgāgniḥ prāṇināṃ prāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛtyaiva pradīpyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam indhayati yan mitra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra kiṃ nāma pauruṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāga-agniḥ prāṇināṃ prāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛtya aiva pradīpyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam indhayati yan mitra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra kiṃ nāma pauruṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas taṃ viṣayasaṃkalpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarpirindhanam uddhatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vairāgyavacanāmbhobhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvāpayati sa kṣamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas taṃ viṣaya-saṃkalpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarpir-indhanam uddhatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vairāgya-vacana-ambhobhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvāpayati sa kṣamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>phalaṃ yadi ca dharmasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukham īdṛśam iṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmasyābhavanirbhūyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatphalasya sukhasya ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>phalaṃ yadi ca dharmasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukham īdṛśam iṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmasya a-bhava-nirbhūyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat-phalasya sukhasya ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāṃ yathāsukham āsīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśnantīṃ ca striyaṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nekṣyate pratiṣedhāt sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham evaṃ viḍambyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāṃ yathā-sukham āsīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśnantīṃ ca striyaṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nā ikṣyate pratiṣedhāt sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham evaṃ viḍambyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>goṣṭhīmaṇḍalamadhyasthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madopahatacetanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣamūrcchāparīteva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartur bhāryā viḍambanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>goṣṭhī-maṇḍala-madhya-sthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mada-upahata-cetanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣa-mūrccha-a-parīta īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartur bhāryā viḍambanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā gacchatu bhavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathāsukham ahaṃ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yāsyāmi na dhāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāraiḥ saha sabhām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā gacchatu bhavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā-sukham ahaṃ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yāsyāmi na dhāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāraiḥ saha sabhām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tataḥ sthirasaṃkalpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ dṛṣṭvā pratyavasthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haste sasmitam ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saviṣāda ivāvadat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tataḥ sthira-saṃkalpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ dṛṣṭvā pratyavasthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haste sa-smitam ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-viṣāda iva avadat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suhṛdām agrataḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratijñām aham āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāso 'yam ānītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadāro dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suhṛdām agrataḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratijñām aham āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāso 'yam ānītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-dāro dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenopahasitasyoccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdbhir vadanaṃ mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratijñākhaṇḍanamlānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ śakṣyasi vīkṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena upahasitasya uccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdbhir vadanaṃ mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratijñā-khaṇḍana-mlānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ śakṣyasi vīkṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat prasīdāsatāṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārā yadi virudhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayaikena pratijñāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāphalyam upapādyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat prasīda a-satāṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārā- yadi virudhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaya aikena pratijñāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāphalyam upapādyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadoṣaṃ yadi pānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayaṃ mā sma pibas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdaḥ pibataḥ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadāratanayān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-doṣaṃ yadi pānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayaṃ mā sma pibas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdaḥ pibataḥ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-dāra-tanayān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tatsahito gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puropavanapadminīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāṃ tadā dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakalatrāṃ suhṛtsabhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tat-sahito gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pura-upavana-padminīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāṃ tadā dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-kalatrāṃ suhṛt-sabhām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ninditendrāyudhacchāyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kusumābharaṇāmbaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣiptāmbhaḥpadminīcchāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthalīkamalinīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nindita-indra-āyudha-cchāyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kusuma-ābharaṇa-ambaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣipta-ambhaḥ-padminī-cchāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthalī-kamalinīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ samañjarījālair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mādhavīcūtapallavaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalpitaṃ dhruvako mahyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccam āharad āsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa-mañjarī-jālair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mādhavī-cūta-pallavaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalpitaṃ dhruvako mahyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccam āharad āsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apaśyaṃ tatra cāsīnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdaḥ pāyitapriyān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pibataś ca madhu prīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyākaratalārpitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apaśyaṃ tatra cā asīnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdaḥ pāyita-priyān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pibataś ca madhu prīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyā-kara-tala-arpitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvacid vasantarāgaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>veṇutantrīrutānvitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gīyamānaṃ śṛṇomi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rudantāś cālikokilāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva-cid vasanta-rāgaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>veṇu-tantrī-ruta-anvitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gīyamānaṃ śṛṇomi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rudantāś ca ali-kokilāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hitvā kurabakāgrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṇasaṃsthānacāruṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patitāḥ karṇikāreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lūnanāsā ivālinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hitvā kurabaka-agrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṇa-saṃsthāna-cāruṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patitāḥ karṇikāreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lūna-nāsā- iva alinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āmūlaśikharaṃ phullās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tilakāśokakiṃśukāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asārasya hi jāyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naṭasyātyutkaṭā rasāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ā-mūla-śikharaṃ phullās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tilaka-aśoka-kiṃśukāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-sārasya hi jāyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naṭasya aty-utkaṭā- rasāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kardamadigdhāṅgaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaivalāvilaśāṭakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utthitaḥ puruṣaḥ ko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarasaḥ sarasas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kardama-digdha-aṅgaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaivala-avila-śāṭakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utthitaḥ puruṣaḥ ko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-rasaḥ sarasas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādāya nalinīpatra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṭaṃ kenāpi pūritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhoḥ puṣkaramadhu prāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayeti ca mudāvadat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādāya nalinī-patra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>puṭaṃ kena-api pūritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhoḥ puṣkara-madhu prāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maya īti ca muda āvadat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratiṣiddhaḥ sa caikena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūrkha mā caṇḍam āraṭīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na puṣkaramadhu prāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvayānartho 'yam arjitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratiṣiddhaḥ sa ca ekena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūrkha mā caṇḍam āraṭīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na puṣkara-madhu prāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaya ān-artho 'yam arjitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi tāvad idaṃ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pibanti suhṛdas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paramāṇupramāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bindur aṃśo na jāyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi tāvad idaṃ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pibanti suhṛdas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parama-aṇu-pramāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bindur aṃśo na jāyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīyate yadi vā rājñe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durlabhaṃ pārthivair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aparaṃ so 'pi yāceta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratnagṛddhā hi pārthivāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīyate yadi vā rājñe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dur-labhaṃ pārthivair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aparaṃ so 'pi yāceta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratna-gṛddhā- hi pārthivāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca karṇejapāḥ kecid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vakṣyanti priyavādinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājann aparam apy asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra prāptam idaṃ yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca karṇe-japāḥ ke-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vakṣyanti priya-vādinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājann aparam apy asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra prāptam idaṃ yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvad eva tatrāsīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nātiriktam iti bruvan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhāvam atiriktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kenopāyena sādhayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvad eva tatrā asīn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na atiriktam iti bruvan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-bhāvam atiriktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kena upāyena sādhayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti protsāhitaḥ pāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhāsvādaś ca pārthivaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haret sarvasvam asmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāt tasmai na dīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti protsāhitaḥ pāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdha-āsvādaś ca pārthivaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haret sarva-svam asmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāt tasmai na dīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu rasyatarāsvādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ca madyaṃ yatas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ puṣkaramadhv eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sānudāsaḥ pibatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu rasyatara-āsvādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ca madyaṃ yatas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ puṣkara-madhv eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sānudāsaḥ pibatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>durlabhatvāt tatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdabhyarthanena ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca madyam iti śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pītavān asmi tan madhu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dur-labhatvāt tatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛd-abhyarthanena ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca madyam iti śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pītavān asmi tan madhu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama ko nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṣaṇṇām eṣa raso bhavet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lakṣyate na hi sādṛśyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etasya madhurādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama ko nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṣaṇṇām eṣa raso bhavet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lakṣyate na hi sādṛśyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etasya madhura-ādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cāhaṃ ṣaḍbhir ārabdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃhatya madhurādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvajñair api durjñānā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yenāsminn ekaśo rasāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca ahaṃ ṣaḍbhir ārabdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃhatya madhura-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-jñair api dur-jñānā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena asminn ekaśo rasāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena manyatae evāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saptamaḥ suraso rasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rasite 'mṛtam apy asmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacched virasatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena manyatae eva ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saptamaḥ su-raso rasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rasite 'mṛtam apy asmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacched virasatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tadrasagandhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tṛṣā ca gamitatrapaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bādhate māṃ pipāseti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanair dhruvakam abruvam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tad-rasa-gandhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tṛṣā ca gamita-trapaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bādhate māṃ pipāsa īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanair dhruvakam abruvam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena dattaṃ tu tat pītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svabhāvāpoḍhamānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat puropavanaṃ vegāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakravad bhramad abhramam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena dattaṃ tu tat pītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-bhāva-apoḍha-mānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat pura-upavanaṃ vegāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakravad bhramad abhramam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś ca tāramadhuraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīrghaveṇor ivoṣasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīnamantharam aśrauṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadākranditadhvanim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś ca tāra-madhuraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīrgha-veṇor iva uṣasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīna-mantharam aśrauṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadā-ākrandita-dhvanim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gatvā tam uddeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ mādhavīgṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>striyaṃ sākṣād ivāsīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mādhavīvanadevatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gatvā tam uddeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyaṃ mādhavī-gṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>striyaṃ sākṣād ivā asīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mādhavī-vana-devatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākhyāyikākathākāvya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāṭakeṣv api tādṛśī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varṇyamānāpi nāsmābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadācit pramadā śrutā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākhyāyikā-kathā-kāvya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāṭakeṣv api tādṛśī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varṇyamāna āpi na asmābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadā-cit pramadā śrutā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tām abravaṃ sāmnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhadre yadi na duṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥkhasyāsya tato hetur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahyam ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tām abravaṃ sāmnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhadre yadi na duṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥkhasya asya tato hetur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahyam ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato ruditasaṃbhinnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nīcakair uditaṃ tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥsahasyāsya duḥkhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nanu hetur bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato rudita-saṃbhinnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nīcakair uditaṃ tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥsahasya asya duḥkhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nanu hetur bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lajjāprahvaśiraskena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato nīcair mayoditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadīdaṃ matkṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīru mā tvaṃ rudas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lajjā-prahva-śiraskena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato nīcair maya ūditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi idaṃ mat-kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīru mā tvaṃ rudas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad anantam anantārghaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tan manye draviṇaṃ tṛṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīrakam apīdaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kvacid vyāpāryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad anantam ananta-arghaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tan manye draviṇaṃ tṛṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīrakam api idaṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva-cid vyāpāryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvocad asau smitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣāśrukaluṣekṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anenaiva tvadīyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīreṇāham arthinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avocad asau smitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣa-aśru-kaluṣa-īkṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anena eva tvadīyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīreṇa aham arthinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ hi gaṅgadatteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yakṣakanyā nabhaścarī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkalpajanmanānalpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkalpaṃ kāritā tvayi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ hi gaṅgadatta īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yakṣa-kanyā nabhaś-carī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkalpa-janmana ān-alpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkalpaṃ kāritā tvayi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad ehi gṛham asmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyaṃ mantrayase yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīrasyāsya te tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viniyogo bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad ehi gṛham asmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyaṃ mantrayase yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīrasya asya te tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viniyogo bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛṣyamāṇas tayā cāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇāv ādāya mantharam</seg> </l>
