<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asurāntaḥpurākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśaṃ bhavaneśvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛṣyamāṇas tayā ca ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇāv ādāya mantharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asura-antaḥ-pura-ākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśaṃ bhavana-īśvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāpaśyaṃ striyaṃ gaurīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sitāsitaśiroruhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthūlodaravalīlekhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddhasūkṣmāmbarāvṛtām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra apaśyaṃ striyaṃ gaurīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sita-a-sita-śiro-ruhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthūla-udara-valī-lekhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddha-sūkṣma-ambara-āvṛtām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā mām arghyeṇa saṃbhāvya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūrddhni cāghrāya sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīd adhvakhinno 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putra viśramyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā mām arghyeṇa saṃbhāvya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūrddhni cā aghrāya sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīd adhva-khinno 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putra viśramyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādṛtā cādiśat preṣyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsaḥ pipāsitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat puṣkaramadhu svādu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śīghram ānīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādṛtā cā adiśat preṣyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsaḥ pipāsitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat puṣkara-madhu svādu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śīghram ānīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd dhruvaṃ yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadattānyathā kutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhe puṣkaramadhv asyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>duṣprāpaṃ mānuṣair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd dhruvaṃ yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadatta ānyathā kutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhe puṣkara-madhv asyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>duṣ-prāpaṃ mānuṣair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandhena puṣkaramadhu</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhaveṇādhivāsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasantakusumākīrṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśaṃ vāsamandiram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandhena puṣkara-madhu</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhaveṇa adhivāsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasanta-kusuma-ākīrṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśaṃ vāsa-mandiram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pītvā ca puṣkaramadhu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītayā sahitas tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asyai pūrvapratijñātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaśarīram upāharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pītvā ca puṣkara-madhu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītayā sahitas tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asyai pūrva-pratijñātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-śarīram upāharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svaśarīrapradānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahyaṃ pūrvopakāriṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāpi pratyupakārāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaśarīraṃ nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sva-śarīra-pradānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahyaṃ pūrva-upakāriṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa āpi pratyupakārāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-śarīraṃ nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīn me yan mayā dattvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarīraṃ puṇyam arjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya kanyāśarīrāptyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥ pariṇataṃ phalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīn me yan mayā dattvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarīraṃ puṇyam arjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya kanyā-śarīra-āptyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥ pariṇataṃ phalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tatra ciraṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛcchāmi sma priyāṃ priye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim idānīṃ suhṛdgoṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karītīty atha sābravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tatra ciraṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛcchāmi sma priyāṃ priye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim idānīṃ suhṛd-goṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karīti ity atha sa ābravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi te draṣṭum icchāsti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayaiva sahitas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā paśya suhṛdgoṣṭhīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madātiśayavihvalām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi te draṣṭum iccha āsti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya aiva sahitas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā paśya suhṛd-goṣṭhīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mada-atiśaya-vihvalām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayālambitahastaṃ tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kaścid api paśyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenādṛṣṭaḥ suhṛdgoṣṭhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśrabdhaḥ paśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā ālambita-hastaṃ tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kaś-cid api paśyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena a-dṛṣṭaḥ suhṛd-goṣṭhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśrabdhaḥ paśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā tatas tad udyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadattāvalambitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyāmi sma suhṛdgoṣṭhīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smitavyāvartitānanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā tatas tad udyānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadattā-avalambitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyāmi sma suhṛd-goṣṭhīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smita-vyāvartita-ānanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha svābhāvikamukhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛt kaścid abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na dṛśyate sānudāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva nu yāto bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha svābhāvika-mukhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛt kaś-cid abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na dṛśyate sānudāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva nu yāto bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apareṇoktam āścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsena duḥsādhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhitā yakṣakanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apareṇa uktam āścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsena duḥ-sādhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhitā yakṣa-kanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣyāvalambitaḥ pāṇāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adṛśyo dṛśyatām ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsaḥ suhṛnmadhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vicaran puṇyavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣya āvalambitaḥ pāṇāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-dṛśyo dṛśyatām ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsaḥ suhṛn-madhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vicaran puṇyavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadattām athāvocam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adṛśyo yady ahaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhadre katham anenoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adṛśyo dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadattām atha avocam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-dṛśyo yady ahaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhadre katham anena uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-dṛśyo dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃrudhyamāno 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatnena janasaṃsadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravṛttaḥ sahasā hāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>salilaugha ivolbaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃrudhyamāno 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatnena jana-saṃsadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravṛttaḥ sahasā hāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>salila-ogha iva ulbaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣām anyatamo nṛtyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satālahasitadhvaniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām avocad adṛśyāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣībhartre namo 'stu te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣām anyatamo nṛtyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-tāla-hasita-dhvaniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām avocad a-dṛśyāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣī-bhartre namo 'stu te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva puṣkaramadhu kvātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durlabhā yakṣakanyakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>drākṣāmadhu tvayā pītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhitā ca vilāsinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva puṣkara-madhu kva atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dur-labhā yakṣa-kanyakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>drākṣā-madhu tvayā pītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhitā ca vilāsinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā duścikitso 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavato vinayāmayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdvaidyagaṇenādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuśalena cikitsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā duś-cikitso 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavato vinaya-āmayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛd-vaidya-gaṇena adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuśalena cikitsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa bhavān gaṅgadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ yātu nirāmayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdo 'pi kṛtasvārthāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarve yāntu yathāyatham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa bhavān gaṅgadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ yātu nir-āmayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdo 'pi kṛta-sva-arthāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarve yāntu yathā-yatham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu puṣkaramadhu</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cchadmanā chalito 'pi taiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jñātakāntāsavasvādo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tebhyaḥ kupito 'bhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu puṣkara-madhu</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cchadmanā chalito 'pi taiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jñāta-kāntā-āsava-svādo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tebhyaḥ kupito 'bhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama te dhīrā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ye svabhyastamadhupriyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidūṣitamadhusparśāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravrajanti mumukṣavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama te dhīrā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ye sv-abhyasta-madhu-priyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidūṣita-madhu-sparśāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravrajanti mumukṣavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu sakṛd āsvādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pramadāmadirārasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na prāṇimi vinā tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhiṅ nikṛṣṭaṃ ca mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu sakṛd āsvādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pramadā-madirā-rasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na prāṇimi vinā tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhiṅ nikṛṣṭaṃ ca mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gacchati sma ravir astabhūdharaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasitadrumān adhi śakuntapaṅktayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madamandam ātmabhavanāni nāgarāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyayā sahāham api tanniveśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gacchati sma ravir asta-bhū-dharaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasita-drumān adhi śakunta-paṅktayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mada-mandam ātma-bhavanāni nāgarāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyayā saha aham api tan-niveśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra prasannayā kālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyayā ca prasannayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasanno dhruvakādīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suhṛdām atyavāhayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra prasannayā kālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyayā ca prasannayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasanno dhruvakā adīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suhṛdām atyavāhayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daśabhir daśabhir yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahasrair divasavyaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanarāśiḥ parikṣīṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālena mahatā mahān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daśabhir daśabhir yāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahasrair divasa-vyaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhana-rāśiḥ parikṣīṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālena mahatā mahān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācic cāham āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nīto dārikayā gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥśravaṃ śrāvito mātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pituḥ svargādhirohaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cic ca aham āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nīto dārikayā gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥ-śravaṃ śrāvito mātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pituḥ svarga-adhirohaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guruṇā guruśokena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīḍyamānaṃ ca māṃ nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāhvāyyāvadat putra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitravarmāham eva te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guruṇā guru-śokena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīḍyamānaṃ ca māṃ nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāhvāyya avadat putra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitravarma āham eva te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kulaputrakavṛttena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthātavyam adhunā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa hīha paraloke ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukhāya prāṇinām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kula-putraka-vṛttena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthātavyam adhunā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa hi iha para-loke ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukhāya prāṇinām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃkṛtāya sa ca me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhūṣaṇāmbaracandanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitryaṃ śreṣṭhipadaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhaṃ yāhīty abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ-kṛtāya sa ca me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhūṣaṇa-ambara-candanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitryaṃ śreṣṭhi-padaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhaṃ yāhi ity abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kālastoke prayāte ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadainyo dhruvako 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saśokā gaṅgadattāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā samāśvasyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāla-stoke prayāte ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-dainyo dhruvako 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-śokā gaṅgadatta āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā samāśvasyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tūktam idānīṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālakālaś calo gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anya evāyam āyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṭumbabharadāruṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu uktam idānīṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāla-kālaś calo gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anya eva ayam āyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṭumba-bhara-dāruṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva veśavanitāsaktiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva kuṭumbaparigrahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi vānaraśāvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktā syandanadhuryatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva veśa-vanitā-āsaktiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva kuṭumba-parigrahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi vānara-śāvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktā syandana-dhuryatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā gaṅgadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālatā lolatāṃ gatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mārgam āsevatāṃ sāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātṛmātāmahīgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā gaṅgadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālatā lolatāṃ gatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mārgam āsevatāṃ sa āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātṛ-mātā-mahī-gatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>durācāraiva sā veśyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ yasyāḥ satīvratam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi vedam adhīyānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūdraḥ sadbhiḥ praśasyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dur-ācāra aiva sā veśyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ yasyāḥ satī-vratam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi vedam adhīyānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūdraḥ sadbhiḥ praśasyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadoṣam api na tyājyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahajaṃ karma sādhubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>itīdaṃ vacanaṃ viṣṇoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāpi saṃmānayatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-doṣam api na tyājyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha-jaṃ karma sādhubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti idaṃ vacanaṃ viṣṇoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa āpi saṃmānayatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ gaṇikāsaktiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratiṣiddhā kuṭumbinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tu śokopataptāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṇikāyāḥ sabhājanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ gaṇikā-āsaktiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratiṣiddhā kuṭumbinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tu śoka-upataptāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṇikāyāḥ sabhājanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad bravīmi samāśvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadattāṃ samātṛkām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam āgata evāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaja niṣṭhuratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad bravīmi samāśvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadattāṃ sa-mātṛkām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam āgata eva asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaja niṣṭhuratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām udbhūtarāgatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhruvakābhyarthitena ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>doṣam utprekṣamāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gata evāsmi tadgṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām udbhūta-rāgatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhruvaka-abhyarthitena ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>doṣam utprekṣamāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gata eva asmi tad-gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sā madviyogena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madduḥkhena ca karśitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krandatparijanā kṛcchrāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parisaṃsthāpitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sā mad-viyogena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mad-duḥkhena ca karśitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krandat-parijanā kṛcchrāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parisaṃsthāpitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayaiva ca saha snātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niruptasalilāñjaliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarāvaṃ madirāpūrṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyasyati sma gṛhāṅgaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya aiva ca saha snātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirupta-salila-añjaliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarāvaṃ madirā-pūrṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyasyati sma gṛha-aṅgaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātā tu gaṅgadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītacaṣakāvadat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putra duḥkhavinodārthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarpaṇaṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātā tu gaṅgadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhīta-caṣaka āvadat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putra duḥkha-vinoda-arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarpaṇaṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīt prapañco 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣamaḥ prastuto 'nayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nūnam asmān iyaṃ vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mugdhān ākṛṣṭum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīt prapañco 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣamaḥ prastuto 'nayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nūnam asmān iyaṃ vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mugdhān ākṛṣṭum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>īdṛśī ca vacodakṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadākṣiṇyaś ca mādṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirdākṣiṇyā ca devī śrīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti jāto 'smi śaṅkitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>īdṛśī ca vaco-dakṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-dākṣiṇyaś ca mādṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-dākṣiṇyā ca devī śrīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti jāto 'smi śaṅkitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avaśyaṃ ca madīyā śrīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadattāṃ gamiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyaḥ samānaśīleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhyaṃ badhnanti jantavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-vaśyaṃ ca madīyā śrīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadattāṃ gamiṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyaḥ samāna-śīleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhyaṃ badhnanti jantavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā gaṅgadattaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣetraṃ dānasya pūjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dānaṃ hi tatra dātavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatra cittaṃ prasīdati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā gaṅgadatta aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣetraṃ dānasya pūjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dānaṃ hi tatra dātavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatra cittaṃ prasīdati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti ceti ca niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trāsāsvāditacetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>triphalāvirasāsvādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānam āsevitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti ca iti ca niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trāsa-āsvādita-cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tri-phalā-virasa-āsvādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānam āsevitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na vartate sakṛt pātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atas triḥ pīyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṇikāmātur ādeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>om iti pratyapūjayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na vartate sakṛt pātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atas triḥ pīyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṇikā-mātur ādeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>om iti pratyapūjayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā yathā ca māṃ mandam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārohan madirāmadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛśoko 'pi balavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avārohat tathā tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā yathā ca māṃ mandam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārohan madirā-madaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitṛ-śoko 'pi balavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avārohat tathā tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ paraṃ madādeśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madīyāḥ paricārikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madirāmandirān madyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āharanti sma saṃtatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ paraṃ mad-ādeśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madīyāḥ paricārikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madirā-mandirān madyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āharanti sma saṃtatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadīyāś ca madīyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gataśokam avekṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāyanti sma hasanti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kecit tatrārudann api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadīyāś ca madīyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gata-śokam avekṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāyanti sma hasanti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ke-cit tatra arudann api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti vismāritas tābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛśokam ahaṃ tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divasān gamayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>surāsmaraparāyaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti vismāritas tābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛ-śokam ahaṃ tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divasān gamayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>surā-smara-parāyaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā gaṇikāmātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>preṣitā gaṇikāvadat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśrūs tvām āha rūkṣo 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gātram abhyajyatāṃ tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā gaṇikā-mātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>preṣitā gaṇika āvadat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśrūs tvām āha rūkṣo 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gātram abhyajyatāṃ tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadattāpi paruṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātā snehavivarjanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād iyam api sneham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgeṣu nidadhātv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadatta āpi paruṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātā sneha-vivarjanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād iyam api sneham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgeṣu nidadhātv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śāṭakaṃ cāharan mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthūlaṃ tailamalīmasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>skandhaḥ kaṭukatailena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mrakṣitaś ca tayā mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śāṭakaṃ ca aharan mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthūlaṃ taila-malīmasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>skandhaḥ kaṭuka-tailena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mrakṣitaś ca tayā mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś cāsmi punar yāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikāyā muhūrtakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyaṅgaḥ kriyate tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān avataratv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś ca asmi punar yāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikāyā- muhūrtakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhy-aṅgaḥ kriyate tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān avataratv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoparipurāt ṣaṣṭham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anantaram avātaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilpinas tatra cāpaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratnasaṃskārakārakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha upari-purāt ṣaṣṭham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-antaram avātaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilpinas tatra ca apaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratna-saṃskāra-kārakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.126'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sasaṃbhramaiś ca tair uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtāñjaliputair aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreṣṭhiputra pravīṇo 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvatto lajjāmahe vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.126'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-saṃbhramaiś ca tair uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛta-añjali-putair aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreṣṭhi-putra pravīṇo 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvatto lajjāmahe vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.127'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvavidyākalāśilpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kovidasya puras tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvajñānām api trāsāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasaranti na pāṇayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.127'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarva-vidyā-kalā-śilpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kovidasya puras tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-jñānām api trāsāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasaranti na pāṇayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.128'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād avataratv asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīrghāyuḥ pañcamaṃ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃkaraṇakarmedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśu niṣṭhāṃ vrajatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.128'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād avataratv asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīrgha-āyuḥ pañcamaṃ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ-karaṇa-karma idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśu niṣṭhāṃ vrajatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.129'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca pariśeṣebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kramāc citrakarādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañcebhyo 'pi purebhyo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāyair avatāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.129'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca pariśeṣebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kramāc citra-kara-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañcebhyo 'pi purebhyo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāyair avatāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.130'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāntaḥkarmārikābhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghaṭadāsībhir aṅgaṇāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sicyase gomayāmbhobhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti nirdhārito bahiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.130'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāntaḥ-karma-ārikābhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghaṭa-dāsībhir aṅgaṇāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sicyase go-maya-ambhobhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti nirdhārito bahiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.131'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyate sma ca tasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāsādasyopari dhvaniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bandinaḥ paṭhataḥ ślokam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccakair uccarann iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.131'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyate sma ca tasya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāsādasya upari dhvaniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bandinaḥ paṭhataḥ ślokam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccakair uccarann iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.132'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jaya rājasiṃha paradantimaṇḍalaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijitaiva vādimṛgasaṃhatis tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parimaṇḍalagrahapatiprabhāprabhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇakesarāṃśuvisaraś ca rājase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.132'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jaya rāja-siṃha para-danti-maṇḍalaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijita aiva vā ādi-mṛga-saṃhatis tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parimaṇḍala-graha-pati-prabhā-prabhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇa-kesara-aṃśu-visaraś ca rājase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.133'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā manye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviṣṭaḥ ko 'pyayaṃ viṭaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raṇḍāputrasya yasyaite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyante bandibhir guṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.133'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā manye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviṣṭaḥ ko 'pyayaṃ viṭaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raṇḍā-putrasya yasya ete</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyante bandibhir guṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.134'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuto 'sya guṇagandho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena lajjaiva khāditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veśanārīgrahasthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayaṃ khyāpayatā guṇān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.134'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuto 'sya guṇa-gandho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena lajja aiva khāditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veśa-nārī-graha-sthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayaṃ khyāpayatā guṇān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.135'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity asūyann ahaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjāvarjitakaṃdharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svagṛhābhimukhaṃ prāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pauradhikkārakāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.135'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity asūyann ahaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjā-varjita-kaṃdharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-gṛha-abhi-mukhaṃ prāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paura-dhik-kāra-kāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.136'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ya eva māṃ suhṛt kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyat saṃmukhāgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa evāmīlayad dṛṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hā kiṃ dṛṣṭam iti bruvan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.136'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ya eva māṃ suhṛt kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apaśyat saṃ-mukha-āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa eva amīlayad dṛṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hā kiṃ dṛṣṭam iti bruvan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.137'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yenāṅgaṇena yāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃstutasyaitarasya vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra gomayapānīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pātayanti sma nāgarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.137'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena aṅgaṇena yāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃstutasya etarasya vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra gomaya-pānīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pātayanti sma nāgarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.138'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃprāyaprapañcābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janatābhir jugupsitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apūrvapuruṣākrāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svagṛhadvāram āgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.138'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ-prāya-prapañcābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janatābhir jugupsitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-pūrva-puruṣa-ākrāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-gṛha-dvāram āgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.139'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca praviśann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvābhyāsād aśaṅkitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti ruṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvārapālena vāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.139'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca praviśann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrva-abhyāsād a-śaṅkitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ruṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvāra-pālena vāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.140'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkāmandīkṛtatrapaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhadra sarvaṃ na jānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tvam ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.140'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkā-mandī-kṛta-trapaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhadra sarvaṃ na jānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tvam ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.141'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam īdṛśaṃ tattvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tvaṃ paragṛhaṃ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭhaddauvārikadvāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśaṅkaḥ praviśer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.141'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam īdṛśaṃ tattvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na tvaṃ para-gṛhaṃ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭhad-dauvārika-dvāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-śaṅkaḥ praviśer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.142'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktam atha sāsūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ ca mitravatī mṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenoktaṃ kaccid āyuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sānudāso bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.142'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktam atha sa-asūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ ca mitravatī mṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena uktaṃ kac-cid āyuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sānudāso bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.143'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu kaṭukālāpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmān madhurabhāṣiṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lajjamānaḥ sthitas tūṣṇīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha tenoditaṃ punaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.143'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu kaṭuka-ālāpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmān madhura-bhāṣiṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lajjamānaḥ sthitas tūṣṇīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha tena uditaṃ punaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.144'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jīvaty eva mṛtā tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātā mitravatī tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>spṛhayaty anapatyābhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā strībhyaḥ putravaty api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.144'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jīvaty eva mṛtā tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātā mitravatī tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>spṛhayaty an-apatyābhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā strībhyaḥ putravaty- api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.145'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekenaiva pravṛddhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāmenāgantunā tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃhatāv api dharmārthāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ucchinnau svakulocitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.145'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekena eva pravṛddhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāmena a-gantunā tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃhatāv api dharma-arthāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ucchinnau sva-kula-ucitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.146'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhaṃ vikrīya niḥsāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anāthā jananī tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha pautreṇa vadhvā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kutrāpy anyatra tiṣṭhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.146'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhaṃ vikrīya niḥ-sāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-nāthā jananī tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha pautreṇa vadhvā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kutra apy anyatra tiṣṭhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.147'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'yaṃ prathamakakṣāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kurute karma vardhakiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āste mitravatī yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad ayaṃ pṛcchyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.147'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'yaṃ prathama-kakṣāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kurute karma vardhakiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āste mitravatī yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad ayaṃ pṛcchyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.148'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca gatvā mayā dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyabhijñāya māṃ cirāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā kaṣṭam iti kṛtvoccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhaskhalitam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.148'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca gatvā mayā dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyabhijñāya māṃ cirāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā kaṣṭam iti kṛtva ūccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkha-skhalitam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.149'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hṛtārthajanadāridryāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvatprasādāt saha snuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daridravāṭake tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jananī tava tiṣṭhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.149'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hṛta-artha-jana-dāridryāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvat-prasādāt saha snuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daridra-vāṭake tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jananī tava tiṣṭhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.150'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daridravāṭakaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kutreti sa mayā punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍālavāṭakādūraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣiṇenety abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.150'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daridra-vāṭakaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kutra iti sa mayā punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍāla-vāṭaka-a-dūraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣiṇena ity abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.151'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śanaiḥ saṃcaramāṇaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daridragrāmarathyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daridrān dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣayakṣīṇān mṛtākṛtīn ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.151'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śanaiḥ saṃcaramāṇaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daridra-grāma-rathyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daridrān dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣaya-kṣīṇān mṛta-ākṛtīn ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.152'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nimbataror mūle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattakaṃ nāma putrakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭavān asmi bahubhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālakaiḥ parivāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.152'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nimba-taror mūle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattakaṃ nāma putrakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭavān asmi bahubhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālakaiḥ parivāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.153'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālakānām ayaṃ rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te 'nye mantryādayaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dadāti sma tatas tebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāḥ sa kulmāṣapiṇḍikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.153'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālakānām ayaṃ rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te 'nye mantry-ādayaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dadāti sma tatas tebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāḥ sa kulmāṣa-piṇḍikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.154'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tu teṣāṃ pratīhāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa rājāṃśaṃ prakalpitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulmāṣapiṇḍikāṃ hṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣudhitatvād abhakṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.154'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tu teṣāṃ pratīhāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa rāja-aṃśaṃ prakalpitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulmāṣa-piṇḍikāṃ hṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣudhitatvād abhakṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.155'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dattako 'pi hṛtasvāṃśas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāraṃ mātaram āhvayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agacchat kuṭikām ekāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkārasthagitājirām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.155'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dattako 'pi hṛta-sva-aṃśas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāraṃ mātaram āhvayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agacchat kuṭikām ekāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkāra-sthagita-ajirām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.156'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaṭaiḥ kṛtaparikṣepāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jaradviralavīraṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anantapaṭalacchidra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviṣṭātapacandrikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.156'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaṭaiḥ kṛta-parikṣepāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jarad-virala-vīraṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ananta-paṭala-cchidra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviṣṭa-ātapa-candrikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.157'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛṣṭato dattakasyāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatas tat kuṭikāṅgaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāsyā ca pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitravatyai niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.157'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛṣṭato dattakasya ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatas tat kuṭikā-aṅgaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāsyā ca pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitravatyai niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.158'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu niṣkramya saṃbhrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām āliṅgya tathāvidham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍhanidrāprasupteva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nākampata na cāśvasīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.158'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu niṣkramya saṃbhrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām āliṅgya tathā-vidham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍha-nidrā-prasupta īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na akampata na ca aśvasīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.159'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadyaḥ putreṇa saṃyuktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāminā ca vinākṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anuṣṇāśītasaṃsparśair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām asnāpayad aśrubhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.159'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadyaḥ putreṇa saṃyuktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāminā ca vinā-kṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-uṣṇa-a-śīta-saṃsparśair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām asnāpayad aśrubhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.160'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nilīnāṃ ca kuṭīkoṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyāmi sma kuṭumbinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ vā vistaraṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūrtām iva daridratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.160'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nilīnāṃ ca kuṭī-koṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyāmi sma kuṭumbinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ vā vistaraṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūrtām iva daridratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.161'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satuṣaiḥ kodravakaṇair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apanītaṃ mamāṅgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadduṣṭaceṭikādattam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādarāt svayam ambayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.161'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satuṣaiḥ kodravakaṇair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apanītaṃ mama aṅgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad-duṣṭa-ceṭikā-dattam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādarāt svayam ambayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.162'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lākṣāvṛtabahucchidrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khaṇḍauṣṭhī śīrṇatālukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ānītoṣṇodakaṃ dātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ālukā paragehataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.162'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lākṣā-āvṛta-bahu-cchidrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khaṇḍa-oṣṭhī śīrṇa-tālukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ānīta-uṣṇa-udakaṃ dātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ālukā para-gehataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.163'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snapayantyā ca māṃ bhagnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karmakaryā pramattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>athāsyāḥ svāminī caṇḍam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākrandat taḍitodarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.163'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snapayantyā ca māṃ bhagnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karma-karyā pramattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha asyāḥ svāminī caṇḍam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākrandat taḍita-udarī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.164'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi tvayi vipannāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālukādevi gomini</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūnyam adya jagajjātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adya mātā mṛtā mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.164'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi tvayi vipannāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālukā-devi gomini</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūnyam adya jagaj-jātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adya mātā mṛtā mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.165'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama mātur vivāhe tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhā jñātikulāt kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena tvām anuśocāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvitīyāṃ jananīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.165'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama mātur vivāhe tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhā jñāti-kulāt kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena tvām anuśocāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvitīyāṃ jananīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.166'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vilapatyai tathā dīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karuṇārdrīkṛtāśayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāṭakaṃ pāṭayitvāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ardhaṃ tasyai vitīrṇavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.166'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vilapatyai tathā dīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karuṇa-ārdrī-kṛta-āśayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāṭakaṃ pāṭayitva āham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ardhaṃ tasyai vitīrṇavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.167'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṣkariṇyāṃ tataḥ snātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pibantīva viṣāṇakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāñjikavyañjanaṃ kṛcchrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhuñje kodravaudanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.167'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṣkariṇyāṃ tataḥ snātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pibanti īva viṣāṇakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāñjika-vyañjanaṃ kṛcchrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhuñje kodrava-odanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.168'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vālam idaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daridracaritaṃ ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrūyamāṇam api hy etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhāyaiva bhavādṛśām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.168'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha va ālam idaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daridra-caritaṃ ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrūyamāṇam api hy etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhāya eva bhavādṛśām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.169'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ katham api kṣiptvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṣalakṣāyatāṃ kṣapām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātadurvāravairāgyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prātar mātaram abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.169'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ katham api kṣiptvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṣa-lakṣa-āyatāṃ kṣapām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāta-dur-vāra-vairāgyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prātar mātaram abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.170'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prakṣapitād dravyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upādāya caturguṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛham mayā praveṣṭavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na praveṣṭavyam anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.170'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prakṣapitād dravyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upādāya catur-guṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛham mayā praveṣṭavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na praveṣṭavyam anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.171'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād ajātaputreva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātar mṛtasuteva vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥkhakarmavinodena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayer divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.171'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād a-jāta-putra īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātar mṛta-suta īva vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥkha-karma-vinodena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayer divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.172'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ mā gamaḥ putra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvāṃ sadāraṃ sadārakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvayāmi sukhāsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmabhir garhitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.172'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ mā gamaḥ putra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvāṃ sa-dāraṃ sa-dārakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvayāmi sukha-āsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmabhir garhitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.173'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ vṛddhayā mātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvyate duḥkhakarmabhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaḥ śaktaḥ puruṣas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ślāghyam ekasya jīvitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.173'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ vṛddhayā mātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvyate duḥkha-karmabhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaḥ śaktaḥ puruṣas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ślāghyam ekasya jīvitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.174'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenālam avalambyemām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amba kātaratāṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu tātasya dārāḥ stha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sumerugurucetasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.174'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena alam avalambya imām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amba kātaratāṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu tātasya dārāḥ stha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-meru-guru-cetasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.175'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity avasthitanirbandhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṇamya jananīm aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daridravāṭakād ghorān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirayāṃ nirayād iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.175'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity avasthita-nir-bandhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṇamya jananīm aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daridra-vāṭakād ghorān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirayāṃ nirayād iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.176'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ambā dūram anuvrajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hitaṃ mahyam upādiśat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmraliptīṃ vraje putra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatrāste mātulas tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.176'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ambā dūram anuvrajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hitaṃ mahyam upādiśat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmraliptīṃ vraje putra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatrā aste mātulas tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.177'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>narāṇāṃ hi vipannānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaraṇaṃ mātṛbāndhavāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyājyās tu nijaśatrutvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prājñena pitṛbāndhavāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.177'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>narāṇāṃ hi vipannānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaraṇaṃ mātṛ-bāndhavāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyājyās tu nija-śatrutvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prājñena pitṛ-bāndhavāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.178'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi samādiśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattvā caudanamallakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā nivṛttā pravṛtto 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pathā prāgdeśagāminā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.178'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi samādiśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattvā ca odana-mallakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā nivṛttā pravṛtto 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pathā prāg-deśa-gāminā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.179'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma ca vaideśāñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jarjaracchattrapādukān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>skandhāsaktajaraccarma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthagikāpacanālikān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.179'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma ca vaideśāñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jarjara-cchattra-pādukān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>skandha-āsakta-jarac-carma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthagikā-pacana-ālikān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.180'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādiprakārās te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat prakāraṃ nirīkṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karuṇāgocarībhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhāṣanta parasparam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.180'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi-prakārās te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat prakāraṃ nirīkṣya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karuṇā-go-carī-bhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhāṣanta parasparam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.181'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho kaṣṭam idaṃ dṛṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmābhiś ceṣṭitaṃ vidheḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva sādhuḥ sānudāso 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kveyam etādṛśī daśā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.181'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho kaṣṭam idaṃ dṛṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmābhiś ceṣṭitaṃ vidheḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva sādhuḥ sānudāso 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva iyam etā-dṛśī daśā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.182'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā naiva śocyo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avipannamahādhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avipannaguṇānāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vipannaṃ mahātmanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.182'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā na eva śocyo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-vipanna-mahā-dhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-vipanna-guṇānāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vipannaṃ mahā-ātmanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.183'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ cāvocan vayaṃ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavataḥ paricārakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etasmād asahāyatvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma śaṅkāṃ karor iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.183'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ ca avocan vayaṃ sarve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavataḥ paricārakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etasmād a-sahāyatvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma śaṅkāṃ karor iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.184'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ ramayantas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīyakathāḥ pathi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agacchan kaṃcid adhvānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>acetitapathaklamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.184'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ ramayantas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇīya-kathāḥ pathi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agacchan kaṃ-cid adhvānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-cetita-patha-klamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.185'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃkocitajagacchāye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratāpena visāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvopari sthite bhānau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃprāpaṃ sumahatsaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.185'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃkocita-jagac-chāye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratāpena visāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-upari sthite bhānau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃprāpaṃ su-mahat-saraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.186'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vañcayitvā tu taddṛṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūre snātvāmṛtopamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kodravānnam asneha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>lavaṇaṃ bhuktavān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.186'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vañcayitvā tu tad-dṛṣṭiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūre snātva ā-mṛta-upamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kodrava-annam a-sneha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>lavaṇaṃ bhuktavān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.187'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te 'pi plutair udāttaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāhāraiḥ parito diśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsā kva yāsīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyāharan māṃ sasaṃbhramāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.187'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te 'pi plutair udāttaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāhāraiḥ parito diśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsā kva yāsi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyāharan māṃ sa-saṃbhramāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.188'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktavantaś ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivṛttasnānabhojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhik pramādahatān asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatā chalitā vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.188'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktavantaś ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivṛtta-snāna-bhojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhik pramāda-hatān asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatā chalitā- vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.189'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmābhiḥ kāritaṃ kandau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khāditavyam anekadhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavatā ca na saṃbhuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etad asmād anarthakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.189'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmābhiḥ kāritaṃ kandau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khāditavyam an-ekadhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavatā ca na saṃbhuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etad asmād an-arthakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.190'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīm api yat kiṃcit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayā tatropayujyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyathāsmābhir apy adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthātavyaṃ kṣudhitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.190'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīm api yat kiṃ-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayā tatra upayujyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyatha āsmābhir apy adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthātavyaṃ kṣudhitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.191'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tadarthitaḥ kiṃcid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhakṣayitvā sahaiva taiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāyāhne prasthito grāmam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchaṃ siddhakacchapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.191'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tad-arthitaḥ kiṃ-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhakṣayitvā saha eva taiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāya-ahne prasthito grāmam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchaṃ siddhakacchapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.192'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra māṃ rathyayāyāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaścid dṛṣṭvā kuṭumbikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praṇipatyābravīd ehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svagṛhaṃ gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.192'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra māṃ rathyayā āyāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaś-cid dṛṣṭvā kuṭumbikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praṇipatya abravīd ehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-gṛhaṃ gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.193'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anujñātasya pathikaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviṣṭasya gṛhaṃ mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayaṃ prakṣālayat pādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vārito 'pi kuṭumbikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.193'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anujñātasya pathikaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviṣṭasya gṛhaṃ mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayaṃ prakṣālayat pādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vārito 'pi kuṭumbikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.194'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhyaṅgocchādanasnāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamitāṅgaśramāya me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhāturaktam adāt sthūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakṣālaṃ paṭaśāṭakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.194'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhy-aṅga-ucchādana-snāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamita-aṅga-śramāya me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhātu-raktam adāt sthūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakṣālaṃ paṭa-śāṭakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.195'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṣīraudanaprāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhuktvā navatakājjhake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śayanīye niṣaṇṇaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avocat sa kuṭumbikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.195'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṣīra-odana-prāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhuktvā navataka-ājjhake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śayanīye niṣaṇṇaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avocat sa kuṭumbikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.196'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvadīyas tāta vṛttāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvaḥ saṃvidito mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhānoḥ svarbhānunā grāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasya nekṣaṇagocaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.196'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvadīyas tāta vṛtta-antaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvaḥ saṃvidito mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhānoḥ svar-bhānunā grāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasya nā ikṣaṇa-gocaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.197'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>merusāgarasārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasādān mitravarmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahasrāṇi samṛddhāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mādṛśām anujīvinām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.197'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>meru-sāgara-sārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasādān mitravarmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahasrāṇi samṛddhāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mādṛśām anujīvinām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.198'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ siddhārthako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṇigbhṛtyaḥ pitus tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena tvadīyam evedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat kiṃcid draviṇaṃ mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.198'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ siddhārthako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṇig-bhṛtyaḥ pitus tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena tvadīyam eva idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat kiṃ-cid draviṇaṃ mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.199'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mūlam etad upādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vardhantāṃ te vibhūtayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahusattvopakāriṇyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śākhā iva vanaspateḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.199'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mūlam etad upādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vardhantāṃ te vibhūtayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahu-sattva-upakāriṇyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śākhā- iva vanas-pateḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.200'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dinastokeṣu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārthena sahito mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmraliptīṃ prayātāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvad viśramyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.200'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dina-stokeṣu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārthena sahito mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmraliptīṃ prayāta āsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvad viśramyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.201'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athopapannam āheti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicārya saha cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prātiṣṭhe saha sārthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena siddharthakena ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.201'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha upapannam āha iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicārya saha cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prātiṣṭhe saha sārthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena siddharthakena ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.202'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato vicitraśastrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣeṇa sphuṭatām iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śṛṇomi sma pracaṇḍānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ḍiṇḍikānāṃ vikatthitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.202'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato vicitra-śastrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣeṇa sphuṭatām iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śṛṇomi sma pracaṇḍānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ḍiṇḍikānāṃ vikatthitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.203'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatāṃ dhātakībhaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratijñāparvatasthirāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khaṇḍacarmeti me nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muṇḍāḥ pāśupatā vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.203'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatāṃ dhātakī-bhaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratijñā-parvata-sthirāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khaṇḍacarma īti me nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muṇḍāḥ pāśu-patā- vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.204'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahasram api caurāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūrāṇāṃ yuddhamūrdhani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na nayeyaṃ yadi svargaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaccheyaṃ nirayaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.204'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahasram api caurāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūrāṇāṃ yuddha-mūrdhani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na nayeyaṃ yadi svargaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaccheyaṃ nirayaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.205'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taskarān yadi paśyāmas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatas tvāṃ devi caṇḍike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyagrais tarpayiṣyāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahiṣacchāgaśoṇitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.205'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taskarān yadi paśyāmas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatas tvāṃ devi caṇḍike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praty-agrais tarpayiṣyāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahiṣa-cchāga-śoṇitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.206'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti gatvāṭavīmadhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nadīṃ gambhīrakandarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvasāma kṛtāpuṇyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍāṃ vaitaraṇīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.206'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti gatva āṭavī-madhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nadīṃ gambhīra-kandarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvasāma kṛta-a-puṇyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍāṃ vaitaraṇīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.207'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛṣṇapakṣakṣapākālī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṇādaparihāriṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālarātrir ivāsahyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulindapṛtanāpatat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.207'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛṣṇa-pakṣa-kṣapā-kālī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṇāda-parihāriṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāla-rātrir iva a-sahyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulinda-pṛtana āpatat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.208'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā kathitavantas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām ālokyaiva ḍiṇḍikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apākrāman parityakta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śastralajjāyaśodhanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.208'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā kathitavantas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām ālokya eva ḍiṇḍikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apākrāman parityakta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śastra-lajjā-yaśo-dhanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.209'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>luṇṭhyamānāt tv ahaṃ sārthāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇatrāṇaparāyaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhramabhrāntadigbhāgaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāndiśīkaḥ palāyitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.209'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>luṇṭhyamānāt tv ahaṃ sārthāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇa-trāṇa-parāyaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhrama-bhrānta-dig-bhāgaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāndiśīkaḥ palāyitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.210'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taskaro 'yam iti bhraṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārthikād api dhāvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gahanāntaṃ dināntena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanāntagrāmam āsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.210'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taskaro 'yam iti bhraṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārthikād api dhāvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gahana-antaṃ dina-antena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vana-anta-grāmam āsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.211'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya madhena gacchantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ pariṣvajya vṛddhikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti roditum ārabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛddhatāghargharadhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.211'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya madhena gacchantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ pariṣvajya vṛddhikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti roditum ārabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛddhatā-gharghara-dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.212'>
