<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putra niṣṭhuracitto 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo mām utsannabāndhavām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛddhāṃ duḥkhitakām asvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaktvā deśāntaraṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.212'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putra niṣṭhura-citto 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo mām utsanna-bāndhavām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛddhāṃ duḥkhitakām a-svāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaktvā deśa-antaraṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.213'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mādṛśīṃ mātaraṃ dīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktvā yad upacīyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat prayāgagatenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na pāpam apacīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.213'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mā-dṛśīṃ mātaraṃ dīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktvā yad upacīyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat prayāga-gatena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na pāpam apacīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.214'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tīrthayātrākṛtaṃ pāpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ataḥ kṣapayatā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām ārādhayamānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svagṛhe sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.214'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tīrtha-yātrā-kṛtaṃ pāpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ataḥ kṣapayatā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām ārādhayamānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-gṛhe sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.215'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho kaṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aparo 'yam upadravaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manye mūrtimatī kāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipattir iyam āgatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.215'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho kaṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aparo 'yam upadravaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manye mūrtimatī ka āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipattir iyam āgatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.216'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mādṛśāṃ hi pramattānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apramattā vipattayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtatāḥ saṃnidhīyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prājñānām iva saṃpadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.216'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mā-dṛśāṃ hi pramattānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-pramattā- vipattayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtatāḥ saṃnidhīyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prājñānām iva saṃpadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.217'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ ciram īkṣitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayoktaṃ lajjamānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putra svaputrasādṛśyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaṃ mayetthaṃ kadarthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.217'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ ciram īkṣitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taya ūktaṃ lajjamānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putra sva-putra-sā-dṛśyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaṃ maya ītthaṃ kadarthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.218'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā putra evāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mamety uktvānayad gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatrākarod akhedaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgābhyaṅgāśanādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.218'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā putra eva asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama ity uktvā ānayad gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra akarod a-khedaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅga-abhyaṅga-āśana-ādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.219'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhāte prasthitaś cainām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhivādyāham abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>campāyāṃ sānudāsasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛham amba vrajer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.219'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhāte prasthitaś ca enām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhivādya aham abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>campāyāṃ sānudāsasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛham amba vrajer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.220'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrāntaśrāntaś ca viśrāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭvā panthānam antare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmraliptīṃ vrajāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paribhūtāmarāvatīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.220'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrānta-śrāntaś ca viśrāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭvā panthānam antare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmraliptīṃ vrajāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paribhūta-amarāvatīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.221'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhoḥ sādho gaṅgasattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛham ākhyāyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaṃ yam eva sma pṛcchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa sa evaivam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.221'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhoḥ sādho gaṅgasattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛham ākhyāyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaṃ yam eva sma pṛcchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa sa eva evam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.222'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāmraliptyāṃ pure bhrāntas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvatto dhūrtataro janaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durvidagdhajanālāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāmyanāgarako bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.222'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāmraliptyāṃ pure bhrāntas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvatto dhūrtataro janaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dur-vidagdha-jana-ālāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāmya-nāgarako bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.223'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃpṛcchamānāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadā mahyaṃ na kaś ca na</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācaṣṭe sma tadā khinnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sann upāviśam āpaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.223'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃpṛcchamānāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadā mahyaṃ na kaś ca na</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācaṣṭe sma tadā khinnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sann upāviśam āpaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.224'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra māṃ pṛṣṭavān eko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṇik pāṇḍaramastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udvigna iva vicchāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ nimittaṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.224'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra māṃ pṛṣṭavān eko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṇik pāṇḍara-mastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udvigna iva vicchāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ nimittaṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.225'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayāpi kathitaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānukampāya pṛcchate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udvegasya nimittaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tenāpi hasitoditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.225'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya āpi kathitaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-anukampāya pṛcchate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udvegasya nimittaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena api hasita-uditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.226'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvām amī kuṭilālāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manyante tāmraliptikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhaṃ hi gaṅgadattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na pṛcchanti yathāsthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.226'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvām amī kuṭila-ālāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manyante tāmraliptikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhaṃ hi gaṅgadattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na pṛcchanti yathā-sthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.227'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paurṇamāsīśaśāṅkasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo na jānāti maṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na sa jānāti dhūrto vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgadattasya mandiram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.227'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paurṇamāsī-śaśāṅkasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo na jānāti maṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na sa jānāti dhūrto vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgadattasya mandiram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.228'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā dharmakāmārthān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kūṭasthān atra paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravṛddhāṃś ca viśuddhā:mśu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgadattasya tad gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.228'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā dharma-kāma-arthān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kūṭa-sthān atra paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravṛddhāṃś ca viśuddha-a:mśu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgadattasya tad gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.229'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā gaccha mugdheti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām uktvā svayam eva saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgadattagṛhadvāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anayat prītayācakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.229'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā gaccha mugdha iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām uktvā svayam eva saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgadatta-gṛha-dvāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anayat prīta-yācakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.230'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān mām āgataṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dauvārikaparaṃparā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antaḥkakṣāntarasthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātulāya nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.230'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān mām āgataṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dauvārika-paraṃparā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antaḥ-kakṣa-antara-sthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātulāya nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.231'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgaughasyeva patatas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuṣāragirigahvare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>athāntastāragambhīraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛttaḥ kranditadhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.231'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgā-oghasya iva patatas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuṣāra-giri-gahvare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha antas-tāra-gambhīraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛttaḥ krandita-dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.232'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sadārabhṛtyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmān niryāya mandirāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgāyāṃ gaṅgadattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitre dattaṃ jalaṃ mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.232'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa-dāra-bhṛtyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmān niryāya mandirāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgāyāṃ gaṅgadattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitre dattaṃ jalaṃ mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.233'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāham upabhuñjānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāntarduḥkhaṃ mahatsukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālastokaṃ nayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣabhinnam ivāmṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.233'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra aham upabhuñjānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-antar-duḥkhaṃ mahat-sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāla-stokaṃ nayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣa-bhinnam iva amṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.234'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā labdhaviśramaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām abhāṣata mātulaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāgineyārthaye yat tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad anuṣṭhātum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.234'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā labdha-viśramaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām abhāṣata mātulaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāgineya arthaye yat tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad anuṣṭhātum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.235'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad anantam akupyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draviṇaṃ mama paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇadraviṇarāśes tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpannaṃ mitravarmaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.235'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad an-antam a-kupyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draviṇaṃ mama paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇa-draviṇa-rāśes tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpannaṃ mitravarmaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.236'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svasmāt svasmāt tad ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratijñātāc caturguṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭuṃ tvadvirahamlānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaraṃ parigamyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.236'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svasmāt svasmāt tad ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratijñātāc catur-guṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭuṃ tvad-viraha-mlānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaraṃ parigamyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.237'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmiṃś ca kṣīṇae evānyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gantrī te dravyasaṃhatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṣayaprabhavo hy asyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgāyā himavān iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.237'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmiṃś ca kṣīṇae eva anyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gantrī te dravya-saṃhatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kṣaya-prabhavo hy asyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgāyā- himavān iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.238'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sve svasmin sati cānante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lipsānyasmin vigarhitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñātasāṅgavedārthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaḥ paṭhen mātṛkām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.238'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sve svasmin sati ca an-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lipsa ānyasmin vigarhitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāta-sa-aṅga-veda-arthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaḥ paṭhen mātṛkām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.239'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuśāsatam ityādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadattam athāvadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāre 'rthe dṛḍhanirbandhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā māṃ vyāhata mātula ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.239'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anuśāsatam ity-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadattam atha avadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāre 'rthe dṛḍha-nirbandhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā māṃ vyāhata mātula ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.240'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pravartyo gurubhiḥ kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra bālo balād api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayam eva pravṛttas tair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivartyeta kathaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.240'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pravartyo gurubhiḥ kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra bālo balād api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayam eva pravṛttas tair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivartyeta kathaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.241'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac coktaṃ māmakair arthaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṭumbaṃ jīvyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etat sahastapādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mādṛśe nopadiśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.241'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca uktaṃ māmakair arthaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṭumbaṃ jīvyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etat sa-hasta-pādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā-dṛśe na upadiśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.242'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātulād dhanam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo jīvati samātṛkaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu mātulamātraiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>klībasattvaḥ sa jīvyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.242'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātulād dhanam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo jīvati sa-mātṛkaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu mātula-mātra aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>klība-sattvaḥ sa jīvyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.243'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthirasattvaṃ sa buddhvā mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālāpair evamādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āptair akārayad bhṛtyaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakṣūrakṣitam ādṛtaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.243'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthira-sattvaṃ sa buddhvā mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālāpair evam-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āptair akārayad bhṛtyaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakṣū-rakṣitam ādṛtaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.244'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>palāyamānaṃ kaḥ śakto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mriyamāṇaṃ ca rakṣitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti lokād idaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>palāynaparo 'bhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.244'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>palāyamānaṃ kaḥ śakto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mriyamāṇaṃ ca rakṣitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti lokād idaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>palāyna-paro 'bhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.245'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sāṃyātrikaṃ kaṃcid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamiṣyantaṃ mahodadhim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adṛṣṭaḥ kenacid gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinayenābhyavādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.245'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sāṃyātrikaṃ kaṃ-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamiṣyantaṃ mahā-udadhim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-dṛṣṭaḥ kena-cid gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinayena abhyavādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.246'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmai ca kathayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛṣṭān ātmano guṇān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛṣṇādāsīvidheyā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ na kurvanti pātakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.246'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmai ca kathayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛṣṭān ātmano guṇān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛṣṇā-dāsī-vidheyā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ na kurvanti pātakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.247'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ campāniveśasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayo mitravarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvaratnaparīkṣādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalākulaviśāradaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.247'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ campā-niveśasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayo mitravarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-ratna-parīkṣā-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalā-kula-viśāradaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.248'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmābhiś ca sanāthatvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aham icchāmi sādhubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvādṛṅnātho hy anatho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukhyo nāthavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.248'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmābhiś ca sa-nāthatvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aham icchāmi sādhubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvā-dṛṅ-nātho hy a-natho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukhyo nāthavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.249'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mitravarmaṇo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutvaivānandavihvalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śraddadhāti sma duḥsādhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayi sarvajñatām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.249'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mitravarmaṇo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutva aivā ananda-vihvalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śraddadhāti sma duḥ-sādhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayi sarva-jñatām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.250'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avocac ca purābhūma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sanāthā mitravarmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā bhavatā tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ prasthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.250'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avocac ca pura ābhūma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-nāthā- mitravarmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā bhavatā tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ prasthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.251'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha devadvijagurūn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arcitvā maṅgalojjvale</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praśaste tithinakṣatre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bohittham amucad vaṇik ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.251'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha deva-dvi-ja-gurūn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arcitvā maṅgala-ujjvale</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praśaste tithi-nakṣatre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bohittham amucad vaṇik ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.252'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taraṅgajaladālayaṃ makaranakracakragrahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pinākadharakaṃdharaprabham anantam aprakṣayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahārṇavanabhastalaṃ lavaṇasindhunauchadmanā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viyatpatharathena tena vaṇijas tataḥ prasthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.252'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taraṅga-jala-da-ālayaṃ makara-nakra-cakra-grahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pināka-dhara-kaṃdhara-prabham an-antam a-prakṣayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-arṇava-nabhas-talaṃ lavaṇa-sindhu-nau-chadmanā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viyat-patha-rathena tena vaṇijas tataḥ prasthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.253'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ vā na vimānaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena mānasaraṃhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>locanonmeṣamātrena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yojanānāṃ śataṃ gatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.253'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ vā na vimānaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yena mānasa-raṃhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>locana-unmeṣa-mātrena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yojanānāṃ śataṃ gatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.254'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato jalagajendreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalād unmajjatāhataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśīrṇabandhanaḥ potaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭṭaśaḥ sphutati sma saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.254'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato jala-gaja-indreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalād unmajjatā āhataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśīrṇa-bandhanaḥ potaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭṭaśaḥ sphutati sma saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.255'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti gītām anusmaran</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daivāt phalakam ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpaṃ toyanidhes taṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.255'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti gītām anusmaran</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daivāt phalakam ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpaṃ toya-nidhes taṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.256'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣaṇaṃ viśramya tatrāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hā kiṃ vṛttam iti bruvan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udbhrāntodbhrāntadikkatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrāntavān sindhurodhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.256'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣaṇaṃ viśramya tatra ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hā kiṃ vṛttam iti bruvan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udbhrānta-udbhrānta-dikkatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrāntavān sindhu-rodhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.257'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>candanāgarukarpūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lavaṅgalavalīvanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatrākrāntāḥ saritvantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śailopāntāḥ samantataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.257'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>candana-agaru-karpūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lavaṅga-lavalī-vanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatrā akrāntāḥ saritvantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaila-upāntāḥ samantataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.258'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadalīnārikerādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>phalinadrumasaṃkaṭāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āraṇyakair araṇyānyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhajyante yatra kuñjaraiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.258'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadalī-nāri-kera-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>phalina-druma-saṃkaṭāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āraṇyakair araṇyānyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhajyante yatra kuñjaraiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.259'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śilāpihitapūrvārdhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darīdvāre tataḥ kvacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilāpihitapūrvāṅgīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅganām asmi dṛṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.259'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śilā-apihita-pūrva-ardhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darī-dvāre tataḥ kva-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilā-apihita-pūrva-aṅgīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅganām asmi dṛṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.260'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato yathāpramāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirnimeṣ.eṇa cakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛjutānirvikāratvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām asau trastam aikṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.260'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato yathā-pramāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nir-nimeṣ.eṇa cakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛjutā-nir-vikāratvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām asau trastam aikṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.261'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kāpy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dānavī devatāpi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi rūpaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāryāḥ kasyāścid īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.261'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama ka āpy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dānavī devata āpi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi rūpaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāryāḥ kasyāś-cid īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.262'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā kṣudhitā kāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatārūpakañcukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām ihaikākinaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptā naktaṃcarāṅganā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.262'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā kṣudhitā ka āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatā-rūpa-kañcukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām iha ekākinaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptā naktaṃ-cara-aṅganā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.263'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rākṣasyo hy apsarorūpā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mādṛśeṣu pramādiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>randhreṣu praharantīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tan mām idam āgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.263'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rākṣasyo hy apsaro-rūpā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā-dṛśeṣu pramādiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>randhreṣu praharanti iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tan mām idam āgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.264'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād asmād ahaṃ deśāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>palāye sabhayād iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasthitaś cintayitvā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā ca mām ity abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.264'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād asmād ahaṃ deśāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>palāye sa-bhayād iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasthitaś cintayitvā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā ca mām ity abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.265'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhoḥ sādho mā bhavat te bhīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāhaṃ naktaṃcarāṅganā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bohitthavyasanabhraṣṭāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viddhi māṃ mānuṣīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.265'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhoḥ sādho mā bhavat te bhīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ahaṃ naktaṃ-cara-aṅganā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bohittha-vyasana-bhraṣṭāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viddhi māṃ mānuṣīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.266'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha śrutvedam utkṛṣṭāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhvāsād ūrdhvamūrdhajaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trātārau jagato vande</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pārvatīparameśvarau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.266'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha śrutva īdam utkṛṣṭāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhvāsād ūrdhva-mūrdha-jaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trātārau jagato vande</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pārvatī-parama-īśvarau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.267'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama divyeyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti saṃprati niścitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirnimeṣā yato yac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paricittajñamānasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.267'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama divya īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti saṃprati niścitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-nimeṣā yato yac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paricitta-jña-mānasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.268'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yady eṣā rākṣasī tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva gataḥ syāṃ palāyitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niścityeti parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bibhyantīm idam abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.268'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yady eṣā rākṣasī tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva gataḥ syāṃ palāyitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niścitya iti parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bibhyantīm idam abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.269'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi tvaṃ mānuṣī satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darīdvārād itas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirgatyātmānam ācakṣva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divyā cet pāhi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.269'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi tvaṃ mānuṣī satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darī-dvārād itas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirgatyā atmānam ācakṣva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divyā cet pāhi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.270'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha hrīteva sā kiṃcin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>netre saṃmīly sāśruṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilānuṣṭhitavastrārdhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvakāye nyapātayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.270'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha hrīta īva sā kiṃ-cin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>netre saṃmīly sa-aśruṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilā-anuṣṭhita-vastra-ardhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrva-kāye nyapātayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.271'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃmīlite dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā netre mamābhavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu mānuṣayoṣaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varāky eṣā nirambarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.271'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃmīlite dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā netre mama abhavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu mānuṣa-yoṣa aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varāky- eṣā nir-ambarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.272'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ parāṅmukhībhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svaśātakam apāṭayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ vassveti tām uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyai tasyārdham akṣipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.272'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ parāṅ-mukhī-bhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-śātakam apāṭayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ vassva iti tām uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyai tasya ardham akṣipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.273'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chāditacchādanīyāṅgī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāhuvastrārdhamūrdhajaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ svajaghanasphītām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyaśeta śilām asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.273'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chādita-cchādanīya-aṅgī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāhu-vastra-ardha-mūrdha-jaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ sva-jaghana-sphītām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyaśeta śilām asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.274'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nātisamīpasthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paritrastaḥ parastriyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhadre kasyāsi kā veti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām apṛccham avāṅmukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.274'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha na ati-samīpa-sthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paritrastaḥ para-striyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhadre kasya asi kā va īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām apṛccham avāṅ-mukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.275'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mānuṣī mānuṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deśe durlabhamānuṣe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>labdhabandhur ivāraṇye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśrabdhārabdha bhāṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.275'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mānuṣī mānuṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deśe dur-labha-mānuṣe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>labdha-bandhur ivā araṇye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśrabdhā ārabdha bhāṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.276'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādhudharmārthasarvārthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārthavāho 'sti sāgaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājarājagṛhākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhe rājagṛhe pure ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.276'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādhu-dharma-artha-sarva-arthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārtha-vāho 'sti sāgaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-rāja-gṛha-ākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhe rājagṛhe pure ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.277'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvanīnāmikā yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāyā yavanadeśajā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yā prakṛṣṭe 'pi saubhāgye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patiṃ devam ivārcati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.277'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvanī-nāmikā yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāyā yavana-deśa-jā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yā prakṛṣṭe 'pi saubhāgye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patiṃ devam iva arcati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.278'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoḥ sāgaradinnākhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraḥ pitror guṇaiḥ samaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭhaḥ samudradinnaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatsanāmā ca kanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.278'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoḥ sāgaradinna-ākhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraḥ pitror guṇaiḥ samaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭhaḥ samudradinnaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat-sa-nāmā ca kanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.279'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>campābhūṣaṇabhūtasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satpater mitravarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sutāya sānudāsāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā ca pitrā pratiśrutā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.279'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>campā-bhūṣaṇa-bhūtasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sat-pater mitravarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sutāya sānudāsāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā ca pitrā pratiśrutā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.280'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sānudāsaś ca rūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>smareṇa sadṛśaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakalaṃ ca kalājālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedeti jagati śrutiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.280'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sānudāsaś ca rūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>smareṇa sadṛśaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-kalaṃ ca kalā-jālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veda iti jagati śrutiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.281'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā na kalājālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jālaṃ veda sa kevalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko hi nāma kalāśālī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karma tādṛśam ācaret ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.281'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā na kalā-jālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jālaṃ veda sa kevalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko hi nāma kalā-śālī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karma tādṛśam ācaret ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.282'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa hi veśyāhṛtāśeṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇadraviṇasaṃcayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samabrāhmaṇacaṇḍālaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cauraiḥ sārthavadhe hataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.282'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa hi veśyā-āhṛta-a-śeṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇa-draviṇa-saṃcayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sama-brāhmaṇa-caṇḍālaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cauraiḥ sārtha-vadhe hataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.283'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca vaiśasam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsasya duḥśravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāgarasya kuṭumbaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthitaṃ yavanīṃ prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.283'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca vaiśasam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsasya duḥ-śravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāgarasya kuṭumbaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthitaṃ yavanīṃ prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.284'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yānapātravipattau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipannaṃ lavaṇāmbhasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>medinīmaṇḍaladhvaṃse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jantūnām iva maṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.284'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāna-pātra-vipattau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipannaṃ lavaṇa-ambhasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>medinī-maṇḍala-dhvaṃse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jantūnām iva maṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.285'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāsau samudradinneti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyā ninditalakṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tasyai nirdayenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sindhunā dattam antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.285'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ya āsau samudradinna īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyā nindita-lakṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tasyai nirdayena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sindhunā dattam antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.286'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāgareṇa ca yā kanyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsāya kalpitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāgareṇa nirastā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandabhāgyāham eva sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.286'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāgareṇa ca yā kanyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsāya kalpitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāgareṇa nirastā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manda-bhāgya āham eva sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.287'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ kartavyaṃ kva gantavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ vṛttaṃ kiṃ nu vartate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti cintāvinodāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ihāse priyajīvitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.287'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ kartavyaṃ kva gantavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ vṛttaṃ kiṃ nu vartate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti cintā-vinoda āham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ihā ase priya-jīvitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.288'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śuktīnāṃ taṭabhinnānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃsair dāvāgnisādhitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajñātaiḥ phalamūlaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṣṇāmi viphalāṃ tanum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.288'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śuktīnāṃ taṭa-bhinnānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃsair dāva-agni-sādhitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajñātaiḥ phala-mūlaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṣṇāmi vi-phalāṃ tanum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.289'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lubdhatvāc ca vaṇigjāter</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āhṛtyāhṛtya saikatāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mauktikasya guhākoṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāśiḥ prāṃśur mayā kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.289'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lubdhatvāc ca vaṇig-jāter</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āhṛtyā ahṛtya saikatāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mauktikasya guhā-koṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāśiḥ prāṃśur mayā kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.290'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tāvad iyaṃ vārttā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvadīyākhyāyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti pṛṣṭasya me cittam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti cittam abhūt tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.290'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tāvad iyaṃ vārttā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvadīyā ākhyāyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti pṛṣṭasya me cittam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti cittam abhūt tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.291'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādudāso 'ham eveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yady asyai kathayāmy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyad eva kim apy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayi saṃbhāvayiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.291'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādudāso 'ham eva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yady asyai kathayāmy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyad eva kim apy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayi saṃbhāvayiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.292'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃbhāvayatu nāmeyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ punar imāṃ katham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipanmagnām upekṣeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puruṣaḥ san striyam satīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.292'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃbhāvayatu nāma iyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ punar imāṃ katham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipan-magnām upekṣeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puruṣaḥ san striyam satīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.293'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api cedaṃ smarāmy eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tātapādair yathā vṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitrā ceyaṃ pratijñātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena vyarthā vicāraṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.293'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api ca idaṃ smarāmy eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāta-pādair yathā vṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitrā ca iyaṃ pratijñātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena vyarthā vicāraṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.294'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athetthaṃ kathayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>campāyām abhavad vaṇik</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mitravarmeti yaḥ svastho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaśasādyāpi tiṣṭhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.294'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha itthaṃ kathayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>campāyām abhavad vaṇik</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mitravarma īti yaḥ sva-stho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaśasa ādya api tiṣṭhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.295'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya mitravatī jāyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsaḥ sutas tayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tābhyām ekaputratvāj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jñāpitaḥ sakalāḥ kalāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.295'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya mitravatī jāyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsaḥ sutas tayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tābhyām eka-putratvāj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jñāpitaḥ sakalāḥ kalāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.296'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau cālīkapāṇḍityāl</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lokavṛttaparāṅmukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdbhir dhūrtacittajñair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāsyā saṃgamitaḥ saha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.296'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau ca alīka-pāṇḍityāl</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>loka-vṛtta-parāṅ-mukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdbhir dhūrta-citta-jñair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāsyā saṃgamitaḥ saha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.297'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sānudāsaḥ sa evāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvasvaṃ me tayā hṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sātha mānarthakaṃ jñātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvāsayitum aihata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.297'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sānudāsaḥ sa eva ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-svaṃ me tayā hṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ātha ma ān-arthakaṃ jñātvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvāsayitum aihata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.298'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsminn antare sā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāṣamāṇam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃcit pṛcchāmi yat tan me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yūyam ākhyātum arhatha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.298'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asminn antare sā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāṣamāṇam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ-cit pṛcchāmi yat tan me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yūyam ākhyātum arhatha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.299'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snānaśāṭakam ānīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthūlaṃ tailamalīmasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsādāgre yad uktāḥ stha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāsyā tat kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.299'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snāna-śāṭakam ānīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthūlaṃ taila-malīmasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsāda agre yad uktāḥ stha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāsyā tat kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.300'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tūktaṃ tayokto 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikāyā muhūrtakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyaṅgaḥ kriyate tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān avataratv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.300'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu uktaṃ taya ūkto 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikāyā- muhūrtakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhy-aṅgaḥ kriyate tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān avataratv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.301'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāthāpṛcchat pure ṣaṣṭhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratnasaṃskārakārakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim uktāḥ śilpibhir yūyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti pratyabruvaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.301'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ātha apṛcchat pure ṣaṣṭhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratna-saṃskāra-kārakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim uktāḥ śilpibhir yūyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti pratyabruvaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.302'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair ukto 'haṃ pravīno 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvatto lajjāmahe vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād asmāt purāt ṣaṣṭhat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcamaṃ gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.302'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair ukto 'haṃ pravīno 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvatto lajjāmahe vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād asmāt purāt ṣaṣṭhat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcamaṃ gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.303'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi yat tayā pṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛttaṃ vṛttaṃ mayākhilam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sārthadhvaṃsāvasānāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyuktaṃ sakalaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.303'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi yat tayā pṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛttaṃ vṛttaṃ maya ā-khilam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sārtha-dhvaṃsa-avasāna-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyuktaṃ sakalaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.304'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kūrmāṅganevāṅgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅge 'līnāpi lajjayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām āliṅgad apāṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sānaṅgābhyaṅgacāruṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.304'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kūrma-aṅgana īva aṅgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅge '-līna āpi lajjayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām āliṅgad apāṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa ān-aṅga-abhy-aṅga-cāruṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.305'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhīru kiṃ kriyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sātha prasārayat svinnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphurantaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.305'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhīru kiṃ kriyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ātha prasārayat svinnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphurantaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.306'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gambhīraṃ dhvanati tataḥ samudratūrye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gāyatsu śrutimadhuraṃ śilīmukheṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nṛtyatsu sphuṭaraṭiteṣu nīlakaṇṭheṣv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ālambe karam ibhatālutāmram asyāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.306'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gambhīraṃ dhvanati tataḥ samudra-tūrye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gāyatsu śruti-madhuraṃ śilī-mukheṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nṛtyatsu sphuṭa-raṭiteṣu nīla-kaṇṭheṣv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ālambe karam ibha-tālu-tāmram asyāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.307'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tat tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potabhaṅgādihetukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvam ekapade naṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhāv apakṛtaṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.307'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tat tā-dṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pota-bhaṅga-ādi-hetukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvam eka-pade naṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhāv apakṛtaṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.308'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāṣaṇḍino gṛhasthāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mokṣasvargābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cintitāṃs tān hasāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyutpannamahāsukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.308'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāṣaṇḍino gṛha-sthāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mokṣa-svarga-abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cintitāṃs tān hasāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyutpanna-mahā-sukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.309'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mīnakūrmakulīrādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛṣyavāricarāmiṣaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārikelādibhiś cāṅgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apuṣāvopabṛmhibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.309'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mīna-kūrma-kulīra-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛṣya-vāri-cara-āmiṣaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārikela-ādibhiś ca aṅgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apuṣāva upabṛmhibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.310'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pulinaiḥ sindhurājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktāvidrumasaṃkaṭaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājahaṃsāv ivotkaṇṭhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītau samacarāvahi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.310'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pulinaiḥ sindhu-rājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktā-vidruma-saṃkaṭaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-haṃsāv iva utkaṇṭhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītau samacarāvahi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.311'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācit kuñjaśikharair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>acalānāṃ sanirjharaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saphaladrumasaṃnāhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kareṇukalabhāv iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.311'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cit kuñja-śikharair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-calānāṃ sa-nirjharaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-phala-druma-saṃnāhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kareṇu-kalabhāv iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.312'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lavaṅgapūgakarpūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmbūlādyair adurlabhaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nityam aṅgam anaṅgāṅgaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samaskurva sacandanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.312'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lavaṅga-pūga-karpūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmbūla-ādyair a-dur-labhaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nityam aṅgam an-aṅga-aṅgaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samaskurva sa-candanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.313'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guhālatāgṛhāvāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasitadrumavalkalau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devam ātmabhuvaṃ dhyāntau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātau svaḥ kāmayoginau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.313'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guhā-latā-gṛha-āvāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasita-druma-valkalau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devam ātma-bhuvaṃ dhyāntau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātau svaḥ kāma-yoginau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.314'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ samudradinnā mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity avocat kadācana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhinnapotavaṇigvṛttam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aryaputra samācara ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.314'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ samudradinnā mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity avocat kadā-cana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhinna-pota-vaṇig-vṛttam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arya-putra samācara ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.315'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divā prāṃśos taror agre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśur ucchrīyatāṃ dhvajaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvalano jyālyatāṃ rātrau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṅge sāgararodhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.315'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divā prāṃśos taror agre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśur ucchrīyatāṃ dhvajaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvalano jyālyatāṃ rātrau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṅge sāgara-rodhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.316'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācin nāvikaḥ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālokyāvāntaraṃ dvayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svadeśam ānayed āvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmo 'yaṃ vaṇijām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.316'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cin nāvikaḥ kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālokya avāntaraṃ dvayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-deśam ānayed āvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmo 'yaṃ vaṇijām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.317'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuktam āheti nirdhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathaiva kṛtavān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āptānām upadeśo hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramāṇaṃ yoṣitām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.317'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuktam āha iti nirdhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatha aiva kṛtavān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āptānām upadeśo hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramāṇaṃ yoṣitām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.318'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tuṅgeṣu raṃhantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaṅgaśṛṅgṣu bhaṅgiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madgupaṅktir ivāgacchad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upanaukāruṇodaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.318'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tuṅgeṣu raṃhantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaṅga-śṛṅgṣu bhaṅgiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madgu-paṅktir iva agacchad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upanauka āruṇa-udaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.319'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ dviniryāmakārūḍhām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārūḍhaḥ paṭuraṃhasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāgvātālīm ivāmbhodaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prātiṣṭhaṃ dūram antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.319'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ dvi-niryāmaka-ārūḍhām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārūḍhaḥ paṭu-raṃhasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāg-vātālīm iva ambho-daḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prātiṣṭhaṃ dūram antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.320'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma tataḥ sindhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bohitthaṃ sthiram asthire</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kātarāṇām iva vrāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthirasattvam avasthitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.320'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma tataḥ sindhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bohitthaṃ sthiram a-sthire</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kātarāṇām iva vrāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthira-sattvam avasthitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.321'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra vāṇijam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahādraviṇabhājanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kailāsae iva śubhāgraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāpadmamahānidhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.321'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra vāṇijam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-draviṇa-bhājanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kailāsae iva śubha-agraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāpadma-mahā-nidhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.322'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhivādayamānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ dṛṣṭvā tena saspṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bāṣpavaddṛṣṭikaṇṭhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣitaṃ praskhaladgirā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.322'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhivādayamānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṃ dṛṣṭvā tena sa-spṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bāṣpavad-dṛṣṭi-kaṇṭhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣitaṃ praskhalad-girā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.323'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ jātiḥ kasya putro 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ vā māteti sarvathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tvayā tāta pṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitravarmasuto bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.323'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ jātiḥ kasya putro 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ vā māta īti sarvathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tvayā tāta pṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitravarma-suto bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.324'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ punar amuṃ deśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgato 'sīti pṛcchate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vistareṇa mayā tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvapūrvaṃ niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.324'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ punar amuṃ deśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgato 'si iti pṛcchate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vistareṇa mayā tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarva-pūrvaṃ niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.325'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam asi dīrghāyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmātā tanayaś ca me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmā sāgaradattaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitravarmā ca me yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.325'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam asi dīrgha-āyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmātā tanayaś ca me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmā sāgaradattaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mitravarmā ca me yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.326'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaccha sāgaradattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayāṃ tac ca mauktikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahunāvikayā nāvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṭād ānīyatām iha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.326'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaccha sāgaradattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayāṃ tac ca mauktikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahu-nāvikayā nāvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṭād ānīyatām iha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.327'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyac cāsiddharātro 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ ca potaṃ na paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avagrahahṛtāmbhaskaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taḍāgam iva riktakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.327'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyac ca a-siddha-rātro 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ ca potaṃ na paśyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avagraha-hṛta-ambhaskaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taḍāgam iva riktakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.328'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mamedaṃ vahanaṃ riktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>voḍhavyaṃ sāravat tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṣṭāśvadagdharathavad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yogaḥ ślāghyo 'yam āvayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.328'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama idaṃ vahanaṃ riktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>voḍhavyaṃ sāravat tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṣṭa-aśva-dagdha-rathavad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yogaḥ ślāghyo 'yam āvayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.329'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mūlyaṃ tasya ca yat tan nau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samabhāgaṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvaṃ saṃmantritārghas tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmo 'yaṃ vaṇijām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.329'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mūlyaṃ tasya ca yat tan nau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sama-bhāgaṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvaṃ saṃmantrita-arghas tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmo 'yaṃ vaṇijām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.330'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca mauktikam ānīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potas tena prapūritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samudradinnayā pādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāṇijasya ca vanditau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.330'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca mauktikam ānīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potas tena prapūritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samudradinnayā pādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāṇijasya ca vanditau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.331'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyai daśasahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena dattāni vadatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadhūs tvaṃ me suteti ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.331'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyai daśa-sahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena dattāni vadatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadhūs tvaṃ me suta īti ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.332'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtaṃ cātiprasaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkṣepaḥ śrūyatām ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>preritaṃ yānapātraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad vipannaṃ ca pūrvavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.332'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtaṃ ca ati-prasaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkṣepaḥ śrūyatām ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>preritaṃ yāna-pātraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad vipannaṃ ca pūrvavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.333'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jīvite 'pi nirāśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānapātre nimajjati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nigṛhītāḥ śikhāmadhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktāḥ katipayā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.333'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jīvite 'pi nir-āśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāna-pātre nimajjati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nigṛhītāḥ śikhā-madhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktāḥ katipayā- mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.334'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāś ca vijñāpayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parasmin mama janmani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhagavatyaḥ sadā bhaktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upatiṣṭhata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.334'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāś ca vijñāpayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parasmin mama janmani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhagavatyaḥ sadā bhaktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upatiṣṭhata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.335'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃprāye ca vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taraṃgāntaratāraṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭṭaśliṣṭā mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃnikṛṣṭāgatā priyā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.335'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ-prāye ca vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taraṃga-antara-tāraṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭṭa-śliṣṭā mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃnikṛṣṭa-āgatā priyā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.336'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mām upāhūyamānaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā prasāritapāṇikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>capalena taraṃgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>balād apahṛtābalā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.336'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mām upāhūyamāna aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā prasārita-pāṇikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>capalena taraṃgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>balād apahṛta-a-balā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.337'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmai kruddhas taraṃgāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāmoham ahaṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetaye yāvad ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>loṭantam udadhes taṭe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.337'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmai kruddhas taraṃgāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-moham ahaṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetaye yāvad ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>loṭantam udadhes taṭe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.338'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāntāṃ muktvā vimuktatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>privāviśleṣaviklavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakrāman vilapāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirjane niravagrahaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.338'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāntāṃ muktvā vimuktatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>privā-viśleṣa-viklavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakrāman vilapāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nir-jane nir-avagrahaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.339'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>namas te bhagavan moha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirvāṇaprītidāyine</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālākālavidāśūnyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetanāṃ dhig acetanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.339'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>namas te bhagavan moha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirvāṇa-prīti-dāyine</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāla-a-kāla-vida ā-śūnyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetanāṃ dhig a-cetanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.340'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mauktikaṃ gṛhyatāṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat te svaṃ svaṃ mahodadhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādho sādhvī vipadbandhuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyā me mucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.340'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mauktikaṃ gṛhyatāṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat te svaṃ svaṃ mahā-udadhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādho sādhvī vipad-bandhuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyā me mucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.341'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāś ca tāḥ śirasi nyastā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktāḥ pote nimajjati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siraḥ kaṇḍūyamānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ pāṇinā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.341'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāś ca tāḥ śirasi nyastā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktāḥ pote nimajjati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siraḥ kaṇḍūyamānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ pāṇinā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.342'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāḥ parīkṣitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanmātradraviṇas tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kiṃ parīkṣitaṃ tāsāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā na dṛṣṭāḥ parīkṣakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.342'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāḥ parīkṣitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tan-mātra-draviṇas tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kiṃ parīkṣitaṃ tāsāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā na dṛṣṭāḥ parīkṣakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.343'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa śokas tāsu dṛṣṭāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat satyam abhavat tanuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad etad draviṇaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇā hy ete bahiścarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.343'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa śokas tāsu dṛṣṭāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat satyam abhavat tanuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad etad draviṇaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇā- hy ete bahiś-carāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.344'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śāṭakānte ca tā buddhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛḍhayā granthimālayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>velākulena yāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhīradhīr draviṇoṣmaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.344'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śāṭaka-ante ca tā- buddhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛḍhayā granthi-mālayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>velā-kulena yāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhīra-dhīr draviṇa-uṣmaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.345'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadalīphalacikkhalla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>praskhalaccaraṇaḥ kvacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārikelajalocchinna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pipāsāvedanaḥ kvacit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.345'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadalī-phala-cikkhalla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>praskhalac-caraṇaḥ kva-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārikela-jala-ucchinna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pipāsā-vedanaḥ kva-cit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.346'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>elāmaricatāmbūla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vallīvellitapallavaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>panasakramūkārāmair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nītadṛk phalabandhuraiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.346'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>elā-marica-tāmbūla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vallī-vellita-pallavaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>panasa-kramūka-ārāmair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīta-dṛk phala-bandhuraiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.347'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>golāṅgūlādivikrānta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśīrṇakususmeṣu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kvacic campakaṣaṇḍeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayan gamanaśramam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.347'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>go-lāṅgūla-ādi-vikrānta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśīrṇa-kususmeṣu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva-cic campaka-ṣaṇḍeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayan gamana-śramam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.348'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dināntakapiśāṅge ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divasāntadivākare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhāvaddhenudhanoddhūta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhūlīkaṃ grāmam āsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.348'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dina-anta-kapiśa-aṅge ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divasa-anta-divā-kare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhāvad-dhenu-dhana-uddhūta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhūlīkaṃ grāmam āsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.349'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tatra vasaty arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaṃ yaṃ yāce sma kaṃcana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanninuṃ colliditi ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bravīti sma hasan sa saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.349'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tatra vasaty arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaṃ yaṃ yāce sma kaṃ-cana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanninuṃ colliditi ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bravīti sma hasan sa saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.350'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athaikena dvibhāṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ nītvā kuṭumbinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāmāteva cirāt prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyaḥ prītyāsmi satkṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.350'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ekena dvibhāṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ nītvā kuṭumbinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāmāta īva cirāt prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyaḥ prītya āsmi sat-kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.351'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca svaśayanāsannam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apṛcchaṃ rajanīmukhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>deśo 'yaṃ katamaḥ sādho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katamad vātra pattanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.351'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca sva-śayana-āsannam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apṛcchaṃ rajanī-mukhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>deśo 'yaṃ katamaḥ sādho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katamad va ātra pattanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.352'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ pāṇḍyadeśo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anudakṣiṇasāgaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāpadmanidhiprāpti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramyaṃ yatrārthidarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.352'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ pāṇḍya-deśo 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anu-dakṣiṇa-sāgaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāpadma-nidhi-prāpti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramyaṃ yatra arthi-darśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.353'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itaś ca pāṇḍyamathurā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāmān mṛduni yojane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśramya rajanīm atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prātar gantāsi tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.353'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itaś ca pāṇḍya-mathurā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāmān mṛduni yojane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśramya rajanīm atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prātar ganta āsi tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.354'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suptena priyayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asuptenārthacintayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkṣiptā ca nirastā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāpitā yāminī mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.354'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suptena priyayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-suptena artha-cintayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkṣiptā ca nirastā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāpitā yāminī mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.355'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prātaḥ krośadvayātītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadalīṣaṇḍasaṃvṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānthasaṃhātasaṃbādham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ sattramaṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.355'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prātaḥ krośa-dvaya-atītaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadalī-ṣaṇḍa-saṃvṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāntha-saṃhāta-saṃbādham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ sattra-maṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.356'>
