<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma ca vaideśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kriyamāṇakṣurakriyān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyaṅgocchādanācchāda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhojanādyaiś ca satkṛtān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.356'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma ca vaideśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kriyamāṇa-kṣura-kriyān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhy-aṅga-ucchādana-ācchāda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhojana-ādyaiś ca sat-kṛtān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.357'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtakṣaurādikarmā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhavastrottamāśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭo 'smi sattrapatinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śayyāsthaḥ śarvarīmukhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.357'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta-kṣaura-ādi-karmā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdha-vastra-uttama-āśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭo 'smi sattra-patinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śayyā-sthaḥ śarvarī-mukhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.358'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvacit kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prājño vāṇijadārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsa iti prāṃśuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śyāmas tāmrāntalocanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.358'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva-cit kaś-cit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prājño vāṇija-dārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsa iti prāṃśuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śyāmas tāmra-anta-locanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.359'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsena kiṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasya vā sānudāso 'sāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti tenoditaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.359'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsena kiṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasya vā sānudāso 'sāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti tena uditaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.360'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadattābhidhānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmraliptīvibhūṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇavān bhāgineyo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gataḥ potena sāgaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.360'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadatta-abhidhānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmraliptī-vibhūṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇavān bhāgineyo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gataḥ potena sāgaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.361'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca potaḥ kilāmbhodhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhañjanaparāhataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśīrṇaḥ payaḥpūrṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>payodhara ivāmbare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.361'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca potaḥ kila ambhodhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhañjana-parāhataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśīrṇaḥ payaḥ-pūrṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>payodhara iva ambare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.362'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vārttā ceyaṃ prasarpantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūrchātiśayadāyinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krūrāśīviṣayoṣeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgaddattam amūrchayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.362'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vārttā ca iyaṃ prasarpantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūrcha-atiśaya-dāyinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krūra-āśī-viṣa-yoṣa īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgaddattam amūrchayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.363'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenāpi sarvadeśeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntāreṣu tareṣu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravartitāni sattrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>velātaṭapureṣu ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.363'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena api sarva-deśeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntāreṣu tareṣu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravartitāni sattrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>velā-taṭa-pureṣu ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.364'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācit sānudāsasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potāpetasya jīvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānthaḥ kaścit kvacit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satre pravṛttiṃ kathayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.364'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cit sānudāsasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pota-apetasya jīvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānthaḥ kaś-cit kva-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satre pravṛttiṃ kathayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.365'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat te yadi sa dīrghāyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyuṣmandarśanaṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācakṣva nas tato dīnā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>janatā jīvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.365'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat te yadi sa dīrgha-āyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyuṣman-darśanaṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācakṣva nas tato dīnā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>janatā jīvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.366'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīt pratijñāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiyatsaṃpāditaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmai yad aham ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācakṣe 'pahatatrapaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.366'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīt pratijñāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiyat-saṃpāditaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmai yad aham ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācakṣe 'pahata-trapaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.367'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād iti bravīmīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viniścityedam abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsaḥ punaḥ potam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āruhya gatavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.367'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād iti bravīmi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viniścitya idam abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsaḥ punaḥ potam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āruhya gatavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.368'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prātaś ca pāṇḍyamathurām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āścaryaśataśālinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyaṃ pūritasarvecchāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cintāmaṇiśilām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.368'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prātaś ca pāṇḍya-mathurām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āścarya-śata-śālinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyaṃ pūrita-sarva-icchāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cintā-maṇi-śilām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.369'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām adhyāsi bhinnābha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratnapañjarasaṃkulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agastyapītapānīya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāgarākāram āpaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.369'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām adhyāsi bhinna-ābha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratna-pañjara-saṃkulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agastya-pīta-pānīya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāgara-ākāram āpaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.370'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrālaṃkāram ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvāv upāgamatāṃ narau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya caiktaraḥ kretā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikretānyataras tayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.370'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra alaṃ-kāram ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvāv upāgamatāṃ narau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya ca ektaraḥ kretā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikreta ānyataras tayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.371'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau taṃ vāṇijam abrūtāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratnatattvavidā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ucitaṃ bhūṣaṇasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūlyam ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.371'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau taṃ vāṇijam abrūtāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratna-tattva-vidā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ucitaṃ bhūṣaṇasya asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūlyam ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.372'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenāpi tac ciraṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na jānāmīti bhāṣite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tau māṃ niścalayā dṛṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭavantam apṛcchatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.372'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena api tac ciraṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na jānāmi iti bhāṣite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tau māṃ niś-calayā dṛṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭavantam apṛcchatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.373'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niścalasnigdhayā dṛṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suṣṭhu dṛṣṭam idaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manyāvahe vijānāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūlyam asya bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.373'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niś-cala-snigdhayā dṛṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suṣṭhu dṛṣṭam idaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manyāvahe vijānāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūlyam asya bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.374'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anāsthottānahastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ smitvā mayoditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naivedam atidurjñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ mudhevākulau yuvām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.374'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-āsthā-uttāna-hastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ smitvā maya ūditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na eva idam ati-dur-jñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ mudha īvā akulau yuvām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.375'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>koṭir asya samaṃ mūlyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratnatattvavido viduḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād adhikam ūnaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kretṛvikrāyakecchayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.375'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>koṭir asya samaṃ mūlyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratna-tattva-vido viduḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād adhikam ūnaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kretṛ-vikrāyaka icchayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.376'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vikrāyakas toṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktāśrur mām avocata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadīyaṃ mūlyam etasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanaṃ dhanyās tato vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.376'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vikrāyakas toṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukta-aśrur mām avocata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi iyaṃ mūlyam etasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanaṃ dhanyās tato vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.377'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api bhūṣaṇam etan me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>koṭimūlyaṃ bhaved iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadaiva me manasy āsīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayam eva manorathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.377'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api bhūṣaṇam etan me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>koṭi-mūlyaṃ bhaved iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sada aiva me manasy āsīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayam eva mano-rathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.378'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atheti krāyakeṇoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mamāpy āsīn manorathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api nāma labheyāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idaṃ koṭyeti cetasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.378'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha iti krāyakeṇa uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama apy āsīn mano-rathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api nāma labheya aham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idaṃ koṭya īti cetasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.379'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāv astuvātāṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>namas te viśvakarmaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko hi mānuṣadurbodham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idaṃ budhyate mānuṣaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.379'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāv astuvātāṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>namas te viśvakarmaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko hi mānuṣa-dur-bodham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idaṃ budhyate mānuṣaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.380'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krayavikrayakāmābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvābhyāṃ bahuśaḥ purī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dravyasyāsya parīkṣārthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parikrāntā samantataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.380'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kraya-vikraya-kāmābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvābhyāṃ bahuśaḥ purī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dravyasya asya parīkṣa-arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parikrāntā samantataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.381'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛthivī mūlyam asyeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaścid āha parīkṣakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ajānan kākinīty anyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kiṃcid iti cāparaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.381'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛthivī mūlyam asya iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaś-cid āha parīkṣakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ajānan kākini īty anyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kiṃ-cid iti ca a-paraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.382'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvatkṛtena tu mūlyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janitaṃ nau mahatsukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etad ekārthayor āsīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhīṣṭam ubhayor api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.382'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvat-kṛtena tu mūlyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janitaṃ nau mahat-sukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etad eka-arthayor āsīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhīṣṭam ubhayor api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.383'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi tau praśastāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prādiṣātāṃ sasaṃmadau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayutaṃ me suvarṇānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sasārābharaṇāmbaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.383'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi tau praśastāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prādiṣātāṃ sa-saṃmadau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayutaṃ me suvarṇānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-sāra-ābharaṇa-ambaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.384'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vārttām imāṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛpeṇāhūya sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parīkṣito 'smi ratnāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varjitāni parīkṣakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.384'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vārttām imāṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛ-peṇā ahūya sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parīkṣito 'smi ratnāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varjitāni parīkṣakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.385'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahubhṛtyaṃ bahudhanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahuvṛttāntaniṣkuṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśālaṃ bahuśālaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītaḥ prādāt sa me gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.385'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahu-bhṛtyaṃ bahu-dhanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahu-vṛtta-anta-niṣkuṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśālaṃ bahu-śālaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītaḥ prādāt sa me gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.386'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ param ahaṃ tasyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsaṃ puri parīkṣakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmeṇaiva ca māṃ kaścin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na parīkṣām akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.386'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ param ahaṃ tasyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsaṃ puri parīkṣakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmeṇa eva ca māṃ kaś-cin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na parīkṣām akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.387'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca vasatas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mameyam abhavan matiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kena nāmālpamūlyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahālābho bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.387'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca vasatas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama iyam abhavan matiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kena nāma alpa-mūlyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-lābho bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.388'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upalabhyas tato lokāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karpāso guṇavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya kailāsakūṭābhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapta kūṭān akārayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.388'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upalabhyas tato lokāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karpāso guṇavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya kailāsa-kūṭa-ābhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapta kūṭān akārayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.389'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhik karpāsakathaṃ tucchāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvathā mūṣakeṇa te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradīpaśikhayā kūṭā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamitā bhasmakūṭatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.389'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhik karpāsa-kathaṃ tucchāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvathā mūṣakeṇa te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradīpa-śikhayā kūṭā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamitā- bhasma-kūṭatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.390'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mathurāyāṃ ca maryādā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ yasya pradīpyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakṣipyate sa tatraiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakuṭumbo raṭann iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.390'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mathurāyāṃ ca maryādā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ yasya pradīpyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakṣipyate sa tatra eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-kuṭumbo raṭann iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.391'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha hastadvitīyo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyaṃ dig iti saṃbhraman</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udīcīṃ diśam uddiśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāndiśīkaḥ palāyitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.391'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha hasta-dvitīyo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyaṃ dig iti saṃbhraman</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udīcīṃ diśam uddiśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāndiśīkaḥ palāyitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.392'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhāvitvā ca triyāmārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aharardhaṃ ca raṃhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durgād utkramya supto 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaṭamule mahāśramaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.392'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhāvitvā ca tri-yāma-ardham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahar-ardhaṃ ca raṃhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dur-gād utkramya supto 'haṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaṭa-mule mahā-śramaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.393'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāṃśumati śītāṃśau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśāntaprabalaśramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janatādhvanim aśrauṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhito vaṭam utkaṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.393'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aṃśumati śīta-aṃśau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśānta-prabala-śramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janatā-dhvanim aśrauṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhito vaṭam utkaṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.394'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama hā kaṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hanta naṣṭo 'smi saṃprati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvalati jvalane kṣipto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirghṛnair draviḍair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.394'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama hā kaṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hanta naṣṭo 'smi saṃprati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvalati jvalane kṣipto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirghṛnair draviḍair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.395'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kanthājaracchattra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādukādiparicchadān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adrākṣaṃ pathikākalpāñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jalpato gauḍabhāṣayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.395'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kanthā-jara-cchattra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāduka-ādi-paricchadān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adrākṣaṃ pathika-ākalpāñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jalpato gauḍa-bhāṣayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.396'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hā mātar jīvito 'smīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tān ālokyāśvasaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakṣomukto hi nāśvasyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko vā dṛṣṭvā narān naraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.396'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hā mātar jīvito 'smi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tān ālokya aśvasaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakṣo-mukto hi nā aśvasyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko vā dṛṣṭvā narān naraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.397'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āstīrṇaparṇaśayyās te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato nyastaparicchadāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parito mām upāsīnāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samapṛcchanta viśramāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.397'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āstīrṇa-parṇa-śayyās te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato nyasta-paricchadāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parito mām upāsīnāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samapṛcchanta viśramāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.398'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgacchati kuto deśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nagarād vā bhavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayāpi kathitaṃ tebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇḍyadeśapurād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.398'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgacchati kuto deśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nagarād vā bhavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maya āpi kathitaṃ tebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇḍya-deśa-purād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.399'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha taiḥ saspṛhaiḥ pṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mathurāyāṃ tvayā yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāso vaṇigdṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.399'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha taiḥ sa-spṛhaiḥ pṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mathurāyāṃ tvayā yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāso vaṇig-dṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.400'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ sānudāsākhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṇik tatra na vidyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavantaḥ katamat tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛcchantīty ucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.400'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ sānudāsa-ākhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṇik tatra na vidyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavantaḥ katamat tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛcchanti ity ucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.401'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas te kathayanti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmraliptyāṃ vaṇikpatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgadatto guṇān yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na na veda bhavān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.401'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas te kathayanti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmraliptyāṃ vaṇik-patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgadatto guṇān yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na na veda bhavān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.402'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye guṇān na vidus tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadvīpāt prāṅmahodadheḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāpinyā kīrtitān kīrtyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na jātās te 'tha vā mṛtāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.402'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye guṇān na vidus tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-dvīpāt prāṅ-mahā-udadheḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāpinyā kīrtitān kīrtyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na jātās te 'tha vā mṛtāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.403'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svasrīyaḥ sānudāso 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potabhaṅgāt kila cyutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhyāste pāṇḍyamathurāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtakarpāsasaṃgrahaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.403'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svasrīyaḥ sānudāso 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pota-bhaṅgāt kila cyutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhyāste pāṇḍya-mathurāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛta-karpāsa-saṃgrahaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.404'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadattas tu pānthebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛttim upalabhya tām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhūyāha sma suhṛdaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītāṃś ca paricārakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.404'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadattas tu pānthebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛttim upalabhya tām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhūyā aha sma suhṛdaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītāṃś ca paricārakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.405'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye me śoṇitam āyānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāpathāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tān ahaṃ suhṛdaḥ sphītais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>toṣayāmi dhanair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.405'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye me śoṇitam āyānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītvā dakṣiṇā-pathāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tān ahaṃ suhṛdaḥ sphītais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>toṣayāmi dhanair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.406'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad vayaṃ gaṅgadattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam ānetuṃ visarjitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi cāsau tvayā dṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad ācaṣṭāṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.406'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad vayaṃ gaṅgadattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam ānetuṃ visarjitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi ca asau tvayā dṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad ācaṣṭāṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.407'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd varaṃ kṣiptas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatraivāhaṃ vibhāvasau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tv apūrṇapratijñena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātur ānanam īkṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.407'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd varaṃ kṣiptas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra eva ahaṃ vibhāvasau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tv a-pūrṇa-pratijñena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātur ānanam īkṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.408'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athetthaṃ kathayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsas tapasvikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karpāse jvalati kṣiptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇḍyair niṣkaruṇair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.408'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha itthaṃ kathayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsas tapasvikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karpāse jvalati kṣiptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇḍyair niṣ-karuṇair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.409'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāḍitavakṣaskās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāram āraṭya te ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti saṃmantrayante sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣādakṣāmavācakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.409'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāḍita-vakṣaskās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāram āraṭya te ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti saṃmantrayante sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣāda-kṣāma-vācakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.410'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadattārthitā yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsārtham āgatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai tanmṛtyuvṛttāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ śakṣyatha śaṃsitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.410'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadatta-arthitā- yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsa-artham āgatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai tan-mṛtyu-vṛtta-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ śakṣyatha śaṃsitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.411'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vārttāṃ cemām upaśrutya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaivasvatahasāśivām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>campāyāṃ tāmraliptyāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīvitavyaṃ na kenacit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.411'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vārttāṃ ca imām upaśrutya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaivasvata-hasa-a-śivām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>campāyāṃ tāmraliptyāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīvitavyaṃ na kena-cit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.412'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad ātmānaṃ parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmino bhavatānṛṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgadatto 'pi tadvārttām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyato labhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.412'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad ātmānaṃ parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmino bhavata an-ṛṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgadatto 'pi tad-vārttām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyato labhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.413'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te kāṣṭhaskandham ādīpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praveṣṭumanasas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stuvanto devatāḥ svāḥ svāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paryakrāman pradakṣiṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.413'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te kāṣṭha-skandham ādīpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praveṣṭu-manasas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stuvanto devatāḥ svāḥ svāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paryakrāman pradakṣiṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.414'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho kaṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baddho 'haṃ naraśambaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sotsāhair api durlaṅghyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jālaṃ jālmaiḥ prasāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.414'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho kaṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baddho 'haṃ nara-śambaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-utsāhair api dur-laṅghyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jālaṃ jālmaiḥ prasāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.415'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoccair āraṭāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bho bho tyajata sāhasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsaḥ sa evāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidheyo bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.415'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uccair āraṭāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bho bho tyajata sāhasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānudāsaḥ sa eva ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidheyo bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.416'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viṣādena tatas teṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asavo niryiyāsavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmatsaṃprāptiharṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātāḥ kaṇṭhopakaṇṭhagāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.416'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viṣādena tatas teṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asavo niryiyāsavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmat-saṃprāpti-harṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātāḥ kaṇṭha-upakaṇṭha-gāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.417'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śeṣatvād āyuṣas te 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinivṛttapriyāsavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣārdrāḥ samakūrdanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tālakṣobhitakānanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.417'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śeṣatvād āyuṣas te 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinivṛtta-priya-asavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣa-ārdrāḥ samakūrdanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāla-kṣobhita-kānanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.418'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te stuvantas tato hṛṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sugataṃ saugatā iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahukṛtvaḥ parikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām avandata mūrdhibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.418'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te stuvantas tato hṛṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-gataṃ saugatā- iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahu-kṛtvaḥ parikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām avandata mūrdhibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.419'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te 'tha māṃ śibikārūḍhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nātidīrghaiḥ prayānakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidhilābhād iva prītās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmraliptīm aneṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.419'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te 'tha māṃ śibikā-ārūḍhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ati-dīrghaiḥ prayānakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidhi-lābhād iva prītās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmraliptīm aneṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.420'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kṣitipateḥ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṇetum ivāgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hṛṣṭaḥ pratyudagacchan māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātulaḥ sphītaḍambaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.420'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kṣiti-pateḥ putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṇetum ivā agatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hṛṣṭaḥ pratyudagacchan māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātulaḥ sphīta-ḍambaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.421'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyāsenāpi na śakyo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāsenākhyātum utsavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāsena tavākhyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vākkuṇṭhānām ayaṃ vidhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.421'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyāsena api na śakyo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāsenā akhyātum utsavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāsena tavā akhyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāk-kuṇṭhānām ayaṃ vidhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.422'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tiṣṭhantu tāvad akalaṅkakuṭumbidārāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śītāṃśubhāsvadanilair api ye na dṛṣṭāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sindūrapāṭalitakhaṇḍanaṭair naṭadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nagnāṭakair api narendrapatheṣu gītam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.422'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tiṣṭhantu tāvad a-kalaṅka-kuṭumbi-dārāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śīta-aṃśu-bhāsvad-anilair api ye na dṛṣṭāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sindūra-pāṭalita-khaṇḍa-naṭair naṭadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nagna-aṭakair api nara-indra-patheṣu gītam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.423'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyāvṛttais tato viprair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadattaḥ svayaṃ ca mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhurair upapannaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vacanair ity abodhayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.423'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyā-vṛttais tato viprair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgadattaḥ svayaṃ ca mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhurair upapannaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vacanair ity abodhayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.424'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitā me dhriyate bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhṛtyān āttena kiṃ mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmanāyāsiteneti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāg abhūs tvam upekṣakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.424'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitā me dhriyate bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhṛtyān āttena kiṃ mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmanā ā-yāsitena iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāg abhūs tvam upekṣakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.425'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā jananījāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajāgurujanādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avaśyabharaṇīyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rakṣyaiś ca paravān bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.425'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā jananī-jāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajā-guru-jana-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-vaśya-bharaṇīyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rakṣyaiś ca paravān bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.426'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad bhavadbhartṛke tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varge proṣitabhartṛke</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asārathāv iva rathe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhruvaṃ yan na bravīmi tat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.426'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad bhavad-bhartṛke tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varge proṣita-bhartṛke</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-sārathāv iva rathe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhruvaṃ yan na bravīmi tat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.427'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād utkaṇṭhayotkaṇṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayi tāta didṛkṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svakuṭumbam anukaṇṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuru yāhi gṛhān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.427'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād utkaṇṭhaya utkaṇṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayi tāta didṛkṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-kuṭumbam anukaṇṭhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuru yāhi gṛhān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.428'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā k.amcid adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āceraṃ nāma vāṇijam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suvarṇabhūmaye yāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anantaiḥ saha vāṇijaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.428'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā k.am-cid adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āceraṃ nāma vāṇijam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suvarṇabhūmaye yāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anantaiḥ saha vāṇijaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.429'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair gatvā saha potena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṃcid adhvānam ambudheḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṭe bohittham ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prātiṣṭhāmahi rodhasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.429'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tair gatvā saha potena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṃ-cid adhvānam ambudheḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṭe bohittham ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prātiṣṭhāmahi rodhasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.430'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athābhraṃlihaśṛṅgasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādaṃ pādapasaṃkaṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvasāma nagendrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lohitāyati bhāsvati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.430'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha abhraṃ-liha-śṛṅgasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādaṃ pāda-pa-saṃkaṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvasāma naga-indrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lohitāyati bhāsvati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.431'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tatrāhṛtāhārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣaṇṇān parṇasaṃstare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity asmān anuśāsti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sārthavāhaḥ kṣapākṣaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.431'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tatrā ahṛta-āhārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣaṇṇān parṇa-saṃstare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity asmān anuśāsti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sārtha-vāhaḥ kṣapā-kṣaye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.432'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tridhā pṛṣṭheṣu badhnīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātheyasthagikā dṛḍham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grīvāsu tailakutupān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samāsajata vāṇijāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.432'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tridhā pṛṣṭheṣu badhnīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātheya-sthagikā dṛḍham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grīvāsu taila-kutupān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samāsajata vāṇijāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.433'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāś ca komalāḥ sthūlāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śoṣadoṣādivarjitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hastair vetralatā gāḍham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ālambyārohatācalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.433'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāś ca komalāḥ sthūlāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śoṣa-doṣa-ādi-varjitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hastair vetra-latā- gāḍham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ālambyā arohata a-calam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.434'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>latām anīdṛśīṃ mohād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ kaścid avalambate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pramīto himavaty asmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa prayāti parāṃ gatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.434'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>latām an-īdṛśīṃ mohād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ kaś-cid avalambate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pramīto himavaty asmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa prayāti parāṃ gatim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.435'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa vetrapatho nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvotsāhavighātakṛt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suvarṇāśāpravṛttānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahān iva vināyakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.435'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa vetra-patho nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-utsāha-vighāta-kṛt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suvarṇa-āśā-pravṛttānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahān iva vināyakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.436'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi tataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣaṇṇair asmadādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hemagardhagrahagrastais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathaiva tad anuṣṭhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.436'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi tataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣaṇṇair asmad-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hema-gardha-graha-grastais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha aiva tad anuṣṭhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.437'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athaiko dūram ārūḍhaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chinnavetralatāśikhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣuraprakṣuritajyākaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣoṇīṃ śūra ivāgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.437'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha eko dūram ārūḍhaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chinna-vetra-latā-śikhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣura-prakṣurita-jyākaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣoṇīṃ śūra iva agamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.438'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayam evācalāgraṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āruhya paridevya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirupya ca jalaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatraivāneṣmahi kṣapām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.438'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayam eva a-cala-agraṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āruhya paridevya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirupya ca jalaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra eva aneṣmahi kṣapām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.439'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prātar mahāntam adhvānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvāpaśyāma nimnagām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gavāśvājaiḍakākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṣāṇakulasaṃkulām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.439'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prātar mahāntam adhvānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatva āpaśyāma nimna-gām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gava-aśva-aja-eḍaka-ākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṣāṇa-kula-saṃkulām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.440'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāceraḥ puraḥsthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānthān uccair avārayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā mā spṛkṣata vāry etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bho bho tiṣṭhata tiṣṭhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.440'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā aceraḥ puraḥ-sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānthān uccair avārayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā mā spṛkṣata vāry etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bho bho tiṣṭhata tiṣṭhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.441'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mūḍhaiḥ spṛṣṭam idaṃ yair yais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te te pāṣāṇatāṃ gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā svayam evaināṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suhṛdaḥ kiṃ na paśyatha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.441'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mūḍhaiḥ spṛṣṭam idaṃ yair yais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te te pāṣāṇatāṃ gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā svayam eva enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suhṛdaḥ kiṃ na paśyatha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.442'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaṃśān paśyatha yān asyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parasmin saritas taṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arvākkūlaṃ nudaty enān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭuḥ parataṭānilaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.442'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaṃśān paśyatha yān asyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parasmin saritas taṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arvāk-kūlaṃ nudaty enān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭuḥ para-taṭa-anilaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.443'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kārśyakaumalasaṃkotha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śoṣadoṣāvidūṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣām anyatamaṃ gāḍhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhṇīdhvaṃ maskaraṃ karaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.443'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kārśya-kaumala-saṃkotha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śoṣa-doṣa-a-vidūṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣām anyatamaṃ gāḍhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhṇīdhvaṃ maskaraṃ karaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.444'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāte mantharatāṃ yāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maskarāt tuṅgatāṃ gatāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parasminn āpagapāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanakair avarohata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.444'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāte mantharatāṃ yāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maskarāt tuṅgatāṃ gatāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parasminn āpa-ga-pāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanakair avarohata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.445'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kothaśoṣādidoṣaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo 'valambeta maskaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tataḥ patito gacchec</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chailasthiraśarīratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.445'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kotha-śoṣa-ādi-doṣaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo 'valambeta maskaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tataḥ patito gacchec</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chaila-sthira-śarīratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.446'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa veṇupatho nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāpathavibhīṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuśalaiḥ kuśalenāśu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirviṣādaiś ca laṅghyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.446'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa veṇu-patho nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-patha-vibhīṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuśalaiḥ kuśalena aśu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nir-viṣādaiś ca laṅghyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.447'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathāsurabilaṃ bālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāsanān mantravādinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviveśāvicāryaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathāsmabhis tad īhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.447'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatha āsura-bilaṃ bālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāsanān mantra-vādinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviveśa a-vicārya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha āsmabhis tad īhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.448'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣām ekaṃ kṛśād vaṃśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśīrṇād apatat tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilābhūtāṃ tanuṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatiṃ māheśvarīm agāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.448'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣām ekaṃ kṛśād vaṃśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśīrṇād apatat tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilā-bhūtāṃ tanuṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatiṃ māheśvarīm agāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.449'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīrya tu vaṃśebhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taktvā dūreṇa tāṃ nadīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai salilam anyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amadāma nyavasāma ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.449'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīrya tu vaṃśebhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taktvā dūreṇa tāṃ nadīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmai salilam anyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amadāma nyavasāma ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.450'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāhayitvā ca panthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yojanadvayasaṃ prage</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhujaṃgasyātisaṃkṣiptām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adrākṣaṃ padavīṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.450'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāhayitvā ca panthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yojana-dvayasaṃ prage</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhujaṃgasya atisaṃkṣiptām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adrākṣaṃ padavīṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.451'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāś cobhayato bhīmam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adṛṣṭāntaṃ rasātalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>andhāndhakārasaṃghāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitrāsitatamonudam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.451'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāś ca ubhayato bhīmam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-dṛṣṭa-antaṃ rasātalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>andha-andhakāra-saṃghāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitrāsita-tamo-nudam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.452'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athācero 'vadat pānthān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāruparṇatṛṇādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārdraśuṣkair araṇyānī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadhūmā kriyatām iyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.452'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā acero 'vadat pānthān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāru-parṇa-tṛṇa-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārdra-śuṣkair araṇyānī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-dhūmā kriyatām iyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.453'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāṃ dṛṣṭvā saparyāṇāñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chārdūlājinakaṅkaṭān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>chāgān vikretum āyānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kirātāḥ parito diśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.453'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa-paryāṇāñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chārdūla-ajina-kaṅkaṭān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>chāgān vikretum āyānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kirātāḥ parito diśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.454'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tān krīṇīyāta kausumbha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nailaśākalikāmbaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khaṇḍataṇḍulasindūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>lavaṇasnehanair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.454'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tān krīṇīyāta kausumbha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>naila-śāka-lika-ambaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khaṇḍa-taṇḍula-sindūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>lavaṇa-snehanair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.455'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chāgapṛṣṭhāni cāruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītāyataveṇavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atigāhata cādhvānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālabhrūdaṇḍabhaṅguram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.455'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chāga-pṛṣṭhāni cā aruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhīta-āyata-veṇavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atigāhata ca adhvānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāla-bhrū-daṇḍa-bhaṅguram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.456'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādāya yadi cānye 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāñcanaṃ kāñcanākarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anenaiva nivarteran</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pathā pānthāḥ kadācana ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.456'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādāya yadi ca anye 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāñcanaṃ kāñcana-ākarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anena eva nivarteran</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pathā pānthāḥ kadā-cana ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.457'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tair asmadīyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃmukhīnair ihāntare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rasātalaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sasuvarṇamanorathaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.457'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tair asmadīyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃmukhīnair iha antare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rasātalaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-suvarṇa-mano-rathaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.458'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na mahāsaṃkaṭād asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārgād utkramya vidyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>chāgapaṅkter avasthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na nivartitum antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.458'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na mahā-saṃkaṭād asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārgād utkramya vidyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>chāga-paṅkter avasthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na nivartitum antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.459'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād abhyastakuntena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīreṇa pratibhāvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anubhūtasamīkena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṅkteḥ prasthīyatāṃ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.459'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād abhyasta-kuntena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīreṇa pratibhāvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anubhūta-samīkena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṅkteḥ prasthīyatāṃ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.460'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samarthas tādṛg eko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hantuṃ paraparaṃparām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na parābhāvyate yāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apareṇa pareṇa saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.460'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samarthas tādṛg eko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hantuṃ para-paraṃparām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na parābhāvyate yāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apareṇa pareṇa saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.461'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ cājapatho nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrūyamāṇo vibhīṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyamāno viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛguḥ pātārthinām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.461'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ ca aja-patho nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrūyamāṇo vibhīṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyamāno viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛguḥ pāta-arthinām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.462'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity ācere bruvaty evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśukodaṇḍamaṇḍalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchan mlecchapṛtanā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chāgapūgapuraḥsarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.462'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity ācere bruvaty evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśu-kodaṇḍa-maṇḍalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchan mleccha-pṛtanā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chāga-pūga-puraḥ-sarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.463'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu tu pratiyāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣkārya krayavikrayau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snātvāvandanta kradantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānthāḥ śaṃkarakeśavau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.463'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu tu pratiyāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣkārya kraya-vikrayau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snātva āvandanta kradantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānthāḥ śaṃkara-keśavau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.464'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pānthāsthitā dīrghā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthitā chāgasaṃtatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raṃhasiny api niṣkampā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivāte naur ivāmbhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.464'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pāntha-āsthitā dīrghā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthitā chāga-saṃtatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raṃhasiny- api niṣkampā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivāte naur iva ambhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.465'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāś ca pathikaśreṇyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saptamaḥ paścimād aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āceraś cābhavat ṣaṣṭhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭhato 'nantaro mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.465'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāś ca pathika-śreṇyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saptamaḥ paścimād aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āceraś ca abhavat ṣaṣṭhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭhato 'nantaro mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.466'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃprāye ca vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrād āśrūyatoccakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṃśānāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puraḥ ṣṭhā ṣṭhoditasvanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.466'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ-prāye ca vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrād āśrūyata uccakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṃśānāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puraḥ ṣṭhā ṣṭha ūdita-svanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.467'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chāgānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhīrāṇām api sādakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>majjatāṃ dhvāntajambāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>me me hā heti ca dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.467'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chāgānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhīrāṇām api sādakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>majjatāṃ dhvānta-jambāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>me me hā ha īti ca dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.468'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā kṣaṇamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṣīṇā paravāhinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekaśeṣāsmadīyā yā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saptamapramukhā sthitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.468'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā kṣaṇa-mātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṣīṇā para-vāhinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eka-śeṣa āsmadīyā yā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saptama-pramukhā sthitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.469'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mām avaśāsti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāmaṇīḥ kim udāsyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekakaḥ puruṣaś cāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paraḥ svar nīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.469'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mām avaśāsti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāma-ṇīḥ kim udāsyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekakaḥ puruṣaś ca ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paraḥ svar nīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.470'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paras tu vaṃśam ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baddhvā mūrdhani cāñjalim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hatasvapānthasārthatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anātho mām anāthata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.470'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paras tu vaṃśam ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baddhvā mūrdhani ca añjalim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hata-sva-pāntha-sārthatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-nātho mām anāthata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.471'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekaśākhāvaśeṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madvaṃśasyāvasīdataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śākhācchedena nocchedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atyantaṃ kartum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.471'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eka-śākhā-avaśeṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mad-vaṃśasya avasīdataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śākhā-cchedena na ucchedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atyantaṃ kartum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.472'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eka eva priyaḥ putraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitror aham acakṣuṣoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>andhayaṣṭhis tayos tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrātar māṃ mā vadhīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.472'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eka eva priyaḥ putraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitror aham a-cakṣuṣoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>andha-yaṣṭhis tayos tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhrātar māṃ mā vadhīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.473'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama dhik prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāpapāṃsuvidhūsarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhig dhig eva suvarṇaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpyaṃ prāṇivadhena yat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.473'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama dhik prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāpa-pāṃsu-vidhūsarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhig dhig eva suvarṇaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpyaṃ prāṇi-vadhena yat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.474'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān nihantu mām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varākaḥ priyajīvitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṇā yasyopayujyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitror duścakṣuṣor iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.474'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān nihantu mām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varākaḥ priya-jīvitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāṇā- yasya upayujyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitror duś-cakṣuṣor iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.475'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha roṣavis.ādābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āceras tāmraniṣprabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambūkṛtam acovan māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācā niṣṭhuramandayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.475'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha roṣa-vis.ādābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āceras tāmra-niṣ-prabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambū-kṛtam acovan māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācā niṣṭhura-mandayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.476'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>are bālabalīvarda</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kālākālāvicakṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva kṛpāṇocitaḥ kālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva kṛpā kṛpaṇocitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.476'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>are bāla-balīvarda</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāla-a-kāla-a-vicakṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva kṛpāṇa-ucitaḥ kālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva kṛpā kṛpaṇa-ucitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.477'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho kāruṇikatvaṃ te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddhaṃ siddhāntavedinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekasya kṣudrakasyārthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaḥ ṣoḍaśa jighāṃsati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.477'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho kāruṇikatvaṃ te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddhaṃ siddha-anta-vedinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekasya kṣudrakasya arthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaḥ ṣoḍaśa jighāṃsati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.478'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sacchāge nihate hyasmiñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvitāḥ syuś caturdaśa</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahate tu sahānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatā ca hatā vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.478'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-cchāge nihate hyasmiñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvitāḥ syuś caturdaśa</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-hate tu saha anena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatā ca hatā vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.479'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cāpi rakṣituṃ kṣudram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātmānaṃ dustyajaṃ tyajet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmā tu satataṃ rakṣyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dārair api dhanair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.479'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca api rakṣituṃ kṣudram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātmānaṃ dus-tyajaṃ tyajet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmā tu satataṃ rakṣyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dārair api dhanair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.480'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi bhagavadgītā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātraṃ daṇḍakam īrayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa pārtham iva māṃ viṣṇuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karma krūram akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.480'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi bhagavad-gītā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātraṃ daṇḍakam īrayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa pārtham iva māṃ viṣṇuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karma krūram akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.481'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāhaṃ prabalavrīḍo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>garhamāṇaś ca karmavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caraṇeṣu paracchāgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukumāram atāḍayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.481'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ahaṃ prabala-vrīḍo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>garhamāṇaś ca karmavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caraṇeṣu para-cchāgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-kumāram atāḍayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.482'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chāgapote tatas tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhvāntasindhau nimajjati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānthasāṃyātriko magnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahaiva dhanatṛṣṇayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.482'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chāga-pote tatas tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhvānta-sindhau nimajjati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāntha-sāṃyātriko magnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha eva dhana-tṛṣṇayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.483'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayaṃ tu durgamān mārgāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṣīṇasvalpasainikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāratād iva saṃgrāmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saptaśeṣā hatodyamāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.483'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayaṃ tu dur-gamān mārgāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṣīṇa-svalpa-sainikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāratād iva saṃgrāmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapta-śeṣā- hata-udyamāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.484'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca deśaṃ parikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāpya viṣṇupadītaṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśrumiśrāṃ pramītebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prādāma salilāñjalim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.484'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca deśaṃ parikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāpya viṣṇupadī-taṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśru-miśrāṃ pramītebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prādāma salila-añjalim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.485'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tat tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bādhitaṃ no bubhukṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīravedanā nāsti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dehināṃ hi kṣudhāsamā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.485'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tat tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bādhitaṃ no bubhukṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīra-vedanā na asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dehināṃ hi kṣudhā-samā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.486'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsaṃpāditāhārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parṇaśayyādhiśāyinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandanidrākulākṣān naḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabodhyāha sma nāyakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.486'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha a-saṃpādita-āhārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parṇa-śayyā-adhiśāyinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manda-nidrā-ākula-akṣān naḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabodhyā aha sma nāyakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.487'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amī chāgāḥ pramāpyantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatas tanmāṃsam adyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sīvyantām ajinair bhastrās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ viparivartitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.487'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amī chāgāḥ pramāpyantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatas tan-māṃsam adyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sīvyantām ajinair bhastrās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ viparivartitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.488'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā ca paridhīyantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktvā vighnakṛtaṃ ghṛṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā tāsām asṛkklinnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad antas tad bahir bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.488'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā ca paridhīyantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktvā vighna-kṛtaṃ ghṛṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā tāsām asṛk-klinnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad antas tad bahir bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.489'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pakṣavanta ivāhāryā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>darīdāritacañcavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hemabhūmer imāṃ bhūmim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgacchanti vihaṃgamāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.489'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pakṣavanta ivā ahāryā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>darī-dārita-cañcavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hema-bhūmer imāṃ bhūmim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgacchanti vihaṃ-gamāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.490'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃsapiṇḍadhiyā te 'smān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabhasādāya cañcubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suvarṇabhūmaye yānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tat saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.490'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃsa-piṇḍa-dhiyā te 'smān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabhasā ādāya cañcubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suvarṇa-bhūmaye yānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tat saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.491'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāham abravaṃ brūte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janatā yat tathaiva tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyajyatāṃ tat suvarṇaṃ yac</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chinatti śravaṇe iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.491'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aham abravaṃ brūte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janatā yat tatha aiva tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyajyatāṃ tat suvarṇaṃ yac</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chinatti śravaṇe iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.492'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yenāhaṃ durgamān mārgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmeṇaiva tu durgateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāritaś chāganāgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hanyāṃ taṃ nirghṛṇaḥ katham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.492'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena ahaṃ dur-gamān mārgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmeṇa eva tu dur-gateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāritaś chāga-nāgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hanyāṃ taṃ nir-ghṛṇaḥ katham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.493'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād alaṃ suvarṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇair evātha vā kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena tenaiva dattebhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tebhyo hanyāṃ suhṛttamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.493'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād alaṃ suvarṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇair eva atha vā kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena tena eva dattebhyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tebhyo hanyāṃ suhṛttamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.494'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athācero 'vadat pānthān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ajaḥ svaḥ svaḥ pramāpyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ tu sānudāsīyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sudūre mucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.494'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā acero 'vadat pānthān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ajaḥ svaḥ svaḥ pramāpyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ tu sānudāsīyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-dūre mucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.495'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣām ekatamaḥ pānthas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam ajaṃ kvāpi nītavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daṇḍālambitakṛttiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratāgatyedam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.495'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣām ekatamaḥ pānthas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam ajaṃ kva api nītavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daṇḍa-ālambita-kṛttiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratāgatya idam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.496'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chāgena sānudāsasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayānyaḥ parivartitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadīyaṃ cedam ānītam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ajinaṃ dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.496'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chāgena sānudāsasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya ānyaḥ parivartitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadīyaṃ ca idam ānītam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ajinaṃ dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.497'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyaivājasya carma tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uktaṃ nāsau tvayā muktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇair muktaḥ priyair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.497'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tu pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya eva ajasya carma tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uktaṃ na asau tvayā muktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇair muktaḥ priyair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.498'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāptavacanād bhīmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samudrataraṇād api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuktihīnaṃ tad asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nabhogamanam iṅgitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.498'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā apta-vacanād bhīmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samudra-taraṇād api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yukti-hīnaṃ tad asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nabho-gamanam iṅgitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.499'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato durbhaganihrādaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇḍucchavibhir aṇḍajaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāradair iva jīmūtaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāśam ākāśam āvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.499'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato dur-bhaga-nihrādaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇḍu-cchavibhir aṇḍa-jaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāradair iva jīmūtaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāśam ākāśam āvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.500'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatpakṣatimarutpiṣṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>guruskandhanago nagaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śakraśastraśikhākṛtta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pattracakra ivābhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.500'>
<lg>
