<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat-pakṣati-marut-piṣṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>guru-skandha-nago nagaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śakra-śastra-śikhā-kṛtta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pattra-cakra iva abhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.501'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kaṇṭhagataprāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmān ādāya khaṃ khagāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākrāman sapta saptāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garutmanta ivoragān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.501'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kaṇṭha-gata-prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmān ādāya khaṃ kha-gāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākrāman sapta sapta api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garutmanta iva uragān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.502'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariśiṣṭo 'paras teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa ca madgrāhiṇo balāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niraṃśatvān nirāṃśaso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām evācchetum aihata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.502'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariśiṣṭo 'paras teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa ca mad-grāhiṇo balāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-aṃśatvān nir-āṃśaso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām evā acchetum aihata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.503'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha raudram abhūd yuddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛdhrayoḥ svārthagṛddhayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathāmbaracaratrāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daśakaṇṭhajaṭāyuṣoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.503'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha raudram abhūd yuddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛdhrayoḥ sva-artha-gṛddhayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatha āmbara-cara-trāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daśa-kaṇṭha-jaṭa-āyuṣoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.504'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paryāyeṇāham ākṛṣṭaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cañcoś cañcau patatriṇoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaccic ca skhalitas tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khastaḥ śaṃkaram asmaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.504'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paryāyeṇa aham ākṛṣṭaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cañcoś cañcau patatriṇoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kac-cic ca skhalitas tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kha-staḥ śaṃkaram asmaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.505'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vajrakoṭikaṭhorābhiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cañcūcaraṇakoṭibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭṭitaṃ tat tayoś carma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātaṃ tita:ujarjaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.505'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vajra-koṭi-kaṭhorābhiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cañcū-caraṇa-koṭibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭṭitaṃ tat tayoś carma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātaṃ tita:ujarjaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.506'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato niṣkuṣitaś cāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṭṭitāc carmakañcukāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patitaḥ sarasi kvāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śobhāvismitamānase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.506'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato niṣkuṣitaś ca ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṭṭitāc carma-kañcukāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patitaḥ sarasi kva api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śobhā-vismita-mānase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.507'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra śoṇitaśoṇāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghṛṣṭvā gātrāṇi paṅkajaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snātas tarpitadevaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścād amṛtam āharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.507'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra śoṇita-śoṇāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghṛṣṭvā gātrāṇi paṅka-jaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snātas tarpita-devaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścād amṛtam āharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.508'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tattaṭe kṣaṇam āsitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣadya ca gataśramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apūrvabahuvṛttāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭavān asmi tad vanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.508'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat-taṭe kṣaṇam āsitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣadya ca gata-śramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-pūrva-bahu-vṛtta-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭavān asmi tad vanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.509'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra vismṛtavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥkhaṃ bhāruṇḍayuddhajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asipattravanāpetaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃcarann iva nandane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.509'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra vismṛtavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥkhaṃ bhāruṇḍa-yuddha-jam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asi-pattra-vana-apetaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃcarann iva nandane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.510'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śīrṇadurvaṇaparṇo vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyuddāhahato 'pi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apuṣpaḥ phalahīno vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatraiko 'pi na pādapaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.510'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śīrṇa-durvaṇa-parṇo vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyud-dāha-hato 'pi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-puṣpaḥ phala-hīno vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatra eko 'pi na pāda-paḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.511'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadambamālatīkunda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mādhavīmallikādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛṅgānīkaiḥ sadā yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛṣṇakalmāṣapallavāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.511'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadamba-mālatī-kunda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mādhavī-mallika-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛṅga-anīkaiḥ sadā yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛṣṇa-kalmāṣa-pallavāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.512'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caturaṅgulatuṅgaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nīlakaṇṭhagalāsitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaśorṇasukumāraiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛṇair bhūṣitabhūtalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.512'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>catur-aṅgula-tuṅgaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nīla-kaṇṭha-gala-asitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaśorṇa-su-kumāraiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛṇair bhūṣita-bhū-talam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.513'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra kesariśārdūla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śikhaṇḍibhujagādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vratayanti dayāvantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parṇapuṣpajalānilān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.513'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra kesari-śārdūla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śikhaṇḍi-bhujaga-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vratayanti dayāvantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parṇa-puṣpa-jala-anilān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.514'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anivṛttadidṛkṣaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kānanaṃ parito bhraman</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasyāpi caraṇaiḥ kṣuṇṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adrākṣaṃ padavīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.514'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-nivṛtta-didṛkṣaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kānanaṃ parito bhraman</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasya api caraṇaiḥ kṣuṇṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adrākṣaṃ padavīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.515'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā saṃcaramāṇaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantharaṃ dūram antaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāmanobhayarodhaskām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agambhīrāmbhasaṃ nadīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.515'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā saṃcaramāṇaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantharaṃ dūram antaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāmana-ubhaya-rodhaskām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-gambhīra-ambhasaṃ nadīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.516'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ ca kāñcanagāhādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratnakāñcanavālukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttīryācarya ca snānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārciṣaṃ devatāgurūn ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.516'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ ca kāñcana-gāha-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratna-kāñcana-vālukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttīryā acarya ca snānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārciṣaṃ devatā-gurūn ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.517'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarittaṭopakaṇṭhe ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadalīkānanāvṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tapaḥkānanam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>baddhaparyaṅkavānaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.517'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarit-taṭa-upakaṇṭhe ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadalī-kānana-āvṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tapaḥ-kānanam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>baddha-paryaṅka-vānaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.518'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāciradyutipiśaṅgajaṭaṃ munīndram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aikṣe nikharvakuśaviṣṭarapṛṣṭhabhājam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājyāhutistimitanīrasadāruyoni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṇḍodarāhitam ivāhavanīyam agnim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.518'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra a-cira-dyuti-piśaṅga-jaṭaṃ muni-indram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aikṣe nikharva-kuśa-viṣṭara-pṛṣṭha-bhājam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājya-āhuti-stimita-nīrasa-dāru-yoni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṇḍa-udara-āhitam ivā ahavanīyam agnim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.519'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ vanditum upāsarpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utsarpatsaumyacandrikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāntasaṃtāpakasparśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uṣṇāṃśum iva haimanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.519'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ vanditum upāsarpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utsarpat-saumya-candrikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-anta-saṃtāpaka-sparśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uṣṇa-aṃśum iva haimanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.520'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsau saṃmadāsrārdra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapolo mām abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuśalaṃ sānudāsāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṣṭhine bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.520'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asau saṃmada-asra-ārdra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapolo mām abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuśalaṃ sānudāsāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṣṭhine bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.521'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīt tato nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyaṃ cakṣus tapasvinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvaṃ paśyati yenārthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māṃsacakṣur agocaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.521'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīt tato nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyaṃ cakṣus tapasvinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvaṃ paśyati yena arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māṃsa-cakṣur a-gocaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.522'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yan me yādṛcchikaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yac ca vyāpārahetukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kīrtitam anenādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kadācid api śrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.522'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yan me yā-dṛcchikaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yac ca vyāpāra-hetukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kīrtitam anena adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kadā-cid api śrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.523'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti vicintitavantaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsthitādiṣṭaviṣṭaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vrīḍāmantharam āha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smitveti munipuṃgavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.523'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti vicintitavantaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsthita-ādiṣṭa-viṣṭaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vrīḍā-mantharam āha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smitva īti muni-puṃgavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.524'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvayā yac cintitaṃ tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ prati tathaiva tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāmamātrakathā nāti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>citraṃ hi tapasaḥ phalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.524'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvayā yac cintitaṃ tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ prati tatha aiva tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāma-mātra-kathā na ati</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>citraṃ hi tapasaḥ phalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.525'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhruvakādyair yathā madyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upāyaiḥ pāyito bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā vadhukayodyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃgato gaṅgadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.525'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhruvaka-ādyair yathā madyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upāyaiḥ pāyito bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā vadhukaya ūdyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃgato gaṅgadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.526'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvad bhāruṇḍasaṃgrāmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yamadraṃṣṭrāntarād iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimuktas tvam iha prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvaṃ tad viditaṃ mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.526'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvad bhāruṇḍa-saṃgrāmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yama-draṃṣṭra-antarād iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimuktas tvam iha prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvaṃ tad viditaṃ mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.527'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anubhūtā tvayā tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānapātravipattayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>laṅghitāś ca sudurlaṅghyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śailakāntāranimnagāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.527'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anubhūtā tvayā tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāna-pātra-vipattayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>laṅghitāś ca su-dur-laṅghyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaila-kāntāra-nimna-gāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.528'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad arthaṃ cāyam āyāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāptaḥ kṛcchratamas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mitravaty eva tat sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātā te kathayiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.528'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad arthaṃ ca ayam āyāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāptaḥ kṛcchratamas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mitravaty- eva tat sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātā te kathayiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.529'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakalaś cāyam ārambhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suvarṇaprāptaye tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tac ca saṃprāptadeśīyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ato mā viṣadad bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.529'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakalaś ca ayam ārambhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suvarṇa-prāptaye tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tac ca saṃprāpta-deśīyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ato mā viṣadad bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.530'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvādṛśaḥ sthirasattvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mādṛśādeśakāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suprāpaṃ prājñasotsāhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suvarṇaṃ kva gamiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.530'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvā-dṛśaḥ sthira-sattvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā-dṛśa-ādeśa-kāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-prāpaṃ prājña-sa-utsāhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suvarṇaṃ kva gamiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.531'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parṇaśālāśayenātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādapāvayavāśinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaḥkatipayāny asminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśrame sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.531'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parṇa-śāla-āśayena ataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāda-pa-avayava-āśinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaḥ-katipayāny asminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśrame sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.532'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athābhilaṣitāsvādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛjaujaḥpuṣṭivardhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāneyam āharann annaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛṣṭapacyam ahaṃ dviṣan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.532'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha abhilaṣita-āsvādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛjā-ojaḥ-puṣṭi-vardhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāneyam āharann annaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛṣṭa-pacyam ahaṃ dviṣan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.533'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parṇaśālāntarāstīrṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śayānaḥ parṇasaṃstare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tuṅgaparyaṅkam adveṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgadattāniveśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.533'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parṇa-śāla-antar-āstīrṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śayānaḥ parṇa-saṃstare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tuṅga-paryaṅkam adveṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgadattā-niveśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.534'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti vismṛtaduḥkho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhāsvādair amānuṣaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daridravāṭakasthāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satataṃ mātur adhyagām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.534'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti vismṛta-duḥkho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukha-āsvādair a-mānuṣaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daridra-vāṭaka-sthāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satataṃ mātur adhyagām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.535'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśapathayānāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśaṃsāmi sma cāpadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suvarṇaprāptaye prāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā vipat saṃpad eva sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.535'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśa-patha-yāna-antāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśaṃsāmi sma ca apadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suvarṇa-prāptaye prāptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā vipat saṃpad eva sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.536'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā taṃ mahātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhitaḥ prāptam ambarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūrtaṃ puṇyam ivādrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimānaṃ merubhāsvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.536'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā taṃ mahā-ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhitaḥ prāptam ambarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūrtaṃ puṇyam iva adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimānaṃ meru-bhāsvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.537'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kanyās tasmān nirakrāman</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dyutidyotitakānanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sendracāpād ivāmbhodāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krāntāt saudāmanīlatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.537'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kanyās tasmān nirakrāman</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dyuti-dyotita-kānanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-indra-cāpād iva ambho-dāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krāntāt saudāmanī-latā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.538'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāḥ saṃparikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṇamya ca yatiprabhum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vihāyastalam ākrāmann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>indor iva marīcayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.538'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāḥ saṃparikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṇamya ca yati-prabhum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vihāyas-talam ākrāmann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>indor iva marīcayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.539'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekā tu na gatā tāsām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅkam āropya tāṃ muniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pramodagadgadālāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramṛṣṭākṣīm abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.539'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekā tu na gatā tāsām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅkam āropya tāṃ muniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pramoda-gadgada-ālāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramṛṣṭa-akṣīm abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.540'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putri gandharvadatte 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsaḥ pitā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmān api tiraskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śraddhayārādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.540'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putri gandharvadatte 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sānudāsaḥ pitā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmān api tiras-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śraddhayā ārādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.541'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ cāham atisatkāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amanye 'tiviḍambanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandyamāno mahāgauryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīḍayā pramatho yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.541'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca aham ati-sat-kāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amanye 'ti-viḍambanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandyamāno mahā-gauryā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīḍayā pramatho yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.542'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā kadācin mayā pṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ko 'yaṃ kā vā tvam ity atha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrūyatām iti bhāṣitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayor vṛttam avartayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.542'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā kadā-cin mayā pṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ko 'yaṃ kā vā tvam ity atha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrūyatām iti bhāṣitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayor vṛttam avartayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.543'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvājasagotro 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upadhānaṃ tapasvinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharabharadvājo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad vidyāsādhanodyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.543'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvāja-sa-gotro 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upadhānaṃ tapasvinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dhara-bharadvājo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad vidyā-sādhana-udyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.544'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahatas tapasaś cāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyathamānaḥ puraṃdaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsanenācalābhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>calatā calitaḥ kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.544'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahatas tapasaś ca asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyathamānaḥ puraṃ-daraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsanena a-cala-ābhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>calatā calitaḥ kila ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.545'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śacyāliṅganakāle 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhyātvā kaṃcit tapasvinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣādākulacetasko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhaṃ jīvati vāsavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.545'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śacy--āliṅgana-kāle 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhyātvā kaṃ-cit tapasvinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣāda-ākula-cetasko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhaṃ jīvati vāsavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.546'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāradāt tu bharadvājam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upalabhya tapasvinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hariṇā suprabhādiṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gandharvādhipateḥ sutā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.546'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāradāt tu bharadvājam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upalabhya tapasvinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hariṇā suprabhā ādiṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gandharva-adhipateḥ sutā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.547'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rūpayauvanasaubhāgyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>garvitām urvaśīm api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atiśeṣe tvam ity eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratītiḥ piṣṭapatraye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.547'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rūpa-yauvana-saubhāgyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>garvitām urvaśīm api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atiśeṣe tvam ity eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratītiḥ piṣṭa-pa-traye ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.548'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvājam ato gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvam ārādhaya sundari</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā te rūpasaubhāgye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saphalībhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.548'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvājam ato gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvam ārādhaya sundari</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā te rūpa-saubhāgye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-phalī-bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.549'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suprabhātha muner asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacaḥprekṣitaceṣṭitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śṛṅgārair aicchad ākraṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satattvālamabanaṃ manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.549'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suprabha ātha muner asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacaḥ-prekṣita-ceṣṭitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śṛṅgārair aicchad ākraṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-tattva-ālamabanaṃ manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.550'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā nāśakad ākraṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abdair bahutithair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā karmakarīkarma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvedād akarod asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.550'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā na aśakad ākraṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abdair bahu-tithair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā karma-karī-karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvedād akarod asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.551'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṣpoccayajalāhāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṭīsaṃmārjanādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>toṣito 'yam avocat tāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaḥ kas te bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.551'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṣpa-uccaya-jala-āhāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṭī-saṃmārjana-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>toṣito 'yam avocat tāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaḥ kas te bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.552'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ spṛhayanti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasmai tridaśayoṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan me bhagavatā dhairyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saubhāgyaṃ durbhagīkṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.552'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ spṛhayanti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasmai tri-daśa-yoṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan me bhagavatā dhairyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saubhāgyaṃ dur-bhagī-kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.553'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niṣprayojanacārutva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhūṣaṇasragvilepanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saubhāgyamātrakaṃ straiṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmakāmeṣu bhartṛṣu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.553'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niṣprayojana-cārutva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhūṣaṇa-srag-vilepanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saubhāgya-mātrakaṃ straiṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāma-kāmeṣu bhartṛṣu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.554'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vijñāpayāmy etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītaś ced dayase varam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jagato 'pi varas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān evāstu no varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.554'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vijñāpayāmy etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītaś ced dayase varam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jagato 'pi varas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān eva astu no varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.555'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taruṇīnāṃ hi kanyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetojakṣuṇṇacetasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetaścakṣupriyāt puṃsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kīdṛśo 'nyo varād varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.555'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taruṇīnāṃ hi kanyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ceto-jakṣuṇṇa-cetasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cetaś-cakṣu-priyāt puṃsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kī-dṛśo 'nyo varād varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.556'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād apriyarāgo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhagavān anukampayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaśitvād rāgam ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saubhāgyaṃ me dadātv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.556'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād a-priya-rāgo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhagavān anukampayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaśitvād rāgam ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saubhāgyaṃ me dadātv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.557'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anurodhāc ca tenāsyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekaiva janitā sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciram ārādhito bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>virakto 'pi hi rajyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.557'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anurodhāc ca tena asyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eka aiva janitā sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciram ārādhito bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>virakto 'pi hi rajyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.558'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu suprabhayā nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitryaṃ viśvāvasoḥ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhitā ca vinītā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyāsu ca kalāsu ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.558'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu suprabhayā nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitryaṃ viśvāvasoḥ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhitā ca vinītā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyāsu ca kalāsu ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.559'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharvarājas tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ānīya duhituḥ sutām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhāṣata bharadvājaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāmāsyāḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.559'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharva-rājas tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ānīya duhituḥ sutām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhāṣata bharadvājaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāma asyāḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.560'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>astu gadharvadatteyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahyaṃ dattā yatas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti tasyāḥ kṛtaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bharadvājena sārthakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.560'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>astu gadharvadatta īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahyaṃ dattā yatas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti tasyāḥ kṛtaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bharadvājena sa-arthakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.561'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suprabhāyāṃ tu yā kanyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bharadvājād ajāyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāmnā gandharvadatteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitta mām eva tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.561'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suprabhāyāṃ tu yā kanyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bharadvājād ajāyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāmnā gandharvadatta īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitta mām eva tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.562'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā kṛṣṇaśarvaryāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyāmi sma śiloccayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātarūpaśilājāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jyotir ujjvalitadrumam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.562'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā kṛṣṇa-śarvaryāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyāmi sma śila-uccayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāta-rūpa-śilā-jāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jyotir ujjvalita-drumam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.563'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd ayaṃ śailo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hiraṇmayaśilaḥ sphuṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalyāṇaṃ kāñcanaṃ cāsminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmatkalyāṇakāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.563'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd ayaṃ śailo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hiraṇmaya-śilaḥ sphuṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalyāṇaṃ kāñcanaṃ ca asminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmat-kalyāṇa-kāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.564'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirdhāryeti suvarṇāśā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāśayantritacetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśālā parṇaśālāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śilābhiḥ pūritā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.564'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirdhārya iti suvarṇa-āśā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāśa-yantrita-cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśālā parṇa-śāla āsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śilābhiḥ pūritā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.565'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tās tu prātaḥ śilā dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭo gandharvadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti tasyai ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathāvṛttaṃ nyavedayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.565'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tās tu prātaḥ śilā- dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭo gandharvadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti tasyai ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā-vṛttaṃ nyavedayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.566'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu kathitaṃ pitre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām āhūya sa cāvadat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyuṣman na hiraṇmayyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śilā eva hi tāḥ śilāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.566'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu kathitaṃ pitre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām āhūya sa ca avadat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyuṣman na hiraṇmayyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śilā- eva hi tāḥ śilāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.567'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>oṣadhīnām idaṃ jyotir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhvānte hāṭakasaprabham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāsvadbhāsābhibhāvinyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktaṃ rātrau vijṛmbhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.567'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>oṣadhīnām idaṃ jyotir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhvānte hāṭaka-sa-prabham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāsvad-bhāsa-abhibhāvinyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktaṃ rātrau vijṛmbhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.568'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭavān asi sauvarṇās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatsaṃparkād imāḥ śilāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyante ca diśaḥ pītās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛṣṇātimiramīlitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.568'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭavān asi sauvarṇās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat-saṃparkād imāḥ śilāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyante ca diśaḥ pītās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛṣṇā-timira-mīlitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.569'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham eva suvarṇaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>campāṃ pratigamaṃ ca te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>acirāt saṃvidhāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tyajākulatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.569'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham eva suvarṇaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>campāṃ pratigamaṃ ca te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-cirāt saṃvidhāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tyajā akulatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.570'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāś ca tās tuṣṭatuṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhūrtenāhṛtāḥ śilāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tā mayā duḥkhaduḥkhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvāhṇena nirākṛtāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.570'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāś ca tās tuṣṭa-tuṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhūrtenā ahṛtāḥ śilāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tā- mayā duḥkha-duḥkhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarva-āhṇena nirākṛtāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.571'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā kacchapīṃ vīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahyaṃ dattvāvadat muniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad bravīmi tad ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvam anuṣṭhātum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.571'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā kacchapīṃ vīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahyaṃ dattva āvadat muniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad bravīmi tad ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvam anuṣṭhātum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.572'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandharvadattayā yas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madvṛttānto niveditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tathaiva yatas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmākam iyam ātmajā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.572'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandharvadattayā yas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mad-vṛtta-anto niveditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tatha aiva yatas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmākam iyam ātma-jā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.573'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyādharapateś ceyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāvino bhāginī priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi sāgarajanmā śrīḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrīpater anyam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.573'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidyā-dhara-pateś ca iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāvino bhāginī priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi sāgara-janmā śrīḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrī-pater anyam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.574'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena campām iyaṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deyā te cakravartine</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cihnair yaiś ca sa vijñeyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyantāṃ tāni cetasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.574'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena campām iyaṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deyā te cakra-vartine</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cihnair yaiś ca sa vijñeyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyantāṃ tāni cetasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.575'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe bhavān māse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandharvān saṃnipātayet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puras teṣām iyaṃ gāyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>geyaṃ nārāyaṇastutim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.575'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe bhavān māse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandharvān saṃnipātayet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puras teṣām iyaṃ gāyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>geyaṃ nārāyaṇa-stutim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.576'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tu saṃvādayet kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandharvas teṣu vīṇayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vādayet tac ca yas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadyāḥ svatanayām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.576'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tu saṃvādayet kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandharvas teṣu vīṇayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vādayet tac ca yas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadyāḥ sva-tanayām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.577'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā bhavatāṃ yad yad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛttaṃ gandharvasaṃsadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇāvādanaparyantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tat tena niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.577'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā bhavatāṃ yad yad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛttaṃ gandharva-saṃsadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇā-vādana-paryantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tat tena niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.578'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvāṃ munir āha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khinnau sthaḥ putrakau ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khedocchedāya tac campāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratiṣṭhethāṃ yuvām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.578'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā avāṃ munir āha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khinnau sthaḥ putrakau ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kheda-ucchedāya tac campāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratiṣṭhethāṃ yuvām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.579'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taṃ praṇipatyāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>calitaḥ pracalo mudā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāmatrayaṃ triyāmāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāpayitvā prasuptavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.579'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taṃ praṇipatya ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>calitaḥ pracalo mudā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāma-trayaṃ tri-yāmāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāpayitvā prasuptavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.580'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāmānuṣam aśrauṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāravīmātravīṇayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saveṇunisvanaṃ svānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manaḥśravaṇavallabham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.580'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha a-mānuṣam aśrauṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāravī-mātra-vīṇayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-veṇu-nisvanaṃ svānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manaḥ-śravaṇa-vallabham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.581'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satāmraśikharāsāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāraṃ maṅgalavādinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidrātyājanadakṣāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bandināṃ vanditāni ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.581'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-tāmra-śikha-rāsāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāraṃ maṅgala-vādinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidrā-tyājana-dakṣāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bandināṃ vanditāni ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.582'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmānam atha nirnidro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātarūpāṅgapañjaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paryaṅkam adhitiṣṭhantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adrākṣaṃ ratnapiñjaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.582'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmānam atha nir-nidro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāta-rūpa-aṅga-pañjaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paryaṅkam adhitiṣṭhantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adrākṣaṃ ratna-piñjaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.583'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citracīnāṃśukāstīrṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ambaraṃ svacchakuṭṭime</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛṣṭahāṭakadaṇḍālī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṭite paṭamaṇḍape ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.583'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citra-cīna-aṃśuka-āstīrṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ambaraṃ svaccha-kuṭṭime</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛṣṭa-hāṭaka-daṇḍa-ālī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṭite paṭa-maṇḍape ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.584'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nīlaratnaśilotsaṅge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vitānāvṛtabhāskare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇāparicayavyagrām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsīnāṃ suprabhāsutām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.584'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nīla-ratna-śilā-utsaṅge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vitāna-āvṛta-bhāskare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇā-paricaya-vyagrām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsīnāṃ suprabhā-sutām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.585'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vicitrojjvalavarṇaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suveṣākārabhartṛkam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>goṇībhir hemapūrṇābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrṇaṃ paṭakuṭīkulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.585'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vicitra-ujjvala-varṇaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-veṣa-ākāra-bhartṛkam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>goṇībhir hema-pūrṇābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrṇaṃ paṭa-kuṭī-kulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.586'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krīṇato maṇihemādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikrīṇānāṃś ca vāṇijān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāhitaiś ca sīmāntān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkaṭān auṣṭrakaukṣakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.586'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krīṇato maṇi-hema-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikrīṇānāṃś ca vāṇijān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāhitaiś ca sīma-antān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkaṭān auṣṭraka-okṣakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.587'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā duṣkaraṃ mandair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ kṛtvātivistaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svapne 'pi na narair dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samṛddhiḥ kaiścid apy asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.587'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā duṣ-karaṃ mandair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ kṛtva āti-vistaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svapne 'pi na narair dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samṛddhiḥ kaiś-cid apy asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.588'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāradvājīm athāpṛcchaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātaḥ kim idam adbhutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandharvanagaraṃ māyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svapno vāyaṃ bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.588'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāradvājīm atha apṛcchaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātaḥ kim idam adbhutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandharva-nagaraṃ māyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svapno va āyaṃ bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.589'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvājārjitasyedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tapaḥkalpataroḥ phalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aprameyaprabhāvaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadbhiḥ sucaritaṃ tapaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.589'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvāja-arjitasya idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tapaḥ-kalpa-taroḥ phalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-prameya-prabhāvaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadbhiḥ su-caritaṃ tapaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.590'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād idam anantatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhanam icchāvyayakṣamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūmer anyatra sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satpātrādau nidhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.590'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād idam an-antatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhanam icchā-avyaya-kṣamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūmer anyatra sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sat-pātra-ādau nidhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.591'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyacintāṃ parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyayacintāparo bhava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyasthānaṃ hi te 'sty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>munikāñcanaparvataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.591'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āya-cintāṃ parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyaya-cintā-paro bhava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āya-sthānaṃ hi te 'sty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muni-kāñcana-parvataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.592'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā paśyāmi jananīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti cākulatāṃ tyaja</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sārthasthānād itaś campā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nanu krośeṣu pañcasu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.592'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā paśyāmi jananīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti cā akulatāṃ tyaja</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sārtha-sthānād itaś campā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nanu krośeṣu pañcasu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.593'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca me svapnam āyādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣayaḥ saṃśayas tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niścayātmikayā sadyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prajñayeva nivartitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.593'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca me svapnam āya-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣayaḥ saṃśayas tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niścaya-ātmikayā sadyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prajñaya īva nivartitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.594'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dhruvakam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vailakṣyān namitānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūrtaṃ tādṛgvidhair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suhṛdbhiḥ parivāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.594'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dhruvakam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vailakṣyān namita-ānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūrtaṃ tā-dṛg-vidhair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suhṛdbhiḥ parivāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.595'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam utthāyātha paryaṅkāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parirabhya ca sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhyasthāpayam ātmīyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śayyāṃ gatavilakṣatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.595'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam utthāya atha paryaṅkāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parirabhya ca sa-ādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhyasthāpayam ātmīyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śayyāṃ gata-vilakṣatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.596'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃbhāṣaṇapariṣvaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śātakumbhāsanādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdgaṇam anujyeṣṭham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udāraiḥ paryatoṣayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.596'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃbhāṣaṇa-pariṣvaṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāta-kumbha-āsana-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛd-gaṇam anu-jyeṣṭham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udāraiḥ paryatoṣayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.597'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ paramaśeṣaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naṭannaṭapuraḥsarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravṛddhapramadonmādā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>campā taṃ sārtham āvṛṇot ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.597'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ parama-śeṣa aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naṭan-naṭa-puraḥ-sarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravṛddha-pramada-unmādā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>campā taṃ sārtham āvṛṇot ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.598'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praharṣotkarṣavicchinna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>niśvāsānilasaṃtatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amṛtaiva janaḥ kaścic</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirāt kaścid udaśvasat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.598'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praharṣa-utkarṣa-vicchinna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>niśvāsa-anila-saṃtatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amṛta aiva janaḥ kaś-cic</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirāt kaś-cid udaśvasat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.599'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>susvādenānnapātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratnavāsaḥsragādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sphītair hemātisargaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pauraśreṇim avardhayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.599'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>su-svādena anna-pātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratna-vāsaḥ-srag-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sphītair hema-ati-sargaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paura-śreṇim avardhayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.600'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaiś ca gomayapānīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣiptaṃ mama puraḥsarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uddhṛtās te viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāridryanirayān mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.600'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaiś ca go-maya-pānīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣiptaṃ mama puraḥ-sarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uddhṛtās te viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāridrya-nirayān mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.601'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dhruvakam ābhāṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhadra raudratarākṛteḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daridravāṭakād ambā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svam evānīyatāṃ gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.601'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dhruvakam ābhāṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhadra raudratara-ākṛteḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daridra-vāṭakād ambā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svam evā anīyatāṃ gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.602'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvan mātreṇa vikrītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draviṇena tad ambayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ śataguṇenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kretur niṣkretum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.602'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvan mātreṇa vikrītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draviṇena tad ambayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ śata-guṇena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kretur niṣkretum arhasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.603'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tādṛśīm īśvarām ambāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daridrakuṭikāgatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭuṃ śaknoti yas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣudrakān dhig asūn iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.603'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tā-dṛśīm īśvarām ambāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daridra-kuṭika-āgatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draṣṭuṃ śaknoti yas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣudrakān dhig asūn iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.604'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tena vihasyoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva devī kva daridratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kena bhāgīrathī dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vicchinnajalasaṃhatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.604'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tena vihasya uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva devī kva daridratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kena bhāgīrathī dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vicchinna-jala-saṃhatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.605'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad eva bhavanaṃ devyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samṛddhiḥ saiva cācalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ujjvalā tu tvayedānīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumudvatyā ivendunā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.605'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad eva bhavanaṃ devyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samṛddhiḥ sa aiva ca a-calā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ujjvalā tu tvaya īdānīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumudvatyā- iva indunā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.606'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tat kṣaṇasaṃkṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣiptvā sakṣaṇadaṃ dinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suprātaḥ prāviśaṃ campāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanādhipa ivālakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.606'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tat kṣaṇa-saṃkṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣiptvā sa-kṣaṇa-daṃ dinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-prātaḥ prāviśaṃ campāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhana-adhipa ivā alakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.607'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rathyābhir viśikhābhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṇiśreṇipuraḥsaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā narendram adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>surendram iva bhāsvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.607'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rathyābhir viśikhābhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṇi-śreṇi-puraḥ-saraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā nara-indram adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sura-indram iva bhāsvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.608'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vandanāya tato dūrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharaṇīm aham āśliṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asāv api mudāhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām āśliṣad akaitavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.608'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vandanāya tato dūrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharaṇīm aham āśliṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asāv api mudā āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām āśliṣad a-kaitavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.609'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāravadbhir anantaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām asau bhūṣaṇāmbaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satkṛtyājñāpayat putra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jananī dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.609'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāravadbhir anantaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām asau bhūṣaṇa-ambaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sat-kṛtyā ajñāpayat putra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jananī dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.610'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sumerusāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratnakāñcanarāśinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣpūraṃ pūrayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājñas tṛṣṇārasātalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.610'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ su-meru-sāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ratna-kāñcana-rāśinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣ-pūraṃ pūrayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājñas tṛṣṇā-rasātalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.611'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>narendraparivāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratītenāvṛtas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭhadbhiś ca tato viprair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmīyam agamaṃ gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.611'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nara-indra-parivāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratītenā avṛtas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭhadbhiś ca tato viprair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmīyam agamaṃ gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.612'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mandadhvanimṛdaṅgādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasminn uddāmatāṇḍave</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paurair harṣakṛtotsāhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kṣuṇṇaḥ katham apy aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.612'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manda-dhvani-mṛdaṅga-ādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasminn uddāma-tāṇḍave</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paurair harṣa-kṛta-utsāhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kṣuṇṇaḥ katham apy aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.613'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ambām athārghajalapātrabhṛtaṃ nirīkṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrād apāsarad asau janatā vihastā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrṇād ivāndhatamasāni tuṣārakānter</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āryāt pṛthag janaśatāni hi saṃbhramanti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.613'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ambām atha argha-jala-pātra-bhṛtaṃ nirīkṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrād apāsarad asau janatā vihastā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrṇād iva andha-tamasāni tuṣāra-kānter</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āryāt pṛthag jana-śatāni hi saṃbhramanti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.614'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>labdhāntaras tataḥ pādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śirasā mātur aspṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāpi sārdhapayaḥpātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patati sma mamopari ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.614'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>labdha-antaras tataḥ pādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śirasā mātur aspṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa āpi sārdha-payaḥ-pātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patati sma mama upari ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.615'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cirāc ca labdhaniśvāsā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām udasthāpayat tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayat pāṇinākṛṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhābhyantaramaṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.615'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cirāc ca labdha-niśvāsā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām udasthāpayat tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayat pāṇinā ākṛṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛha-abhyantara-maṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.616'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devadvijagurūṃs tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadurgatavanīpakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sphītaiḥ parijanaṃ ca svaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vibhavaiḥ samayojayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.616'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deva-dvija-gurūṃs tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-dur-gata-vanīpakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sphītaiḥ parijanaṃ ca svaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vibhavaiḥ samayojayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.617'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato nivartitāhāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>paryantakaraṇasthitiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāviśaṃ mātur ādeśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āvāsaṃ gurucārutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.617'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato nivartita-āhāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>paryanta-karaṇa-sthitiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāviśaṃ mātur ādeśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āvāsaṃ guru-cārutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.618'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāsīnaś ca paryaṅke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahītalasamāsanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ prathamāṃ jāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karaśākhāvṛtānanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.618'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrā asīnaś ca paryaṅke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahī-tala-sama-āsanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ prathamāṃ jāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kara-śākha-āvṛta-ānanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.619'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ karuṇayā netre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārjatā saṃtatāśruṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgadattā mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śliṣṭabhittiḥ parāṅmukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.619'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ karuṇayā netre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārjatā saṃtata-aśru-ṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgadattā mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śliṣṭa-bhittiḥ parāṅ-mukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.620'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāṅmātreṇāpi yat satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na sā saṃmānitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smaranti hi tiraskārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>munayo 'pi garīyasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.620'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāṅ-mātreṇa api yat satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na sā saṃmānitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smaranti hi tiras-kārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>munayo 'pi garīyasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.621'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac cāvāsagṛhaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kusumasthagitakṣiti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sindhurodhaḥ smarāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phullanānālatāgṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.621'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac cā avāsa-gṛhaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kusuma-sthagita-kṣiti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sindhu-rodhaḥ smarāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phulla-nānā-latā-gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.622'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samudradinnayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anubhūtaṃ ca tatra yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitaprasthitagītādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśrabdhācaritaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.622'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samudradinnayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anubhūtaṃ ca tatra yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthita-prasthita-gīta-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśrabdha-ācaritaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.623'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd varaṃ duḥkham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anubhūtaṃ mahan mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hṛdayād vyāvṛtād yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kvāpi priyatamā gatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.623'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd varaṃ duḥkham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anubhūtaṃ mahan mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hṛdayād vyāvṛtād yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva api priyatamā gatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.624'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥkhaśūnyaṃ tu tad dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>randhrān veṣaṇatatparā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā niranukrośā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā praviṣṭānivāritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.624'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥkha-śūnyaṃ tu tad dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>randhrān veṣaṇa-tat-parā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā nir-anukrośā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā praviṣṭa ā-nivāritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.625'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviṣṭā hṛdayaṃ sā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathāvāsagṛhaṃ tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśed api nāmeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durghaṭo 'yaṃ manorathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.625'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviṣṭā hṛdayaṃ sā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā āvāsa-gṛhaṃ tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśed api nāma iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-ghaṭo 'yaṃ mano-rathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.626'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā hi hi mām āhvayaty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paritrāyasva mām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taraṃgapāṇinākṛṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛtā pāpena sindhunā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.626'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā hi hi mām āhvayaty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paritrāyasva mām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taraṃ-ga-pāṇinā ākṛṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛtā pāpena sindhunā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.627'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti cintāturaṃ sā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣatyājitadhīratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśya tvarayāliṅgad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgais tuṅgatanūruham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.627'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti cintā-āturaṃ sā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣa-tyājita-dhīratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśya tvarayā āliṅgad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgais tuṅga-tanū-ruham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.628'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyantānupapannaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā tasyāḥ samāgamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām eva dhyātavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sindhubhaṅgāgratāraṇīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.628'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyanta-an-upapannaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā tasyāḥ samāgamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām eva dhyātavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sindhu-bhaṅga-agra-tāraṇīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.629'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vismṛtāparavṛttāntas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadāsaktamanastayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām evāśvāsayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma bhīrur bhaver iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.629'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vismṛta-apara-vṛtta-antas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad-āsakta-manastayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām evā aśvāsayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma bhīrur bhaver iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.630'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bhīteva sāvocat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svagṛhe vartate bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipannavahanaḥ kaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tu kṣārāmbhudhāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.630'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bhīta īva sa āvocat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-gṛhe vartate bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipanna-vahanaḥ kaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tu kṣāra-ambhudhāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.631'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṣārāmbudher bhīmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāhṛtamanās tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhaṃ tat paritaḥ paśyann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ vanitādvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.631'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṣāra-ambudher bhīmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāhṛta-manās tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhaṃ tat paritaḥ paśyann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ vanitā-dvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.632'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>smaratā ca sadācāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sapatnījanasaṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vakṣaḥsthāpi satī nāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dorbhyām āliṅgitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.632'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>smaratā ca sad-ācāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-patnī-jana-saṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vakṣaḥ-stha āpi satī na asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dorbhyām āliṅgitā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.633'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvasthāntare tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārasaṃnidhisaṃkaṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asrāvitā mamāgacchad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambātrāsākulekṣaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.633'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avastha-antare tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāra-saṃnidhi-saṃkaṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-srāvitā mamā agacchad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amba ā-trāsa-ākula-īkṣaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.634'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samudradinnayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ucchrite saṃbhramān mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambā śayanam adhyāste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śeṣās tv āsata bhūtale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.634'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samudradinnayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ucchrite saṃbhramān mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambā śayanam adhyāste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śeṣās tv āsata bhū-tale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.635'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kiṃcid ivāmbāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat satyaṃ kupito 'bhavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akālajñā hi mātāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putreṇa paribhūyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.635'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kiṃ-cid iva ambāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat satyaṃ kupito 'bhavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kāla-jñā hi māta āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>putreṇa paribhūyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.636'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāmbayā vihasyoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akālajñeti mā grahīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu sarvajñakalpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryāhaṃ mitravarmaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.636'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ambayā vihasya uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-kāla-jña īti mā grahīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu sarva-jña-kalpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhārya āhaṃ mitravarmaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.637'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvadbhāryāsaṃnidhāv asminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgamiṣyam ahaṃ yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyanaśiṣyan mahat kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tac cedam avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.637'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvad-bhāryā-saṃnidhāv asminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgamiṣyam ahaṃ yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyanaśiṣyan mahat kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tac ca idam avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.638'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyācitaśatair jātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraḥ putratvam āvayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhitaḥ śikṣitaś cāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitrā vidyācatuṣṭayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.638'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyācita-śatair jātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraḥ putratvam āvayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhitaḥ śikṣitaś ca asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitrā vidyā-catuṣṭayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.639'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parivrācchakyanirgrantha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>granthābhyāsāc ca sarvadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭumbapālanālāpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tava jāto 'tidurbhagaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.639'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parivrāc-chakya-nir-grantha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>grantha-abhyāsāc ca sarvadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭumba-pālana-ālāpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tava jāto 'ti-dur-bhagaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.640'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ samantrinā rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃmantrya gurubhiś ca te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdbhir dhruvakādyais tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udyāne madhu pāyitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.640'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa-mantrinā rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃmantrya gurubhiś ca te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdbhir dhruvaka-ādyais tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udyāne madhu pāyitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.641'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadattā ca tair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yojitā bhavatā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā tathā kṛtaś cāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā vettha tvam eva tat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.641'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadattā ca tair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yojitā bhavatā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā tathā kṛtaś ca asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā vettha tvam eva tat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.642'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakāreṇa ca yena tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ nivāsitas tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jananyai gaṅgadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathito bhūbhṛtaiva saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.642'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakāreṇa ca yena tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ nivāsitas tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jananyai gaṅgadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathito bhū-bhṛta aiva saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.643'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daridravāṭake yac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rātriṃdivam asi sthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad evaikam asau rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalpitaś cāraṇādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.643'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daridra-vāṭake yac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rātriṃ-divam asi sthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad eva ekam asau rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalpitaś cāraṇa-ādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.644'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jānāty eva ca dīrghāyuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva campā kva daridratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paurṇamāsī kṣapā kena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭā dhvāntamalīmasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.644'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jānāty eva ca dīrgha-āyuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva campā kva daridratā</seg> </l>
