<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paurṇamāsī kṣapā kena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭā dhvānta-malīmasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.645'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvadaiva hi campāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmin balini pālake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balāv iva mahīpāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>balirājyaṃ na durlabham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.645'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvada aiva hi campāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmin balini pālake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balāv iva mahī-pāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bali-rājyaṃ na dur-labham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.646'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāṃ ca rātriṃ bhavān suptas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmin durgatavāṭake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mama khaṭvātale tasmiñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chayitaṃ gaṅgadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.646'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāṃ ca rātriṃ bhavān suptas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmin dur-gata-vāṭake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mama khaṭvā-tale tasmiñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chayitaṃ gaṅgadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.647'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ prabhṛti bhīmāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvad adyatanīṃ niśām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atrāntare niṣaṇṇeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>matkhaṭvātalabhūtale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.647'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ prabhṛti bhīmāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvad adyatanīṃ niśām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atra antare niṣaṇṇa īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mat-khaṭvā-tala-bhū-tale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.648'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca tad dhanam etasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayā dattaṃ tad etayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāṇḍāgāre tava nyastam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśeṣaṃ kṛtalekhakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.648'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca tad dhanam etasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayā dattaṃ tad etayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāṇḍa-āgāre tava nyastam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-śeṣaṃ kṛta-lekhakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.649'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad iyaṃ sānurāgatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavaddarśanakāṅkṣiṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smṛtvā mithyātiraskāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tiraskāram arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.649'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad iyaṃ sa-anurāgatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavad-darśana-kāṅkṣiṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smṛtvā mithyā-tiras-kāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tiras-kāram arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.650'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavatā paribhūtā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sapatnījanasaṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kātarā pramadābhāvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇān api parityajet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.650'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavatā paribhūtā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-patnī-jana-saṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kātarā pramadā-bhāvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇān api parityajet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.651'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etan manasi kṛtvārtham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akāle 'py aham āgatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sīdad gurutarārthānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaḥ kālo nāma kāryiṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.651'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etan manasi kṛtva ārtham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-kāle 'py aham āgatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sīdad gurutara-arthānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaḥ kālo nāma kāryiṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.652'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa te gaṅgadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛttāntaḥ kathito 'dhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadhūḥ samudradinnāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathāyātā tathā śṛṇu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.652'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa te gaṅgadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛtta-antaḥ kathito 'dhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadhūḥ samudradinna āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā āyātā tathā śṛṇu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.653'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daridravāṭakādyais tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pathikaiḥ saha nirgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayuktās te nṛpeṇaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa ca siddhārthako vaṇik ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.653'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daridra-vāṭaka-ādyais tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pathikaiḥ saha nirgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayuktās te nṛpeṇa eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa ca siddhārthako vaṇik ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.654'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antare yac ca te vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārthadhvaṃsādi bhīṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmraliptīpraveśāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiṣṭaṃ siddhārthakena tat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.654'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antare yac ca te vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārtha-dhvaṃsa-ādi bhīṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmraliptī-praveśa-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiṣṭaṃ siddhārthakena tat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.655'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhraṣṭena vahanabhraṃśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrāmyatā jaladhes taṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā samudradinnāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇir ālambitas tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.655'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhraṣṭena vahana-bhraṃśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrāmyatā jaladhes taṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā samudradinnāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇir ālambitas tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.656'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaś ca bhinnapotaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇḍyapuryāṃ ca yat tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛttaṃ karpāsadāhāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmraliptyāgamaś ca yaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.656'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaś ca bhinna-potaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇḍyapuryāṃ ca yat tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛttaṃ karpāsa-dāha-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmralipty--āgamaś ca yaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.657'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadattena tan mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃtatair lekhahāribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khyāpitaṃ yāvad ācero</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantaṃ kvāpi nītavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.657'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṅgadattena tan mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃtatair lekha-hāribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khyāpitaṃ yāvad ācero</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantaṃ kva api nītavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.658'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ paraṃ bhavadvārttāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicchinnatvād avindatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nairāśyakṛtanirvedāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paralokotsukābhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.658'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ paraṃ bhavad-vārttāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicchinnatvād a-vindatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nairāśya-kṛta-nirvedāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>para-loka-utsuka abhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.659'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃprāye ca vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dauvārikaniveditau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samudradinnayā sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syālau prāviśatāṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.659'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ-prāye ca vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dauvārika-niveditau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samudradinnayā sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syālau prāviśatāṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.660'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prayuktārghyādisatkārau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇaṃ tau gamitaśramau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vilakṣyāvīkṣamāṇau mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ābhāṣyesam avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.660'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prayukta-arghya-ādi-sat-kārau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇaṃ tau gamita-śramau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vilakṣya a-vīkṣamāṇau mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ābhāṣya isam avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.661'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tava putrāya pitrā nas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayeyaṃ pratiśrutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca yauvanamūḍhatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svīkṛto gaṅgadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.661'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tava putrāya pitrā nas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanaya īyaṃ pratiśrutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca yauvana-mūḍhatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svī-kṛto gaṅgadattayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.662'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā ca svīkṛtasvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchato mātulālayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na śakyate yad ākhyātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulindaiḥ kila tat kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.662'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā ca svī-kṛta-svasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchato mātula-ālayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na śakyate yad ākhyātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulindaiḥ kila tat kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.663'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaiśasaṃ duḥśravaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat sūnor mitravarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣpratyāśaṃ kuṭumbaṃ naḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthitaṃ yavanān prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.663'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaiśasaṃ duḥ-śravaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat sūnor mitravarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣ-pratyāśaṃ kuṭumbaṃ naḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthitaṃ yavanān prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.664'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bohittham āsthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūjitadvijadevatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhāvyavyasanadhvaṃsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samagāhāma sāgaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.664'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bohittham āsthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūjita-dvija-devatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhāvya-vyasana-dhvaṃsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samagāhāma sāgaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.665'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prajavinaṃ potaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ pracaṇḍaḥ prabhañjanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛgendra iva nāgendraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasphurantaṃ prabhinnavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.665'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prajavinaṃ potaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ pracaṇḍaḥ prabhañjanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mṛga-indra iva nāga-indraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasphurantaṃ prabhinnavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.666'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayaṃ tu karmasāmarthyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taraṃgaiḥ śaragatvaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārūḍhāḥ paṭṭapṛṣṭhāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpitā jaladhes taṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.666'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vayaṃ tu karma-sāmarthyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taraṃgaiḥ śara-gatvaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārūḍhāḥ paṭṭa-pṛṣṭhāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpitā jaladhes taṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.667'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vadhūs tv ekārṇavāmbhodhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lolakallolasaṃkule</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrāntamegha ivodbhrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyomni sārasakanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.667'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vadhūs tv eka-arṇava-ambhodhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lola-kallola-saṃkule</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrānta-megha iva udbhrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyomni sārasa-kanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.668'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muktvā samudradinnāśām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arthāśāṃ ca mahāśrubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yavanastham agacchāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātāmahagṛhaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.668'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muktvā samudradinna-āśām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>artha-āśāṃ ca mahā-aśrubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yavana-stham agacchāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātāmaha-gṛhaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.669'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāsmākaṃ kuṭumbaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrād utsukam āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samṛddhe sarasīvāsīt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛptaṃ haṃsakadambakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.669'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra asmākaṃ kuṭumbaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrād utsukam āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samṛddhe sarasi ivā asīt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛptaṃ haṃsa-kadambakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.670'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etha yāte kvacit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitā vām ittham ādiśat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsāte kim udāsīnau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantau sthavirāv iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.670'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etha yāte kva-cit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitā vām ittham ādiśat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsāte kim udāsīnau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantau sthavirāv iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.671'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taruṇau sakalau svasthau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vārttāvidyāviśāradau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svajanānnena jīvantau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kum ucyethe janair yuvām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.671'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taruṇau sakalau svasthau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vārttā-vidyā-viśāradau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-jana-annena jīvantau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kum ucyethe janair yuvām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.672'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān muktāpravālādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāraṃ sāgarasaṃbhavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītvā yānapātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sindhur uttāryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.672'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān muktā-pravāla-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāraṃ sāgara-saṃbhavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītvā yāna-pātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sindhur uttāryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.673'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatheti ca pratijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathaivāvām akurvahi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śliṣṭapaṭṭām athādrākṣva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarantīṃ rudatīṃ striyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.673'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatha īti ca pratijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatha aivā avām akurvahi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śliṣṭa-paṭṭām atha adrākṣva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarantīṃ rudatīṃ striyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.674'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aspṛśantaḥ karair enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parastrīm upanaukayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āropayata bohittham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity avocāva vāhakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.674'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-spṛśantaḥ karair enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>para-strīm upanaukayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āropayata bohittham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity avocāva vāhakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.675'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ cārūḍhām apṛcchāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parastrīti parāṅmukhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātaḥ kasyāsi kā veti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā ca nīcair avocata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.675'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ cā arūḍhām apṛcchāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>para-stri īti parāṅ-mukhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātaḥ kasya asi kā va īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā ca nīcair avocata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.676'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vācā pratyabhijānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciram abhyastayā yuvām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaccit sāgaradattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantau tanayāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.676'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vācā pratyabhijānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciram abhyastayā yuvām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kac-cit sāgaradattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantau tanayāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.677'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasyāś cirābhyastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyabhijñāya tad vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaccit samudradinnāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sundarīty avadāva tām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.677'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasyāś cira-abhyastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyabhijñāya tad vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kac-cit samudradinna āsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sundari ity avadāva tām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.678'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākrandantī tatas tāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvayor vāmadakṣiṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāparāṅmukhayor jaṅghe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāhubhyāṃ gāḍham āśliṣat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.678'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākrandantī tatas tāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvayor vāma-dakṣiṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ā-parāṅ-mukhayor jaṅghe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāhubhyāṃ gāḍham āśliṣat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.679'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhāṣata ca hā tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hā mamāmbā priyātmajā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhikkāraḥ sāgaraṃ pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena tau kvāpi yāpitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.679'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhāṣata ca hā tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hā mama ambā priya-ātma-jā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhik-kāraḥ sāgaraṃ pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena tau kva api yāpitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.680'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hāryaputra kva yāto 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hatasneha vihāya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āpannapriyadārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naiṣa dharmaḥ satām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.680'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ha ārya-putra kva yāto 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hata-sneha vihāya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āpanna-priya-dārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na eṣa dharmaḥ satām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.681'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāryaputraśabdena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhayasaṃśayahetunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niḥsnehīkṛtacetaskāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhāṣāvahi tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.681'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā arya-putra-śabdena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaya-saṃśaya-hetunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niḥ-snehī-kṛta-cetaskāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhāṣāvahi tām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.682'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ sundari kranditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvataḥ pitarau tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āryaputraḥ punar yas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa nau niścīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.682'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ sundari kranditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvataḥ pitarau tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārya-putraḥ punar yas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa nau niścīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.683'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śrutapitṛkṣemā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā śokojjhitamānasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvāṃ mā bhaiṣṭam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaṃ vṛttaṃ vṛttam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.683'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śruta-pitṛ-kṣemā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā śoka-ujjhita-mānasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvāṃ mā bhaiṣṭam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaṃ vṛttaṃ vṛttam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.684'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty ahaṃ vahanād bhraṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrāmyantī jaladhes taṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmai dattāsmi yuṣmābhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam adrākṣaṃ vipadgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.684'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty ahaṃ vahanād bhraṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrāmyantī jaladhes taṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmai datta āsmi yuṣmābhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam adrākṣaṃ vipad-gatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.685'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃvāditasvavṛttena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītas tena me karaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāyante hi supuṇyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utsavā vyasaneṣv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.685'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃvādita-sva-vṛttena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītas tena me karaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāyante hi su-puṇyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utsavā- vyasaneṣv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.686'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mām alālayad bāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nārīlālanapeśalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā yathā priyatamau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsmaraṃ pitarāv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.686'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mām alālayad bāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nārī-lālana-peśalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā yathā priyatamau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na asmaraṃ pitarāv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.687'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athādya potam āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samāyataṃ yadṛcchayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasthitau svaḥ svadeśāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipannaḥ sa ca pūrvavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.687'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha adya potam āruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samāyataṃ yadṛcchayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasthitau svaḥ sva-deśāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipannaḥ sa ca pūrvavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.688'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca vāṃ bhāginībhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sākrandāyāḥ puro mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃpraty eva taraṃgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamitaḥ kvāpi vairiṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.688'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca vāṃ bhāginī-bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-ākrandāyāḥ puro mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃpraty eva taraṃgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamitaḥ kva api vairiṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.689'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nabhasvajjavanair bhaṅgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaṅgurair āvṛtaḥ sa ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akasmāj jātaśatrubhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavadbhyāṃ cāham uddhṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.689'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nabhasvaj-javanair bhaṅgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaṅgurair āvṛtaḥ sa ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kasmāj jāta-śatrubhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavadbhyāṃ ca aham uddhṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.690'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satvathā tadviyogāgni</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>taptāny aṅgāni sāgare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śīte śītalayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muñcataṃ māṃ yuvām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.690'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satvathā tad-viyoga-agni</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>taptāny aṅgāni sāgare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śīte śītalayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muñcataṃ māṃ yuvām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.691'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upapannair athālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janitapratyayau tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpannaparamānandāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āliṅgāma parasparam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.691'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upapannair athā alāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janita-pratyayau tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpanna-parama-ānandāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āliṅgāma parasparam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.692'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vipannapotayor āsīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvayoḥ saṃgamo yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaviṣyati tathā bhūyaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citraṃ hi caritaṃ vidheḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.692'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vipanna-potayor āsīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuvayoḥ saṃgamo yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaviṣyati tathā bhūyaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citraṃ hi caritaṃ vidheḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.693'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādibhir ālāpaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cetovikṣepahetubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parisaṃsthāpayantau tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atarāva mahodadhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.693'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādibhir ālāpaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ceto-vikṣepa-hetubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parisaṃsthāpayantau tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atarāva mahā-udadhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.694'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca muktāpravālādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurumūlyaṃ yad āhṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahasraguṇalābhaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āvābhyāṃ parivartitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.694'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca muktā-pravāla-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guru-mūlyaṃ yad āhṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahasra-guṇa-lābhaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āvābhyāṃ parivartitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.695'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vadhūḥ samudradinnā te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurusāraṃ ca taddhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvam arpitam āvābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tubhyaṃ tat parigṛhyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.695'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vadhūḥ samudradinnā te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guru-sāraṃ ca tad-dhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvam arpitam āvābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tubhyaṃ tat parigṛhyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.696'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vahanadhvaṃsamuktānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sametānāṃ ca bandhubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ samudradinnā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvatputrasya nidarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.696'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vahana-dhvaṃsa-muktānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sametānāṃ ca bandhubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ samudradinnā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvat-putrasya nidarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.697'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrvavat sānudaso 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktaḥ potavipattitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgamiṣyati tad devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muñca kātaratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.697'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrvavat sānudaso 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktaḥ pota-vipattitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgamiṣyati tad devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muñca kātaratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.698'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā sadhanaskandhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nikṣipya bhāginīṃ mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>susatkāraprayuktau tau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathāgatam agacchatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.698'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā sa-dhana-skandhāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nikṣipya bhāginīṃ mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-sat-kāra-prayuktau tau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā-āgatam agacchatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.699'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ samudradinneyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgatā bhavato gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daivapauruṣayuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrīr iva ślāghyajanmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.699'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ samudradinna īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgatā bhavato gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daiva-pauruṣa-yuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrīr iva ślāghya-janmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.700'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad etān bhavato dārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmacāritrarakṣitān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakṣantyā gurumāninyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>carite caritaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.700'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad etān bhavato dārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharma-cāritra-rakṣitān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakṣantyā guru-māninyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>carite caritaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.701'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vrīḍitadraviṇeśasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samṛddhyā divyayānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitrā tulyo bhavatv eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāpo nāśaṃsitas tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.701'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vrīḍita-draviṇa-īśasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samṛddhyā divyaya ānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitrā tulyo bhavatv eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāpo na a-śaṃsitas tava ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_18.702'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād dhanam idaṃ bhuñjan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhuñjānaś ca yathāgamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātv ānṛṇyaṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_18.702'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād dhanam idaṃ bhuñjan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhuñjānaś ca yathā-āgamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātv ānṛṇyaṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>campāyāṃ ramamāṇasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālaḥ kaścid agād mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>campāyāṃ ramamāṇasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālaḥ kaś-cid agād mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā prāsakaiḥ krīḍan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha gandharvadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahasā pramadāveṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ puruṣaṃ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā prāsakaiḥ krīḍan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha gandharvadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahasā pramadā-veṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ puruṣaṃ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kapālaśikhipiñchābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>virājitakaradvayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayuktendradhanuśchāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṅgāragalakaṇṭhikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kapāla-śikhi-piñchābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>virājita-kara-dvayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-yukta-indra-dhanuś-chāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṅgāra-gala-kaṇṭhikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandharvadattayā cāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattasvāsanayā svayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakṣālya caraṇau bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svālaṃkārair alaṃkṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandharvadattayā ca asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>datta-sva-āsanayā svayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakṣālya caraṇau bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-alaṃ-kārair alaṃ-kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca me gurugāmbhīryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kvāpi nītam asūyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā kesariśāvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gandhahastijighāṃsayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca me guru-gāmbhīryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva api nītam asūyayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā kesari-śāvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gandha-hasti-jighāṃsayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mamāsīd iyam evātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadoṣā kulamāninī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣa strīpuruṣaḥ śocyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yo na strī na pumān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mamā asīd iyam eva atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-doṣā kula-māninī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣa strī-puruṣaḥ śocyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yo na strī na pumān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mām uddiśya tatas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodhāruṇitacakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadatā nihato 'sīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimuktaḥ śikhipicchakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mām uddiśya tatas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodha-aruṇita-cakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadatā nihato 'si iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimuktaḥ śikhi-picchakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa me keśakalāpāgram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īṣad āmṛśya yātavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāgeṣur iva karṇāstraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kirīṭāgraṃ kirīṭinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa me keśa-kalāpa-agram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īṣad āmṛśya yātavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāga-iṣur iva karṇa-astraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kirīṭa-agraṃ kirīṭinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayam eva ca tat tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapālam apatat karāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niḥsthāmnaḥ kuñjarasyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidhānaṃ vinaśiṣyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayam eva ca tat tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapālam apatat karāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niḥ-sthāmnaḥ kuñjarasya iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidhānaṃ vinaśiṣyataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'tha grāmeyakeneva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhiyā dhūrto 'tisaṃdhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūmrachāyaḥ śanair jalpan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhig dhiṅ mām iti nirgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'tha grāmeyakena iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhiyā dhūrto 'tisaṃdhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūmra-chāyaḥ śanair jalpan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhig dhiṅ mām iti nirgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharvadattā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīptāmarṣam aśaṅkitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>savāḍavam upāsarpan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nimnageva mahārṇavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharvadattā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīpta-āmarṣam a-śaṅkitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-vāḍavam upāsarpan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nimna-ga īva mahā-arṇavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho strīṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atrāsamatrapaṃ manaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat pureva pragalbheyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upasarpati mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho strīṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atra a-sama-trapaṃ manaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat pura īva pragalbha īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upasarpati mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā mām avocad bhīteva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śītalībhavata kṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃcid vijñāpayāmy eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātu vaḥ krodhapāvakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā mām avocad bhīta īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śītalī-bhavata kṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ-cid vijñāpayāmy eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātu vaḥ krodha-pāvakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ vikaciko nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaurīśikharavāsinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharapater bhrātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaurimuṇḍasya sādhakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ vikaciko nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaurī-śikhara-vāsinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dhara-pater bhrātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaurimuṇḍasya sādhakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūtavrataṃ ca nāmedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahuvidhnaṃ caraty ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāpte 'sminn avighnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vandhyāḥ syur no manorathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūta-vrataṃ ca nāma idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahu-vidhnaṃ caraty ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāpte 'sminn a-vighnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vandhyāḥ syur no mano-rathaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā ca pūjayate taṃ strī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaurīvratavicāriṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyai varaṃ mahāgaurī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dayate śāpam anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā ca pūjayate taṃ strī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaurī-vrata-vicāriṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyai varaṃ mahā-gaurī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dayate śāpam anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijñāpayāmi saṃkṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodhād anyo mahābalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vihantā sarvasiddhīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsti vighnavināyakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijñāpayāmi saṃkṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodhād anyo mahā-balaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vihantā sarva-siddhīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na asti vighna-vināyakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siddhakalpaṃ ca tasyedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khaṇḍayatyā mahāvratam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tuṣṭayā toṣitā gaurī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā yūyaṃ ca roṣitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siddha-kalpaṃ ca tasya idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khaṇḍayatyā mahā-vratam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tuṣṭayā toṣitā gaurī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā yūyaṃ ca roṣitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad etasyāsya yuṣmabhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kruddhebhyaḥ krudhyatas tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaurībhraṣṭā mahāvidyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyeva tanumedhasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad etasya asya yuṣmabhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kruddhebhyaḥ krudhyatas tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaurī-bhraṣṭā mahā-vidyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidya īva tanu-medhasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yuṣmākam evedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryaṃ kurvāṇayā guru</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yan mayā roṣitā yūyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etan me mṛṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yuṣmākam eva idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryaṃ kurvāṇayā guru</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yan mayā roṣitā yūyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etan me mṛṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca krodhagrahaś caṇḍaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śanakaiḥ śanakair mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dayitāmantravādinyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛdayād apasarpitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca krodha-grahaś caṇḍaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śanakaiḥ śanakair mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dayitā-mantra-vādinyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛdayād apasarpitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃjanitotsāhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayāhaṃ mantrasādhanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnaḥ sānudāsena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadācid iti bhāṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃjanita-utsāhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taya āhaṃ mantra-sādhanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnaḥ sānudāsena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadā-cid iti bhāṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd ihaiva campāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iṣṭabhāryo mahīpatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena dohadakaṃ pṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryāvocat trapāvatī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd iha eva campāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iṣṭa-bhāryo mahī-patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena dohadakaṃ pṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhārya āvocat trapāvatī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krīḍanmakarakumbhīra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kulīrajhaṣakacchape</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍeyaṃ saha yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jale jalanidher iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krīḍan-makara-kumbhīra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kulīra-jhaṣa-kacchape</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍeyaṃ saha yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jale jala-nidher iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājñāpi magadhair sāṅgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandhayitvāśu nimnagām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saraḥ sāgaravistāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avandhyājñena khānitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājña āpi magadhair sa-aṅgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandhayitva āśu nimnagām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saraḥ sāgara-vistāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-vandhya-ājñena khānitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra nakrādisaṃsthāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāruyantranirantare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimānākārapotasthau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tau rājānau viceratuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra nakra-ādi-saṃsthāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāru-yantra-nirantare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimāna-ākāra-pota-sthau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tau rājānau viceratuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārabhya ca tataḥ kālāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra yātrā pravartitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhṛṣṭaparapuṣṭeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divaseṣu mahībhujā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārabhya ca tataḥ kālāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra yātrā pravartitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhṛṣṭa-parapuṣṭeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divaseṣu mahī-bhujā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te caite divasāḥ prāptāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭukokilakūjitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā ca yātreyam āyātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramyāmṛtabhujām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te ca ete divasāḥ prāptāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭu-kokila-kūjitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā ca yātra īyam āyātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramya-a-mṛta-bhujām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iṣyate yadi ca draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha gandharvadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmadādiparīvārais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ sā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iṣyate yadi ca draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha gandharvadattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmad-ādi-parīvārais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ sā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhinīya tato rātriṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prātaḥ pravahaṇāśritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirgacchāmi sma campāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pauranetrotpalārcitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhinīya tato rātriṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prātaḥ pravahaṇa-āśritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirgacchāmi sma campāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paura-netra-utpala-arcitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cakṣurmanoharārāma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cchāyām adhyāsitaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pakkaṇaṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājarājapurojjvalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cakṣur-mano-hara-ārāma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cchāyām adhyāsitaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pakkaṇaṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāja-rāja-pura-ujjvalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya madhye ca mātaṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandhamātaṅgadhīratam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālam apy ujjvalāyāmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghanāghanam ivāmbudam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya madhye ca mātaṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandha-mātaṅga-dhīratam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālam apy ujjvala-āyāmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghana-a-ghanam iva ambu-dam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kālindīnīlakālīṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddhāṃ piṅgaśiroruhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīptasaudāmanīcakrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāvṛṣeṇyām iva kṣapām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kālindī-nīla-kālīṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddhāṃ piṅga-śiro-ruhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīpta-saudāmanī-cakrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāvṛṣeṇyām iva kṣapām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dolālilāvilolā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatrādṛśyata kanyakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīlanīrajamāleva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>komalānilalāsitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dolā-lilā-vilolā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra adṛśyata kanyakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīla-nīraja-māla īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>komala-anila-lāsitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi me kālikā bhavet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyam eva tatas tanvī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣiptakuṅkumagauratā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi me kālikā bhavet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyam eva tatas tanvī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣipta-kuṅkuma-gauratā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthānāc cācalitaivāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭyā māṃ dūram anvagāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālayeva palāśānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṃśumantaṃ suvarcalā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthānāc ca acalita aiva asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭyā māṃ dūram anvagāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālaya īva palāśānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṃśumantaṃ suvarcalā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ cāliṅgitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭyā dūrībhavann api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nitāntasnigdhayā prācīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhayeva divākaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ cā aliṅgitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭyā dūrī-bhavann api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nitānta-snigdhayā prācīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhaya īva divākaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snigdhe dṛṣṭī visarjyeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūtikāpratidūtike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā mama mayā tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nītāḥ prāṇā vidheyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>snigdhe dṛṣṭī- visarjya iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūtikā-pratidūtike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā mama mayā tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nītāḥ prāṇā- vidheyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athārāmān abhikrudhyann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvayor vyavadhāyakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātaṅgīṃ manasāgacchaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīreṇa mahāsaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā arāmān abhikrudhyann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvayor vyavadhāyakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātaṅgīṃ manasā āgacchaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīreṇa mahā-saraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca yātrotsavaś citro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayānyāhitacetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatrasthenaiva no dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃsāra iva yoginā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca yātrā-utsavaś citro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya ānya-āhita-cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra-sthena eva na u dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃsāra iva yoginā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha yātrotsave tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pītveva madhu bhāskaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandamandaparispandas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmramaṇḍalatām ayāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha yātrā-utsave tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pītva īva madhu bhāskaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manda-manda-parispandas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmra-maṇḍalatām ayāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd yathā devaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prācīṃ kamalinīpriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aprasādyaiva tāṃ bhānuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīcim upasarpati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd yathā devaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prācīṃ kamalinī-priyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-prasādya eva tāṃ bhānuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīcim upasarpati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā gandharvadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pura evānuvarṇya tām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātaṅgīm anusarpāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā rājā tathā prajāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā gandharvadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pura eva anuvarṇya tām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātaṅgīm anusarpāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā rājā tathā prajāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā mānuṣair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ panthāḥ kāmibhir gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam evānugamiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na devacaritaṃ caret ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā mānuṣair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ panthāḥ kāmibhir gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam eva anugamiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na deva-caritaṃ caret ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sānudāsam athāvocaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bharadvājātmajā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvam eva sayānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nagarīm abhinīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sānudāsam atha avocaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bharadvāja-ātma-jā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvam eva sa-yānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nagarīm abhinīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścāj janasamūhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchantyāḥ pathi pāṃsavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parādhūsarayanty asyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sotpalāmalakāvalīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paścāj jana-samūhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchantyāḥ pathi pāṃsavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parādhūsarayanty asyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-utpala-āmalaka-āvalīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śobhāṃ yātrikalokasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyan praviśataḥ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>purastād aham āyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha nāgarakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śobhāṃ yātrika-lokasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyan praviśataḥ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>purastād aham āyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha nāgarakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharvadattāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛttāyāṃ puraṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dārike dve parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanditvā mām avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha gandharvadattāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛttāyāṃ puraṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dārike dve parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanditvā mām avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āvām ājñāpite devyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāminaṃ nirvinodanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vinodayatam ālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuvām aparuṣair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āvām ājñāpite devyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāminaṃ nirvinodanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vinodayatam ālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuvām a-paruṣair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas te madayitvāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>toṣayitvā ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭuvegena yānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pakkaṇāntikam āgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas te madayitva āhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>toṣayitvā ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭu-vegena yānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pakkaṇa-antikam āgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāpi tatraiva dolāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthitā mātaṅgasundarī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gacchantam iva nirvyājam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgacchantaṃ samaikṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa āpi tatra eva dolāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthitā mātaṅga-sundarī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gacchantam iva nirvyājam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgacchantaṃ samaikṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśrabdham atha tāṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śanair yānam acodayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatas tad api saṃprāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>javena kulaṭādvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśrabdham atha tāṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śanair yānam acodayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatas tad api saṃprāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>javena kulaṭā-dvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama yal loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasiddham abhidhīyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreyāṃsi bahuvighnāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantīti tathaiva tat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama yal loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasiddham abhidhīyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreyāṃsi bahu-vighnāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavanti iti tatha aiva tat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥkhena ca gṛhaṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūnyaḥ saṃmānya ca priyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidrām abhilaṣāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅgīsaṃgamāśayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥkhena ca gṛhaṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūnyaḥ saṃmānya ca priyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidrām abhilaṣāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātaṅgī-saṃgama-āśayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ardharātre tu sahasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratibuddhā muneḥ sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayukte mayi ye dāsyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te pānīyam ayācata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ardha-rātre tu sahasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratibuddhā muneḥ sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayukte mayi ye dāsyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te pānīyam ayācata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhautapramṛṣṭavadanā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāditānanabhūṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upaveśya puro 'kleśair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apṛcchad bandhakīdvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhauta-pramṛṣṭa-vadanā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svādita-ānana-bhūṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upaveśya puro 'kleśair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apṛcchad bandhakī-dvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aryaputreṇa mātaṅgī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā vā lolanetrayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭo 'yaṃ taraleneti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatas tābhyāṃ niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arya-putreṇa mātaṅgī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā vā lola-netrayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭo 'yaṃ taralena iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatas tābhyāṃ niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tathā sāryaputreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prekṣitā jīrṇakanyakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>netrābhyām animeṣābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aryaputras tayā yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tathā sa ārya-putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prekṣitā jīrṇa-kanyakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>netrābhyām a-nimeṣābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arya-putras tayā yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prāk pratibuddhaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apṛcchat suprabhāsutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāgratha svapithety uccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāgramīti mayoditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prāk pratibuddhaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apṛcchat suprabhā-sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāgratha svapitha ity uccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāgrami iti maya ūditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktam ayam ārambho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmākaṃ dṛśyate yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā nalinikāṃ nūnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartum icchasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktam ayam ārambho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmākaṃ dṛśyate yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā nalinikāṃ nūnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartum icchasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvāsau nalinikā kā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasya veti mayodite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bharadvājasutākhyātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upākrāmata vṛttakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva asau nalinikā kā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasya va īti maya ūdite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bharadvāja-sutā ākhyātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upākrāmata vṛttakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti paścāt samudrānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svācāradhanavatprajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nagaraṃ kānanadvīpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahendranagaropamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti paścāt samudra-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sv-ācāra-dhanavat-prajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nagaraṃ kānanadvīpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-indra-nagara-upamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amahendraguṇas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manujendraḥ prajāpriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putro manoharas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃjñāyāpi manoharaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-mahā-indra-guṇas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manu-ja-indraḥ prajā-priyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putro mano-haras tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃjñāya api manoharaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viditāśeṣavedyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandhaśāstrapriyo 'dhikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nānāruciṣu sattveṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasyacit kiṃcid īpsitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidita-a-śeṣa-vedyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandha-śāstra-priyo 'dhikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nānā-ruciṣu sattveṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasya-cit kiṃ-cid īpsitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suhṛdau bakulāśokau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasantasyeva tasya yau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasantam iva taṃ premṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kadācid amuñcatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suhṛdau bakula-aśokau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasantasya iva tasya yau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasantam iva taṃ premṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kadā-cid amuñcatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācid dvārapālena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vanditvā rājasūnave</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kumārāvasathasthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samitrāya niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cid dvāra-pālena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vanditvā rāja-sūnave</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kumāra-avasatha-sthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-mitrāya niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmān sumaṅgalo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhagandhānuśāsanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agrāmyo dhīravacanaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasmād api didṛkṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmān sumaṅgalo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddha-gandha-anuśāsanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-grāmyo dhīra-vacanaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasmād api didṛkṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaccha praveśayety uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvārapālaṃ manoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vilepanam upādatta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhūpaṃ ca tvarito 'dahat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaccha praveśaya ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvāra-pālaṃ manoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vilepanam upādatta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhūpaṃ ca tvarito 'dahat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sumaṅgalo 'py anujñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviśya dvāradeśataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiro nipīḍya pāṇibhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkocyāṅgam apāsarat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sumaṅgalo 'py anujñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviśya dvāra-deśataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiro nipīḍya pāṇibhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkocya aṅgam apāsarat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena mama dhūpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandhamālyavivādinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āghrātena śiraḥśūlam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpannam iti cāvadat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena mama dhūpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandha-mālya-vivādinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āghrātena śiraḥ-śūlam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpannam iti ca avadat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākṛṣṭe sthagikāyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasyāḥ phalakasaṃpuṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manoharaṃ muhuḥ paśyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayaṃ dhūpam ayojayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākṛṣṭe sthagikāyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasyāḥ phalaka-saṃpuṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manoharaṃ muhuḥ paśyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayaṃ dhūpam ayojayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṛtanamaskāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa manoharam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sumanogandhasaṃvādī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhūpo 'yaṃ dāhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṛta-namas-kāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa manoharam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-mano-gandha-saṃvādī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhūpo 'yaṃ dāhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sabakulāśokas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmin gandhe manoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratīto gandhaśāstrajñaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sumaṅgalam apūjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa-bakula-aśokas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmin gandhe manoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratīto gandha-śāstra-jñaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sumaṅgalam apūjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca kṛtasatkāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājaputraṃ sumaṅgalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dinais tricaturair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturaḥ paryatoṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca kṛta-sat-kāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja-putraṃ sumaṅgalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dinais tri-caturair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturaḥ paryatoṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā bakulāśoka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumaṅgalapuraḥsaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manoharām agād draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣasattrāṃ manoharaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā bakula-aśoka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumaṅgala-puraḥ-saraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mano-harām agād draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣa-sattrāṃ mano-haraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra tatra tatas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyatā tat tad adbhutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣīpratikṛtir dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinyastā citrakarmaṇi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra tatra tatas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyatā tat tad adbhutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣī-pratikṛtir dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinyastā citra-karmaṇi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirjīvāpi sphurantīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūkāpi mṛduvāg iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citre nyastāpi sā tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citte nyastātirāgiṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nir-jīva āpi sphuranti īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūka āpi mṛdu-vāg iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citre nyasta āpi sā tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citte nyasta āti-rāgiṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>draṣṭavyaṃ cānyad ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇaṃ cittacakṣuṣām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sumanogandhadhūpādyais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām evaikām asevata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>draṣṭavyaṃ ca anyad ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramaṇaṃ citta-cakṣuṣām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-mano-gandha-dhūpa-ādyais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām eva ekām asevata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>balavanmanmathāpāsta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhogyābhogyavicāraṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nitambād ambaraṃ tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kilākraṣṭum aihata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>balavan-manmatha-apāsta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhogya-a-bhogya-vicāraṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nitambād ambaraṃ tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kilā akraṣṭum aihata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citrabhittim atha tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāpi padmeva padminīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣṇor vakṣa iva śyāmam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asevata nabhastalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citra-bhittim atha tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa āpi padma īva padminīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣṇor vakṣa iva śyāmam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asevata nabhas-talam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uvāca rājaputraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāmnāhaṃ sukumārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣī yakṣapateḥ śāpāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptālekhyaśarīratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uvāca rāja-putraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāmna āhaṃ sukumārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yakṣī yakṣa-pateḥ śāpāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpta-ālekhya-śarīratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena kṣaṇikaroṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nārīṣu ca dayālunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāpāntam arthitenāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti nidhyāya dhīritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena kṣaṇika-roṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nārīṣu ca dayālunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāpa-antam arthitena aham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti nidhyāya dhīritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citranyastatanuṃ yas tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manuṣyo 'bhibhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa eva kṛtaśāpāntas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tava bhartā bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citra-nyasta-tanuṃ yas tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manuṣyo 'bhibhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa eva kṛta-śāpa-antas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tava bhartā bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tvaṃ rājarājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartā me pratipāditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadṛśo varadānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāpo 'pi hi mahātmanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tvaṃ rāja-rājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartā me pratipāditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadṛśo vara-dānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāpo 'pi hi mahā-ātmanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi te 'sti mayi prītis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ krīḍatsurāsuram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śailaṃ śrīkuñjanāmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣāvāsaṃ vrajer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi te 'sti mayi prītis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ krīḍat-sura-asuram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śailaṃ śrīkuñja-nāmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣa-āvāsaṃ vrajer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāntardhiṃ gatā yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāmohaṃ manoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ cālokya tathāvasthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣādaṃ bakulādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha antar-dhiṃ gatā yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-mohaṃ manoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ cā alokya tathā-avasthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣādaṃ bakula-ādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>labdhasaṃjñaś ca tair uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutvā yakṣīkathām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alam ākulatāṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sulabhā sukumārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>labdha-saṃjñaś ca tair uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutvā yakṣī-kathām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alam ākulatāṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-labhā su-kumārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yady asau durgamaḥ śailas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatas taṃ sukumārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmatsaṃbhogam icchantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tathā kathayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yady asau dur-gamaḥ śailas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatas taṃ su-kumārikā</seg> </l>
