<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmat-saṃbhogam icchantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tathā kathayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa gataḥ sasuhṛdgaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddhayātraṃ parāvṛttam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyat potavāṇijam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa gataḥ sa-suhṛd-gaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddha-yātraṃ parāvṛttam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyat pota-vāṇijam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājño dattamahāratnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa rājñā kṛtasatkriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭas tena bhavān kiṃ kim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āścaryaṃ dṛṣṭavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājño datta-mahā-ratnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa rājñā kṛta-sat-kriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭas tena bhavān kiṃ kim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āścaryaṃ dṛṣṭavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam ambudhes tīre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devena vasatā satā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ nāma nāścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āścaryanidhir ambudhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam ambu-dhes tīre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devena vasatā satā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ nāma nā aścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āścarya-nidhir ambu-dhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tv ekadāham adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hṛtapoto nabhasvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāndrahemaprabhāpiṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṅgaśṛṅgasrajaṃ nagam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tv ekada āham adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hṛta-poto nabhasvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāndra-hema-prabhā-piṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṅga-śṛṅga-srajaṃ nagam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā niryāmako 'vadat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛddhair eṣa samākhyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrīkuñjaḥ śṛṅgavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā niryāmako 'vadat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛddhair eṣa samākhyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrīkuñjaḥ śṛṅgavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi nivedyāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāṇijaḥ svagṛhān agāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājaputro 'pi rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>natvā vāṇijam anvagāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi nivedya asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāṇijaḥ sva-gṛhān agāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-putro 'pi rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>natvā vāṇijam anvagāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradadāv atha sarvasvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmai trāsena vāṇijaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājaputrād gṛhaprāptād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āḍhyaḥ ko nāma na traset ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradadāv atha sarva-svaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmai trāsena vāṇijaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-putrād gṛha-prāptād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āḍhyaḥ ko nāma na traset ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenāpi sumanomālā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātram ālabhya bhāṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na satkārakhalīkāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arhanti śiśavo guroḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena api su-mano-mālā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātram ālabhya bhāṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na sat-kāra-khalī-kāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arhanti śiśavo guroḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu yas tātapādebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrīkuñjaḥ kathitas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kutūhaline mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>spaṣṭam ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu yas tāta-pādebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrīkuñjaḥ kathitas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kutūhaline mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>spaṣṭam ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyāśvastas tatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacobhir madhurair asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrīkuñjaṃ sahitaṃ cihnair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity ākhyātuṃ pracakrame ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyāśvastas tatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacobhir madhurair asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrīkuñjaṃ sahitaṃ cihnair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity ākhyātuṃ pracakrame ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athaikadā madeneva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāvyālo mataṅgajaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>marutā tyājitasthairyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātaḥ potaḥ svatantratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ekadā madena iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-vyālo mataṅga-jaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>marutā tyājita-sthairyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātaḥ potaḥ sva-tantratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśāntotpātavātatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāgare cāmbarasthire</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citrākārān apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇino jalacāriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśānta-utpāta-vātatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāgare ca ambara-sthire</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citra-ākārān apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇino jala-cāriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvacit kesariśārdūla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvīpikhaḍgarkṣaśambarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūthaśaḥ prastutakrīḍān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>unmajjananimajjanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva-cit kesari-śārdūla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvīpi-khaḍga-rkṣa-śambarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūthaśaḥ prastuta-krīḍān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>unmajjana-nimajjanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyatrāviddhakarṇānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>strīpuṃsānām avāsasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhvanimātrakabhāṣāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvaṃdvāni paśudharmaṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyatrā aviddha-karṇānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>strī-puṃsānām a-vāsasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhvani-mātraka-bhāṣāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvaṃdvāni paśu-dharmaṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvacid utpatatas tuṅgān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāgān āyatapakṣatīn</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pakṣacchedabhayālīnān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nagān iva mahārṇavāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva-cid utpatatas tuṅgān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāgān āyata-pakṣatīn</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pakṣa-ccheda-bhaya-ālīnān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nagān iva maha-arṇavāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avāc ca sahasā modaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kauveryāḥ pavanāhṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyāghrāṇāya saṃpannaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manye ghrāṇam ayaṃ jagat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avāc ca sahasā modaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kauveryāḥ pavana-āhṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyā aghrāṇāya saṃpannaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manye ghrāṇam ayaṃ jagat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>drakṣyantaḥ saṃbhavaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakutūhaladṛṣṭayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūrād girim apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratnakūṭasthakiṃnaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>drakṣyantaḥ saṃbhavaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-kutūhala-dṛṣṭayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūrād girim apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratna-kūṭa-stha-kiṃnaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti prṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā niryāmako 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛddhair eṣa samākhyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrīkuñjaḥ śṛṅgavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti prṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā niryāmako 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛddhair eṣa samākhyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrīkuñjaḥ śṛṅgavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi kathitaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yat tat tan manoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahasāgaradigdeśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>spaṣṭaṃ saṃpuṭake 'likhat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi kathitaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yat tat tan manoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha-sāgara-dig-deśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>spaṣṭaṃ saṃpuṭake 'likhat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgamayya tataḥ potam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āptaniryāmakāsthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bakulādisahāyo 'sāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agāhata mahārṇavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgamayya tataḥ potam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āpta-niryāmaka-āsthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bakula-ādi-sahāyo 'sāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agāhata mahā-arṇavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anukūlamahāvega</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>samīrapreritena saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīdad acireṇaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>potena diśam īpsitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anukūla-mahā-vega</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>samīra-preritena saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīdad a-cireṇa eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>potena diśam īpsitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadṛśaiḥ sphalakasthānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cihnair janitaniścayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manaścakṣuḥśarīraiḥ saḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrīkuñjaṃ yugapad gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadṛśaiḥ sphalaka-sthānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cihnair janita-niścayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manaś-cakṣuḥ-śarīraiḥ saḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrīkuñjaṃ yugapad gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ambhodhijalakallola</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhautanīlopalaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāśāśaviśāloccaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>potaḥ sopānam āsadat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ambhodhi-jala-kallola</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhauta-nīla-upalaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāśa-āśa-viśāla-uccaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>potaḥ sopānam āsadat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatraiva suhṛdas tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad utkaṇṭho manoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena śailāgram ārohad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmeneva tripiṣṭapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra eva suhṛdas tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad utkaṇṭho manoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena śaila-agram ārohad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmena iva tripiṣṭapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣastrīpuṃsavṛndaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prekṣyamāṇaḥ sasaṃmadaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkalpacakṣuṣā paśyann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchat sukumārikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yakṣa-strī-puṃsa-vṛndaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prekṣyamāṇaḥ sa-saṃmadaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkalpa-cakṣuṣā paśyann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchat sukumārikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra kāścid abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtārthā sukumārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayāsminn āhitaṃ prema</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>narāmarakumārake ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra kāś-cid abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛta-arthā sukumārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaya āsminn āhitaṃ prema</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nara-amara-kumārake ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>surāsuranarāṇāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasyāyaṃ na manoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo vṛtaḥ sahajāhāryaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīrādiguṇair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sura-asura-narāṇāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasya ayaṃ na mano-haraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo vṛtaḥ saha-ja-a-hāryaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīra-ādi-guṇair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakrīḍantīm athāpaśyad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśāle mandirājire</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sve saṃkalpamaye yakṣīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vakṣasīva manoharaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakrīḍantīm atha apaśyad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśāle mandira-ajire</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sve saṃkalpa-maye yakṣīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vakṣasi iva manoharaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyudgamya tayā cāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpājīvāpragalbhayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svinnakaṇṭakite pāṇau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhītvāntaḥ praveśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyudgamya tayā ca asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpa-ājīvā-pragalbhayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svinna-kaṇṭakite pāṇau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhītva āntaḥ praveśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ pitaram adrākṣīt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatrārabdhadurodaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raktākṣaṃ śātakaumbhābhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samadaṃ medurodaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ pitaram adrākṣīt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatrā arabdha-durodaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakta-akṣaṃ śātakaumbha-abhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-madaṃ medura-udaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upaveśya ca tenāṅke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghrātvā mūrdhni mahoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśrūḥ paśyety anujñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviveśāvarodhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upaveśya ca tena aṅke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghrātvā mūrdhni mahoharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśrūḥ paśya ity anujñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviveśa avarodhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra saṃpūrṇatāruṇyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇikārasragujjvalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśrūśvaśurayos tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitāmahyo 'pi yoṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra saṃpūrṇa-tāruṇyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇikāra-srag-ujjvalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśrū-śvaśurayos tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitāmahyo 'pi yoṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhivādya ca tās tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa tābhir abhinanditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñātaś ca sasnehaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśat kanyakāgṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhivādya ca tās tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa tābhir abhinanditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñātaś ca sa-snehaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśat kanyakā-gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divyasya madhunaḥ pānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyatantrīrutiśrutiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divyastrīsaṃprayogāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manoharamano 'haran ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divyasya madhunaḥ pānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divya-tantrī-ruti-śrutiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divya-strī-saṃprayogāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manohara-mano 'haran ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity asau kṣaṇam āsīnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukumārikayoditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atītā divasāḥ pañca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumāra pratigamyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity asau kṣaṇam āsīnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukumārikaya ūditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atītā- divasāḥ pañca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumāra pratigamyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devalokaikadeśo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat tato 'smin na labhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthātuṃ mānuṣamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcamād divasāt param ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deva-loka-eka-deśo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat tato 'smin na labhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthātuṃ mānuṣa-mātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcamād divasāt param ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavantaṃ ca parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaccheyuḥ potavāhakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vahanasvāminaṃ pañca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīkṣante dināni te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavantaṃ ca parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaccheyuḥ pota-vāhakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vahana-svāminaṃ pañca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīkṣante dināni te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.126'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutvedaṃ rājaputrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devaputrasya yādṛśī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svargataś cyavamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhyāmadhyāmābhavat prabhā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.126'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutva īdaṃ rāja-putrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deva-putrasya yādṛśī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svargataś cyavamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhyāma-dhyāma ābhavat prabhā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.127'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśākāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocat sukumārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adyārabhya gamiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tavaivāhaṃ gṛhān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.127'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśa-ākāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocat sukumārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adyā arabhya gamiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tava eva ahaṃ gṛhān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.128'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tayā dhīrito gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potam udvignavāhakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatraiva suhṛdo 'paśyad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divyaratnāmbarasrajaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.128'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tayā dhīrito gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potam udvigna-vāhakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra eva suhṛdo 'paśyad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divya-ratna-ambara-srajaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.129'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthitāḥ stha divasān etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva kathaṃ veti coditāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena te kathayanti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā yūyaṃ tathā vayaṃ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.129'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthitāḥ stha divasān etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva kathaṃ va īti coditāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena te kathayanti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā yūyaṃ tathā vayaṃ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.130'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukumārikayādiṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prahṛṣṭā guhyakāṅganāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmān upacaranti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>surān iva surāṅganāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.130'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukumārikayā ādiṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prahṛṣṭā- guhyaka-aṅganāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmān upacaranti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>surān iva sura-aṅganāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.131'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādevam upāsīnā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛtā gacchanti mānuṣāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sevamānā vayaṃ devaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devatām amṛtā gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.131'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahā-devam upāsīnā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛtā- gacchanti mānuṣāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sevamānā- vayaṃ devaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devatām a-mṛtā- gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.132'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti yakṣīkathāraktā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahādhvānaṃ mahābhayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāsām evānubhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃterus te mahodadhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.132'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti yakṣī-kathā-raktā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-adhvānaṃ mahā-bhayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāsām eva anubhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃterus te mahā-udadhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.133'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyāpārair ujjhitaṃ sarvais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trivargaprāptihetubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāviśaṃs tadviyogārtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūnyarājapathaṃ puram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.133'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyāpārair ujjhitaṃ sarvais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tri-varga-prāpti-hetubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāviśaṃs tad-viyoga-ārtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūnya-rāja-pathaṃ puram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.134'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athaikā brāhmaṇī vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim artham api nirgatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avaguṣṭhitamūrdhānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyati sma manoharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.134'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ekā brāhmaṇī vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim artham api nirgatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avaguṣṭhita-mūrdhānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyati sma manoharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.135'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam asau pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paritoṣaskhaladgatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā dhyānaparāsthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahīpālam atoṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.135'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam asau pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paritoṣa-skhalad-gatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatvā dhyāna-para-āsthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahī-pālam atoṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.136'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantriprabhṛtayas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāritāḥ puravāsinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā vocad dārakaṃ kaścit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva gato 'bhūd bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.136'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantri-prabhṛtayas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāritāḥ pura-vāsinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā vocad dārakaṃ kaś-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva gato 'bhūd bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.137'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājaputro 'pi rājānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avandata vilakṣakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'pi tasyāṅkam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>harati sma vilakṣatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.137'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāja-putro 'pi rājānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avandata vilakṣakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'pi tasya aṅkam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>harati sma vilakṣatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.138'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svaṃ ca mandiram āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa sumaṅgalam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandhaśāstraphalaṃ sāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhūpam āyojyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.138'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svaṃ ca mandiram āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa sumaṅgalam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandha-śāstra-phalaṃ sāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhūpam āyojyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.139'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adyāgacchati yuṣmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakhībhiḥ sahitā sakhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sugandhitāpradhānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratam āhur aninditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.139'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adyā agacchati yuṣmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakhībhiḥ sahitā sakhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-gandhita-a-pradhānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ratam āhur a-ninditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.140'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandharājaś ca yo 'smākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghuṣyate yakṣakardamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kardamasamas tāsām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ato 'sau yakṣakardamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.140'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandha-rājaś ca yo 'smākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghuṣyate yakṣa-kardamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kardama-samas tāsām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ato 'sau yakṣa-kardamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.141'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād ādaram āsthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstram adya prakāśyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanurvedasya kṛtsnasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viddhasāraṃ hi sauṣṭhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.141'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād ādaram āsthāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstram adya prakāśyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanur-vedasya kṛtsnasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viddha-sāraṃ hi sauṣṭhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.142'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti protsāhitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svārthena ca sumaṅgalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūpasnānīyagandhādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathādeśam ayojayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.142'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti protsāhitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-arthena ca sumaṅgalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūpa-snānīya-gandha-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā-deśam ayojayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.143'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manoharas tu sasuhṛt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtakāmukaḍambaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsannadayitāśūnyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhaśayyām asevata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.143'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manoharas tu sa-suhṛt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛta-kāmuka-ḍambaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsanna-dayitā-śūnyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkha-śayyām asevata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.144'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa tādṛśo gandhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathāyatnena sādhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>preritaḥ paṭunānyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samīreṇeva toyadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.144'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa tādṛśo gandhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā-yatnena sādhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>preritaḥ paṭuna ānyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samīreṇa iva toya-daḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.145'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāsā vicchāyayantīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candrakāntādicandrikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśya sahasāchyāsta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paryaṅkaṃ sukumārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.145'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāsā vicchāyayanti īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candra-kānta-ādi-candrikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśya sahasa āchyāsta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paryaṅkaṃ sukumārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.146'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sasmitam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bakulādīn uvāca sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sasahāyāham āyātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāta viśramyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.146'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa-smitam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bakula-ādīn uvāca sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-sahāya āham āyātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāta viśramyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.147'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praṇamya teṣu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumārasukumārike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā tathāvidhotkaṇṭhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathāgamayatāṃ niśām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.147'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praṇamya teṣu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumāra-sukumārike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā tathā-vidhā-utkaṇṭhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā-gamayatāṃ niśām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.148'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃbhogaramaṇīyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarīrair bakulādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhāte rājaputrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rātrivṛttaṃ nyavedayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.148'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃbhoga-ramaṇīyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarīrair bakula-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhāte rāja-putrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rātri-vṛttaṃ nyavedayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.149'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rātrau rātrau sametānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viyuktānāṃ divā divā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti saṃvatsaro yātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tābhis teṣām acetitatḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.149'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rātrau rātrau sametānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viyuktānāṃ divā divā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti saṃvatsaro yātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tābhis teṣām a-cetitatḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.150'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā syandamānāśruḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sākrandā sā tam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svādhīnānāṃ parādhīnaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha saṃgatir īdṛśī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.150'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā syandamāna-aśruḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-ākrandā sā tam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-adhīnānāṃ para-adhīnaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha saṃgatir īdṛśī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.151'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adyārabhya mayā devaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sevitavyo dhaneśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakhīsahitayā varṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhītabrahmacaryayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.151'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adyā arabhya mayā devaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sevitavyo dhana-īśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakhī-sahitayā varṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhīta-brahma-caryayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.152'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitarau vandituṃ cāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṣṭamyādiṣu parvasu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svagṛhāya gamiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra gacched bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.152'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pitarau vandituṃ ca aham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṣṭamy--ādiṣu parvasu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-gṛhāya gamiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra gacched bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.153'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvatsaṅgasubhagā yā dik</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām api prekṣya jīvyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ninditāmṛtapānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punar darśanena te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.153'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvat-saṅga-subhagā yā dik</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām api prekṣya jīvyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nindita-amṛta-pānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punar darśanena te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.154'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām uktveti yātāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyātā bakulādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khaṃ paśyantam apaśyaṃs tam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iyaṃ yātīti vādinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.154'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām uktva īti yātāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyātā- bakula-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>khaṃ paśyantam apaśyaṃs tam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iyaṃ yāti iti vādinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.155'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sabakulāśoke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saśoke pārthivātmaje</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>toṣagadgadavāg uccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhāṣata sumaṅgalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.155'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa-bakula-aśoke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-śoke pārthiva-ātma-je</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>toṣa-gadgada-vāg uccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhāṣata sumaṅgalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.156'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim astāne viṣādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potam āruhya māmakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭamārgā muhūrtena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāmas taṃ guhyakācalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.156'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim a-stāne viṣādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potam āruhya māmakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭa-mārgā- muhūrtena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāmas taṃ guhyaka-a-calam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.157'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhyāyantas tatra tāḥ kāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyantaś cāntarāntarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃgamāśādhanaprāṇā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāpayāma samām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.157'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhyāyantas tatra tāḥ kāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyantaś ca antara āntarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃgama-āśā-dhana-prāṇā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāpayāma samām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.158'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa tena potena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthitaś ca mahārṇavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca potaḥ samīreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūraṃ hṛtvā vipāditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.158'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa tena potena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthitaś ca mahā-arṇavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca potaḥ samīreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūraṃ hṛtvā vipāditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.159'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājaputras tu dayitāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddhāṃ vidyām iva smaran</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāṃ na cetitavān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipattiṃ māradāruṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.159'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāja-putras tu dayitāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddhāṃ vidyām iva smaran</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāṃ na cetitavān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipattiṃ māra-dāruṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.160'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttīrṇasyaiva jaladher</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>velārodhāsi sarpataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caurasainyena saṃyamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyālaṃkaraṇaṃ hṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.160'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttīrṇasya eva jala-dher</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>velā-rodhāsi sarpataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caura-sainyena saṃyamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya alaṃ-karaṇaṃ hṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.161'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taskarasainyaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vājisainyena sarvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veṣṭitaṃ kuṭṭitaṃ baddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udbaddhaṃ pādapeṣu ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.161'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taskara-sainyaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāji-sainyena sarvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veṣṭitaṃ kuṭṭitaṃ baddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udbaddhaṃ pāda-peṣu ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.162'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekaś cārutarākāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣaḥ praṇipatya tam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kariṇīpṛṣṭham āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sasainyaḥ prasthitaḥ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.162'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekaś cārutara-ākāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣaḥ praṇipatya tam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kariṇī-pṛṣṭham āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-sainyaḥ prasthitaḥ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.163'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adūraṃ cāntaraṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandistutiguṇānvayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manoharaḥ puraṃ prāpat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṅkumāliptacatvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.163'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-dūraṃ ca antaraṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandi-stuti-guṇa-anvayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manoharaḥ puraṃ prāpat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṅkuma-ālipta-catvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.164'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ratnavandanamālānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa śṛṇvan paṭuśiñjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchat kalarāsānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nānāpattrisrajām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.164'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ratna-vandana-mālānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa śṛṇvan paṭu-śiñjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchat kala-rāsānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nānā-pattri-srajām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.165'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>purānurūpaśobhaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāviśat sa nṛpālayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśālamaṇḍapāsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śakrākāraṃ narādhipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.165'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pura-anurūpa-śobhaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāviśat sa nṛ-pa-ālayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśāla-maṇḍapa-āsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śakra-ākāraṃ nara-adhipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.166'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīrya ca hastinyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa rājānam avandata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍham āliṅgya tenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ prītyā nirūpitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.166'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīrya ca hastinyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa rājānam avandata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍham āliṅgya tena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ prītyā nirūpitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.167'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīrāvayavān dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhus tasyāvadat tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kutaḥ sumaṅgalād anyaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakṣuṣmān iti bhūpatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.167'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīra-avayavān dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muhus tasya avadat tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kutaḥ sumaṅgalād anyaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakṣuṣmān iti bhū-patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.168'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca rājaputrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa evāyaṃ sumaṅgalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaved aham iva bhraṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>potabhaṅgabhayād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.168'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca rāja-putrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa eva ayaṃ sumaṅgalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhaved aham iva bhraṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pota-bhaṅga-bhayād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.169'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaccha viśramya tāteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājñoktaḥ prāviśat puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyan natamūrdhānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa tam eva sumaṅgalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.169'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaccha viśramya tāta iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājña ūktaḥ prāviśat puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyan nata-mūrdhānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa tam eva sumaṅgalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.170'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛcchati sma ca taṃ bhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mitre prāṇasame tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhujau me bakulāśokau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaccit kuśalināv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.170'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛcchati sma ca taṃ bhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mitre prāṇa-same tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhujau me bakula-aśokau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kac-cit kuśalināv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.171'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ bakulāśokau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhān kuśalinau gatau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā cāham ihāyātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathāśrotuṃ prasīdata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.171'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ bakula-aśokau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhān kuśalinau gatau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā ca aham ihā ayātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā āśrotuṃ prasīdata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.172'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaruktaguṇākhyānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etat nāgapuraṃ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭam eva hi yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛpaś caiṣa puraṃdaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.172'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punar-ukta-guṇa-ākhyānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etat nāgapuraṃ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭam eva hi yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛ-paś ca eṣa puraṃdaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.173'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jayanta iti putro 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūraḥ cāruḥ kaviḥ paṭuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa yena yūyam ānītāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāgaropāntakānanāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.173'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jayanta iti putro 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūraḥ cāruḥ kaviḥ paṭuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa yena yūyam ānītāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāgara-upānta-kānanāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.174'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sutā nalinikā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛpates tasya tādṛśī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyā na pramadāloke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na cāsti sadṛśo varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.174'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sutā nalinikā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛ-pates tasya tādṛśī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyā- na pramadā-loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ca asti sadṛśo varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.175'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varaṃ varayatā tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitrā dvīpāntarāṇy api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇarūpāntarajñāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śālinaḥ prahitā hatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.175'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varaṃ varayatā tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitrā dvīpa-antarāṇy api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇa-rūpa-antara-jñāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>śālinaḥ prahitā- hatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.176'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena ca prapañcena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadā kālo bahurgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā mām ayam āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadainyasmitam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.176'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena ca prapañcena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadā kālo bahur-gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā mām ayam āhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-dainya-smitam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.177'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ na kevalam asmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvādhyakṣagaṇāgraṇīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nātho 'pi bhava nas tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkaṭād uddharann itaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.177'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ na kevalam asmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-adhyakṣa-gaṇa-agra-ṇīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nātho 'pi bhava nas tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkaṭād uddharann itaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.178'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kulaśīlavayorūpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ syād asyāḥ samo varaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādareṇa tam anviṣyes</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaja śrīmadirārujam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.178'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kula-śīla-vayo-rūpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ syād asyāḥ samo varaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādareṇa tam anviṣyes</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaja śrī-madira-a-rujam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.179'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūrisāradhanāḍhyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇadraviṇadurgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durgatebhyaḥ sudūreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śocanīyaḥ satām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.179'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūri-sāra-dhana-āḍhyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇa-draviṇa-dur-gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dur-gatebhyaḥ su-dūreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śocanīyaḥ satām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.180'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato nalinikārūpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālikhya phalake mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahī sāṣṭādaśadvīpā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parikrāntā varārthinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.180'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato nalinikā-rūpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālikhya phalake mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahī sa-aṣṭādaśa-dvīpā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parikrāntā vara-arthinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.181'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā tu paṭuyatno 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nālabhe varam īpsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā tyaktumanaḥ prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāvivikṣaṃ mahodadhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.181'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā tu paṭu-yatno 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nā alabhe varam īpsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā tyaktu-manaḥ prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāvivikṣaṃ mahā-udadhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.182'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gataś ca kānanadvīpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭavān asmi saṃcaran</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmadguṇakathāsaktāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtatāḥ sādhusaṃpadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.182'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gataś ca kānana-dvīpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭavān asmi saṃcaran</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmad-guṇa-kathā-āsaktāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtatāḥ sādhu-saṃpadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.183'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa me sthirādhairyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tādṛṅmaraṇaniścayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyotsnayeva tamorāśir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmatkīrtyā nirākṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.183'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa me sthira-a-dhairyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tādṛṅ-maraṇa-niścayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyotsnaya īva tamo-rāśir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmat-kīrtyā nirākṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.184'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandhaśāstravyasanino</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmān buddhvā ca lokataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmāpi gandhaśāstrajñas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā vaḥ śrāvito mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.184'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandha-śāstra-vyasanino</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmān buddhvā ca lokataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātma āpi gandha-śāstra-jñas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā vaḥ śrāvito mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.185'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tulyajñānasvabhāvā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṝṇām anujīvinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rañjayanti manaḥ kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇair api nirākṛtāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.185'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tulya-jñāna-sva-bhāvā- hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṝṇām anujīvinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rañjayanti manaḥ kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇair api nirākṛtāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.186'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandhamālyavisaṃvādī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhūpo yac cāpi dāhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdbhiḥ saha yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ jijñāsitas tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.186'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandha-mālya-visaṃvādī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhūpo yac ca api dāhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdbhiḥ saha yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ jijñāsitas tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.187'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca yojitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandhamālyānuvādinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūpaṃ tat phalake nyastām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ bhartṛdārikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.187'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca yojitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandha-mālya-anuvādinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūpaṃ tat phalake nyastām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ bhartṛ-dārikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.188'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām ālokya tato yuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manye 'haṃ dhanyajanmanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmano rājaputryāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidhātuś ca kṛtārthatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.188'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām ālokya tato yuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manye 'haṃ dhanya-janmanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmano rāja-putryāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidhātuś ca kṛta-arthatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.189'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ svārthaparo yuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apahartum ito gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvad yuṣmadguṇair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛtaḥ sādhumanoharaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.189'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ sva-artha-paro yuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apahartum ito gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvad yuṣmad-guṇair eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛtaḥ sādhu-mano-haraiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.190'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathāpi satkṛto yuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hartum evāham udyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāpam adhyācaranty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtyā bhartṛpriyepsavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.190'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatha āpi sat-kṛto yuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hartum eva aham udyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāpam adhyācaranty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtyā bhartṛ-priya-īpsavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.191'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṇyair nalinikāyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmatsaṃgamahetubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sevācārāpadeśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gataiva sukumārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.191'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puṇyair nalinikāyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmat-saṃgama-hetubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>seva-ācāra-apadeśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gata aiva sukumārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.192'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ cāntaram āsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā yūyaṃ tvarāvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃnidhāpitapotena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samudram avatāritāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.192'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ ca antaram āsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā yūyaṃ tvarāvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃnidhāpita-potena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samudram avatāritāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.193'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradeśe yatra cāmbhodhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipannaṃ vahanaṃ vahet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipannavahanas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ca kaścana vidyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.193'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradeśe yatra ca ambhodhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipannaṃ vahanaṃ vahet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipanna-vahanas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ca kaś-cana vidyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.194'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tau bakulāśokāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avipannau gṛhān gatau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ ca puram āyātā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā yūyaṃ tathā vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.194'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tau bakula-aśokāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-vipannau gṛhān gatau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ ca puram āyātā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā yūyaṃ tathā vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.195'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān nalinikādyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhir anugamyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi śrīḥ svayam āyāntī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālātikramam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.195'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān nalinika ādya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhir anugamyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi śrīḥ svayam āyāntī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāla-atikramam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.196'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manoharas tu tāṃ prāpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvākāramanoharām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathākāmam upābhuṅkta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karī kamālinīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.196'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manoharas tu tāṃ prāpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-ākāra-mano-harām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā-kāmam upābhuṅkta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karī kamālinīm iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.197'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sumaṅgalena sā coktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā sma śethāḥ pṛthaṅniśi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patyus te dayitā yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maivaṃ naiṣīd asāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.197'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sumaṅgalena sā ca uktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā sma śethāḥ pṛthaṅ-niśi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patyus te dayitā yakṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ma aivaṃ naiṣīd asāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.198'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kupitā rājaputrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājaputrī kadācana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>unnidraiva sanidreva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suptā kila pṛthak kṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.198'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kupitā rāja-putrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja-putrī kadā-cana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>un-nidra aiva sa-nidra īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suptā kila pṛthak kṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.199'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sevāvadhau pūrṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṣānte sukumārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śayitaṃ pṛthag āsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manoharam apāharat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.199'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha seva-avadhau pūrṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṣa-ante sukumārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śayitaṃ pṛthag āsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manoharam apāharat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.200'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā nalinikābhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukumārikayā hṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmān api hared eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā mātaṅgakanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.200'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā nalinikā-bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukumārikayā hṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmān api hared eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā mātaṅga-kanyakā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.201'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manyadhve yādṛśīm enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyakā neyam īdṛśī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi caṇḍālakanyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rajyante devasūnavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.201'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manyadhve yādṛśīm enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyakā na iyam īdṛśī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi caṇḍāla-kanyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rajyante deva-sūnavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.202'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ nalinikāvṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>smṛtvā yūyaṃ mayoditāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na me nalinikāvārttā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>virasāntā bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.202'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ nalinikā-vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>smṛtvā yūyaṃ maya ūditāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na me nalinikā-vārttā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>virasa-antā bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.203'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ananyagatasaṃkalpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evaṃ māṃ mā sma kalpayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti jihmaṃ puras tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmukācāram ācaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.203'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-anya-gata-saṃkalpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evaṃ māṃ mā sma kalpayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti jihmaṃ puras tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmuka-ācāram ācaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_19.204'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandharvadattāvacanāt priyatvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātaṅgakanyā sutarām agān me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madaṃ vidhatte madirā prakṛtyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim aṅga kāntānanasaṅgaramyā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_19.204'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gandharvadattā-vacanāt priyatvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātaṅga-kanyā sutarām agān me</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madaṃ vidhatte madirā prakṛtyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim aṅga kānta-ānana-saṅga-ramyā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śeṣaṃ vasantasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanupāṭalakuṅmalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divasāṃś ca nayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>subhagānilacandanān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śeṣaṃ vasantasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanu-pāṭala-kuṅmalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divasāṃś ca nayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-bhaga-anila-candanān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā dattakenāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgatya hasatoditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aryaputra vicitraṃ vaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīḍāsthānam upāgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā dattakena aham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āgatya hasata ūditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arya-putra vicitraṃ vaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīḍā-sthānam upāgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājamārge mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddhā strī bhāsvaraprabhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāgarair devi devīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vandyamānā varārthibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāja-mārge mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddhā strī bhāsvara-prabhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāgarair devi devi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vandyamānā vara-arthibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā cāha prabhavantīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāraka pratigṛhyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava bhartre mayā dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyājinavatīti mām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā cā aha prabhavanti īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāraka pratigṛhyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava bhartre mayā dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanya ājinavati īti mām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktā sā ca mayā devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhṛtyatvāt paravān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā svāminam āyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat kṣaṇaṃ kṣamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktā sā ca mayā devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhṛtyatvāt paravān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā svāminam āyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat kṣaṇaṃ kṣamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mayoktas tayā sākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hasantaḥ sukham āsmahe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāgacchatu sātraiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madvacaś cedam ucyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa maya ūktas tayā sākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hasantaḥ sukham āsmahe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenā agacchatu sa ātra eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mad-vacaś ca idam ucyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahūn saṃpṛcchya kanyāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryau dānapratigrahau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praṣṭavyāḥ santi cāsmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvat pṛcchāmi tān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahūn saṃpṛcchya kanyāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryau dāna-pratigrahau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praṣṭavyāḥ santi ca asmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvat pṛcchāmi tān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyac cāgamyatām etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ yadi na duṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvādṛśātithisatkāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāraṇaṃ śreyasām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyac cā agamyatām etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhaṃ yadi na duṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvā-dṛśa ātithi-sat-kāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāraṇaṃ śreyasām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasthāpito gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāgatya ca dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām abhāṣata bhāratyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gambhīrabhayagarbhayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasthāpito gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāgatya ca dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām abhāṣata bhāratyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gambhīra-bhaya-garbhayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmatsaṃdeśam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayoktaṃ bhīmahāsayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho mahākulīnānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācāraḥ sādhusevinām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmat-saṃdeśam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taya ūktaṃ bhīma-hāsayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho mahā-kulīnānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācāraḥ sādhu-sevinām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim atrodayano rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṣṭavyaḥ suhṛdā tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devī vāsavadattā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vā magadhavaṃśajā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim atra udayano rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṣṭavyaḥ suhṛdā tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devī vāsavadattā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vā magadha-vaṃśa-jā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rumaṇvadādayaḥ kiṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ vā hariśikhādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āha yat santi me kecit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvat pṛcchāmi tān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rumaṇvad-ādayaḥ kiṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ vā hariśikha-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āha yat santi me ke-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvat pṛcchāmi tān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ājñāpayati yac caiṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām ihāgamyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim evam apamānyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guravo gurusevibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ājñāpayati yac ca eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām ihā agamyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim evam apamānyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guravo guru-sevibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā kim ahaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samīpaṃ kim asau mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>acirād yāsyatīty etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa evānubhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā kim ahaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samīpaṃ kim asau mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-cirād yāsyati ity etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa eva anubhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā niścarantībhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jvālāmālābhir ānanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dagdhvā campaikadeśaṃ sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maholkeva tirohitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā niścarantībhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jvālā-mālābhir ānanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dagdhvā campā-eka-deśaṃ sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-ulka īva tiro-hitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd vidagdheyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddhā vipraśnikā dhruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>indrajālābhiyuktā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māyākārī bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd vidagdha īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddhā vipraśnikā dhruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>indra-jāla-abhiyuktā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māyā-kārī bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvājasutāyās tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tīvraḥ saṃtrāsakāraṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmaddhṛdayasaṃtāpī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paritāpajvaro 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvāja-sutāyās tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tīvraḥ saṃtrāsa-kāraṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmad-dhṛdaya-saṃtāpī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paritāpa-jvaro 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛṇālānilamuktālī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jalārdrapaṭacandanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmadaṅgapariśvaṅgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsyās tāpo nyavartata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛṇāla-anila-muktālī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jala-ārdra-paṭa-candanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmad-aṅga-pariśvaṅgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na asyās tāpo nyavartata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śakradhanuḥsampā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>balākācakralāñchanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirambudāmbaracchāyaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>channam ambaram ambudaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śakra-dhanuḥ-sampā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>balākā-cakra-lāñchanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-ambu-da-ambara-cchāyaiś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>channam ambaram ambu-daiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃtāpam apanetuṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāsāraiḥ paścimānilaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samārohāma harmyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāndraśubhrasudhaṃ śiraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃtāpam apanetuṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-āsāraiḥ paścima-anilaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samārohāma harmyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāndra-śubhra-sudhaṃ śiraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāruddhapraṇālādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāsīdasottarāmbaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāścātyamarudādyoti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jaḍaṃ jalam adhārayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrā aruddha-praṇāla-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāsī-da-sa-uttara-ambaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāścātya-marud-ādyoti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jaḍaṃ jalam adhārayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrānyeṣām uromātre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>majjantaḥ kubjavāmanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śanakaiḥ śāntasaṃtāpāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāradvājīm ahāsayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra anyeṣām uro-mātre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>majjantaḥ kubja-vāmanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śanakaiḥ śānta-saṃtāpāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāradvājīm ahāsayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti naḥ krīḍato dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāsādāgramahāhrade</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jale rantum ivoṣṇāṃśuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśat paścimārṇavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti naḥ krīḍato dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāsāda-agra-mahā-hrade</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jale rantum iva uṣṇa-aṃśuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśat paścima-arṇavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvājatanūjā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣevya śiśiraṃ ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praśāntāgantusaṃtāpā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śītapīḍāturābhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvāja-tanū-jā tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣevya śiśiraṃ ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praśānta-āgantu-saṃtāpā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śīta-pīḍa-ātura ābhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām urobāhuvāsobhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samācchādya nirantaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśītāṃ kṛtavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāpaśītāpahāribhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām uro-bāhu-vāsobhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samācchādya nirantaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśītāṃ kṛtavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāpa-śīta-apahāribhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apanītapidhānaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṇālair makarānanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsādāt prāsravat toyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sumeror iva nirjharaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apanīta-pidhānaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praṇālair makara-ānanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsādāt prāsravat toyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sumeror iva nirjharaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakīrṇasalilakrīḍā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīḍanacchinnabhūṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>munipītāmbudhicchāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>harmyāgraṃ tad adṛśyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakīrṇa-salila-krīḍā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīḍana-cchinna-bhūṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muni-pīta-ambudhi-cchāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>harmya-agraṃ tad adṛśyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasminn abhinavāmbhoda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumbhāmbhaḥkṣālanāmale</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dānaiḥ paricarāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samānaiḥ paricārakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasminn abhinava-ambho-da</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kumbha-ambhaḥ-kṣālana-a-male</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dānaiḥ paricarāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samānaiḥ paricārakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti kānte triyāmādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamite mānitapriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyi prabalāṃ nidrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukhaduḥkhābhibhāvinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti kānte tri-yāma-ādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamite mānita-priyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyi prabalāṃ nidrāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukha-duḥkha-abhibhāvinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāte ca kṣaṇadāpāde</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṭhorasparśabodhitaḥ</seg> </l>
