<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gambhīrekṣaṇam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naraṃ vyāttāsyakandaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāte ca kṣaṇa-dā-pāde</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṭhora-sparśa-bodhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gambhīra-īkṣaṇam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naraṃ vyātta-āsya-kandaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anumāya ca taṃ pretaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantragarbham upāgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kvāpi māṃ netum icchantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>netum aicchaṃ yamālayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anumāya ca taṃ pretaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantra-garbham upāgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva api māṃ netum icchantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>netum aicchaṃ yama-ālayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvājātmajā trastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā sma nidrāṃ jahād iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na taṃ tatra nihanmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīṣaṇāraṭiśaṅkitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bharadvāja-ātma-jā trastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā sma nidrāṃ jahād iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na taṃ tatra nihanmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīṣaṇa-āraṭi-śaṅkitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tuṣārajaḍam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svapṛṣṭaṃ kāṣṭhaniṣṭhuram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa māṃ sopānamārgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāsādāgrād avātarat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tuṣāra-jaḍam āropya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-pṛṣṭaṃ kāṣṭha-niṣṭhuram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa māṃ sopāna-mārgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāsāda-agrād avātarat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatprabhāvāc ca nidrāndhāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suptā jāgarikāḥ kṣitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kakṣārakṣās tam adrākṣur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na niryāntam acetanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat-prabhāvāc ca nidrā-andhāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suptā- jāgarikāḥ kṣitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kakṣa-ārakṣās tam adrākṣur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na niryāntam a-cetanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niṣkrāntaś ca parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kakṣādvāraṃ yad aikṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kavāṭasaṃpuṭas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanair aghaṭayat svayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niṣkrāntaś ca parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kakṣā-dvāraṃ yad aikṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kavāṭa-saṃpuṭas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanair aghaṭayat svayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhād dūram atītaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānubhyāṃ tam atāḍayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prahāraḥ sa tu me jāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jānupīḍāprayojanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhād dūram atītaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānubhyāṃ tam atāḍayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prahāraḥ sa tu me jāto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jānu-pīḍā-prayojanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca kiṃcid ahaṃ draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aicchaṃ paṭukutūhalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulaputraḥ sa tatra sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃcit kālaṃ na gacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca kiṃ-cid ahaṃ draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aicchaṃ paṭu-kutūhalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kula-putraḥ sa tatra sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ-cit kālaṃ na gacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āśākāśaviśālāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśikhāsu prasāritāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ dvīpināṃ kṛttīs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathedam abhavan mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āśā-ākāśa-viśālāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśikhāsu prasāritāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ dvīpināṃ kṛttīs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha īdam abhavan mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvanti kutaḥ santi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvīpicarmāṇi kānane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āstīrṇāni kim arthaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kenāpi viśikhāsv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvanti kutaḥ santi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvīpi-carmāṇi kānane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āstīrṇāni kim arthaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kena-api viśikhāsv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvat prāsādam ālābhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jālavātāyanacyutaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtatair vitatā rathyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradīpārciḥkadambakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvat prāsādam ālābhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāla-vāta-āyana-cyutaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtatair vitatā rathyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradīpa-arciḥ-kadambakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apanītavitarkaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tair gataḥ stokam antaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsāde kvacid aśrauṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vacaḥ kasyāpi kāminaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apanīta-vitarkaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tair gataḥ stokam antaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsāde kva-cid aśrauṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vacaḥ kasya api kāminaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi candraka kiṃ śeṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nanu bhrātar vibudhyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nākarṇayasi kūjantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ulūkaṃ subhagadhvanim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi candraka kiṃ śeṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nanu bhrātar vibudhyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nā akarṇayasi kūjantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ulūkaṃ su-bhaga-dhvanim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmai daśasahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīyantāṃ bhūṣaṇāni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ naḥ sukhahetūnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agraṇīḥ suhṛdām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmai daśa-sahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīyantāṃ bhūṣaṇāni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ naḥ sukha-hetūnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agra-ṇīḥ suhṛdām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anantaraṃ ca sāraṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dardūrāmbhodabandhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkaṇṭhāgarbhakaṇṭhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīlakaṇṭhena kūjitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-antaraṃ ca sāraṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dardūra-ambho-da-bandhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkaṇṭhā-garbha-kaṇṭhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīla-kaṇṭhena kūjitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kāmī jvalatkrodhaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candrakaṃ caṇḍam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣṭasya caṭakasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mastakaś chidyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kāmī jvalat-krodhaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candrakaṃ caṇḍam abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣṭasya caṭakasya asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mastakaś chidyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tarkayatā cedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viruddham iti niścitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājñātam anayor nyāyye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃmānanavimānane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā tarkayatā ca idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viruddham iti niścitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ājñātam anayor nyāyye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃmānana-vimānane ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryā nāgarakasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parasaṃkrāntamānasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekaparyaṅkasuptāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suptā bhartuḥ parāṅmukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryā nāgarakasya asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>para-saṃkrānta-mānasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eka-paryaṅka-supta āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suptā bhartuḥ parāṅ-mukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayolūkadhvaniṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhīrunārīvibhīṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trastayātaḥ parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāḍham āliṅgitaḥ patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūlūka-dhvaniṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhīru-nārī-vibhīṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trastaya ātaḥ parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gāḍham āliṅgitaḥ patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato viraktabhāryeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāryāraktena cāmunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ulūkabhayapūrvo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntāśleṣo 'bhinanditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato virakta-bhāryeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāryā-raktena ca amunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ulūka-bhaya-pūrvo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntā-āśleṣo 'bhinanditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena pūjām ulūkasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdaḥ kṛtavān ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yenāsya vimukhī kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trāsād abhimukhī kṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena pūjām ulūkasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdaḥ kṛtavān ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena asya vimukhī kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trāsād abhimukhī kṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutvā ca śikhinaḥ kekāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntotkaṇṭhāvidhāyinīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patyuḥ kaṇṭhaṃ parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthitā bhūyaḥ parāṅmukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutvā ca śikhinaḥ kekāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kānta-utkaṇṭhā-vidhāyinīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patyuḥ kaṇṭhaṃ parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthitā bhūyaḥ parāṅ-mukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenānena mayūrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mastakaś chedito ruṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yenāsyābhimukhī kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūjatā vimukhī kṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena anena mayūrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mastakaś chedito ruṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena asya abhimukhī kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūjatā vimukhī kṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athātītya tam uddeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśrauṣaṃ madaviddhayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtanigrahayor vācaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kulaṭāviṭayor yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha atītya tam uddeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśrauṣaṃ mada-viddhayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛta-nigrahayor vācaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ku-laṭā-viṭayor yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manoghrāṇaharā gandhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yayā pratanutuṅgayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āghrātā mama sā nāsā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvatkṛte vikṛtā kṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mano-ghrāṇa-harā gandhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yayā pratanu-tuṅgayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āghrātā mama sā nāsā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvat-kṛte vikṛtā kṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kartarīpāśasaṃkāśau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purā maṇḍitakuṇḍalau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karṇau mama tathā bhūtau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatāṃ bhavato yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kartarī-pāśa-saṃkāśau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purā maṇḍita-kuṇḍalau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karṇau mama tathā bhūtau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatāṃ bhavato yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāham evaṃvidhā jātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipralabdhā khalu tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtaghna tvam apīdānīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avajānāsi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa āham evaṃ-vidhā jātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipralabdhā khalu tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛta-ghna tvam api idānīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avajānāsi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvocat patis tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ māṃ indasi nandini</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayāpi nanu yat prāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvadarthaṃ tan na dṛśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avocat patis tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ māṃ indasi nandini</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maya āpi nanu yat prāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvad-arthaṃ tan na dṛśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devāḥ kusumadhūpādyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitaraḥ piṇḍavāribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samastās tarpitā yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣiṇābhir dvijātayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devāḥ kusuma-dhūpa-ādyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitaraḥ piṇḍa-vāribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samastās tarpitā- yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣiṇābhir dvi-jātayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śūrādhiṣṭhitapṛṣṭhānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cūrṇitapratidantinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena cāsisanāthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nikṛttāḥ kariṇāṃ karāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śūra-adhiṣṭhita-pṛṣṭhānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cūrṇita-pratidantinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena ca asi-sa-nāthena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nikṛttāḥ kariṇāṃ karāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛthulāḥ komalās tuṅgāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīnāḥ satkṛtacandanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmaśeṣaparastrīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena bhuktāḥ payodharāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛthulāḥ komalās tuṅgāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīnāḥ sat-kṛta-candanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātma-śeṣa-para-strīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena bhuktāḥ payo-dharāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa me vāmetaraḥ pāṇiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>phullatāmarasāruṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛttaḥ śastreṇa saṃdhānād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bandhanād iva pallavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa me vāma-itaraḥ pāṇiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>phulla-tāmarasa-aruṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛttaḥ śastreṇa saṃdhānād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bandhanād iva pallavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā vāmapādasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śṛṇu caṇḍi parākramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena krāntā samudrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tīrthasnānāya medinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā vāma-pādasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śṛṇu caṇḍi parākramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena krāntā samudra-antā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tīrtha-snānāya medinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena cāntaḥpurārakṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>parikṣiptena līlayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vapraprākāraparikhāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatakṛtvo vilaṅghitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena ca antaḥ-pura-ārakṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>parikṣiptena līlayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vapra-prākāra-parikhāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śata-kṛtvo vilaṅghitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'yaṃ mārutasaṃcāras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmras tuṅganakhāṅguliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pādo me yādṛśo jātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśaḥ kasya kathyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'yaṃ māruta-saṃcāras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmras tuṅga-nakha-aṅguliḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pādo me yā-dṛśo jātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tā-dṛśaḥ kasya kathyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā yaḥ samudrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulayā tulayej jalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa guṇān pāṇipādasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṇayen mandadhīr girā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā yaḥ samudrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulayā tulayej jalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa guṇān pāṇi-pādasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṇayen manda-dhīr girā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā dhig adhīraṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yas tvādṛśyāḥ striyaḥ puraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmanaḥ pāṇipādasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praśaṃsāmi guṇān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā dhig a-dhīraṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yas tvā-dṛśyāḥ striyaḥ puraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmanaḥ pāṇi-pādasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praśaṃsāmi guṇān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānyatra śṛṇomi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādaḥ ślokasya śobhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgatas taṃ likhāmy āśu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>datta me vartikām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha anyatra śṛṇomi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādaḥ ślokasya śobhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgatas taṃ likhāmy āśu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>datta me vartikām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ cānantavṛttāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>campāṃ paśyan kutūhalī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchaṃ nagarīdvāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uttaraṃ pretavāhanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca an-anta-vṛtta-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>campāṃ paśyan kutūhalī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchaṃ nagarī-dvāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uttaraṃ preta-vāhanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīn na mām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gataprāṇo jighāṃsati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttareṇa hi nīyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na dvāreṇa jighāṃsitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīn na mām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gata-prāṇo jighāṃsati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uttareṇa hi nīyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na dvāreṇa jighāṃsitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintayann iti niryātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prākāraṃ samayā vrajan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣīṇamāṃsakam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālakaṃ gatajīvakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintayann iti niryātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prākāraṃ samayā vrajan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣīṇa-māṃsakam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālakaṃ gata-jīvakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athācintayam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇaṃ bālacikitsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śoṣitaḥ śuṣkaraivatyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varāko 'yaṃ mṛtaḥ śiśuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha acintayam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇaṃ bāla-cikitsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śoṣitaḥ śuṣka-raivatyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varāko 'yaṃ mṛtaḥ śiśuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi jīvantam adrakṣyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>likhitvā maṇḍalaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atrāsye maraṇād enam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iṣṭvā krūragrahān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi jīvantam adrakṣyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>likhitvā maṇḍalaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atrāsye maraṇād enam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iṣṭvā krūra-grahān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭavān asmi cānyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citravastravibhūṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puruṣaṃ proṣitaprāṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>athedam abhavan mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭavān asmi ca anyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citra-vastra-vibhūṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puruṣaṃ proṣita-prāṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha idam abhavan mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rajjuśastrāgnipānīya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jarājvaragarakṣudhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāyam anyatamenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kena nāma mṛto bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rajju-śastra-agni-pānīya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jarā-jvara-gara-kṣudhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ayam anyatamena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kena nāma mṛto bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aye nūnam ayaṃ kāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāmayitvānyakāminīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidrāsukham upāsīnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratibuddhaḥ pipāsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aye nūnam ayaṃ kāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāmayitva ānya-kāminīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidrā-sukham upāsīnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratibuddhaḥ pipāsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukhasupteti cānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na sā strī pratibodhitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gavākṣasthodapātrastham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udakaṃ pītam ātmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukha-supta īti ca anena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na sā strī pratibodhitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gava-akṣa-stha-uda-pātra-stham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udakaṃ pītam ātmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apanītapidhānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā taj jalabhājanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svaviṣānaladāhāndhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviṣṭaḥ prāg bhujaṃgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apanīta-pidhānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā taj jala-bhājanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-viṣa-anala-dāha-andhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviṣṭaḥ prāg bhujaṃ-gamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tadviṣam udgīrṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena tad dūṣitaṃ jalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena pītena mūḍho 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥ prāṇair viyojitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tad-viṣam udgīrṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena tad dūṣitaṃ jalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena pītena mūḍho 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥ prāṇair viyojitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāś ca parakāminyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikābhiḥ sasaṃbhramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prākāraśṛṅgarandhreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nikṣiptaḥ parikhātaṭe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāś ca para-kāminyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikābhiḥ sa-saṃbhramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prākāra-śṛṅga-randhreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nikṣiptaḥ parikhā-taṭe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amṛto yadi dṛṣṭaḥ syāj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvitaḥ syād ayaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mantramaṇḍalamudrāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāṃśusmaraṇād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-mṛto yadi dṛṣṭaḥ syāj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvitaḥ syād ayaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mantra-maṇḍala-mudrāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāṃśu-smaraṇād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānyatrāham adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ninditāsurakanyakām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśokaśākhiśākhāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udbaddhāṃ kām api striyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha anyatra aham adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nindita-asura-kanyakām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśoka-śākhi-śākhāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udbaddhāṃ kām api striyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅgaiḥ kusumasindūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṅkumālaktakojjvalaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīlārdhorukasaṃvīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśālajaghanasthalām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅgaiḥ kusuma-sindūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṅkuma-alaktaka-ujjvalaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīla-ardha-ūruka-saṃvīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśāla-jaghana-sthalām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nikṣiptaṃ ca tayādūraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karacchuritacandrikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cīnapaṭṭāṃśukanyastam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anarghyaṃ ratnamaṇḍanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nikṣiptaṃ ca taya ā-dūraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kara-cchurita-candrikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cīna-paṭṭa-aṃśuka-nyastam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>an-arghyaṃ ratna-maṇḍanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim artham anayā straiṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtaṃ sāhasam ity aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parāmṛśya bahūn pakṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idaṃ niścitavān dhiyā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim artham anayā straiṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtaṃ sāhasam ity aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parāmṛśya bahūn pakṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idaṃ niścitavān dhiyā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyaṃ pativratā yoṣin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nūnaṃ bhartuś ca vallabhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vimānitavān etāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patiḥ parihasann api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iyaṃ pati-vratā yoṣin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nūnaṃ bhartuś ca vallabhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vimānitavān etāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patiḥ parihasann api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena suptena mattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jijñāsākupitena vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītaṃ nāma kasyāścit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadāyāḥ pramādinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena suptena mattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jijñāsā-kupitena vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītaṃ nāma kasyāś-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadāyāḥ pramādinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena cāśrutapūrveṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vajrapātapramāthinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍhaṃ tāḍitayā krūraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtaṃ karmedam etayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca a-śruta-pūrveṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vajra-pāta-pramāthinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍhaṃ tāḍitayā krūraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtaṃ karma idam etayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā putradārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitābhartṛsamo ripuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāsti yas tānitasnehāl</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lālayaty eva kevalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā putra-dārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitā-bhartṛ-samo ripuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na asti yas tānita-snehāl</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lālayaty eva kevalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varaṃ cātitiraskāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālānāṃ nātilālanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyante hy avasīdanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhīmanto 'py atilālitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varaṃ ca ati-tiras-kāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālānāṃ na ati-lālanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyante hy avasīdanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhīmanto 'py ati-lālitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vasanābharaṇaṃ yac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhūtale svayam ujjhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat taskarakarasparśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>parihārārtham etayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vasana-ābharaṇaṃ yac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhū-tale svayam ujjhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat taskara-kara-sparśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>parihāra-artham etayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niścaurā cedṛśī campā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yan merugurur apy ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃkāro 'py asatkāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkāra iva dṛśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niś-caurā cā idṛśī campā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yan meru-gurur apy ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ-kāro 'py a-sat-kāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkāra iva dṛśyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāni cānyāni ca nāgarāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyan vicitrāṇi viceṣṭitāni</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citānalālokahṛtāndhakāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agaccham ujjīvajanādhivāsam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāni ca anyāni ca nāgarāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyan vicitrāṇi viceṣṭitāni</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cita-anala-āloka-hṛta-andha-kāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agaccham ujjīva-jana-adhivāsam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāpaśyaṃ śivās tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trāsitāḥ piśitāśinīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīnabhīṣaṇaphetkārāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kukkuraiḥ kharabukkitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha apaśyaṃ śivās tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trāsitāḥ piśita-aśinīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīna-bhīṣaṇa-phet-kārāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kukkuraiḥ khara-bukkitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ujjhitāmbaram udbāhu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakīrṇakacasaṃcayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paritaḥ kuṇapaṃ nṛtyaḍ</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ḍākinīmaṇḍalaṃ kvacit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ujjhita-ambaram ud-bāhu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakīrṇa-kaca-saṃcayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paritaḥ kuṇapaṃ nṛtyaḍ</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ḍākinī-maṇḍalaṃ kva-cit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvacit puruṣam utkhaḍgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upāttaghaṭakarparam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāmāṃsaṃ mahāsattvāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīyatām iti vādinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva-cit puruṣam ut-khaḍgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upātta-ghaṭa-karparam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-māṃsaṃ mahā-sattvāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krīyatām iti vādinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saśastrapuruṣavrāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>rakṣitāśācatuṣṭayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhakaṃ siddhinistriṃśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpatantaṃ nabhaḥ kvacit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-śastra-puruṣa-vrāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>rakṣita-āśā-catuṣṭayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhakaṃ siddhi-nistriṃśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpatantaṃ nabhaḥ kva-cit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādibahuvṛttāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyatā pretaketakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yātrāṃ yā gacchatā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā dṛṣṭā sthavirā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi-bahu-vṛtta-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyatā preta-ketakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yātrāṃ yā gacchatā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā dṛṣṭā sthavirā mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaṭamūle citāvahnau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāmahastārpitasruvā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haṃkārāntena mantreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>juhvatī naraśoṇitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaṭa-mūle citā-vahnau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāma-hasta-arpita-sruvā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haṃ-kāra-antena mantreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>juhvatī nara-śoṇitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca pretam asau dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhitādeśam āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guruharṣavi/ālākṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmaśeṣaṃ samāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca pretam asau dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhita-ādeśam āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guru-harṣa-vi/āla-akṣī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karma-śeṣaṃ samāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca dattārghasatkāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocat kṛtakarmaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāgataṃ candravaktrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumāro mucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca datta-argha-sat-kāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocat kṛta-karmaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sv-āgataṃ candra-vaktrāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumāro mucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho kaṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candramasyāpad āgatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena kākamukhasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukham etena tulyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho kaṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candramasyā apad āgatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena kāka-mukhasya asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukham etena tulyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu māṃ śanakair muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāhujaṅghaṃ prasārya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dakṣiṇābhimukhas tāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āraṭyāpatitaḥ kṣitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu māṃ śanakair muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāhu-jaṅghaṃ prasārya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dakṣiṇa-abhimukhas tāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āraṭyā apatitaḥ kṣitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mātaṅgavṛddhā mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocad dattaviṣṭarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śmaśānam āgato 'smīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khedaṃ mā manaso gamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mātaṅga-vṛddhā mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocad datta-viṣṭarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śmaśānam āgato 'smi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khedaṃ mā manaso gamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śmaśāne bhagavān rudraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarudrāṇīvināyakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samātṛpramathānīkas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trisaṃdhyaṃ saṃnidhīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śmaśāne bhagavān rudraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-rudrāṇī-vināyakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-mātṛ-pramatha-anīkas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tri-saṃdhyaṃ saṃnidhīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra rudraḥ surās tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarve haripuraḥsarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy anyatra tuṣārāṃśur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyatrāsya marīcayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra rudraḥ surās tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarve hari-puraḥ-sarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy anyatra tuṣāra-aṃśur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyatra asya marīcayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mokṣasvargārthakāmāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrūyante bahavo dvijāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptāḥ pretavane siddhiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmān nedam amaṅgalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mokṣa-svarga-artha-kāmāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrūyante bahavo dvi-jāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptāḥ preta-vane siddhiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmān na idam a-maṅgalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mamānītas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad etat saṃniśāmyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi niṣkāraṇaḥ khedas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvādṛśām upapadyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad-arthaṃ tvaṃ mamā anītas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad etat saṃniśāmyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi niṣ-kāraṇaḥ khedas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvā-dṛśām upapadyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīn mātaṅganāthendraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣuṇṇaśatrur mataṅgajaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīrīva mahadbāhor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāsiṃhaḥ patir mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīn mātaṅga-nātha-indraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣuṇṇa-śatrur mataṅga-jaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīri īva mahad-bāhor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāsiṃhaḥ patir mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ dhanamatī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantraśaktiś ca yā mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā dineṣu gamiṣyatsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vijñātā bhavatā svayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ dhanamatī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantra-śaktiś ca yā mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā dineṣu gamiṣyatsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vijñātā bhavatā svayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caṇḍasiṃhaṃ mahāsiṃhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putram utpādya niṣṭhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalabhāram ivānantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanaḥ kusumasaṃcayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caṇḍasiṃhaṃ mahāsiṃhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putram utpādya niṣṭhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phala-bhāram iva an-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanaḥ kusuma-saṃcayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sutājinavatī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caṇḍasiṃhasya kanyakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rātriṃ divam asūyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yasyai tridaśakanyakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suta ājinavatī nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caṇḍasiṃhasya kanyakā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rātriṃ divam asūyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yasyai tri-daśa-kanyakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā mahāsaroyātrām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmābhiḥ saha yātayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāradvājīdvitīyas tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭaḥ pravahaṇāśritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā mahā-saro-yātrām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmābhiḥ saha yātayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāradvājī-dvitīyas tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭaḥ pravahaṇa-āśritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvasthābhavat tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāpi durjñānakāraṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durlabhe bhavati strīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭe tvādṛśi yādṛśī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avastha ābhavat tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ka āpi dur-jñāna-kāraṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dur-labhe bhavati strīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭe tvā-dṛśi yā-dṛśī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakhībhir anuyuktāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahuśaḥ kleśakāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadā nākathayaj jñātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantraśaktyā mayā tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakhībhir anuyukta āsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahuśaḥ kleśa-kāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadā na akathayaj jñātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantra-śaktyā mayā tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prārthanābhaṅgajaṃ duḥkham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asaṃcintya svayaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pautryāḥ prāṇaparitrāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kariṣyantyā bhavān vṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prārthanā-bhaṅga-jaṃ duḥkham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-saṃcintya svayaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pautryāḥ prāṇa-paritrāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kariṣyantyā bhavān vṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrghāyuṣā yadā cāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paribhūtā tathā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhayitvā tathā pretaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvam ihānāyito mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīrgha-āyuṣā yadā ca ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paribhūtā tathā tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhayitvā tathā pretaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvam ihā anāyito mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenājinavatīṃ tubhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayacchāmi balād api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālām adhārayanto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>labhante hi divaukasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ajinavatīṃ tubhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayacchāmi balād api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālām a-dhārayanto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>labhante hi diva-okasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sātha paścānmukhī sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pautrīm ehīty abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>athādṛśyata tatraiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāpy anāgatm āgatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ātha paścān-mukhī sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pautrīm ehi ity abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha adṛśyata tatra eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa āpy an-āgatm āgatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cedivatseśadāyādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā mantrair vaśīkṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varaṃ pāṇau gṛhāṇeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām avocat pitāmahī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cedi-vatsa-īśa-dāyādaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā mantrair vaśī-kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varaṃ pāṇau gṛhāṇa iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tām avocat pitā-mahī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madīyaṃ ca tadīyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svinnaṃ svinnena pāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sphurantaṃ sphuratāgṛhṇād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇena sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madīyaṃ ca tadīyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svinnaṃ svinnena pāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sphurantaṃ sphurata āgṛhṇād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇena sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ kararucā tāmre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭapātaiḥ sitāsitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ kuṅkumābhe 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svakare varṇasaṃkaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāḥ kara-rucā tāmre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭa-pātaiḥ sita-a-sitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyaṃ kuṅkuma-abhe 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-kare varṇa-saṃkaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mām avadad vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvaśuro dṛśyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatas tām avadaṃ devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jano 'yaṃ paravān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mām avadad vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvaśuro dṛśyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatas tām avadaṃ devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jano 'yaṃ paravān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ puruṣam adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arkamaṇḍalabhāsuram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvartayantam utkāntiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>candrakāntākṣamaṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ puruṣam adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arka-maṇḍala-bhāsuram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āvartayantam utkāntiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>candra-kānta-akṣa-maṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhanamatyā mamākhyātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ vidyādhareśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaurimuṇḍo mahāgaurīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārādhayitum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhanamatyā mamā akhyātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ vidyā-dhara-īśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaurimuṇḍo mahā-gaurīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārādhayitum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyālakāṅgārakau cāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrātārau paricārakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāv etau pārśvayor asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhujāv iva mahābalau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyālaka-aṅgārakau ca asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrātārau paricārakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāv etau pārśvayor asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhujāv iva mahā-balau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.126'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yenāmitagatir baddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadambe mocitas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'yam aṅgārako yo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jahāra kusumālikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.126'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena amitagatir baddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadambe mocitas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'yam aṅgārako yo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jahāra kusumālikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.127'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārabhya ca tataḥ kālād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaurimuṇḍaḥ sahānujaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dviṣantam antaraṃ prāpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantaṃ hantum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.127'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārabhya ca tataḥ kālād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaurimuṇḍaḥ saha-anujaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dviṣantam antaraṃ prāpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantaṃ hantum icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.128'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena mānasavegaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaurimuṇḍādayaś ca te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anantāś ca mahāntaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣyantaś ca śatravaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.128'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena mānasavegaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaurimuṇḍa-ādayaś ca te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-antāś ca mahāntaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣyantaś ca śatravaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.129'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pramattam asahāyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyasāmarthyadurgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvām etadviparītāriṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāntu devagurudvijāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.129'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pramattam a-sahāyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divya-sāmarthya-dur-gatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvām etad-viparīta-ariṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāntu deva-guru-dvijāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.130'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tan nāyaṃ tava saṃbandhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyāmātraprayojanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍasiṃhasahāyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahad asya prayojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.130'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tan na ayaṃ tava saṃbandhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kanyā-mātra-prayojanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍasiṃha-sahāyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahad asya prayojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.131'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv abhūd abhūn mitram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eko 'mitagatir mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idānīṃ caṇḍasiṃho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sumahābalamātṛkaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.131'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv abhūd abhūn mitram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eko 'mitagatir mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idānīṃ caṇḍasiṃho 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-mahā-bala-mātṛkaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.132'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃkalpayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chāyācchuritacandrikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimānam aham adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avarūḍhaṃ vihāyasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.132'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti saṃkalpayann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chāyā-cchurita-candrikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimānam aham adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avarūḍhaṃ vihāyasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.133'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gacchatāpi sthireṇeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena mānasaraṃhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kham agacchann ivāgacchaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vahaneneva sāgaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.133'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gacchata āpi sthireṇa iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena mānasa-raṃhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kham agacchann iva agacchaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vahanena iva sāgaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.134'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāpaśyaṃ vimānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrād avanimaṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokālokādiparyantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādarśaparimaṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.134'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha apaśyaṃ vimānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūrād avani-maṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>loka-a-loka-ādi-paryantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādarśa-parimaṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.135'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam īdṛśam ākāśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anāvaraṇam īkṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tu nāsti pradeśo 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yo vimānair anāvṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.135'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam īdṛśam ākāśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-āvaraṇam īkṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tu na asti pradeśo 'sya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yo vimānair an-āvṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.136'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apsaraḥśatasaṃbādhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakrīḍāgiriniṣkuṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nikṛṣṭasyāpi devasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimānaṃ yojanāyatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.136'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apsaraḥ-śata-saṃbādhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-krīḍā-giri-niṣkuṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nikṛṣṭasya api devasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vimānaṃ yojana-āyatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.137'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'ham evam anantāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntimanti mahānti ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gacchāmi sma vimānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyann āyānti yānti ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.137'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'ham evam an-antāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntimanti mahānti ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gacchāmi sma vimānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyann āyānti yānti ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.138'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kasminn api tato deśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasyāpi śikhare gireḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasyām api diśi sphītam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adṛśyata puraḥ puram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.138'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kasminn api tato deśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasya api śikhare gireḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasyām api diśi sphītam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adṛśyata puraḥ puram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.139'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāc codapatad bhāsvad</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vimānaṃ vyāpnuvan nabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śṛṅgāt prāgacalasyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasrakaramaṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.139'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāc ca udapatad bhāsvad</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vimānaṃ vyāpnuvan nabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śṛṅgāt prāg-a-calasya iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasra-kara-maṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.140'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māmakena vimānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha tat samagacchata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīram iva mātaṅgyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīreṇa nirantaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.140'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māmakena vimānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha tat samagacchata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīram iva mātaṅgyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīreṇa nir-antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.141'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛṣṇāṅgaśyāmatuṅgāṅgas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmrāpāṅgāyatekṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgamat puruṣas tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhāva iva dehavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.141'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛṣṇa-aṅga-śyāma-tuṅga-aṅgas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmra-apāṅga-āyata-īkṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgamat puruṣas tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhāva iva dehavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.142'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taṃ pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭaṃ yātrāmahotsave</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathitaṃ dhanamatyāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍasiṃham avandiṣi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.142'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taṃ pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭaṃ yātrā-mahā-utsave</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathitaṃ dhanamatya āhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caṇḍasiṃham avandiṣi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.143'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau cānandajasveda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>stimitair uttanūruhaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgair aṅgaṃ samāliṅgya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snehādraiḥ karkaśair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.143'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau cā ananda-ja-sveda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>stimitair ut-tanū-ruhaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgair aṅgaṃ samāliṅgya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sneha-ādraiḥ karkaśair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.144'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apasṛtya tato dūraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>namayitvonnataṃ śiraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyogbhartar jaya deveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa mām uktvedam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.144'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apasṛtya tato dūraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>namayitva ūnnataṃ śiraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyog-bhartar jaya deva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa mām uktva īdam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.145'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmābhiḥ sevakaiḥ kāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ yuṣmāsu bhartṛṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅganaṃ tu bhartṝṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtyaiḥ paribhavo mahān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.145'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmābhiḥ sevakaiḥ kāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ yuṣmāsu bhartṛṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅganaṃ tu bhartṝṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtyaiḥ paribhavo mahān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.146'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālo 'pi nāvamantavyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmāteti bhavādṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahatī devatā hy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvādṛgrūpeṇa tiṣṭhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.146'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālo 'pi na avamantavyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmāta īti bhavā-dṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahatī devatā hy eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvā-dṛg-rūpeṇa tiṣṭhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.147'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi bahu tat tan māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvad eva vadaty asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍasiṃhapuraṃ tāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tumulotsavam āsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.147'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi bahu tat tan māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvad eva vadaty asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍasiṃha-puraṃ tāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tumula-utsavam āsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.148'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya kiṃ varṇyate yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśālaṃ viśikhātalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citraṃ citrair mahāratnair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>indrāṇījaghanocitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.148'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya kiṃ varṇyate yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśālaṃ viśikhā-talam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citraṃ citrair mahā-ratnair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>indrāṇī-jaghana-ucitaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.149'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etena parikhāśāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāsādasurasadmanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avaśyādheyaśobhānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākhyātaṃ rāmaṇīyakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.149'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etena parikhā-śāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāsāda-sura-sadmanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avaśya-ādheya-śobhānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākhyātaṃ rāmaṇīyakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.150'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya kiṃ varṇyate yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṇavāḥ smitimānasāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na stanyam api yāvante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jananīr api bālakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.150'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya kiṃ varṇyate yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māṇavāḥ smiti-mānasāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na stanyam api yāvante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jananīr api bālakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.151'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya kiṃ varṇyate yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśupālasutair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakalāḥ sakalā vidyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātṛkevānuśīlitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.151'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya kiṃ varṇyate yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśu-pāla-sutair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakalāḥ sakalā vidyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātṛka īva anuśīlitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.152'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya kiṃ varṇyate yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yoginām eva kevalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakṣayo na ca jāyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rathyāḥ prāsādasaṃkaṭāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.152'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya kiṃ varṇyate yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yoginām eva kevalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakṣayo na ca jāyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rathyāḥ prāsāda-saṃkaṭāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.153'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena doṣeṇa saṃsārāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paritrasyanti mokṣavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tasmin mokṣaśāstreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyate kapilādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.153'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena doṣeṇa saṃsārāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paritrasyanti mokṣavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tasmin mokṣa-śāstreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyate kapila-ādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.154'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca dūṣitasaṃsārair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vastudoṣair adūṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akalmaṣaguṇāt tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramaṇīyatamaṃ kutaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.154'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca dūṣita-saṃsārair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vastu-doṣair a-dūṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kalmaṣa-guṇāt tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramaṇīyatamaṃ kutaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.155'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cedaṃ caṇḍasiṃhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puram ekaṃ praśasyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyeṣām api siddhānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īdṛśāny adhikāny api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.155'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca idaṃ caṇḍasiṃhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puram ekaṃ praśasyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyeṣām api siddhānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īdṛśāny adhikāny api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.156'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avaruhya ca bhūmiṣṭhāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmād ambaramandirāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāviśaṃ kanyakāgāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hasitāmbaramandiram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.156'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avaruhya ca bhūmi-ṣṭhāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmād ambara-mandirāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāviśaṃ kanyakā-āgāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hasita-ambara-mandiram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.157'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin parijano divyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakārair mām upācarat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim artham api cāhutā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātrājinavatī gatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.157'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin parijano divyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakārair mām upācarat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim artham api cā ahutā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātra ājinavatī gatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.158'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā yadā tan niśāśeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uttaraṃ ca divāniśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāgataiva tad āsīn me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvarāturamater matiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.158'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā yadā tan niśā-śeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uttaraṃ ca divā-niśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nā agata aiva tad āsīn me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvara-ātura-mater matiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.159'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśanasmitasaṃbhāṣā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sparśanāliṅganādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samastair asamastaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramayanti priyāḥ priyān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.159'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>darśana-smita-saṃbhāṣā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sparśana-āliṅgana-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samastair a-samastaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramayanti priyāḥ priyān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.160'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiraṇair indulekheva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gataiva saha tair asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham apy eṣa tiṣṭhāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhasaṃtaptamānasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.160'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiraṇair indu-lekha īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gata aiva saha tair asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham apy eṣa tiṣṭhāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkha-saṃtapta-mānasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.161'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat kim etat kathaṃ nv etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ityādi bahu cintayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivāhavighnasaṃbhrāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aikṣe sāntaḥpuraṃ puram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.161'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat kim etat kathaṃ nv etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity-ādi bahu cintayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivāha-vighna-saṃbhrāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aikṣe sa-antaḥ-puraṃ puram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.162'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama campāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>preto mām anayan niśi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭhakṛṣṇacaturdaśyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārdrasthe tārakāpatau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.162'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama campāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>preto mām anayan niśi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭha-kṛṣṇa-catur-daśyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārdra-sthe tārakā-patau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.163'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nūnam āṣāḍhaśuklādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañcamyām uttarāsu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalguṇīṣu vivāho 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājñā kārayitāvayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.163'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nūnam āṣāḍha-śukla-ādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañcamyām uttarāsu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalguṇīṣu vivāho 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājñā kārayitā āvayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.164'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ mahākulo rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutismṛtiviśāradaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad brāhmeṇa vivāhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūnoḥ saṃskāram icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.164'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ mahā-kulo rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śruti-smṛti-viśāradaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad brāhmeṇa vivāhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūnoḥ saṃskāram icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.165'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upāsya caturaḥ kaṣṭān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāvakān iva vāsarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāṃ prāpaṃ kanyakām ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tapaḥsiddhim ivepsitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.165'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upāsya caturaḥ kaṣṭān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāvakān iva vāsarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāṃ prāpaṃ kanyakām ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tapaḥ-siddhim ivā ipsitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.166'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ghanāghanāmbhodharajālakālīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adṛṣṭatārāgaṇarājabimbām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā saha prāvṛṣamāsi ramyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśuklapakṣāntaniśām ivaikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.166'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ghana-a-ghana-ambho-dhara-jāla-kālīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-dṛṣṭa-tārā-gaṇa-rāja-bimbām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā saha prāvṛṣa-māsi ramyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-śukla-pakṣa-anta-niśām iva ekām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.167'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saikadā saparīvārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nibhṛtakranditadhvaniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anuyuktā mayā kaccin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛpaḥ kuśalavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.167'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa aikadā sa-parīvārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nibhṛta-krandita-dhvaniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anuyuktā mayā kac-cin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛpaḥ kuśalavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.168'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu pratiṣiddhāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikā megharājikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivedayitum ārabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyatāṃ bhartṛdāraka ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.168'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu pratiṣiddha āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dārikā megharājikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivedayitum ārabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyatāṃ bhartṛ-dāraka ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.169'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrvaṃ vikaciko nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svacchandaḥ khecarādhamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svais tyaktaḥ sāparādhatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃcit kālam ihāsthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.169'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrvaṃ vikaciko nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-cchandaḥ khe-cara-adhamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svais tyaktaḥ sa-aparādhatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ-cit kālam ihā asthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.170'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kanyā sarvasya dṛśyeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tenāsau bhartṛdārikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnāṃ pitur utsaṅge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭvā rājānam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.170'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kanyā sarvasya dṛśya īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena asau bhartṛ-dārikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnāṃ pitur utsaṅge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭvā rājānam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.171'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duhitā tava yady eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato mahyaṃ pradīyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madīyaguṇasaṃkhyā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddhaiva bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.171'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duhitā tava yady eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato mahyaṃ pradīyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madīya-guṇa-saṃkhyā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddha aiva bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.172'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ kena na jñātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasiddhā hi guṇās tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu komalajanmeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prauḍhā tāvad bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.172'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ kena na jñātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasiddhā- hi guṇās tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu komala-janma īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prauḍhā tāvad bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.173'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenāpy āmantrya rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svadeśāya gamiṣyatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āyoṣidbālagopālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ālāpaḥ śrāvitaḥ pure ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.173'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena apy āmantrya rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-deśāya gamiṣyatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ā-yoṣid-bāla-go-pālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ālāpaḥ śrāvitaḥ pure ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.174'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājñā mahyaṃ sasatkāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattājinavatī sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>diṣṭyā vṛddhir bhavaty adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mameva bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.174'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājñā mahyaṃ sa-sat-kāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>datta ājinavatī sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>diṣṭyā vṛddhir bhavaty adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama iva bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.175'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa bhartṛdārikāṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṛdārakabhartṛkām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vismṛtopakṛtaḥ krodhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āha rājānam atrapaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.175'>
<lg>
