<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa bhartṛ-dārikāṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṛ-dāraka-bhartṛkām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vismṛta-upakṛtaḥ krodhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āha rājānam a-trapaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.176'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavataḥ ko 'yaṃ ācāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadācārābhimāninaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad dattvā tanayāṃ mahyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyasmai dattavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.176'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavataḥ ko 'yaṃ ācāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadā ācāra-abhimāninaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad dattvā tanayāṃ mahyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyasmai dattavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.177'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vālam upālabhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavantam abhayatrapam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sutā vā vyavahāro vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuddhaṃ vā dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.177'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha va ālam upālabhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavantam a-bhaya-trapam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sutā vā vyavahāro vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuddhaṃ vā dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.178'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāha vihasan rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na yuddhaṃ na mamātmajām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>labdhum arhati dīrghāyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyavahāras tu dīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.178'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā aha vihasan rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na yuddhaṃ na mamā atma-jām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>labdhum arhati dīrgha-āyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyavahāras tu dīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.179'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā taṃ mahīpālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samantrigaṇamātṛkaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāyumuktamahādhyakṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saptaparṇapuraṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.179'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā taṃ mahī-pālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-mantri-gaṇa-mātṛkaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāyumukta-mahā-adhyakṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saptaparṇapuraṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.180'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuvām api rucau satyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śobhitāśāvihāyasau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatraiva sahitau yātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rohiṇīśaśināv iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.180'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuvām api rucau satyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śobhita-āśā-vihāyasau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra eva sahitau yātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rohiṇī-śaśināv iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.181'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ bhīru mā bhaiṣīḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃnarīkaṇṭhi mā rudaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>megharājyā yathākhyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jitaḥ sa capalas tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.181'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ bhīru mā bhaiṣīḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ-narī-kaṇṭhi mā rudaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>megharājyā yathā ākhyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jitaḥ sa capalas tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.182'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tasyāḥ paritrāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuṣāramlāpitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāntvabālātapasparśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukhāmbhojaṃ vikāśitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.182'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tasyāḥ paritrāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuṣāra-mlāpitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāntva-bāla-ātapa-sparśān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukha-ambho-jaṃ vikāśitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.183'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mām ādāya tataḥ pāṇau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā gatvāmbaravartmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saptaparṇapurodyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saptaparṇapure sthitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.183'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mām ādāya tataḥ pāṇau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā gatva āmbara-vartmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saptaparṇapura-udyāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapta-parṇa-pure sthitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.184'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca nirutkaṇṭhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam ekam ihāsyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvad emi sakhīṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanditvā ca gurūn iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.184'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca nir-utkaṇṭhaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam ekam ihā asyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvad emi sakhīṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanditvā ca gurūn iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.185'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām utpatya yātāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udyāne saṃcarann aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthūlamauktikavarṇāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saptaparṇāni dṛṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.185'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām utpatya yātāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>udyāne saṃcarann aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthūla-mauktika-varṇāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapta-parṇāni dṛṣṭavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.186'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taiś ca grathitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadalīpaṭutantubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bandhūkataralaṃ hāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpalaiś churitodaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.186'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taiś ca grathitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadalī-paṭu-tantubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bandhūka-taralaṃ hāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpalaiś churita-udaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.187'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padmarāgendranīlādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānāratnopalaprabhaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kusumaiḥ kalpayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kambūnūpuramekhalāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.187'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padma-rāga-indra-nīla-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānā-ratna-upala-prabhaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kusumaiḥ kalpayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kambū-nūpura-mekhalāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.188'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīrya tato vyomnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā priyā priyavādinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirjitaḥ sa durātmeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛṣṭā mām apy aharṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.188'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatīrya tato vyomnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā priyā priya-vādinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirjitaḥ sa dur-ātma iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛṣṭā mām apy aharṣayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.189'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>katham ity anuyuktā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā sādaram abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anuyogam upekṣante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivakṣanto 'pi vācakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.189'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>katham ity anuyuktā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā sa-ādaram abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anuyogam upekṣante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivakṣanto 'pi vācakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.190'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāyumūlān mayā gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vanditāntaḥpurastriyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāyumuktā sakhī dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyāntaḥpuravartinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.190'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāyu-mūlān mayā gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vandita-antaḥ-pura-striyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāyumuktā sakhī dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyā-antaḥ-pura-vartinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.191'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāhaṃ kṣaṇam āsīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jitajīmūtagarjitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradhvanantīṃ śṛṇomi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bherīṃ bhairavagarjitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.191'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ahaṃ kṣaṇam āsīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jita-jīmūta-garjitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradhvanantīṃ śṛṇomi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bherīṃ bhairava-garjitām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.192'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭā sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhramotkarṇayā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakhī svāṃ dārikām āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāhi vijñāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.192'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭā sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhrama-ut-karṇayā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakhī svāṃ dārikām āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāhi vijñāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.193'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā muhūrtād ivāgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvasitotkampitastanī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhase devi diṣṭyeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām uktvoktavatī punaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.193'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā muhūrtād ivā agatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvasita-utkampita-stanī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhase devi diṣṭya īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām uktva ūktavatī punaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.194'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bherīṃ tāḍitavān eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā vikacikaḥ sabhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāyumuktākṣadarśanāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ca samāyātāḥ sabhāsadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.194'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bherīṃ tāḍitavān eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā vikacikaḥ sabhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāyumukta-akṣa-darśanāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ca samāyātāḥ sabhā-sadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.195'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tam āhur bhavān kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bherīṃ tāḍitavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āryaveṣaḥ sa tān āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puraḥ sthitvā nirāsanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.195'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tam āhur bhavān kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bherīṃ tāḍitavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārya-veṣaḥ sa tān āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puraḥ sthitvā nir-āsanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.196'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caṇḍasiṃhaḥ sutāṃ dattvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahyaṃ nagarasaṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyasmin dattavān yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgaraṃ pṛcchyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.196'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caṇḍasiṃhaḥ sutāṃ dattvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahyaṃ nagara-saṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyasmin dattavān yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgaraṃ pṛcchyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.197'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ucyatām iti coktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tātena kila saṃsadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>megharājyā yad ākhyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad evākhyātam āha ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.197'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ucyatām iti ca uktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tātena kila saṃsadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>megharājyā yad ākhyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad evā akhyātam āha ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.198'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madīyapuravāstavyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sākṣiṇaś cāyam āha yān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛcchyantāṃ te 'pi teṣāṃ ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aviruddhā pramāṇatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.198'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madīya-pura-vāstavyān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sākṣiṇaś ca ayam āha yān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛcchyantāṃ te 'pi teṣāṃ ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-viruddhā pramāṇatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.199'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoktaṃ vāyumuktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāṣitasabhāsadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nṛpater manukalpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etasya parīkṣayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.199'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uktaṃ vāyumuktena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāṣita-sabhā-sadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nṛ-pater manu-kalpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etasya parīkṣayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.200'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na hi prāmāṇyarājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jijñāsāsaṃśayacchidaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyakṣasyānumānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramāṇatvaṃ pramīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.200'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na hi prāmāṇya-rājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jijñāsā-saṃśaya-cchidaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyakṣasya anumānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramāṇatvaṃ pramīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.201'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt pratyarthinā rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyavahāre parājitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthī vikacikaḥ kanyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyāṃ mṛgayatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.201'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt pratyarthinā rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyavahāre parājitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthī vikacikaḥ kanyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyāṃ mṛgayatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.202'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato vikacikaḥ kruddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jhaṭity utthāya saṃsadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpatya nabhasā gacchann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccair āha sabhāsadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.202'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato vikacikaḥ kruddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jhaṭity utthāya saṃsadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpatya nabhasā gacchann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccair āha sabhā-sadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.203'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhik khalān khalu caṇḍālān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pakṣapātahatāñ jaḍān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham eva hi kartavye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartavye buddhivān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.203'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhik khalān khalu caṇḍālān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pakṣa-pāta-hatāñ jaḍān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham eva hi kartavye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartavye buddhivān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.204'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama yat satyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āśaṅkākaluṣaṃ manaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmin punar asau kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartavye buddhimān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.204'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama yat satyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āśaṅkā-kaluṣaṃ manaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmin punar asau kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kartavye buddhimān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.205'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tais tām alaṃkṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaratkusumabhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīraśaradākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>taskarām idam abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.205'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tais tām alaṃ-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarat-kusuma-bhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīra-śarada-ākāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>taskarām idam abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.206'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>priyākhyānaprahṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhramābharaṇaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tavāropitam aṅgeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>subhagāṅgi virājate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.206'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>priya-ākhyāna-prahṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhrama-ābharaṇaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tavā aropitam aṅgeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-bhaga-aṅgi virājate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.207'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tatas tān alaṃkārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dviṣatī kaṇṭakān iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām avocad vidhūyāṅgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asūyāmantharasmitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.207'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tatas tān alaṃ-kārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dviṣatī kaṇṭakān iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām avocad vidhūya aṅgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asūya-a-manthara-smitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.208'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aparāsv api bhāryāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhir idam āhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi dṛṣṭaṃ vinābhyāsāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyākauśalam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.208'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aparāsv api bhāryāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhir idam āhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi dṛṣṭaṃ vina ābhyāsāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kriyā-kauśalam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.209'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān nirmālyatulyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kāryam amunā mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kā hi durlabham ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kitavaiḥ paribhāvayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.209'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān nir-mālya-tulyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na kāryam amunā mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kā hi dur-labham ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kitavaiḥ paribhāvayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.210'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd apūrveyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asyā viṣamaśīlatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyair durnivartyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇāmaśapathādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.210'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd a-pūrva īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asyā- viṣama-śīlatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāyair dur-nivartya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṇāma-śapatha-ādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.211'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nārī ca laghusāratvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taraṃgaśreṇicañcalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naukeva pratikūlāśu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuśalaiḥ parivartyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.211'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nārī ca laghu-sāratvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taraṃ-ga-śreṇi-cañcalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nauka īva pratikūla āśu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuśalaiḥ parivartyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.212'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryājñātigṛhe vāsaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ daurbhāgyakāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi vipratyayaḥ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartāraṃ kiṃ na paśyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.212'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryā-jñāti-gṛhe vāsaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ daurbhāgya-kāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadi vipratyayaḥ kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartāraṃ kiṃ na paśyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.213'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartrā te cāṭukāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāryāṃ toṣayatā kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kṛtaṃ durvidagdhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena bhāryaiva roṣitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.213'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhartrā te cāṭu-kāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāryāṃ toṣayatā kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat kṛtaṃ dur-vidagdhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena bhārya aiva roṣitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.214'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>subhagaṃ karaṇaṃ yad yat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samācarati durbhagaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sutarāṃ tena tenāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daurbhāgyam upacīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.214'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>su-bhagaṃ karaṇaṃ yad yat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samācarati dur-bhagaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-tarāṃ tena tena asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daurbhāgyam upacīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.215'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā vārayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putrān api bhaviṣyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā ciraṃ putrakāḥ sthāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryājñātigṛheṣv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.215'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā vārayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putrān api bhaviṣyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā ciraṃ putrakāḥ sthāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryā-jñāti-gṛheṣv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.216'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu manmukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hrītatrastavilakṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asnigdhasmitayā hā hā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etad iti bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.216'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu man-mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hrīta-trasta-vilakṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-snigdha-smitayā hā hā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim etad iti bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.217'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ param ayukto 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prapañca iti tām aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayaṃ vepamānāṅgīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āliṅgyotsaṅgam aṅganām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.217'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ param a-yukto 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prapañca iti tām aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayaṃ vepamāna-aṅgīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āliṅgya-utsaṅgam aṅganām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.218'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu labdhasamāśvāsā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīrghikātīrthavartinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aryaputra prasīdeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyāharat tāram āturā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.218'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu labdha-samāśvāsā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīrghikā-tīrtha-vartinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arya-putra prasīda iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyāharat tāram āturā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.219'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma tataḥ khasthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ vidyādharapāṃsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paritaḥ sphuritasphīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇḍalāgrāṃśumaṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.219'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyāmi sma tataḥ kha-sthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ vidyā-dhara-pāṃsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paritaḥ sphurita-sphīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇḍala-agra-aṃśu-maṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.220'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>roṣabhīṣaṇaghoṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tenoktaṃ dharaṇīcara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te paśyata iyaṃ kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hriyate dhriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.220'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>roṣa-bhīṣaṇa-ghoṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena uktaṃ dharaṇī-cara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te paśyata iyaṃ kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hriyate dhriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.221'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krodhāpahatadhairyatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācyāvācyāvivecinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhāvitasvasāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayāsāv iti bhartsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.221'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krodha-apahata-dhairyatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācya-a-vācya-a-vivecinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhāvita-sva-sāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maya āsāv iti bhartsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.222'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśagocaro 'smīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ tvaṃ nīca vikatthase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāko 'pi hi nabhaścārī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ca muñcati nīcatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.222'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākāśa-go-caro 'smi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ tvaṃ nīca vikatthase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāko 'pi hi nabhaś-cārī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na ca muñcati nīcatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.223'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ siṃhaśirasi nyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kākaś caraṇam utpatet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tena paribhūtaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kesarī dharaṇīcaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.223'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ siṃha-śirasi nyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kākaś caraṇam utpatet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tena paribhūtaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kesarī dharaṇī-caraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.224'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam uttejyamāno 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāvatīrṇaḥ sa bhūtalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paritaś cakitaḥ paśyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāvajñānam ivābravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.224'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam uttejyamāno 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na avatīrṇaḥ sa bhū-talam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paritaś cakitaḥ paśyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-avajñānam iva abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.225'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthalakacchapakalpāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vainateyaparākramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvādṛśe mādṛśaḥ krudhyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kena pāpān na śocyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.225'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthala-kacchapa-kalpāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vainateya-parākramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvā-dṛśe mā-dṛśaḥ krudhyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kena pāpān na śocyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.226'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā karuṇākrandāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām asau khecarādhamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhuvaḥ śyena iva śyāmām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādāyodapatad divam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.226'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā karuṇa-ākrandāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām asau khe-cara-adhamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhuvaḥ śyena iva śyāmām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādāya udapatad divam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.227'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāpaśyaṃ mahājvālā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jvālasaṃkucitāmbarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āpatantīṃ divaṃ devīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpātolkām ivāśivām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.227'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha apaśyaṃ mahā-jvālā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jvāla-saṃkucita-ambarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āpatantīṃ divaṃ devīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpāta-ulkām iva a-śivām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.228'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caṇḍavidyādharānīka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivāraṃ ca bhūpatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākālam iva kruddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṇāmaragaṇānugam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.228'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caṇḍa-vidyā-dhara-anīka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivāraṃ ca bhū-patim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-kālam iva kruddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṇa-amara-gaṇa-anugam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.229'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttānavadanaś cāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caṇḍasiṃham anuvrajan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyatraiva gataḥ kvāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>diṅmohamuṣitasmṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.229'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uttāna-vadanaś ca ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caṇḍasiṃham anuvrajan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyatra eva gataḥ kva api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>diṅ-moha-muṣita-smṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.230'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrāmyatā śrāmyatā rūkṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛkṣeṣūpavane ghane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cirād ākarṇito dhīrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccakair uccaran dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.230'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrāmyatā śrāmyatā rūkṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛkṣeṣu upavane ghane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cirād ākarṇito dhīrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uccakair uccaran dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.231'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>he he kālākṣi kālākṣi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅge gaṅge mahīti ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vatsalānāṃ vivatsānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rambhaś ca subhago gavām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.231'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>he he kālākṣi kālākṣi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅge gaṅge mahi īti ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vatsalānāṃ vivatsānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rambhaś ca su-bhago gavām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.232'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā ca tvarayāpaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāṣṭīkaṃ pālam agrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulatthasthūlapulakam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>urujaṅghoruvistṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.232'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā ca tvaraya āpaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāṣṭīkaṃ pālam agrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulattha-sthūla-pulakam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uru-jaṅgha-uru-vistṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.233'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratimallabhujānāma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandhuraskandhakaṃdharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vegavaccarpaṭātāḍa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṇakarkaśakarṇakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.233'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratimalla-bhujā-nāma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bandhura-skandha-kaṃdharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vegavac-carpaṭā-tāḍa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṇa-karkaśa-karṇakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.234'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam abravaṃ sāmnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satataṃ mahitaṃ gavām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhraṣṭaḥ panthā mamāṭavyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam ākhyātu bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.234'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam abravaṃ sāmnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satataṃ mahitaṃ gavām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhraṣṭaḥ panthā mama aṭavyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam ākhyātu bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.235'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ gokule rātriṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamayitvā gataśramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prage draṣṭā svapanthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadeta svagṛhān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.235'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ go-kule rātriṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamayitvā gata-śramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prage draṣṭā sva-panthānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tada īta sva-gṛhān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.236'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā tena sahāpaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghoṣam āsannagokulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandramanthadhvanikṣipta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandarāsphālitārṇavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.236'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā tena saha apaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghoṣam āsanna-go-kulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mandra-mantha-dhvani-kṣipta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandara-āsphālita-arṇavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.237'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akuṭṭimasamā yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāṅgaṇoṭajabhūmayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haridgomayasaṃmārga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃprasāritamānasāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.237'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-kuṭṭima-samā- yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-aṅgaṇa-uṭaja-bhūmayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harid-go-maya-saṃmārga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃprasārita-mānasāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.238'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bandhūkacūtakāstambaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parikṣiptoṭajāṅgaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatra nābhīranārīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paribhūtaṃ karādharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.238'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bandhūka-cūtakā-stambaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parikṣipta-uṭaja-aṅgaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatra nā abhīra-nārīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paribhūtaṃ kara-adharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.239'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra tumbīlatājālaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṭīpaṭalarodhibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lajjitāḥ paṅkajinyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalikāṅgulitārjitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.239'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra tumbī-latā-jālaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṭī-paṭala-rodhibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lajjitāḥ paṅkajinyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalikā-aṅguli-tārjitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.240'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasminn adṛṣṭadurdarśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṃsusaṃkārasaṃkaṭāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niravācyatalā rathyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūrdaduddāmatarṇakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.240'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasminn a-dṛṣṭa-dur-darśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṃsu-saṃkāra-saṃkaṭāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-a-vācya-talā- rathyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kūrdad-uddāma-tarṇakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.241'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karṇikārāmalair aṅgaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛthulair jaghanasthalaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tādṛṅmalinaḥ strīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatra veṣo vibhūṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.241'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karṇikāra-a-malair aṅgaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛthulair jaghana-sthalaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tā-dṛṅ-malinaḥ strīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatra veṣo vibhūṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.242'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vanagokulavṛddhatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra gopā gavārjavāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gopyas tu caturācārā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>naṭīr apy atiśerate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.242'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vana-go-kula-vṛddhatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra go-pā- gav-ārjavāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gopyas tu catura-ācārā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>naṭīr apy atiśerate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.243'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādiprakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghoṣeṇa hṛtamānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māṃ gopaḥ svagṛhaṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhiṇīm āhvayan mudā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.243'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi-prakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghoṣeṇa hṛta-mānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māṃ go-paḥ sva-gṛhaṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhiṇīm āhvayan mudā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.244'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sudevaduhitaḥ kvāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nanu gopāladārike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devas te gṛham āyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa bhaktyārādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.244'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sudeva-duhitaḥ kva asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nanu go-pāla-dārike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devas te gṛham āyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa bhaktyā ārādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.245'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ payodaśakalāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā kaleva kalāvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhān niragamad gaurī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakīrṇatanucandrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.245'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ payo-da-śakalāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā kala īva kalāvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhān niragamad gaurī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakīrṇa-tanu-candrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.246'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dārudantaśilāmayyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratimās tāvad āsatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tāṃ vedhāḥ kṣamaḥ sraṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhūcchiṣṭamayīm api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.246'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dāru-danta-śilā-mayyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratimās tāvad āsatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tāṃ vedhāḥ kṣamaḥ sraṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhu-ucchiṣṭa-mayīm api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.247'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāvabhir vartamānaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kavibhiḥ kim udāhṛtaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tāṃ varṇayituṃ śaktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyāsavālmīkināv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.247'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāvabhir vartamānaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kavibhiḥ kim udāhṛtaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tāṃ varṇayituṃ śaktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyāsa-vālmīkināv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.248'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā māṃ gomayapīṭhasthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svaseva svacchamānasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśiraḥpādam aśrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvāhitavatī ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.248'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā māṃ gomaya-pīṭha-sthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasa īva svaccha-mānasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ā-śiraḥ-pādam a-śrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvāhitavatī ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.249'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaṃ yam evopasāraṃ sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuccham apy ācaren mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvam anvasahe taṃ taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dākṣiṇyakṣayaśaṅkayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.249'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaṃ yam eva upasāraṃ sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuccham apy ācaren mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvam anvasahe taṃ taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dākṣiṇya-kṣaya-śaṅkayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.250'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>salilaiḥ kāṃsyapātrasthair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhāvac caraṇau mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sottamāṅgeṣu cāṅgeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>navanītam adān mudā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.250'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>salilaiḥ kāṃsya-pātra-sthair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhāvac caraṇau mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-uttama-aṅgeṣu ca aṅgeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nava-nītam adān mudā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.251'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ucchādya kaṇakalkena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra stīmitamastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lodhrakarbūramustābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghṛṣṭo 'haṃ snapitas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.251'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ucchādya kaṇa-kalkena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra stīmita-mastakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lodhra-karbūra-mustābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghṛṣṭo 'haṃ snapitas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.252'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśitvā cāśanaṃ medhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alpānnaṃ bahugorasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipāpmānam ivātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amanye madyapāyinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.252'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśitvā ca aśanaṃ medhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alpa-annaṃ bahu-go-rasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vi-pāpmānam ivā atmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amanye madya-pāyinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.253'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalpayitvā tu me gopaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śayyāṃ valkalapallavaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etat te gṛham ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṃsabhāro vrajam avrajat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.253'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalpayitvā tu me go-paḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śayyāṃ valkala-pallavaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etat te gṛham ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṃsa-bhāro vrajam avrajat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.254'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd ayaṃ manye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vītarāgādibandhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakleśaḥ ko nu viśvasyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāreṣu ca pareṣu ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.254'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd ayaṃ manye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīta-rāga-ādi-bandhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-kleśaḥ ko nu viśvasyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāreṣu ca pareṣu ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.255'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādhāraṇakalatrāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īrśyākṣobhitacetasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiraścām api dṛśyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakāśamaraṇā raṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.255'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-ādhāraṇa-kalatrāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īrśyā-kṣobhita-cetasām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiraścām api dṛśyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakāśa-maraṇā- raṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.256'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu dayitān dārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>munimānasahāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayi nikṣipya yātīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyakta eṣa sa puṃgavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.256'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu dayitān dārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muni-mānasa-hāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayi nikṣipya yāti iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyakta eṣa sa puṃgavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.257'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā niṣpravīṇeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahirvṛttikuṭumbiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārītantreṣu tantreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim ācāraparīkṣayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.257'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā niṣ-pravīṇeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahir-vṛtti-kuṭumbiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārī-tantreṣu tantreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim ācāra-parīkṣayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.258'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rajakadhvajagopāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mālākāranaṭastriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyante yāḥ sadācārāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā tāsāṃ bālaśīlatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.258'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rajaka-dhvaja-go-pāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mālā-kāra-naṭa-striyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyante yāḥ sad-ācārāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā tāsāṃ bāla-śīlatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.259'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣā tu gopayoṣāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpiṇy api taruṇy api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ gambhīradhairyeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durbodhāḥ parabuddhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.259'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣā tu go-pa-yoṣa āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpiṇy- api taruṇy- api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ gambhīra-dhairya īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-bodhāḥ para-buddhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.260'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintām etāṃ kurvataḥ kāryavandhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsīt sā me sopakāraiva rātrīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyaḥ kāntākaṇṭhaviśleṣaduḥkham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārāt sahyaṃ cetasā yan na soḍham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.260'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintām etāṃ kurvataḥ kārya-vandhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsīt sā me sa-upakāra aiva rātrīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyaḥ kāntā-kaṇṭha-viśleṣa-duḥkham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārāt sahyaṃ cetasā yan na soḍham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.261'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prātaḥ sa māṃ gopaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛpālur iva tattvavit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghorāt kāntārasaṃsārād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>acirad udatārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.261'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prātaḥ sa māṃ go-paḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛpālur iva tattva-vit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghorāt kāntāra-saṃsārād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-cira-d udatārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.262'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa te saṃbhavagrāmaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśuprāgvaṃśakānanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyante yasya sīmāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sīramantaḥ sasaṃkaṭāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.262'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa te saṃbhavagrāmaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśu-prāg-vaṃśa-kānanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyante yasya sīmāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sīramantaḥ sa-saṃkaṭāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.263'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deśāntaram abhipretam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atra viśramya gamyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti mām idam uktvāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivṛttaḥ kṛtabandhanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.263'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deśa-antaram abhipretam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atra viśramya gamyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti mām idam uktva āsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivṛttaḥ kṛta-bandhanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.264'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athekṣugahanachāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣiptaśāradikātapāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sevamānaḥ prayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtapto bhānubhānubhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.264'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ikṣu-gahana-chāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣipta-śāradika-ātapāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sevamānaḥ prayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃtapto bhānu-bhānubhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.265'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vikāśikumudārāmāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśaṃsan sarasīḥ kvacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthalīr iva nidāghānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phullāviralakandarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.265'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vikāśi-kumuda-ārāmāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśaṃsan sarasīḥ kva-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthalīr iva nidāgha-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phulla-a-virala-kandarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.266'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvacid garbhitaśālīni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāleyāni kutūhalī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sagundrāgahanānīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>palvalāni vilokayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.266'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva-cid garbhita-śālīni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāleyāni kutūhalī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-gundrā-gahanāni iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>palvalāni vilokayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.267'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvacid utkūlakālindī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarāmbhaḥpūritair iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtahaṃsadvijātīryaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarobhiḥ prīṇitekṣaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.267'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva-cid utkūla-kālindī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sara-ambhaḥ-pūritair iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛta-haṃsa-dvi-ja-ātīryaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarobhiḥ prīṇita-īkṣaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.268'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sattvākārasatīkāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>komalāpāṇḍupāṃsubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛṣṭair ākṛṣṭadṛṣṭiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāhnavīpulinair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.268'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sattva-ākāra-satī-kāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>komala-āpāṇḍu-pāṃsubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛṣṭair ākṛṣṭa-dṛṣṭiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāhnavī-pulinair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.269'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādiśaratkāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntivismāritapriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gacchan puruṣam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāmād āyāntam antike ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.269'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi-śarat-kāla</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kānti-vismārita-priyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gacchan puruṣam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāmād āyāntam antike ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.270'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu māṃ ciram īkṣitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bravīti sma savismayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citram āryakaniṣṭhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yūyaṃ susadṛśā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.270'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu māṃ ciram īkṣitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bravīti sma sa-vismayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citram ārya-kaniṣṭhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yūyaṃ su-sadṛśā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.271'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd asaṃdigdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭavān eṣa gomukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi tasmād ṛte kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asti matsadṛśaḥ kṣitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.271'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd a-saṃdigdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭavān eṣa gomukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi tasmād ṛte kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asti mat-sadṛśaḥ kṣitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.272'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛcchāmi sma ca taṃ bhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa kaniṣṭhaḥ kva tiṣṭhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kīdṛśā vā vinodena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayed divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.272'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛcchāmi sma ca taṃ bhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa kaniṣṭhaḥ kva tiṣṭhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kī-dṛśā vā vinodena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayed divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.273'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tenoktam atraiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāme gṛhapatir dvijaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asti sādhāraṇārthārthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyavādī prasannakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.273'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tena uktam atra eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāme gṛha-patir dvi-jaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asti sādhāraṇa-artha-arthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priya-vādī prasannakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.274'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā brāhmaṇaḥ pṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena brahmasabhāṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgataḥ katamād deśāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim arthaṃ vā bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.274'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā brāhmaṇaḥ pṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena brahma-sabhāṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgataḥ katamād deśāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim arthaṃ vā bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.275'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam āgatāv āvām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avantiviṣayād dvijau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātarau sa ca me jyeṣṭho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātrāyām anyato gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.275'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam āgatāv āvām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avanti-viṣayād dvi-jau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātarau sa ca me jyeṣṭho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yātrāyām anyato gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.276'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad gaveṣayamāṇo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etaṃ grāmam upāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>chāttrāṇām atra sarveṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upapannaḥ samāgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.276'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad gaveṣayamāṇo 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etaṃ grāmam upāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>chāttrāṇām atra sarveṣām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upapannaḥ samāgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.277'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity ukte tena tenoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ vaḥ sadhanaṃ gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena yenātra vaḥ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tad ādīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.277'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity ukte tena tena uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ vaḥ sa-dhanaṃ gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena yena atra vaḥ kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tad ādīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.278'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhe gṛhapates tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣamāvān api śīlataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trastabhṛtyakṛtārādho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durvāsovad vasaty asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.278'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhe gṛha-pates tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣamāvān api śīlataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trasta-bhṛtya-kṛta-ārādho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durvāsovad vasaty asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.279'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hālikatvān na jānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jñātā kiṃ kim asāv iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yanmātraṃ tu vijānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanmātraṃ kathayāmi vaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.279'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hālikatvān na jānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jñātā kiṃ kim asāv iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yan-mātraṃ tu vijānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tan-mātraṃ kathayāmi vaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.280'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chāttrais tāvat kim uddiṣṭair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aprāptasakalāgamaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācāryā api vidyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyaiva chāttratāṃ gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.280'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chāttrais tāvat kim uddiṣṭair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-prāpta-sakala-āgamaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācāryā- api vidyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya eva chāttratāṃ gatāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.281'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti cāhuḥ kim asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛthaivātmāvasādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśvakarmātha vā brahmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasmān nāyam upāsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.281'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti cā ahuḥ kim asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛtha aivā atma-avasādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśvakarma ātha vā brahmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasmān na ayam upāsitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.282'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādivinodo 'sāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āryajyeṣṭhaṃ pratīkṣate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkaṇṭhaḥ sarvataḥ paśyañ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīmūtam iva cātakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.282'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi-vinodo 'sāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārya-jyeṣṭhaṃ pratīkṣate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkaṇṭhaḥ sarvataḥ paśyañ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīmūtam iva cātakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.283'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āryajyeṣṭho bhavān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi tal laghu kathyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akālakaumudī grāme</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasā jṛmbhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.283'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārya-jyeṣṭho bhavān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi tal laghu kathyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kāla-kaumudī grāme</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasā jṛmbhatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.284'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āma saumya sa evāham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti saṃvādito mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ūrdhvacūḍaḥ sa vegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prati grāmam adhāvata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.284'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āma saumya sa eva aham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti saṃvādito mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ūrdhva-cūḍaḥ sa vegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prati grāmam adhāvata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.285'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahasā tena cotkṣipto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāme trāsitakātaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utthitas toṣanirghoṣas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tālasaṃpātasaṃkulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.285'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahasā tena ca utkṣipto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grāme trāsita-kātaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utthitas toṣa-nirghoṣas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāla-saṃpāta-saṃkulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.286'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viniḥsṛtya tato grāmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukho vikasanmukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūrād eva yathādīrgham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apatan mama pādayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.286'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viniḥsṛtya tato grāmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukho vikasan-mukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūrād eva yathā-dīrgham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apatan mama pādayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.287'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālair āliṅgitaiḥ putrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāraiś ca na tathā priyaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janyate janitā prītis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena me suhṛdā yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.287'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālair āliṅgitaiḥ putrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāraiś ca na tathā priyaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janyate janitā prītis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena me suhṛdā yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.288'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasannavadanaṃ cārāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad ākhyātaṃ prasannakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅgya sahitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhavagrāmam āsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.288'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prasanna-vadanaṃ cārāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad ākhyātaṃ prasannakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅgya sahitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhava-grāmam āsadam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.289'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ubheṭīkūṭapaṭala</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāsādādigatā ca mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grāmīṇā janatā yāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgulībhir adarśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.289'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ubheṭī-kūṭa-paṭala</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāsāda-ādi-gatā ca mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grāmīṇā janatā yāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgulībhir adarśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.290'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prītānucaravargeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasannakaniveśane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtāsukarasatkāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prerayaṃ divasaṃ kṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.290'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prīta-anucara-vargeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasannaka-niveśane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛta-asu-kara-sat-kāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prerayaṃ divasaṃ kṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.291'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śayanīyagṛhasthaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām abhāṣata gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītavantaḥ kathaṃ yūyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iyato divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.291'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śayanīya-gṛha-sthaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām abhāṣata gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītavantaḥ kathaṃ yūyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iyato divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.292'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ghoṣavāsāvasāne ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svavṛtte kathite mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭaḥ svavṛtta ācaṣṭa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ priyavistaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.292'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ghoṣa-vāsa-avasāne ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-vṛtte kathite mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭaḥ sva-vṛtta ācaṣṭa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ priya-vistaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.293'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty ahaṃ svagṛhāt prātar</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmān sevitum āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratibuddhān na cāpaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇḍāv api divākare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.293'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty ahaṃ sva-gṛhāt prātar</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmān sevitum āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratibuddhān na ca apaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇḍāv api divā-kare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.294'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃbhrāntamatprayuktā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviśya paricārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā śūnyam iti sākrandā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirgatā vāsamandirāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.294'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃbhrāntamat-prayuktā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praviśya paricārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā śūnyam iti sa-ākrandā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirgatā vāsa-mandirāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.295'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ savatsakauśāmbī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kranditahrādapūritāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vindhyākāśadiśaś caṇḍam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āraṭann iva pīḍitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.295'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa-vatsa-kauśāmbī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>krandita-hrāda-pūritāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vindhya-ākāśa-diśaś caṇḍam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āraṭann iva pīḍitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.296'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tāḍitahastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā mā bhaiṣṭeti vādinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādityaśarmaṇā lokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siddhādeśena vāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.296'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tāḍita-hastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā mā bhaiṣṭa iti vādinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ādityaśarmaṇā lokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siddha-ādeśena vāritaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.297'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cāvocan mahīpālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ gatvā viṣaṇṇatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy adarśanamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhānoḥ saṃbhāvyate cyutiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.297'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca avocan mahī-pālam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃ gatvā viṣaṇṇatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy a-darśana-mātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhānoḥ saṃbhāvyate cyutiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.298'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya vegavatī rakṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣamāsaṃrakṣaṇakṣamā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahmajātir ivāvadhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kasmād duḥsthatām iyāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.298'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya vegavatī rakṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣamā-saṃrakṣaṇa-kṣamā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahma-jātir iva a-vadhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa kasmād duḥ-sthatām iyāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.299'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vottiṣṭhata snāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>juhatāśnīta gāyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścād vārttopalambhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viyad ālocyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.299'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha va ūttiṣṭhata snāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>juhata aśnīta gāyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paścād vārtta-upalambhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viyad ālocyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.300'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ śrutvāpi naivāsīt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasmaicid aśane ruciḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkaṇṭhāviṣayād anyat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ sotkaṇṭhāya rocate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.300'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ śrutva āpi na evā asīt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kasmai-cid aśane ruciḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkaṇṭhā-viṣayād anyat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ sa-utkaṇṭhāya rocate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.301'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athottānamukhāḥ paurāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khaṃ paśyantaḥ samantataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicchinnābhralavākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim apy aikṣanta pūrvataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.301'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uttāna-mukhāḥ paurāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khaṃ paśyantaḥ samantataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicchinna-abhra-lava-ākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim apy aikṣanta pūrvataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.302'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti paurāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvad vākyaṃ samāpyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvad āsannam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puro 'mitagatiṃ divaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.302'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti paurāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvad vākyaṃ samāpyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvad āsannam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puro 'mitagatiṃ divaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.303'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarapātāntare cāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vadhūveṣavibhūṣaṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vegavattanayāṃ devīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāntīm antaḥpuraṃ prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.303'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śara-pāta-antare ca asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vadhū-veṣa-vibhūṣaṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vegavat-tanayāṃ devīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāntīm antaḥ-puraṃ prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.304'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vyajñāpayaṃ devaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deva prājñaptikauśikiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>diṣṭyāmitagatiḥ prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītyā saṃbhāvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.304'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vyajñāpayaṃ devaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deva prājñapti-kauśikiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>diṣṭya āmitagatiḥ prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītyā saṃbhāvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.305'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu mām abravīt karṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ katham ayaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharo manuṣyeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satā saṃmānyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.305'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu mām abravīt karṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ katham ayaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dharo manuṣyeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satā saṃmānyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.306'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yayā hariśikhādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayāmitagatir dṛṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśrabdhaṃ dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.306'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yayā hariśikha-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taya āmitagatir dṛṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśrabdhaṃ dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.307'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgacchāgaccha tāteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa tam āhūtam āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasāritabhujaḥ prahvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āmṛśat pṛṣṭhamūrdhani ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.307'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgacchā agaccha tāta iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa tam āhūtam āgatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasārita-bhujaḥ prahvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āmṛśat pṛṣṭha-mūrdhani ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.308'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'pi nyubjikayā dūram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apasṛtya praṇamya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhūtaḥ punar ādiṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyāstānuccam āsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.308'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'pi nyubjikayā dūram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apasṛtya praṇamya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhūtaḥ punar ādiṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyāsta an-uccam āsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.309'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ rājā kṣaṇam āsīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akhedam idam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātuḥ kathaya vṛttāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti tenoditaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.309'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ rājā kṣaṇam āsīnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-khedam idam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātuḥ kathaya vṛtta-antam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti tena uditaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.310'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājñā mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakravartī nabhastalāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pātito 'ndhatame kūpe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svavīryāc cotthitas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.310'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājñā mānasavegena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakravartī nabhas-talāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pātito 'ndhatame kūpe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-vīryāc ca utthitas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.311'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegavaty api sakrodhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jitvā bhrātaram ambare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ matsahitāgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatā rājāvarodhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.311'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegavaty- api sa-krodhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jitvā bhrātaram ambare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ mat-sahitā āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gatā rāja-avarodhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.312'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuvarājo 'pi campāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattakaveśmani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhaṃ tiṣṭhati mā bhūt tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśaṅkā bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.312'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuva-rājo 'pi campāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇādattaka-veśmani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhaṃ tiṣṭhati mā bhūt tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśaṅkā bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.313'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātarau putra paśyeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samādiṣṭo mahībhujā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa mayā sahito gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devyau dūrād avandata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.313'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mātarau putra paśya iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samādiṣṭo mahī-bhujā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa mayā sahito gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devyau dūrād avandata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.314'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣaṇaṃ cāntaḥpure sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niryātaḥ sa mayoditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vistareṇa sakhe mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartur vṛttaṃ nivedyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.314'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣaṇaṃ ca antaḥ-pure sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niryātaḥ sa maya ūditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vistareṇa sakhe mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartur vṛttaṃ nivedyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.315'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhidyante na rahasyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurūṇāṃ saṃnidhau tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathābhinnarahasyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśaṅkaiḥ suhṛdām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.315'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhidyante na rahasyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurūṇāṃ saṃnidhau tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatha ā-bhinna-rahasyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-śaṅkaiḥ suhṛdām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.316'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoktaṃ tena yady evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivikte kvacid āsyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hīdaṃ śakyam ākhyātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na śrotuṃ prasthitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.316'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uktaṃ tena yady evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivikte kva-cid āsyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi idaṃ śakyam ākhyātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na śrotuṃ prasthitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.317'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāntaḥpuraniryūhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirākṛtamahājane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnāya sa me vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmadvṛttam avartayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.317'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha antaḥ-pura-niryūhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirākṛta-mahā-jane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnāya sa me vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmad-vṛttam avartayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.318'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty ahaṃ yuvarājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mocitaḥ śaṅkubandhanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenaiva ca kṛtānujñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyām aṅgārakaṃ prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.318'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty ahaṃ yuva-rājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mocitaḥ śaṅku-bandhanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena eva ca kṛta-anujñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāyām aṅgārakaṃ prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.319'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cakravartibhayāc cāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktavān kusumālikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balavatsaṃśrayāt kena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durbalena na bhīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.319'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cakra-varti-bhayāc ca asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktavān kusumālikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balavat-saṃśrayāt kena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-balena na bhīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.320'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'ham ādāya viśrabdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvatsakhīm āśrame pituḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avasaṃ divasān etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadācit kāśyapasthale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.320'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'ham ādāya viśrabdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvat-sakhīm āśrame pituḥ</seg> </l>
