<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avasaṃ divasān etān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kadā-cit kāśyapa-sthale ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.321'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adya cānugṛhīto 'smi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>smaratā cakravartinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca gatvā mayā dṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiṣṭhann avaṭasaṃkaṭe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.321'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adya ca anugṛhīto 'smi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>smaratā cakra-vartinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca gatvā mayā dṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiṣṭhann avaṭa-saṃkaṭe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.322'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cāvaṭataṭastho mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ājñayānugṛhītavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yudhyāmānāṃ saha bhrātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rakṣa vegavatīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.322'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca avaṭa-taṭa-stho mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ājñaya ānugṛhītavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yudhyāmānāṃ saha bhrātrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rakṣa vegavatīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.323'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utpatya ca mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirjitā bhrātṛśātravā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkhātanijarāgeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yoginīcakravartinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.323'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utpatya ca mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirjitā bhrātṛ-śātravā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkhāta-nija-rāga īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yoginī-cakra-vartinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.324'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu māṃ praṇataṃ dūrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ājñāpitavatī laghu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātaḥ prajñaptim āvartya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāmī vijñāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.324'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu māṃ praṇataṃ dūrād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ājñāpitavatī laghu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrātaḥ prajñaptim āvartya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāmī vijñāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.325'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ vijñāpitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devi campānivāsinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavane dattakasyāste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra saṃbhāvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.325'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ vijñāpitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devi campā-nivāsinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavane dattakasyā aste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra saṃbhāvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.326'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dūreṇa māṃ jitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegād vegavatī gatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāvṛḍjaḍam ivāmbhodaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samīraṇaparaṃparā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.326'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dūreṇa māṃ jitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vegād vegavatī gatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāvṛḍ-jaḍam iva ambho-daṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samīraṇa-paraṃ-parā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.327'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāpya cāticirāc campām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ dattakaveśmani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭavān mānuṣādṛśyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devīṃ devasya saṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.327'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāpya ca ati-cirāc campām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ dattaka-veśmani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭavān mānuṣa-a-dṛśyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devīṃ devasya saṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.328'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāgabhogāṅkaparyaṅke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣaṇṇaṃ ca nabhaḥpatim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jagatpatim ivānanta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhujaṅgotsaṅgaśāyinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.328'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāga-bhoga-aṅka-paryaṅke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣaṇṇaṃ ca nabhaḥ-patim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jagat-patim iva ananta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhujaṅga-utsaṅga-śāyinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.329'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛṣṭaś ca yuvarājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādareṇaiva dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rūpaṃ gandharvadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kīdṛg ity ucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.329'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛṣṭaś ca yuva-rājena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-ādareṇa eva dattakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rūpaṃ gandharvadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kī-dṛg ity ucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.330'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegavatyā tataḥ krodha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dainyavailakṣyadhūmrayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyāmitagate bhartur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācāram iti bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.330'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vegavatyā tataḥ krodha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dainya-vailakṣya-dhūmrayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśya amitagate bhartur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācāram iti bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.331'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varṇitaṃ dattakenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpaṃ tasyās tathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyo vikasitaṃ bhartur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devyās tu mlānam ānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.331'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varṇitaṃ dattakena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpaṃ tasyās tathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadyo vikasitaṃ bhartur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devyās tu mlānam ānanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.332'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoktaṃ śanakair bhartrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattakaḥ kūpakacchapaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpam eṣa praśaṃsati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.332'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uktaṃ śanakair bhartrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattakaḥ kūpa-kacchapaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena gandharvadattāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpam eṣa praśaṃsati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.333'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi paśyed ayaṃ mugdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyāṃ madanamañjukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūre gandharvadattāstāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rambhām api na varṇayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.333'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi paśyed ayaṃ mugdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyāṃ madanamañjukām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūre gandharvadattā āstāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rambhām api na varṇayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.334'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś cāryaduhitrāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kampayitvā śanaiḥ śiraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahu śrotavyam atrāsti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nipuṇaṃ śrūyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.334'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś ca arya-duhitra āhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kampayitvā śanaiḥ śiraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahu śrotavyam atra asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nipuṇaṃ śrūyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.335'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punar apy uktavān svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā tathāpi priyā priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyāṃ vegavatīṃ prāpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat satyaṃ vismṛtaiva me ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.335'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punar apy uktavān svāmī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā tatha āpi priyā priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyāṃ vegavatīṃ prāpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat satyaṃ vismṛta aiva me ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.336'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sadyas tadaṅgāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjāmukulitāny api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adrākṣaṃ vikasantīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṅgībhūtais tanūruhaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.336'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sadyas tad-aṅgāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjā-mukulitāny api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adrākṣaṃ vikasanti īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tuṅgī-bhūtais tanū-ruhaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.337'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś cāsmi tayā smitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrātar gacchāva saṃprati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvannāparam etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃcid durvaca ucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.337'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaś ca asmi tayā smitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrātar gacchāva saṃprati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvanna a-param etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ-cid dur-vaca ucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.338'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekena paṭunānekaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūṣyate madhuraṃ vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣatoyalaveneva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dugdhakuṇḍam urūdaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.338'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekena paṭuna ān-ekaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūṣyate madhuraṃ vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣa-toya-lavena iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dugdha-kuṇḍam uru-udaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.339'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvatyā velayā devyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vākyam ityādi kalpitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devaḥ saṃcintya tāvatyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścād ūhitavān idam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.339'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvatyā velayā devyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vākyam ity-ādi kalpitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devaḥ saṃcintya tāvatyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścād ūhitavān idam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.340'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā prāpya dvitīyāṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vismṛtā prathamā priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛtīyāyās tatha prāptyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvitīyā vismariṣyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.340'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā prāpya dvitīyāṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vismṛtā prathamā priyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛtīyāyās tatha prāptyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvitīyā vismariṣyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.341'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāvyastrīvastracandreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyeṇa viguṇeṣv api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apurāṇeṣu rajyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svabhāvād eva jantavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.341'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāvya-strī-vastra-candreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyeṇa viguṇeṣv api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-purāṇeṣu rajyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-bhāvād eva jantavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.342'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena gandharvadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śulkaṃ saṃpādyatām aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasahya svīkariṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛṣṇām iva dhanaṃjayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.342'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena gandharvadattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śulkaṃ saṃpādyatām aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasahya svī-kariṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛṣṇām iva dhanaṃjayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.343'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti dāruṇayā patyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyaṃ vācā vimohitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭyā dṛṣṭiviṣasyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niśceṣṭā vasudhām agāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.343'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti dāruṇayā patyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyaṃ vācā vimohitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭyā dṛṣṭi-viṣasya iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niś-ceṣṭā vasudhām agāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.344'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kiṃkāryamūḍhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā katham api prabhuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratīkāraśatāvadhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛttāntaṃ taṃ na bodhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.344'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kiṃ-kārya-mūḍhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā katham api prabhuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratīkāra-śata-a-vadhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛtta-antaṃ taṃ na bodhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.345'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utthāya ca sasaṃjñeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divam utpatya bhāṣate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandamānā guroḥ pādān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣapayāmi śarīrakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.345'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utthāya ca sa-saṃjñeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divam utpatya bhāṣate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vandamānā guroḥ pādān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣapayāmi śarīrakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.346'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athavā kuru bandhutvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrātaḥ kāṣṭhāni saṃhara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājadvāre śmaśāne vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yas tiṣṭhati sa bāndhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.346'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athavā kuru bandhutvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrātaḥ kāṣṭhāni saṃhara</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-dvāre śmaśāne vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yas tiṣṭhati sa bāndhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.347'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥkhāni hy anubhūyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saśarīraiḥ śarīribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥkhādhikaraṇaṃ tan me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīraṃ dahyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.347'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duḥkhāni hy anubhūyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-śarīraiḥ śarīribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥkha-adhikaraṇaṃ tan me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīraṃ dahyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.348'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayokteyaṃ kva devasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī vegavataḥ sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva cāsadṛśam etat te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadanān nirgataṃ vacaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.348'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūkta īyaṃ kva devasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī vegavataḥ sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kva ca a-sadṛśam etat te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadanān nirgataṃ vacaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.349'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi tyaktaśarīrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarīraṃ na punar bhavet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato naiva virudhyeran</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nātmānair ātmyavādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.349'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi tyakta-śarīrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarīraṃ na punar bhavet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato na eva virudhyeran</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na-ātmānair ātmya-vādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.350'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cittavṛttinirodhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat khinnair mokṣubhiś ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mustāgranthipramāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad viṣeṇaiva labhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.350'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>citta-vṛtti-nirodhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat khinnair mokṣubhiś ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mustā-granthi-pramāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad viṣeṇa eva labhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.351'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān nāstikyam ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvasarvajñaninditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmādhikaraṇaṃ devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīraṃ pālyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.351'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān nāstikyam ujjhitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-sarva-jña-ninditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharma-adhikaraṇaṃ devi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīraṃ pālyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.352'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu sarvam evedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśrutvā śūnyacetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu saṃhara dārūṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ cireṇeti bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.352'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu sarvam eva idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-śrutvā śūnya-cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nanu saṃhara dārūṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ cireṇa iti bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.353'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ yadi yuṣmākam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ cetasi niścayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham eva tataḥ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviśāmi citām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.353'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ yadi yuṣmākam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ cetasi niścayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aham eva tataḥ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praviśāmi citām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.354'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāhaṃ paruṣālāpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktaḥ kupitayā tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām anumriyamāṇas tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ucyase kiṃ janair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.354'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ahaṃ paruṣā alāpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktaḥ kupitayā tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām anumriyamāṇas tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ucyase kiṃ janair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.355'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athainām uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyam etad virudhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvitaṃ tu mahādoṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā ca śrūyatāṃ kathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.355'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha enām uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyam etad virudhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jīvitaṃ tu mahā-doṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā ca śrūyatāṃ kathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.356'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyās tv ākāśae āsāno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥśliṣṭālāpakarpaṭām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cittam ākṣiptavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathākanthāṃ prasārayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.356'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyās tv ākāśae āsāno</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥ-śliṣṭa-ālāpa-karpaṭām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cittam ākṣiptavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathā-kanthāṃ prasārayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.357'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti bhāgīrathīkacchaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśukāśaśarākāraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>badarīkhadiraprāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntāratarudurgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.357'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti bhāgīrathī-kacchaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśu-kāśa-śara-ākāraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>badarī-khadira-prāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntāra-taru-dur-gamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.358'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sphītasīmāntaluṇṭhākāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khaḍgiśambarataskarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durgarājaṃ yam āśritya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājabhyo 'pi na bibhyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.358'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sphīta-sīma-anta-luṇṭhākāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khaḍgi-śambara-taskarāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dur-ga-rājaṃ yam āśritya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājabhyo 'pi na bibhyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.359'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhāvād yasya śārdūlair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viralīkṛtagokulaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>goṣṭhaśvā iva gāyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mattā mṛgayudantinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.359'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhāvād yasya śārdūlair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viralī-kṛta-go-kulaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>goṣṭha-śvā- iva gāyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mattā- mṛgayu-dantinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.360'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca gharmāntavādāgni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jvālājanitavedanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>payaḥśvetapayaḥpūrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvāpayati jāhnavī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.360'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca gharma-anta-vāda-agni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jvālā-janita-vedanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>payaḥ-śveta-payaḥ-pūrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvāpayati jāhnavī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.361'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrānyatra śarastambe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>badarījhāṭaveṣṭite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bilaṃ kṛtvā śatadvāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uvāsa kila mūṣika ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.361'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra anyatra śara-stambe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>badarī-jhāṭa-veṣṭite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bilaṃ kṛtvā śata-dvāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>uvāsa kila mūṣika ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.362'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāneyaiḥ pāvanair annair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāhnavīyaiś ca vāribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa bhṛtyān bibharām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaikhānasa ivāśrame ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.362'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāneyaiḥ pāvanair annair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāhnavīyaiś ca vāribhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa bhṛtyān bibharām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaikhānasa ivā aśrame ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.363'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācit proṣite tasminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āhārāhārakāṅkṣiṇi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛham asyāgaman mitram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākhur nagaragocaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.363'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cit proṣite tasminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āhāra-āhāra-kāṅkṣiṇi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛham asyā agaman mitram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākhur nagara-go-caraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.364'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīnaś cārghyapādyābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau mūṣikayārcitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām apṛcchat kva yāto naḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhā sakhi bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.364'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīnaś ca arghya-pādyābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau mūṣikaya ārcitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām apṛcchat kva yāto naḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhā sakhi bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.365'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayāhārārhtam ity ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthitaṃ tam uvāca sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam āyāti te bhrātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sumuhūrtam udīkṣyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.365'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā āhāra-arhtam ity ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthitaṃ tam uvāca sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam āyāti te bhrātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-muhūrtam udīkṣyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.366'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asatkāre gṛhād yāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtaghne 'pi sa te sakhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidrāhārābhilāṣābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saptarātraṃ viyujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.366'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-sat-kāre gṛhād yāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛta-ghne 'pi sa te sakhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidrā-āhāra-abhilāṣābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapta-rātraṃ viyujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.367'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ punas tasya mitraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cirāc ca gṛham āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirātithyaś ca yāmīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛṣas tvam aviṣāṇakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.367'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ punas tasya mitraṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cirāc ca gṛham āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-ātithyaś ca yāmi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛṣas tvam a-viṣāṇakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.368'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvac ceyaṃ kathā tāvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirgranthāṅgamalīmasaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūmair dhūsarito bhānuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svarbhānutimirair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.368'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvac ca iyaṃ kathā tāvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirgrantha-aṅga-malīmasaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhūmair dhūsarito bhānuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svar-bhānu-timirair iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.369'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anantaraṃ ca sāṅgāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhasmasaṃtānahāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apavanta nabhasvanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgātāṇḍavahetavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.369'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-antaraṃ ca sa-aṅgāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhasma-saṃtāna-hāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apavanta nabhasvanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgā-tāṇḍava-hetavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.370'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pṛṣatagokarṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>paraṃparaparaṃparāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>laṅghitodbhrāntaśārdūlāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prādhāvann abhi jāhnavīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.370'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pṛṣata-gokarṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>paraṃ-para-paraṃ-parāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>laṅghita-udbhrānta-śārdūlāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prādhāvann abhi jāhnavīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.371'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsau mūṣikaḥ pāpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām āmantrya sasaṃbhramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apagantum upakrāntas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayā saṃbhrāntayoditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.371'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asau mūṣikaḥ pāpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām āmantrya sa-saṃbhramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apagantum upakrāntas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayā saṃbhrāntaya ūditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.372'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho nagaravāsitvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devareṇa prakāśitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāsāhasam ārabdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmānaṃ yena rakṣatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.372'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho nagara-vāsitvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devareṇa prakāśitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-sāhasam ārabdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmānaṃ yena rakṣatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.373'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāgarāḥ kila bhāṣante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmārthagranthakovidāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmārthe sakalāṃ jahyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṇḍitaḥ pṛthivīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.373'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāgarāḥ kila bhāṣante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharma-artha-grantha-kovidāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātma-arthe sakalāṃ jahyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṇḍitaḥ pṛthivīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.374'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvadīyena tu mitreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mitrāmitrā vipadgatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīranirapekṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaguṇā iva rakṣitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.374'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvadīyena tu mitreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mitra-a-mitrā- vipad-gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarīra-nir-apekṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-guṇā- iva rakṣitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.375'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā kṛtam ālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akālo 'yam udāsitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāvadāhabhayād bālān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paritrāyasva putrakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.375'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā kṛtam ālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-kālo 'yam udāsitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāva-dāha-bhayād bālān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paritrāyasva putrakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.376'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahūn etān ahaṃ mugdhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anunmīlitalocanān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañcarātraprasūtatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃcārayitum akṣamā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.376'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahūn etān ahaṃ mugdhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-unmīlita-locanān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pañca-rātra-prasūtatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃcārayitum a-kṣamā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.377'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ punaḥ puruṣaḥ śaktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyāpatyaś ca yatnataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tuṅgagaṅgātaṭīṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃcāraya sutān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.377'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ punaḥ puruṣaḥ śaktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priya-āpatyaś ca yatnataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tuṅga-gaṅgā-taṭīṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃcāraya sutān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.378'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu pāpākhur ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhrāntavyāghravāladhim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muṣikām avakarṇyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgārodhaḥ parāgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.378'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu pāpa-ākhur ālambya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhrānta-vyāghra-vāladhim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muṣikām avakarṇya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgā-rodhaḥ parāgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.379'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pāṣāṇavarṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patataḥ kuṭṭimeṣv iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utthitaḥ paritaḥ kacchaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭuḥ paṭapaṭādhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.379'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pāṣāṇa-varṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>patataḥ kuṭṭimeṣv iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utthitaḥ paritaḥ kacchaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭuḥ paṭa-paṭā-dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.380'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athālocya bubhukṣos taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kakṣaṃ kakṣaṃ vibhāvasoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvaṃ jvālāc chalenāṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jihvāmayam ivābhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.380'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā alocya bubhukṣos taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kakṣaṃ kakṣaṃ vibhāvasoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvaṃ jvālāc chalena aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jihvā-mayam iva abhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.381'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dāvakālānalaḥ stamba</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kakṣasaṃsāram āyatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dagdhvā nirindhanaḥ śāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpya gaṅgātaṭāmbaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.381'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dāva-kāla-analaḥ stamba</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kakṣa-saṃsāram āyatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dagdhvā nir-indhanaḥ śāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpya gaṅgā-taṭa-ambaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.382'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ paṭumarudvyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhamsaskandhavasuṃdharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣaṇena dadṛśe kacchaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṃśuvalmīkasaṃkulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.382'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ paṭu-marud-vyasta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhamsa-skandha-vasuṃdharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣaṇena dadṛśe kacchaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāṃśu-valmīka-saṃkulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.383'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn īdṛśe kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkāgrastaḥ sa mūṣikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anumāya cirāc cihnair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ājagāma svam ālayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.383'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn īdṛśe kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkā-grastaḥ sa mūṣikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anumāya cirāc cihnair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ājagāma svam ālayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.384'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāpaśyat tataḥ kāntām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antargṛham acetanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvālāvyatikaroṣṇābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utsvinnāṃ dhūmavartibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.384'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra apaśyat tataḥ kāntām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antar-gṛham a-cetanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvālā-vyatikara-uṣṇābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utsvinnāṃ dhūma-vartibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.385'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvān āliṅgya sarvāṅgaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāvakān gatajīvakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrghanidrām upāsīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asaṃmīlitalocanān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.385'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvān āliṅgya sarva-aṅgaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāvakān gata-jīvakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrgha-nidrām upāsīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-saṃmīlita-locanān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.386'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mūḍhaś ciraṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabuddho vilalāpa saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vilāpaikavinodā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bandhuvyasanapīḍitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.386'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mūḍhaś ciraṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabuddho vilalāpa saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vilāpa-eka-vinodā- hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bandhu-vyasana-pīḍitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.387'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahābhūtāni bhūtāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhūtānāṃ bhūtaye kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahābhūtena bhūtāṅge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatā kim idaṃ kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.387'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahā-bhūtāni bhūtāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhūtānāṃ bhūtaye kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-bhūtena bhūta-aṅge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatā kim idaṃ kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.388'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varaṃ brahmavadhādīni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātakāni mahānty api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na punar yat tvayā pāpa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duṣkaraṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.388'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varaṃ brahma-vadha-ādīni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātakāni mahānty api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na punar yat tvayā pāpa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duṣ-karaṃ duṣ-kṛtaṃ kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.389'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nanu brahmavadhādīni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānti niṣkṛtibhiḥ kṣayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaraṇāgatabālastrī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtahatyās tu duḥkṣayāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.389'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nanu brahma-vadha-ādīni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānti niṣkṛtibhiḥ kṣayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaraṇa-āgata-bāla-strī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛta-hatyās tu duḥ-kṣayāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.390'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasmān niṣkaruṇenedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dagdham ākhukulaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daśajanmasahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād ākhur bhaviṣyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.390'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasmān niṣ-karuṇena idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dagdham ākhu-kulaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daśa-janma-sahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād ākhur bhaviṣyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.391'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā nirdahatv eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīptaśāpahutāśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam eva capalaṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvabhakṣaḥ kṛto bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.391'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā nirdahatv eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīpta-śāpa-huta-āśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tam eva capalaṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarva-bhakṣaḥ kṛto bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.392'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi vilapantaṃ taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sametya sa suhṛd dhruvaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūṣikair aparaiḥ sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alīkam avadad vacaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.392'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi vilapantaṃ taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sametya sa suhṛd dhruvaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūṣikair aparaiḥ sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alīkam avadad vacaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.393'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayam eva sakhe sakhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>strītvād vāmasvabhāvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayi prārthayamāne 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṭumbam avasāditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.393'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayam eva sakhe sakhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>strītvād vāma-sva-bhāvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayi prārthayamāne 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṭumbam avasāditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.394'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daśakṛtvo mayokteyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavatī sahitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgākūlaṃ tribhir vāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāvakān nayatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.394'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>daśa-kṛtvo maya ūkta īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavatī sahitā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgā-kūlaṃ tribhir vāraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāvakān nayatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.395'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asaṃbhrāntā ca mām āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kātarāṇāṃ bhavādṛśām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apāyaśatadarśinyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svacchavṛtte 'pi buddhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.395'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-saṃbhrāntā ca mām āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kātarāṇāṃ bhavā-dṛśām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apāya-śata-darśinyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaccha-vṛtte 'pi buddhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.396'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vetasvannaḍvalopāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antare palvalaṃ mahat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīlāviralaparṇāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jambūvañjularājayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.396'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vetasvan-naḍvala-upāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>antare palvalaṃ mahat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīla-a-virala-parṇāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jambū-vañjula-rājayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.397'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cāgner asti sāmarthyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adāhyaṃ dagdhum īdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'tidūreṇa vicchinnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham asmān dahed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.397'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca agner asti sāmarthyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-dāhyaṃ dagdhum īdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'ti-dūreṇa vicchinnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham asmān dahed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.398'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu mitrīyamāṇas taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciram ālokya pṛṣṭavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evam uktaḥ prajāvatyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān kiṃ kṛtavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.398'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu mitrīyamāṇas taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciram ālokya pṛṣṭavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evam uktaḥ prajāvatyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavān kiṃ kṛtavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.399'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ vāmaśīlatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadeyaṃ pratyavasthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣpratyāśas tadā prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ rakṣitavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.399'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ vāma-śīlatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yada īyaṃ pratyavasthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣ-pratyāśas tadā prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ rakṣitavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.400'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lajjamāne nate tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthite 'sādhāvadhomukhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhur anyatamas teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam asādhum abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.400'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lajjamāne nate tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthite '-sādha-avadho-mukhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhur anyatamas teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam a-sādhum abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.401'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tuṣān gopayatā tyaktāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prājñena kalamās tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakṣatā sutyajān prāṇāṃs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaktā yad dustyajā guṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.401'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tuṣān gopayatā tyaktāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prājñena kalamās tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakṣatā su-tyajān prāṇāṃs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyaktā- yad dus-tyajā- guṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.402'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāṇānāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśeṣaḥ syāt kiyān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mīmāṃsitvā ciraṃ devāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāmyam eṣām akalpayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.402'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāṇānāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśeṣaḥ syāt kiyān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mīmāṃsitvā ciraṃ devāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāmyam eṣām akalpayan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.403'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tān prajāpatir āhaitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā kṛdhvaṃ viṣamaṃ samam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taraṃgataralāḥ prāṇā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇā merusthirā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.403'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tān prajā-patir āha etya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā kṛdhvaṃ viṣamaṃ samam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taraṃga-taralāḥ prāṇā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇā- meru-sthirā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.404'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā mṛta eva tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utkrāntaṃ paśya te yaśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaśomaraṇāt trastā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaśojīvā hi sādhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.404'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā mṛta eva tvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utkrāntaṃ paśya te yaśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-yaśo-maraṇāt trastā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaśo-jīvā- hi sādhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.405'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakhe sāvāgninā dagdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvatkuṭumbaṃ mamāgrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ jīvita ity etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko brūyān mūṣikād ṛte ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.405'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakhe sāva-agninā dagdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvat-kuṭumbaṃ mama agrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ahaṃ jīvita ity etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko brūyān mūṣikād ṛte ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.406'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti te tam upālabhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parisaṃsthāpya cetaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭumbaṃ cāsya saṃskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratijagmur yathāgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.406'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti te tam upālabhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parisaṃsthāpya ca itaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭumbaṃ ca asya saṃskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratijagmur yathā-āgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.407'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cākhur mūṣikaśreṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmād ārabhya vāsarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsanasthānasaṃbhāṣā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhogair varjitaḥ kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.407'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cā akhur mūṣika-śreṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmād ārabhya vāsarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsana-sthāna-saṃbhāṣā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhogair varjitaḥ kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.408'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu svāminīṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pavitritacitānalām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṣatāṅgaḥ svayaṃ mandaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vakṣyāmi puraḥ prabhoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.408'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu svāminīṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pavitrita-cita-analām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kṣata-aṅgaḥ svayaṃ mandaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vakṣyāmi puraḥ prabhoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.409'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caturvargasya dharmāder</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hetuḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhubhir varjyamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naṣṭam etac catuṣṭayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.409'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>catur-vargasya dharma-āder</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hetuḥ sādhu-samāgamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhubhir varjyamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naṣṭam etac catuṣṭayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.410'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad gariṣṭhād ato doṣāl</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>laghiṣṭhaṃ maraṇaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgīkṛtam alaṃ prāṇair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>akīrtimalinair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.410'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad gariṣṭhād ato doṣāl</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>laghiṣṭhaṃ maraṇaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgī-kṛtam alaṃ prāṇair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-kīrti-malinair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.411'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvac ca samayaṃ baddhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathā parisamāpyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvad āvām anuprāptāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsthānaṃ bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.411'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvac ca samayaṃ baddhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathā parisamāpyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvad āvām anuprāptāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsthānaṃ bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.412'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa satkṛto rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasanābharaṇādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prītaḥ prītaṃ mahīpālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇipatya tiro 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.412'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa sat-kṛto rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasana-ābharaṇa-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prītaḥ prītaṃ mahī-pālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇipatya tiro 'bhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.413'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāciragate devaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>senāpatir abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantreṇa saha gacchantu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>campāṃ hariśikhādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.413'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra a-cira-gate devaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>senā-patir abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantreṇa saha gacchantu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>campāṃ hariśikha-ādayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.414'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājaputrasya nāgantuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na sthātuṃ tatra yujyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānthasyevāsahāyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>purādhiṣṭhānavāsinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.414'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāja-putrasya nā agantuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na sthātuṃ tatra yujyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānthasya iva a-sahāyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pura-adhiṣṭhāna-vāsinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.415'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śatāni pañca nāgānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhyastāstraniṣādinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvanty eva sahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśām eva vājinām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.415'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śatāni pañca nāgānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhyasta-astra-niṣādinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvanty eva sahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśām eva vājinām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.416'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pattayaś ca pratiṣṭhantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vājisaṃkhyācaturguṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pattirakṣyā hi mātaṅgāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmaṇyāḥ samareṣv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.416'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pattayaś ca pratiṣṭhantāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāji-saṃkhyā-catur-guṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patti-rakṣyā- hi mātaṅgāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmaṇyāḥ samareṣv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.417'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāptakālam idaṃ stutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā senāpater vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantreṇa sāhitān asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāhiṇod yuṣmadantikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.417'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāpta-kālam idaṃ stutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā senā-pater vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantreṇa sāhitān asmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāhiṇod yuṣmad-antikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.418'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vindhyācalacchāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guñjadvānarakuñjarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākrāmantaḥ prayāmaḥ sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svacchaśailasarijjalām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.418'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vindhya-a-cala-cchāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guñjad-vānara-kuñjarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākrāmantaḥ prayāmaḥ sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaccha-śaila-sarij-jalām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.419'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃniviṣṭaṃ ca tat tantram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyasmin vindhyasānuṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhvanatpaṭahaśṛṅgaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cauracakram upāgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.419'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃniviṣṭaṃ ca tat tantram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyasmin vindhya-sānuṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhvanat-paṭaha-śṛṅgaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caura-cakram upāgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.420'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adṛṣṭatarupāṣāṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śakuntamṛgacāraṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭaḥ pulīndrabhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vindhyaḥ pariṇamann iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.420'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-dṛṣṭa-taru-pāṣāṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śakunta-mṛga-cāraṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭaḥ pulīndra-bhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vindhyaḥ pariṇamann iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.421'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pulindrakodaṇḍa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṣaṇḍamuktaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtatair vayam ākrāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śalabhair iva śālayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.421'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pulindra-kodaṇḍa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṣaṇḍa-muktaiḥ śilī-mukhaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtatair vayam ākrāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śalabhair iva śālayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.422'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nāgādhirūḍhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saināpatyena tat kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyakṣam api yad dṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kaścit samabhāvayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.422'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nāga-adhirūḍhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sainā-patyena tat kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praty-akṣam api yad dṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kaś-cit samabhāvayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.423'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatkarabhramitaprāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakraprāntaparāgatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parāvṛtya parān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parāghnanparamārgaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.423'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat-kara-bhramita-prāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakra-prānta-parāgatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parāvṛtya parān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parāghnan-para-mārgaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.424'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrāntakuntaparikṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na śarīram adṛśyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya bāhusahasraṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phalena samabhāvyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.424'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrānta-kunta-parikṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na śarīram adṛśyata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya bāhu-sahasraṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phalena samabhāvyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.425'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākrāntacaturāśeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vindhyakāntāravāsiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadvisṛṣṭān apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yugapat patataḥ śarān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.425'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākrānta-catur-āśeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vindhya-kāntāra-vāsiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad-visṛṣṭān apaśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yugapat patataḥ śarān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.426'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sphuratkiraṇanistriṃśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇir yaugandharāyaṇiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭaḥ sarveṇa sarveṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulīndrāṇāṃ puraḥ sthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.426'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sphurat-kiraṇa-nistriṃśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṇir yaugandharāyaṇiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭaḥ sarveṇa sarveṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulīndrāṇāṃ puraḥ sthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.427'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathānena saṃdṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paracakram udāyudham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadāsannavimānasthair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.427'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvatha ānena saṃdṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>para-cakram ud-āyudham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad-āsanna-vimāna-sthair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.428'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratipakṣakṣayaṃ ghoram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akarot taṃ tapantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtabrahmāstramokṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>droṇenāpi na yaḥ kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.428'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratipakṣa-kṣayaṃ ghoram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akarot taṃ tapantakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛta-brahma-astra-mokṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>droṇena api na yaḥ kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.429'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayāpi saturaṃgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra tatrābhidhāvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣprayojanayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sve pare copahāsitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.429'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā-api sa-turaṃgeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra tatra abhidhāvatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣ-prayojana-yatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sve pare ca upahāsitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.430'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taskaracakreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyatibhinnaṃ bhavadbalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīhāranikareṇeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāsvatkarakadambakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.430'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas taskara-cakreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyatibhinnaṃ bhavad-balam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīhāra-nikareṇa iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāsvat-kara-kadambakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.431'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn ākule kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śālaskandhāvṛtaḥ paraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛḍhaṃ marmaṇi bāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>matturaṃgam atāḍayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.431'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn ākule kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāla-skandha-āvṛtaḥ paraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛḍhaṃ marmaṇi bāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mat-turaṃgam atāḍayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.432'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>turaṃgas tu tathā pāda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāḍanāny avicintayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthāṇupāṣāṇagartāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathāvegam adhāvata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.432'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>turaṃgas tu tathā pāda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāḍanāny a-vicintayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthāṇu-pāṣāṇa-gartāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā-vegam adhāvata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.433'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dināntena ca nirgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gahanād vindhyakānanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthita evāmucat prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścāt kāyam apātayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.433'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dina-antena ca nirgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gahanād vindhya-kānanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthita eva amucat prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścāt kāyam apātayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.434'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃhṛtya dārūṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurūṇi ca bahūni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyānuṣthitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃskāraṃ sodakakriyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.434'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃhṛtya dārūṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gurūṇi ca bahūni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya anuṣthitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃskāraṃ sa-udaka-kriyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.435'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>diṅmohabhrāntacetāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśum āruhya śākhinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etaṃ grāmakam adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārād ākulagokulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.435'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>diṅ-moha-bhrānta-cetāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṃśum āruhya śākhinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etaṃ grāmakam adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārād ākula-go-kulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.436'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgataś cāham etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhunārādhitas tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā gurur yathā devo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā rājā yathāv varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.436'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgataś ca aham etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhunā ārādhitas tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā gurur yathā devo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā rājā yathāv varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.437'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca taskarasenānyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aghnan hariśikhādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti mahyam iyaṃ vārttā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathitā pathikair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.437'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca taskara-senā-anyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aghnan hariśikha-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti mahyam iyaṃ vārttā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathitā pathikair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_20.438'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāntāsuhṛdguṇakathāśravaṇotsukasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramyā vinidranayanasya gatā mamāsau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvendriyārthajanitāni hi sevyamānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīrghāsvavṛttir iva hanti sukhāni nidrā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_20.438'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāntā-suhṛd-guṇa-kathā-śravaṇa-utsukasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ramyā vi-nidra-nayanasya gatā mama asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-indriya-artha-janitāni hi sevyamānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīrgha-a-sva-vṛttir iva hanti sukhāni nidrā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra mitraprakāṇḍena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhena vinoditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māsam āsiṣi vipraiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasannaiḥ saprasannakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra mitra-prakāṇḍena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhena vinoditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māsam āsiṣi vipraiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasannaiḥ sa-prasannakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā gomukhenoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yojane grāmakād itaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avimuktāvimuktatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṇyā vārāṇasī purī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā gomukhena uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yojane grāmakād itaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-vimukta-a-vimuktatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṇyā vārāṇasī purī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āprāgjyotiṣakaśmīra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvārakātāmraparṇi yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat sarvaṃ sulabhaṃ tasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manohārivinodanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ā-prāgjyotiṣa-kaśmīra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvārakā-tāmraparṇi yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat sarvaṃ su-labhaṃ tasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mano-hāri-vinodanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācic copalabhyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra pānthāt kutaścana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vārttā hariśikhādīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ataḥ sāgamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cic ca upalabhyeta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra pānthāt kutaś-cana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vārttā hariśikha-ādīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ataḥ sā āgamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam uktvā yuktam āttheti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ cāmantrya prasannakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sākrandāt saṃbhavagrāmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prati vārāṇasīm agām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam uktvā yuktam āttha iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ cā amantrya prasannakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-ākrandāt saṃbhava-grāmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prati vārāṇasīm agām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha stokāntarātītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām abhāṣata gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vahāni kim ahaṃ yuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yūyaṃ vahata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha stoka-antara-ātītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām abhāṣata gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vahāni kim ahaṃ yuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yūyaṃ vahata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā hanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinaṣṭaḥ khalu gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūyaṃ māṃ vahatety eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>no brūyāt katham anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā hanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vinaṣṭaḥ khalu gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūyaṃ māṃ vahata ity eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>no brūyāt katham anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsanasyāpi yaś chāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madīyasya namasyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ariṣṭāviṣṭatāṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham itthaṃ sa vakṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsanasya api yaś chāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madīyasya namasyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ariṣṭa-āviṣṭatāṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham itthaṃ sa vakṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mayoktaḥ sadainyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavān gurupadaśramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan madīyam aśaṅkena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭham āruhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa maya ūktaḥ sa-dainyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavān guru-pada-śramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan madīyam a-śaṅkena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭham āruhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena coktaṃ vilakṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā grahīta yathā śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>neyaṃ saṃbhāvyate cintā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātāriṣṭe 'pi mādṛśi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca uktaṃ vilakṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā grahīta yathā śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na iyaṃ saṃbhāvyate cintā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāta-ariṣṭe 'pi mā-dṛśi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu yaḥ kiṃcid ācaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānthasya pathikaḥ pathi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>voḍhā bhavati tasyāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khedavismaraṇād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu yaḥ kiṃ-cid ācaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānthasya pathikaḥ pathi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>voḍhā bhavati tasya asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kheda-vismaraṇād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mayokto bhavān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvavṛttāntapeśalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyātuṃ ca vijānāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tataḥ kathayatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa maya ūkto bhavān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-vṛtta-anta-peśalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyātuṃ ca vijānāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tataḥ kathayatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ pañca kathyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathāvastūni kovidaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmārthasukhanirvāṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>cikitsāḥ sahavistarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ pañca kathyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathā-vastūni kovidaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharma-artha-sukha-nirvāṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>cikitsāḥ saha-vistarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra sattvopakārārthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāyavāṅmānasakriyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhavaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jagatī jagatām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra sattva-upakāra-arthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāya-vāṅ-mānasa-kriyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabhavaḥ sarva-dharmāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jagatī jagatām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yenopāyena mitratvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānti madhyasthaśatravaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvārthānām asau hetur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇānām iva sajjanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yena upāyena mitratvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yānti madhya-stha-śatravaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-arthānām asau hetur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇānām iva saj-janaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parastrīgaṇikātyāgaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃtoṣo mandaroṣatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nātisaktiś ca dāreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ viparyayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>para-strī-gaṇikā-tyāgaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃtoṣo manda-roṣatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ati-saktiś ca dāreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ viparyayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāṅgasya sukharāgāder</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anaṅgasya ca dehinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbandhābhāvam atyantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvāṇaṃ vidur īśvarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-aṅgasya sukha-rāga-āder</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-aṅgasya ca dehinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbandha-a-bhāvam aty-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvāṇaṃ vidur īśvarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ardharātre 'pi bhuñjānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paramārthabubhukṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kūṭavaidyaparityāgī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rogair dūreṇa varjyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ardha-rātre 'pi bhuñjānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parama-artha-bubhukṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kūṭa-vaidya-parityāgī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rogair dūreṇa varjyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭasaṃsārasārāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣīṇāṃ ko hi mādṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asāro gurusārāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>darśanāni viḍambayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭa-saṃsāra-sārāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣīṇāṃ ko hi mā-dṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-sāro guru-sārāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>darśanāni viḍambayet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yat kiṃcid ucchāstraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālabhāvād udāhṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śukavāśitaniḥsāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idaṃ me mṛṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yat kiṃ-cid uc-chāstraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāla-bhāvād udāhṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śuka-vāśita-niḥsāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idaṃ me mṛṣyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idamādīḥ kathāḥ śṛṇvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirantarasurālayām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgābharaṇam ākhyātāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpaṃ vārāṇasīṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam-ādīḥ kathāḥ śṛṇvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nir-antara-sura-ālayām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgā-bharaṇam ākhyātāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpaṃ vārāṇasīṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra bāhyaniviṣṭasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūnyasya purasadmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jaraddārusudhācitram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyatiṣṭhāma maṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra bāhya-niviṣṭasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śūnyasya pura-sadmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jarad-dāru-sudhā-citram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhyatiṣṭhāma maṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tu kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām avocad gataśramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muhūrtakam anutkaṇṭhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iha yuṣmābhir āsyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tu kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām avocad gata-śramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muhūrtakam an-utkaṇṭhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iha yuṣmābhir āsyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra sthātavyam asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upalabhya tam āśrayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchāmīti mām uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>calair uccalitaḥ padaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra sthātavyam asmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upalabhya tam āśrayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchāmi iti mām uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>calair uccalitaḥ padaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā ṣoḍaśaviṃśāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padāni sahasā sthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ kim api niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivṛtto mām abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā ṣoḍaśa-viṃśāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padāni sahasā sthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ kim api niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivṛtto mām abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad idaṃ yuṣmadaṅgeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyaṃ bhūṣaṇam āhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idam ādāya gacchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthātuṃ nāsyeha yujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad idaṃ yuṣmad-aṅgeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divyaṃ bhūṣaṇam āhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idam ādāya gacchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthātuṃ na asya iha yujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tridaṇḍipāṇḍarāṅgādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṣaṇḍaiś chadmakaṅkaṭaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vārāṇasī mahācaurais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tīrthadhvāṅkṣair adhiṣṭhitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tri-daṇḍi-pāṇḍara-aṅga-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṣaṇḍaiś chadma-kaṅkaṭaiḥ</seg> </l>
