<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vārāṇasī mahā-caurais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tīrtha-dhvāṅkṣair adhiṣṭhitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmān ekākino dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sālaṅkārān nirāyudhān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>teṣāṃ sāhasikaḥ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anarthaṃ cintayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmān ekākino dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-alaṅkārān nir-āyudhān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>teṣāṃ sāhasikaḥ kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>an-arthaṃ cintayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ bhavatu nāmeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayāsāv anumoditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadābharaṇam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśat tvaritaḥ puram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ bhavatu nāma iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya āsāv anumoditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā ābharaṇam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśat tvaritaḥ puram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāciragate tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivrāḍbrahmacāriṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paricaṅkramaṇaśrāntau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasminn eva nyasīdatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha a-cira-gate tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivrāḍ-brahma-cāriṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paricaṅkramaṇa-śrāntau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasminn eva nyasīdatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama tāv etau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nūnaṃ pāṣaṇḍitaskarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirāyudhāsahāyaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muṣituṃ kila vāñchataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama tāv etau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nūnaṃ pāṣaṇḍi-taskarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-āyudha-a-sahāyaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muṣituṃ kila vāñchataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad eteṣāṃ sahasreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakṛpāṇakareṣv api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gavām ivodviṣāṇānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>matir me mantharādarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad eteṣāṃ sahasreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-kṛpāṇa-kareṣv api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gavām iva udviṣāṇānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>matir me manthara-ādarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ūrumūlasthaśastreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravrajyākaṅkaṭeṣu yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayuṅkte nirghṛṇaḥ śastraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko 'nyaḥ klībatamas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ūru-mūla-stha-śastreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravrajya-a-kaṅkaṭeṣu yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayuṅkte nirghṛṇaḥ śastraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko 'nyaḥ klībatamas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādivikalpaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asāv ālokya maskarī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirāśa iva vidrāṇo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brahmacāriṇam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi-vikalpaṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asāv ālokya maskarī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nir-āśa iva vidrāṇo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brahma-cāriṇam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jalpākagrathitair granthaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāṃkhyayogādibhir vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipralabdhāḥ sukhaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mokṣamārge kila sthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jalpāka-grathitair granthaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāṃkhya-yoga-ādibhir vayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipralabdhāḥ sukhaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mokṣa-mārge kila sthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā tṛṇam upādātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ambarāmbhojam eva vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaścin mahat tapaḥ kuryān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mokṣārtho nas tathā śramaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā tṛṇam upādātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ambara-ambho-jam eva vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaś-cin mahat tapaḥ kuryān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mokṣa-artho nas tathā śramaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tṛṇavatsulabho mokṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi khedo 'phalas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha khāmbojaduṣprāpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato naṣṭā mumukṣavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tṛṇavat-su-labho mokṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi khedo '-phalas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha kha-ambo-ja-duṣ-prāpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato naṣṭā- mumukṣavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paralokasya sadbhāve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hetuḥ sarvajñabhāṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvajñasyāpi sadbhāvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcadivyapramāṇakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>para-lokasya sad-bhāve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hetuḥ sarva-jña-bhāṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-jñasya api sad-bhāvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañca-divya-pramāṇakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'py upādīyate hetuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvajñāstitvasiddhaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'py asiddhaviruddhādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>doṣāśīviṣadūṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'py upādīyate hetuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-jña-astitva-siddhaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'py a-siddha-viruddha-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>doṣa-āśīviṣa-dūṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad alaṃ viṭavācāṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghaṭitaiḥ kāvyakarpaṭaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sevamānā yathācchandam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsmahe viṣayān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad alaṃ viṭa-vācāṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghaṭitaiḥ kāvya-karpaṭaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sevamānā- yathā-cchandam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsmahe viṣayān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmacārī tu sāvegaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivrājakam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasāritas tvayā kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asāro malladaṇḍakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahma-cārī tu sa-āvegaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivrājakam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasāritas tvayā kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-sāro malla-daṇḍakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratijñāhetudṛṣṭāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhavas tāvad āsatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvatantrāviruddhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siddhāntenaiva bādhyase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratijñā-hetu-dṛṣṭa-antāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhavas tāvad āsatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-tantra-a-viruddhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siddha-antena eva bādhyase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asattāṃ paralokasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuṣkatarkeṇa sādhayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vitaṇḍāvādavārttārtaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhu śocyo bhaviṣyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-sattāṃ para-lokasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuṣka-tarkeṇa sādhayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vitaṇḍā-vāda-vārtta-ārtaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhu śocyo bhaviṣyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vāstām idaṃ tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ tāvan nigadyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smṛtīnāṃ viṭakāvyatvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ veda bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā āstām idaṃ tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ tāvan nigadyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smṛtīnāṃ viṭa-kāvyatvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ veda bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaḥ sarvaśarīriṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nandīśapramukhair uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ jānāmi lakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaḥ sarva-śarīriṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nandi-īśa-pramukhair uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ jānāmi lakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś caiṣa puruṣaḥ ko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānthaḥ pāṃsulapādakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣa vidyādharendrāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>indraḥ kila bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś ca eṣa puruṣaḥ ko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānthaḥ pāṃsula-pādakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣa vidyā-dhara-indrāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>indraḥ kila bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>enaṃ dṛṣṭvādhitiṣṭhantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etaṃ jarjaramaṇḍapam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>malladaṇḍakaniḥsārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utprekṣe sakalāgamān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>enaṃ dṛṣṭva ādhitiṣṭhantam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etaṃ jarjara-maṇḍapam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>malla-daṇḍaka-niḥ-sārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utprekṣe sakala-āgamān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adṛṣṭārthāḥ kila granthā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭārthair gāruḍādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthavanto 'numīyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yācakair iva dāyakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-dṛṣṭa-arthāḥ kila granthā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭa-arthair gāruḍa-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthavanto 'numīyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yācakair iva dāyakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā ca viṭakāvyatvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛṣā puruṣalakṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutismṛtipurāṇādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā saṃbhāvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā ca viṭa-kāvyatvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛṣā puruṣa-lakṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śruti-smṛti-purāṇa-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā saṃbhāvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itaras tam athāvocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atītabhavasaṃcitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daivam āhur vicakṣaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>itaras tam atha avocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atīta-bhava-saṃcitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iṣṭa-an-iṣṭa-phalaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daivam āhur vicakṣaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac cedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarīreṣu śarīriṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etad daivābhidhānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lakṣaṇaṃ pūrvakarmaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca idaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarīreṣu śarīriṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etad daiva-abhidhānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lakṣaṇaṃ pūrva-karmaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cāpuruṣakārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daivaṃ phalati kasyacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālakāraṇasāmagrīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īśvaro 'pi hy apekṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca a-puruṣa-kārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daivaṃ phalati kasya-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāla-kāraṇa-sāmagrīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īśvaro 'pi hy apekṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu taruṇaḥ kalyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntikṣiptasurāsuraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṇṭhayā gaṇḍamaṇḍānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandaceṣṭatayā samaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu taruṇaḥ kalyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kānti-kṣipta-sura-asuraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṇṭhayā gaṇḍa-maṇḍānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manda-ceṣṭatayā samaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā dhanur adhānuṣkaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā bījam avāpakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sattāmātraphalaṃ puṃsas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā daivam apauruṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā dhanur a-dhānuṣkaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā bījam a-vāpakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sattā-mātra-phalaṃ puṃsas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā daivam a-pauruṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parivrāḍ abravīd daivaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pauruṣād balavattaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jñāpakaṃ cāsya pakṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyatāṃ yan mayā śrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parivrāḍ abravīd daivaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pauruṣād balavattaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jñāpakaṃ ca asya pakṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyatāṃ yan mayā śrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti sindhutaṭe grāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmasthalakanāmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatrāsīd vedaśarmeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturvedo dvijottamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asti sindhu-taṭe grāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmasthalaka-nāmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatrā asīd vedaśarma īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>catur-vedo dvi-ja-uttamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya yo 'nyatamaḥ śiṣyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṭhaṃ prati dṛḍhodyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād eva ca sa chātrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āhūyata dṛḍhodyamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya yo 'nyatamaḥ śiṣyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāṭhaṃ prati dṛḍha-udyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād eva ca sa chātrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āhūyata dṛḍhodyamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tamobhedakanāmnaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhasthasya gṛhe sadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāpitaṃ bhojanaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācchādanaṃ vedaśarmaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tamobhedaka-nāmnaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛha-sthasya gṛhe sadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāpitaṃ bhojanaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācchādanaṃ vedaśarmaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra bhinnatamā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivrāṭ pāñcarātrikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāsam āvasathe tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karoti sma dṛḍhodyamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra bhinnatamā- nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivrāṭ pāñcarātrikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāsam āvasathe tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karoti sma dṛḍhodyamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena ca prakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭuśraddhānamedhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhītaṃ daśabhir varṣais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena vedacatuṣṭayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena ca prakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭu-śraddhāna-medhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhītaṃ daśabhir varṣais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena veda-catuṣṭayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bhinnatamāḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṇāśramakathāṃ ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praśāntajanasaṃpāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradoṣe tam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bhinnatamāḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṇa-āśrama-kathāṃ ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praśānta-jana-saṃpāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pradoṣe tam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahugomahiṣībhūmi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāsīdāsam idaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantrasthānam upāntaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāṭādibhyaś ca rakṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahu-go-mahiṣī-bhūmi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāsī-dāsam idaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tantra-sthānam upāntaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāṭa-ādibhyaś ca rakṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhyānādhyāyapradhānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vihitaṃ bhikṣukarma yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaiśyakarmābhiyuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya nāmāpi nāsti me ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhyāna-ādhyāya-pradhānaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vihitaṃ bhikṣu-karma yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaiśya-karma-abhiyuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya nāma api na asti me ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā tu vacaḥkāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>parispandāpahāriṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paralokasamāsannā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jarātandrīr ivāgatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhunā tu vacaḥ-kāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>parispanda-apahāriṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>para-loka-samāsannā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jarā-tandrīr ivā agatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhamedhivratasthānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alasānāṃ svakarmasu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmasādhanam uddiṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṛṣibhis tīrthasevanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛha-medhi-vrata-sthānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alasānāṃ sva-karmasu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharma-sādhanam uddiṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṛṣibhis tīrtha-sevanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āha vedāntavādaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tārakaṃ brahma tantrayet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etasmān na vimuñceyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avimuktaṃ mumukṣavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āha veda-anta-vādaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tārakaṃ brahma tantrayet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etasmān na vimuñceyur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-vimuktaṃ mumukṣavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaḥ prasthātāsmahe tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prātar vārāṇasīṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>buddhadharme praśastā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmasya tvaritā gatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaḥ prasthāta āsmahe tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prātar vārāṇasīṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>buddha-dharme praśastā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmasya tvaritā gatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavatāpi śrutismṛtyoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāmāṇyam anujānatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niyogenaiva kartavyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patnīputraparigrahaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavata āpi śruti-smṛtyoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāmāṇyam anujānatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niyogena eva kartavyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patnī-putra-parigrahaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhasthāśramadharmaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gavādidhanasādhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca pratigrahād anyad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viprasya dhanasādhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛha-stha-āśrama-dharmaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gav-ādi-dhana-sādhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca pratigrahād anyad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viprasya dhana-sādhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat sukhopanataṃ caitad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anindyam atibhūri ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadāsīdāsam asmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanam ādīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat sukha-upanataṃ ca etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-nindyam ati-bhūri ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-dāsī-dāsam asmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanam ādīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ yuṣmadādiṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akāryam api mādṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vikalpayituṃ śaktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punar nyāyyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ yuṣmad-ādiṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-kāryam api mā-dṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vikalpayituṃ śaktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punar nyāyyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tv āmantrya pitṛsthānau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyājīvitadāyinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kartāsmi bhavadādeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ativāhya niśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tv āmantrya pitṛ-sthānau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidyā-jīvita-dāyinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karta āsmi bhavad-ādeśam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ativāhya niśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātāyāṃ tu triyāmāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam āmantrayituṃ gatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃpratiṣṭhāsamāno 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ bhikṣur udaikṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātāyāṃ tu tri-yāmāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam āmantrayituṃ gatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃpratiṣṭhā-samāno 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ bhikṣur udaikṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā tu divasārdhe 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gate chāttraḥ sa nāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ gaveṣayituṃ bhikṣuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam eva tadā gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā tu divasa-ardhe 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gate chāttraḥ sa nā agataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ gaveṣayituṃ bhikṣuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam eva tadā gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu tenāṅgaṇe dṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tamobhedakaveśamanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śanaiś caṅkramaṇaṃ kurvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīcaiś cāmnāyamānasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu tena aṅgaṇe dṛṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tamobhedaka-veśamanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śanaiś caṅkramaṇaṃ kurvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nīcaiś cā amnāya-mānasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaṃ ca bhavatā kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyacciram iha sthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>athārthenaiva tenārthas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaṃ ca bhavatā kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyac-ciram iha sthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha arthena eva tena arthas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tenoktam etasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhe kenāpi hetunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyagraḥ parijanaḥ sarvas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra tatrābhidhāvati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tena uktam etasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhe kena api hetunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyagraḥ parijanaḥ sarvas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra tatra abhidhāvati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāṃ yām eva ca pṛcchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim etad iti dārikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā sā mām āha saṃrabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śivaṃ dhyātu bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāṃ yām eva ca pṛcchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim etad iti dārikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā sā mām āha saṃrabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śivaṃ dhyātu bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ cādyāpi na pṛcchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tamobhedakam ākulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāhaṃ nāgataḥ kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakāśaṃ bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca adya api na pṛcchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tamobhedakam ākulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena ahaṃ nā agataḥ kṣipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakāśaṃ bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bhinnatamāḥ smitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛḍhodyamam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yenāyam ākulo lokas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad ahaṃ kathayāmi te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha bhinnatamāḥ smitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛḍhodyamam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena ayam ākulo lokas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad ahaṃ kathayāmi te ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tamobhedakabhāryāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasūtiḥ pratyupasthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ parijanas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatratatrākulākulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tamobhedaka-bhāryāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasūtiḥ pratyupasthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ parijanas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra-tatrā akula-ākulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dārikā jāyate cāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāṃ ca tvaṃ pariṇeṣyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā ca rāgagrahāviṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duṣṭaceṣṭā bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dārikā jāyate ca asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāṃ ca tvaṃ pariṇeṣyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā ca rāga-graha-āviṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duṣṭa-ceṣṭā bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tasmin kṛtādeśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gate svavivadhaṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>itaraś cintayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaṅkākampitamānasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tasmin kṛta-ādeśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gate sva-vivadhaṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>itaraś cintayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaṅkā-kampita-mānasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi kanyāṃ vijāyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato bhinnatamovākyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhūtārthaṃ na jāyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇasya asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi kanyāṃ vijāyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato bhinnatamo-vākyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-bhūta-arthaṃ na jāyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>stobhāveśaviṣāccheda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kriyāsu vyaktaśaktibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śeṣāṇām api mantrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāmarthyam anumīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>stobha-āveśa-viṣa-āccheda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kriyāsu vyakta-śaktibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śeṣāṇām api mantrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāmarthyam anumīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti cintayatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīno gṛhapatir gṛhāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā daivaṃ khalam ityādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lapan nīcair vinirgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti cintayatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīno gṛha-patir gṛhāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā daivaṃ khalam ity-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lapan nīcair vinirgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣaṇāc ca śvagṛhītasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārjārasyeva kūjataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antarbhavanam udbhūtaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śvāgāraparuṣaśrutiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣaṇāc ca śva-gṛhītasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārjārasya iva kūjataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antar-bhavanam udbhūtaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śva-āgāra-paruṣa-śrutiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasādhitā nāryo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjāprāvṛtamastakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pakṣadvāreṇa nirjagmur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nairāśyottānapāṇayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasādhitā- nāryo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lajjā-prāvṛta-mastakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pakṣa-dvāreṇa nirjagmur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nairāśya-uttāna-pāṇayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paricārakavargaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śocadbandhukadambakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amantrayata vāmasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidheḥ kiṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paricāraka-vargaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śocad-bandhu-kadambakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amantrayata vāmasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidheḥ kiṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃprāyaprapañce tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhe tasmin dṛḍhodyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddhapravrajitādeśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātabhītir acintayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ-prāya-prapañce tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhe tasmin dṛḍhodyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siddha-pravrajita-ādeśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāta-bhītir acintayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parivrājakavākyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathābhūtena sādhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janāḥ paśyantu bādhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parivrājaka-vākyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā-bhūtena sādhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daivaṃ puruṣa-kāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janāḥ paśyantu bādhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sindhudeśaṃ parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>de/ād deśaṃ parivrajan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ pariharāmy enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūrataḥ kardamām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sindhu-deśaṃ parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>de/ād deśaṃ parivrajan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ pariharāmy enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūrataḥ kardamām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi vimṛśyāsāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asaṃmantryaiva saṃskṛtān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daśayojanam adhvānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekāhena palāyitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi vimṛśya asāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-saṃmantrya eva saṃskṛtān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daśa-yojanam adhvānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>eka-ahena palāyitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadvīpāṃ ca parikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṣair dvādaśabhir mahīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgātaṭam upāgacchat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tīrthopāsanakāmyayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-dvīpāṃ ca parikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṣair dvādaśabhir mahīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgā-taṭam upāgacchat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tīrtha-upāsana-kāmyayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athātapapipāsārtaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chāyāsalilavāñchayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmiṃścid brāhmaṇagrāme</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṃcana prāviśad gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā atapa-pipāsa-ārtaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chāyā-salila-vāñchayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmiṃś-cid brāhmaṇa-grāme</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṃ-cana prāviśad gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra cālindakāsīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arkatūlābhamūrdhajām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayāce brāhmaṇīm amba</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānīyaṃ dāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra cā alindaka-āsīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arka-tūla-ābha-mūrdha-jām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayāce brāhmaṇīm amba</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānīyaṃ dāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tv abhāṣata saṃbhrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hale putri tamālike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsanodakam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>laghu nirgamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tv abhāṣata saṃbhrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hale putri tamālike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsana-udakam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>laghu nirgamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pīṭhālukāhastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasitāsitakañcukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āpiṅgāpāntakeśāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyakā niragād gṛhāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pīṭha-ālukā-hastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasita-asita-kañcukā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āpiṅga-apānta-keśa-antā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyakā niragād gṛhāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>diśas taralayā dṛṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyantī saṃtatasmitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṅgubhaṅgurasaṃcārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirāt prāpad dṛḍhodyamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>diśas taralayā dṛṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyantī saṃtata-smitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṅgu-bhaṅgura-saṃcārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirāt prāpad dṛḍhodyamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsyatām atra mitreti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vadantyā śūnyayā tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pīṭhabuddhyā puras tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nikṣiptaṃ jalabhājanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsyatām atra mitra iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vadantyā śūnyayā tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pīṭha-buddhyā puras tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nikṣiptaṃ jala-bhājanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tām abravīd vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktvaitām avinītatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apareṇodapātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jalam āvarjyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tām abravīd vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktva aitām a-vinītatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apareṇa uda-pātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jalam āvarjyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu kṛtrimasaṃtrāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>janitotkaṭavepathuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antarhasitabhugnauṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛddhājñāṃ samapādayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu kṛtrima-saṃtrāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>janita-utkaṭa-vepathuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antar-hasita-bhugna-oṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛddhā-ājñāṃ samapādayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato gataśramaṃ vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛcchati sma dṛḍhodyamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchati kuto deśāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṃ vā yāti bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato gata-śramaṃ vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛcchati sma dṛḍhodyamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchati kuto deśāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṃ vā yāti bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ na sa deśo 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāgacchāmi yataḥ kṣitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yac ca brūtha kva yāsīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra viñāpayāmi vaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ na sa deśo 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nā agacchāmi yataḥ kṣitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yac ca brūtha kva yāsi iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra viñāpayāmi vaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kasmiṃścid brāhmaṇagrāme</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kurvan baṭukapāṭhanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtuṣṭo grāmavāsobhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ninīṣe divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kasmiṃś-cid brāhmaṇa-grāme</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kurvan baṭuka-pāṭhanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtuṣṭo grāma-vāsobhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ninīṣe divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam abravīd vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītijñaiḥ satyam ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy ataptena lohena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taptaṃ saṃdhīyate kvacit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam abravīd vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nīti-jñaiḥ satyam ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy a-taptena lohena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taptaṃ saṃdhīyate kva-cit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama dvau putranaptārāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhunaivopanītakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tau ca saṃyojitau puṇyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthināv arthinā tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama dvau putra-naptārāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhuna aiva upanītakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tau ca saṃyojitau puṇyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthināv arthinā tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavān adhyāpanenārthī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tau cādhyayanakāṅkṣiṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṣṭāśvadagdharathavad</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yogo 'stu bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavān adhyāpanena arthī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tau ca adhyayana-kāṅkṣiṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṣṭa-aśva-dagdha-ratha-vad</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yogo 'stu bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasyai pratijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tau baṭū pāṭhayann asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antevāsigaṇaṃ cānyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asthāt saṃvatsaradvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tasyai pratijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tau baṭū pāṭhayann asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>antevāsi-gaṇaṃ ca anyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asthāt saṃvatsara-dvayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā tām abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddhām āgatya bāndhavāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmād dṛḍhodyamāyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīyate na tamālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā tām abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛddhām āgatya bāndhavāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmād dṛḍhodyamāya iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīyate na tamālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye jāmātṛguṇās teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaścid asti kvacid vare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛḍhodyame punaḥ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yadi kaṃcin na paśyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye jāmātṛ-guṇās teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaś-cid asti kva-cid vare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛḍhodyame punaḥ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yadi kaṃ-cin na paśyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>durlabhaḥ sulabhībhūtas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmāt svīkriyatām ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kena vanyaḥ karī vārīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgataḥ svayam ujjhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dur-labhaḥ su-labhī-bhūtas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmāt svī-kriyatām ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kena vanyaḥ karī vārīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āgataḥ svayam ujjhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tair bodhitā vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratītā tān ayācata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yady evaṃ svayam evāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūjyair abhyarthyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tair bodhitā vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratītā tān ayācata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yady evaṃ svayam eva ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūjyair abhyarthyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tatas tam abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhautika brahmacāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āmnātāś cāvabuddhāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedāḥ sasmṛtayas tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te tatas tam abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhautika brahma-cāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āmnātāś ca avabuddhāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedāḥ sa-smṛtayas tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avaśyaṃ cādhunā kāryaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuddhapatnīparigrahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uraḥkaṇṭhauṣṭhaśoṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā bhūd vaiphalyam anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-vaśyaṃ ca adhunā kāryaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śuddha-patnī-parigrahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uraḥ-kaṇṭha-oṣṭha-śoṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā bhūd vaiphalyam anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ pratīṣyatām eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvaśuddhā tamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhāśramasyāṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trayī vidyeva dehinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ pratīṣyatām eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-śuddhā tamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭha-āśramasya aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trayī vidya īva dehinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi sa tair uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam etad acintayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuktaṃ yad brāhmaṇair uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atra tāvat kim ucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi sa tair uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam etad acintayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuktaṃ yad brāhmaṇair uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atra tāvat kim ucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś cāsau sindhuviṣaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūṣitaḥ kṛtyayā tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāre sāgaravat so 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūratvāt sudurāgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś ca asau sindhu-viṣaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūṣitaḥ kṛtyayā tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāre sāgaravat so 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūratvāt su-dur-āgamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha daivena saiveyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ānītā sindhudeśataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sūcīsūtragate daivāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ kaḥ kutra mokṣyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha daivena sa aiva iyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ānītā sindhu-deśataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sūcī-sūtra-gate daivāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ kaḥ kutra mokṣyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi sa niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratiśrutya tatheti ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṇīya ca tāṃ kanyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvatsaram ayāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi sa niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratiśrutya tatha īti ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṇīya ca tāṃ kanyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvatsaram ayāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha yātatriyāmāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>triyāmāyāṃ dṛḍhodyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jṛmbhāveditanidrāntāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛcchati sma tamālikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha yāta-tri-yāmāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tri-yāmāyāṃ dṛḍhodyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jṛmbhā-vedita-nidrā-antāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛcchati sma tamālikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brūhi sundari paśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṭumbasyāsya kaḥ prabhuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>keyaṃ bhavati te vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāv etau baṭukāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brūhi sundari paśyāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṭumbasya asya kaḥ prabhuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ka īyaṃ bhavati te vṛddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāv etau baṭukāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tv āyataniśvāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathitāyataduḥkhayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>srutāśrukaṇikāśreṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathitaṃ skhaladakṣaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tv āyata-niśvāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathita-āyata-duḥkhayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sruta-aśru-kaṇikā-śreṇyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathitaṃ skhalad-akṣaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyā brāhmaṇavṛddhāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyaḥ sādhur abhūt patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya vidyādhanais tṛptāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiṣyayājakayācakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyā- brāhmaṇa-vṛddhāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyaḥ sādhur abhūt patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya vidyā-dhanais tṛptāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiṣya-yājaka-yācakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena cāśeṣavedāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣamādiguṇaśāline</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duhitā gṛhajāmātre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chāttrāya pratipāditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca a-śeṣa-vedāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣama-ādi-guṇa-śāline</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duhitā gṛha-jāmātre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chāttrāya pratipāditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.126'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāḍitaś caraṇenāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ kṣamāvān abhūt purā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa jāmātṛtayā krodhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamitaḥ kṛṣṇasarpatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.126'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāḍitaś caraṇena api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ kṣamāvān abhūt purā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa jāmātṛtayā krodhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamitaḥ kṛṣṇa-sarpatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.127'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāntam api saṃmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manyamāno vimānatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśrūśvaśurayoḥ khedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmanaś cākarod vṛthā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.127'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāntam api saṃmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>manyamāno vimānatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śvaśrū-śvaśurayoḥ khedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmanaś ca akarod vṛthā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.128'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā parihāsena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>syālakas tam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durvāsaḥsadṛśas tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durārādho bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.128'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā parihāsena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>syālakas tam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durvāsaḥ-sadṛśas tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-ārādho bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.129'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yady evaṃ durdurūḍhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ mayārādhitena vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity uktvā mantharālāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadāro gata eva saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.129'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yady evaṃ dur-dur-ūḍhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ mayā ārādhitena vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity uktvā manthara-ālāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-dāro gata eva saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.130'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaśrūśvaśuramitrāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avakarṇya kadarthanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirapekṣaṃ svadeśāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sindhudeśāya yātavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.130'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaśrū-śvaśura-mitrāṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avakarṇya kadarthanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirapekṣaṃ sva-deśāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sindhu-deśāya yātavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.131'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ca grāmam adhyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmasthalakanāmakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>acirān nityakāmyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmāṇi niravartayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.131'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ca grāmam adhyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmasthalaka-nāmakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-cirān nitya-kāmyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karmāṇi niravartayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.132'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya tasyāṃ ca bhāryāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kālarātrisamā sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yamau ca tanayau jātau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yamakālau kulasya yau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.132'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasya tasyāṃ ca bhāryāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāla-rātri-samā sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yamau ca tanayau jātau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yama-kālau kulasya yau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.133'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham eva ca sā kanyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tau caitau kākatālukau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yair mātāpitarāv eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālair eva samāhitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.133'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham eva ca sā kanyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tau ca etau kāka-tālukau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yair mātā-pitarāv eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālair eva samāhitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.134'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sindhudeśaikadeśaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sindhunā caṇḍaraṃhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durvāragurupūreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasākṛṣya nīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.134'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sindhu-deśa-eka-deśaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sindhunā caṇḍa-raṃhasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dur-vāra-guru-pūreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasā ākṛṣya nīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.135'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mātāpitṛbhyāṃ nas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadbhayād avadhāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātāmahagṛhaṃ yāntu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālā me niviśantv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.135'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mātā-pitṛbhyāṃ nas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad-bhayād avadhāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātā-maha-gṛhaṃ yāntu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālā- me niviśantv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.136'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śaṅkeṣubhinnas tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhāṣata dṛḍhodyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śeṣaṃ sujñānam evāsyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathāyāḥ sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.136'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śaṅkā-iṣu-bhinnas tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhāṣata dṛḍhodyamaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śeṣaṃ su-jñānam eva asyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathāyāḥ sthīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.137'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc cāsya sa sarvajñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivrājakabhāskaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sphuṭaṃ bhinnatamā eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhinnājñānatamā yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.137'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca asya sa sarva-jñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivrājaka-bhāskaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sphuṭaṃ bhinnatamā- eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhinna-a-jñāna-tamā- yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.138'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anubhūtau tathābhūtau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadādeśau mayādhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛtīyaparihārāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyajāmi pṛthivīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.138'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anubhūtau tathā-bhūtau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad-ādeśau maya ādhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛtīya-parihārāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyajāmi pṛthivīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.139'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dvādaśavarṣāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrāṃtvā dvīpāntarāṇi saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirviṇṇaś cintayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃcid dhavalamūrdhajaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.139'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dvā-daśa-varṣāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhrāṃtvā dvīpa-antarāṇi saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirviṇṇaś cintayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ-cid dhavala-mūrdha-jaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.140'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādiṣṭaṃ yat parivrājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat tayonmādamattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālenaitāvatā nūnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>akṛtyaṃ kṛtyayā kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.140'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādiṣṭaṃ yat parivrājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat taya ūnmāda-mattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālena etāvatā nūnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-kṛtyaṃ kṛtyayā kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.141'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmābhiś ca na vedoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vedāntoktamohitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vraṇair iva visarpadbhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kvāpītaṃ puruṣāyuṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.141'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmābhiś ca na veda-uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na veda-anta-ukta-mohitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vraṇair iva visarpadbhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva api itaṃ puruṣa-āyuṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.142'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vārāṇasīṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tīrthopāsanahetukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṇyaṃ svargaphalaṃ kurvann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayāmi divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.142'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vārāṇasīṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tīrtha-upāsana-hetukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṇyaṃ svarga-phalaṃ kurvann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayāmi divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.143'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sāgaram uttīrya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgāsāgaram āgamat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato vārāṇasīṃ prāpad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amuñcann eva jāhnavīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.143'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sāgaram uttīrya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gaṅgāsāgaram āgamat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tato vārāṇasīṃ prāpad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-muñcann eva jāhnavīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.144'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāviśann eva cāpaśyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naradhātuparicchadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>skhaladālāpasaṃcāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāpāśupataṃ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.144'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāviśann eva ca apaśyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nara-dhātu-paricchadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>skhalad-ālāpa-saṃcāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-pāśu-pataṃ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.145'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ cānu sphaṭikaprāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇakaṇṭhavibhūṣaṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madirātāmrajihmākṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vicitragalakaṇṭhikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.145'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca anu sphaṭika-prāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇa-kaṇṭha-vibhūṣaṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madirā-tāmra-jihma-akṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vicitra-gala-kaṇṭhikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.146'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dviguṇīkurvatīṃ mārgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṅkair gatinivartanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amuktanijanirmokāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhujaṃgīm iva yoṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.146'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvi-guṇī-kurvatīṃ mārgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṅkair gati-nivartanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-mukta-nija-nirmokāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhujaṃgīm iva yoṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.147'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu kāpālikenoktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>drutam ehi kapālini</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yāvad avimuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhūpavelātivartate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.147'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu kāpālikena uktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>drutam ehi kapālini</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yāvad avimuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhūpa-vela ātivartate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.148'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>huṃhuṃkārādibhiḥ stutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃsthātrayaparaṃ dhruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ śuṇḍikaśāleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mārgayāmi surām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.148'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>huṃ-huṃ-kāra-ādibhiḥ stutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃsthā-traya-paraṃ dhruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataḥ śuṇḍika-śāleṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mārgayāmi surām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.149'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃprāye ca vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛḍhodyamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>papāta pādayos tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tārākrandā kapālinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.149'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ-prāye ca vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛḍhodyamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>papāta pādayos tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāra-ākrandā kapālinī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.150'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaḥ kāpāliknoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muñca brāhmaṇam adhvagam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parihāsaś ciraṃ caṇḍi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viruddhas tyajyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.150'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaḥ kāpālikna uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muñca brāhmaṇam adhva-gam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parihāsaś ciraṃ caṇḍi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viruddhas tyajyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.151'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābravīd eṣa me bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daivataiḥ pratipāditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaṃ tu dhṛṣṭaviṭo bhūtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vyāharasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.151'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ābravīd eṣa me bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>daivataiḥ pratipāditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaṃ tu dhṛṣṭa-viṭo bhūtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vyāharasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.152'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca prapañcam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa pradeśaḥ sakautukaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janair agaṇitair vyāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śramaṇabrāhmaṇādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.152'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca prapañcam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa pradeśaḥ sa-kautukaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janair a-gaṇitair vyāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śramaṇa-brāhmaṇa-ādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.153'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā cāvocac caturveda</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>riktavedo 'si sarvathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>savedaḥ ko hi nirvedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vedoktaiḥ karmabhir vrajet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.153'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā ca avocac catur-veda</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rikta-vedo 'si sarvathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-vedaḥ ko hi nir-vedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veda-uktaiḥ karmabhir vrajet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.154'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tvayotpāditāḥ putrā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāgnihotram upāsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārcitāḥ pitaraḥ piṇḍair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāyubhūtena hiṇḍitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.154'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tvaya ūtpāditāḥ putrā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>na agni-hotram upāsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na arcitāḥ pitaraḥ piṇḍair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāyu-bhūtena hiṇḍitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.155'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvayā dṛḍhodyama tyaktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāhaṃ mandā tamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulāt kulam aṭantīdaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>carāmi kulaṭāvratam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.155'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvayā dṛḍhodyama tyaktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa āhaṃ mandā tamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulāt kulam aṭanti īdaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>carāmi ku-laṭā-vratam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.156'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avṛddhakulavāsinyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taruṇyaḥ pativarjitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yair aduṣṭāḥ striyo dṛṣṭās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te dṛṣṭāḥ kenacit kvacit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.156'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-vṛddha-kula-vāsinyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taruṇyaḥ pati-varjitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yair a-duṣṭāḥ striyo dṛṣṭās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te dṛṣṭāḥ kena-cit kva-cit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.157'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tyaktavatā dārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat tvayā pāpam arjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tān eva bharamāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat samucchidyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.157'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tyaktavatā dārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat tvayā pāpam arjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tān eva bharamāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat samucchidyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.158'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha lajjāviṣādāndham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ūcur viprā dṛḍhodyamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhagavatyā yad uktaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tattvataḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.158'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha lajjā-viṣāda-andham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ūcur viprā- dṛḍhodyamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhagavatyā yad uktaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tattvataḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.159'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenātmanaś ca tasyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijādijanasaṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahmasthalakavāsādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad vṛttaṃ tan niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.159'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenā atmanaś ca tasyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvi-ja-ādi-jana-saṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahmasthalaka-vāsa-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad vṛttaṃ tan niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.160'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoktaṃ brāhmaṇair brahman</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇī parigṛhyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raktadāraparityāgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācaranti na sādhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.160'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uktaṃ brāhmaṇair brahman</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇī parigṛhyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rakta-dāra-parityāgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācaranti na sādhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.161'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca kiṃcid akartavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anāthyād anayā kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya kṛcchratamaiḥ kṛcchrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśuddhiḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.161'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca kiṃ-cid a-kartavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-nāthyād anayā kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya kṛcchratamaiḥ kṛcchrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśuddhiḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.162'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ yādṛśaṃ pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaścittair apohyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūjyānām eva tad buddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idaṃ budhyata yādṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.162'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ yā-dṛśaṃ pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaścittair apohyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūjyānām eva tad buddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idaṃ budhyata yā-dṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.163'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hīnavarṇābhigāminyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātakinyaḥ kila striyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ tv aśubhasāvarṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yam upāste sa dṛśyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.163'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hīna-varṇa-abhigāminyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātakinyaḥ kila striyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ tv a-śubha-sāvarṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yam upāste sa dṛśyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.164'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad upāstām iyaṃ bhadrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yam upāsac chivaṃ dhruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhānāṃ copahartāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāpāśupataṃ patim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.164'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad upāstām iyaṃ bhadrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yam upāsac chivaṃ dhruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhānāṃ ca upahartāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-pāśu-pataṃ patim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.165'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktavati sā tasminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uvācopacitatrapā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ā mṛtyos tvatsamīpasthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nayāmi divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.165'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktavati sā tasminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uvāca upacita-trapā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ā mṛtyos tvat-samīpa-sthā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nayāmi divasān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.166'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athaiko brāhmaṇas teṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛḍhodyamam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madīyā duhitā brahman</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpiṇī pariṇīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.166'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha eko brāhmaṇas teṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛḍhodyamam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madīyā duhitā brahman</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpiṇī pariṇīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.167'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhanaṃ me dhanadasyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saiva caikā sutā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatas tasya ca tasyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaved bhartā bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.167'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhanaṃ me dhana-dasya iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa aiva ca ekā sutā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatas tasya ca tasyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaved bhartā bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.168'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc cāsya kim adyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>syān na syād iti cintayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parivrājakavākyaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtārthīkṛtam etayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.168'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca asya kim adya api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>syān na syād iti cintayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parivrājaka-vākyaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛta-arthī-kṛtam etayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.169'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratijñāya ca tāṃ kanyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dadānād brāhmaṇāt svayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samahādraviṇaskandhām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upayeme dṛḍhodyamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.169'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratijñāya ca tāṃ kanyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dadānād brāhmaṇāt svayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-mahā-draviṇa-skandhām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upayeme dṛḍhodyamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.170'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tamālikāpi saṃhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>keśān kāṣāyacīvarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛḍhodyamagṛhāsannā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasatī kālam akṣipat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.170'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tamālika āpi saṃhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>keśān kāṣāya-cīvarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛḍhodyama-gṛha-āsannā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasatī kālam akṣipat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.171'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛḍhoyamo 'pi saṃtataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijātikarma sādhayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harottamāṅgalālitām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāsta jahnukanyakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.171'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛḍhoyamo 'pi saṃtataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvi-jāti-karma sādhayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hara-uttama-aṅga-lālitām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāsta jahnu-kanyakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_21.172'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat tena yena kṛtaduṣkarapauruṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vākyaṃ na bhinnatamasaḥ kṛtam apramāṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūreṇa daivahariṇā prabhuṇā prasahya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāj jitaḥ puruṣakāragajādhirājaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_21.172'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat tena yena kṛta-duṣ-kara-pauruṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vākyaṃ na bhinnatamasaḥ kṛtam a-pramāṇam</seg> </l>
