<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūreṇa daiva-hariṇā prabhuṇā prasahya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāj jitaḥ puruṣa-kāra-gaja-adhirājaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kiṃcid vihasyoktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivrāḍ brahmacāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā puruṣakārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prādhānyaṃ tan niśāmyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kiṃ-cid vihasya uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parivrāḍ brahma-cāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā puruṣa-kārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prādhānyaṃ tan niśāmyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd ujjayanīvāsī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārthakārthaparigrahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṇik sāgaradattākhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāgarāgādhamānasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīd ujjayanī-vāsī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sārthaka-artha-parigrahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṇik sāgaradatta-ākhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāgara-a-gādha-mānasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāgaraṃ tena yātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktapotena gacchatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aparaḥ prekṣitaḥ potas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taraladhvajalakṣaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāgaraṃ tena yātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukta-potena gacchatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aparaḥ prekṣitaḥ potas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarala-dhvaja-lakṣaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅgāpotam amuṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potaṃ prerayateti saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvan niryāmakān āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvat potau samīyatuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅgā-potam amuṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potaṃ prerayata iti saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvan niryāmakān āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvat potau samīyatuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sāgaradattas taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>potasvāminam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūyaṃ ye vā yatas tyā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tan naḥ pratyucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sāgaradattas taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pota-svāminam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūyaṃ ye vā yatas tyā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tan naḥ pratyucyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ buddhavarmāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṇig rājagṛhālayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavantaḥ ke kuto veti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ so 'pi nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ buddhavarma āhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṇig rājagṛha-ālayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavantaḥ ke kuto va īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ so 'pi nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kāvyakathāpāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tantrīgītadurodaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>savinodau jagāhāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tau durgādhaṃ mahodadhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha kāvya-kathā-pāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tantrī-gīta-dur-odaraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-vinodau jagāhāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tau dur-gādhaṃ mahā-udadhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā ca kāñcanadvīpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upāntānantakāñcanau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptavantau parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samudrataṭapattanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatvā ca kāñcana-dvīpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upānta-an-anta-kāñcanau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptavantau parāvṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samudra-taṭa-pattanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhavarmeti bhāṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prītir naḥ sthiratāṃ yāyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā saṃpādyatāṃ tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhavarma īti bhāṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prītir naḥ sthiratāṃ yāyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā saṃpādyatāṃ tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryāyāṃ gurugarbhāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niragaccham ahaṃ gṛhāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyāś ca divasir ebhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātam anyatarad dvayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryāyāṃ guru-garbhāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niragaccham ahaṃ gṛhāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyāś ca divasir ebhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātam anyatarad dvayoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duhitā cet tato dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavatputrāya sā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putraś cet tvaṃ tatas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadyāḥ svatanayām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duhitā cet tato dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavat-putrāya sā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putraś cet tvaṃ tatas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadyāḥ sva-tanayām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ mahad āścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyam eva hi no matiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā kim ihāścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekam evāvayor vapuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ mahad āścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyam eva hi no matiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā kim ihā aścaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ekam eva avayor vapuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tau kṛtasaṃbandhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṣvajya parasparam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāmahiṣasārthābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathāsthānam agacchatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tau kṛta-saṃbandhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṣvajya paras-param</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-mahiṣa-sārthābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā-sthānam agacchatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praṇipatya ca rājānāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avantimagadhādhipau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatprayuktātisatkārau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yayatuḥ svagṛhān prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praṇipatya ca rājānāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avanti-magadha-adhipau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat-prayukta-ati-sat-kārau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yayatuḥ sva-gṛhān prati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra satkriyamāṇau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satkurvāṇau ca saṃtatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bandhubhir brāhmaṇādīṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayām āsatur dinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra sat-kriyamāṇau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sat-kurvāṇau ca saṃtatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bandhubhir brāhmaṇa-ādīṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamayām āsatur dinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sāgaradattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paryaṅkam adhitiṣṭhataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utsaṅge dārikā nyastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>virājatkundamālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sāgaradattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paryaṅkam adhitiṣṭhataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utsaṅge dārikā nyastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>virājat-kunda-mālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kasyeyaṃ kundamāleti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa bhāryām anuyuktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāpi kasyāparasyeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanair ācaṣṭa lajjitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kasya iyaṃ kunda-māla īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa bhāryām anuyuktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa āpi kasya aparasya iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanair ācaṣṭa lajjitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena coktam idaṃ yādṛg</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālikā kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayoḥ syād īdṛśaḥ putraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitarau tau saputrakau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca uktam idaṃ yādṛg</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālikā kunda-mālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayoḥ syād īdṛśaḥ putraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pitarau tau sa-putrakau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād duhitṛmāteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā gās tvaṃ bhīru bhīrutām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kīrtijananī vidyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nindyā bhavitum arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād duhitṛ-māta īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā gās tvaṃ bhīru bhīrutām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kīrti-jananī vidyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nindyā bhavitum arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām ityādi samāśyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>payonidhisamāgamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>buddhavarmasakhitvaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyai kathitavān asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām ity-ādi samāśyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>payo-nidhi-samāgamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>buddhavarma-sakhitvaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyai kathitavān asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kasyeyaṃ kundamāleti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām apṛcchad yataḥ pitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasiddhā tasya nāmnāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā tataḥ kundamālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kasya iyaṃ kunda-māla īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām apṛcchad yataḥ pitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasiddhā tasya nāmna āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā tataḥ kundamālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>buddhavarmāpi papraccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirālāpāṃ kuṭumbinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmin garbhe tavotpannaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tan naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>buddhavarma āpi papraccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nir-ālāpāṃ kuṭumbinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmin garbhe tava utpannaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tan naḥ kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vāmanam ekākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūkṣaṃ tundiladanturam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lambauṣṭhaṃ bhugnapṛṣṭhaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā taṃ putraṃ samarpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vāmanam eka-akṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūkṣaṃ tundila-danturam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lamba-oṣṭhaṃ bhugna-pṛṣṭhaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā taṃ putraṃ samarpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt kiṃ vṛthaivāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhṛtaḥ kurubhakas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmād īkṣaṇikāṃ pṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garbha eva na pātitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīt kiṃ vṛtha aiva ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhṛtaḥ kurubhakas tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmād īkṣaṇikāṃ pṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garbha eva na pātitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ sa sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha saṃbandhakaḥ kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vikṛtākṛtinānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa pretena nirākṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ sa sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha saṃbandhakaḥ kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vikṛta-ākṛtina ānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa pretena nirākṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃdiśed yadi nāmāsāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ duhitṛvān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā kiṃ pratisaṃdeśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayāhaṃ putravān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃdiśed yadi nāma asāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ duhitṛvān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā kiṃ pratisaṃdeśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maya āhaṃ putravān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryāṃ cāvocad āgacched</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūto mālavakād yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>enaṃ kurubhakaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kaścit kathayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāryāṃ ca avocad āgacched</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dūto mālavakād yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>enaṃ kurubhakaṃ tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kaś-cit kathayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ kurubhakaḥ kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti yat taṃ pitābravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāharanti sma taṃ paurās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ kurubhakākhyayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ kurubhakaḥ kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti yat taṃ pita ābravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāharanti sma taṃ paurās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ kurubhaka-ākhyayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athātīte kvacit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhivarmā rahaḥ sthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lekhaṃ sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthāpitam avācayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha atīte kva-cit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhivarmā rahaḥ sthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lekhaṃ sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthāpitam avācayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sv asti rājagṛhe pūjyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhavarmāṇam ūrjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ujjayanyāḥ pariṣvajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vijñāpayati sāgaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sv asti rājagṛhe pūjyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhavarmāṇam ūrjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ujjayanyāḥ pariṣvajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vijñāpayati sāgaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakhyās te duhitā jātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreyolakṣaṇabhūṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rūpeṇa sadṛśī yasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadā na bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakhyās te duhitā jātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreyo-lakṣaṇa-bhūṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rūpeṇa sa-dṛśī yasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadā na bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tavāpi yadi bhāryāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putro jātaḥ śivaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyā ced vāmaśīlena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devena muṣitā vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tava api yadi bhāryāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putro jātaḥ śivaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyā ced vāma-śīlena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devena muṣitā- vayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirnimittāpi hi prītir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā na saṃbandhabṛṃhitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrīr utsāhasanātheva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayāti sthiratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nir-nimitta āpi hi prītir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā na saṃbandha-bṛṃhitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrīr utsāha-sa-nātha īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayāti sthiratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ satkṛtya taṃ dūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apṛcchad gṛhiṇīṃ vaṇik</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasminn evaṃ gate kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brūhi kiṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sat-kṛtya taṃ dūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apṛcchad gṛhiṇīṃ vaṇik</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasminn evaṃ gate kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brūhi kiṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ dvyaṅgulaprajñā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānīyur vā striyaḥ kiyat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu pṛṣṭeti vakṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭadhṛṣṭā hi mādṛśī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ dvy-aṅgula-prajñā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānīyur vā striyaḥ kiyat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu pṛṣṭa īti vakṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭa-dhṛṣṭā hi mā-dṛśī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satyānṛtaṃ vaṇikvṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parityājyaṃ na vāṇijaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahajaṃ hi tyajan vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durvṛtta iti nindyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satya-an-ṛtaṃ vaṇik-vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parityājyaṃ na vāṇijaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha-jaṃ hi tyajan vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-vṛtta iti nindyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putras tāvat tavotpannas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra kānṛtavāditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ye punas tasya doṣās tān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mithyā bhaṇa guṇā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>putras tāvat tava utpannas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatra ka ān-ṛta-vāditā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ye punas tasya doṣās tān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mithyā bhaṇa guṇā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākhyāyante hi sarvārthāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtrimair eva nāmabhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhur madhurakaṃ kecit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ tādṛṅmārakaṃ viṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākhyāyante hi sarva-arthāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtrimair eva nāmabhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhur madhurakaṃ ke-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ tā-dṛṅ-mārakaṃ viṣam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kārye hi guruṇi prāpte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mithyā satyam apīṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśvatthāmā hato drauṇir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity ūce kiṃ na pāṇḍavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kārye hi guruṇi prāpte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mithyā satyam api iṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśvatthāmā hato drauṇir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity ūce kiṃ na pāṇḍavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhanagardhaparādhīnāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kālahuṃkāradāruṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍākamalinīṃ yānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvadvidhāḥ kṣārasāgare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhana-gardha-parādhīnāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāla-huṃ-kāra-dāruṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīḍā-kamalinīṃ yānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvad-vidhāḥ kṣāra-sāgare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāṃyātrikapates tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duhitā bhavato gṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vināmbhodhisāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praveṣṭā dhanarāśinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāṃyātrika-pates tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duhitā bhavato gṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vina āmbho-dhi-sāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praveṣṭā dhana-rāśinā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān mā smāvamanyadhvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhanyair durlabhāṃ śriyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛcchrāyāsaśataprāpyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kṛcchrādhigatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān mā sma avamanyadhvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-dhanyair dur-labhāṃ śriyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛcchra-āyāsa-śata-prāpyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kṛcchra-adhigatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādivacanaṃ tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūktam ity abhinandya saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dadau sāgaradattāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdeśaṃ dūtasaṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi-vacanaṃ tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-uktam ity abhinandya saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dadau sāgaradattāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdeśaṃ dūta-saṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaktavyaḥ suhṛd asmākam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmākam api dārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpannas tādṛśo yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathitā katham ākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaktavyaḥ suhṛd asmākam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmākam api dārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utpannas tā-dṛśo yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathitā katham ākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā ye guṇāḥ ke 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya śārīramānasāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayam evāsi tān dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ nas taiḥ kathitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā ye guṇāḥ ke 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya śārīra-mānasāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayam eva asi tān dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ nas taiḥ kathitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi bahu saṃkīrṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau saṃdiśya sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūtaṃ prasthāpayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapātheyapradeśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi bahu saṃkīrṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau saṃdiśya sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūtaṃ prasthāpayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-pātheya-pradeśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam aṣṭāv atikrāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samā dūtasamāgamaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha dūtaḥ sphuṭālāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddhavarmāṇam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam aṣṭāv atikrāntāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samā- dūta-samāgamaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha dūtaḥ sphuṭa-ālāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddhavarmāṇam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakalatreṇa bhāṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāmātaram anālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā smāgacchad bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-kalatreṇa bhāṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāmātaram an-ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā smā agacchad bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tan mām ujjayanīṃ yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi gacchantam icchatha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ me dārakam ākhyāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadīyāṃś ca guṇān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tan mām ujjayanīṃ yūyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi gacchantam icchatha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taṃ me dārakam ākhyāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadīyāṃś ca guṇān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tu kṣaṇam utprekṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samagrasmṛtinoditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āste mātulaśāle 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmraliptyāṃ paṭhann iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena tu kṣaṇam utprekṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samagra-smṛtina ūditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āste mātula-śāle 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmraliptyāṃ paṭhann iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anenāpi prapañcena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catuṣpañca samā yayuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha tricaturāḥ prāpur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūtāś caturabhāṣiṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena api prapañcena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catuṣ-pañca samā- yayuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha tri-caturāḥ prāpur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dūtāś catura-bhāṣiṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te cādṛtam anādṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhavarmāṇam abruvan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āha saṃbandhinī yat tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadāraṃ tan niśāmyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te cā adṛtam an-ādṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhavarmāṇam abruvan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āha saṃbandhinī yat tvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadāraṃ tan niśāmyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amī saṃvatsarā yātās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trayodaśacaturdaśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adyāpi ca na paśyāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vayaṃ jāmātur ākṛtim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amī saṃvatsarā- yātās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trayo-daśa-catur-daśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adya api ca na paśyāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vayaṃ jāmātur ākṛtim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭasya kila paṇyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavataḥ krayavikrayau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti lokapravādo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatāpi na kiṃ śrutaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭasya kila paṇyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavataḥ kraya-vikrayau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti loka-pravādo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavata āpi na kiṃ śrutaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ yac cāttha paṭhann āste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmraliptyām asāv iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idam apy atidurbaddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>savyājam iva vācakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ yac cā attha paṭhann āste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmraliptyām asāv iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idam apy ati-dur-baddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-vyājam iva vācakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yeṣāṃ karma ca vṛttiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vihite pāṭhapāṭhane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>teṣām api paricchinnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṭhakālaḥ kiyān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yeṣāṃ karma ca vṛttiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vihite pāṭha-pāṭhane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>teṣām api paricchinnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṭha-kālaḥ kiyān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvadīyena tu putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktasarvānyakarmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭhatā sakalaṃ janma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>neyam ity asamañjasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvadīyena tu putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyakta-sarva-anya-karmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭhatā sakalaṃ janma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>neyam ity a-samañjasam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt krīḍām imāṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yamahāsavibhīṣaṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atra vā tāmraliptyāṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dārako darśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt krīḍām imāṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yama-hāsa-vibhīṣaṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atra vā tāmraliptyāṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dārako darśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti yāvad asau tāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūjyair viśramyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tān uktvā gṛhiṇīm ūce</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddhavarmā sasaṃbhramaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti yāvad asau tāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūjyair viśramyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tān uktvā gṛhiṇīm ūce</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddhavarmā sa-saṃbhramaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anutprekṣyaiva mandena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>doṣam āgāminaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūrāśāgrastacittena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadāvacanaṃ kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>an-utprekṣya eva mandena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>doṣam āgāminaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūra-āśā-grasta-cittena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadā-vacanaṃ kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvatputrasya hi ye doṣāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāṇadanturatādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālenaitāvatā teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katamaḥ prakṣayaṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvat-putrasya hi ye doṣāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāṇa-danturatā-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālena etāvatā teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katamaḥ prakṣayaṃ gataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vardhamāṇe śarīre hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nijā doṣāḥ śarīriṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sutarām upacīyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīrāvayavā iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vardhamāṇe śarīre hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nijā- doṣāḥ śarīriṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sutarām upacīyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīra-avayavā- iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād darśaya dūtebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraṃ haragaṇākṛtim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā paṇḍitenaivam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāyaś cintyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād darśaya dūtebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraṃ hara-gaṇa-ākṛtim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā paṇḍitena evam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāyaś cintyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā coktaṃ mayopāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kīdṛśo 'py atra cintitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yady asau rocate tubhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ prastūyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā ca uktaṃ maya ūpāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kī-dṛśo 'py atra cintitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yady asau rocate tubhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataḥ prastūyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ucyatām iti tenoktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇe kim api sābravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'pi śobhanam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam upāyaṃ prayuktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ucyatām iti tena uktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇe kim api sa ābravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'pi śobhanam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam upāyaṃ prayuktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vivikte brāhmaṇaṃ mitraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatpratigrahajīvinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyālāpaśataprītam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayācata sadīnataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vivikte brāhmaṇaṃ mitraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat-pratigraha-jīvinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priya-ālāpa-śata-prītam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayācata sa-dīnataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvetakākaprasiddhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama putrasya ye guṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāraś ca prakāraś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yādṛk kiṃ tasya kathyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śveta-kāka-prasiddhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama putrasya ye guṇāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāraś ca prakāraś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā-dṛk kiṃ tasya kathyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā ca paribhāṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>buddhaṃ tad bhavataḥ sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahadūtasamāgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā ca paribhāṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>buddhaṃ tad bhavataḥ sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha-dūta-samāgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena nas tena sauhārdaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdā sthiratāṃ naya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā svārtha evāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tava dhiṅ māṃ mudhākulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena nas tena sauhārdaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdā sthiratāṃ naya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā sva-artha eva ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tava dhiṅ māṃ mudhā-ākulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ya eṣa bhavataḥ putro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñaguptaḥ surūpavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrutismṛtyāditattvajñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalāsu ca viśāradaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ya eṣa bhavataḥ putro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñaguptaḥ su-rūpavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śruti-smṛty-ādi-tattva-jñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalāsu ca viśāradaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa sāgaradattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayām upayacchatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tādṛśīm eva cānīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>matputrāya prayacchatu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa sāgaradattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayām upayacchatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tā-dṛśīm eva cā anīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mat-putrāya prayacchatu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca ratnasuvarṇādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lapsyate draviṇaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyāṃśas tava bhāvīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjate kathayānayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca ratna-suvarṇa-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lapsyate draviṇaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya aṃśas tava bhāvi īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjate kathaya ānayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi sa tenoktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sotsāhaṃ svārthatṛṣṇayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīt tvadvidheyaiḥ kiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madvidhaiḥ prārthitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi sa tena uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-utsāhaṃ sva-artha-tṛṣṇayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīt tvad-vidheyaiḥ kiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mad-vidhaiḥ prārthitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yajñaguptam athāhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃnidhau buddhavarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitā śrāvitavān etaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛttāntaṃ pūrvamantritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yajñaguptam athā ahūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃnidhau buddhavarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitā śrāvitavān etaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛtta-antaṃ pūrva-mantritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ guruvākyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktimantītarāṇi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiśubhir na vicāryāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād evaṃ bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ guru-vākyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktimanti itarāṇi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiśubhir na vicāryāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād evaṃ bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ katicid āsitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divasān buddhavarmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptaḥ svalaṃkāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbandhibhyaḥ pradarśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kati-cid āsitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divasān buddhavarmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptaḥ sv-alaṃ-kāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbandhibhyaḥ pradarśitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc cāyam āyātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmraliptyāḥ sa dārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāraś ca guṇāś cāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛśyantāṃ yādṛśā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca ayam āyātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāmraliptyāḥ sa dārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāraś ca guṇāś ca asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛśyantāṃ yā-dṛśā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tair vismitair uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anindyā kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha bālavasantena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad anena sameṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tair vismitair uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-nindyā kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha bāla-vasantena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad anena sameṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guṇānāṃ tv etadīyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anveṣaṇam anarthakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyate nirguṇānāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nedṛśākāradhīratā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guṇānāṃ tv etadīyānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anveṣaṇam an-arthakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛśyate nir-guṇānāṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nā idṛśā ākāra-dhīratā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu nāmāsya duḥśliṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ kurubhakaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi kubjapalāśākhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pārijātasya yujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu nāma asya duḥ-śliṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ kurubhakaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi kubja-palāśa-ākhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pārijātasya yujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā duḥśravaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrūyate mahatām api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kledur ity ucyate candro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātariśveti mārutaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā duḥ-śravaṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrūyate mahatām api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kledur ity ucyate candro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātariśva īti mārutaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cāpi guṇavad vācya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācakaṃ paribhūyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśrayasya hi daurbalyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśritaḥ paribhūyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca api guṇavad vācya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācakaṃ paribhūyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśrayasya hi daurbalyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśritaḥ paribhūyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā sārthavāhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasūtādya kuṭumbinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuvayor adya sauhārdaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gataṃ kūṭasthanityatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā sa-artha-vāhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasūta ādya kuṭumbinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuvayor adya sauhārdaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gataṃ kūṭa-stha-nityatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād āśutaraṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktanidrāśanādikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhayāmo vayaṃ diṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sārthavāhakuṭumbinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād āśutaraṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyakta-nidrā-āśana-ādikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhayāmo vayaṃ diṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-artha-vāha-kuṭumbinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavadbhir api puṇyāhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varayātrā pravartyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hīdānīṃ vivāhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaścid asti vighātakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavadbhir api puṇya-āhe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vara-yātrā pravartyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi idānīṃ vivāhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaś-cid asti vighātakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā teṣu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāravatprābhṛteṣu saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptaṃ varīkṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varayātrāṃ vyasarjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā teṣu yāteṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāravat-prābhṛteṣu saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptaṃ varī-kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vara-yātrāṃ vyasarjayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'sau kurubhakas taṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñaguptaṃ cakāra saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃjñayā yajñaguptaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaṃ kurubhakaṃ vaṇik ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo 'sau kurubhakas taṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñaguptaṃ cakāra saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃjñayā yajñaguptaṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaṃ kurubhakaṃ vaṇik ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalpitabrāhmaṇākalpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulahemāṅgulīyakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreṣṭhiputro 'pi jāmātur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsīt tatra vayasyakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalpita-brāhmaṇa-ākalpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tula-hema-aṅgulīyakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreṣṭhi-putro 'pi jāmātur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsīt tatra vayasyakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varayātrā cirāt prāpad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avantinagarīṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkāntikāntavṛttāntāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣasenālakām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vara-yātrā cirāt prāpad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avanti-nagarīṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkānti-kānta-vṛtta-antāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yakṣa-sena ālakām iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siprātaṭe niviṣṭaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janyāvāsakam āvasat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasantopahṛtaśrīka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>purodyānamanoharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siprā-taṭe niviṣṭaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>janya-āvāsakam āvasat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasanta-upahṛta-śrīka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pura-udyāna-mano-haram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tṛṇīkṛtamahākālās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad ahaḥ sakutūhalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atṛptadṛṣṭayo 'paśyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaṃ pauraparaṃparāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tṛṇī-kṛta-mahā-kālās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad ahaḥ sa-kutūhalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-tṛpta-dṛṣṭayo 'paśyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaṃ paura-paraṃ-parāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cojjayanakair dhūrtair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṅkavācakapaṇḍitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veṇuvīṇāpravīṇaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāṃcid velām ayāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca ujjayanakair dhūrtair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaṅka-vācaka-paṇḍitaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veṇu-vīṇā-pravīṇaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāṃ-cid velām ayāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsau syālakenoktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalpitāhārabhūṣiṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sajjaṃ vaḥ pānam annaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim ādhve bhujyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asau syālakena uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalpita-āhāra-bhūṣiṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sajjaṃ vaḥ pānam annaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim ādhve bhujyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cānekāsanām ekām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālokya manubhūmikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kena kenātra bhoktavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti syālakam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca an-eka-āsanām ekām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālokya manu-bhūmikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kena kena atra bhoktavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti syālakam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ jātarūpāṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuṅgavidrumapādakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūyaṃ madhyamam adhyādhvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsanaṃ paṭuvāsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ jāta-rūpa-aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tuṅga-vidruma-pādakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūyaṃ madhyamam adhyādhvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsanaṃ paṭu-vāsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye caite dattavetrāṅge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmān ubhayataḥ same</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ete jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhau te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syālakāv adhitiṣṭhataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye ca ete datta-vetra-aṅge</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmān ubhayataḥ same</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ete jyeṣṭha-kaniṣṭhau te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syālakāv adhitiṣṭhataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pārśvayor ubhayor dīrghā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā cāsanaparaṃparā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tavāsyām upaveṣṭavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śeṣayā syālamālayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pārśvayor ubhayor dīrghā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā cā asana-paraṃ-parā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava asyām upaveṣṭavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śeṣayā syāla-mālayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varas tu kṣaṇam avyūha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>syālam etad abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmābhiḥ saha yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kāryaṃ pānabhojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varas tu kṣaṇam a-vyūha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>syālam etad abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmābhiḥ saha yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kāryaṃ pāna-bhojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gotrācāro 'yam asmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāvat pānaṃ na sevyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhujyate vāparaiḥ sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvan na pariṇīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gotra-ācāro 'yam asmākaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāvat pānaṃ na sevyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhujyate va ā-paraiḥ sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvan na pariṇīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariṇīya nivṛttena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhājñena satā pituḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāryam etan na vā kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinādeśād guror iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariṇīya nivṛttena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdha-ājñena satā pituḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāryam etan na vā kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinā ādeśād guror iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ nāmety anujñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvaśureṇa varaḥ pṛthak</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durmanāyitasaṃbandhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūtam āhāram āharat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ nāma ity anujñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvaśureṇa varaḥ pṛthak</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durmanāyita-saṃbandhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūtam āhāram āharat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāte yāme ca yāminyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>garjadvāditramaṇḍalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhaṃ sāgaradattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṇetum agād asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāte yāme ca yāminyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>garjad-vāditra-maṇḍalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhaṃ sāgaradattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṇetum agād asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrālambitavān vadhvāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuraccāmīkaraṃ karam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smaran guruvaco dhīryān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvikārakaro varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrā alambitavān vadhvāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuraccāmīkaraṃ karam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smaran guru-vaco dhīryān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nir-vikāra-karo varaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cātrāgniṃ parikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caṇḍaśūlākulaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāṇibhyām udaraṃ dhṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mumoha ca papāta ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca atra agniṃ parikramya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caṇḍa-śūla-ākulaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāṇibhyām udaraṃ dhṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mumoha ca papāta ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśāntocchvāsaniḥśvāse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmin saṃmīlitekṣaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūkitoddāmadhūryeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kranditena vijṛmbhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśānta-ucchvāsa-niḥśvāse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmin saṃmīlita-īkṣaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mūkita-uddāma-dhūryeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kranditena vijṛmbhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaśrūr jāmātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāḍitoraḥśirās tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uccair bhartṛsamāvasthām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākrośat kundamālikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śvaśrūr jāmātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāḍita-uraḥ-śirās tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uccair bhartṛ-sama-avasthām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākrośat kundamālikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hā hatāsi vinaṣṭāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhik tvāṃ pracchannarākṣasīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jitapradyumnarūpo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patir utsādito yayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hā hata āsi vinaṣṭa āsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhik tvāṃ pracchanna-rākṣasīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jita-pradyumna-rūpo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patir utsādito yayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvam eva na mṛtā kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ vā duḥkhabhāginī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayā tvaṃ sakalaṃ janma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>draṣṭavyāmṛtayā mṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvam eva na mṛtā kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ahaṃ vā duḥkha-bhāginī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayā tvaṃ sakalaṃ janma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>draṣṭavya ā-mṛtayā mṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ jīvati sā yā strī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālaiva mṛtabhartṛkā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūrāntaragariṣṭho hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nārīṇāṃ jīvitāt patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ jīvati sā yā strī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāla aiva mṛta-bhartṛkā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūra-antara-gariṣṭho hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nārīṇāṃ jīvitāt patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā ca mātā sutām iṣṭāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cārutāśīlaśālinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaktā vidhavikāṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jyeṣṭhā kālasya sā svasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā ca mātā sutām iṣṭāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cārutā-śīla-śālinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaktā vidhavikāṃ draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jyeṣṭhā kālasya sā svasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi vilapanty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā ca niśceṣṭanābhavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hṛdayodarasaṃdhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāmātuḥ spanditaḥ śanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi vilapanty- eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā ca niś-ceṣṭana ābhavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hṛdaya-udara-saṃdhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāmātuḥ spanditaḥ śanaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ paurasamūhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmātari tathāvidhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣahāsāṭṭahāsānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsīn nāntaram ambare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ paura-samūhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāmātari tathā-vidhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harṣa-hāsa-aṭṭa-hāsānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āsīn na antaram ambare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śanakaiś ca sa niḥśvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jihmasphuritapakṣmaṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udamīlayad ātāmre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>locane gurutārake ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śanakaiś ca sa niḥśvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jihma-sphurita-pakṣmaṇī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udamīlayad ā-tāmre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>locane guru-tārake ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtas tādṛṅ mahotsavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛddhatālabdhaputreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yo nṛpeṇāpi duṣkaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtas tādṛṅ mahā-utsavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛddhatā-labdha-putreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yo nṛpeṇa api duṣ-karaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa vaidyaiḥ pratyuvāca tān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āmāśayagataṃ śūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bādhate guru mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti pṛṣṭaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa vaidyaiḥ pratyuvāca tān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āmāśaya-gataṃ śūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bādhate guru mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vāsagṛhasthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaidyā jāmātur ādṛtāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūlasyāmanidānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtavantaś cikitsitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vāsa-gṛha-sthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaidyā- jāmātur ādṛtāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śūlasyā ama-nidānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtavantaś cikitsitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śūlair āyāsyamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdhanidrasya cāntare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya jāgradvadhūkasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham apy agaman niśā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śūlair āyāsyamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>labdha-nidrasya ca antare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya jāgrad-vadhūkasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>katham apy agaman niśā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāgarātiviṣāmustā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kvathapānāvatarpitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asnehālpatarāhāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'bhavat pratyahaḥ kṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāgara-ati-viṣā-mustā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kvatha-pāna-avatarpitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-sneha-alpatara-āhāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'bhavat praty-ahaḥ kṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayaṃ bheṣajapeṣādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāpṛtā kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vismṛteva vadhūlajjāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartṛmāndyabhayāturā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svayaṃ bheṣaja-peṣa-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāpṛtā kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vismṛta īva vadhū-lajjāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartṛ-māndya-bhaya-āturā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ patim upāsīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa kubjaḥ kundamālikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgeṣu bhayasannāṅgīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kurvan kelīṃ kilāspṛśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ patim upāsīnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa kubjaḥ kundamālikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgeṣu bhaya-sanna-aṅgīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kurvan kelīṃ kila aspṛśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca vimuñcainaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kirāṭam apaṭuṃ viṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devatāgurubhir dattaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntaṃ toṣaya mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca vimuñca enaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kirāṭam a-paṭuṃ viṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>devatā-gurubhir dattaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntaṃ toṣaya mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athotthāya tataḥ sthānād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṛśayyātiraskṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>keyaṃ kelir anāryeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadhūr bhartāram abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha utthāya tataḥ sthānād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartṛ-śayyā-tiras-kṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ka īyaṃ kelir an-ārya īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadhūr bhartāram abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tāṃ sasmitam āha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā sma grāmeyikā bhava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kā hi nāgarikaṃmanyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hāsyāt naṭabaṭos traset ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tāṃ sa-smitam āha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā sma grāmeyikā bhava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kā hi nāgarikaṃ-manyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hāsyāt naṭa-baṭos traset ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhaninām īdṛśāḥ kṣudrāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyo vācālatāphalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi mūkaṃ śukaṃ kaścic</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ dharati pañjare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhaninām īdṛśāḥ kṣudrāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyo vācā-latā-phalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi mūkaṃ śukaṃ kaś-cic</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ dharati pañjare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt krīḍanakād asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abaddhabhāṣamāṇakāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hasataḥ spṛśataś cāṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīru mā vitrasīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.125'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt krīḍanakād asmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-baddha-bhāṣamāṇakāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hasataḥ spṛśataś ca aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhīru mā vitrasīr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.126'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena sā bodhitāpy evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sadācārakulodbhavā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍābhir ghaṭadāsībhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ bhuktaṃ nirabhartsayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.126'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena sā bodhita āpy evaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sad-ācāra-kula-udbhavā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caṇḍābhir ghaṭa-dāsībhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ bhuktaṃ nirabhartsayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.127'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca yajñaguptasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvad evaiṣa mūḍhakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rahasyaṃ na bhinatty etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvan nyāyyam ito gatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.127'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca yajñaguptasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvad eva eṣa mūḍhakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rahasyaṃ na bhinatty etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvan nyāyyam ito gatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.128'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ kadācid abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhiṣajo niṣphalakriyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pānāhāravihāreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim icchati bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.128'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ kadā-cid abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhiṣajo niṣ-phala-kriyāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāna-āhāra-vihāreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim icchati bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.129'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṣāmatarālāpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tān avocac cirād asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitarau draṣṭum icchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyaputrau priyāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.129'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kṣāmatara-ālāpas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tān avocac cirād asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pitarau draṣṭum icchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priya-putrau priyāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.130'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sāgaradattāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaidyair evaṃ niveditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ vadati jāmātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tac ca pratividhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.130'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sāgaradattāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaidyair evaṃ niveditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>evaṃ vadati jāmātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tac ca pratividhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.131'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad yad vaidyena kartavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āmāśayacikitsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtam apy akṛtaṃ tat tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etasmiñ jātam āture ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.131'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad yad vaidyena kartavyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āmāśaya-cikitsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtam apy a-kṛtaṃ tat tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etasmiñ jātam āture ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.132'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svadeśāya tu yāto 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaved api nirāmayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jagatprasiddhisiddhaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suhṛddarśanam auṣadham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.132'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sva-deśāya tu yāto 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaved api nir-āmayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jagat-prasiddhi-siddhaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suhṛd-darśanam auṣadham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.133'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhātrīpradhānaparivāracamūsanāthām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ambhodhisāradhanahāramahoṣṭrayūthām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śyāmāṃ niśām iva kṛśena tuṣārabhāsā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāsthāpayat saha vareṇa vaṇiktanūjām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.133'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhātrī-pradhāna-parivāra-camū-sa-nāthām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ambho-dhi-sāra-dhana-hāra-mahā-uṣṭra-yūthām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śyāmāṃ niśām iva kṛśena tuṣāra-bhāsā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāsthāpayat saha vareṇa vaṇik-tanūjām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.134'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prayāṇakaiś ca yāvadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>agād rājagṛhaṃ varaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreṣṭhī ca dviguṇān prītān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāhiṇot paricārakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.134'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prayāṇakaiś ca yāvadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>agād rājagṛhaṃ varaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreṣṭhī ca dvi-guṇān prītān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāhiṇot paricārakān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.135'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyajāmātṛvārttābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ prayāṇakāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivartitavyaṃ yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti cāsāv uvāca tān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.135'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anya-jāmātṛ-vārttābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ prayāṇakāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivartitavyaṃ yuṣmābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti ca asāv uvāca tān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.136'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prathamād vāsakād yau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivṛttau paricārakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreṣṭhine kathitaṃ tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaḥ svastho manāg iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.136'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prathamād vāsakād yau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivṛttau paricārakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreṣṭhine kathitaṃ tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaḥ sva-stho manāg iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.137'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā yathā ca yāti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsakān uttarottarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śanakaiḥ śanakair māndyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atyajat sa tathā tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.137'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā yathā ca yāti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāsakān uttara-uttarān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śanakaiḥ śanakair māndyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atyajat sa tathā tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.138'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyāt tu vāsakād anyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivṛttaparicārakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varaṃ sāgaradattāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛṣṭapuṣṭāṅgam ākhyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.138'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyāt tu vāsakād anyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivṛtta-paricārakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>varaṃ sāgaradattāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛṣṭa-puṣṭa-aṅgam ākhyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.139'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsāv iti harṣāndhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktapātraparīkṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ācaturvedacaṇḍālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitatāra nidhīn api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.139'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asāv iti harṣa-andhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyakta-pātra-parīkṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ā-catur-veda-caṇḍālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitatāra nidhīn api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.140'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtrimas tu varaḥ prātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktajāmātṛḍambaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītabrāhmaṇākalpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthitaḥ padagaḥ pathi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.140'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtrimas tu varaḥ prātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyakta-jāmātṛ-ḍambaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhīta-brāhmaṇa-ākalpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthitaḥ pada-gaḥ pathi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.141'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaiṣeṇāgantunā muktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa reje nijayā śriyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sendracāpataḍiddāmnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghaneneva niśākaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.141'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaiṣeṇā agantunā muktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa reje nijayā śriyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-indra-cāpa-taḍid-dāmnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghanena iva niśā-karaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.142'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>varapravahaṇaṃ tac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kundamālikayāsthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āruroha varākāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītaḥ kurubhakaḥ khalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.142'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vara-pravahaṇaṃ tac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kundamālikayā āsthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āruroha vara-ākāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītaḥ kurubhakaḥ khalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.143'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jitaśaṃkarakiṃkaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravidhūya vadhūr aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>locane samamīlayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.143'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛta-ākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jita-śaṃkara-kiṃkaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravidhūya vadhūr aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>locane samamīlayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.144'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vadhūvaram atha draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakalā sakutūhalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niragāt tyaktakartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>javanā janatā purāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.144'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vadhū-varam atha draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakalā sa-kutūhalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niragāt tyakta-kartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>javanā janatā purāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.145'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau ca durbaddhasambandhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktālohaguḍāv iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā dhutakaraiḥ paurair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhikṣiptaḥ prajāpatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.145'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau ca dur-baddha-sambandhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktā-loha-guḍāv iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā dhuta-karaiḥ paurair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhikṣiptaḥ prajāpatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
