</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.146'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāmacāreṇa kāmo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāvan naiva praśasyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ punar yaḥ sadācāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sargahetur bhavādṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.146'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāma-cāreṇa kāmo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāvan na eva praśasyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ punar yaḥ sad-ācāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarga-hetur bhavā-dṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.147'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā vāmaśīlānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvam eva parameśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yenaitāv apsaraḥpretau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duryojyau yojitāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.147'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā vāma-śīlānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvam eva parama-īśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena etāv apsaraḥ-pretau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-yojyau yojitāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.148'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>buddhavarmāpi niryāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvaśreṇipuraḥsaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadhūm abhyanayat kāntyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jitarājagṛhaṃ gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.148'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>buddhavarma āpi niryāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-śreṇi-puraḥ-saraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadhūm abhyanayat kāntyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jita-rāja-gṛhaṃ gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.149'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅkasthavadhukas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa cāvocat kuṭumbinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyam evāstu te putras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanayā ca vadhūr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.149'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅka-stha-vadhukas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa ca avocat kuṭumbinīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyam eva astu te putras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanayā ca vadhūr iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.150'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manyamāneṣu māneṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vandamāneṣu bandiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṭādiṣu ca nṛtyatsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sārkaṃ tad agamad dinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.150'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manyamāneṣu māneṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vandamāneṣu bandiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naṭa-ādiṣu ca nṛtyatsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-arkaṃ tad agamad dinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.151'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha cakṣurmanaḥkāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvāsaṃ kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptavayasyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kubjakena sahāviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.151'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha cakṣur-manaḥ-kāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvāsaṃ kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñagupta-vayasyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kubjakena sahā aviśat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.152'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra śayyāsamīpastham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsthitā citram āsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadhūr varavayasyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadanantaram unnatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.152'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra śayyā-samīpa-stham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āsthitā citram āsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vadhūr vara-vayasyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad-an-antaram unnatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.153'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintayantas tataḥ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarve mohāndhamānasāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amūlāgrāṇi pattrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lilikhur namitānanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.153'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintayantas tataḥ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarve moha-andha-mānasāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-mūla-agrāṇi pattrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lilikhur namita-ānanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.154'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asminn acintayat kaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛttānte kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api nāmaiṣa māṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇo na vrajed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.154'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asminn acintayat kaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛtta-ante kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api nāma eṣa māṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brāhmaṇo na vrajed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.155'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīt kurubhakasyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivikte rantum icchataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api nāmaiṣa niryāyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahir vāsagṛhād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.155'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīt kurubhakasya api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivikte rantum icchataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>api nāma eṣa niryāyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahir vāsa-gṛhād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.156'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yajñaguptas tayor buddhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat kālocitam iṅgitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gamanaṃ cātmanaḥ śreyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato nirgantum aihata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.156'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yajñaguptas tayor buddhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat kāla-ucitam iṅgitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gamanaṃ cā atmanaḥ śreyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato nirgantum aihata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.157'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tam ucchalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saviṣādam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dārān āpadgatān muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthitaḥ kva bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.157'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tam ucchalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-viṣādam abhāṣata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dārān āpad-gatān muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthitaḥ kva bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.158'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ yasya dārās tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidhātrā parikalpitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āpannāsmīti mā vocas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiṣṭhantī tasya saṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.158'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ yasya dārās tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidhātrā parikalpitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āpanna āsmi iti mā vocas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiṣṭhantī tasya saṃnidhau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.159'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat samālabhatām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvadāliṅganacumbanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vayaṃ tu kharadharmāṇo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāramātrasya bhāginaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.159'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat samālabhatām eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvad-āliṅgana-cumbanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vayaṃ tu khara-dharmāṇo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāra-mātrasya bhāginaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.160'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ittham uktvā sa cānyābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>preṣyābhiḥ saha niryayau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anicchām aicchad ākraṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāmyaḥ kurubhakaś ca tām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.160'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ittham uktvā sa ca anyābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>preṣyābhiḥ saha niryayau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-icchām aicchad ākraṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāmyaḥ kurubhakaś ca tām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.161'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāratarārāvaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śroṇīcaraṇabhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāharantīva taṃ vipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirjagāma javena sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.161'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāratara-ārāvaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śroṇī-caraṇa-bhūṣaṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāharanti īva taṃ vipraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirjagāma javena sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.162'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mattapramattapaure ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛtyadbhṛtyanirantare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptas tayā naiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭas tatra gṛhāṅgaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.162'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>matta-pramatta-paure ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛtyad-bhṛtya-nir-antare</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptas tayā na eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭas tatra gṛha-aṅgaṇe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.163'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa yāty eṣa yātīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādṛśyabhrāntivañcitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaṃ kaṃcid api sā yāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anvayāsīt tadāśayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.163'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa yāty eṣa yāti iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādṛśya-bhrānti-vañcitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaṃ kaṃ-cid api sā yāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anvayā āsīt tad-āśayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.164'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rabhasena ca niryāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rathyāpatham avātarat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hiṇḍīvāditrabhītā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumbhakārakuṭīgamāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.164'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rabhasena ca niryāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rathyā-patham avātarat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hiṇḍī-vāditra-bhītā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumbha-kāra-kuṭī-gamāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.165'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra kāpālikaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suṣuptaṃ madamūrchayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suśliṣṭā hanta rakṣeyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity adhyavasitaṃ tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.165'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra kāpālikaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suṣuptaṃ mada-mūrchayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-śliṣṭā hanta rakṣa īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity adhyavasitaṃ tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.166'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athābharaṇam unmucya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahāsāraṃ śarīrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyastavaṇigācārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>babandha dṛḍham ambare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.166'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā abharaṇam unmucya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-sāraṃ śarīrataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyasta-vaṇig-ācārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>babandha dṛḍham ambare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.167'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khaṭvāṅgādikam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāpālikaparicchadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghūrṇamānā madād grāmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāhyaṃ niragamat purāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.167'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khaṭva-aṅga-ādikam ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāpālika-paricchadam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghūrṇamānā madād grāmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bāhyaṃ niragamat purāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.168'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ca brāhmaṇī kācit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā śvetaśiroruhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svagṛhālindakāsīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭā karpāsakarttrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.168'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ca brāhmaṇī kā-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayā śveta-śiro-ruhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-gṛha-alindaka-āsīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭā karpāsa-karttrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.169'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekākiny eva sā daivaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ninditvā karuṇasvanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhik kṣudraṃ buddhavarmāṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti sakrodham abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.169'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekākiny- eva sā daivaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ninditvā karuṇa-svanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhik kṣudraṃ buddhavarmāṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti sa-krodham abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.170'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām apṛcchad asāv ārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirvyājaguṇaśālinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhoḥ kiṃ duṣkṛtaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nindyate yad asāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.170'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām apṛcchad asāv ārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirvyāja-guṇa-śālinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhoḥ kiṃ duṣ-kṛtaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nindyate yad asāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.171'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktam atimugdho vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhūrto vā bhagavann asi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadīyaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakāśam api na śrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.171'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktam ati-mugdho vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhūrto vā bhagavann asi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadīyaṃ duṣ-kṛtaṃ yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakāśam api na śrutam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.172'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā śroṣyati bhavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyatas tat suduḥśravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mādṛśī tu na śaktaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaktuṃ prakṛtikātarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.172'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā śroṣyati bhavān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyatas tat su-duḥ-śravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mādṛśī tu na śakta aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaktuṃ prakṛti-kātarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.173'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvac cedam asāv āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāvad uccais tarāṃ pure</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ḍiṇḍimadhvanisaṃbhinnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paribabhrāma ghoṣaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.173'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvac ca idam asāv āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāvad uccais tarāṃ pure</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ḍiṇḍima-dhvani-saṃbhinnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paribabhrāma ghoṣaṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.174'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho rājasamādeśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo vadhūṃ buddhavarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāgaraḥ kaścid ācaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa dāridryeṇa mucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.174'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho rāja-samādeśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo vadhūṃ buddhavarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāgaraḥ kaś-cid ācaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa dāridryeṇa mucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.175'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ punaḥ svagṛhe mohāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pracchādayati taṃ nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāṭayaty adhanaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāruṇaiḥ krakacair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.175'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ punaḥ sva-gṛhe mohāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pracchādayati taṃ nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāṭayaty a-dhanaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dāruṇaiḥ krakacair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.176'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athedaṃ brāhmaṇī śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>netrāmbuplāvitānanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paritoṣaparādhīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jahāsa ca ruroda ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.176'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha idaṃ brāhmaṇī śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>netra-ambu-plāvita-ānanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paritoṣa-parādhīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jahāsa ca ruroda ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.177'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca kim āścaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad ujjayaniko janaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nātisaṃdhīyate dhūrtair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūladevasamair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.177'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca kim āścaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad ujjayaniko janaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na atisaṃdhīyate dhūrtair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mūla-deva-samair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.178'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādhu sādhu mahāprājñe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sujāte kundamālike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayā sakubjakaḥ pāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddhavarmātisaṃdhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.178'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādhu sādhu mahā-prājñe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-jāte kundamālike</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayā sa-kubjakaḥ pāpo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>buddhavarma ātisaṃdhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.179'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā rājagṛhaṃ putri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayedaṃ sukham āsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptena saṃgamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvayāpi sthīyatāṃ tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.179'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā rājagṛhaṃ putri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaya īdaṃ sukham āsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptena saṃgamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaya āpi sthīyatāṃ tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.180'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi bruvatīṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cintayām āsa tām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣkāraṇajanany eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gopāyiṣyati mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.180'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi bruvatīṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cintayām āsa tām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣ-kāraṇa-janany- eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gopāyiṣyati mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.181'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śanaiś cākathayat tasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛttaṃ vṛttāntam ātmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍham āliṅgya sā caināṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītā prāveśayad gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.181'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śanaiś ca akathayat tasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛttaṃ vṛtta-antam ātmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gāḍham āliṅgya sā ca enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītā prāveśayad gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.182'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatārya ca tatrāsyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāṃ kāpālikataṇḍikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadbhāraparikhinnāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gātrāṇi paryavāhayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.182'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avatārya ca tatra asyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāṃ kāpālika-taṇḍikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad-bhāra-parikhinnāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gātrāṇi paryavāhayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.183'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhyajya snapayitvā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhoṣṇaiḥ salilair asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthūlaceladalāstīrṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śayane samaveśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.183'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhyajya snapayitvā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukha-uṣṇaiḥ salilair asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthūla-cela-dala-āstīrṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śayane samaveśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.184'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paridhāya ca tām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bībhatsām asthiśṛṅkhalām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrāmyatsaṃbhrāntapauraṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā prātaḥ prāviśat puram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.184'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paridhāya ca tām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bībhatsām asthi-śṛṅkhalām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrāmyat-saṃbhrānta-pauraṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā prātaḥ prāviśat puram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.185'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃnimittam ayaṃ lokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃcaraty ākulākulaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti pṛṣṭavatī kaṃcid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau puranivāsinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.185'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ-nimittam ayaṃ lokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃcaraty ākula-ākulaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti pṛṣṭavatī kaṃ-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau pura-nivāsinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.186'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam iha ca sthāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṣṭhino buddhavarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putraḥ kurubhako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svanāmavikṛtākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.186'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam iha ca sthāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṣṭhino buddhavarmaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putraḥ kurubhako nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-nāma-vikṛta-ākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.187'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmai cānyena ṣaṇḍhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṇīya dvijanmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śailūṣeṇeva lubdhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svabhāryā pratipāditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.187'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmai ca anyena ṣaṇḍhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pariṇīya dvi-janmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śailūṣeṇa iva lubdhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-bhāryā pratipāditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.188'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā taṃ kurubhakaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārgayantī ca taṃ dvijam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradoṣe kvāpy apakrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lokas tenāyam ākulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.188'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā taṃ kurubhakaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mārgayantī ca taṃ dvi-jam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradoṣe kva apy apakrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lokas tena ayam ākulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.189'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tatas tayā śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāntaḥsmitamudāhṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhadra ṣaṇḍhasya tasyāśu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhaṃ nayata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.189'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tatas tayā śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-antaḥ-smita-mud-āhṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhadra ṣaṇḍhasya tasyā aśu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhaṃ nayata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.190'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tanmadhurālāpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>raktapaurapuraḥsarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptagṛhaṃ prāpad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brahmanirghoṣabhūṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.190'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tan-madhura-ālāpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>rakta-paura-puraḥ-sarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñagupta-gṛhaṃ prāpad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brahma-nirghoṣa-bhūṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.191'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra cāgnigṛhadvāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyākhyānakaraṇākulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāntevāsinam āsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yajñaguptaṃ dadarśa sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.191'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ca agni-gṛha-dvāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyākhyāna-karaṇa-ākulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-antevāsinam āsīnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yajñaguptaṃ dadarśa sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.192'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato nidhāya khaṭvāṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>racitasvastikāsanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko 'yaṃ vyākhyāyate grantha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity apṛcchat samatsarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.192'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato nidhāya khaṭva-aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>racita-svastika-āsanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko 'yaṃ vyākhyāyate grantha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ity apṛcchat samatsarā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.193'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd bhagavann eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mānavī dharmasaṃhitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etasyāṃ cāturāśramyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāturvarṇyaṃ ca varṇyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.193'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd bhagavann eṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mānavī dharma-saṃhitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etasyāṃ cāturāśramyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cāturvarṇyaṃ ca varṇyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.194'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ kim alīkena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na hīyaṃ dharmasaṃhitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokāyatam idaṃ manye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirmaryādajanapriyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.194'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ kim alīkena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na hi iyaṃ dharma-saṃhitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokāyatam idaṃ manye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirmaryāda-jana-priyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.195'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva dharmasaṃhitā kvedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adharmacaritaṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi vaidyaḥ svaśāstrajñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṣṭhī māṃsaṃ niṣevate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.195'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kva dharma-saṃhitā kva idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-dharma-caritaṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi vaidyaḥ sva-śāstra-jñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṣṭhī māṃsaṃ niṣevate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.196'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyācakhyānena vipreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mānavīṃ dharmasaṃhitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyatikrāntasavarṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṇītā varā tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.196'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyācakhyānena vipreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mānavīṃ dharma-saṃhitām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyatikrānta-sa-varṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṇītā varā tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.197'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā cākhaṇḍaśarīreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>surūpeṇa kalāvidā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūnā ca kāṇakuṇṭhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>matkuṇāya kilārpitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.197'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā ca a-khaṇḍa-śarīreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-rūpeṇa kalā-vidā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yūnā ca kāṇa-kuṇṭhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mat-kuṇāya kilā arpitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.198'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tan māheśvara pṛcchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim artham idam īdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayā kṛtam akartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktaṃ cet kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.198'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tan māheśvara pṛcchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim artham idam ī-dṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayā kṛtam a-kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuktaṃ cet kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.199'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd bhagavan yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayuktaṃ vā bhavatv idam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidheyair avikāryārthād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guruvākyād anuṣṭhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.199'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'bravīd bhagavan yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-yuktaṃ vā bhavatv idam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidheyair a-vikārya-arthād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guru-vākyād anuṣṭhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.200'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā hi jāmadagnyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durlaṅghyād vacanāt pituḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātuḥ kṛttaṃ śiras tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim āha bhagavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.200'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā hi jāmadagnyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dur-laṅghyād vacanāt pituḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātuḥ kṛttaṃ śiras tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim āha bhagavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.201'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ divyavṛttāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nādivyasya nidarśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi rudreṇa pīteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pibanti brāhmaṇāḥ surām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.201'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ divya-vṛtta-antā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na a-divyasya nidarśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi rudreṇa pīta īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pibanti brāhmaṇāḥ surām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.202'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca prājñena kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvam eva guror vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guruḥ kiṃ nāma na brūyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhakrodhādibādhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.202'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca prājñena kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvam eva guror vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guruḥ kiṃ nāma na brūyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkha-krodha-ādi-bādhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.203'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tīvraśūlāturaśirāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraṃ brūyāt pitā yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiro me chinddhi putreti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ kāryaṃ tena tat tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.203'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tīvra-śūla-ātura-śirāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putraṃ brūyāt pitā yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiro me chinddhi putra iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ kāryaṃ tena tat tathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.204'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca mātuḥ śiraḥ kṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāmeṇa vacanāt pituḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat tasyaiva prabhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥ saṃghaṭitaṃ punaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.204'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca mātuḥ śiraḥ kṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāmeṇa vacanāt pituḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat tasya eva prabhāvena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥ saṃghaṭitaṃ punaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.205'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvayā tu guruvākyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtākartavyakarmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divyaprabhāvahīnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat kathaṃ kāryam anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.205'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvayā tu guru-vākyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛta-a-kartavya-karmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divya-prabhāva-hīnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat kathaṃ kāryam anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.206'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīm api tām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavān vineṣyati priyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guruvākyaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad gataṃ gatam eva tat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.206'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idānīm api tām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavān vineṣyati priyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guru-vākyaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad gataṃ gatam eva tat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.207'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām ityuktavākyāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asāv āsīn niruttaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vādivācye hi nirdoṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vācyaṃ prativādinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.207'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyām ity-ukta-vākyāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asāv āsīn nir-uttaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vādi-vācye hi nir-doṣe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ vācyaṃ prativādinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.208'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca ciram āsitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabhomadhyagate ravau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhikṣāvelāpadeśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam āmantyoccacāla sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.208'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca ciram āsitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nabho-madhya-gate ravau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhikṣā-velā-apadeśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam āmantya uccacāla sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.209'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena coktā svam evedam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛddhimac ca gṛhaṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenātraiva sadāhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karotu bhagavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.209'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca uktā svam eva idam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛddhimac ca gṛhaṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena atra eva sadā āhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karotu bhagavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.210'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tayā vihasyoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāstikasya bhavādṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asaṃbhojyam abhojyatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>annaṃ kāpālikair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.210'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tayā vihasya uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāstikasya bhavā-dṛśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-saṃbhojyam a-bhojyatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>annaṃ kāpālikair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.211'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtvāpi tu mahat pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paścāt tāpaṃ karoti yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥsaṃvaraṇaṃ cāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāti bhojyānnatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.211'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtva āpi tu mahat pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paścāt tāpaṃ karoti yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥ-saṃvaraṇaṃ ca asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāti bhojya-annatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.212'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi tam uktvāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā ca brāhmaṇīgṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apanīya ca taṃ veṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācaran majjanādikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.212'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi tam uktva āsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā ca brāhmaṇī-gṛham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apanīya ca taṃ veṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācaran majjana-ādikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.213'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca kāpālikaṃ kalpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāyam ādāya sā punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptagṛhaṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dinaśe.am ayāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.213'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca kāpālikaṃ kalpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāyam ādāya sā punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñagupta-gṛhaṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dina-śe.am ayāpayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.214'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>annakālaṃ ca rātriṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nayantī brāhmaṇīgṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śeṣaṃ ca yajñaguptasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sānayad divasān bahūn ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.214'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anna-kālaṃ ca rātriṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nayantī brāhmaṇī-gṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śeṣaṃ ca yajñaguptasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa ānayad divasān bahūn ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.215'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācic cābhavat tasyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tṛṣṇāvaśagacetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akāryam idam etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtaṃ karma dvijanmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.215'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cic ca abhavat tasyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tṛṣṇā-vaśa-ga-cetasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kāryam idam etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtaṃ karma dvi-janmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.216'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena śakyo mayānetum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ darśitatṛṣṇayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kārye hi sulabhopāye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na muhyanti sumedhasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.216'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena śakyo mayā ānetum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayaṃ darśita-tṛṣṇayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kārye hi su-labha-upāye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na muhyanti su-medhasaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.217'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha muktālatām ekām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aruṇāṃ taralāṃśubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asau vikrāpayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayā brāhmaṇavṛddhayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.217'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha muktā-latām ekām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aruṇāṃ tarala-aṃśubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asau vikrāpayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayā brāhmaṇa-vṛddhayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.218'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hemarūpyaṃ ca tanmūlyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āhatānāhataṃ śuci</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmrakumbhayuganyastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sīmānte nihitaṃ tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.218'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hema-rūpyaṃ ca tan-mūlyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āhata-an-āhataṃ śuci</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāmra-kumbha-yuga-nyastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sīma-ante nihitaṃ tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.219'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dhātukriyāvāda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nidhivādāśrayair asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālāpaiś ciram āsitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yajñaguptam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.219'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha dhātu-kriyā-vāda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>nidhi-vāda-āśrayair asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālāpaiś ciram āsitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yajñaguptam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.220'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekarātraṃ vased grāme</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañcarātraṃ muniḥ pure</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti pravrajitācāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etaṃ veda bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.220'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eka-rātraṃ vased grāme</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pañca-rātraṃ muniḥ pure</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti pravrajita-ācāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etaṃ veda bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.221'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vatsa rājagṛhe sthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyaktapravrajitācāras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad abhavat prītivañcitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.221'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vatsa rājagṛhe sthitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyakta-pravrajita-ācāras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad abhavat prīti-vañcitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.222'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhiṇo 'pi hi sīdanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>snehaśṛṅkhalayantritāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viraktāḥ svaśarīre 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niḥsaṅgāḥ kiṃ mumukṣavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.222'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhiṇo 'pi hi sīdanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sneha-śṛṅkhala-yantritāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viraktāḥ sva-śarīre 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niḥ-saṅgāḥ kiṃ mumukṣavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.223'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vārāṇasīṃ gantum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aham icchāmi saṃprati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tīrthadarśanatantrā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>somasiddhāntavādinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.223'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena vārāṇasīṃ gantum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aham icchāmi saṃprati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tīrtha-darśana-tantrā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>soma-siddha-anta-vādinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.224'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyac cāhaṃ vijānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāridryavyādhivaidyakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākālamataṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidhānotpāṭanāgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.224'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyac ca ahaṃ vijānāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāridrya-vyādhi-vaidyakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-kāla-mataṃ nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidhāna-utpāṭana-āgamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.225'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā ca dhyānakhinnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vanānte parisarpatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ujjvalair lakṣitaś cihnaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kenāpi nihito nidhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.225'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā ca dhyāna-khinnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vana-ante parisarpatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ujjvalair lakṣitaś cihnaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kena api nihito nidhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.226'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi cāsti mayi prītis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ svīkriyatām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saphalāḥ khalu saṃparkāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhubhis tvādṛśair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.226'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi ca asti mayi prītis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tataḥ svīkriyatām asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-phalāḥ khalu saṃparkāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhubhis tvā-dṛśair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.227'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yajñaguptas tam utkhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nidhiṃ tatsahitas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadhīrāptataracchāttraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pracchannaṃ gṛham ānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.227'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yajñaguptas tam utkhāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nidhiṃ tat-sahitas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-dhīra-āptatara-cchāttraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pracchannaṃ gṛham ānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.228'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra pitre nidhānaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītaḥ kathitavān asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākālamatajñātvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya kāpālikasya ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.228'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra pitre nidhānaṃ tat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītaḥ kathitavān asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākālamata-jñātvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya kāpālikasya ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.229'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam uvāca pitā putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktvā vedān anarthakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahābhiks.or mahājñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahākālamataṃ paṭha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.229'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam uvāca pitā putraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyaktvā vedān an-arthakān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-bhiks.or mahā-jñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahākālamataṃ paṭha ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.230'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divyaṃ cakṣur idaṃ tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahākālamataṃ matam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidhigarbhāṃ naro yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chidrāṃ paśyati medinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.230'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>divyaṃ cakṣur idaṃ tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahākālamataṃ matam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nidhi-garbhāṃ naro yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chidrāṃ paśyati medinīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.231'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāpāśupatas tasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahākāla iva tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākālamatasyārthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatnād ārādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.231'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahā-pāśupatas tasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahākāla iva tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākālamatasya arthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatnād ārādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.232'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti protsāhitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahākālamatārthinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñagupto bravīti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthitāṃ kundamālikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.232'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti protsāhitas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahākālamata-arthinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñagupto bravīti sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthitāṃ kundamālikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.233'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy anugacchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavantaṃ tīrtham asthiram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭādṛṣṭamahāśreyaḥ</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāraṇaṃ mādṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.233'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy anugacchāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavantaṃ tīrtham a-sthiram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭa-a-dṛṣṭa-mahā-śreyaḥ</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāraṇaṃ mā-dṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.234'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu vāryamāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācā mandaprayatnayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākālamataprepsur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau naiva nivṛttavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.234'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tu vāryamāṇo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācā manda-prayatnayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākālamata-prepsur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau na eva nivṛttavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.235'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vārāṇasīṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñaguptāya sā dadau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ratnaṃ nātimahāmūlyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti cainam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.235'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vārāṇasīṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñaguptāya sā dadau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ratnaṃ na-ati-mahā-mūlyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti ca enam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.236'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asya ratnasya mūlyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathāsukham ihāsyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tu tāruṇyamūḍhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhāṣyā gaṇikā tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.236'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asya ratnasya mūlyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā-sukham ihā asyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tu tāruṇya-mūḍhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhāṣyā gaṇikā tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.237'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvādṛṅ navadaśaprāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrotriyaḥ sakutūhalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veśyāvaśyaḥ svadārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāty avaśyam avaśyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.237'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvā-dṛṅ nava-daśa-prāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrotriyaḥ sa-kutūhalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veśyā-vaśyaḥ sva-dārāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāty a-vaśyam a-vaśyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.238'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṇikāḍākinībhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pītasarvāṅgalohitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaj jīvati tad āścaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva dharmaḥ kva yaśaḥsukhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.238'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaṇikā-ḍākinībhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīta-sarva-aṅga-lohitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaj jīvati tad āścaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva dharmaḥ kva yaśaḥ-sukhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.239'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādim ādeśam asau tadīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathety anujñāya tathā cakāra</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārādhyavākyāni hi bhūtikāmāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sevāvidhijñā na vikalpayanti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.239'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādim ādeśam asau tadīyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatha īty anujñāya tathā cakāra</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārādhya-vākyāni hi bhūti-kāmāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sevā-vidhi-jñā- na vikalpayanti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.240'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caturaḥ pañca vā māsān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vārāṇasyāṃ vihṛtya tau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naimiṣaṃ jagmatus tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgādvāraṃ tataḥ kurūn ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.240'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caturaḥ pañca vā māsān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vārāṇasyāṃ vihṛtya tau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naimiṣaṃ jagmatus tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgā-dvāraṃ tataḥ kurūn ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.241'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kurubhyaḥ puṣkaraṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamayitvā ghanāgamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kārttikānte mahāpuṇyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭavantau mahālayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.241'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kurubhyaḥ puṣkaraṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gamayitvā ghana-āgamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kārttika-ante mahā-puṇyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭavantau mahālayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.242'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yajñaguptam athāvocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekadā kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahudraviṇam utpādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadāmi bhavate nidhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.242'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yajñaguptam atha avocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekadā kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bahu-draviṇam utpādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadāmi bhavate nidhim ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.243'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam ādāya gṛhān gaccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthasādhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trivargeṇa hi yujyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhasthā gṛhamedhinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.243'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tam ādāya gṛhān gaccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭa-a-dṛṣṭa-artha-sādhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tri-vargeṇa hi yujyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhasthā- gṛha-medhinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.244'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśrutaśrutayo mūḍhā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>raṇḍā nirvasavo 'pi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavanti khalu dharmārthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tīrthayātrāparāyaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.244'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-śruta-śrutayo mūḍhā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>raṇḍā- nir-vasavo 'pi vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavanti khalu dharma-arthaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tīrtha-yātrā-parāyaṇāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.245'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy adhunā gacchāmy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avantinagarīṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā hi kāpālikālīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṇikānām ivākaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.245'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy adhunā gacchāmy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avanti-nagarīṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā hi kāpālika-ālīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṇikānām ivā akaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.246'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāpāśupatās tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niśātaśitapaṭṭiśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yātrāyāṃ kila yudhyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuddhamātraprayojanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.246'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahā-pāśupatās tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niśāta-śita-paṭṭiśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yātrāyāṃ kila yudhyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuddha-mātra-prayojanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.247'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra kāpālikaḥ kaścin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nihanyād api māṃ balī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kākatālīyamokṣā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śastrapañjaracāriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.247'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra kāpālikaḥ kaś-cin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nihanyād api māṃ balī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāka-tālīya-mokṣā- hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śastra-pañjara-cāriṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.248'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ujjayanyāṃ ca yat pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtavān asi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svargavad brahmaghātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena sā durgamā tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.248'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ujjayanyāṃ ca yat pāpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duṣ-kṛtaṃ kṛtavān asi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svargavad brahma-ghātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena sā dur-gamā tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.249'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenāyāsaphalaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśaṅke gamanaṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāvṛtya ca tataḥ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sanidhiḥ pitarāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.249'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenā ayāsa-phalaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśaṅke gamanaṃ tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāvṛtya ca tataḥ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-nidhiḥ pitarāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.250'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc cāsya prasannau me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādāv asya mahātmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hanta saṃprati saṃprāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahākālamataṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.250'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca asya prasannau me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādāv asya mahā-ātmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hanta saṃprati saṃprāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahākālamataṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.251'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>loko hi prāṇasaṃdehe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇadhāraṇakāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvam apy ujjhati sphītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim u grantham anarthakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.251'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>loko hi prāṇa-saṃdehe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāṇa-dhāraṇa-kāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvam apy ujjhati sphītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim u grantham an-arthakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.252'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ciram ārādhitaś cāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirapekṣaḥ svajīvite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākālamataṃ tan me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ nāma na dāsyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.252'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ciram ārādhitaś ca ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirapekṣaḥ sva-jīvite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahākālamataṃ tan me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ nāma na dāsyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.253'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaṃ ca doṣam ahaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtavān guruśāsanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya pracchādanopāyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat kiṃcid iva tucchakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.253'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaṃ ca doṣam ahaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtavān guru-śāsanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya pracchādana-upāyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat kiṃ-cid iva tucchakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.254'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ devakulakoṇeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>līnaṃ kālapaṭaccaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paruṣākulakeśaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kaścil lakṣayaiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.254'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ deva-kula-koṇeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>līnaṃ kālapaṭaccaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paruṣa-ākula-keśaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kaś-cil lakṣayaiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.255'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuktam ityādi nirdhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'bravīt kundamālikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ cāntevāsināṃ yuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>moktum ācāryam āpadi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.255'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuktam ity-ādi nirdhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'bravīt kundamālikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ ca antevāsināṃ yuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>moktum ācāryam āpadi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.256'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā gatir bhavataḥ saiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mamāpi sahacāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi gacchati pūrṇendau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalaṅko 'sya na gacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.256'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā gatir bhavataḥ sa aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama api saha-cāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi gacchati pūrṇa-indau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalaṅko 'sya na gacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.257'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi vadato valgu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātasaṃmadamānasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñātavatī tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamanaṃ kundamālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.257'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi vadato valgu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāta-saṃmada-mānasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anujñātavatī tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamanaṃ kundamālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.258'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvantipurīṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñaguptam uvāca sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iha bhadravaṭe bhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinayasva pathiśramam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.258'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avanti-purīṃ gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yajñaguptam uvāca sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iha bhadravaṭe bhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinayasva pathi-śramam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.259'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgacchāmi nidhiṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nihitaṃ kenacit kvacit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvat tāvat tvayotkaṇṭhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kāryā mām apaśyatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.259'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āgacchāmi nidhiṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nihitaṃ kena-cit kva-cit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāvat tāvat tvaya ūtkaṇṭhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kāryā mām a-paśyatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.260'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ujjayanyāṃ nidhānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durlabhāni yatas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśaṅke ciram ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paribhrāntam itas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.260'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ujjayanyāṃ nidhānāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dur-labhāni yatas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśaṅke ciram ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paribhrāntam itas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.261'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyuṣmantaḥ prajāvanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>apitṛvanto 'pi vā samāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy aujjayanakāḥ paurāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthirān nidadhate nidhīn ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.261'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āyuṣmantaḥ prajāvanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-pitṛvanto 'pi vā samāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy aujjayanakāḥ paurāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthirān nidadhate nidhīn ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.262'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi tam uktvāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā siprāsarittaṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muktvā kāpālikākalpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>amalām akarot tanum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.262'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi tam uktva āsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatvā siprā-sarit-taṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muktvā kāpālika-ākalpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-malām akarot tanum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.263'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kundaśubhraparīdhānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkhasphaṭikamaṇḍanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaraddyaur iva sābhāsīj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jyotsnātārākulākulā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.263'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kunda-śubhra-parīdhānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkha-sphaṭika-maṇḍanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śarad-dyaur iva sa ābhāsīj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jyotsnā-tārā-kula-ākulā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.264'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhinnavarṇāṃ ca bhindantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>stanābhyāṃ kaṇṭhakaṇṭhikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jālaśikyasthitālābūḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā pratasthe sapiṇḍikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.264'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhinna-varṇāṃ ca bhindantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>stanābhyāṃ kaṇṭha-kaṇṭhikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāla-śikya-sthita-alābūḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā pratasthe sa-piṇḍikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.265'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kāpālikā mattāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pibanto baddhamaṇḍalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāharanti sma tām uccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuñcitāṅgulipāṇayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.265'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kāpālikā- mattāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pibanto baddha-maṇḍalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāharanti sma tām uccaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuñcita-aṅguli-pāṇayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.266'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ehy ehi taralāpāṅgi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yas te kāpālikaḥ priyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena sārdhaṃ yathāśraddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānam āsevyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.266'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ehy ehi tarala-apāṅgi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yas te kāpālikaḥ priyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena sārdhaṃ yathā-śraddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pānam āsevyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.267'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tatrāpi sā tebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛtyā pratibhāvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tān atidrutayā gatyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jagāma ca jagāda ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.267'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tatra api sā tebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛtyā pratibhāvatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tān ati-drutayā gatyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jagāma ca jagāda ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.268'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyantīṃ ca ramaṇīyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>spṛśyamānāṃ ca bhīṣaṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ bhagavatāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māṃ dṛṣṭiviṣakanyakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.268'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paśyantīṃ ca ramaṇīyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>spṛśyamānāṃ ca bhīṣaṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ bhagavatāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māṃ dṛṣṭi-viṣa-kanyakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.269'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patir mama hi gandharvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krūratājitarākṣasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>īrṣyāvān apramattaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadā rakṣati mām asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.269'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patir mama hi gandharvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krūratā-jita-rākṣasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>īrṣyāvān a-pramattaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadā rakṣati mām asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.270'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena mām abhiyuñjānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kandarpaśaratāḍitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yameneva kṣayaṃ nītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>koṭir yuṣmādṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.270'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena mām abhiyuñjānā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kandarpa-śara-tāḍitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yamena iva kṣayaṃ nītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>koṭir yuṣmā-dṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.271'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kāpālikair uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktaṃ yad anayā śriyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan na kevalam etasyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhikaṃ copapadyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.271'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kāpālikair uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktaṃ yad anayā śriyā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tan na kevalam etasyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adhikaṃ ca upapadyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.272'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>trailokye 'nidratāhetor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asyāḥ kāntākṛteḥ kṛte</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āścaryaṃ yan na yudhyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.272'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>trailokye '-nidratā-hetor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asyāḥ kānta-ākṛteḥ kṛte</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āścaryaṃ yan na yudhyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brahma-viṣṇu-maheśvarāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.273'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād gandharvam anyaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṃcit trailokyasundaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anugṛhṇātu sasnehair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iyam ālokitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.273'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād gandharvam anyaṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṃ-cit trailokya-sundaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anugṛhṇātu sa-snehair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iyam ālokitair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.274'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sā parikarṣantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sapāṣaṇḍigaṇā purīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśīḥkalakalonnītam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchad bhavanaṃ pituḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.274'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sā parikarṣantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-pāṣaṇḍi-gaṇā purīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśīḥ-kalakala-unnītam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchad bhavanaṃ pituḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.275'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hṛṣṭārthe vargasaṃbādhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saptakakṣaṃ praviśya tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātur vāsagṛhadvāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhikṣāṃ dehīti cābravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.275'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hṛṣṭa-arthe varga-saṃbādhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sapta-kakṣaṃ praviśya tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātur vāsa-gṛha-dvāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhikṣāṃ dehi iti ca abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.276'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhād gṛhītabhikṣā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niryāya paricārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśiraścaraṇāṅguṣṭham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyat kundamālikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.276'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhād gṛhīta-bhikṣā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niryāya paricārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ā-śiraś-caraṇa-aṅguṣṭham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyat kundamālikām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.277'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cirāc ca pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghnatī sahṛdayaṃ śiraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśya kathayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāminyai śanakair asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.277'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cirāc ca pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghnatī sa-hṛdayaṃ śiraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praviśya kathayām āsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svāminyai śanakair asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.278'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utsannāsi vinaṣṭāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasyās te dharaṇīdhṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śirīṣāmālikālolā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duhitā kundamālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.278'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utsanna āsi vinaṣṭa āsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yasyās te dharaṇī-dhṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śirīṣā-mālikā-lolā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duhitā kundamālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.279'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā hi kāpālikākalpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalaṅkāṃ dadhatī tanum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ tiṣṭhati te dvāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayaṃ vā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.279'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā hi kāpālika-ākalpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalaṅkāṃ dadhatī tanum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ tiṣṭhati te dvāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayaṃ vā dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.280'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam ākarṇya niṣkrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāvidhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vācyatām anapekṣyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snehād etac cacāra sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.280'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam ākarṇya niṣkrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā-vidhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vācyatām an-apekṣya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>snehād etac cacāra sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.281'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bibheda lavaśaḥ picchaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapālaṃ ca kapālaśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciccheda guḍikāṃ śaśvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaṅkhasphatikamaṇḍanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.281'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bibheda lavaśaḥ picchaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapālaṃ ca kapālaśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciccheda guḍikāṃ śaśvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaṅkha-sphatika-maṇḍanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.282'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāṭayitvā ca tāṃ tasyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tantuśaḥ kaṇṭhakaṇṭhikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṅgalasnānaśuddhāntāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddhāntam anayat tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.282'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāṭayitvā ca tāṃ tasyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tantuśaḥ kaṇṭha-kaṇṭhikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maṅgala-snāna-śuddha-antāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuddha-antam anayat tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.283'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrainām abravīn mātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātarviśrabdham ucyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad evam eveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā tatas tām abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.283'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra enām abravīn mātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātar-viśrabdham ucyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad evam eva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā tatas tām abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.284'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akasmād bhrāntir ambāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ tava sutā satī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asatībhir api kṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caret kāpālikavratam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.284'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-kasmād bhrāntir ambāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ tava sutā satī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-satībhir api kṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caret kāpālika-vratam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.285'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āstāṃ tāvat kathā ceyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tātapādān ihāhvaya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asti me guru kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhyate tac ca tair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.285'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āstāṃ tāvat kathā ca iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāta-pādān ihā ahvaya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asti me guru kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhyate tac ca tair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.286'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sāgaradattas tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālokya vyāhṛtāgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ kim etat kathaṃ ceti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaśaṅke viṣasāda ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.286'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha sāgaradattas tām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālokya vyāhṛta-āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ kim etat kathaṃ ca iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaśaṅke viṣasāda ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.287'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>atrastā kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśvāsayitum āliṅgya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vavande vijahāsa ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.287'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tathā-bhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-trastā kundamālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśvāsayitum āliṅgya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vavande vijahāsa ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.288'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc cainam āśvastam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āste bhadravaṭāśrame</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāmātā tava sa syālais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād ānāyyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.288'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abravīc ca enam āśvastam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āste bhadravaṭa-āśrame</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jāmātā tava sa syālais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād ānāyyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.289'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadādiṣṭaiś ca saṃrabdhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītaḥ syālakair asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>labdho 'si putracaureti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛṣā paruṣabhāṣibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.289'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad-ādiṣṭaiś ca saṃrabdhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhītaḥ syālakair asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>labdho 'si putra-caura iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛṣā paruṣa-bhāṣibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.290'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tiṣṭhasi śaṭhottiṣṭha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratiṣṭha svapuraṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvām āhūyati rājeti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sasmitāś cainam abruvan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.290'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tiṣṭhasi śaṭha uttiṣṭha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratiṣṭha sva-puraṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvām āhūyati rāja iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-smitāś ca enam abruvan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>
