<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.291'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tān pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāvya vadhabandhane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mānastokam ṛcaṃ japtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śikhābandhaṃ cakāra saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.291'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tān pratyabhijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāvya vadha-bandhane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mānastokam ṛcaṃ japtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śikhā-bandhaṃ cakāra saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.292'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sasāntvaṃ cābravīd aṅga</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam etad udīkṣyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mama kāpāliko mitraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvad āyāty asāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.292'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-sāntvaṃ ca abravīd aṅga</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam etad udīkṣyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mama kāpāliko mitraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāvad āyāty asāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.293'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tais tāraṃ vihasyoktas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaṃ yan mitram udīkṣase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa gataḥ prathamaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tenaiva grāhito bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.293'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tais tāraṃ vihasya uktas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaṃ yan mitram udīkṣase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa gataḥ prathamaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena eva grāhito bhavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.294'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niṣprayojanasauhārdā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacaḥsadṛ/acetasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdo 'pi virajyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khalānāṃ tvādṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.294'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niṣprayojana-sauhārdā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacaḥ-sadṛ/a-cetasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suhṛdo 'pi virajyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khalānāṃ tvā-dṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.295'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ prahṛṣṭās te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūkaṃ bahupaṭusvanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītvā gṛham ājagmuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītabandhujanāvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.295'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ prahṛṣṭās te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mūkaṃ bahu-paṭu-svanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhītvā gṛham ājagmuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prīta-bandhu-jana-āvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.296'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītikaṇṭakitatvacā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṣvaktasya jāmātuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saprāṇam abhavad vapuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.296'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra sāgaradattena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prīti-kaṇṭakita-tvacā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pariṣvaktasya jāmātuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-prāṇam abhavad vapuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.297'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtārghādisaparyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa nivartitabhojanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhyaśeta mahāśayyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramyamaṇḍapasaṃstṛtām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.297'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛta-argha-ādi-saparyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa nivartita-bhojanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhyaśeta mahā-śayyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramya-maṇḍapa-saṃstṛtām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.298'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāsya śvaśurau syālāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>syālabhāryāś ca sātmajāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āptāś ca śreṣṭhinaḥ paurāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paritaḥ samupāviśan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.298'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra asya śvaśurau syālāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>syāla-bhāryāś ca sa-ātma-jāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āptāś ca śreṣṭhinaḥ paurāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paritaḥ samupāviśan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.299'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāthāgacchad vaṇikkanyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhurābharaṇakvaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vācālakalahaṃseva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣkalaṅkāmbarā śarat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.299'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa āthā agacchad vaṇik-kanyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhura-ābharaṇa-kvaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vācāla-kala-haṃsa īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣkalaṅka-ambarā śarat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.300'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guravaḥ satkṛtā mūrdhnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācā savayasas tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptaḥ punar dṛṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarāgāñjanagarbhayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.300'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>guravaḥ sat-kṛtā mūrdhnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācā sa-vayasas tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yajñaguptaḥ punar dṛṣṭyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-rāga-añjana-garbhayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.301'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhyāsya ca puraḥ pitror</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau vāmanam āsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivāhādiyathāvṛttam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātmavṛttaṃ nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.301'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhyāsya ca puraḥ pitror</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau vāmanam āsanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivāha-ādi-yathā-vṛttam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ātma-vṛttaṃ nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.302'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca yajñaguptasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhig dhiṅ me viphalāḥ kalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvyaṅgulaprajñayā yo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ vañcitaḥ kulakanyayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.302'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca yajñaguptasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhig dhiṅ me vi-phalāḥ kalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvy-aṅgula-prajñayā yo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ahaṃ vañcitaḥ kula-kanyayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.303'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā dvyaṅgulaprajñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣā eva mādṛśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuśāgrīyadhiyo yoṣā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāsāṃ karmesam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.303'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā dvy-aṅgula-prajñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣā- eva mā-dṛśāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuśa-agrīya-dhiyo yoṣā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāsāṃ karma isam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.304'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim ataḥ paramāścaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yan nāgarikayānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭhatāṃ gatisaṃsthāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaro 'pi parivartitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.304'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim ataḥ parama-āścaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yan nāgarikaya ānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiṣṭhatāṃ gati-saṃsthāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaro 'pi parivartitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.305'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>virāṭanagare pārthaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ mūḍhātmabhiḥ sthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti ye vicikitseyus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣām eṣā nidarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.305'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>virāṭa-nagare pārthaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ mūḍha-ātmabhiḥ sthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti ye vicikitseyus</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣām eṣā nidarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.306'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā guruvākyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yan mayā caritaṃ mahat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād asmy anayaivādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mocitaḥ pātakād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.306'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā guru-vākyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yan mayā caritaṃ mahat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmād asmy anaya aiva adya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mocitaḥ pātakād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.307'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vṛttāntaṃ caitad ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prahṛṣṭena mahībhṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahajāmātṛkānītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svagṛhaṃ kundamālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.307'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vṛtta-antaṃ ca etad ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prahṛṣṭena mahī-bhṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha-jāmātṛkā ānītā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-gṛhaṃ kundamālikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.308'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin bahumahāgrāmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dānaṃ bahusuvarṇakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa dattvā yajñaguptāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sasmitas tām abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.308'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmin bahu-mahā-grāmaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dānaṃ bahu-suvarṇakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa dattvā yajñaguptāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-smitas tām abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.309'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā dvijātikarmabhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na hīyate patis tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayā dhīratayā putri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.309'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā dvi-jāti-karmabhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na hīyate patis tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayā dhīratayā putri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.310'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayātidhairyāṅkuśavāriterṣyayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijātikanyāṃ pariṇāyitaḥ patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi kṣitīśān avilaṅghyaśāsanān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vilaṅghayanti priyajīvitaśriyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.310'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya āti-dhairya-aṅkuśa-vārita-īrṣyayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvi-jāti-kanyāṃ pariṇāyitaḥ patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi kṣiti-īśān a-vilaṅghya-śāsanān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vilaṅghayanti priya-jīvita-śriyaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.311'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvijātikanyāṃ ratiputrakāmyayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhāya śuddhāya ca kundamālikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣevamānaḥ sukṛtaṃ ca saṃtataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nināya vipraḥ saphalaṃ samāśatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.311'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvi-jāti-kanyāṃ rati-putra-kāmyayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhāya śuddhāya ca kundamālikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niṣevamānaḥ su-kṛtaṃ ca saṃtataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nināya vipraḥ sa-phalaṃ samā-śatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_22.312'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paugaṇḍāya vitīrṇayāpi vidhinā yasmād vaṇikkanyayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citropāyaparaṃparācaturayā prāptaḥ patir vāñchitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtoṣakṣatasattvasattvadayitaḥ saṃsevitaḥ kātarais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāt pauruṣamārutena balinā daivādrir unmūlitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_22.312'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paugaṇḍāya vitīrṇaya āpi vidhinā yasmād vaṇik-kanyayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citra-upāya-paraṃparā-caturayā prāptaḥ patir vāñchitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃtoṣa-kṣata-sattva-sattva-dayitaḥ saṃsevitaḥ kātarais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāt pauruṣa-mārutena balinā daiva-adrir unmūlitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity ākhyāya kathitau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mithaḥ pravrajitau gatau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>drutapravahaṇārūḍho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaś ca parāgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity ākhyāya kathitau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mithaḥ pravrajitau gatau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>druta-pravahaṇa-ārūḍho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaś ca parāgataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mām avocat sa vanditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītidāsaḥ punarvasuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvanāgarakaśreṇi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāmaṇīr dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mām avocat sa vanditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prīti-dāsaḥ punarvasuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-nāgaraka-śreṇi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāma-ṇīr dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha praṇatam adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anulbaṇavibhūṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuvānam api vainītyāl</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjitasthaviraṃ naram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha praṇatam adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-ulbaṇa-vibhūṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuvānam api vainītyāl</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjita-sthaviraṃ naram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhākhyātamāhātmyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ cāliṅgitavān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhāvitaguṇāḥ sadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arhanty eva ca satkriyām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukha-ākhyāta-māhātmyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ cā aliṅgitavān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhāvita-guṇāḥ sadbhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arhanty eva ca sat-kriyām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha yānaṃ samāruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat punarvasuvāhakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāṃyātrika ivāmbhodhiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadāvāsam avātaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha yānaṃ samāruhya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat punarvasu-vāhakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāṃyātrika iva ambhodhiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad-āvāsam avātaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sevitāhāraparyanta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarīrasthitisādhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dinaśeṣaṃ nayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gītiśrutivinodanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sevita-āhāra-paryanta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarīra-sthiti-sādhanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dina-śeṣaṃ nayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gīti-śruti-vinodanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ suptajane kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭavān asmi gomukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>katham eṣa tvayā prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suhṛd ity atha so 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ supta-jane kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭavān asmi gomukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>katham eṣa tvayā prāptaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>suhṛd ity atha so 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatām asty ahaṃ yuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vanditvā punar āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca kaṃcana paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yogyam āśrayadāyinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatām asty ahaṃ yuṣmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vanditvā punar āgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca kaṃ-cana paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yogyam āśraya-dāyinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cintitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhanavidyādidāyinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhavaḥ sarvasādhūnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsti rājakulād ṛte ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś cintitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhana-vidyā-ādi-dāyinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃbhavaḥ sarva-sādhūnāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na asti rāja-kulād ṛte ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yogakṣemaprayuktā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaḥ sajjanasaṃsadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājadvāraṃ vigāhante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samudram iva sindhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yoga-kṣema-prayuktā- hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaḥ saj-jana-saṃsadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-dvāraṃ vigāhante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samudram iva sindhavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājadvāraṃ tato gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāciṣye kaṃcid āśrayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājadvāraṃ hi kāryāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvāram uktaṃ budhair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāja-dvāraṃ tato gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāciṣye kaṃ-cid āśrayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-dvāraṃ hi kāryāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvāram uktaṃ budhair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nigrahānugrahaprāpta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lokakolāhalākulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad gatvā smṛtavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pretādhipadhanādhipau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nigraha-anugraha-prāpta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>loka-kolāhala-ākulam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad gatvā smṛtavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>preta-adhipa-dhana-adhipau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāmanuṣyacaritaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣo 'yaṃ vibhāvyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśrayaprārthanā tasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsmin saṃpadyate mṛṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahā-manuṣya-caritaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣo 'yaṃ vibhāvyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āśraya-prārthanā tasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na asmin saṃpadyate mṛṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayam anyaḥ suveṣo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kīnāśavirasākṛtiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena saṃbhāvyate nāsmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prārthanāphalam aṇv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayam anyaḥ su-veṣo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kīnāśa-virasa-ākṛtiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena saṃbhāvyate na asmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prārthanā-phalam aṇv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puruṣaṃ puruṣaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciram itthaṃ vicārayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyantarāt pratīhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭavān asmi nirgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>puruṣaṃ puruṣaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciram itthaṃ vicārayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhyantarāt pratīhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭavān asmi nirgatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svastikāranamaskāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyotkārān sa ca kāryiṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratimānitavān sarvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakṛn namitamastakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sv-asti-kāra-namas-kāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyotkārān sa ca kāryiṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratimānitavān sarvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakṛn namita-mastakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vijñāpanāmātraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyadbhiḥ kāryasādhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāryibhir yugapat tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāryavijñāpanā kṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vijñāpanā-mātraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paśyadbhiḥ kārya-sādhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāryibhir yugapat tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kārya-vijñāpanā kṛtā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tebhyas tenāpi sāmānyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekam evottaraṃ kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavataḥ sumukho rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā tvariṣṭa bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tebhyas tena api sāmānyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekam eva uttaraṃ kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavataḥ su-mukho rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā tvariṣṭa bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa pratīhāraveṣaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vārabāṇādim aṅgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avatārya samīpasthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyastavān paricārake ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa pratīhāra-veṣaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāra-bāṇa-ādim aṅgataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avatārya samīpa-sthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyastavān paricārake ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā samāptaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samāśrayagaveṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi dṛṣṭasuvarṇādriḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmraṃ dhamati vātikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā samāpta aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samāśraya-gaveṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi dṛṣṭa-suvarṇa-adriḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāmraṃ dhamati vātikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svastikṛtvā tatas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svagṛhān pratigacchate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māṃ muhuḥ paśyatā prītyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tenaiva sahito 'gamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svasti-kṛtvā tatas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-gṛhān pratigacchate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māṃ muhuḥ paśyatā prītyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena eva sahito 'gamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhe ca kṛtasatkāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau mām anuyuktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchati kutaḥ kiṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mad icchati bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhe ca kṛta-satkāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau mām anuyuktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgacchati kutaḥ kiṃ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mad icchati bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ bhrātarāv āvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijau dvāv āgamārthinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyāsthānam idaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avantideśāt samāgatau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ bhrātarāv āvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijau dvāv āgama-arthinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-sthānam idaṃ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avanti-deśāt samāgatau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iha vāsitum icchāvo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmatkṛtaparigrahau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balavattaragupto hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛśo 'pi balavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iha vāsitum icchāvo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmat-kṛta-parigrahau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balavattara-gupto hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛśo 'pi balavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ tvādṛśām etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇagrahaṇakāṅkṣiṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agrāmyālāparūpāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svagṛhaṃ bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ tvā-dṛśām etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇa-grahaṇa-kāṅkṣiṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-grāmya-ālāpa-rūpāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-gṛhaṃ bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muhūrtaṃ tatra cāsīnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutavān aham utthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣubhitāmbhodhikallola</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kolāhalam iva kṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muhūrtaṃ tatra cā asīnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutavān aham utthitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣubhita-ambhodhi-kallola</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kolāhalam iva kṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ tadākarṇanotkarṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau sasmitam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tvam etan na vettheti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na vedeti mayoditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ tad-ākarṇana-utkarṇam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau sa-smitam uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tvam etan na vettha iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na veda iti maya ūditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ punarvasur nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dātā vāṇijadārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛtaḥ kitavasaṃghena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīvyati dyūtamaṇḍape ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ punarvasur nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dātā vāṇija-dārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛtaḥ kitava-saṃghena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīvyati dyūta-maṇḍape ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā vijayate dyūte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa sarvaṃ draviṇaṃ tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vitaraty arthivargāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasyaiṣa tumulo dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā vijayate dyūte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa sarvaṃ draviṇaṃ tadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vitaraty arthi-vargāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya eṣa tumulo dhvaniḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jīyamāne punas tasmiñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānumūrdhasthamastakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣādamuṣitālāpā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhyāyanti śivam arthinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jīyamāne punas tasmiñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānu-mūrdha-stha-mastakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viṣāda-muṣita-ālāpā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhyāyanti śivam arthinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi kautūhalaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato 'sau dṛśyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratīhāreṇa kathite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataś cintitavān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi kautūhalaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tato 'sau dṛśyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratīhāreṇa kathite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tataś cintitavān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nītividyāvayovṛddhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amātyaiḥ kiṃ prayojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yeṣāṃ yantritavākkāyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agrato duḥkham āsyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nīti-vidyā-vayo-vṛddhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amātyaiḥ kiṃ prayojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yeṣāṃ yantrita-vāk-kāyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agrato duḥkham āsyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ samānavayaḥśīlo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktahastaḥ sakiṃcana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyasanī ca svatantraś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'smākam adhunā suhṛt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ sa-māna-vayaḥ-śīlo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukta-hastaḥ sa-kiṃ-cana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyasanī ca sva-tantraś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'smākam adhunā suhṛt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād dyūtasabhām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāmi draṣṭuṃ punarvasum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirdhāryeti tam āmantrya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dyūtakārasabhām agām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād dyūta-sabhām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāmi draṣṭuṃ punarvasum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirdhārya iti tam āmantrya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dyūta-kāra-sabhām agām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sākīrṇā devanavyagraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sabhā kitavacandrakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarasīvāmiṣāsvāda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛddhair bakakadambakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā ākīrṇā devana-vyagraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sabhā kitava-candrakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarasi ivā amiṣa-āsvāda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛddhair baka-kadambakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrānyatamayor akṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīvyator akṣadhūrtayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṣaḥ koṇena patitaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdigdhapadapañcakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra anyatamayor akṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dīvyator akṣa-dhūrtayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṣaḥ koṇena patitaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdigdha-pada-pañcakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañcako 'yaṃ padaṃ nedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padam etan na pañcakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti jātā tayoḥ spardhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parasparajayaiṣiṇoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañcako 'yaṃ padaṃ na idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padam etan na pañcakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti jātā tayoḥ spardhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paras-para-jaya-eṣiṇoḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayor ekatareṇoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhyasthaḥ pṛcchyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyuktam itareṇāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathecchasi tathāstv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayor ekatareṇa uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhya-sthaḥ pṛcchyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratyuktam itareṇa api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatha īcchasi tatha āstv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athaikaḥ puruṣaḥ prāṃśuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭas tābhyām anāgaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>katarat paśyasi spaṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padapañcakayor iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ekaḥ puruṣaḥ prāṃśuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭas tābhyām a-nāgaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>katarat paśyasi spaṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pada-pañcakayor iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra cānyatamenoccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktam utkṣiptapāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrghatvād eṣa nirbuddhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ato 'nyaḥ pṛcchyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ca anyatamena uccair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktam utkṣipta-pāṇinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrghatvād eṣa nir-buddhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ato 'nyaḥ pṛcchyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pṛṣṭo 'paro hrasvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'pi tena nivāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nedṛśāḥ praśnam arhanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahudoṣā hi khaṭvakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pṛṣṭo 'paro hrasvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'pi tena nivāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nā idṛśāḥ praśnam arhanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahu-doṣā- hi khaṭvakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ dṛṣṭavantau tau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭavantau ca sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādho yadi na doṣo 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato nau chinddhi saṃśayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ dṛṣṭavantau tau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭavantau ca sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādho yadi na doṣo 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tato nau chinddhi saṃśayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ na dīrgho na ca hrasvas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmāt prājño na duṣṭadhīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena madhyapramāṇatvād gaccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhyasthatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ na dīrgho na ca hrasvas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasmāt prājño na duṣṭa-dhīḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena madhya-pramāṇatvād gaccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhya-sthatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā kaṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khalasaṃdigdhanirṇayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāradraviṇagṛddheṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kitaveṣu viśeṣataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā kaṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khala-saṃdigdha-nirṇayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāra-draviṇa-gṛddheṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kitaveṣu viśeṣataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avaśyaṃ tu kalājñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khyāpanīyaṃ kalāvidā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aprakāśaṃ hi vijñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛpaṇārthanirarthakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avaśyaṃ tu kalā-jñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khyāpanīyaṃ kalā-vidā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-prakāśaṃ hi vijñānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛpaṇa-artha-nir-arthakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca dyūtakalānyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kitavebhyaḥ prakāśyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi prayuñjate prājñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veśād anyatra vaiśikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca dyūta-kala ānyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kitavebhyaḥ prakāśyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi prayuñjate prājñāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>veśād anyatra vaiśikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dyūte jeṣyati yaś cātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa me mitraṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanavanmitralābhaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidhilābhādikaṃ viduḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dyūte jeṣyati yaś ca atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa me mitraṃ bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanavan-mitra-lābhaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidhi-lābha-ādikaṃ viduḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi bahu niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puras teṣāṃ savistaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṣāṣṭāpadaśārīṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākhyaṃ bhūmeś ca lakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi bahu niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puras teṣāṃ sa-vistaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṣa-aṣṭā-pada-śārīṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākhyaṃ bhūmeś ca lakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃdigdhapātasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāhaṃ koṇapātinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>supiṣṭamiṣṭakākṣodam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>akṣasyopari dattavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃdigdha-pātasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya ahaṃ koṇa-pātinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-piṣṭam-iṣṭakā-kṣodam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>akṣasya upari dattavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsāv iṣṭakākṣodaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padasyopari yo 'patat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'patat sakalo bhūmau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcakasyopari sthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asāv iṣṭakā-kṣodaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padasya upari yo 'patat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>so 'patat sakalo bhūmau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcakasya upari sthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tān uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo bhāgaḥ pañcakāṅkitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyottānatvam utkṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣodas tatra yataḥ sthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tān uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo bhāgaḥ pañcaka-aṅkitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya uttānatvam utkṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣodas tatra yataḥ sthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvan mama vijñānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity uktvāvasthite mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho sādhv iti nirghoṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samantāt sahasotthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etāvan mama vijñānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity uktva āvasthite mayi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho sādhv iti nirghoṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samantāt sahasa ūtthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tatroditaṃ kaiścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayam akṣaviśāradau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhruvaṃ vijayate dūrān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nalakuntīsutāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tatra uditaṃ kaiś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayam akṣa-viśāradau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhruvaṃ vijayate dūrān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nala-kuntī-sutāv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te 'paraiḥ kupitair uktā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jitau nalayudhiṣṭhirau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ jayati jetārāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>api puṣakarasaubalau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>te 'paraiḥ kupitair uktā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jitau nala-yudhiṣṭhirau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayaṃ jayati jetārāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>api puṣakara-saubalau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti praśasyamānaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tiryag dṛṣṭvā samatsaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padavādī jito yo 'sāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau mantharam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti praśasyamānaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tiryag dṛṣṭvā samatsaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pada-vādī jito yo 'sāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau mantharam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yeṣāṃ dyūtapaṇābhāvas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te kim artham ihāsate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dyūtasthāne hi kiṃ kṛtyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravīṇaiḥ prāśnikair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yeṣāṃ dyūta-paṇa-a-bhāvas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te kim artham ihā asate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dyūta-sthāne hi kiṃ kṛtyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravīṇaiḥ prāśnikair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kasmān māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaulaṭeyaḥ kṣipaty ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo 'haṃ trailokyasāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṇena paṇavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama kasmān māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaulaṭeyaḥ kṣipaty ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo 'haṃ trailokya-sāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṇena paṇavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nikṣipya sakrodhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yauṣmākaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ bhuvi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ehi dīvyāva mitreti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam ahaṃ dhūrtam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nikṣipya sa-krodhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yauṣmākaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ bhuvi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ehi dīvyāva mitra iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tam ahaṃ dhūrtam uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca dhūrtair alaṃkāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasarpadbahalaprabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭas tṛṣṇāviśālākṣaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pataṃgair iva pāvakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca dhūrtair alaṃ-kāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasarpad-bahala-prabhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭas tṛṣṇā-viśāla-akṣaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pataṃgair iva pāvakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsau krodhalobhābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akṣadhūrtaḥ pratāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā saha sasaṃrambham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>akṣān ārabdha devitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asau krodha-lobhābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akṣa-dhūrtaḥ pratāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayā saha sa-saṃrambham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>akṣān ārabdha devitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena cāhaṃ tribhiḥ pātair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anakṣakuśalaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabuddhair gardhagṛddhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasratritayaṃ jitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca ahaṃ tribhiḥ pātair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-akṣa-kuśalaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabuddhair gardha-gṛddhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasra-tritayaṃ jitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tat sakṛd unmocya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahasratritayaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lakṣam ekena pātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jitaḥ sa kitavādhamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tat sakṛd unmocya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahasra-tritayaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lakṣam ekena pātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jitaḥ sa kitava-adhamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijayāj jṛmbhitotsāhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkitaś ca parājayāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na virantuṃ na vā rantum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asāv aśakad ākulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijayāj jṛmbhita-utsāhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkitaś ca parājayāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na virantuṃ na vā rantum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asāv aśakad ākulaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīvya vā dehi vā lakṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saumyeti ca mayoditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vailakṣyād ghaṭṭayann akṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kiṃcit pratipannavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīvya vā dehi vā lakṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saumya iti ca maya ūditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vailakṣyād ghaṭṭayann akṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kiṃcit pratipannavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn antare bhṛtyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svam avocat punarvasuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kitavo 'yam idaṃ lakṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>acalaṃ dāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn antare bhṛtyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svam avocat punarvasuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kitavo 'yam idaṃ lakṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>acalaṃ dāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ cāyaṃ svaṃ gṛhaṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣād ṛjutanūruhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā pūjitavān devaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>haraṃ dattavaraṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ ca ayaṃ svaṃ gṛhaṃ nītvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harṣād ṛju-tanū-ruhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā pūjitavān devaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>haraṃ datta-varaṃ yathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ cāvocad dhanaṃ yat tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavadbhiḥ kitavārjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad udgrāhyedam ānītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lakṣaṃ te gṛhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māṃ ca avocad dhanaṃ yat tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavadbhiḥ kitava-arjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad udgrāhya idam ānītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lakṣaṃ te gṛhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayāpy uktam upānte yad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draviṇaṃ tvatparigrahāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhitaṃ bhavatā yac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya svāmī bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya āpy uktam upānte yad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draviṇaṃ tvat-parigrahāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sādhitaṃ bhavatā yac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya svāmī bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaṃ cānena yan nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhiḥ svayam arjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmino yūyam evāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanasyety atra kā kathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktaṃ ca anena yan nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhiḥ svayam arjitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāmino yūyam eva asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanasya ity atra kā kathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad apīdaṃ mayāvāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmatsvāmikam eva tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhigacchati yad dāso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartur eva hi tad dhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad api idaṃ maya āvāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmat-svāmikam eva tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhigacchati yad dāso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhartur eva hi tad dhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca pṛcchāmi tan mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasāde sati kathyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhūtalaṃ yūyam āyātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ nimittaṃ tripiṣṭapāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca pṛcchāmi tan mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasāde sati kathyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhū-talaṃ yūyam āyātāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ nimittaṃ tripiṣṭapāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manye saty api devatve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavadbhiḥ krīḍayāhṛtaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākārāntaranirmāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nātyantam anuśīlitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manye saty api devatve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavadbhiḥ krīḍayā āhṛtaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāra-antara-nirmāṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na-aty-antam anuśīlitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā ca varṇasaṃsthāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalāvijñānasaṃpadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭāḥ kena manuṣyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yādṛśo bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā ca varṇa-saṃsthāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalā-vijñāna-saṃpadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭāḥ kena manuṣyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yādṛśo bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yat satyam ity ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥkham āśitavān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūreṇa hy atinindāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhahetur atistutiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yat satyam ity ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥkham āśitavān aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūreṇa hy ati-nindāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkha-hetur ati-stutiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vārāṇasīpraveśeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratīhārāya pṛcchate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yan mayā kāryam ākhyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad evāsmai niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vārāṇasī-praveśeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratīhārāya pṛcchate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yan mayā kāryam ākhyātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad eva asmai niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānenoktam āścaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyeṣṭhasya jagatāṃ guṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvādṛśasyāpi yo jyeṣṭhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kīdṛśaḥ sa bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha anena uktam āścaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyeṣṭhasya jagatāṃ guṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvā-dṛśasya api yo jyeṣṭhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kī-dṛśaḥ sa bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ vānena vimardena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyeṣṭhas tiṣṭhati yatra saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvatīrthādhike deśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ prāpayata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ va ānena vimardena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyeṣṭhas tiṣṭhati yatra saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarva-tīrtha-adhike deśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taṃ prāpayata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athainam aham ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatavān bhavadantikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yac cottaram atas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyakṣaṃ bhavatām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha enam aham ādāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatavān bhavad-antikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yac ca uttaram atas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyakṣaṃ bhavatām api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti kṣipram ayaṃ labdho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā vaḥ paricārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hiṃsanti na sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śriyaḥ puṇyavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti kṣipram ayaṃ labdho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā vaḥ paricārakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hiṃsanti na sarvatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śriyaḥ puṇyavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipadas tena durlabhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalaṃ sucaritasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛdayaṃ yasya gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipadas tena dur-labhāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalaṃ su-caritasya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hṛdayaṃ yasya gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu saṃśrayamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīḍanīyaḥ punarvasuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parānnaṃ hi vṛthābhuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhāyaiva satām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu saṃśraya-mātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pīḍanīyaḥ punarvasuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>para-annaṃ hi vṛthā-bhuktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhāya eva satām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādibhir ālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ardham ardhaṃ ca nidrayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītavān asmi yāminyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prātaś cāgāt punarvasuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādibhir ālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ardham ardhaṃ ca nidrayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nītavān asmi yāminyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prātaś cā agāt punarvasuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca vanditamatpādam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocad iti gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ballavaḥ kuśalaḥ kaścit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kutaścana gaveṣyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca vandita-mat-pādam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocad iti gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ballavaḥ kuśalaḥ kaś-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kutaś-cana gaveṣyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvadanyasya gṛhe nānnam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aryajyeṣṭhena sevitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parapākanivṛttā hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhuvṛttā dvijātayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvad-anyasya gṛhe na annam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arya-jyeṣṭhena sevitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>para-pāka-nivṛttā- hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhu-vṛttā- dvi-jātayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādarārādhitaś cāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvadīyaṃ paribhuktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārādhanānurodho hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caritaṃ mahatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ādara-ārādhitaś ca ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvadīyaṃ paribhuktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārādhana-anurodho hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caritaṃ mahatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyākhyānavicittas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam āha sma punarvasuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yady evaṃ jagadīśānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ nāsti bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyākhyāna-vicittas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam āha sma punarvasuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yady evaṃ jagad-īśānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ na asti bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>acirāc ca tadānītau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāvyaguṇasaṃpadau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākārakṣiptanāsatyāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ puruṣau puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-cirāc ca tad-ānītau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāvya-guṇa-saṃpadau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākāra-kṣipta-nāsatyāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ puruṣau puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau ca māṃ ciram ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vadanaṃ ca parasparam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasārya sabhujān pādāñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jayety uktvā bhuvaṃ gatau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau ca māṃ ciram ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vadanaṃ ca paras-param</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasārya sa-bhujān pādāñ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jaya ity uktvā bhuvaṃ gatau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau cāhūya mayāyātau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>spṛṣṭapṛṣṭhau sabhājitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vanditvā punar abrūtāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brūta kiṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau cā ahūya mayā āyātau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>spṛṣṭa-pṛṣṭhau sabhājitau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vanditvā punar abrūtāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>brūta kiṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tau gomukhenoktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavantau kila ballavau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satyaṃ ced idam āryasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pākaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tau gomukhena uktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavantau kila ballavau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satyaṃ ced idam āryasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pākaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau ca prītau pratijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nikartya nakhamūrdhajān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snātau soṣṇīṣamūrdhānau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahānasam agacchatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau ca prītau pratijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nikartya nakha-mūrdha-jān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snātau sa-uṣṇīṣa-mūrdhānau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahānasam agacchatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā tiṣṭhati vyāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samāsaḥ śrūyatām ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvā tābhyām apūrveva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakriyā saṃprasāritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā tiṣṭhati vyāsaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samāsaḥ śrūyatām ayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvā tābhyām a-pūrva īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakriyā saṃprasāritā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvatyā cāparaḥ sthālīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhiśrayati ballavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvatyā velayā tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāka eva samāpitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yāvatyā ca aparaḥ sthālīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhiśrayati ballavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvatyā velayā tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāka eva samāpitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato nirvartitasnāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatānalatarpaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhārasthānam adhyāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viprapaṅktinirantaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato nirvartita-snāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatā-anala-tarpaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhāra-sthānam adhyāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipra-paṅkti-nir-antaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañca tittirayaḥ pakvāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catvāraḥ kukkuṭā iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhāro yaiḥ praśastas tair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśitaṃ prākṛtāśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pañca tittirayaḥ pakvāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catvāraḥ kukkuṭā- iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhāro yaiḥ praśastas tair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aśitaṃ prākṛta-aśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āhāraṃ yadi severan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakṛt tam amṛtāśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samutsṛṣṭāmṛtāhārā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaveyur nāmarās tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āhāraṃ yadi severan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakṛt tam amṛta-aśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samutsṛṣṭa-amṛta-āhārā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaveyur na amarās tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ samāpitāhāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇe gomukham abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sūdābhyāṃ bhuktabhaktābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayutaṃ dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ samāpita-āhāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karṇe gomukham abravam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sūdābhyāṃ bhukta-bhaktābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ayutaṃ dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa gatvā sahitas tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cirāc cāgatya kevalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smitasaṃsūcitaprītir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upākramata bhāṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa gatvā sahitas tābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cirāc cā agatya kevalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smita-saṃsūcita-prītir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upākramata bhāṣitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā yāv uditāv etau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na yūvām etad arhatha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avasthāsādṛśaṃ kiṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat kiṃcid gṛhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā yāv uditāv etau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na yūvām etad arhatha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avasthā-sādṛśaṃ kiṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat kiṃ-cid gṛhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayor ekatareṇātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartur dauḥsthityavartinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yuktaṃ dhanam ādātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āvābhyām iti bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayor ekatareṇa atha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartur dauḥsthitya-vartinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yuktaṃ dhanam ādātum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āvābhyām iti bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kruddhenetareṇokto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhik tvāṃ dīnatarāśayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jitatrailokyavitteśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitteśaṃ yo 'nukampase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kruddhena itareṇa ukto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhik tvāṃ dīnatara-aśayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jita-trailokya-vitta-īśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitta-īśaṃ yo 'nukampase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahāpadmasahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat prasādād vimāninām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>susthitāni bhaviṣyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dauḥsthityaṃ tasya kīdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahā-padma-sahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat prasādād vimāninām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>su-sthitāni bhaviṣyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dauḥsthityaṃ tasya kī-dṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prayacchaty ayutaṃ yaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pākasyaikasya niṣkrayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥsthitas tādṛśo yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>susthitas tasya kīdṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prayacchaty ayutaṃ yaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pākasya ekasya niṣkrayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥ-sthitas tādṛśo yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>su-sthitas tasya kī-dṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi bruvann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa mālyam iva tad dhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhārayitvā kṣaṇaṃ mūrdhnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthāya prāptavān gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi bruvann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa mālyam iva tad dhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhārayitvā kṣaṇaṃ mūrdhnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthāya prāptavān gṛham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athainaṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭukautūhalākulaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divyam aiśvaryam āgāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ veda bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha enaṃ pṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭu-kautūhala-ākulaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divyam aiśvaryam āgāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ veda bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tenoktam asyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śatayajñādhikaśrīkaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañcayajñaḥ pitābhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tena uktam asya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmadattasya bhū-pateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śata-yajña-adhika-śrīkaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pañca-yajñaḥ pita ābhavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cikitsāsūdaśāstrajñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śilpitve 'py aśaṭho 'bhavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvitīya iva tasyātmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devavān iti ballavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cikitsā-sūda-śāstra-jñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śilpitve 'py a-śaṭho 'bhavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvitīya iva tasyā atmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>devavān iti ballavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīram etad āyattaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mameti kṛtabuddhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājñā tasmai svarājyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daśamo 'ṃśaḥ prakalpitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīram etad āyattaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama iti kṛta-buddhinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājñā tasmai sva-rājyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daśamo 'ṃśaḥ prakalpitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nandopanandanāmānau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya sūdapateḥ sutau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>īdṛśākāravijñānāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āvām eva ca viddhi tau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nanda-upananda-nāmānau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasya sūda-pateḥ sutau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>īdṛśa-ākāra-vijñānāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āvām eva ca viddhi tau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālābhyām eva cāvābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūdaśāstracikitsite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahajñānaprayogābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kulavidyeti śikṣite ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bālābhyām eva cā avābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūda-śāstra-cikitsite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha-jñāna-prayogābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kula-vidya īti śikṣite ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā nau pitāvocat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putrakau śṛṇutaṃ hitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrotāraṃ guruvākyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na spṛśanti vipattayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā nau pita āvocat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>putrakau śṛṇutaṃ hitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrotāraṃ guru-vākyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na spṛśanti vipattayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padavākyapramāṇāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāvyāni vividhāni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavadbhyāṃ śikṣitavyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citrādiś ca kalāgaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pada-vākya-pramāṇāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāvyāni vividhāni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavadbhyāṃ śikṣitavyāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citra-ādiś ca kalā-gaṇaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācid ajitaṃ jetuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāto yātavyamaṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāstrakāvyakathālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinodaṃ prabhur icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cid a-jitaṃ jetuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāto yātavya-maṇḍalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāstra-kāvya-kathā-ālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinodaṃ prabhur icchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijñāya tu tadāsthānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asaṃnihitapaṇḍitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vinodaṃ tasya kuryātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāstrālāpādibhir yuvām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vijñāya tu tad-āsthānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-saṃnihita-paṇḍitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vinodaṃ tasya kuryātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śāstra-ālāpa-ādibhir yuvām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pragalbhāḥ pratibhāvanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahuvṛttāntapaṇḍitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakāśitamanovṛttair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtyāḥ krīḍanti bhartṛbhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pragalbhāḥ pratibhāvanto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahu-vṛtta-anta-paṇḍitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakāśita-mano-vṛttair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛtyāḥ krīḍanti bhartṛbhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekavidyaḥ punas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pragalbho 'pi tapasvikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svavidyālāpaparyāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>khinnaś ciram udīkṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eka-vidyaḥ punas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pragalbho 'pi tapasvikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-vidyā-ālāpa-paryāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>khinnaś ciram udīkṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhyastabahuvidyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirviparyāyamānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gatasaṃśayaduḥkhatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukhināṃ parameśvaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhyasta-bahu-vidyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nir-viparyāya-mānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gata-saṃśaya-duḥkhatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sukhināṃ parama-īśvaraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utsāhena ca śikṣethām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyuraiśvaryalakṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrghāyur vittavanto hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃsevyāḥ sevakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.118'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utsāhena ca śikṣethām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyur-aiśvarya-lakṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīrgha-āyur vittavanto hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃsevyāḥ sevakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca pitrājñayāśeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvābhyām anuśīlitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramyāsvādaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko 'vamanyeta bheṣajam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.119'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca pitr-ājñaya ā-śeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvābhyām anuśīlitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramya-āsvādaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ko 'vamanyeta bheṣajam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad vidyādharacakrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakravartī bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyaiṣṭhacandrasahasrāṃśu</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīrghāyuś ceti nau matiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.120'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad vidyā-dhara-cakrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakra-vartī bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyaiṣṭha-candra-sahasra-aṃśu</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīrgha-āyuś ca iti nau matiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena prasāritāṅgābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvābhyām eṣa vanditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi vandanasāmānyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arhanti bahuvanditāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.121'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena prasārita-aṅgābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvābhyām eṣa vanditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi vandana-sāmānyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arhanti bahu-vanditāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahavo hīha tiṣṭhanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇās tīrthakukkuṭāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiraḥspandanamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tān āvāṃ pūjayāvahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.122'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahavo hi iha tiṣṭhanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brāhmaṇās tīrtha-kukkuṭāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiraḥ-spandana-mātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tān āvāṃ pūjayāvahe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād yasmād asaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvatrāgamacakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
