<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭhasya dṛṣṭam aiśvaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ataḥ śraddhīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.123'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād yasmād a-saṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvatrā agama-cakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jyeṣṭhasya dṛṣṭam aiśvaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ataḥ śraddhīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_23.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prajñaptikauśikasutapramukhair uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nandasya niścitataraṃ vacanāt tad āsīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāvaṃ hi saṃśayatamaḥ paṭalāpinaddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udbhāvayanty avitathā vacanapradīpāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_23.124'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prajñapti-kauśika-suta-pramukhair uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nandasya niścitataraṃ vacanāt tad āsīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāvaṃ hi saṃśaya-tamaḥ paṭala-apinaddham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udbhāvayanty a-vitathā- vacana-pradīpāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nandopanandābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sevyamānaḥ svakarmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punarvasugṛhe stokān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divasān avasaṃ sukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nanda-upanandābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sevyamānaḥ sva-karmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punarvasu-gṛhe stokān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>divasān avasaṃ sukhī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācin mandirāgrasthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kurvann āśāvalokanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śramaṇāṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiṣyāsaṃghapuraḥsarīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cin mandira-agra-sthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kurvann āśā-avalokanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śramaṇāṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiṣyā-saṃgha-puraḥ-sarīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kavibhis tair anātmajñair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhir āyāsyate vṛthā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ye tasyā varṇasaṃsthāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varṇayanti hatatrapāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kavibhis tair an-ātma-jñair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhir āyāsyate vṛthā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ye tasyā- varṇa-saṃsthāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varṇayanti hata-trapāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā taṃ vidhātāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhig yat kiṃcanakāriṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yenākāraviruddho 'syām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācāro durbhagaḥ kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā taṃ vidhātāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhig yat kiṃ-cana-kāriṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yenā akāra-viruddho 'syām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ācāro dur-bhagaḥ kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvo hi viniyogārtham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arthaḥ sarveṇa sṛjyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghaṭayitvā ghaṭaḥ kena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>loṣṭena śakalīkṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvo hi viniyoga-artham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arthaḥ sarveṇa sṛjyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghaṭayitvā ghaṭaḥ kena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>loṣṭena śakalī-kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhātrā punar iyaṃ sṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>komaleva mṛṇālinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śoṣitā tuhineneti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhik tasya khalatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhātrā punar iyaṃ sṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>komala īva mṛṇālinī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śoṣitā tuhinena iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhik tasya khalatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāṃ ciram ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirnimiṣeṇa cakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhaḥ sphuritotsāhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛcchati sma punarvasum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāṃ ciram ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nir-nimiṣeṇa cakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhaḥ sphurita-utsāhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛcchati sma punarvasum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃkṛtapurīmārgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ūrugauravamantharaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣā pravrajitā bhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva gacchati gatair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃ-kṛta-purī-mārgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ūru-gaurava-mantharaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣā pravrajitā bhadra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kva gacchati gatair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktam ṛṣidatteyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārhataṃ dharmam āsthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vītarāgatayā siddhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atiśete jinān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktam ṛṣidatta īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārhataṃ dharmam āsthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīta-rāgatayā siddhān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atiśete jinān api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣā bālasakhīṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satataṃ rājadārikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyakāntaḥpurād eti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāti svaśayanāsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣā bāla-sakhīṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satataṃ rāja-dārikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyakā-antaḥ-purād eti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāti sva-śayana-āsanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi kathayitvāsāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣidattām avandata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambike sahaśiṣyāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te namo 'stu namo 'stv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi kathayitva āsāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣidattām avandata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ambike saha-śiṣyāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te namo 'stu namo 'stv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca pravrajitāvocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asaṃbhāṣyo bhavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim artham iti tenokte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tayoktam avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca pravrajita āvocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-saṃbhāṣyo bhavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim artham iti tena ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taya ūktam avadhīyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñānādhikṣiptasarvajñau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpavismāritasmarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvijau jyeṣṭhakaniṣṭhākhyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvadgṛhe kila tiṣṭhataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñāna-adhikṣipta-sarva-jñau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpa-vismārita-smarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvijau jyeṣṭha-kaniṣṭha-akhyau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvad-gṛhe kila tiṣṭhataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat saṃdarśanasaṃbhāṣā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>janitaṃ ca sukhaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draviṇaṃ kṛpaṇeneva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pracchannam upabhujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat saṃdarśana-saṃbhāṣā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>janitaṃ ca sukhaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>draviṇaṃ kṛpaṇena iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pracchannam upabhujyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suhṛtsādhāraṇaṃ yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhaṃ sa paramaṃ sukhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhasaṃvaraṇāyāsād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viparītas tu duḥkhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suhṛt-sādhāraṇaṃ yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhaṃ sa paramaṃ sukhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukha-saṃvaraṇa-āyāsād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viparītas tu duḥkhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suhṛdbhiḥ kupitais tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asaṃbhāṣyaḥ kṛto bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>teṣām atrānayopāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samarthaś cintyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suhṛdbhiḥ kupitais tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-saṃbhāṣyaḥ kṛto bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>teṣām atrā anaya-upāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samarthaś cintyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoccair gomukhenoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>acireṇa punarvasuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><note>The second half of the verse is missing</note> ||</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uccair gomukhena uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-cireṇa punarvasuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><note>The second half of the verse is missing</note> ||</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.18'>
<l><note>The first half of the verse is missing</note> |</l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sahanandopanandaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jināyatanamaṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.18'>
<lg>
<l><note>The first half of the verse is missing</note> |</l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saha-nanda-upanandaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jina-āyatana-maṇḍapam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arhatas tatra vanditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃghaṃ cīvaravāsasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛṣidattāṃ ca tad datte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣṭare samupāviśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arhatas tatra vanditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃghaṃ cīvara-vāsasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛṣidattāṃ ca tad datte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣṭare samupāviśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avalambitabāhus tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktakakṣaś ca gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitvā devakuladvāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jinastotram udāharat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avalambita-bāhus tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukta-kakṣaś ca gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitvā deva-kula-dvāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jina-stotram udāharat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>namo 'stu sarvasiddhebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhubhyaś ca namo 'stu vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛṣabhapramukhebhyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvajñebhyo namo 'stv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>namo 'stu sarva-siddhebhyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādhubhyaś ca namo 'stu vaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛṣabha-pramukhebhyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarva-jñebhyo namo 'stv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādhu śrāvaka dhanyo 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ sarvajñaṃ namasyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ityādi bahu nirgranthāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītyāstuvata gomukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādhu śrāvaka dhanyo 'si</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ sarva-jñaṃ namasyasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity-ādi bahu nirgranthāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītya āstuvata gomukham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāyam ṛṣidattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādau gāḍhaṃ nipīḍayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīt suprasannau me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantau bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ayam ṛṣidattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādau gāḍhaṃ nipīḍayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abravīt su-prasannau me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantau bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tv asya prayuktāśīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmākaṃ laghuśāsane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāvakasyāpi saṃvādyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratipattir bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tv asya prayukta-āśīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asmākaṃ laghu-śāsane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāvakasya api saṃvādyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratipattir bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athoktam upanandena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇāgoṣṭhī pravartyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣa saṃnihitaḥ saṃghaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakalaḥ suhṛdām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha uktam upanandena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇā-goṣṭhī pravartyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣa saṃnihitaḥ saṃghaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakalaḥ suhṛdām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyenoktam anāyāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravīṇe gaṅgarakṣite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asaṃnihitahaṃseva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nalinī nīravā sabhā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyena uktam an-āyāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravīṇe gaṅgarakṣite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-saṃnihita-haṃsa īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nalinī nīravā sabhā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān mahāpratīhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavanto gaṅgarakṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udīkṣantām iti tataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃprāpto gaṅgarakṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmān mahā-pratīhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavanto gaṅgarakṣitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>udīkṣantām iti tataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃprāpto gaṅgarakṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgarair uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āryajyeṣṭhasya vāsya vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyāta nipuṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kataro rūpavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgarair uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārya-jyeṣṭhasya va āsya vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyāta nipuṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kataro rūpavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama yat satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyam evāsmi rūpavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgarakṣitarūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpaṃ me sadṛśaṃ yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama yat satyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyam eva asmi rūpavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṅgarakṣita-rūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rūpaṃ me sa-dṛśaṃ yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadīyam etadīyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpeṇāpy upacaryate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upamānam upādeyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'pi rūpavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadīyam etadīyena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpeṇa apy upacaryate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upamānam upādeyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>so 'pi rūpavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vanditvā jinam agranthān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣidattāṃ ca māṃ ca saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāviśat punaś coktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upanandena pūrvavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vanditvā jinam a-granthān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣidattāṃ ca māṃ ca saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upāviśat punaś ca uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upanandena pūrvavat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pravrajitāha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṣṭhini priyadarśane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anāyāte sadaḥ sarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idam apriyadarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pravrajitā āha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṣṭhini priyadarśane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-āyāte sadaḥ sarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>idam a-priya-darśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ pratīkṣyatāṃ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam ity uditekṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam āyāta ity ākhyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgarāḥ priyadarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ataḥ pratīkṣyatāṃ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣaṇam ity udita-īkṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam āyāta ity ākhyan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāgarāḥ priyadarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama taṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naivāyaṃ priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣā puruṣaveṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūṣitā priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama taṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na eva ayaṃ priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣā puruṣa-veṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhūṣitā priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>straiṇībhir gatisaṃsthāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāṇībhir vyaktam etayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣiptatrailokyasaundaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākhyātaṃ straiṇam ātmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>straiṇībhir gati-saṃsthāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāṇībhir vyaktam etayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣipta-trailokya-saundaryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ākhyātaṃ straiṇam ātmanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu vanditadevādiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādaraṃ mām avandata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciraṃ sundari jīveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayāpi prativanditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā tu vandita-deva-ādiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-ādaraṃ mām avandata</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciraṃ sundari jīva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maya āpi prativanditā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ krodhāruṇākṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhenāham īkṣataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citraṃ nāgarakaiḥ kaiścil</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjitaiḥ kaiścid ambaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ krodha-aruṇa-akṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhena aham īkṣataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citraṃ nāgarakaiḥ kaiś-cil</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjitaiḥ kaiś-cid ambaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattā punaḥ sāsraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>savikāsacalekṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sagomukham apaśyan mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśiraścaraṇaṃ ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattā punaḥ sa-asraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-vikāsa-cala-īkṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-gomukham apaśyan mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ā-śiraś-caraṇaṃ ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prapañcam ākṣeptum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etaṃ sapadi gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhāṣata suhṛdvargaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>goṣṭhī prastūyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prapañcam ākṣeptum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etaṃ sapadi gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhāṣata suhṛd-vargaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>goṣṭhī prastūyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upanandas tataḥ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā vīṇām avādayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā vigatarāgād yair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirgranthair api mūrchitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upanandas tataḥ pūrvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā vīṇām avādayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā vigata-rāgād yair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirgranthair api mūrchitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upanandāt tato nandaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nandād api punarvasum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punarvasor agād vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kramāt taṃ gaṅgarakṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upanandāt tato nandaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nandād api punarvasum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punarvasor agād vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kramāt taṃ gaṅgarakṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upanandādikānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jitanāradaparvatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parājayata dūreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ paraḥ paraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upananda-ādikānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jita-nārada-parvatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parājayata dūreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ paraḥ paraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kramaprāptā tato vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhaṃ gaṅgarakṣitāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarasvatīva vittāḍhyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īśvarād durgataṃ gatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krama-prāptā tato vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhaṃ gaṅgarakṣitāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarasvati īva vitta-aḍhyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īśvarād dur-gataṃ gatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tu tato vīṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avādayata līlayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā nāgarikair dīnair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īkṣito gaṅgarakṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhas tu tato vīṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avādayata līlayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathā nāgarikair dīnair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>īkṣito gaṅgarakṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhāṅkāt tato vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāti sma priyadarśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kulaṭeva priyotsaṅgāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāminaṃ priyadarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukha-aṅkāt tato vīṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāti sma priyadarśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ku-laṭa īva priya-utsaṅgāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāminaṃ priyadarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pravādite tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pragīte cātimānuṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vailakṣyād gomukhasyāsīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhiprāyaḥ palāyitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pravādite tasmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pragīte ca ati-mānuṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vailakṣyād gomukhasyā asīd</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhiprāyaḥ palāyitum ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu nāradaśiṣyo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suto vā tumbaror iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat satyam aham apy āsam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adbhutaśrutivismitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu nārada-śiṣyo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suto vā tumbaror iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yat satyam aham apy āsam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>adbhuta-śruti-vismitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muktavīṇe tatas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śanair māṃ gomukho 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā prāptaparyāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vādanaṃ bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mukta-vīṇe tatas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śanair māṃ gomukho 'bravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā prāpta-paryāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vādanaṃ bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hasitvā tam athāvocam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adyāpi hi śiśur bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo māṃ yatra kvacit tucche</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravartayati vastuni ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hasitvā tam atha avocam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adya api hi śiśur bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo māṃ yatra kva-cit tucche</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravartayati vastuni ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nagnaśramaṇakānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kirāṭānāṃ ca saṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇāṃ vādayamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mādṛśaḥ kīdṛśaṃ phalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nagna-śramaṇakānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kirāṭānāṃ ca saṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇāṃ vādayamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā-dṛśaḥ kī-dṛśaṃ phalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvedam ukto 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anena kṛtamanyunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>campāyāṃ kīdṛśaṃ kāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhavad bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutva īdam ukto 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anena kṛta-manyunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>campāyāṃ kī-dṛśaṃ kāryam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhavad bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrūyatām yadi na śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptir gandharvadattāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra kāryam abhūd iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrūyatām yadi na śrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāptir gandharvadattāyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra kāryam abhūd iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāyam avadat tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devīprāptiḥ phalaṃ yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ihāpi gomukhaprāptiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phalam uttamam iṣyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ayam avadat tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devī-prāptiḥ phalaṃ yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iha api gomukha-prāptiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>phalam uttamam iṣyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmad anyo na māṃ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇayā jitavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ me śreṣṭham āgamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṣṭhināpahṛtaṃ yaśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmad anyo na māṃ kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vīṇayā jitavān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idaṃ me śreṣṭham āgamya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṣṭhina āpahṛtaṃ yaśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'yam asmadyaśaścauro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi nāśu nigṛhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyajāmy eṣa tataḥ prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhabhārāturān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'yam asmad-yaśaś-cauro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yadi na aśu nigṛhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyajāmy eṣa tataḥ prāṇān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkha-bhāra-āturān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd asaṃdigdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvam atropapadyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maraṇābhyadhikakleśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mānabhaṅgo hi māninām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd a-saṃdigdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvam atra upapadyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>maraṇa-abhyadhika-kleśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māna-bhaṅgo hi māninām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śāstrārthajñānamattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nigṛhītasya vādinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāntayā ca vimuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhaṃ kenopamīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śāstra-artha-jñāna-mattasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nigṛhītasya vādinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāntayā ca vimuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhaṃ kena upamīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād etad iha nyāyyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti niścitya sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyavasthāpayituṃ tantrīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārabhe durvyavasthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād etad iha nyāyyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti niścitya sādaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyavasthāpayituṃ tantrīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārabhe dur-vyavasthitāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pṛthulitair netraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pulakāliṅgitatvacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyonyasya niraikṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadanāni sadaḥsadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ pṛthulitair netraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pulaka-āliṅgita-tvacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyonyasya niraikṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadanāni sadaḥ-sadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tantrīṣu karaśākhāgraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parāmṛṣṭāsu te tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā hā kim idam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pustanyastā ivābhavan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tantrīṣu kara-śākhā-agraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parāmṛṣṭāsu te tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā hā kim idam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pusta-nyastā- iva abhavan ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athaitasyām avasthāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā vīṇā ca saṃhṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taiś ca muktāyatocchvāsair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīvaloko 'valokitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha etasyām avasthāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā vīṇā ca saṃhṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taiś ca mukta-āyata-ucchvāsair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jīva-loko 'valokitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>harṣāruṇaparāmṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikasadviśadaprabham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhrājata tataḥ sadyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhānanapaṅkajam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>harṣa-aruṇa-parāmṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vikasad-viśada-prabham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>abhrājata tataḥ sadyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukha-a-nana-paṅka-jam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jitagomukhadarpas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jito 'pi priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jitadurjayavādīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītimān mām abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jita-gomukha-darpas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jito 'pi priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jita-dur-jaya-vādi īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prītimān mām abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śreṣṭhī jyeṣṭhena vīṇāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jagadvijayinā jitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti me prasthitā kīrtir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āpayodhi vasuṃdharām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śreṣṭhī jyeṣṭhena vīṇāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jagad-vijayinā jitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti me prasthitā kīrtir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ā-payodhi vasuṃdharām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrṇā hi vasudhā śūdrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ca tān veda kaścana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāghavotkṛttamūrdhnas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śambūkasyāmalaṃ yaśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrṇā hi vasudhā śūdrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ca tān veda kaś-cana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāghava-utkṛtta-mūrdhnas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śambūkasya a-malaṃ yaśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ cādyārabhya yuṣmabhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayātmaiva niveditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇāvādārthinaṃ śiṣyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parigṛhṇīta mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ ca adyā arabhya yuṣmabhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā ātma eva niveditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīṇā-vāda-arthinaṃ śiṣyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parigṛhṇīta mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyām eva tu velāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocad gaṅgarakṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam eva mamāpy arthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saphalīkriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyām eva tu velāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avocad gaṅgarakṣitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam eva mama apy arthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-phalī-kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tau gomukhenoktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavantāv āgamārthinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anāyāsopadeśau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tad evaṃ bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tau gomukhena uktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavantāv āgama-arthinau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-āyāsa-upadeśau ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yat tad evaṃ bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mayā śanakair uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣipram eva tvayānayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prārthanā pratipanneti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhenoditaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mayā śanakair uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣipram eva tvaya ānayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prārthanā pratipanna īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhena uditaṃ tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīraṃ kāśirājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājyam antaḥpuraṃ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yac cānyad api tat sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgarakṣitarakṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīraṃ kāśi-rājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājyam antaḥ-puraṃ puram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yac ca anyad api tat sarvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gaṅgarakṣita-rakṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya ca svayam evāyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāsyām abhyanugacchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyāpadbhir asaṃkīrṇā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>hastasthāḥ sarvasaṃpadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasya ca svayam eva ayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāsyām abhyanugacchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya apadbhir a-saṃkīrṇā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>hasta-sthāḥ sarva-saṃpadaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aśeṣaśreṇibhartā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṣṭhitvāt priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa yasya kiṃkaras tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃkarā sakalā purī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-śeṣa-śreṇi-bhartā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṣṭhitvāt priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa yasya kiṃ-karas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ-karā sakalā purī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etat phalam abhipretya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayaitābhyāṃ pratiśrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy anālocyakartāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃkarā bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etat phalam abhipretya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya aitābhyāṃ pratiśrutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hy an-ālocya-kartāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ-karā- bhavatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_24.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśaṃsya tasyeti matipraharṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nandopanandādisuhṛtsamagraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>namaskṛtārhadvratacārisaṃghaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punarvasor veśma gatas tato 'ham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_24.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśaṃsya tasya iti mati-praharṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nanda-upananda-ādi-suhṛt-samagraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>namas-kṛta-arhad-vrata-cāri-saṃghaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punarvasor veśma gatas tato 'ham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra nandādibhir mitrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārādhanaviśāradaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṛtrimasuhṛdbhāvaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa.gataḥ sukham āsiṣi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra nanda-ādibhir mitrair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārādhana-viśāradaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kṛtrima-suhṛd-bhāvaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa.gataḥ sukham āsiṣi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadāhāravelāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛśyate sma na gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha nītam anāhārair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmābhir api tad dinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā āhāra-velāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛśyate sma na gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha nītam an-āhārair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmābhir api tad dinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau tu sāyam āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nātisvābhāvikākṛtiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad anāthamatodvignaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māṃ vinītavad uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau tu sāyam āgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ati-svābhāvika-ākṛtiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad a-nātha-mata-udvignaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māṃ vinītavad uktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājamārge mayā dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paurasaṃghātasaṃkaṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛtyo hariśikhasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lokenāntaritaḥ sa ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rāja-mārge mayā dṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paura-saṃghāta-saṃkaṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛtyo hariśikhasya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lokena antaritaḥ sa ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadgaveṣayamāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayādya gamitaṃ dinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kārye hi guruṇi vyagraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jighatsāpi na bādhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad-gaveṣayamāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maya ādya gamitaṃ dinam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kārye hi guruṇi vyagraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jighatsa āpi na bādhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cāvaśyaṃ mayānveṣyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdvārttopalabdhaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmān mā mām apaśyantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛdhvaṃ duḥkhāsikām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ca a-vaśyaṃ maya ānveṣyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛd-vārtta-upalabdhaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmān mā mām a-paśyantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛdhvaṃ duḥkha-asikām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā cāyam anujñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣiptasaptāṣṭavāsaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madamantharasaṃcāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahujalpann upāgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā ca ayam anujñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣipta-sapta-aṣṭa-vāsaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mada-manthara-saṃcāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bahu-jalpann upāgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athainam aham ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodhakṣobhitamānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitvā kṣaṇam anālāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paruṣālāpam abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha enam aham ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodha-kṣobhita-mānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthitvā kṣaṇam an-ālāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paruṣa-ālāpam abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>īdṛśas tādṛśaḥ prājñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prekṣākārī ca gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti paṅgos turaṃgasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtā garuḍavegatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>īdṛśas tā-dṛśaḥ prājñaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prekṣā-kārī ca gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti paṅgos turaṃgasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtā garuḍa-vegatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrvaṃ brāhmaṇam ākhyāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samastāyāḥ puraḥ puraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā madhunā mattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ paśyasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pūrvaṃ brāhmaṇam ākhyāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samastāyāḥ puraḥ puraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā madhunā mattaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ paśyasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mām ayam āha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na madaḥ pāramārthikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadoṣaṃ tu vaco vaktuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayāyaṃ kṛtrimaḥ kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mām ayam āha sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na madaḥ pāramārthikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-doṣaṃ tu vaco vaktuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maya āyaṃ kṛtrimaḥ kṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mattasya kila vāgdoṣāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāruṣyānṛtatādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūṣayanti na vaktāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ato 'yaṃ kṛtrimo madaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mattasya kila vāg-doṣāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pāruṣya-an-ṛtatā-ādayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dūṣayanti na vaktāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ato 'yaṃ kṛtrimo madaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāvitaguṇasya te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madapracchādanopāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ nv adoṣo 'pi vidyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tam uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāvita-guṇasya te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mada-pracchādana-upāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ nv a-doṣo 'pi vidyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athānenoktam astīti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>katham ity udite mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam ārabhatākhyātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjāmantharitākṣaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha anena uktam asti iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>katham ity udite mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam ārabhatā akhyātuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lajjā-mantharita-akṣaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatām ṛṣidattā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra netrapathaṃ gatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārabhya divasāt tasmāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetoviṣayatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatām ṛṣidattā me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra netra-pathaṃ gatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārabhya divasāt tasmāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ceto-viṣayatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niravagrahatāṃ buddhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cittasyātha mamābhavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmād aviṣaye cakṣuś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetasā me prasāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niravagrahatāṃ buddhvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cittasya atha mama abhavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmād a-viṣaye cakṣuś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetasā me prasāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñātadharmārthaśāstratvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthānāt sādhusabhāsu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāgādhīnaṃ na me cakṣuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛttaṃ gaṇikāsv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jñāta-dharma-artha-śāstratvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthānāt sādhu-sabhāsu ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāga-adhīnaṃ na me cakṣuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛttaṃ gaṇikāsv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nūnam eṣā parigrāhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama pravrajitā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkalpena mamaitasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durdāntaturago 'yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nūnam eṣā parigrāhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama pravrajitā yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkalpena mama etasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dur-dānta-turago '-yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād asyām aniṣṭasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkalpasya nibandhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jijñāsye tāvad ity enām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchaṃ draṣṭum anv aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād asyām an-iṣṭasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkalpasya nibandhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jijñāsye tāvad ity enām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchaṃ draṣṭum anv aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nānākārair vinodaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deśāntarakathādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvitrair eva dinais tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśvāsam udapādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nānā-kārair vinodaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deśa-antara-kathā-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvitrair eva dinais tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśvāsam udapādayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā prastutālāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭo 'ham ṛṣidattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ke ke deśās tvayā dṛṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krāmatā pṛthivīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā prastuta-ālāpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭo 'ham ṛṣidattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ke ke deśās tvayā dṛṣṭāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krāmatā pṛthivīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samṛddhiḥ saśarīreva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kauśāmbī yatra pattanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vatsadeśaḥ sa dṛṣṭaḥ prāṅ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mameti kathite mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samṛddhiḥ sa-śarīra īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kauśāmbī yatra pattanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vatsa-deśaḥ sa dṛṣṭaḥ prāṅ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama iti kathite mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktam alam ālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aparais tava durbhagaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyatāṃ vatsakauśāmbī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbandhaiva punaḥ kathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktam alam ālāpair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aparais tava dur-bhagaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyatāṃ vatsa-kauśāmbī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbandha aiva punaḥ kathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha jānāsi kauśāmbyāym</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākārajitamanmatham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhaṃ nāma niṣṇātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>savidyāsu kalāsv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha jānāsi kauśāmbyāym</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākāra-jita-manmatham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhaṃ nāma niṣṇātaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-vidyāsu kalāsv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athācintayam ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etasyai kathayāmi kim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā dhig adhīraṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>evaṃ tāvad bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha acintayam ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etasyai kathayāmi kim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā dhig a-dhīraṃ mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>evaṃ tāvad bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato 'ham uktavān ārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānāsīti kim ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmānaṃ ko na jānāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa hi me paramaḥ suhṛt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato 'ham uktavān ārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jānāsi iti kim ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmānaṃ ko na jānāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa hi me paramaḥ suhṛt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā na viśeṣo 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūkṣmo 'pi mama gomukhāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena māṃ paśyatā vyaktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭo bhavati gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā na viśeṣo 'sti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sūkṣmo 'pi mama gomukhāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena māṃ paśyatā vyaktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dṛṣṭo bhavati gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsau locanāntena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāṣpastimitapakṣmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānurāgeva dṛṣṭvā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ mantharam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asau locana-antena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāṣpa-stimita-pakṣmaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-anurāga īva dṛṣṭvā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ mantharam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhaḥ kila rūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalākauśalacāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vatsarājasutaṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nānyena sadṛśaḥ kṣitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhaḥ kila rūpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalā-kauśala-cāriṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vatsa-rāja-sutaṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na anyena sadṛśaḥ kṣitau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi cāsau tvadākāras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvatkalājālapeśalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharakumāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ sadṛśas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi ca asau tvad-ākāras</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvat-kalā-jāla-peśalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dhara-kumāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ sadṛśas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tvadākāravijñānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvathā puṇyavān asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandhaśailo 'pi hi ślāghyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tulyamānaḥ sumeruṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yas tvad-ākāra-vijñānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvathā puṇyavān asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gandha-śailo 'pi hi ślāghyas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tulyamānaḥ sumeruṇā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā cīvarāntena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukham āvṛtya nīcakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asau roditum ārabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sotkamastanamaṇḍalā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktvā cīvara-antena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukham āvṛtya nīcakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asau roditum ārabdhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-utkama-stana-maṇḍalā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattām athāvocam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārye kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rudyate mṛtapatyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaśravaṇād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattām atha avocam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ārye kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rudyate mṛta-patya īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukha-śravaṇād iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ śrūyatām asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidvān rājagṛhe vaṇik</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padmo nāma dhanaṃ yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padmasyeva mahānidheḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ śrūyatām asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidvān rājagṛhe vaṇik</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padmo nāma dhanaṃ yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padmasya iva mahā-nidheḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuṭumbācāracature</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priye patyuḥ pativrate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sumanā mahadinnā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya bhārye babhūvatuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kuṭumba-ācāra-cature</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priye patyuḥ pati-vrate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sumanā mahadinnā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya bhārye babhūvatuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayor abhavatāṃ putrau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātṛnāmasanāmakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putrābhyāṃ dayite pitros</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā duhitarāv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayor abhavatāṃ putrau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mātṛ-nāma-sa-nāmakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>putrābhyāṃ dayite pitros</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā duhitarāv api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra yā sumanā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāḥ sumanasaḥ sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nagaryāṃ pariṇītātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṣṭhinā kāliyena sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra yā sumanā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasyāḥ sumanasaḥ sutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nagaryāṃ pariṇīta ātra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṣṭhinā kāliyena sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duhitā mahadinnāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā ca mātuḥ sanāmikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cedivatseśamitreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṇītar1ṣabheṇa sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duhitā mahadinnāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yā ca mātuḥ sa-nāmikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cedi-vatsa-īśa-mitreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pariṇītar1ṣabheṇa sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣabhān mahadinnāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utpannaḥ kila gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kutaścin na kasyāṃcit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaścij jagati yādṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣabhān mahadinnāyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>utpannaḥ kila gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kutaś-cin na kasyāṃ-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaś-cij jagati yādṛśaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu mahadinnasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayā guṇaśālinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>himādrer api niyānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saritaḥ kṣāravārayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ tu mahadinnasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanayā guṇa-śālinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hima-adrer api niyānti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saritaḥ kṣāra-vārayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāhaṃ bālaiva gurubhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhāya pratiśrutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṃ hi nāma na gacchanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyāpitror manorathāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa āhaṃ bāla aiva gurubhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhāya pratiśrutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṃ hi nāma na gacchanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kanyā-pitror mano-rathāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāle kvacid atīte tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ guṇair janavallabham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>himakāla ivāsādhuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālaḥ padmam anāśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāle kva-cid atīte tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṃ guṇair jana-vallabham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hima-kāla iva a-sādhuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālaḥ padmam anāśayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatkuṭumbaṃ tatas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhārakena vinā kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>unmūlitadṛḍhastambha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandirāvasthāṃ gatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat-kuṭumbaṃ tatas tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhārakena vinā kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>unmūlita-dṛḍha-stambha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandira-avasthāṃ gatam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vārāṇasyāṃ tataḥ pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasuḥ sumanaso gṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthāpitāhaṃ pitṛṣvasrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duhiteva ca lālitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vārāṇasyāṃ tataḥ pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasuḥ sumanaso gṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sthāpita āhaṃ pitṛṣvasrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duhita īva ca lālitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃtatādyaiḥ krameṇātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jvaraiḥ pañcabhir apy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pīḍyamānā babhūvāndhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyākhyātā cikitsakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃtata-ādyaiḥ krameṇa atha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jvaraiḥ pañcabhir apy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pīḍyamānā babhūva andhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyākhyātā cikitsakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atra cāgādhajainendra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstrasāgarapāragā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asīc chrutadharā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śramaṇā karuṇāvatī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atra ca a-gādha-jaina-indra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstra-sāgara-pāra-gā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asīc chrutadharā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śramaṇā karuṇāvatī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etaṃ vācā samānīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantrāgadaviśāradā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām asāv acireṇaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād vyādher amocayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etaṃ vācā samānīya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mantra-agada-viśāradā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām asāv a-cireṇa eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād vyādher amocayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svasthāvasthāṃ ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumanā gṛham ānayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha krodhād ivāgṛhṇāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saiva jvaraparaṃparā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svastha-avasthāṃ ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumanā gṛham ānayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha krodhād iva agṛhṇāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa aiva jvara-paraṃparā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śrutadhārāyai mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arpayat sumanāḥ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca yātaḥ punar vyādhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantrāgadabhayād iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śrutadhārāyai mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arpayat sumanāḥ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa ca yātaḥ punar vyādhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantra-agada-bhayād iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śravaṇām avadad dainyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durmanāḥ sumanās tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravrajyāgrāhaṇeneyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālikā jīvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śravaṇām avadad dainyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dur-manāḥ sumanās tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravrajyā-grāhaṇena iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bālikā jīvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā cāgrāhayat sā mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arhatpravacanaṃ yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakalaḥ śramanāsaṃghaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siṣyatām agaman mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā cā agrāhayat sā mām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arhat-pravacanaṃ yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakalaḥ śramanā-saṃghaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>siṣyatām agaman mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kevalajñānadīpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā saṃsāraphalgutām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirvāṇasya ca sāratvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣṭhāṃ śrutadharāgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kevala-jñāna-dīpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭvā saṃsāra-phalgutām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirvāṇasya ca sāratvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣṭhāṃ śrutadhara āgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirvṛttāyāṃ tatas tasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃhatya śramaṇāgaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṇanīm akarod asmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vihāre mām anicchatīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirvṛttāyāṃ tatas tasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃhatya śramaṇā-gaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaṇa-nīm akarod asmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vihāre mām an-icchatīm ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhyānaṃ yad yat samāpadya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatālambanaṃ niśi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balād ālambanaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ saṃnidhīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhyānaṃ yad yat samāpadya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devatā-ālambanaṃ niśi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balād ālambanaṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ saṃnidhīyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā yadā ca gośabdam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhīyānā vadāmy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mukhottarapadas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāyate sa tadā tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadā yadā ca go-śabdam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adhīyānā vadāmy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mukha-uttara-padas tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāyate sa tadā tadā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jalpantī mukhaśabdaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayuñje yadi kevalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gośabdapūrvapadatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>balāt tatropagacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jalpantī mukha-śabdaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayuñje yadi kevalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>go-śabda-pūrva-padatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>balāt tatra upagacchati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhena parāmṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ślāghanīyaṃ tṛṇādy api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti cintāparādhīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāntaṃ kālam akṣipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhena parāmṛṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ślāghanīyaṃ tṛṇa-ādy api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti cintā-parādhīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāntaṃ kālam akṣipam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāvac ca na mayā tyaktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratyāśā gomukhāśrayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgatā yāvad anyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vārttā dattanirāśatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāvac ca na mayā tyaktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praty-āśā gomukha-āśrayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgatā yāvad anya aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vārttā datta-nir-āśatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>campāsthasya prabhor mūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthitaḥ sabalaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhaḥ sasuhṛdvargaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulindair antare hataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>campā-sthasya prabhor mūlaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasthitaḥ sa-balaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhaḥ sa-suhṛd-vargaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pulindair antare hataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac cāsmi na mṛtā sadyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutvā gomukhavaiśasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicāraṇasamarthāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prajñāyāḥ sā samarthatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca asmi na mṛtā sadyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śrutvā gomukha-vaiśasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vicāraṇa-samarthāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prajñāyāḥ sā samarthatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama jīvantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvitasya mahat phalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramyām ākarṇayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhasya kathām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama jīvantī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvitasya mahat phalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ramyām ākarṇayiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhasya kathām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api cāparam apy asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvitālambanaṃ mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hataḥ pravādamātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ śabarair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api ca aparam apy asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jīvita-ālambanaṃ mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hataḥ pravāda-mātreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ śabarair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena gomukhasaṃbandhām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṇya ruditaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amṛtābhyadhikatve 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkhahetuṃ kathām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena gomukha-saṃbandhām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ākarṇya ruditaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-mṛta-abhyadhikatve 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duḥkha-hetuṃ kathām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd yathāheyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvaṃ tad upapadyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmaddāsāḥ kathaṃ kuryuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāpasaṃkalpam anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd yathā āha iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvaṃ tad upapadyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmad-dāsāḥ kathaṃ kuryuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāpa-saṃkalpam anyathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svair iyaṃ gurubhir dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madīyair api yārthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kumārī sānurāgā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmān na tyāgam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svair iyaṃ gurubhir dattā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madīyair api ya ārthitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kumārī sa-anurāgā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmān na tyāgam arhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi bahu nirdhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tatsvīkaraṇakāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aduṣṭaṃ grahaṇopāyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aham etaṃ prayuktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi bahu nirdhārya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tat-svī-karaṇa-kāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-duṣṭaṃ grahaṇa-upāyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aham etaṃ prayuktavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svādunā piṇḍapātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vandanena cikitsayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mardanābhyañjanādyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>laghu saṃgham atoṣayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svādunā piṇḍa-pātena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vandanena cikitsayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mardana-abhyañjana-ādyaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>laghu saṃgham atoṣayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyagreṇa cātra vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattaṃ vaḥ kṛtakottaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mitravārtāvidāvyagraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīkṣadhvaṃ na mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyagreṇa ca atra vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dattaṃ vaḥ kṛtaka-uttaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mitra-vārtā-vidā-vyagraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīkṣadhvaṃ na mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattām athāvocaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svaśilpe labdhakauśalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāvakaiḥ saṃnidhāryantām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>annasaṃskārakārakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattām atha avocaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-śilpe labdha-kauśalāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrāvakaiḥ saṃnidhāryantām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anna-saṃskāra-kārakāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arhatām arhaṇaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandhavāsasragādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛṣibhyaḥ śramaṇābhyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dātum icchāmi bhojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arhatām arhaṇaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gandha-vāsa-srag-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ṛṣibhyaḥ śramaṇābhyaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dātum icchāmi bhojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.71'>
