<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mithyādṛṣṭisahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhojayitvā yad arjyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad ekam arhataṃ bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥ pāpaṃ pramārjyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mithyā-dṛṣṭi-sahasrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhojayitvā yad arjyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad ekam arhataṃ bhaktyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadyaḥ pāpaṃ pramārjyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena santīha yāvantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyasarvajñaśāsanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saśrāvakagaṇān āryāṃs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāṃs tad āmantryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena santi iha yāvantaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priya-sarva-jña-śāsanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-śrāvaka-gaṇān āryāṃs</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāṃs tad āmantryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā sādhitaḥ sūdair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āhāraḥ sa tathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jitajihvair api prītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jinaśāsanapāragaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā sādhitaḥ sūdair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āhāraḥ sa tathā yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jita-jihvair api prītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jina-śāsana-pāra-gaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāham ṛṣidattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puraḥ sakṛtakajvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patitas tuṅgaromāñcaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>savepathuvijṛmbhakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aham ṛṣidattāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puraḥ sa-kṛtaka-jvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>patitas tuṅga-romāñcaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-vepathu-vijṛmbhakaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tādṛśī ca mayā vyaktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jvaritānukṛtiḥ kṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣkaraḥ paritāpo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā saṃbhāvitas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tā-dṛśī ca mayā vyaktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jvarita-anukṛtiḥ kṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duṣ-karaḥ paritāpo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathā saṃbhāvitas tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti cāpṛcchat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā mām ujjvalasaṃbhramā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dantakūjitasaṃbhinnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayāpy etan niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim etad iti ca apṛcchat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā mām ujjvala-saṃbhramā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>danta-kūjita-saṃbhinnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maya āpy etan niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaḍrātrābhakṣaṇakṣāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhīto vātahetunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvareṇānubhavāmy etām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avasthām īdṛśīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṣaḍ-rātrā-bhakṣaṇa-kṣāmo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhīto vāta-hetunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvareṇa anubhavāmy etām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>avasthām īdṛśīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ svasvapanāvāse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śramaṇāgaṇasaṃkule</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām asau karuṇāviṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvāhitavatī ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sva-svapana-āvāse</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śramaṇā-gaṇa-saṃkule</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mām asau karuṇa-āviṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃvāhitavatī ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha saṃghaṭṭayan dantān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktavān asmi tāṃ śanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahājanavivikto 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āvāsaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha saṃghaṭṭayan dantān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktavān asmi tāṃ śanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-jana-vivikto 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āvāsaḥ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattākṛtānujñās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāś ca pravrajitā gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadabhiprāyajijñāsur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha tām idam abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattā-kṛta-anujñās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāś ca pravrajitā- gatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad-abhiprāya-jijñāsur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atha tām idam abravam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārye virudhyate strīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛbhrātṛsutair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vratasthānāṃ viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthātuṃ saha rahaś ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārye virudhyate strīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pitṛ-bhrātṛ-sutair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vrata-sthānāṃ viśeṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthātuṃ saha rahaś ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ ca kitavaḥ pānthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāvyāvinayākrṭiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛthagjanā janāś caite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena nirgamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ ca kitavaḥ pānthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃbhāvya-a-vinaya-ākrṭiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛthag-janā- janāś ca ete</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena nirgamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayoktaṃ kṣaṇam apy ekam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśaktā svastham apy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muktvā tvāṃ sthātum anyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punaḥ saṃtatajvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya ūktaṃ kṣaṇam apy ekam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-śaktā svastham apy aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muktvā tvāṃ sthātum anyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ punaḥ saṃtata-jvaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃbhāvanāpi ramyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mādṛśyās tvādṛśā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ślāghyā kiṃśukaśākhāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasantasahacāriṇī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃbhāvana āpi ramya aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā-dṛśyās tvā-dṛśā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ślāghyā kiṃśuka-śākha āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasanta-saha-cāriṇī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhanyo jvaro 'pi yenedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvadaṅgam upayujyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālakūṭam api ślāghyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>līḍhaśaṃkarakaṃdharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhanyo jvaro 'pi yena idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvad-aṅgam upayujyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kālakūṭam api ślāghyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>līḍha-śaṃkara-kaṃdharam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi bruvāṇaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakhalīkṛtasādhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā mahāgrahacaṇḍena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhītā bhāvajanmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi bruvāṇa aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakhalī-kṛta-sādhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā mahā-graha-caṇḍena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhītā bhāva-janmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd iyaṃ cintā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyam āhuś cikitsakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarve saṃkrāmiṇo rogāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>spṛśatāṃ prāṇinām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd iyaṃ cintā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyam āhuś cikitsakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarve saṃkrāmiṇo rogāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>spṛśatāṃ prāṇinām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madīyaḥ kṛtrimo 'py enaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra saṃkrāmati jvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathaṃ nāma na saṃkramet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra yaḥ paramārthikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madīyaḥ kṛtrimo 'py enaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra saṃkrāmati jvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathaṃ nāma na saṃkramet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra yaḥ parama-arthikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā hi svedaromānca</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāṣpakampavijṛmbhikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvarasya parivāro 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgam asyāḥ prabādhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā hi sveda-romānca</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bāṣpa-kampa-vijṛmbhikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jvarasya parivāro 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅgam asyāḥ prabādhate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā smaraśāstreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad iṅgitam udāhṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lāvaṇyam iva gātreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad asyāḥ prāsphurat sphuṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā smara-śāstreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad iṅgitam udāhṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lāvaṇyam iva gātreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad asyāḥ prāsphurat sphuṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tām uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhik tvāṃ niṣkaruṇāśayām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śītajvarārtam aṅgair yā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na pīḍayasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tām uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhik tvāṃ niṣ-karuṇa-āśayām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śīta-jvara-ārtam aṅgair yā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na pīḍayasi mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāśliṣyaṃ tathā sā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nādṛśyata yathā pṛthak</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viralevāruṇālokaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niśāntaśaśicandrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā aśliṣyaṃ tathā sā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na adṛśyata yathā pṛthak</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>virala īva aruṇa-ālokaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niśa-anta-śaśi-candrikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāv āvayoś caṇḍau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathāśleṣacikitsayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apāyātāṃ muhūrtena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtrimākṛtrimau jvarau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tāv āvayoś caṇḍau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā āśleṣa-cikitsayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apāyātāṃ muhūrtena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtrima-a-kṛtrimau jvarau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātāyām atha yāminyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhvā vṛttāntam īdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃghaḥ saṃhatya tāṃ svasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivāsān niravāsayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yātāyām atha yāminyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>buddhvā vṛtta-antam īdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃghaḥ saṃhatya tāṃ svasmān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivāsān niravāsayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pravahaṇārūḍhām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣidattāṃ mayā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayan muditaḥ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhaṃ maṅgalasaṃkulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha pravahaṇa-ārūḍhām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣidattāṃ mayā saha</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayan muditaḥ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gṛhaṃ maṅgala-saṃkulam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatrāvayoḥ sasumanāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumanāḥ priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prītanāgarakānīkaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karagraham akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra avayoḥ sa-sumanāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-manāḥ priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prīta-nāgaraka-ānīkaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kara-graham akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad evam ṛṣidattā vaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃvṛttā paricārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā kiṃ vikalpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam ālokyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad evam ṛṣidattā vaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃvṛttā paricārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā kiṃ vikalpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam ālokyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathāpi kathitaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naiva saṃśayam atyajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥśraddhānaṃ hi sahasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kākatālīyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatha āpi kathitaṃ tena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na eva saṃśayam atyajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥ-śraddhānaṃ hi sahasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kākatālīyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mālālaṃkāravastrādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhopakaraṇāni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasthāpya prāk tadārhāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāṃ didṛkṣus tato 'gamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mālā-alaṃkāra-vastra-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛha-upakaraṇāni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasthāpya prāk tada ārhāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāṃ didṛkṣus tato 'gamam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra cāsau mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citrāṃśukavibhūṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nānāpuṣpāṃ hasantīva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasantopavanaśriyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatra ca asau mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citra-aṃśuka-vibhūṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nānā-puṣpāṃ hasanti īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasanta-upavana-śriyam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratimāḥ kāṣṭhamayyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śobhante bhūṣitās tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lajjitāsurakanyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśīṣu tu kā kathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratimāḥ kāṣṭha-mayyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śobhante bhūṣitās tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lajjita-asura-kanyāsu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tādṛśīṣu tu kā kathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pravrajyāyāṃ punar yasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntir yāsīd akṛtrimā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durlabhāṇi kvacit tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācakāny akṣarāṇy api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pravrajyāyāṃ punar yasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntir yā āsīd a-kṛtrimā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dur-labhāṇi kva-cit tasyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācakāny akṣarāṇy api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama duḥśliṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntarūpavirūpayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃkārakalāpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gurusārasya dhāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama duḥśliṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kānta-rūpa-virūpayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃkāra-kalāpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guru-sārasya dhāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃkārāvṛtā tāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntarūpasya cārutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na śakyā sarvathā draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janair lolekṣaṇair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃkāra-āvṛtā tāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kānta-rūpasya cārutā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na śakyā sarvathā draṣṭuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janair lola-īkṣaṇair api ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>virūpasya tu vairūpyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat pracchādanam arhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakāśayati tal loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭumaṇḍanaḍiṇḍimaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>virūpasya tu vairūpyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yat pracchādanam arhati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakāśayati tal loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paṭu-maṇḍana-ḍiṇḍimaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athādhiṣṭhitaparyaṅkam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣidattopagamya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avandata prahṛṣṭāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravrajyātyāgalajjitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha adhiṣṭhita-paryaṅkam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṛṣidatta ūpagamya mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avandata prahṛṣṭa āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravrajyā-tyāga-lajjitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tām uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakhyāḥ kiṃ kāryam āśiṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarāgaiva satī yā tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vītarāgagatiṃ gatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tām uktavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakhyāḥ kiṃ kāryam āśiṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-rāga aiva satī yā tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīta-rāga-gatiṃ gatā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mokṣaḥ kāruṇikair uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddhair duḥkhakṣayaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣīṇaduḥsahaduḥkhatvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mokṣaṃ prāptāsi sarvathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mokṣaḥ kāruṇikair uktaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>siddhair duḥkha-kṣayaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣīṇa-duḥsaha-duḥkhatvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mokṣaṃ prāpta āsi sarvathā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_25.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā subhagatāmahoddhataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃkaro bhavatu gomukhas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo,sito hi jitadṛṣṭabhartṛkās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>toṣayanti jananīsakhījanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_25.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathā su-bhagatā-mahā-uddhataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃkaro bhavatu gomukhas tava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo,sito hi jita-dṛṣṭa-bhartṛkās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>toṣayanti jananī-sakhī-janam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādikuṭilālāpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalāpagamitatrapām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām āmantrya svam āvāsam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchaṃ sahagomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi-kuṭila-ālāpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalāpa-gamita-trapām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tām āmantrya svam āvāsam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchaṃ saha-gomukhaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā punar āyātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayānuṣṭhitassatkriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipaṇer gṛham āyātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ priyadarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekadā punar āyātas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taya ānuṣṭhitas-sat-kriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipaṇer gṛham āyātam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ priyadarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kañcukaṃ muñcatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā dṛṣṭaḥ payodharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>payodharāntarālakṣyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaśīva parimaṇḍalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kañcukaṃ muñcatas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā dṛṣṭaḥ payo-dharaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>payo-dhara-antara-ālakṣyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaśi īva parimaṇḍalaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama yoṣaiṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatas tuṅgapayodharā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stanakeśivatītvaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prathamaṃ strītvalakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama yoṣa aiṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatas tuṅga-payo-dharā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>stana-keśivatītvaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prathamaṃ strītva-lakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lokas tu yad imāṃ sarvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratipannaḥ pumān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrāntijñānam idaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃcit sādṛśyakāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lokas tu yad imāṃ sarvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratipannaḥ pumān iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhrānti-jñānam idaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ-cit sā-dṛśya-kāritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā kiṃ vikalpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mamātimiracakṣuṣaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi dṛṣṭena dṛṣṭārthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>draṣṭur bhavati saṃśayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā kiṃ vikalpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama a-timira-cakṣuṣaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi dṛṣṭena dṛṣṭa-arthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>draṣṭur bhavati saṃśayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi bahusaṃkalpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>animeṣavilocanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyad ṛṣidattā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyantaṃ priyadarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi bahu-saṃkalpam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-nimeṣa-vilocanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apaśyad ṛṣidattā māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśyantaṃ priyadarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsau gadgadālāpā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prītibāṣpāvṛtekṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmānaṃ cetayasveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyadarśanam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asau gadgada-ālāpā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prīti-bāṣpa-āvṛta-īkṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmānaṃ cetayasva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyadarśanam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asāv api tam uddeśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakāśya jhagiti tviṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taḍidguṇa ivāmbhodaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśan mandirodaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asāv api tam uddeśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakāśya jhagiti tviṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taḍid-guṇa iva ambho-daṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāviśan mandira-udaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattām athāpaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodhavisphāritekṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayāpakramitaḥ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama locanagocarāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattām atha apaśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodha-visphārita-īkṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaya āpakramitaḥ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama locana-gocarāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utthāya ca tataḥ sthānāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakāmakrodhagomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punarvasugṛhaṃ prāpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paryaṅkaśaraṇo 'bhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utthāya ca tataḥ sthānāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-kāma-krodha-gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punarvasu-gṛhaṃ prāpya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paryaṅka-śaraṇo 'bhavam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kramaṃ parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāmāvasthāparaṃparā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tumulāyudhiseneva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yugapad mām abādhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kramaṃ parityajya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāma-avasthā-paraṃparā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tumula-āyudhi-sena īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yugapad mām abādhata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athācirāgataśrīko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā bālaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathājñāpitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaṃ rūkṣayā girā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha a-cira-āgata-śrīko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathā bālaḥ pṛthag-janaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā ājñāpitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaṃ rūkṣayā girā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api pravrajitābhartaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyā me priyadarśanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akṛtapratikarmaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣipram ānīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>api pravrajitā-bhartaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyā me priyadarśanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-kṛta-pratikarma aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣipram ānīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu mām abravīt trastaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kā nāma priyadarśanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyājitāḥ stha yayā sadyaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetasaḥ sthiratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu mām abravīt trastaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kā nāma priyadarśanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyājitāḥ stha yayā sadyaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cetasaḥ sthiratām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ tava yaḥ syālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣaḥ priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam eva jagatsāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadā priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ tava yaḥ syālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣaḥ priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam eva jagat-sāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadā priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca vakṣyasi sarvasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vārāṇasyām ayaṃ pumān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavataḥ katham ekasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadeti tad ucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca vakṣyasi sarvasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vārāṇasyām ayaṃ pumān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavataḥ katham ekasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramada īti tad ucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattā virakteti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paricchinnā purā tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā bhavataḥ kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jātety atra kim ucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattā virakta īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paricchinnā purā tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunā bhavataḥ kāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāta īty atra kim ucyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatānugatiko lokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛtto hi yathā tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paramārthaṃ punar veda</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasraikaḥ pumān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gata-anugatiko lokaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛtto hi yathā tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parama-arthaṃ punar veda</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasra ekaḥ pumān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenoktaṃ janatāsiddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viruddham api na tyajet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyate chagalaḥ śvāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃhatya bahubhir balāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena uktaṃ janatā-siddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viruddham api na tyajet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyate chagalaḥ śva āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃhatya bahubhir balāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yuṣmadvidhaiḥ prājñair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vācyaṃ sad apīdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśraddheyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyakṣam api yad bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yuṣmad-vidhaiḥ prājñair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vācyaṃ sad apī idṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-śraddheyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratyakṣam api yad bhavet ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatāṃ ca kathā tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arthasyāsya prakāśikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pramāṇaṃ hi pramāṇajñaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>purākalpe 'pi vartitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrūyatāṃ ca kathā tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arthasya asya prakāśikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pramāṇaṃ hi pramāṇa-jñaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>purā-kalpe 'pi vartitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>babhūva kauśiko nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vedavedāṅgaviddvijaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satyavratatayā loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasiddhaḥ satyakauśikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>babhūva kauśiko nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>veda-vedāṅga-vid-dvijaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satya-vratatayā loke</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasiddhaḥ satyakauśikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadācid abhiṣekāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena yātena jāhnavīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saśiṣyaparivāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarantī prekṣitā śilā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā-cid abhiṣekāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena yātena jāhnavīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-śiṣya-parivāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarantī prekṣitā śilā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahatāsau prayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiṣyān anvaśiṣat tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāyam artho mahānarthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakāśyaḥ putrakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahata āsau prayatnena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiṣyān anvaśiṣat tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ayam artho mahā-an-arthaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakāśyaḥ putrakair iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athaikaś capalas teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baṭuḥ piṅgalanāmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipaṇau mantrayāṃ cakre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasyacid vaṇijaḥ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha ekaś capalas teṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baṭuḥ piṅgala-nāmakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vipaṇau mantrayāṃ cakre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kasya-cid vaṇijaḥ puraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śreṣṭhi kiṃ na śṛṇoṣy ekam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āścaryaṃ kathayāmi te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tarantīṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sopādhyāyaḥ śilām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śreṣṭhi kiṃ na śṛṇoṣy ekam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āścaryaṃ kathayāmi te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tarantīṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-upādhyāyaḥ śilām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāntaḥpurikā dāsī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim api kretum āgatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etad ālāpam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājapatnyai nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha antaḥ-purikā dāsī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim api kretum āgatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etad ālāpam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāja-patnyai nyavedayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayāpi kathitaṃ rajñe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa tāṃ pṛṣṭvā paraṃparām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>baṭunākhyātam āhvāyya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭavān satyakauśikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taya āpi kathitaṃ rajñe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa tāṃ pṛṣṭvā paraṃparām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>baṭunā ākhyātam āhvāyya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭavān satyakauśikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satyaṃ būhīti no vācyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satyavādivrato bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mithyā brūhīti no vācyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmī mithyāvrato hi saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>satyaṃ būhi iti no vācyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satya-vādi-vrato bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mithyā brūhi iti no vācyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāmī mithyā-vrato hi saḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu yat piṅgalenoktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etad yuktaṃ parīkṣitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pramadāt satyam apy ete</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadanti baṭavo yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu yat piṅgalena uktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>etad yuktaṃ parīkṣitum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pramadāt satyam apy ete</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadanti baṭavo yataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saśiṣyaiḥ kila yuṣmābhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tarantī prekṣitā śilā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etat satyam āho svin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛṣety ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa-śiṣyaiḥ kila yuṣmābhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tarantī prekṣitā śilā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etat satyam āho svin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛṣa īty ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc cāsya dhig etāṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ninditāṃ satyavāditām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥśraddhānam aniṣṭaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yan mayā vācyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca asya dhig etāṃ me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ninditāṃ satya-vāditām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>duḥ-śraddhānam an-iṣṭaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yan mayā vācyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na satyam api tad vācyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad uktam asukhāvaham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti satyapravādo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tyājyaḥ satyavādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na satyam api tad vācyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad uktam a-sukha-āvaham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti satya-pravādo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tyājyaḥ satya-vādibhiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt satyam idaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛṣāvādaśatādhikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asatyam abhidhāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satyavādaśatādhikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāt satyam idaṃ tyaktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mṛṣā-vāda-śata-adhikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-satyam abhidhāsyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satya-vāda-śata-adhikam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāvocat sa rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājan mithyā baṭor vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agniṃ paśyati yaḥ śītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>plavamānāṃ śilām asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha avocat sa rājānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājan mithyā baṭor vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agniṃ paśyati yaḥ śītaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>plavamānāṃ śilām asau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaḥ śraddadhyād baṭor vācaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nisargādhīracetasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>capalasyopamānaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prathamaṃ baṭumarkaṭāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaḥ śraddadhyād baṭor vācaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nisarga-a-dhīra-cetasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>capalasya upamānaṃ hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prathamaṃ baṭu-markaṭāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viṣaṇṇam iti viśvāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājānaṃ satyakauśikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viruddhavādinaṃ kruddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>piṅgalaṃ niravāsayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viṣaṇṇam iti viśvāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājānaṃ satyakauśikaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viruddha-vādinaṃ kruddhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>piṅgalaṃ niravāsayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad evaṃ lokavidviṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anuyukto 'pi bhūbhṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satyam satyapratijño 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāvadat satyakauśikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad evaṃ loka-vidviṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anuyukto 'pi bhū-bhṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satyam satya-pratijño 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na avadat satyakauśikaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmākaṃ punar ajñāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śīlacāritrajanmanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viruddham idam īdṛk kaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śraddadhyād vadatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuṣmākaṃ punar a-jñāta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śīla-cāritra-janmanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viruddham idam īdṛk kaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śraddadhyād vadatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mayokto bhavān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥśraddhānasya bhāṣitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasyāsmin pramadāratne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pumān iti viparyayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa maya ūkto bhavān eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥ-śraddhānasya bhāṣitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya asmin pramadā-ratne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pumān iti viparyayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ cānena pralāpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>strīratnaṃ priyadarśanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>acirāt svīkariṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krośatāṃ tvādṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ ca anena pralāpena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>strī-ratnaṃ priyadarśanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-cirāt svī-kariṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>krośatāṃ tvā-dṛśām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca mama vṛttāntaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijānann api gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaidyarājaṃ samāhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaidyarājam upāgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca mama vṛtta-antaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijānann api gomukhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaidya-rājaṃ samāhūya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaidya-rājam upāgamat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mamālāpam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāyacchāyāṃ vilokya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradhārya cāparair vaidyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanakair idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mamā alāpam ākarṇya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāya-cchāyāṃ vilokya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pradhārya ca aparair vaidyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śanakair idam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mānaso 'sya vikāro 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īpsitālābhahetukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāsmai rucitaṃ yat tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśu saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mānaso 'sya vikāro 'yam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īpsita-a-lābha-hetukaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena asmai rucitaṃ yat tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āśu saṃpādyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nandopanandābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃskāryāhāram ādarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māṃ punarvasuhastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ prāg abhojayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nanda-upanandābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃskārya-āhāram ādarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>māṃ punarvasu-hastena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhaḥ prāg abhojayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cāhāraḥ susaṃskāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lobhano 'py amṛtāśinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>triphalākvāthavaddveṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mamāṅgāni vyadhūnayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa cā ahāraḥ su-saṃskāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lobhano 'py amṛta-āśinām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tri-phalā-kvāthavad-dveṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama aṅgāni vyadhūnayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato nandopanandābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhojyamānaḥ krameṇa tau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saviṣādau karomi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣādāv iva vairiṇau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato nanda-upanandābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhojyamānaḥ krameṇa tau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-viṣādau karomi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viṣā-dāv iva vairiṇau ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu vandhyaprayatneṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhaḥ priyadarśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lajjāmandapadanyāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>namitānanam ānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>teṣu vandhya-prayatneṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhaḥ priyadarśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lajjā-manda-pada-nyāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>namita-ānanam ānayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa māṃ samānaparyaṅka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhyam adhyāsitas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grāsān agrāsayat ṣaḍ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapta vā gomukhājñayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa māṃ samāna-paryaṅka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhyam adhyāsitas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>grāsān agrāsayat ṣaḍ vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sapta vā gomukha-ājñayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_26.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye tatpāṇisarojasaṅgasubhagā grāsā mayā svāditās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taiḥ sadyas tanutām anīyata sa me saṃkalpajanmā jvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śailendrāḥ śuciśukrabhānudahanapluṣṭopalādhityakā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandair apy udabindubhir navatarair ujjhanti saṃtaptatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_26.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye tat-pāṇi-saro-ja-saṅga-su-bhagā- grāsā- mayā svāditās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taiḥ sadyas tanutām anīyata sa me saṃkalpa-janmā jvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śaila-indrāḥ śuci-śukra-bhānu-dahana-pluṣṭa-upala-adhityakā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mandair apy uda-bindubhir navatarair ujjhanti saṃtaptatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ samāpitāhāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdām eva saṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyadarśanam āliṅgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anaṅgonmūlitatrapaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ samāpita-āhāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suhṛdām eva saṃnidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyadarśanam āliṅgam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>an-aṅga-unmūlita-trapaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha krodhāruṇamukho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhaḥ priyadarśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāṇāv ākṛṣya tvaritaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svagṛhān pratiyātavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha krodha-aruṇa-mukho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukhaḥ priyadarśanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāṇāv ākṛṣya tvaritaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sva-gṛhān pratiyātavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa mayoktaḥ samāyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodhavistīrṇacakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāṇḍityāndhaka mitrāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma tiṣṭhaḥ puro mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa maya ūktaḥ samāyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krodha-vistīrṇa-cakṣuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pāṇḍitya-andhaka mitra-are</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā sma tiṣṭhaḥ puro mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pipāsor madhuśauṇḍasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhuśuktiṃ haret karāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya yas tasya kas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arātir aparaḥ paraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pipāsor madhu-śauṇḍasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>madhu-śuktiṃ haret karāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasya yas tasya kas tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arātir aparaḥ paraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktaḥ sa viṣādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyājitaś campakābhatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāhuṇeva tuṣārāṃśur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agamad dhūmadhūmratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity uktaḥ sa viṣādena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tyājitaś campaka-ābhatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāhuṇa īva tuṣāra-aṃśur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agamad dhūma-dhūmratām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca dīrgham ahaḥśeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyatāṃ ca vibhāvarīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravṛddhair gamayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣādāsanacaṅkramaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ ca dīrgham ahaḥ-śeṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyatāṃ ca vibhāvarīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravṛddhair gamayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣāda-āsana-caṅkramaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suhṛdvṛndavṛtaḥ prāyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dveṣyāśeṣavinodanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyadarśanasaṃprāpter</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāyam agaveṣayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suhṛd-vṛnda-vṛtaḥ prāyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dveṣya-a-śeṣa-vinodanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyadarśana-saṃprāpter</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upāyam agaveṣayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃprāye ca vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhavaloṣṇīṣakañcukau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vismitau ciram ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthavirau mām avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ-prāye ca vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhavala-uṣṇīṣa-kañcukau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vismitau ciram ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthavirau mām avocatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃnimittam api brahman</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmadattaḥ prajeśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavantam icchati draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iṣṭaṃ ced gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ-nimittam api brahman</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmadattaḥ praja-īśvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavantam icchati draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iṣṭaṃ ced gamyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam ākarṇya yat satyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īṣad ākulamānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhasya smarāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vicāracaturaṃ manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam ākarṇya yat satyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īṣad ākula-mānasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gomukhasya smarāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vicāra-caturaṃ manaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ gacchāni na gacchāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchataḥ kiṃ bhaved iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vitarkya kṣaṇam āsīn me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdehacchedanī matiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ gacchāni na gacchāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchataḥ kiṃ bhaved iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vitarkya kṣaṇam āsīn me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃdeha-ccheda-nī matiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo bandhavyo 'tha vā vadhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na sa kañcukidūtakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa hi śṛṅkhalanistriṃśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇibhiḥ parivāryate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yo bandhavyo 'tha vā vadhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na sa kañcuki-dūtakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa hi śṛṅkhala-nistriṃśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇibhiḥ parivāryate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye ca kecij janā yeṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣaye sukham āsate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājñām ājñām avajñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ jīvanti te katham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye ca ke-cij janā- yeṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣaye sukham āsate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājñām ājñām avajñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ jīvanti te katham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amandaspandam etac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāṅkṣitām akṣi dakṣiṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyatīva priyāprāptiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahyaṃ tad gamanaṃ hitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-manda-spandam etac ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāṅkṣitām akṣi dakṣiṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyati iva priyā-prāptiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahyaṃ tad gamanaṃ hitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niścityetyādi nirgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhāt pravahaṇaṃ bahiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kañcukyānītam adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārukṣaṃ cāviśaṅkitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niścitya ity-ādi nirgatya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛhāt pravahaṇaṃ bahiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kañcukya-ānītam adrākṣam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārukṣaṃ ca a-viśaṅkitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paurasaṃghātasaṃbādhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājamārgaṃ vyatītya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājadvāraṃ vrajāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citramaṅgalamaṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paura-saṃghāta-saṃbādhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja-mārgaṃ vyatītya ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-dvāraṃ vrajāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>citra-maṅgala-maṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukhākhyāpitābhikhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad adhyāsya kṣaṇaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāvikṣaṃ prathamāṃ kakṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvāḥsthavṛndābhinanditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gomukha-ākhyāpita-abhikhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad adhyāsya kṣaṇaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāvikṣaṃ prathamāṃ kakṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvāḥ-stha-vṛnda-abhinanditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samṛddhiḥ srūyatāṃ tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtaṃ vā tatpraśaṃsayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko hi varṇayituṃ śakto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naro meror adhityakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samṛddhiḥ srūyatāṃ tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtaṃ vā tat-praśaṃsayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko hi varṇayituṃ śakto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naro meror adhityakām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām atikramya pañcānyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛṣṭatararamyatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saptamyāṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāsthānaṃ mahīpateḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām atikramya pañca anyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakṛṣṭatara-ramyatāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saptamyāṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-sthānaṃ mahī-pateḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutismṛtipurāṇādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>granthasāgarapāragaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanurvedāditattvajñaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalādakṣaiś ca sevitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śruti-smṛti-purāṇa-ādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>grantha-sāgara-pāra-gaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanur-veda-ādi-tattva-jñaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalā-dakṣaiś ca sevitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viruddhaṃ bibhrataṃ mūrtyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candramaḥsavitṛprabhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukhasevyaṃ durīkṣaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taptāṃśum iva haimanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viruddhaṃ bibhrataṃ mūrtyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candramaḥ-savitṛ-prabhām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sukha-sevyaṃ dur-īkṣaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tapta-aṃśum iva haimanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svastikṛtvā tatas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātarūpāṅgam ānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhyatiṣṭhaṃ nṛpādiṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvikārāmbarāvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svasti-kṛtvā tatas tasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāta-rūpa-aṅgam ānasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhyatiṣṭhaṃ nṛpa-ādiṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirvikāra-ambara-āvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nṛpas tu māṃ ciraṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>snehasnigdhāyatekṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatas tārakarājākhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>senābhṛtāram aikṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nṛpas tu māṃ ciraṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sneha-snigdha-āyata-īkṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatas tārakarāja-ākhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>senā-bhṛtāram aikṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu mām abhitaḥ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryamātrasya vācakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avocad vacanaṃ cāru</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vispaṣṭamadhurākṣaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa tu mām abhitaḥ sthitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kārya-mātrasya vācakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avocad vacanaṃ cāru</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vispaṣṭa-madhura-akṣaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āryajyeṣṭha manas tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avikṣiptaṃ kuru kṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājā manmukhasaṃkrāntair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vākyais tvām eṣa bhāṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārya-jyeṣṭha manas tāvad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>a-vikṣiptaṃ kuru kṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājā man-mukha-saṃkrāntair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vākyais tvām eṣa bhāṣate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yeyaṃ bhāgīrathīśubhrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśibhūpatisaṃtatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā kim ākhyāyate tubhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prathitā pṛthivīva yā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ya īyaṃ bhāgīrathī-śubhrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāśi-bhū-pati-saṃtatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā kim ākhyāyate tubhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prathitā pṛthivi īva yā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyām asya prasūtasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ye guṇās te 'pi te buddhāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiśirāṃśor ivāṃśavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyām asya prasūtasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>brahmadattasya bhū-pateḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ye guṇās te 'pi te buddhāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śiśira-aṃśor iva aṃśavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyāsīt kāliyo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṣṭhī prāṇapriyaḥ suhṛt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saphalair draviṇair yasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>draviṇeśo 'pi lajjitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyā asīt kāliyo nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṣṭhī prāṇa-priyaḥ suhṛt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-phalair draviṇair yasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>draviṇa-īśo 'pi lajjitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antarvatyām asau patnyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītaḥ puṇyais tripiṣṭapam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha sā gṛhiṇī tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāle putraṃ vyajāyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>antarvatyām asau patnyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nītaḥ puṇyais tri-piṣṭapam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha sā gṛhiṇī tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāle putraṃ vyajāyata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmiñ jāte mahārājaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svātmajād api harṣade</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pure sāntaḥpure ramyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāmaham akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmiñ jāte mahā-rājaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-atma-jād api harṣa-de</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pure sa-antaḥ-pure ramyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahā-maham akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kṛtāśeṣasaṃskāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiśur gacchan kumāratām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgair vidyākalābhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakalābhir alaṃkṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kṛta-a-śeṣa-saṃskāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śiśur gacchan kumāratām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgair vidyā-kalābhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakalābhir alaṃkṛtaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃprāye ca vṛttānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvāḥsthair vijñāpito nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvāre vaḥ kāliyaḥ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiṣṭhatīti sasaṃbhramaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ-prāye ca vṛtta-ante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvāḥ-sthair vijñāpito nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvāre vaḥ kāliyaḥ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tiṣṭhati iti sa-saṃbhramaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś citrīyamāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa nṛpeṇa praveśitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kas tvaṃ kasya kuto veti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭaś cedam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataś citrīyamāṇena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa nṛpeṇa praveśitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kas tvaṃ kasya kuto va īti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pṛṣṭaś ca idam abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>devāhaṃ kāliyaḥ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devena svaśarīravat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lālitaḥ pālitaś cāsaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śikṣitaś cākhilāḥ kalāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deva ahaṃ kāliyaḥ śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devena sva-śarīravat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lālitaḥ pālitaś cā asaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śikṣitaś ca a-khilāḥ kalāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ sucaritair aṅgaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhād yuṣmatprasādajāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cyāvayitvā divaṃ nīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na hi nāśo 'sti karmaṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'haṃ su-caritair aṅgaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sukhād yuṣmat-prasāda-jāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cyāvayitvā divaṃ nīto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na hi nāśo 'sti karmaṇām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsau bhavatāṃ dāsī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durmanāḥ sumanāḥ sutām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātāṃ putra iti khyātim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anayal lobhadūṣitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asau bhavatāṃ dāsī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dur-manāḥ sumanāḥ sutām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātāṃ putra iti khyātim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anayal lobha-dūṣitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛṣāvādena tenāsyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suralokād ahaṃ cyutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāryayā hi kṛtaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patyāv api vipacyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛṣā-vādena tena asyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sura-lokād ahaṃ cyutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāryayā hi kṛtaṃ karma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patyāv api vipacyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kule ca kulaputrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāto jātismaraḥ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etam īdṛśam ākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vahāmi jananinditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kule ca kula-putrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāto jāti-smaraḥ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etam īdṛśam ākāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vahāmi jana-ninditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau ca yuvatir jātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntākārā ca dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmaicid abhirūpāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varāya pratipādyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau ca yuvatir jātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kānta-ākārā ca dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasmai-cid abhirūpāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varāya pratipādyatām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy etam ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgavaikalyaninditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayāge saṃnyasiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthāpayata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aham apy etam ātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅga-vaikalya-ninditam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayāge saṃnyasiṣyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prasthāpayata mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādy uktavān ukto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vismitena sa bhūbhṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvaṃ yad āvayor vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat kiṃcit smaryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādy uktavān ukto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vismitena sa bhū-bhṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pūrvaṃ yad āvayor vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat kiṃ-cit smaryatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anenāpi vihasyoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yad devāya rocate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asaṃdigdhaṃ suviśrabdhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tat pṛṣṭatu mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena api vihasya uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yad devāya rocate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-saṃdigdhaṃ su-viśrabdhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tat pṛṣṭatu mām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athādhyāya ciraṃ rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yat pṛṣṭaṃ cirantanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśeṣaṃ tat tad etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saviśeṣaṃ niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā adhyāya ciraṃ rājñā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yat pṛṣṭaṃ cirantanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>a-śeṣaṃ tat tad etena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-viśeṣaṃ niveditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athātyadbhutam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātasaṃpratyayo nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhainaṃ dārikā kasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāmātre dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aty-adbhutam ity uktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jāta-saṃpratyayo nṛpaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āha enaṃ dārikā kasmai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāmātre dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu paritoṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>skhaladakṣaram uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rocate yo varas tasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmai sā dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ tu paritoṣeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>skhalad-akṣaram uktavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rocate yo varas tasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmai sā dīyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato 'ntaḥpuram ānāyya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā sārdham ṛṣidattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭā devīsamūhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hriyā kūrmāṅganākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato 'ntaḥ-puram ānāyya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā sārdham ṛṣidattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pṛṣṭā devī-samūhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hriyā kūrma-aṅgana-ākṛtiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau cāsau ca jāmātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kularūpādibhūṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavatyai rocate neti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātar ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau ca asau ca jāmātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kula-rūpa-ādi-bhūṣaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavatyai rocate na iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mātar ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāruṇakarachāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapolekṣaṇayānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṇḍarīkam ivāvāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantharaṃ calitaṃ śiraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha aruṇa-kara-chāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapola-īkṣaṇaya ānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puṇḍarīkam iva a-vāte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mantharaṃ calitaṃ śiraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāryajyeṣṭha ity ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasannākṣikapolayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svedārdrāṃśukayā prāgvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tad vicalitaṃ śiraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athā arya-jyeṣṭha ity ukte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasanna-akṣi-kapolayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sveda-ārdra-aṃśukayā prāgvan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na tad vicalitaṃ śiraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad bhavān rūcitas tasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛpāya ca yatas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adyaiva śreṣṭhikanyāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇim ālambatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad bhavān rūcitas tasyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛpāya ca yatas tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adya eva śreṣṭhi-kanyāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇim ālambatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato mandaspṛheṇeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā anādaramantharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhītāntaḥpuradṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirād idam udīritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tato manda-spṛheṇa iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayā an-ādara-mantharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhīta-antaḥ-pura-dṛṣṭena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirād idam udīritam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avanter aham āyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha bhrātrā kanīyasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vedaśāstrāgamāyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na yoṣitprāptivāñchayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avanter aham āyātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saha bhrātrā kanīyasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>veda-śāstra-āgamāya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na yoṣit-prāpti-vāñchayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu bhūbhartur ādeśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>durlaṅghyaḥ puravāsibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yogakṣemārthibhir bhavyais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād evaṃ bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu bhū-bhartur ādeśo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dur-laṅghyaḥ pura-vāsibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yoga-kṣema-arthibhir bhavyais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmād evaṃ bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn antare mandraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satālatumuladhvani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratidhvānadhvanadvyoma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prādhvanat tūryamaṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etasminn antare mandraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa-tāla-tumula-dhvani</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratidhvāna-dhvanad-vyoma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prādhvanat tūrya-maṇḍalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś ca saṃvatsareṇāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥsaṃbhāro nṛpaiḥ paraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivāhārthaḥ sa saṃbhāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājñā saṃbhāritaḥ kṣaṇāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaś ca saṃvatsareṇa api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>duḥ-saṃbhāro nṛpaiḥ paraiḥ</seg> </l>
