<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vivāha-arthaḥ sa saṃbhāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājñā saṃbhāritaḥ kṣaṇāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sāntaḥpuro rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa sadārasuhṛdgaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājājire mamodāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karagraham akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ sa-antaḥ-puro rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa sa-dāra-suhṛd-gaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rāja-ajire mama udāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kara-graham akārayat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>datvā tataḥ śreṣṭhipadaṃ nagaryāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vittaṃ ca bhūmaṇḍalamūlyatulyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samṛddhim anveṣya ca kāliyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāsthāpayan māṃ mudito narendraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>datvā tataḥ śreṣṭhi-padaṃ nagaryāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vittaṃ ca bhū-maṇḍala-mūlya-tulyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samṛddhim anveṣya ca kāliyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāsthāpayan māṃ mudito nara-indraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama lokoktir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyaṃ mayy eva saṃprati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhamāno yathā rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṣṭhī jāta iti sthitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca mama loka-uktir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iyaṃ mayy eva saṃprati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vardhamāno yathā rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṣṭhī jāta iti sthitā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nandopanandādyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛddhaprītivismayaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyadarśanayā cāsmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha kṣiptaśacīpatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nanda-upananda-ādyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravṛddha-prīti-vismayaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyadarśanayā ca asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saha kṣipta-śacī-patiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahorātre tv atikrānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa gomukham apaśyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāvyasanasaṃkīrṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ivāsīn me mahotsavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho-rātre tv atikrānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa gomukham a-paśyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahā-vyasana-saṃkīrṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ivā asīn me mahā-utsavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca me vilakṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vilakṣaṃ gomukhaṃ balāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidagdhasuhṛdāṃ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>api nāmānayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīc ca me vilakṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vilakṣaṃ gomukhaṃ balāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidagdha-suhṛdāṃ kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>api nāmā anayed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃmānayantaṃ tam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ānatān puravāsinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adrākṣaṃ bhṛtyavargaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃcarantam itas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ saṃmānayantaṃ tam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ānatān pura-vāsinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adrākṣaṃ bhṛtya-vargaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃcarantam itas tataḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā diṅ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vilakṣakam akāraṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balād ānāyayāmy enaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ duḥkhāsikayā mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>cintitaṃ ca mayā diṅ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vilakṣakam a-kāraṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>balād ānāyayāmy enaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ duḥkha-āsikayā mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nandopanandābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asāv ānāyito mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnaḥ smayamānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sopālambham ivoditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha nanda-upanandābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asāv ānāyito mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsīnaḥ smayamānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-upālambham iva uditaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ gomukhaḥ sakhā yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prājñaṃmanyo na vidyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya sādhyāni kāryāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na sidhyantīti so 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ gomukhaḥ sakhā yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prājñaṃ-manyo na vidyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya sādhyāni kāryāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na sidhyanti iti so 'bravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvaprāṇabhṛtām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purākṛtakṛtaṃ phalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tu tatkāraṇair yogyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinā sidhyati kasyacit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarva-prāṇa-bhṛtām eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purā-kṛta-kṛtaṃ phalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na tu tat-kāraṇair yogyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinā sidhyati kasya-cit ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad apīdaṃ mahat kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhiḥ kila sādhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatrāpi gomukhasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prājñaṃmanyasya kauśalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad api idaṃ mahat kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhiḥ kila sādhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra api gomukhasya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prājñaṃ-manyasya kauśalam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhavaḥ prabhavanto hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>doṣābhāse manāg api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛtyān udvejayanty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ kiṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhavaḥ prabhavanto hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>doṣa-ābhāse manāg api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛtyān udvejayanty eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>teṣāṃ kiṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim asmin bhavatā kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtam ity udite mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyātum ayam ārabdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyatāṃ yan mayā kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kim asmin bhavatā kārye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛtam ity udite mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākhyātum ayam ārabdhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrūyatāṃ yan mayā kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty ahaṃ bhartsitaḥ kruddhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhiḥ svagṛhaṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra prāvṛtya mūrdhānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patitvā śayano sthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty ahaṃ bhartsitaḥ kruddhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuṣmābhiḥ sva-gṛhaṃ gataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra prāvṛtya mūrdhānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>patitvā śayano sthitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas trasaddrutagirā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭo 'ham ṛṣidattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti tasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na mayā dattam uttaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas trasad-druta-girā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛṣṭo 'ham ṛṣidattayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim etad iti tasya eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na mayā dattam uttaram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā yadā dṛḍhanibandhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛcchati sma punaḥ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmadvṛttāntam akhilaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā kathitavān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā yadā dṛḍha-nibandhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pṛcchati sma punaḥ punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmad-vṛtta-antam a-khilaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadā kathitavān aham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sātha pramodabāṣpārdra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapolāpṛcchad ādarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vatseśvarasutaḥ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āryajyeṣṭho bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ātha pramoda-bāṣpa-ardra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kapola āpṛcchad ādarāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vatsa-īśvara-sutaḥ kaś-cid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ārya-jyeṣṭho bhaved iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śapathaiḥ pratiṣidhyaināṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvadvṛttāntaprakāśanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āma subhrū sa evāyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti tasyai nyavedayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śapathaiḥ pratiṣidhya enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvad-vṛtta-anta-prakāśanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āma su-bhrū sa eva ayam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>iti tasyai nyavedayam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsau sthiradhīratvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukha śrūyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāsūyā sapramodeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām uktvākathayat kathām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asau sthira-dhīratvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gomukha śrūyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-asūyā sa-pramoda īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mām uktva ākathayat kathām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīt sumanasaḥ kāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyā vidyādharī sakhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divyajñānā marudvegā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāmnā ca priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āsīt sumanasaḥ ka āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>priyā vidyā-dharī sakhī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divya-jñānā marud-vegā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāmnā ca priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā yadṛcchāgatā caināṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasaṅge kvacid abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaṃ mām āpadi kaṣṭāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vartamānā smarer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā yadṛccha-āgatā ca enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasaṅge kva-cid abravīt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaṃ mām āpadi kaṣṭāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vartamānā smarer iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śreṣṭhini kālena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nīte vaivasvatakṣayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreṣṭhinyāḥ kanyakā jātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śokānalaghṛtāhutiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śreṣṭhini kālena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nīte vaivasvata-kṣayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śreṣṭhinyāḥ kanyakā jātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śoka-anala-ghṛta-āhutiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyās tv āsīd aputrāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>draviṇasyātibhūriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sārasyāsyāsmadīyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pālakaḥ ko bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asyās tv āsīd a-putrāyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>draviṇasya ati-bhūriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sārasya asya asmadīyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pālakaḥ ko bhaviṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktā cāsmi purā sakhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyasane māṃ smarer iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataś cintitamātraiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadṛśe priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktā ca asmi purā sakhyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyasane māṃ smarer iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataś cintita-mātra aiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadṛśe priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ cāsau dārikāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakarṣapramadasmitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avocat sakhi mā bhaiṣīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janayitvedṛśīṃ sutām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ ca asau dārikāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prakarṣa-pramada-smitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avocat sakhi mā bhaiṣīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janayitvā īdṛśīṃ sutām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣā vidyādharendrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaviṣyati bhaviṣyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyā priyatamā tasmāj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jṛmbhantāṃ tūryapaṅktayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣā vidyā-dhara-indrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaviṣyati bhaviṣyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyā priyatamā tasmāj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jṛmbhantāṃ tūrya-paṅktayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athāsāv oṣadhīgarbhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baddhvā tasyāḥ sphuratkaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyāyā hāṭakaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṇṭhe gaṇḍakam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha asāv oṣadhī-garbhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baddhvā tasyāḥ sphurat-karam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kanyāyā- hāṭakaṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṇṭhe gaṇḍakam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhāvād oṣadher asyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>striyam enāṃ satīṃ janāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>drakṣyanti puruṣaṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣyaccakravartinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabhāvād oṣadher asyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>striyam enāṃ satīṃ janāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>drakṣyanti puruṣaṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaviṣyac-cakravartinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amalānantapuṇyatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvajñāś cakravartinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyanti hi yathābhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>a-mala-an-anta-puṇyatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-jñāś cakravartinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśyanti hi yathā-bhūtam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yaḥ striyam evaināṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draṣṭā sa bhavati dhruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakravartī patiś cāsyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvavidyādharādhipaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yaḥ striyam eva enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>draṣṭā sa bhavati dhruvam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakravartī patiś ca asyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarva-vidyā-dhara-adhipaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>oṣadhir yā ca kaṇṭhe 'syāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā nāmnā priyadarśanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idam eva ca nāmāsyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praśastaṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>oṣadhir yā ca kaṇṭhe 'syāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā nāmnā priyadarśanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>idam eva ca nāma asyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praśastaṃ kriyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yo 'yaṃ puraśreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣaḥ priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyādharendrayogyeyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadā priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena yo 'yaṃ pura-śreṣṭhī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣaḥ priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā-dhara-indra-yogya īyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramadā priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ ca vīṇāsamasyāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad uktaṃ cakravartinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciraṃ sundari jīveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tenaiva viditaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ ca vīṇā-samasyāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad uktaṃ cakravartinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciraṃ sundari jīva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena eva viditaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na hi śaktaḥ striyaṃ draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>enām avanigocaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yas tu paśyati sma vyaktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakravartīty abhūn mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na hi śaktaḥ striyaṃ draṣṭum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>enām avanigocaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yas tu paśyati sma vyaktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakravarti īty abhūn mama ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ ca gomukha eveti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadaiva jñātavaty aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarūpaḥ savayāś cānyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāsti yac cakravartinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvaṃ ca gomukha eva iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tada aiva jñātavaty- aham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa-rūpaḥ sa-vayāś ca anyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na asti yac cakravartinaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rūpaṃ ca yuvarājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tava cānāyitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kauśāmbītaḥ paṭe nyastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tac ca niścayakāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rūpaṃ ca yuva-rājasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tava cā anāyitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kauśāmbītaḥ paṭe nyastaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tac ca niścaya-kāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādibhir mayā cihnair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayam avyabhicāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakravartīti vijñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścimaṃ stanadarśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādibhir mayā cihnair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayam a-vyabhicāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cakravarti īti vijñātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paścimaṃ stana-darśanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ punar ghaṭanopāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryaḥ sa bhavatānayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghaṭane durghaṭasyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturo hi bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ punar ghaṭana-upāyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryaḥ sa bhavata ānayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ghaṭane dur-ghaṭasya api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturo hi bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evamādi tataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>spṛhayāmi sma mṛtyave</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmān niścitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trayaṃ maraṇakāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evam-ādi tataḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>spṛhayāmi sma mṛtyave</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmān niścitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trayaṃ maraṇa-kāraṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā satyaṃ bruvad bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mithyā brūteti kheditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atra jīvati yas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛta evāmṛtopamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā satyaṃ bruvad bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mithyā brūta iti kheditaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atra jīvati yas tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛta eva amṛta-upamaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāṇḍityāndhasuhṛdvairi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā sma tiṣṭha puro mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti yaḥ svāminādiṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya mṛtyum arhotsavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāṇḍitya-andha-suhṛd-vairi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā sma tiṣṭha puro mama</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti yaḥ svāminā ādiṣṭas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasya mṛtyum arha-utsavaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na cāsti durghaṭasyāsya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghaṭane mama kauśalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmān maraṇam evāstu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhik prāṇān duḥsthitān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca asti dur-ghaṭasya asya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghaṭane mama kauśalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasmān maraṇam eva astu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhik prāṇān duḥ-sthitān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niryātaś ca purībāhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maraṇopāyalipsayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasyāpy adṛṣṭarūpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācam aśrauṣam ambare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niryātaś ca purī-bāhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maraṇa-upāya-lipsayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kasya apy a-dṛṣṭa-rūpasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vācam aśrauṣam ambare ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viparyasta nivartasva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nindyān maraṇaniścayāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi duḥkhakṣayopāyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtyur iṣṭaḥ satām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viparyasta nivartasva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nindyān maraṇa-niścayāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi duḥkha-kṣaya-upāyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtyur iṣṭaḥ satām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śithilitodvego</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>girā khecarayānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puraḥ puruṣam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>skandhāropitadārakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ śithilita-udvego</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>girā khe-caraya ānayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>puraḥ puruṣam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>skandha-āropita-dārakam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau ca dārakaḥ kuṇṭhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khañjaḥ kubjaḥ pṛthūdaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti saṃtakṣitaḥ pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karkaśair vacanakṣuraiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau ca dārakaḥ kuṇṭhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khañjaḥ kubjaḥ pṛthu-udaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iti saṃtakṣitaḥ pitrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karkaśair vacana-kṣuraiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mriyasva dharṣiṇīputra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pretakhāditamātṛka</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vahāmi na puṣṇāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantaṃ niṣprayojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mriyasva dharṣiṇī-putra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>preta-khādita-mātṛka</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vahāmi na puṣṇāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavantaṃ niṣ-prayojanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa tvāṃ gāḍham āveṣṭya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grīvāṃ bhittvāthavā śiraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mārayiṣyāmi tad gaccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaivasvatapurīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.104'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eṣa tvāṃ gāḍham āveṣṭya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>grīvāṃ bhittva āthavā śiraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mārayiṣyāmi tad gaccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vaivasvata-purīm iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tena vihasyoktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā vākṣīr mā ca māṃ puṣaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etāvatā hi te kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na madīyena mṛtyunā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.105'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tena vihasya uktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mā vākṣīr mā ca māṃ puṣaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etāvatā hi te kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na madīyena mṛtyunā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayāpi kila kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahat kāryaṃ mahātmanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad bhavān māṃ sahasreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikrīnītāṃ mahātmasu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.106'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya āpi kila kartavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahat kāryaṃ mahā-ātmanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad bhavān māṃ sahasreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vikrīnītāṃ mahā-ātmasu ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahasraṃ yac ca tad dattaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paryāptaṃ jīvanaṃ yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā sma tasmād vinā kāryān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mārayan māṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.107'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahasraṃ yac ca tad dattaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paryāptaṃ jīvanaṃ yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mā sma tasmād vinā kāryān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mārayan māṃ bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīn mahātmānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ke 'nye yuṣmaj jagattraye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kutaś cānyan mahat kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmajjīvitarakṣaṇāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.108'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīn mahā-ātmānaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ke 'nye yuṣmaj jagat-traye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kutaś ca anyan mahat kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuṣmaj-jīvita-rakṣaṇāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahasraṃ te na yat kiṃcit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>koṭyāpi yadi labhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tucchamūlyas tathāpy eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛṇamuṣṭisamā hi sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.109'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahasraṃ te na yat kiṃ-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>koṭya āpi yadi labhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tuccha-mūlyas tatha āpy eṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛṇa-muṣṭi-samā hi sā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat tad ityādi niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛham ānāyya taṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīṇāmi sma sahasreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cintāmaṇim ivāśmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.110'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tat tad ity-ādi niścitya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gṛham ānāyya taṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>krīṇāmi sma sahasreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cintā-maṇim iva aśmanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattām athāvocaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvat smarasi kiṃcana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pracchannaṃ śreṣṭhino vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvan me kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.111'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ṛṣidattām atha avocaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yāvat smarasi kiṃ-cana</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pracchannaṃ śreṣṭhino vṛttaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvan me kathyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāliyena ca rājñā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yat kāryaṃ rahaḥ kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat tat sumanase bhartrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathitaṃ dhīracetase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.112'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāliyena ca rājñā ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad yat kāryaṃ rahaḥ kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat tat su-manase bhartrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathitaṃ dhīra-cetase ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca śrutadharā kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājñaḥ śrutavatī guru</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā tad ṛṣidattāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duṣprakāśaṃ prakāśitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.113'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yac ca śruta-dharā kāryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājñaḥ śrutavatī guru</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayā tad ṛṣidattāyai</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duṣ-prakāśaṃ prakāśitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tayā ca tan mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kubjāya kathitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kubjena brahmadattāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śeṣaṃ pratyakṣam eva ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.114'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā tayā ca tan mahyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kubjāya kathitaṃ mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kubjena brahmadattāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śeṣaṃ pratyakṣam eva ca ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad yuṣmabhir yad ādiṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad atra bhavatā kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad ācakṣveti kāryaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etad atra mayā kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.115'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad yuṣmabhir yad ādiṣṭaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yad atra bhavatā kṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad ācakṣva iti kāryaṃ tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etad atra mayā kṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādy ākarṇya tat tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>indrajālādhikādbhutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāśaṃsaṃ caritaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praśasyā hi guṇādhikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādy ākarṇya tat tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>indra-jāla-adhika-adbhutam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāśaṃsaṃ caritaṃ tasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praśasyā- hi guṇa-adhikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_27.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kā vidyādharacakravartipadake tucchā ratir mādṛśaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>suprāpaṃ dharaṇīcarair yad aparaiḥ krodhādivaśyair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajñādhikkṛtadevadānavagurur yeṣāṃ suhṛd gomukhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te yat piṣṭapasaptakāptivimukhās tatkarmaṇāṃ jṛmbhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_27.117'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kā vidyā-dhara-cakravarti-padake tucchā ratir mādṛśaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>su-prāpaṃ dharaṇī-carair yad aparaiḥ krodha-ādi-vaśyair api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajñā-dhik-kṛta-deva-dānava-gurur yeṣāṃ suhṛd gomukhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>te yat piṣṭapa-saptaka-āpti-vimukhās tat-karmaṇāṃ jṛmbhitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ vārāṇasīstaṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāramitrair upāsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upātiṣṭhanta kāśikyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṇayaḥ paṇyapāṇayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ vārāṇasī-staṃ māṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāra-mitrair upāsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upātiṣṭhanta kāśikyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṇayaḥ paṇya-pāṇayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃś ca bhāṣitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvavṛttāntakovidaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam āryakaniṣṭho vaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṇiśresṭhī bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃś ca bhāṣitavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarva-vṛtta-anta-kovidaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam ārya-kaniṣṭho vaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śreṇi-śresṭhī bhavatv iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha yāte kvacit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saudhe sapriyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sopāne tāram aśrauṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>haṃsānām iva nisvanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha yāte kva-cit kāle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saudhe sa-priyadarśanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sopāne tāram aśrauṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>haṃsānām iva nisvanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīn na haṃsānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nūpurāṇām ayaṃ dhvaniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padamantharasaṃcāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yac cāvicchinnasaṃtatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīn na haṃsānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nūpurāṇām ayaṃ dhvaniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pada-manthara-saṃcāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yac ca a-vicchinna-saṃtatiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na caiṣa kulanārīṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upapattyā virudhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utsavābhyudayeṣv eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tā hi bibhrati bhūṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca eṣa kula-nārīṇām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upapattyā virudhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utsava-abhyudayeṣv eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tā- hi bibhrati bhūṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tenāntaḥpurasaṃcāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vārastrīcaraṇocitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim artham api sopāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caraty ābharaṇadhvani ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena antaḥ-pura-saṃcāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vāra-strī-caraṇa-ucitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim artham api sopāne</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caraty ābharaṇa-dhvani ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca vimṛśann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tārābharaṇaśiñjitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citrāṃśukadharā nārīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ rūḍhayauvanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca vimṛśann eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tāra-ābharaṇa-śiñjitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>citra-aṃśuka-dharā- nārīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ rūḍha-yauvanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāsāṃ kumudikā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lokalocanakaumudī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pragalbhāpi vinīteva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanditvā mām abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāsāṃ kumudikā nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>loka-locana-kaumudī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pragalbha āpi vinīta īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanditvā mām abhāṣata ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āryajyeṣṭhaṃ yaśobhāgin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavato bhartṛdārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpayati vanditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādaraṃ rājadārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārya-jyeṣṭhaṃ yaśo-bhāgin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavato bhartṛ-dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vijñāpayati vanditvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādaraṃ rāja-dārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā vratakam uddiśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūjitā devatādvijāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṇṭakas tasya yuṣmābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sadārair gṛhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayā vratakam uddiśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūjitā- devatā-dvijāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaṇṭakas tasya yuṣmābhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-dārair gṛhyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mahyaṃ susaṃskāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā samudraṃ samudgakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāsaḥkusumagandhāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hārigandhān upāsarat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha mahyaṃ su-saṃskāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā sa-mudraṃ samudgakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vāsaḥ-kusuma-gandhāṃś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hāri-gandhān upāsarat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athodvṛtya jagatsārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau mahyam adarśayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dviprakārān alaṃkārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naranārījanocitān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha udvṛtya jagat-sārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asau mahyam adarśayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvi-prakārān alaṃkārān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nara-nārī-jana-ucitān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ dvayam apy etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arhati priyadarśanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>preṣitaṃ yoṣitā yat tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yoṣid eva yato 'rhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ dvayam apy etad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arhati priyadarśanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>preṣitaṃ yoṣitā yat tad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yoṣid eva yato 'rhati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam ākarṇya tāḥ prekṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vismitāḥ sasmitāś ca mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyai dattvā ca tad dravyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchan kṛtavandanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idam ākarṇya tāḥ prekṣya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vismitāḥ sa-smitāś ca mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasyai dattvā ca tad dravyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>agacchan kṛta-vandanāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaśobhāginn iti śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tayoktaṃ pīḍito 'bhavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anabhyastaṃ hi yad yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena tad vastu duḥsaham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaśo-bhāginn iti śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taya ūktaṃ pīḍito 'bhavam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-abhyastaṃ hi yad yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena tad vastu duḥsaham ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mamāmantrayate yāvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣaḥ pramadājanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvo 'sāv āryaputreti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktvaitāṃ puruṣām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mamā amantrayate yāvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>puruṣaḥ pramadā-janaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarvo 'sāv ārya-putra iti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>muktva aitāṃ puruṣām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ cānyat kulakanyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>keyam īdṛk svatantratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yeyam asmadvidhaiḥ sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lokayātrā niraṅkuśaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ ca anyat kula-kanyānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ka īyam īdṛk sva-tantratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ya īyam asmad-vidhaiḥ sārdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>loka-yātrā nir-aṅkuśaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu kāmayamānāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāmini kāmini priye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na dhanāyaty api svāṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim aṅga dhanam adhruvam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kiṃ tu kāmayamāna āpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāmini kāmini priye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na dhanāyaty api sva-aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kim aṅga dhanam a-dhruvam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad asyāḥ ko bhaved bhāvo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayīty etad vitarkayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>andhakāramukhenāhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhena iti bhāṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad asyāḥ ko bhaved bhāvo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mayi ity etad vitarkayan</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>andha-kāra-mukhena ahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gomukhena iti bhāṣitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aryaputra duranteyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īdṛśībhir bhavādṛśām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lokayātrety athāvocam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>enaṃ parihasann iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arya-putra dur-anta īyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>īdṛśībhir bhavādṛśām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>loka-yātra īty atha avocam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>enaṃ parihasann iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>durantā vātha vā svantā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na hīyaṃ prastutā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā saṃkaṭāt trātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mamāsty eva bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dur-antā va ātha vā sv-antā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na hi iyaṃ prastutā mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha vā saṃkaṭāt trātā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mama asty eva bhavān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tasminn ahorātre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gate kumudikādikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgatyedam abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>savrīḍāvinayā iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tasminn aho-rātre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gate kumudikā-ādikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āgatya idam abhāṣanta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-vrīḍā-vinayā- iva ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aryaputrāryaduhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vanditvā rājadārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmaddoṣe kṛtavrīḍā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vijñāpayati sāñjaliḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arya-putra arya-duhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vanditvā rāja-dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asmad-doṣe kṛta-vrīḍā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vijñāpayati sa-añjaliḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣamaṇīyo 'yam asmākam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ācārātikramo yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muḍhabhṛtyakṛtā doṣā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>na grāhyāḥ svāminām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣamaṇīyo 'yam asmākam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ācāra-ati-kramo yataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muḍha-bhṛtya-kṛtā- doṣā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>na grāhyāḥ svāminām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayāpy uktaṃ na paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>doṣam ācaritaṃ tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asti cet kṣānta evāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathāpy ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya āpy uktaṃ na paśyāmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>doṣam ācaritaṃ tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asti cet kṣānta eva asau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha āpy ākhyāyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kumudikācaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām apṛcchan nṛpātmajā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āryajyeṣṭhas tvayālāpān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣitaḥ kīdṛśān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kumudikā ācaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām apṛcchan nṛpa-ātma-jā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ārya-jyeṣṭhas tvayā ālāpān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāṣitaḥ kī-dṛśān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āryajyeṣṭha yaśobhāginn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ityādau kathite mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāsūyā saviṣādeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vepamānedam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārya-jyeṣṭha yaśo-bhāginn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity-ādau kathite mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāsūyā sa-viṣāda īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vepamāna īdam abravīt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi vairiṇi bhartāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evaṃ vadati kāṅganā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathokto mandayā jyeṣṭho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaśobhāginn iti tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayi vairiṇi bhartāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>evaṃ vadati ka āṅganā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatha ūkto mandayā jyeṣṭho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yaśo-bhāginn iti tvayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca tvadīyam evedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacaḥ saṃbhāvayaty asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parasaṃdeśahārī hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīto gaṇikājanaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na ca tvadīyam eva idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vacaḥ saṃbhāvayaty asau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>para-saṃdeśa-hārī hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīto gaṇikā-janaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ śreṣṭhiduhitur bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'smākam api dharmataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyadarśanayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhinnaiva hi me tanuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yaḥ śreṣṭhi-duhitur bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>so 'smākam api dharmataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priyadarśanayā sārdham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-bhinna aiva hi me tanuḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aryaputras tvayā tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aryaputreti bhāṣyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā vijñāpyatāṃ cedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yathāvajñāṃ na manyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arya-putras tvayā tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arya-putra iti bhāṣyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā vijñāpyatāṃ ca idaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yatha āvajñāṃ na manyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmadarthaṃ mayā ceyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ucyatāṃ priyadarśanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vratakotsavam āsevya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāyāhne pratiyāsyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asmad-arthaṃ mayā ca iyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ucyatāṃ priyadarśanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vrataka-utsavam āsevya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāyāhne pratiyāsyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutvedam āsīn me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ko 'nyaḥ paribhavaḥ paraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etasmād yad asāv āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryā prasthāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti śrutva īdam āsīn me</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ko 'nyaḥ paribhavaḥ paraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etasmād yad asāv āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāryā prasthāpyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā vadhūs tātapādānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama bhāryā ca sā katham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭumbijanayoṣeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchet paragṛhān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yā vadhūs tāta-pādānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama bhāryā ca sā katham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭumbi-jana-yoṣa īva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gacchet para-gṛhān iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ gomukho 'vocat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim asthāne viśaṅkayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nedaṃ paragṛhaṃ devyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā viditam eva vaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha māṃ gomukho 'vocat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim a-sthāne viśaṅkayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na idaṃ para-gṛhaṃ devyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā viditam eva vaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maṅgalaṃ hi vivāhāntam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asyās tatraiva kāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tac caitac ca gṛhaṃ tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhinnaṃ dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maṅgalaṃ hi vivāha-antam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asyās tatra eva kāritam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tac ca etac ca gṛhaṃ tasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>a-bhinnaṃ dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tadvacanān nyāyyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujñātā satī mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsādāgrād avārohat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samaṃ tu priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatas tad-vacanān nyāyyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anujñātā satī mayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāsāda-agrād avārohat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samaṃ tu priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prāsādapṛṣṭhastho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāntair ujjvalamaṇḍanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gobhiḥ pravahaṇaṃ yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ rājavartmani ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha prāsāda-pṛṣṭha-stho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dāntair ujjvala-maṇḍanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gobhiḥ pravahaṇaṃ yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apaśyaṃ rāja-vartmani ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājakañcukibhir vṛddhair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anantair vetrapāṇibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārīvarṣavaraprāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>janavṛndaiś ca saṃvṛtam ||</seg> </l>

<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.39'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nārī-varṣavara-prāya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jana-vṛndaiś ca saṃvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tac ca rājakulād dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gacchatpravahaṇaṃ tataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad dinaṃ gamayāmi sma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīrghabandhanadurgamam ||</seg> </l>

</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.41'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daityocchinnaturaṃgo vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yenāstaṃ katham apy agāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sūryo 'pi tad ahar manye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhagna-akṣa-syandano bhavet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daitya-ucchinna-turaṃgo vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena astaṃ katham apy agāt ||</seg> </l>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.42'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad eva yānam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīpikāvalayāvṛtam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.42'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad eva yānam adrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dīpikā-āvalayā āvṛtam ||</seg> </l>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.43'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sopāne dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāmyantīṃ priyadarśanām ||</seg> </l>

<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.43'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sopāne dṛṣṭavān asmi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrāmyantīṃ priyadarśanām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.44'>

</lg>

<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tām ādāya tataḥ pāṇau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mada-pramada-bādhitām</seg> </l>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣaṇaṃ ca tatra viśrāntāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām āliṅgam asau ca mām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tataś caḍ iti vicchinnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatkāñcīguṇabandhanam ||</seg> </l>

<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣaṇaṃ ca tatra viśrāntāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tām āliṅgam asau ca mām</seg> </l>

</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarāṭikuraraśreṇiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pulinān nalinīm iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiñjānā raśanā śayyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tan nitambād athāpatat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarāṭi-kurara-śreṇiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pulinān nalinīm iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śiñjānā raśanā śayyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tan nitambād atha apatat ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ ca bhinnamaṇicchāyāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chatracchāditadīpikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭā mayā tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃprāptiṃ priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ ca bhinna-maṇi-cchāyāc</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chatra-cchādita-dīpikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭā mayā tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃprāptiṃ priyadarśanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahu śrotavyam atrāsti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krameṇa śrūyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uktvā ruṣṭaiva tāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sācaṣṭa sma kathām imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahu śrotavyam atra asti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krameṇa śrūyatām iti</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uktvā ruṣṭa aiva tāṃ dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā ācaṣṭa sma kathām imām ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty ahaṃ yuṣmadādeśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatā kanyāvarodhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca tatra mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mārgayantyā nṛpātmajā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asty ahaṃ yuṣmad-ādeśād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatā kanyā-avarodhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na ca tatra mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mārgayantyā nṛpa-ātma-jā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.50'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛhopavanam adhyāste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra saṃbhāvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ parijanas tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāha māṃ rāja-dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gṛha-upavanam adhyāste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra saṃbhāvyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praviśya ca mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tasminn udyānapālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasantasumanaḥkḹpta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mālābharaṇadhāriṇī ||</seg> </l>

<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.51'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vasanta-su-manaḥ-kḹpta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mālā-ābharaṇa-dhāriṇī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā ca pṛṣṭā mayāvocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo 'yaṃ saṃdhyāvadāruṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśokaṣaṇḍas tatrāste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivikte rājadārikā ||</seg> </l>

<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.52'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sā ca pṛṣṭā maya āvocad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yo 'yaṃ saṃdhyā-vad-āruṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aśoka-ṣaṇḍas tatrā aste</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivikte rāja-dārikā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena cāryaduhitur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vakreṇāpi tathā vrajaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo 'yaṃ priyaṅguṣaṇḍasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāti madhyena nirbhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anena cā arya-duhitur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vakreṇa api tathā vrajaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yo 'yaṃ priyaṅgu-ṣaṇḍasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yāti madhyena nir-bhayaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.54'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mādhavīsahakārānām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aṅkolānāṃ ca varjaya ||</seg> </l>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dūrāt kurabakānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'><note>Missing text</note> kānanam</seg> </l>

</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.55'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛṅgadaṃśabhayāt kas taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāpramattas tyajed iti ||</seg> </l>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛṅga-daṃśa-bhayāt kas taṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na a-pramattas tyajed iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca prasthitādrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadambakuṭajān api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālatīsaptaparṇāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mañjarīcchannapallavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tena ca prasthita ādrākṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kadamba-kuṭajān api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mālatī-saptaparṇāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mañjarī-cchanna-pallavān ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho śaktir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dohadasya varīyasī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anṛtāv api yenaite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jṛmbhitāḥ pādapā iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mama tv āsīd aho śaktir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dohadasya varīyasī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>an-ṛtāv api yena ete</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jṛmbhitāḥ pāda-pā- iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sātha paṅkajinīkūle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>himavatkaṃdharājate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilāpṛṣṭhe mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāndracandanakardame ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.58'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa ātha paṅka-jinī-kūle</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>himavat-kaṃdharā-jate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śilā-pṛṣṭhe mayā dṛṣṭā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāndra-candana-kardame ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samaśītātape 'py asmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasante śāradīva sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhyaṃdine jvareṇaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khedyamānā balīyasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sama-śīta-ātape 'py asmin</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasante śāradi īva sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhyaṃdine jvareṇa eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khedyamānā balīyasā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃtatais tālavṛntaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candanāpādramārutaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vījyamānā vacobhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāntvyamānātikomalaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃtatais tāla-vṛntaiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candana-āp-ādra-mārutaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vījyamānā vacobhiś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāntvyamāna āti-komalaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tasyā mayā gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samīpaṃ vandanā kṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tayāpi kṣiptacetastvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kiṃcid api bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>

<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha tasyā- mayā gatvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samīpaṃ vandanā kṛtā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>taya āpi kṣipta-cetastvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na kiṃ-cid api bhāṣitam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kumudikā tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādam ālambya niṣṭhuram</seg> </l>

</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kumudikā tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pādam ālambya niṣṭhuram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pratibuddhām avocat tāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaginī dṛśyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ kumudikāhastam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ālambyotthāya māṃ ciram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅgitavatī svāṅgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhvāntāṅgārāgniduḥsahaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
