<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅgitavatī sva-aṅgair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhvānta-aṅgāra-agni-duḥ-sahaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukhāsīnāṃ ca mām āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartā te sukhabhāgini</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satataṃ kuśalītyādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatheti ca mayoditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukha-āsīnāṃ ca mām āha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartā te sukha-bhāgini</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satataṃ kuśali īty-ādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatha īti ca maya ūditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punar āha sa te bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chāttratvād durjanaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhārādyair durārādhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvayā tad iti me matiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punar āha sa te bhartā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chāttratvād dur-janaḥ kila</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhāra-ādyair dur-ārādhas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvayā tad iti me matiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prītyā nandopanandābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yenāharati sādhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena naivopacaryo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayeti kathitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prītyā nanda-upanandābhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yenā aharati sādhitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena na eva upacaryo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maya īti kathitaṃ mayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punar uktaṃ tayā smitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nedaṃ saṃbhāvyate tayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājyāṃśo daśamas tābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhimānāt kilojjhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punar uktaṃ tayā smitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na idaṃ saṃbhāvyate tayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājya-aṃśo daśamas tābhyām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>abhimānāt kila ujjhitaḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau tvadbhartur avittasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānthasyājñātajanmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāsam abhyupagacchetāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ nāmeti durghaṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tau tvad-bhartur a-vittasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pānthasya a-jñāta-janmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dāsam abhyupagacchetāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃ nāma iti dur-ghaṭam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mayoktaṃ sarvam asty etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ tu tau divyacakṣuṣau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad evādiśataḥ kiṃcit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tathaiva hi sidhyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>maya ūktaṃ sarvam asty etat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ tu tau divya-cakṣuṣau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad evā adiśataḥ kiṃ-cit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tat tatha aiva hi sidhyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jyeṣṭhasya ca guṇā jyeṣṭhās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tābhyāṃ kasyeti mānuṣāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tenāṅgīkṛtavantau tau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madbhartur bhṛtyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jyeṣṭhasya ca guṇā- jyeṣṭhās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tābhyāṃ kasya iti mānuṣāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena aṅgī-kṛtavantau tau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mad-bhartur bhṛtyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhagīrathayaśāḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣkampākṣī kathām imām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tanūruhavikāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāśruṇāliṅgitā balāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhagīrathayaśāḥ śrutvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣkampa-akṣī kathām imām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tanū-ruha-vikāreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-aśruṇā āliṅgitā balāt ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca kṣaṇam āsīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āha māṃ rājadārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgaṃ pravahaṇakṣobhāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khinnam abhyañjyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ ca kṣaṇam āsīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āha māṃ rāja-dārikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgaṃ pravahaṇa-kṣobhāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khinnam abhyañjyatām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āstām āstām iti mayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anicchantyā yāvad ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvad balād balātailaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyadhāt kumudikā mayi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āstām āstām iti mayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>an-icchantyā yāvad ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāvad balād balā-tailaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyadhāt kumudikā mayi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvathākṣinikocādyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktvā kumudikādikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā me 'bhyaṅgāpadeśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivṛtyāṅgāni paśyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvatha ākṣi-nikoca-ādyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uktvā kumudikā-ādikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sā me 'bhyaṅga-apadeśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vivṛtya aṅgāni paśyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etat tvatkaraśākhābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>likhitaṃ <note>Missing text</note> mbhakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madīyam aṅgam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājadārikayoditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etat tvat-kara-śākhābhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>likhitaṃ <note>Missing text</note> mbhakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madīyam aṅgam ālokya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāja-dārikaya ūditam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho sakhe salajjāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālikā kulapālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayeha duḥsahā soḍhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>komalāṅgyā kadarthanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho sakhe sa-lajja āsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bālikā kula-pālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaya īha duḥ-sahā soḍhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>komala-aṅgyā kadarthanā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā tvaṃ parādhīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhartaiva tava nirdayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena prabaladarpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtaṃ vaiṣamyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha vā tvaṃ para-ādhīnā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bharta aiva tava nirdayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena prabala-darpeṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtaṃ vaiṣamyam īdṛśam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko 'nyo niṣkaruṇas tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaṃ yenotpalakomalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dantineva mahāndhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mathitā puṇḍarīkiṇī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ko 'nyo niṣ-karuṇas tasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvaṃ yena utpala-komalā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dantina īva mahā-andhena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mathitā puṇḍarīkiṇī ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>matsaṃdeśaṃ ca vācyo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim asthāne kṛtam tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi cūḍāmaṇiḥ pāde</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhavāmīti badhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mat-saṃdeśaṃ ca vācyo 'sau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kim a-sthāne kṛtam tvayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na hi cūḍā-maṇiḥ pāde</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhavāmi iti badhyate ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ hi karkaśāḥ soḍhuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaktā rājanyakanyakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>chāyākomalagātryas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na hi vānijadārikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>idaṃ hi karkaśāḥ soḍhuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaktā- rājanya-kanyakāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>chāyā-komala-gātryas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na hi vānija-dārikāḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi bahu jalpitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā mām udvartanādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satkārair annapānāntaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃmānitavatī ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ity-ādi bahu jalpitvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā mām udvartana-ādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sat-kārair anna-pāna-antaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃmānitavatī ciram ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāś ca kṣaṇasaṃkṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama saṃvatsarāyatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmatkathāprasaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sārkaṃ gatam idaṃ dinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasyāś ca kṣaṇa-saṃkṣiptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mama saṃvatsara-āyatam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuṣmat-kathā-prasaṅgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa-arkaṃ gatam idaṃ dinam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>athācalanitambābhāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svanitambād vimucya sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āmucan mekhalām enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mannitambe laghīyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atha a-cala-nitamba-abhāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-nitambād vimucya sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āmucan mekhalām enāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>man-nitambe laghīyasi ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahur visraṃsamānāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>granthir asyāṃ tayā kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svahastavilatair yatnān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛṇālītantusūtrakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahur visraṃsamānāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>granthir asyāṃ tayā kṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sva-hasta-vilatair yatnān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛṇālī-tantu-sūtrakaiḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasthāpitavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām ityādi vidhāya sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mekhalā skhalitā ceyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chittvā tat tantubandhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tataḥ prasthāpitavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mām ity-ādi vidhāya sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mekhalā skhalitā ca iyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chittvā tat tantu-bandhanam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tasyās tayā citre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prapañce 'smin nivedite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkalpajanmanāmṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkalpayitum ārabhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iti tasyās tayā citre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prapañce 'smin nivedite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃkalpa-janmanā āmṛṣṭaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃkalpayitum ārabhe ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā yad guru saṃdiṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upalabdhaṃ ca yat tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etad eva suparyāptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anurāgasya lakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tayā yad guru saṃdiṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upalabdhaṃ ca yat tayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etad eva su-paryāptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anurāgasya lakṣaṇam ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yat punar mekhalā baddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niḥsarair bisatantubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satsv apy anyeṣu sūtreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatredaṃ cintitaṃ tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yat punar mekhalā baddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niḥ-sarair bisa-tantubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>satsv apy anyeṣu sūtreṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra idaṃ cintitaṃ tayā ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirdayāliṅganakṣobhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ vicchedam eṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atheyaṃ mekhalā srastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śayyāyāṃ nipatiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirdaya-āliṅgana-kṣobhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>idaṃ vicchedam eṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atha iyaṃ mekhalā srastā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śayyāyāṃ nipatiṣyati ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lambāṃ cemām asau dṛṣṭvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mannitambaviśālatām</seg> </l>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anayā <note>Missing text</note> prītim</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādhāsyaty api kām iti ||</seg> </l>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.91'>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.92'>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.93'>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.94'>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.95'>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.96'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>janaḥ pracchādanīyo 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>khyāpito yaiḥ śaṭhair api ||</seg> </l>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.97'>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.98'>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.99'>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.100'>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.101'>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.102'>

<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vandanā-cchadmanā paścān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māyy ātmānaṃ nidhāya sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ceto-vinimayaṃ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravṛttā śibikām iti ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BKSS_28.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārādhayāmi nṛpasūnukṛte nu gaurīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ khānayāmi caturais tvaritaṃ suruṅgām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ityādyupāyaśatacintanatāntacetāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛcchrān niśām anayam apratilabdhanidraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BKSS_28.116'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ārādhayāmi nṛpa-sūnu-kṛte nu gaurīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ khānayāmi caturais tvaritaṃ suruṅgām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity-ādy-upāya-śata-cintana-tānta-cetāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛcchrān niśām anayam a-pratilabdha-nidraḥ ||</seg> </l>
</lg>
</note>

  </body>
